inspire.quote: Politeness is the flower of humanity
inspire.author: Joseph Joubert

inspire.quote: Pray for your health first, then pray for humanity
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Humanity should be our race. Love should be our religion
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Be a good human being, a warm hearted, affectionate person. That is my fundamental belief
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Be the reason someone smiles. Be the reason someone feels loved and believes in the goodness in people. Roy T
inspire.author: Bennett

inspire.quote: Kindness is the best form of humanity
inspire.author: Doris Lee

inspire.quote: You must never be fearful about what you are doing when it is right
inspire.author: Rosa Parks

inspire.quote: The next evolutionary step for humankind is to move from man to kind
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Strong people stand up for themselves, but stronger people stand up for others
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: My country is the world, and my religion is to do good
inspire.author: Thomas Paine

inspire.quote: The more we take, the less there is for future generations
inspire.author: Phil Kingston

inspire.quote: All I have is a sense of duty toward all people and an attachment to those with whom I have become intimate
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Humanity has only scratched the surface of its real potential
inspire.author: Peace Pilgrim

inspire.quote: We are very, very small, but we are profoundly capable of very, very big things
inspire.author: Stephen Hawking

inspire.quote: We cannot despair of humanity, since we ourselves are human beings
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I’m not concerned with your liking or disliking me… All I ask is that you respect me as a human being
inspire.author: Jackie Robinson

inspire.quote: Never discourage anyone who continually makes progress, no matter how slow
inspire.author: Plato

inspire.quote: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world
inspire.author: Malala Yousafzai

inspire.quote: Each of us must work for his own improvement, and at the same time share a general responsibility for all humanity
inspire.author: Marie Curie

inspire.quote: Moral courage is the highest expression of humanity
inspire.author: Ralph Nader

inspire.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: I don’t think of all the misery, but of the beauty that still remains
inspire.author: Anne Frank

inspire.quote: Earth provides enough to satisfy every man’s need, but not every man’s greed
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: The simplest way to be happy is to do good
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: Love life and life will love you back. Love people and they will love you back
inspire.author: Arthur Rubinstein

inspire.quote: I’m for truth, no matter who tells it. I’m for justice, no matter who it is for or against. I’m a human being, first and foremost, and as such I’m for whoever and whatever benefits humanity as a whole
inspire.author: Malcolm X

inspire.quote: Angry people want you to see how powerful they are. Loving people want you to see how powerful you are
inspire.author: Chief Red Eagle

inspire.quote: I have no race prejudices, and I think I have no color prejudices or caste prejudices nor creed prejudices. Indeed I know it. I can stand any society. All that I care to know is that a man is a human being-that is enough for me; he can’t be any worse
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: We think too much and feel too little. More than machinery, we need humanity; more than cleverness, we need kindness and gentleness. Without these qualities, life will be violent and all will be lost
inspire.author: Charlie Chaplin

inspire.quote: Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: We have flown the air like birds and swum the sea like fishes, but have yet to learn the simple act of walking the earth like brothers
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: Find the sweetness in your own heart, then you may find the sweetness in every heart
inspire.author: Rumi

inspire.quote: To be a man is to feel that one’s own stone contributes to building the edifice of the world
inspire.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

inspire.quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; it’s those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world
inspire.author: Desmond Tutu

inspire.quote: This is my creed: Happiness is the only good; reason the only torch; justice the only worship, humanity the only religion, and love the only priest
inspire.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

inspire.quote: I am constantly preoccupied with how to remove distance so that we can all come closer together, so that we can all begin to sense we are the same, we are one
inspire.author: David Hockney

inspire.quote: An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: Great thoughts speak only to the thoughtful mind, but great actions speak to all mankind
inspire.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspire.quote: To think ill of mankind and not wish ill to them, is perhaps the highest wisdom and virtue
inspire.author: William Hazlitt

inspire.quote: No religion is higher than humanity
inspire.author: Abdul Sattar Edhi

inspire.quote: Humanity is so much more than the sum of humans
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: This is one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind
inspire.author: Neil Armstrong

inspire.quote: The human race is just a chemical scum on a moderate-sized planet, orbiting around a very average star in the outer suburb of one among a hundred billion galaxies. We are so insignificant that I can’t believe the whole universe exists for our benefit. That would be like saying that you would disappear if I closed my eyes
inspire.author: Stephen Hawking

inspire.quote: Embrace with tender affection the whole of humanity, especially the poorest, the weakest, the least important
inspire.author: Pope Francis

inspire.quote: The great moral teachers of humanity were in a way artistic geniuses in the art of living
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The world will not be destroyed by those who do evil, but by those who watch them without doing anything
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The future of humanity is in our hands
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: Be certain that you do not die without having done something wonderful for humanity
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: If our tears do not lead us to act then we have lost the reason of our humanity, which is compassion
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: Our human compassion binds us the one to the other – not in pity or patronizingly but as human beings who have learnt how to turn our common suffering into hope for the future
inspire.author: Nelson Mandela

inspire.quote: No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin, or his background, or his religion. People must learn to hate, and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart than its opposite
inspire.author: Nelson Mandela

inspire.quote: We may have different religions, different languages, different colored skin, but we all belong to one human race. We all share the same basic values
inspire.author: Kofi Annan

inspire.quote: My friends, our challenge today is not to save Western civilization – or Eastern, for that matter. All civilization is at stake, and we can save it only if all peoples join together in the task
inspire.author: Kofi Annan

inspire.quote: In the midst of economic recovery and global upheaval, disasters like this remind us of the common humanity that we share
inspire.author: Barack Obama (On Japan, March 17, 2011)

inspire.quote: This is American leadership at its best. We stand with people who fight for their own freedom, and we rally other nations on behalf of our common security and common humanity
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: This country will not be a good place for any of us to live in unless we make it a good place for all of us to live in
inspire.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspire.quote: The bond of our common humanity is stronger than the divisiveness of our fears and prejudices
inspire.author: Jimmy Carter

inspire.quote: You want to max out your humanity by using your energy to lift yourself up, your family, and the people around you
inspire.author: Oprah Winfrey

inspire.quote: My humanity is bound up in yours, for we can only be human together
inspire.author: Desmond Tutu

inspire.quote: Benevolence is the characteristic element of humanity
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The golden way is to be friends with the world and to regard the whole human family as one
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: All labor that uplifts humanity has dignity and importance and should be undertaken with painstaking excellence
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: We must all learn to live together as brothers or we will all perish together as fools. Because of our involvement in humanity we must be concerned about every human being
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: Civilization began the first time an angry person cast a word instead of a rock
inspire.author: Sigmund Freud

inspire.quote: The world is a stage, but the play is badly cast
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: Each person must live their life as a model for others
inspire.author: Rosa Parks

inspire.quote: Comedy is the only hope for humanity
inspire.author: Roseanne Barr

inspire.quote: Think higher, feel deeper
inspire.author: Elie Wiesel

inspire.quote: Humanity needs to weep, and this is the time to weep
inspire.author: Pope Francis

inspire.quote: Truth is on the side of the oppressed
inspire.author: Malcolm X

inspire.quote: The perfect normal person is rare in our civilization
inspire.author: Karen Horney

inspire.quote: The moment we stop fighting for each other, that’s the moment that we lose our humanity
inspire.author: Adrian Hemlsley (In the movie "2012")

inspire.quote: The human race has improved everything, but the human race. Adlai E
inspire.author: Stevenson

inspire.quote: It’s all about humanity, humility, and integrity
inspire.author: Debra Wilson

inspire.quote: We are not broken, we are just unfinished
inspire.author: Dawna Markova

inspire.quote: Humanity is the virtue of a woman, generosity that of a man
inspire.author: Adam Smith

inspire.quote: The more I see of man, the more I like dogs
inspire.author: Madame de Stael

inspire.quote: God must love the common man, he made so many of them
inspire.author: Abraham Lincoln

inspire.quote: You cannot hope to build a better world without improving the individuals
inspire.author: Marie Curie

inspire.quote: Every step we take on earth brings us to a new world
inspire.author: Federico Garcia Lorca

inspire.quote: My humanity is a constant self-overcoming
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: The only real nation is humanity
inspire.author: Paul Farmer

inspire.quote: Compassion becomes real when we recognize our shared humanity
inspire.author: Pema Chodron

inspire.quote: Be soft. Do not let the world make you hard
inspire.author: Unknown (Submitted by the Wisdom Quotes Community)

inspire.quote: You don’t need a reason to help people
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Sometimes a hug is worth more than a thousand words
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: I am not a human being; I am a human becoming
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Be the reason someone smiles today
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: I would never trust a man who didn’t cry
inspire.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

inspire.quote: The strides of humanity are slow, they can only be counted in centuries
inspire.author: Georg Buchner

inspire.quote: The planet is fine. The people are fucked
inspire.author: George Carlin

inspire.quote: To err is human, to forgive, divine
inspire.author: Alexander Pope

inspire.quote: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire
inspire.author: Thomas Keneally

inspire.quote: All of our humanity is dependent upon recognizing the humanity in others
inspire.author: Desmond Tutu

inspire.quote: Let’s be better humans
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: If you want to awaken all of humanity, awaken all of yourself
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Humanity’s best works are still ahead, in every single field, and this is likely to remain true for thousands of years
inspire.author: François Chollet

inspire.quote: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful
inspire.author: Malala Yousafzai

inspire.quote: We were scared, but our fear was not as strong as our courage
inspire.author: Malala Yousafzai

inspire.quote: At the end of the day, we can endure much more than we think we can
inspire.author: Frida Kahlo

inspire.quote: Progress is the attraction that moves humanity
inspire.author: Marcus Garvey

inspire.quote: We have to do the best we are capable of. This is our sacred human responsibility
inspire.author: Albert Einstien

inspire.quote: This is what you shall do; Love the earth and sun and the animals, despise riches, give alms to every one that asks, stand up for the stupid and crazy, devote your income and labor to others, hate tyrants, argue not concerning God, have patience and indulgence toward the people
inspire.author: Walt Whitman

inspire.quote: People don’t realize how a man’s whole life can be changed by one book
inspire.author: Malcolm X

inspire.quote: Our most important task as a nation is to make sure all our young people can achieve their dreams
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: One of the biggest lies in the story of humanity is the lie of our imperfection
inspire.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

inspire.quote: The world is truly beautiful solely in the eyes of a true philosopher
inspire.author: Kedar Joshi

inspire.quote: Part 1. A human being is a part of the whole called by us universe, a part limited in time and space
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Part 2. He experiences himself, his thoughts and feeling as something separated from the rest, a kind of optical delusion of his consciousness
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Part 3. This delusion is a kind of prison for us, restricting us to our personal desires and to affection for a few persons nearest to us
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Part 4. Our task must be to free ourselves from this prison by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature in its beauty
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: We must see in every person a universe with its own secrets, with its own treasures, with its own sources of anguish, and with some measure of triumph
inspire.author: Elie Wiesel

inspire.quote: Once you bring life into the world, you must protect it. We must protect it by changing the world
inspire.author: Elie Wiesel

inspire.quote: Since we live in this world, we have to do our best for this world
inspire.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

inspire.quote: Courage. Kindness. Friendship. Character. These are the qualities that define us as human beings, and propel us, on occasion, to greatness. R.J
inspire.author: Palacio

inspire.quote: Know that although in the eternal scheme of things you are small, you are also unique and irreplaceable, as are all your fellow humans everywhere in the world
inspire.author: Margaret Laurence

inspire.quote: To be a good human being is to have a kind of openness to the world, an ability to trust uncertain things beyond your own control, that can lead you to be shattered in very extreme circumstances for which you were not to blame. That says something very important about the condition of the ethical life: that it is based on a trust in the uncertain and on a willingness to be exposed; it’s based on being more like a plant than like a jewel, something rather fragile, but whose very particular beauty is inseparable from that fragility
inspire.author: Martha Nussbaum

inspire.quote: It is not what a lawyer tells me I may do; but what humanity, reason, and justice tell me I ought to do
inspire.author: Edmund Burke

inspire.quote: I don’t believe in people just hoping. We work for what we want. I always say that one has no right to hope without endeavor
inspire.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

inspire.quote: Stand for something or you will fall for anything. Today’s mighty oak is yesterday’s nut that held its ground
inspire.author: Rosa Parks

inspire.quote: People always say that I didn’t give up my seat because I was tired, but that isn’t true. I was not tired physically … No, the only tired I was, was tired of giving in
inspire.author: Rosa Parks

inspire.quote: We forge gradually our greatest instrument for understanding the world – introspection. We discover that humanity may resemble us very considerably – that the best way of knowing the inwardness of our neighbors is to know ourselves
inspire.author: Walter Lippmann (See also: introvert quotes)

inspire.quote: The true test of a character is to face hard conditions with the determination to make them better
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: I’ve found that there is always some beauty left – in nature, sunshine, freedom, in yourself
inspire.author: Anne Frank

inspire.quote: Even one voice can be heard loudly all over the world in this day and age
inspire.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

inspire.quote: One person of integrity can make a difference
inspire.author: Elie Wiesel

inspire.quote: What makes you vulnerable makes you beautiful
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: I believe that mankind’s destiny lies in the stars
inspire.author: Neil Gaiman

inspire.quote: All human eyes have longing in them
inspire.author: Ernesto Cardenal

inspire.quote: We realize the importance of our voices only when we are silenced
inspire.author: Malala Yousafzai

inspire.quote: Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity
inspire.author: Horace Mann

inspire.quote: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others
inspire.author: Rosa Parks

inspire.quote: Enjoying the joys of others and suffering with them – these are the best guides for men
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Man can find meaning in life, short and perilous as it is, only through devoting himself to society
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: My passionate sense of social justice and social responsibility has always contrasted oddly with my pronounced lack of need for direct contact with other human beings and human communities
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Science knows no country, because knowledge belongs to humanity, and is the torch which illuminates the world
inspire.author: Louis Pasteur

inspire.quote: The problem with the world is that the intelligent people are full of doubts, while the stupid ones are full of confidence
inspire.author: Charles Bukowski

inspire.quote: The most potent weapon in the hands of the oppressor is the mind of the oppressed
inspire.author: Stephen Biko

inspire.quote: How many disasters do we need to unite humanity
inspire.author: Loesje

inspire.quote: I love mankind; it’s people I can’t stand. Charles M
inspire.author: Schulz

inspire.quote: There is nothing on earth divine except humanity
inspire.author: Walter Savage Landor

inspire.quote: On the whole human beings want to be good, but not too good, and not quite all the time
inspire.author: George Orwell

inspire.quote: How far you go in life depends on your being tender with the young, compassionate with the aged, sympathetic with the striving and tolerant of the weak and strong. Because someday in your life you will have been all of these
inspire.author: George Washington Carver

inspire.quote: Act in such a way that you treat humanity, whether in your own person or in the person of any other, never merely as a means to an end, but always at the same time as an end
inspire.author: Immanuel Kant

inspire.quote: What makes earth feel like hell is our expectation that it should feel like heaven
inspire.author: Chuck Palahniuk

inspire.quote: All things in this vast universe exist in you, with you, and for you
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: Is man’s civilization only a wrappage, through which the savage nature of him can still burst, infernal as ever?
inspire.author: Thomas Carlyle

inspire.quote: What Darwin was too polite to say, my friends, is that we came to rule the earth not because we were the smartest, or even the meanest, but because we have always been the craziest, most murderous motherfuckers in the jungle
inspire.author: Stephen King

inspire.quote: In times of danger large groups rise to the highest pitch of enthusiasm, courage and sacrifice… Mankind will be refashioned and history rewritten when this law is understood and obeyed
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: We are not human beings having a spiritual experience. We are spiritual beings having a human experience
inspire.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

inspire.quote: Human beings seem to be a poor invention
inspire.author: If they are the noblest works of God where is the ignoblest? Mark Twain

inspire.quote: If there must be trouble, let it be in my day, that my child may have peace
inspire.author: Thomas Paine

inspire.quote: Humanity is the refuse of spirit
inspire.author: James Lendall Basford

inspire.quote: We are healthy only to the extent that our ideas are humane
inspire.author: Kurt Vonnegut

inspire.quote: I ask you to ensure that humanity is served by wealth, and not ruled by it
inspire.author: Pope Francis

inspire.quote: People have become educated but have not become human
inspire.author: Abdul Sattar Edhi

inspire.quote: Dream for a better world and for a better humanity, not for a better car and a bigger house
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: All that is valuable in human society depends upon the opportunity for development accorded to the individual
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: If you’re in the luckiest one per cent of humanity, you owe it to the rest of humanity to think about the other 99 per cent
inspire.author: Warren Buffett

inspire.quote: I’m not impressed by money, social status or job title. I’m impressed by the way someone treats other human beings
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: There can be no high civilization where there is not ample leisure
inspire.author: Henry Ward Beecher

inspire.quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: The only worthwhile achievements of man are those which are socially useful
inspire.author: Alfred Adler

inspire.quote: It is only our humanity that can deliver us from the brutality of our achievements
inspire.author: Henry Rollins

inspire.quote: Just be good. I’m good. Not because I think I’ll go to heaven but because when I do something bad, I feel bad. And when I do something good, I feel good
inspire.author: Ricky Gervais

inspire.quote: While we are sitting in meditation, we are simply exploring humanity and all of creation in the form of ourselves
inspire.author: Pema Chodron

inspire.quote: We can become extremely wise and sensitive to all of humanity and the whole universe simply by knowing ourselves, just as we are
inspire.author: Pema Chodron

inspire.quote: Being human is given. But keeping our humanity is a choice
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: I am not religious. I am a humanist because human beings are more important than dogma an traditions
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: The universe is my country and the human family is my tribe
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: Our chief usefulness to humanity rests on our combining power with high purpose. Power undirected by high purpose spells calamity, and high purpose by itself is utterly useless if the power to put it into effect is lacking
inspire.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Wealth without work, pleasure without conscience, knowledge without character, commerce without morality, science without humanity, worship without sacrifice, politics without principles
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don’t do anything about it
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Take care that you don’t treat inhumanity as it treats human beings
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: It is absurd to divide people into good and bad. People are either charming or tedious
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: There is always more misery among the lower classes than there is humanity in the higher
inspire.author: Victor Hugo

inspire.quote: You’ll never have a quiet world till you knock the patriotism out of the human race
inspire.author: George Bernard Shaw

inspire.quote: How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: If you want to change the world, go home and love your family
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: People are unrealistic, illogical, and self-centered. Love them anyway
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: It’s not how much we give but how much love we put into giving
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak but their echoes are truly endless
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: God doesn’t require us to succeed, he only requires that you try
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: If we worry too much about ourselves, we won’t have time for others
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Some people come in our life as blessings. Some come in your life as lessons
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight; build it anyway
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: The first step to becoming is to will it
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Prayer in action is love, love in action is service
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: The fruit of love is service, which is compassion in action
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Never worry about numbers. Help one person at a time and always start with the person nearest you
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Life is a song, sing it. Life is a struggle, accept it
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: I want you to be concerned about your next-door neighbor
inspire.author: Do you know your next-door neighbor?

inspire.quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: I know God won’t give me anything I can’t handle. I just wish he didn’t trust me so much
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: It is a kingly act to assist the fallen
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: I do not pray for success, I ask for faithfulness
inspire.author: Click to tweet (See also: faith quotes)

inspire.quote: The success of love is in the loving – it is not in the result of loving. Of course it is natural in love to want the best for the other person, but whether it turns out that way or not does not determine the value of what we have done
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Do ordinary things with extraordinary love
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: How can there be too many children? That is like saying there are too many flowers
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: The problem with the world is that we draw the circle of our family too small
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Do not worry about why problems exist in the world – just respond to people’s needs
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: If we really want to love we must learn how to forgive
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Love to be real, it must cost — it must hurt — it must empty us of self
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Be happy in the moment, that’s enough. Each moment is all we need, not more
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: A life not lived for others is not a life
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Keep the corners of your mouth turned up. Speak in a low, persuasive tone. Listen; be teachable. Laugh at good stories and learn to tell them…For as long as you are green, you can grow
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: I fear just one thing: Money! Greed was what motivated Judas to sell Jesus
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Peace begins with a smile
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: The most terrible poverty is loneliness, and the feeling of being unloved
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: If you can’t feed a hundred people, then feed just one
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Live simply so others may simply live
inspire.author: (See also: simplicity quotes)

inspire.quote: One of the greatest diseases is to be nobody to anybody
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Please choose the way of peace. In the short term there may be winners and losers in this war that we all dread. But that never can, or never will justify the suffering, pain and loss of life your weapons will cause
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Work without love is slavery
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: If you find happiness, people may be jealous. Be happy anyway
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Life is a challenge, we must take it
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: We do not need guns and bombs to bring peace, we need love and compassion
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Let us not be satisfied with just giving money. Money is not enough, money can be got, but they need your hearts to love them. So, spread your love everywhere you go
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Never travel faster than your guardian angel can fly
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Joy is a net of love in which you can catch souls
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Love cannot remain by itself – it has no meaning. Love has to be put into action, and that action is service
inspire.author: Mother Teresa
Unknown
inspire.quote: I am not sure exactly what heaven will be like, but I know that when we die and it comes time for God to judge us, he will not ask, ‘How many good things have you done in your life?’ rather he will ask, ‘How much love did you put into what you did?
It is only when you realize your nothingness, your emptiness, that God can fill you with Himself
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Jesus said love one another. He didn’t say love the whole world
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: I am only a pencil in the hand of God, but it is He who writes
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: The less we have, the more we give. Seems absurd, but it’s the logic of love
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Life is an opportunity, benefit from it. Life is beauty, admire it. Life is a dream, realize it
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: There is a light in this world, a healing spirit more powerful than any darkness we may encounter
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Do not think that love, in order to be genuine, has to be extraordinary. What we need is to love without getting tired
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: I only feel angry when I see waste. When I see people throwing away things that we could use
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Sometimes a good feeling from inside is worth much more than a beautician
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: If we pray, we will believe; If we believe, we will love; If we love, we will serve
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: If you are humble nothing will touch you, neither praise nor disgrace, because you know what you are
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Keep in mind that our community is not composed of those who are already saints, but of those who are trying to become saints. Therefore let us be extremely patient with each other’s faults and failures
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: We fear the future because we are wasting today
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Profound joy of the heart is like a magnet that indicates the path of life
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones – the ones at home
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: If I look at the mass I will never act
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: These are the few ways we can practice humility: To speak as little as possible of one’s self. To mind one’s own business. Not to want to manage other people’s affairs. To avoid curiosity. To accept contradictions and correction cheerfully. To pass over the mistakes of others. To accept insults and injuries. To accept being slighted, forgotten and disliked. To be kind and gentle even under provocation. Never to stand on one’s dignity. To choose always the hardest
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: When you don’t have anything, then you have everything
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: I can do things you cannot, you can do things I cannot; together we can do great things
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Even the rich are hungry for love, for being cared for, for being wanted, for having someone to call their own
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Everybody today seems to be in such a terrible rush, anxious for greater developments and greater riches and so on, so that children have very little time for their parents. Parents have very little time for each other, and in the home begins the disruption of peace of the world
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: It is easy to love the people far away. It is not always easy to love those close to us. It is easier to give a cup of rice to relieve hunger than to relieve the loneliness and pain of someone unloved in our own home. Bring love into your home for this is where our love for each other must start
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Words which do not give the light of Christ increase the darkness
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: We do not need guns and bombs to bring peace, we need love and compassion
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: We need to find God, and he cannot be found in noise and restlessness. God is the friend of silence. See how nature – trees, flowers, grass- grows in silence; see the stars, the moon and the sun, how they move in silence… We need silence to be able to touch souls
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Where is my faith? Even deep down … there is nothing but emptiness and darkness. … If there be God – please forgive me. When I try to raise my thoughts to Heaven, there is such convicting emptiness that those very thoughts return like sharp knives and hurt my very soul
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: It’s easy to stand in the crowd but it takes courage to stand alone
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Service without humility is selfishness and egotism
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: My life is my message
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Hate the sin, love the sinner
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The enemy is fear. We think it is hate; but, it is fear
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Seek not greater wealth, but simpler pleasure; not higher fortune, but deeper felicity
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Our greatest ability as humans is not to change the world; but to change ourselves
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: In doing something, do it with love or never do it at all
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is a sufficiency in the world for man’s need but not for man’s greed
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: What barrier is there that love cannot break?
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Honest disagreement is often a good sign of progress
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The real ornament of woman is her character, her purity
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Man should forget his anger before he lies down to sleep
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Gentleness, self-sacrifice and generosity are the exclusive possession of no one race or religion
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is nothing that wastes the body like worry, and one who has any faith in God should be ashamed to worry about anything whatsoever
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A ‘No’ uttered from deepest conviction is better and greater than a ‘Yes’ merely uttered to please, or what is worse, to avoid trouble
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A man is but the product of his thoughts. What he thinks, he becomes
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: They cannot take away our self-respect if we do not give it to them
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: To lose patience is to lose the battle
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: My faith is brightest in the midst of impenetrable darkness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Truth without humility would be an arrogant caricature
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: That service is the noblest which is rendered for its own sake
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Even if the paradise of material satisfactions, which they envisage as their final goal, were realize on earth, it would not bring mankind either contentment or peace
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The difference between what we do and what we are capable of doing would suffice to solve most of the world’s problems
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles; but today it means getting along with people
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is unwise to be too sure of one’s own wisdom. It is healthy to be reminded that the strongest might weaken and the wisest might err
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: You can chain me, you can torture me, you can even destroy this body, but you will never imprison my mind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: To give pleasure to a single heart by a single act is better than a thousand heads bowing in prayer
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 1. Man falls from the pursuit of the ideal of plan living and high thinking the moment he wants to multiply his daily wants
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 2. Man’s happiness really lies in contentment. He who is discontented, however much he possesses, becomes a slave to his desires
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is the quality of our work which will please God and not the quantity
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Man becomes great exactly in the degree in which he works for the welfare of his fellow-men
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolence is a weapon of the strong
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The only tyrant I accept in this world is the still voice within
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The true measure of any society can be found in how it treats its most vulnerable members
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Faith is not something to grasp, it is a state to grow into
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with it
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Where there is love there is life
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: First they ignore you, then they laugh at you, then they fight you, then you win
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Interviewer: "What do you think of Western Civilization?" Gandhi: "I think it would be a good idea"
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A customer is the most important visitor on our premises
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I like your Christ. I do not like your Christians. Your Christians are so unlike your Christ
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Take care of this moment
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Live simply so that others may simply live
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Truth is one, paths are many
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Self-respect knows no considerations
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Action expresses priorities
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Commonsense is the realised sense of proportion
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The future depends on what you do today
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Doubt is invariably the result of want or weakness of faith
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: God has no religion
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: True beauty consists of purity of heart
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Find purpose. The means will follow
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is no ‘way to peace’, there is only ‘peace’
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Healthy discontent is the prelude to progress
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Imitation is the sincerest flattery
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Fear has its use but cowardice has none
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Peace is its own reward
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Full effort is full victory
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Whatever I do is out of love
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A small body of determined spirits fired by an unquenchable faith in their mission can alter the course of history
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A nation’s culture resides in the hearts and in the soul of its people
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I am a humble but very earnest seeker after truth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Whatever you do may seem insignificant to you, but it is most important that you do it
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Many people, especially ignorant people, want to punish you for speaking the truth, for being correct, for being you. Never apologize for being correct, or for being years ahead of your time. If you’re right and you know it, speak your mind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: We may never be strong enough to be entirely nonviolent in thought, word and deed. But we must keep nonviolence as our goal and make strong progress towards it
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Namaste. I honour the place in you where the entire universe resides… a place of light, of love, of truth, of peace, of wisdom. I honour the place in you where when you are in that place and I am in that place there is only one of us
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Each night, when I go to sleep, I die. And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is force in the universe, which, if we permit it, will flow through us and produce miraculous results
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Truth resides in every human heart, and one has to search for it there, and to be guided by truth as one sees it. But no one has a right to coerce others to act according to his own view of truth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: As human beings, our greatness lies not so much in being able to remake the world – that is the myth of the atomic age – as in being able to remake ourselves
inspire.author: (See also: change quotes)

inspire.quote: When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love has always won. There have been tyrants and murderers and for a time they seem invincible, but in the end, they always fall – think of it, always
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There are two days in the year that we can not do anything – yesterday and tomorrow
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: What is true of the individual will be tomorrow true of the whole nation if individuals will but refuse to lose heart and hope
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Unwearied ceaseless effort is the price that must be paid for turning faith into a rich infallible experience
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Infinite striving to be the best is man’s duty; it is its own reward. Everything else is in God’s hands
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Everyone who wills can hear the inner voice. It is within everyone
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If by strength is meant moral power, then woman is immeasurably man’s superior
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A weak man is just by accident. A strong but nonviolent man is unjust by accident
inspire.author: (See also patience quotes)

inspire.quote: Speak only if it improves upon the silence
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is no principle worth the name if it is not wholly good
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nothing has saddened me so much in life as the hardness of heart of educated people
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is better to be violent, if there is violence in our hearts, than to put on the cloak of nonviolence to cover impotence
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A principle is the expression of perfection, and as imperfect beings like us cannot practise perfection, we devise every moment limits of its compromise in practice
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Rationalists are admirable beings, rationalism is a hideous monster when it claims for itself omnipotence. Attribution of omnipotence to reason is as bad a piece of idolatry as is worship of stock and stone believing it to be God
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I will far rather see the race of man extinct than that we should become less than beasts by making the noblest of God’s creation, woman, the object of our lust
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is any day better to stand erect with a broken and bandaged head then to crawl on one’s belly, in order to be able to save one’s head
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Study not man in his animal nature – man following the laws of the jungle – but study man in all his glory
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I do not believe that multiplication of wants and machinery contrived to supply them is taking the world a single step nearer its goal… I whole-heartedly detest this mad desire to destroy distance and time, to increase animal appetites and go to the ends of the earth in search of their satisfaction. If modern civilization stands for all this, and I have understood it to do so, I call it Satanic
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Before the throne of the Almighty, man will be judged not by his acts but by his intentions. For God alone reads our hearts
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I do all the evil I can before I learn to shun it? Is it not enough to know the evil to shun it? If not, we should be sincere enough to admit that we love evil too well to give it up
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I have also seen children successfully surmounting the effects of an evil inheritance. That is due to purity being an inherent attribute of the soul
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I am prepared to die, but there is no cause for which I am prepared to kill
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The rich cannot accumulate wealth without the co-operation of the poor in society
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There are people in the world so hungry, that God cannot appear to them except in the form of bread
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The human voice can never reach the distance that is covered by the still small voice of conscience
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Rights that do not flow from duty well performed are not worth having
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If I had no sense of humor, I would long ago have committed suicide
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is health that is real wealth and not pieces of gold and silver
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Anger is the enemy of nonviolence and pride is a monster that swallows it up
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If you take care of your immediate surroundings, the universe will take care of itself
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The golden rule of conduct is mutual toleration, seeing that we will never all think alike and we shall always see Truth in fragment and from different points of vision
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The roots of violence: Wealth without work, pleasure without conscience, knowledge without character, commerce without morality, science without humanity, worship without sacrifice, politics without principles
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Capital as such is not evil; it is its wrong use that is evil. Capital in some form or other will always be needed
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: All compromise is based on give and take, but there can be no give and take on fundamentals. Any compromise on mere fundamentals is a surrender. For it is all give and no take
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Man often becomes what he believes himself to be. If I keep on saying to myself that I cannot do a certain thing, it is possible that I may end by really becoming incapable of doing it
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Faith… must be enforced by reason… when faith becomes blind it dies
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Action is no less necessary than thought to the instinctive tendencies of the human frame
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Do not judge others. Be your own judge and you will be truly happy. If you will try to judge others, you are likely to burn your fingers
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: When you are right, you have no need to be angry. When you are wrong, you have no right to be angry
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The Seven Sins are: Wealth without work. Pleasure without conscience. Knowledge without character. Commerce without morality. Science without humanity. Religion without sacrifice. Politics without principle. See also https://en.wikipedia
inspire.author: org/wiki/Seven_Social_Sins

inspire.quote: There is a higher court than courts of justice and that is the court of conscience. It supercedes all other courts
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Morality which depends upon the helplessness of a man or woman has not much to recommend it. Morality is rooted in the purity of our hearts
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Just as a man would not cherish living in a body other than his own, so do nations not like to live under other nations, however noble and great the latter may be
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Increase of material comforts, it may be generally laid down, does not in any way whatsoever conduce to moral growth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A man of few words will rarely be thoughtless in his speech; he will measure every word
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Whenever you are confronted with an opponent. Conquer him with love
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A man’s true wealth hereafter is the good he has done to his fellowmen
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Relationships are based on four principles: respect, understanding, acceptance and appreciation
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If your heart acquires strength, you will be able to remove blemishes from others without thinking evil of them
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The golden rule to apply in all such cases is resolutely to refuse to have what millions cannot
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Whether humanity will consciously follow the law of love, I do not know. But that need not disturb me. The law will work just as the law of gravitation works, whether we accept it or not
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The person who discovered the law of love was a far greater scientist than any of our modern scientists
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I first learned the concepts of nonviolence in my marriage
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A man who was completely innocent, offered himself as a sacrifice for the good of others, including his enemies, and became the ransom of the world. It was a perfect act
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Hatred ever kills, love never dies. Such is the vast difference between the two. What is obtained by love is retained for all time. What is obtained by hatred proves a burden in reality for it increases hatred
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Forgiveness is choosing to love. It is the first skill of self-giving love
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I believe that the sum total of the energy of mankind is not to bring us down but to lift us up, and that is the result of the definite, if unconscious, working of the law of love
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Let the first act of every morning be to make the following resolve for the day: I shall not fear anyone on Earth. I shall fear only God. I shall not bear ill will toward anyone. I shall not submit to injustice from anyone. I shall conquer untruth by truth. And in resisting untruth, I shall put up with all suffering
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I claim that human mind or human society is not divided into watertight compartments called social, political and religious. All act and react upon one another
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Where love is, there God is also
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Man can never be a woman’s equal in the spirit of selfless service with which nature has endowed her
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Interdependence is and ought to be as much the ideal of man as self-sufficiency. Man is a social being
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I look only to the good qualities of men. Not being faultless myself, I won’t presume to probe into the faults of others
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Love is the strongest force the world possesses and yet it is the humblest imaginable
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Intolerance betrays want of faith in one’s cause
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Civilization is the encouragement of differences
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: America aims at having a car for every citizen. I do not
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I cannot conceive of a greater loss than the loss of one’s self-respect
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolence is impossible without humility
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Always aim at complete harmony of thought and word and deed. Always aim at purifying your thoughts and everything will be well
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Constant development is the law of life, and a man who always tries to maintain his dogmas in order to appear consistent drives himself into a false position
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The less you possess, the less you want, the better you are. And better for what? Not for enjoyment of this life, but for enjoyment of personal service to the fellow-beings; service which you dedicate yourself, body, soul and mind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 1. It’s the action, not the fruit of the action, that’s important
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 2. You have to do the right thing. It may not be in your power, may not be in your time, that there’ll be any fruit
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 3. But that doesn’t mean you stop doing the right thing. You may never know what results come from your action
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 4. But if you do nothing, there will be no result
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is really no slavery equal to that of the desires. All the sages have declared from the house-tops that man can be his own worst enemy as well as his best friend. To be free or to be a slave lies in his own hands. And what is true for the individual is true for society
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If by abundance you mean everyone having plenty to eat and drink and to clothe himself with, enough to keep his mind trained and educated, I should be satisfied. But I should not like to pack more stuffs in my belly than I can digest and more things than I can ever usefully use. But neither do I want poverty, penury, misery, dirt and dust in India
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: He who would sacrifice his life for others has hardly time to reserve for himself a place in the sun
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: True humility means most strenuous and constant endeavor entirely directed towards the service of humanity
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Just as one must not receive, so must one not possess anything which one does not really need. It would be a breach of this principle to possess unnecessary food-stuffs, clothing, or furniture. For instance, one must not keep a chair if one can do without it. In observing this principle one is led to a progressive simplification of one’s own life
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The first condition of humaneness is a little humility and a little diffidence about the correctness of one’s conduct and a little receptiveness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I know that I have still before me a difficult path to traverse. I must reduce myself to zero. So long as a man does not of his own free will put himself last among his fellow creatures, there is no salvation for him. Ahimsa is the farthest limit of humility
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: My imperfections and failures are as much a blessing from God as my successes and my talents and I lay them both at his feet
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: When I admire the wonders of a sunset or the beauty of the moon, my soul expands in the worship of the creator
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The very first step in nonviolence is that we cultivate in our daily life, as between ourselves, truthfulness, humility, tolerance, loving kindness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is an orderliness in the universe, there is an unalterable law governing everything and every being that exists or lives. It is no blind law; for no blind law can govern the conduct of living beings
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: One, who abandons all desires, is free from pride and selfishness and behaves as one apart, finds peace
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The main purpose of life is to live rightly, think rightly, act rightly. The soul must languish when we give all our thought to the body
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Providence has its appointed hour for everything. We cannot command results, we can only strive
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I do not want to foresee the future. I am concerned with taking care of the present. God has given me no control over the moment following
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: In matters of conscience, the law of the majority has no place
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Freedom is never dear at any price. It is the breath of life
inspire.author: What would a man not pay for living?

inspire.quote: To believe in something, and not to live it, is dishonest
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Truth never damages a cause that is just
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A man of truth must also be a man of care
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: In judging myself I shall try to be as harsh as truth, as I want others also to be
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Morality is the basis of things and truth is the substance of all morality
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The seeker after truth should be humbler than the dust. The world crushes the dust under its feet, but the seeker after truth should so humble himself that even the dust could crush him. Only then, and not till then, will he have a glimpse of truth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is nothing on earth that I would not give up, excepting of course, two things and two things only, truth and nonviolence
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Truth is by nature self-evident. As soon as you remove the cobwebs of ignorance that surround it, it shines clear
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Silence has now become both a physical and spiritual necessity for me. Originally it was taken to relieve the sense of pressure. Then I wanted time for writing. After, however, I had practiced it for some time I saw the spiritual value of it. It suddenly flashed across my mind that that was the time when I could best hold communion with God. And now I feel as though I was naturally built for silence
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: What is Truth? A difficult question; but I have solved it for myself by saying that it is what the "voice within" tells you
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: All that I can in true humility present to you is that Truth is not to be found by anybody who has not got an abundant sense of humility. If you would swim on the bosom of the ocean of Truth you must reduce yourself to zero
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: An error does not become truth by reason of multiplied propagation, nor does truth become error because nobody sees it
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: But it is impossible for us to realize perfect truth so long as we are imprisoned in this mortal frame
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Truth alone will endure, all the rest will be swept away before the tide of time
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Truth, purity, self-control, firmness, fearlessness, humility, unity, peace, and renunciation – these are the inherent qualities of a civil resister
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Silence becomes cowardice when occasion demands speaking out the whole truth and acting accordingly
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The pursuit of truth does not permit violence on one’s opponent
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It has often occurred to me that a seeker after Truth has to be silent
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: In the midst of death life persists
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A courageous man prefers death to the surrender of self-respect
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: You don’t know who is important to you until you actually lose them
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Fear of death makes us devoid both of valour and religion. For want of valour is want of religious faith
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Man lives freely only by his readiness to die, if need be, at the hands of his brother, never by killing him
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If we weep for all the deaths in our country, the tears in our eyes would never dry
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Life and death are but phases of the same thing, the reverse and obverse of the same coin. Death is as necessary for man’s growth as life itself
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I came alone in this world, I have walked alone in the valley of the shadow of death, and I shall quit alone when the time comes
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: We do not know whether it is good to live or to die. Therefore, we should not take delight in living, nor should we tremble at the thought of death. We should be equiminded towards death
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Where death without resistance or death after resistance is the only way, neither party should think of resorting to law-courts or help from the government
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The wise are unaffected either by death or life. These are but faces of the same coin
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: To die in the act of killing is, in essence, to die defeated
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi
Mahatma Gandhi
inspire.quote: What is imprisonment to the man who is fearless of death itself?
If you want real peace in the world, start with children
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Unity to be real must stand the severest strain without breaking
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The day the power of love overrules the love of power, the world will know peace
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The golden way is to be friends with the world and to regard the whole human family as one
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is no occasion for women to consider themselves subordinate or inferior to men
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Justice that love gives is a surrender, justice that law gives is a punishment
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: To call woman the weaker sex is a libel; it is man’s injustice to woman
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I believe in equality for everyone, except reporters and photographers
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If we are to teach real peace in this world, & if we are to carry on a real war against war, we shall have to begin with children
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A man must arrange his physical and cultural circumstances so that they do not hinder him in his service of humanity, on which all his energies should be concentrated
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A living faith in God means acceptance of the brotherhood of mankind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The cry for peace will be a cry in the wilderness, so long as the spirit of nonviolence does not dominate millions of men and women
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I offer you peace. I offer you love. I offer you friendship. I see your beauty. I hear your need. I feel your feelings
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Friendship that insists upon agreement on all things isn’t worth the name
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is easy enough to be friendly to one’s friends. But to befriend the one who regards himself as your enemy is the quintessence of true religion. The other is mere business
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I believe in the essential unity of all people and for that matter of all lives. Therefore, I believe that if one person gains spiritually, the whole world gains, and if one person falls, the whole world falls to that extent
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Mankind is notoriously too dense to read the signs that God sends from time to time. We require drums to be beaten into our ears, before we should wake from our trance and hear the warning and see that to lose oneself in all, is the only way to find oneself
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Our ability to reach unity in diversity will be the beauty and the test of our civilisation
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: My life is an indivisible whole, and all my attitudes run into one another; and they all have their rise in my insatiable love for mankind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Each one has to find his peace from within. And peace to be real must be unaffected by outside circumstances
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Man’s nature is not essentially evil. Brute nature has been know to yield to the influence of love. You must never despair of human nature
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The moment there is suspicion about a person’s motives, everything he does becomes tainted
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: When restraint and courtesy are added to strength, the latter becomes irresistible
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi
Mahatma Gandhi
inspire.quote: We may have our private opinions but why should they be a bar to the meeting of hearts?
The law of sacrifice is uniform throughout the world. To be effective it demands the sacrifice of the bravest and the most spotless
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Service which is rendered without joy helps neither the servant nor the served. But all other pleasures and possessions pale into nothingness before service which is rendered in a spirit of joy
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Measures must always in a progressive society be held superior to men, who are after all imperfect instruments, working for their fulfilment
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It has always been a mystery to me how men can feel themselves honoured by the humiliation of their fellow beings
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If we are to teach real peace in this world, and if we are to carry on a real war against war, we shall have to begin with the children
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I have worshipped woman as the living embodiment of the spirit of service and sacrifice
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Woman is the companion of man, gifted with equal mental capacity
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: We win justice quickest by rendering justice to the other party
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: No culture can live, if it attempts to be exclusive
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It’s my conviction that nothing enduring can be built on violence
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolence requires a double faith, faith in God and also faith in man
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolence and truth are inseparable and presuppose one another
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolence is not a garment to be put on and off at will. Its seat is in the heart, and it must be an inseparable part of our being
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Unless discipline is rooted in nonviolence, it might prove to be a source of infinite mischief
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolence, which is the quality of the heart, cannot come by an appeal to the brain
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: My life is dedicated to service of India through the religion of nonviolence which I believed to be the root of Hinduism
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Non-cooperation with evil is as much a duty as is cooperation with good
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Non-cooperation is a measure of discipline and sacrifice, and it demands respect for the opposite views
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If co-operation is a duty, I hold that non-co-operation also under certain conditions is equally a duty
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I know, to banish anger altogether from one’s breast is a difficult task. It cannot be achieved through pure personal effort. It can be done only by God’s grace
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: We should meet abuse by forbearance. Human nature is so constituted that if we take absolutely no notice of anger or abuse, the person indulging in it will soon weary of it and stop
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Violent men have not been known in history to die to a man. They die up to a point
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Violent means will give violent freedom. That would be a menace to the world and to India herself
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: To deprive a man of his natural liberty and to deny to him the ordinary amenities of life is worse then starving the body; it is starvation of the soul, the dweller in the body
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolence is the greatest force at the disposal of mankind. It is mightier than the mightiest weapon of destruction devised by the ingenuity of man
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary, the evil it does is permanent
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Intolerance is itself a form of violence and an obstacle to the growth of a true democratic spirit
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I have nothing new to teach the world. Truth and nonviolence are as old as the hills. All I have done is to try experiments in both on as vast a scale as I could
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolence is the first article of my faith. It is also the last article of my creed
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolence is not to be used ever as the shield of the coward. It is the weapon of the brave
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Victory attained by violence is tantamount to a defeat, for it is momentary
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Violence is a concession to human weakness, satyagraha is an obligation
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Poverty is the worst form of violence
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi
