inspire.quote: Earth provides enough to satisfy every man’s need, but not every man’s greed
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The good man is the friend of all living things
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: To forget how to dig the earth and to tend the soil is to forget ourselves
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: What we are doing to the forests of the world is but a mirror reflection of what we are doing to ourselves and to one another
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Monotony is the law of nature. Look at the monotonous manner in which the sun rises. The monotony of necessary occupation is exhilarating and life giving
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Unlike the animal, God has given man the faculty of reason
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: As for food, India has plenty of fertile land, there is enough water and no dearth of man power… The public should be educated to become self reliant. Once they know that they have got to stand on their own legs, it would electrify the atmosphere
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The purpose of life is undoubtedly to know oneself. We cannot do it unless we learn to identify ourselves with all that lives. The sum-total of that life is God
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I want to realize brotherhood or identity not merely with the beings called human, but I want to realize identity with all life, even with such things as crawl upon earth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I hold flesh-food to be unsuited to our species. We err in copying the lower animal world if we are superior to it
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I do feel that spiritual progress does demand at some stage that we should cease to kill our fellow creatures for the satisfaction of our bodily wants
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Ethically they had arrived at the conclusion that man’s supremacy over lower animals meant not that the former should prey upon the latter, but that the higher should protect the lower, and that there should be mutual aid between the two as between man and man. They had also brought out the truth that man eats not for enjoyment but to live
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Human nature will find itself only when it fully realizes that to be human it has to cease to be beastly or brutal
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: When I see a cow, it is not an animal to eat, it is a poem of pity for me and I worship it and I shall defend its worship against the whole world
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The basis of my vegetarianism is not physical, but moral. If anybody said that I should die if I did not take beef tea or mutton, even on medical advice, I would prefer death. That is the basis of my vegetarianism
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Every man has an equal right to the necessaries of life even as birds and beasts have
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I submit that scientists have not yet explored the hidden possibilities of the innumerable seeds, leaves and fruits for giving the fullest possible nutrition to mankind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: To my mind, the life of a lamb is no less precious than that of a human being
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Cow-slaughter and man-slaughter are in my opinion two sides of the same coin
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is no need of a teacher for those who know how to think
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Every home is a university and the parents are the teachers
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: You don’t have to burn books to destroy a culture. Just get people to stop reading them
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A wise parent allows the children to make mistakes. It is good for them once in a while to burn their fingers
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Responsibility will mellow and sober the youth and prepare them, for the burden they must discharge
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Real education has to draw out the best from the boys and girls to be educated. This can never be done by packing ill-assorted and unwanted information into the heads of the pupils. It becomes a dead weight crushing all originality in them and turning them into mere automata
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: An intellect that is developed through the medium of socially useful labour will be an instrument for service and will not easily be led astray or fall into devious paths
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I hold that, as the largest part of our time is devoted to labour for earning our bread, our children must from their infancy be taught the dignity of such labour
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Craft, art, health and education should all be integrated into one scheme
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Purity of personal life is the one indispensable condition for building up a sound education
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 1. Our first duty is that we should not be a burden on society, i.e., we should be self-dependent. From this point of view self-sufficiency itself is a kind of service
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 2. After becoming self-sufficient we shall use our spare time for the service of others. If all become self-sufficient, none will be in trouble
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Given the right kind of teachers, our children will be taught the dignity of labour and learn to regard it as an integral part and a means of their intellectual growth, and to realize that it is patriotic to pay for their training through their labour
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is for you and me to show that no vice is inherent in man
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Education must be of a new type for the sake of the creation of a new world
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Character cannot be built with mortar and stone. It cannot be built by hands other than your own. The Principal and the Professor cannot give you character from the pages of books. Character building comes from their very lives really speaking, it must come from within yourselves
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: When it is remembered that the primary aim of all education is, or should be, the moulding of the character of pupils, a teacher who has a character to keep need not lost heart
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If teachers impart all the knowledge in the world to their students but inculcate not truth and purity among them, they will have betrayed them and instead of raising them set them on the downward road to perdition
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Knowledge without character is a power for evil only, as seen in the instances of so many talented thieves and ‘gentlemen rascals’ in the world
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Persistent questioning and healthy inquisitiveness are the first requisite for acquiring learning of any kind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There can be no knowledge without humility and the will to learn
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Literary training by itself adds not an inch to one’s moral height and that character-building is independent of literary training
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The students should be, above all, humble and correct… The greatest to remain great has to be the lowliest by choice
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The utterly false idea that intelligence can be developed only through book-reading should give place to the truth that the quickest development of the mind can be achieved by artisan’s work being learnt in a scientific manner
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: We have up to now concentrated on stuffing children’s minds with all kinds information, without ever thinking of stimulating and developing them. Let us now cry a halt and concentrate on education the child properly through manual work, not as a side activity, but as the prime means of intellectual training
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: You have to train the boys in one occupation or another. Round this special occupation you will train up his mind, his body, his handwriting, his artistic sense, and so on. He will be master of the craft he learns
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If India is not to declare spiritual bankruptcy, religious instruction of its youth must be held to be at least as necessary as secular instruction
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is wrong and immoral to seek to escape the consequences of one’s acts
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Man will ever remain imperfect, and it will always be his part to try to be perfect
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Confession of errors is like a broom which sweeps away the dirt and leaves the surface brighter and clearer. I feel stronger for confession
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There will have to be rigid and iron discipline before we achieve anything great and enduring, and that discipline will not come by mere academic argument and appeal to reason and logic. Discipline is learnt in the school of adversity
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is no school equal to a decent home and no teacher equal to a virtuous parent
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: An ounce of practice is worth more than tons of preaching
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Culture of the mind must be subservient to the heart
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Even if you are a minority of one, the truth is the truth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Those who cannot renounce attachment to the results of their work are far from the path
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I do not want my house to be walled in on all sides and my windows to be stifled. I want all the cultures of all lands to be blown about my house as freely as possible. But I refuse to be blown off my feet by any
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Moral authority is never retained by any attempt to hold on to it. It comes without seeking and is retained without effort
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Let us all be brave enough to die the death of a martyr, but let no one lust for martyrdom
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: There is nothing more potent than thought. Deed follows word and word follows thought. The word is the result of a mighty thought, and where the thought is mighty and pure the result is always mighty and pure
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is my own firm belief that the strength of the soul grows in proportion as you subdue the flesh
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: For me every ruler is alien that defies public opinion
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I want freedom for the full expression of my personality
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: No man loses his freedom except through his own weakness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Men aspiring to be free can hardly think of enslaving others
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A leader is useless when he acts against the promptings of his own conscience
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Man has always desired power. Ownership of property gives this power. Man hankers also after posthumous fame based on power
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Some form of common worship and a common place of worship appear to be a human necessity
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: God’s word is: ‘He who strives never perishes’. I have implicit faith in that promise
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Be congruent, be authentic, be your true self
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The difficulty one experiences in meeting himsa arises from weakness of mind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is weakness which breeds fear, and fear breeds distrust
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Perfect nonviolence is difficult. It admits to no weakness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The best way of losing a cause is to abuse your opponent and to trade upon his weakness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Life is an aspiration. Its mission is to strive after perfection, which is self-realization. The ideal must not be lowered because of our weaknesses or imperfections
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Nonviolent resistance implies the very opposite of weakness. Defiance combined with non-retaliatory acceptance of repression from one’s opponents is active, not passive
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A definite forgiveness would mean a definite recognition of our strength
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If we were strong, self-respecting and not susceptible to frightfulness, the foreign rulers would have been powerless for mischief
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The greater our innocence, the greater our strength and the swifter our victory
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A customer is the most important visitor on our premises. He is not dependent on us. We are dependent on him. He is not an interruption in our work. He is the purpose of it. He is not an outsider in our business. He is part of it. We are not doing him a favor by serving him. He is doing us a favor by giving us an opportunity to do so. (Could falsely be attributed to Gandhi https://quoteinvestigator
inspire.author: com/2012/08/02/gandhi-customer/)

inspire.quote: If patience is worth anything, it must endure to the end of time. And a living faith will last in the midst of the blackest storm
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I claim to be a simple individual liable to err like any other fellow mortal. I own, however, that I have humility enough to confess my errors and to retrace my steps
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I believe that a man is the strongest soldier for daring to die unarmed
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: If your heart acquires strength, you will be able to remove blemishes from others without thinking evil of them
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is difficult, but not impossible, to conduct strictly honest business
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I regard myself as a soldier, though a soldier of peace
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Change yourself – you are in control
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Distinguish between real needs and artificial wants and control the latter
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A man who would interpret the scriptures must have the spiritual discipline
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Man is oftentimes weak-minded enough to be caught in the snare of greed and honeyed words
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The human body is meant solely for service, never for indulgence. The secret of happy life lies in renunciation. Renunciation is life. Indulgence spells death
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: He who runs to the doctor, vaidya, or hakim for every little ailment, and swallows all kinds of vegetable and mineral drugs, not only curtails his life, but by becoming the slave of his body instead of remaining its master, loses self-control, and ceases to be a man
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Not to have control over the senses is like sailing in a rudderless ship, bound to break to pieces on coming in contact with the very first rock
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 1. We but mirror the world. All the tendencies present in the outer world are to be found in the world of our body
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 2. If we could change ourselves, the tendencies in the world would also change (positivityblog.com)
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 3. As a man changes his own nature, so does the attitude of the world change towards him
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 4. This is the divine mystery supreme. A wonderful thing it is and the source of our happiness. We need not wait to see what others do
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Fasting unto death is the last and the most potent weapon in the armoury of Satyagraha (a policy of passive political resistance). It is a sacred thing. But it must be accepted with all its implications. It is not the fast itself, but what it implies that matters
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Not until we have reduced ourselves to nothingness can we conquer the evil in us. God demands nothing less than complete self-surrender as the price for the only real freedom that is worth having
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Every moment of your life is infinitely creative and the universe is endlessly bountiful. Just put forth a clear enough request, and everything your heart desires must come to you
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 1. I have naturally formed the habit of restraining my thoughts. A thoughtless word hardly ever escaped my tongue or pen. Experience has taught me that silence is part of the spiritual discipline of a votary of truth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 2. We find so many people impatient to talk. All this talking can hardly be said to be of any benefit to the world. It is so much waste of time
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Part 3. My shyness has been in reality my shield and buckler. It has allowed me to grow. It has helped me in my discernment of truth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The richest grace of ahimsa will descend easily upon the owner of hard discipline
inspire.author: (ahimsa is the principle of nonviolence toward all living things)

inspire.quote: For winning Swaraj one requires iron discipline
inspire.author: (Swaraj can mean self-governance or "self-rule" but the word usually refers to Gandhi’s concept for Indian independence from foreign domination)

inspire.quote: The Swaraj of my dream recognizes no race or religious distinctions
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Independence means voluntary restraints and discipline, voluntary acceptance of the rule of law
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Good government is no substitute for self-government
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The spirit of democracy cannot be imposed from without. It has to come from within
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Civil disobedience becomes a sacred duty when the state becomes lawless or corrupt
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Every person in a well-ordered state is fully conscious of both his responsibilities and his rights
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Among the many misdeeds of British rule in India, history will look upon the Act depriving a whole nation of arms as the blackest
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Corruption and hypocrisy ought not to be inevitable products of democracy, as they undoubtedly are today
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: So far as I can see the atomic bomb has deadened the finest feeling that has sustained mankind for ages
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Those who say religion has nothing to do with politics do not know what religion is
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Terrorism and deception are weapons not of the strong, but of the weak
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A good person will resist an evil system with his whole soul. Disobedience of the laws of an evil state is therefore a duty
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is derogatory to the dignity of mankind, it is derogatory to the dignity of India, to entertain for one single moment hatred towards Englishmen
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A democrat must be utterly selfless. He must think and dream not in terms of self or of party, but only of democracy
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A policy is a temporary creed liable to be changed, but while it holds good it has got to be pursued with apostolic zeal
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: To safeguard democracy the people must have a keen sense of independence, self-respect, and their oneness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: No nation being under another nation can accept gifts, and kick at the responsibility attached to those gifts, imposed by the conquering nation
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The spirit of democracy cannot be established in the midst of terrorism, whether governmental or popular
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi
Mahatma Gandhi
inspire.quote: What difference does it make to the dead, the orphans and the homeless, whether the mad destruction is wrought under the name of totalitarianism or the holy name of liberty or democracy?
An unjust law is itself a species of violence. Arrest for its breach is more so
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The spirit of democracy is not a mechanical thing to be adjusted by abolition of forms. It requires change of heart
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I would heartily welcome the union of East and West provided it is not based on brute force
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: In true democracy every man and women is taught to think for himself or herself
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I call him religious who understands the suffering of others
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I consider myself a Hindu, Christian, Muslim, Jew, Buddhist, and Confucian
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: In reality there are as many religions as there are individuals
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The dignity of man requires obedience to a higher law, to the strength of the spirit
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A religion that takes no account of practical affairs and does not help to solve them is no religion
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Hypocrisy and distortion are passing currents under the name of religion
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: For me, the different religions are beautiful flowers from the same garden, or they are branches of the same majestic tree. Therefore, they are equally true, though being received and interpreted through human instruments equally imperfect
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Every formula of every religion has in this age of reason, to submit to the acid test of reason and universal assent
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is the duty of every cultured man or woman to read sympathetically the scriptures of the world. If we are to respect others’ religions as we would have them respect our own, a friendly study of the world’s religions is a sacred duty
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Hinduism insists on the brotherhood of not only all mankind but of all that lives
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: True meditation consists in closing the eyes and ears of the mind to all else except the object of one’s devotion. Hence closing of eyes during the prayers is an aid to such concentration
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: All the religions of the world, while they may differ in other respects, unitedly proclaim that nothing lives in this world but Truth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Are creeds such simple things like the clothes which a man can change at will and put on at will? Creeds are such for which people live for ages and ages
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I reject any religious doctrine that does not appeal to reason and is in conflict with morality
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: We do not need to proselytise either by our speech or by our writing. We can only do so really with our lives. Let our lives be open books for all to study
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Spiritual relationship is far more precious than physical. Physical relationship divorced from spiritual is body without soul
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Religion is a matter of the heart. No physical inconvenience can warrant abandonment of one’s own religion
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Religion is more than life. Remember that his own religion is the truest to every man even if it stands low in the scales of philosophical comparison
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: One’s own religion is after all a matter between oneself and one’s Maker and no one else’s
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The essence of all religions is one. Only their approaches are different
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I believe in the fundamental truth of all great religions of the world
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: God sometimes does try to the uttermost those whom he wishes to bless
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Faith becomes lame, when it ventures into matters pertaining to reason
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: A vow is a purely religious act which cannot be taken in a fit of passion. It can be taken only with a mind purified and composed and with God as witness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Only he can take great resolves who has indomitable faith in God and has fear of God
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is the faith that steers us through stormy seas, faith that moves mountains and faith that jumps across the ocean
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Though we may know Him by a thousand names, He is one and the same to us all
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Jesus is ideal and wonderful, but you Christians – you are not like him
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: It is beyond my power to induce in you a belief in God. There are certain things which are self proved and certain which are not proved at all
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: For me the voice of God, of Conscience, of Truth or the Inner Voice or ‘the still small Voice’ mean one and the same thing
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I worship God as Truth only. I have not yet found Him, but I am seeking after Him
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: But for my faith in God, I should have been a raving maniac
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I have never found Him lacking in response. I have found Him nearest at hand when the horizon seemed darkest—in my ordeals in jails when it was not all smooth sailing for me. I cannot recall a moment in my life when I had a sense of desertion by God
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I’m a lover of my own liberty, and so I would do nothing to restrict yours. I simply want to please my own conscience, which is God
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Satan’s successes are the greatest when he appears with the name of God on his lips
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Faith is not a delicate flower which would wither under the slightest stormy weather. Faith is like the Himalaya mountains which cannot possibly change. No storm can possibly remove the Himalaya mountains from their foundations… And I want every one of you to cultivate that faith in God and religion
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: That faith is of little value which can flourish only in fair weather. Faith in order to be of any value has to survive the severest trials. Your faith is a whited sepulcher if it cannot stand against the calumny of the whole world
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Cultivation of tolerance for other faiths will impart to us a truer understanding of our own
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: One needs to be slow to form convictions, but once formed they must be defended against the heaviest odds
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: My religion is based on truth and nonviolence. Truth is my God. Nonviolence is the means of realising Him
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: God is, even though the whole world deny him. Truth stands, even if there be no public support. It is self-sustained
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: God, as Truth, has been for me a treasure beyond price. May He be so to every one of us
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Each one prays to God according to his own light
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Prayer is a confession of one’s own unworthiness and weakness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: In prayer it is better to have a heart without words than words without a heart
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Close the day with prayer so that you may have a peaceful night free from dreams and nightmares
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Prayer needs no speech. It is in itself independent of any sensuous effort. But it must be combined with the utmost humility
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Let everyone try and find that as a result of daily prayer he adds something new to his life, something with which nothing can be compared
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I can give my own testimony and say that a heartfelt prayer is undoubtedly the most potent instrument that man possesses for overcoming cowardice and all other bad old habits
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: As food is necessary for the body, prayer is necessary for the soul. A man may be able to do without food for a number of days – as MacSwiney did for over 70 days – but believing in God, man cannot, should not, live a moment without prayer
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Prayer is not an old woman’s idle amusement. Properly understood and applied, it is the most potent instrument of action
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: I believe that prayer is the very soul and essence of religion, and therefore prayer must be the very core of life of man, for no man can live without religion
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: As I believe that silent prayer is often a mightier (force) than any overt act, in my helplessness I continuously pray in the faith that the prayer of a pure heart never goes unanswered
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Prayer is for remembering God, and for purifying the heart and can be offered even when observing silence
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Prayer is not asking. It is a longing of the soul. It is daily admission of one’s weakness
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Gandhi was a deceptively clever strategist whose frail, even saintly appearance constantly misled his adversaries into underestimating him
inspire.author: Robert Greene

inspire.quote: My study of Gandhi convinced me that true pacifism is not nonresistance to evil, but nonviolent resistance to evil. Between the two positions, there is a world of difference. Gandhi resisted evil with as much vigor and power as the violent resister, but True pacifism is not unrealistic submission to evil power. It is rather a courageous confrontation of evil by the power of love
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: Mahatma Gandhi is the greatest living exponent of successful pacifism. He has demonstrated that pacifism in action can be a force in world politics. It proved itself, that is to say, a stronger instrument than the instrument of government by force and oppression
inspire.author: Laurence Housman

inspire.quote: In South Africa, his success was complete; in India it was very considerable; and had his following been larger and more uniformly nonviolent, his pacific instrument would have triumphed
inspire.author: Laurence Housman

inspire.quote: Dr. King used Gandhi‘s commitment to nonviolence and to passive resistance
inspire.author: Al Sharpton

inspire.quote: On Gandhi after his assassination: Generations to come, it may be, will scarce believe that such a one as this ever in flesh and blood walked upon this earth!
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Taken on the whole, I would believe that Gandhi‘s views were the most enlightened of all the political men of our time
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: We should strive to do things in his spirit: not to use violence for fighting for our cause, but by non-participation of anything you believe is evil
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: One feels of him that there was much he did not understand, but not that there was anything that he was frightened of saying or thinking
inspire.author: George Orwell

inspire.quote: I guess the most surprising discovery was how long Gandhi remained loyal to the ideal of the British Empire, even in India. Arthur L
inspire.author: Herman

inspire.quote: There are many people making a difference. I mean, Dr. King never held an office. Gandhi never held an office. There are people who are archetypes in our society who have never held office and made a difference
inspire.author: Dennis Kucinich

inspire.quote: I believe that Gandhi was correct. Non-violent civil disobedience is the only way to bring about change that allows people to enjoy the change and not get killed in the process
inspire.author: Edward James Olmos

inspire.quote: I’m hungry for knowledge. The whole thing is to learn every day, to get brighter and brighter. That’s what this world is about. You look at someone like Gandhi, and he glowed. Martin Luther King glowed. Muhammad Ali glows. I think that’s from being bright all the time, and trying to be brighter
inspire.author: Jay-Z

inspire.quote: Nobody sensible voted for Thatcher. For me, in political terms, the most admirable person and the most influential would have been the philosophy of Gandhi. The ideology of passive resistance worked and can work again and again. It is the exact opposite of violence. A glorious conception
inspire.author: John Lydon

inspire.quote: I don’t believe in anarchy, because it will ultimately amount to the power of the bully, with weapons. Gandhi is my life’s inspiration: passive resistance
inspire.author: Johnny Rotten

inspire.quote: Gandhi proved it is possible to fight for one’s people and win without for a moment losing the world’s respect
inspire.author: Albert Camus

inspire.quote: I am really honoured but if the prize had gone to Mahatma Gandhi before me I would have been more honoured. Kailash Satyarthi (On winning the Nobel Peace Prize, wikipedia
inspire.author: org)

inspire.quote: I am very proud to be an Indian, a son of the soil where Mahatma Gandhi and Buddha were born and they were always the great inspiration for me, in my life
inspire.author: Kailash Satyarthi

inspire.quote: I believe in Gandhi‘s philosophy of the last man, that is, the bonded laborer is the last man in Indian society, that we are here to liberate the last man
inspire.author: Kailash Satyarthi

inspire.quote: As you may be well aware, marches and walks have been an integral part of our Indian tradition. Mahatma Gandhi marched several times to educate the people and also to learn something himself
inspire.author: Kailash Satyarthi

inspire.quote: I want to be like Gandhi, and Martin Luther King, and John Lennon… but I want to stay alive
inspire.author: Madonna Ciccone

inspire.quote: A lot of people are waiting for Martin Luther King or Mahatma Gandhi to come back – but they are gone. We are it. It is up to us. It is up to you
inspire.author: Marian Wright Edelman

inspire.quote: I was a little nervous backstage. But I had this book, Gandhi. I just read his quotes, closed my eyes and focused my thoughts. Presently, this book is my prized possession
inspire.author: Nafisa Joseph

inspire.quote: In our generation, the role models were Gandhi and Nehru. We revered them. They were venerated personalities
inspire.author: Pranab Mukherjee

inspire.quote: One was a book I read by Mahatma Gandhi. In it was a passage where he said that religion, the pursuing of the inner journey, should not be separated from the pursuing of the outer and social journey, because we are not isolated beings
inspire.author: Satish Kumar

inspire.quote: Gandhi has asked that the British Government should walk out of India and leave the Indian people to settle differences among themselves, even if it means chaos and confusion
inspire.author: Stafford Cripps

inspire.quote: Gandhi has more recently recognized the need for continuance of British, American and Chinese efforts in India and has suggested that these troops might remain by agreement with some new Indian Government
inspire.author: Stafford Cripps

inspire.quote: Gandhi and Nehru liberated us. By winning their freedom, they freed us from the ignorance and prejudice that lay behind the myth of Britain’s imperial destiny
inspire.author: Tony Benn

inspire.quote: Your beliefs become your thoughts. Your thoughts become your words. Your words become your actions. Your actions become your habits. Your habits become your values. Your values become your destiny. The future depends on what you do today
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Without tenderness, a man is uninteresting
inspire.author: Marlene Dietrich

inspire.quote: Never look down on anybody unless you’re helping them up
inspire.author: Jesse Jackson

inspire.quote: The fragrance always stays in the hand that gives the rose
inspire.author: Hada Bejar

inspire.quote: A great man shows his greatness by the way he treats little men
inspire.author: Thomas Carlyle

inspire.quote: An egoist lives in poverty. A kind person lives in abundance
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: What wisdom can you find that is greater than kindness?
inspire.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

inspire.quote: Kind words do not cost much. Yet they accomplish much
inspire.author: Blaise Pascal

inspire.quote: Act with kindness, but do not expect gratitude
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: I hope you will have a wonderful year, that you’ll dream dangerously and outrageously, that you’ll make something that didn’t exist before you made it, that you will be loved and that you will be liked, and that you will have people to love and to like in return. And, most importantly (because I think there should be more kindness and more wisdom in the world right now), that you will, when you need to be, be wise, and that you will always be kind
inspire.author: Neil Gaiman

inspire.quote: Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: We rise by lifting others
inspire.author: Robert Ingersoll

inspire.quote: One can’t be kind to one person and cruel to another
inspire.author: Morarji Desai

inspire.quote: There’s no such things as a small act of kindness. Every act creates a ripple with no logical end
inspire.author: Scott Adams

inspire.quote: Gentleness and kindness will make our homes a paradise upon earth. C. A
inspire.author: Bartol

inspire.quote: Politeness is the flower of humanity
inspire.author: Joseph Joubert

inspire.quote: To understand everything is to forgive everything
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Today I bent the truth to be kind, and I have no regret, for I am far surer of what is kind than I am of what is true
inspire.author: Robert Brault

inspire.quote: Be nice to strangers. Be nice even when it doesn’t matter
inspire.author: Sam Altman

inspire.quote: Kids want to appear tough and independent. Adults want to appear kind and perfect. The wise are just kind
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted
inspire.author: Aesop

inspire.quote: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money
inspire.author: John Ruskin

inspire.quote: Never lose a chance of saying a kind word
inspire.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

inspire.quote: When I was young, I used to admire intelligent people; as I grow older, I admire kind people
inspire.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

inspire.quote: You can accomplish by kindness what you cannot by force
inspire.author: Publilius Syrus

inspire.quote: Kindness makes a fellow feel good whether it’s being done to him or by him. Frank A
inspire.author: Clark

inspire.quote: I feel no need for any other faith than my faith in the kindness of human beings. I am so absorbed in the wonder of earth and the life upon it that I cannot think of heaven and angels. Pearl S
inspire.author: Buck

inspire.quote: It is futile to judge a kind deed by its motives. Kindness can become its own motive. We are made kind by being kind
inspire.author: Eric Hoffer

inspire.quote: The first thing a kindness deserves is acceptance, the second, transmission
inspire.author: George MacDonald

inspire.quote: Beginning today, treat everyone you meet as if they were going to be dead by midnight. Extend to them all the care, kindness and understanding you can muster, and do it with no thought of any reward. Your life will never be the same again
inspire.author: Og Mandino

inspire.quote: Always remember that to argue, and win, is to break down the reality of the person you are arguing against. It is painful to lose your reality, so be kind, even if you are right
inspire.author: Haruki Murakami

inspire.quote: Be kind to unkind people – they need it the most
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Kindness is the light that dissolves all walls between souls, families, and nations
inspire.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

inspire.quote: Kindness and politeness are not overrated at all. They’re underused
inspire.author: Tommy Lee Jones

inspire.quote: Whatever point of view you have, there’s another
inspire.author: Jack Kornfield

inspire.quote: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength
inspire.author: Saint Francis de Sales

inspire.quote: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving
inspire.author: Anne Frank

inspire.quote: Forget injuries, never forget kindnesses
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for a kindness
inspire.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

inspire.quote: Extend yourself in kindness to other human being wherever you can
inspire.author: Oprah Winfrey

inspire.quote: There is no duty more obligatory than the repayment of kindness
inspire.author: Cicero

inspire.quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: When words are both true and kind, they can change the world
inspire.author: Buddha

inspire.quote: The only way to tell the truth is to speak with kindness. Only the words of a loving man can be heard
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak but their echoes are truly endless
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Let us learn to live with kindness, to love everyone, even when they do not love us
inspire.author: Pope Francis

inspire.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: Come, gentlemen, I hope we shall drink down all unkindness
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: The ideals which have always shone before me and filled me with joy are goodness, beauty, and truth
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Gentleness doesn’t get work done unless you happen to be a hen laying eggs
inspire.author: Coco Chanel

inspire.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Be pitiful, for every man is fighting a hard battle
inspire.author: Ian Maclaren (For more detail on the source of this quote, check this link)

inspire.quote: For it is in giving that we receive
inspire.author: Francis of Assisi

inspire.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Kindness, I’ve discovered, is everything in life
inspire.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

inspire.quote: Kindness gives birth to kindness
inspire.author: Sophocles

inspire.quote: Treat everyone with respect and kindness. Period. No exceptions
inspire.author: Kiana Tom

inspire.quote: Only the powerful are gentle
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Kindness and a generous spirit go a long way
inspire.author: Max Irons

inspire.quote: Kindness is wisdom
inspire.author: Philip James Bailey

inspire.quote: Kindness is showing someone they matter
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Kill them with kindness, slay them with a smile
inspire.author: Caesar (The Goodbye Man)

inspire.quote: Always be a little kinder than necessary. James M
inspire.author: Barrie

inspire.quote: Tenderness is a virtue
inspire.author: Oliver Goldsmith

inspire.quote: Kindness is ever the begetter of kindness
inspire.author: Sophocles

inspire.quote: We win by tenderness. We conquer by forgiveness
inspire.author: Frederick William Robertson

inspire.quote: Be a little kinder than you have to. E
inspire.author: Lockhart

inspire.quote: How beautiful a day can be when kindness touches it!
inspire.author: George Elliston

inspire.quote: Be kind to the living
inspire.author: James McBride

inspire.quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself
inspire.author: Teresa of Avila

inspire.quote: Gentleness is the antidote for cruelty
inspire.author: Phaedrus

inspire.quote: Live simply. Love generously. Care deeply. Speak kindly
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Men are cruel, but Man is kind
inspire.author: Rabindranath Tagore

inspire.quote: Be kind with people and tough with their ideas
inspire.author: @TheStoicEmperor

inspire.quote: Kindness is the sunshine in which virtue grows
inspire.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

inspire.quote: It doesn’t do any good to argue. Be kind. Richard G
inspire.author: Scott

inspire.quote: The most beautiful family is based respect. The most beautiful relationship is based on love. The most beautiful world in based on kindness
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: To practice five things under all circumstances constitutes perfect virtue; these five are gravity, generosity of soul, sincerity, earnestness, and kindness
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: Deliberately seek opportunities for kindness, sympathy, and patience
inspire.author: Evelyn Underhill

inspire.quote: A word of kindness is seldom spoken in vain, while witty sayings are as easily lost as the pearls slipping from a broken string
inspire.author: George Dennison Prentice

inspire.quote: It really shocks me when I encounter people who think kindness doesn’t matter. Because I think it’s pretty much the only thing that matters
inspire.author: Josh Radnor

inspire.quote: Kindness goes a long ways lots of times when it ought to stay at home
inspire.author: Kin Hubbard

inspire.quote: I’m a big believer in acts of kindness, no matter how small
inspire.author: Liam Neeson

inspire.quote: Genuine kindness is no ordinary act, but a gift of rare beauty
inspire.author: Sylvia Rossetti

inspire.quote: Concentrate on what you have to do. Fix your eyes on it. Remind yourself that your task is to be a good human being; remind yourself what nature demands of people. Then do it, without hesitation, and speak the truth as you see it. But with kindness. With humility. Without hypocrisy
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: One ought, every day at least, to hear a little song, read a good poem, see a fine picture and, if possible, speak a few reasonable words
inspire.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

inspire.quote: How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: Do all the good you can. By all the means you can. In all the ways you can. In all the places you can. At all the times you can. To all the people you can. As long as ever you can
inspire.author: John Wesley

inspire.quote: Do not be daunted by the enormity of the world’s grief. Do justly, now. Love mercy, now. Walk humbly, now. You are not obligated to complete the work, but neither are you free to abandon it
inspire.author: Rabbi Tarfon

inspire.quote: I am not and never will be perfect. I am not always as honest, respectful, responsible, fair or as kind as I should be. All I can do is what I should do: strive every day, with every decision to be the best person I can be. I don’t expect to be perfect but I know I can be better
inspire.author: Michael Josephson

inspire.quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind
inspire.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

inspire.quote: When you encounter difficulties and contradictions, do not try to break them, but bend them with gentleness and time
inspire.author: Saint Francis de Sales

inspire.quote: So many gods, so many creeds, so many paths that wind and wind, while just the art of being kind is all the sad world needs
inspire.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

inspire.quote: The true and noble way to kill a foe, is not to kill him, – you, with kindness, may so change him, that he shall cease to be so, and then he’s slain
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: We are the leaves of one branch, the drops of one sea, the flowers of one garden
inspire.author: Jean Baptiste Henry Lacordaire

inspire.quote: The wonderful thing is that it’s so incredibly easy to be kind
inspire.author: Ingrid Newkirk

inspire.quote: Be nice to nerds. Chances are you’ll end up working for one
inspire.author: Bill Gates

inspire.quote: I believe in kindness. Also in mischief. Also in singing, especially when singing is not necessarily prescribed
inspire.author: Mary Oliver

inspire.quote: We have to be active about kindness and about peace. I’ve always fantasized that it would be great if there was a Department of Peace
inspire.author: Dave Matthews

inspire.quote: You can tell by the kindness of a dog how a human should be
inspire.author: Don Van Vliet

inspire.quote: They are always saying God loves us. If that’s love I’d rather have a bit of kindness
inspire.author: Graham Greene

inspire.quote: Kindness eases everything almost as much as money does
inspire.author: Mason Cooley

inspire.quote: A kind word is like a Spring day
inspire.author: Russian Proverb

inspire.quote: A dog has one aim in life… to bestow his heart. J.R
inspire.author: Ackerley

inspire.quote: To belittle, you have to be little
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: Kindness does wonderful things to a face
inspire.author: Dixie Doyle

inspire.quote: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person
inspire.author: Andy Rooney

inspire.quote: Always be nice to your children because they are the ones who will choose your rest home
inspire.author: Phyllis Diller

inspire.quote: Kind people are the best kind of people
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Praise by name, criticize by category
inspire.author: Warren Buffett

inspire.quote: Kindness has converted more sinners than zeal, eloquence or learning. Frederick W
inspire.author: Faber

inspire.quote: People will clap to be nice. They will not laugh to be nice
inspire.author: Kenny Rogers

inspire.quote: He who fears to weep, should learn to be kind to those who weep
inspire.author: Ahmad Shah Massood

inspire.quote: Anger exceeding limits causes fear and excessive kindness eliminates respect
inspire.author: Euripides

inspire.quote: It’s wise to be kind. It’s wiser to be kind and truthful
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: We are never as kind as we want to be, but nothing outrages us more than people being unkind to us
inspire.author: Adam Phillips

inspire.quote: There is a rollicking kindness that looks like malice
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche (See also: integrity quotes)

inspire.quote: Ignorant kindness may have the effect of cruelty; but to be angry with it as if it were direct cruelty would be an ignorant unkindness
inspire.author: George Eliot

inspire.quote: When death, the great reconciler, has come, it is never our tenderness that we repent of, but our severity
inspire.author: George Eliot

inspire.quote: Kindness is not about instant gratification. More often, it’s akin to a low-risk investment that appreciates steadily over time
inspire.author: Josh Radnor

inspire.quote: We cannot seek or attain health, wealth, learning, justice or kindness in general. Action is always specific, concrete, individualized, unique
inspire.author: Benjamin Jowett

inspire.quote: I have learned silence from the talkative, toleration from the intolerant, and kindness from the unkind; yet, strange, I am ungrateful to those teachers
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: There is none made so great, but he may both need the help and service, and stand in fear of the power and unkindness, even of the meanest of mortals
inspire.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

inspire.quote: In the context of interfaith encounter, we need to bring to the surface how our actual beliefs shape what we do – not simply to agree that kindness is better than cruelty. Rowan D
inspire.author: Williams

inspire.quote: A single sunbeam is enough to drive away many shadows
inspire.author: Francis of Assisi

inspire.quote: In the midst of global crises such as pollution, wars and famine, kindness may be too easily dismissed as a ‘soft’ issue, or a luxury to be addressed after the urgent problems are solved. But kindness is the greatest need in all those areas – kindness toward the environment, toward other nations, toward the needs of people who are suffering. Until we reflect basic kindness in everything we do, our political gestures will be fleeting and fragile
inspire.author: Bo Lozoff

inspire.quote: Kindly words do not enter so deeply into men as a reputation for kindness
inspire.author: Mencius

inspire.quote: It is kindness to immediately refuse what you intend to deny
inspire.author: Publilius Syrus

inspire.quote: The serenity of mind, gentleness, silence, self-restraint, and the purity of mind are called the austerity of thought
inspire.author: Bhagavad Gita

inspire.quote: When kindness has left people, even for a few moments, we become afraid of them as if their reason had left them. When it has left a place where we have always found it, it is like shipwreck; we drop from security into something malevolent and bottomless
inspire.author: Willa Cather

inspire.quote: Kindness is in our power, even when fondness is not
inspire.author: Samuel Johnson

inspire.quote: Will you be clever at the expense of others, or will you be kind?
inspire.author: Jeff Bezos

inspire.quote: You cannot do a kindness too soon, for you never know how soon it will be too late
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: One who knows how to show and to accept kindness will be a friend better than any possession
inspire.author: Sophocles

inspire.quote: Kind hearts are the gardens. Kind thoughts are the roots. Kind words are the blossoms. Kind deeds are the fruits
inspire.author: Kirpal Singh

inspire.quote: He that has done you a kindness will be more ready to do you another, than he whom you yourself have obliged
inspire.author: Benjamin Franklin

inspire.quote: Be as successful as you want, but if you’re unkind, you’re not
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: There are many times when it is better to be kind than clever
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: There’s no use doing a kindness if you do it a day too late
inspire.author: Charles Kingsley

inspire.quote: Kindness and a good heart are the foundation for success in this life, progress on the spiritual path, and the fulfillment of our aspirations. Our need for them is not limited to any specific time, place, society, or culture
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: A kind and compassionate act is often its own reward
inspire.author: William John Bennett

inspire.quote: We are all different. Don’t judge, understand instead. Roy T
inspire.author: Bennett

inspire.quote: If we are going to be kind, let it be out of simple generosity, not because we fear guilt or retribution. J.M
inspire.author: Coetzee

inspire.quote: A great many men’s gratitude is nothing but a secret desire to hook in more valuable kindnesses hereafter
inspire.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

inspire.quote: Good nature will always supply the absence of beauty; but beauty cannot supply the absence of good nature
inspire.author: Joseph Addison

inspire.quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely. Roy T
inspire.author: Bennett

inspire.quote: It has always seemed strange to me… the things we admire in men, kindness and generosity, openness, honesty, understanding and feeling, are the concomitants of failure in our system. And those traits we detest, sharpness, greed, acquisitiveness, meanness, egotism and self-interest, are the traits of success. And while men admire the quality of the first they love the produce of the second
inspire.author: John Steinbeck

inspire.quote: Kindness trumps greed: it asks for sharing. Kindness trumps fear: it calls forth gratefulness and love. Kindness trumps even stupidity, for with sharing and love, one learns
inspire.author: Marc Estrin

inspire.quote: When you are young you take the kindness people show you as your right. W
inspire.author: Somerset Maugham

inspire.quote: Kindness is more important than wisdom, and the recognition of this is the beginning of wisdom
inspire.author: Theodore Rubin

inspire.quote: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it’s thinking of yourself less. C. S
inspire.author: Lewis

inspire.quote: Unseasonable kindness gets no thanks
inspire.author: Thomas Fuller

inspire.quote: 1. Love is the absence of judgment
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 2. Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can’t help them, at least don’t hurt them
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 3. Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them, humanity cannot survive
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 4. Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 5. There is a saying in Tibetan, ‘Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.’ No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that’s our real disaster
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 6. To conquer oneself is a greater victory than to conquer thousands in a battle
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 7. We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 8. Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 9. Only the development of compassion and understanding for others can bring us the tranquility and happiness we all seek
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 10. Give the ones you love wings to fly, roots to come back, and reasons to stay
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 11. If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: 1. Peace begins with a smile
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 2. Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 3. I am not sure exactly what heaven will be like, but I know that when we die and it comes time for God to judge us, he will not ask, ‘How many good things have you done in your life?’ rather he will ask, ‘How much love did you put into what you did?’
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 4. Do not think that love in order to be genuine has to be extraordinary. What we need is to love without getting tired. Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 5. Intense love does not measure, it just gives
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 6. The most terrible poverty is loneliness, and the feeling of being unloved
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 7. Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 8. I have found the paradox that if I love until it hurts, then there is no hurt, but only more love
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 9. If you judge people, you have no time to love them
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 10. We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: 11. What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: There is no need for temples, no need for complicated philosophies. My brain and my heart are my temples; my philosophy is kindness
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: Be a good person, but don’t waste your time trying to prove it
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: The ideals which have lighted me on my way and time after time given me new courage to face life cheerfully, have been truth, goodness, and beauty
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: One person, with good purpose, can, constitute the majority
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: How far a little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: To live a good life, prioritize your health. To prioritize your health, learn to say no. To say no, learn to be courageous. To be courageous, learn to love yourself
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Be not simply good – be good for something
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Treat those who are good with goodness, and also treat those who are not good with goodness. Thus goodness is attained. Be honest to those who are honest, and be also honest to those who are not honest. Thus honesty is attained
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Good things, when short, are twice as good
inspire.author: Baltasar Gracián

inspire.quote: And then you might see what the life of the good man is like – someone content with what nature assigns him, and satisfied with being just and kind himself
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: Pick up the battle and make it a better world, just where you are. Yes… and it can be better, and it must be better, but it is up to us
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: Keep good company, read good books, love good things and cultivate soul and body as faithfully as you can
inspire.author: Louisa May Alcott (Rose in Bloom)

inspire.quote: Be prepared to appreciate what you meet
inspire.author: Frank Herbert (Dune)

inspire.quote: It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: What is your art? To be good
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: He that is kind is free, though he is a slave; he that is evil is a slave, though he be a king
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: Good luck is another name for tenacity of purpose
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: It takes a great man to be a good listener
inspire.author: Calvin Coolidge

inspire.quote: I’ll never be ashamed to quote a bad writer with a good saying
inspire.author: " Seneca

inspire.quote: A man when he has done a good act, does not call out for others to come and see, but he goes on to another act, as a vine goes on to produce again the grapes in season
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: You were born with potential. You were born with goodness and trust. You were born with ideals and dreams. You were born with greatness. You were born with wings. You are not meant for crawling, so don’t. You have wings. Learn to use them and fly
inspire.author: Rumi

inspire.quote: There is far too great a disproportion between what one is and what others think one is, or at least what they say they think one is. But one has to take it all with good humor
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Be quick to do good. If you are slow, the mind, delighting in mischief, will catch you
inspire.author: Buddha

inspire.quote: Confidence in the goodness of another is good proof of one’s own goodness
inspire.author: Michel de Montaigne

inspire.quote: He who cannot be a good follower cannot be a good leader
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: The only way to live is by accepting each minute as an unrepeatable miracle
inspire.author: Tara Brach (Radical Acceptance)

inspire.quote: At all times love and discipline have led to a beautiful environment and a good life
inspire.author: Charles Eames

inspire.quote: The cave you fear to enter holds the treasure you seek
inspire.author: Joseph Campbell

inspire.quote: There is no greatness where there is no simplicity, goodness, and truth
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you’ve stood up for something, sometime in your life
inspire.author: Winston Churchill

inspire.quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing
inspire.author: Benjamin Franklin

inspire.quote: If we live good lives, the times are also good. As we are, such are the times
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: I am, indeed, a king, because I know how to rule myself
inspire.author: Pietro Aretino

inspire.quote: The master has no possessions. The more he does for others, the happier he is. The more he gives to others, the wealthier he is
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Ultimately our greatest joy is when we seek to do good for others
inspire.author: Desmond Tutu

inspire.quote: To live the good life: We have the potential for it. If we can learn to be indifferent to what makes no difference
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: The good man is the friend of all living things
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Goodness is the only investment that never fails
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: I am content in my later years. I have kept my good humor and take neither myself nor the next person seriously
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The chief enemy of creativity is ‘good’ sense
inspire.author: Pablo Picasso

inspire.quote: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow
inspire.author: Bob Marley

inspire.quote: Better is the enemy of good
inspire.author: Voltaire

inspire.quote: Good order and discipline in an army are more to be depended upon than ferocity
inspire.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

inspire.quote: The ultimate tragedy is not the oppression and cruelty by the bad people but the silence over that by the good people
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: Better to know a few things which are good and necessary than many things which are useless and mediocre
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: Once you’ve accepted your flaws, no one can use them against you. Tyrion Lannister (George R. R
inspire.author: Martin, Games of Thrones)

inspire.quote: The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don’t wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: If I am not good to myself, how can I expect anyone else to be good to me?
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: It takes many good deeds to build a good reputation, and only one bad one to lose it
inspire.author: Benjamin Franklin

inspire.quote: Every man is guilty of all the good he did not do
inspire.author: Voltaire

inspire.quote: Dig deep within yourself, for there is a fountain of goodness ever ready to flow if you will keep digging
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: Men who give way easily to tears are good
inspire.author: I have nothing to do with those whose hearts are dry and whose eyes are dry! Johann Wolfgang von Goethe (Elective Affinities)

inspire.quote: I am one of the 7 billion human beings alive today. We each have a responsibility to think about humanity and the good of the world because it affects our own future. We weren’t born on this planet at this time to create problems but to bring about some benefit
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: There is no passion to be found playing small, in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living
inspire.author: Nelson Mandela

inspire.quote: There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving
inspire.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

inspire.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. John D
inspire.author: Rockefeller

inspire.quote: Misfortune is virtue’s opportunity
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: Run your own race, at your own pace
inspire.author: Dan Mace

inspire.quote: Be good because people will be better
inspire.author: Sahil Lavingia

inspire.quote: Too much of a good thing can be taxing
inspire.author: Mae West

inspire.quote: A man is only as good as what he loves
inspire.author: Saul Bellow

inspire.quote: All the good are friends of one another
inspire.author: Zeno of Citium

inspire.quote: We are the ones we have been waiting for
inspire.author: June Jordan

inspire.quote: It’s easy to say yes. It’s hard to say no
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: Your belief and your work will speak for you
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: I can live for two months on a good compliment
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: Always try to keep in good humor with the world
inspire.author: Wellington

inspire.quote: If you have to chase it, you will never have it
inspire.author: Kapil Gupta

inspire.quote: Build a life that you don’t need to escape from
inspire.author: Ryan Holiday

inspire.quote: Well, I don’t want to be king, I want to be real
inspire.author: John Lennon

inspire.quote: You create a good future by creating a good present
inspire.author: Eckhart Tolle

inspire.quote: It’s a hundred times easier to criticize than create
inspire.author: Sahil Lavingia

inspire.quote: Saying yes to everything is a quick road to mediocrity
inspire.author: Shane Parrish (@shaneaparrish)

inspire.quote: And now that you don’t have to be perfect, you can be good
inspire.author: John Steinbeck

inspire.quote: Do the good that’s in front of you, even if it feels very small
inspire.author: Sharon Salzberg

inspire.quote: Today was good. Today was fun. Tomorrow is another one. Dr
inspire.author: Seuss

inspire.quote: I want to tell the truth in my work. The truth will lead me to all
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: All good things which exist are the fruits of originality
inspire.author: John Stuart Mill

inspire.quote: The more we come out and do good to others, the more our hearts will be purified
inspire.author: Swami Vivekananda

inspire.quote: From a certain point on, there is no more turning back. That is the point that must be reached
inspire.author: Franz Kafka

inspire.quote: Don’t expect recognition for your efforts, your genius to be discovered or your love to be understood. Act because you need to act
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Be aware that as you are feeling good, you are powerfully attracting more good things to you
inspire.author: Rhonda Byrne

inspire.quote: A good character is the best tombstone. Those who loved you and were helped by you will remember you when forget-me-nots have withered. Carve your name on hearts, not on marble
inspire.author: Charles Spurgeon

inspire.quote: Sometimes greatness is the result of a transcendent, peak performance. But often, greatness is simply the result of a good performance repeated and sustained much longer than usual
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: I’ve seen the promised land, and there is good news. You can have it all
inspire.author: Tim Ferriss

inspire.quote: It’s much better to do good in a way that no one knows anything about it
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy (Anna Karenina)

inspire.quote: You have to do stuff that average people don’t understand because those are the only good things
inspire.author: Andy Warhol

inspire.quote: Create beauty everywhere you go. Create meaning in everything you do. Create things that will last. You are here to create
inspire.author: Carlos Del Valle

inspire.quote: We are not here to fit in, be well balanced, or provide exempla for others. We are here to be eccentric, different, perhaps strange, perhaps merely to add our small piece, our little clunky, chunky selves, to the great mosaic of being. As the gods intended, we are here to become more and more ourselves
inspire.author: Jim Hollis

inspire.quote: Optimism is a strategy for making a better future. Because unless you believe that the future can be better, you are unlikely to step up and take responsibility for making it so
inspire.author: Noam Chomsky

inspire.quote: When I was very young, most of my childhood heroes wore capes, flew through the air, or picked up buildings with one arm. They were spectacular and got a lot of attention. But as I grew, my heroes changed, so that now I can honestly say that anyone who does anything to help a child is a hero to me
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: It’s not what you do; it’s why you do it that makes the difference
inspire.author: Jennifer Louden

inspire.quote: Everything around you that you call life was made up by people that were no smarter than you
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: Successful people aren’t smarter than you, they’re just way more persistent
inspire.author: Sam Altman

inspire.quote: I am the master of my fate; I am the captain of my soul
inspire.author: William Henley

inspire.quote: Everything good that’s ever happened to me came out of helping others
inspire.author: Danny Trejo

inspire.quote: If you want to do better than average then social proof is not for you
inspire.author: @AmuseChimp

inspire.quote: No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar
inspire.author: Abraham Lincoln

inspire.quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good
inspire.author: Steven Wright

inspire.quote: I think it pisses God off if you walk by the color purple in a field somewhere and don’t notice it
inspire.author: Alice Walker

inspire.quote: One great thing about getting old is that you can get out of all sorts of social obligations just by saying you’re tired
inspire.author: George Carlin

inspire.quote: In heaven, all the interesting people are missing
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: A good scare is worth more to a man than good advice. E. W
inspire.author: Howe

inspire.quote: Few things are harder to put up with than the annoyance of a good example
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Nothing leads to good that is not natural
inspire.author: Friedrich Schiller

inspire.quote: Again, people seem to seek honor in order to convince themselves of their own goodness
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: The truth is, as long as you believe that you are not good enough, you will never feel good enough
inspire.author: Iyanla Vanzant

inspire.quote: It is the mark of a good action that it appears inevitable in retrospect
inspire.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

inspire.quote: On the whole, human beings want to be good, but not too good, and not quite all the time
inspire.author: George Orwell

inspire.quote: Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws
inspire.author: Plato

inspire.quote: It’s your road and yours alone. Others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: I no longer wish to meet a good I do not earn, for example, to find a pot of buried gold, knowing that it brings with it new burdens
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing
inspire.author: Edmund Burke

inspire.quote: Bring the good news in trickles, the bad news in lumps
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

inspire.quote: You do not know where death awaits you; so be ready for it everywhere
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: It’s good that it hurts. Pain is the signal that you’re confused, that you’re in a lie
inspire.author: Byron Katie

inspire.quote: Hard times create strong men. Strong men create good times. Good times create weak men. And, weak men create hard times
inspire.author: @rivatez

inspire.quote: It’s not that you should own nothing. It’s that nothing should own you
inspire.author: @zen_fi

inspire.quote: Anger is good at telling us there is a problem. Anger is not good at telling us the source of the problem. Anger is very bad at telling us the solution to the problem
inspire.author: @TheStoicEmperor

inspire.quote: Visit all the places, eat all the food, read all the books, make all the friends, gather all the fame, support all the causes, build all the products, earn all the money… to see that the quality of your life is what it is when you are doing nothing
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: If you don’t get what you want, it’s a sign either that you did not seriously want it, or that you tried to bargain over the price
