inspire.author: Rudyard Kipling

inspire.quote: Trying to build a life where you never experience bad feelings is like building a ship that can’t handle a storm
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: We are all ready to be savage in some cause. The difference between a good man and a bad one is the choice of the cause
inspire.author: William James

inspire.quote: The good always arrives bundled with the bad
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: It is not good to be too free. It is not good to have everything one wants
inspire.author: Blaise Pascal

inspire.quote: The omission of good is no less reprehensible than the commission of evil
inspire.author: Plutarch

inspire.quote: A good completion takes a long time; a bad completion cannot be changed later
inspire.author: Zhuangzi

inspire.quote: Writing is good, thinking is better. Cleverness is good, patience is better
inspire.author: Hermann Hesse

inspire.quote: Order is necessary, otherwise there can be no peace at all. It is only in peace, in quietness, in beauty, that goodness can flower
inspire.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

inspire.quote: You’re never as bad as they say you are, but you’re never as good as they say you are either
inspire.author: Tim Ferriss

inspire.quote: The good for man is an activity of the soul in accordance with virtue
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: Virtue consists more in doing good than in receiving it, and more in doing fine actions than in refraining from disgraceful ones
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: The only thing to do with good advice is to pass it on. It is never of any use to oneself
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: I’d rather live with a good question than a bad answer
inspire.author: Aryeh Frimer

inspire.quote: This can be swiftly taught in very few words: virtue is the only good; there is no certain good without virtue; and virtue resides in our nobler part, which is the rational one. And what can this virtue be? True and steadfast judgment
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: We all seek to know whether we shall be rich; but no one asks whether he shall be good
inspire.author: Publius Syrus

inspire.quote: I begin to speak only when I’m certain what I’ll say isn’t better left unsaid
inspire.author: Cato

inspire.quote: He that is slow to anger is better than the mighty; and he that ruleth his spirit than he that taketh a city
inspire.author: Proverbs 16:31

inspire.quote: Better to be emotionally intelligent than intellectually intelligent
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: Isolation of the poor is loneliness. Isolation of the rich is solitude
inspire.author: @zen_fi

inspire.quote: The coin of the poor is money. The coin of the rich is time
inspire.author: @zen_fi

inspire.quote: The modern mind is overstimulated and the modern body is understimulated and overfed. Meditation, exercise, and fasting restore an ancient balance
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: The highest level of mastery is simplicity. Most information is irrelevant and most effort is wasted, but only the expert knows what to ignore
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: If you accomplish something good with hard work, the labor passes quickly, but the good endures; if you do something shameful in pursuit of pleasure, the pleasure passes quickly, but the shame endures
inspire.author: Musonius Rufus

inspire.quote: Intelligence never grows by imitation: intelligence grows by experimentation, intelligence grows by taking challenges
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: If it isn’t good, let it die. If it doesn’t die, make it good
inspire.author: Ajahn Chah

inspire.quote: Our task is to become good men, or to achieve the highest human good. That good is happiness
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: The fragrance of flowers spreads only in the direction of the wind. But the goodness of a person spreads in all directions
inspire.author: Chanakya

inspire.quote: It’s the people who feel strong and good about themselves who are best able to accept outside difference – their own and others!
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: I encourage you to look for the good where you are and embrace it
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Who can I control: myself. Who can I not control: others. Herein lies the solution to all my problem
inspire.author: Kamal Ravikant

inspire.quote: Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance
inspire.author: Eckhart Tolle

inspire.quote: Independence is my happiness, and I view things as they are, without regard to place or person; my country is the world, and my religion is to do good
inspire.author: Thomas Paine (Rights of Man)

inspire.quote: Only goodwill and compassion can bring order and peace to the world and not political blueprints and conferences
inspire.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

inspire.quote: Happiness is the achievement of your values
inspire.author: Ayn Rand

inspire.quote: A mathematical formula for happiness: Reality divided by Expectations. There were two ways to be happy: improve your reality or lower your expectations
inspire.author: Jodi Picoult (Nineteen Minutes)

inspire.quote: Confidence is silent. Insecurity is loud. Strength is gentle. Weakness is abrasive
inspire.author: Ed Latimore (@EdLatimore)

inspire.quote: Don’t expect others to praise you or raise toasts to you. Don’t count on receiving credit for your good deeds or good practice
inspire.author: Chögyam Trungpa

inspire.quote: That’s the whole secret: to do things that excite you
inspire.author: Ray Bradbury

inspire.quote: Make laughter your prayer. Laugh more. Nothing releases your blocked energies as does laughter. Nothing makes you innocent as does laughter
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: If you want to awaken all of humanity, then awaken all of yourself. If you want to eliminate the suffering in the world, then eliminate all that is dark and negative in yourself. Truly, the greatest gift you have to give is that of your own self-transformation
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: It is in your power to withdraw yourself whenever you desire. Perfect tranquility within consists in the good ordering of the mind, the realm of your own
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: A good person dyes events with his own color…and turns whatever happens to his own benefit
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: Don’t ruin a good today thinking about a bad yesterday. Let it go
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: Do not strive for comfort or to be good. Strive only to be free and true
inspire.author: Mooji

inspire.quote: To be creative means to be in love with life
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Life is a mystery to be experienced, not a problem to be solved
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: I can alter my life by altering my attitude. He who would have nothing to do with thorns must never attempt to gather flowers
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: I believe that life exists to be enjoyed, and that the most important thing is to feel good about yourself
inspire.author: Tim Ferriss

inspire.quote: As it is with a play, so it is with life – what matters is not how long the acting lasts, but how good it is
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: We are here to add to what we can to life, not to get what we can from it
inspire.author: William Osler

inspire.quote: A secret to life: Know that none of this matters, and yet… live as if every single moment does
inspire.author: Kamal Ravikant

inspire.quote: The place to improve the world is first in one’s own heart and head and hands, and then work outward from there. Robert M
inspire.author: Pirsig

inspire.quote: If we couldn’t laugh, we would all go insane
inspire.author: Robert Frost

inspire.quote: Nothing bad is permanent. Nothing good is permanent
inspire.author: @DailyZen

inspire.quote: All you need are these: certainty of judgment in the present moment; action for the common good in the present moment; and an attitude of gratitude in the present moment for anything that comes your way
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: The purpose of life is to discover your gift. The work of life is to develop it. The meaning of life is to give your gift away
inspire.author: David Viscott

inspire.quote: If you’re overly worried about looking bad at something, then you’ll never have to worry about being good at anything
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: It’s not about being better than others. You’re not interested in defeating people. That’s not your aim. Your aim is to be a better version of yourself and inspire others to be a better version of themselves
inspire.author: Thibaut (@kpaxs)

inspire.quote: When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: It’s easy to be a hater. Go for the difficult task: Be a lover
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: When life is good do not take it for granted as it will pass. Be mindful, be compassionate and nurture the circumstances that find you in this good time so it will last longer
inspire.author: Ajahn Brahm

inspire.quote: The future is made up of only one substance and that is the present moment. By taking care of the present, you are doing everything you can to assure a good future
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: If you have everything under control, you’re not moving fast enough
inspire.author: Mario Andretti

inspire.quote: Life is about execution rather than purpose
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: You are this universe and you are creating it at every moment
inspire.author: Alan Watts

inspire.quote: How you love is how you live
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Love is rocket fuel for life
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: When you find someone exceptional that you love and loves you in return, go all in
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Always give without remembering, always receive without forgetting. T
inspire.author: Harv Eker

inspire.quote: Spread the energy of love without expecting anything. Cowards are incapable of expressing love; it is the prerogative of the brave
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: The positive force of love can create anything good, increase the good things, and change anything negative in your life
inspire.author: Rhonda Byrne

inspire.quote: For one human being to love another human being: that is perhaps the most difficult task that has been entrusted to us, the ultimate task, the final test and proof, the work for which all other work is merely preparation
inspire.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

inspire.quote: Nothing is of love if it is not done through love
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Love needs two things: it has to be rooted in freedom and it has to know the art of trust
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Rather than thinking how to get love, start giving. If you give, you get. Everybody is interested in getting and nobody seems to enjoy giving. Love is not a business, so stop being businesslike
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Love is not dependent on the object, but is a radiation of your subjectivity – a radiation of your soul
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Love makes you feel needed, and to be needed is the greatest need
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Love is not a relationship between two persons. It is a state of mind within yourself. If you are loving, you are loving to everybody
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Friendship of the wise is good; a wise enemy is better than a foolish friend
inspire.author: Rumi

inspire.quote: Don’t let jerks live rent-free in your head
inspire.author: Sam Altman

inspire.quote: Develop enough courage so that you can stand up for yourself and then stand up for somebody else
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: Perfect people aren’t real and real people aren’t perfect
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: If you wish to glimpse inside a human soul and get to know a man, don’t bother analyzing his ways of being silent, of talking, of weeping, of seeing how much he is moved by noble ideas; you will get better results if you just watch him laugh. If he laughs well, he’s a good man
inspire.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

inspire.quote: I’m wary of people who insist on trying to make other people feel bad about themselves. The more I look around me and within me the more I notice that those who feel best about themselves have the greatest capacity to feel good about others
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Pay bad people with your goodness; fight their hatred with your kindness. Even if you do not achieve victory over other people, you will conquer yourself
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: When you are independent of the good or bad opinions of others, you stand strong in your own divine power
inspire.author: Deepak Chopra

inspire.quote: The secret to life is simple. Be good to people. Treat them with kindness. Listen. Be open
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: Shallow men believe in luck, believe in circumstances. Strong men believe in cause and effect
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: I’m not the strongest. I’m not the fastest. But I’m really good at suffering
inspire.author: Amelia Boone

inspire.quote: No one will work for your success as much as you will
inspire.author: Sahil Lavingia

inspire.quote: You’ll never know how good of a musician you could have been. You’ll never know how good of a painter you could have been. You’ll never know how good of a writer you could have been. If you don’t give yourself the chance
inspire.author: Sahil Lavingia

inspire.quote: There is a difference between interest and commitment. When you’re interested in doing something, you do it only when circumstances permit. When you’re committed to something, you accept no excuses, only results
inspire.author: Ken Blanchard

inspire.quote: In the past, jobs were about muscles, now they’re about brains, but in the future they’ll be about the heart
inspire.author: Minouche Shafik

inspire.quote: Better is possible. It does not take genius. It takes diligence. It takes moral clarity. It takes ingenuity. And above all, it takes a willingness to try
inspire.author: Atul Gawande

inspire.quote: Good decisions don’t ensure success, but bad ones almost always ensure failure
inspire.author: George Raveling

inspire.quote: You can’t ever reach perfection, but you can believe in an asymptote toward which you are ceaselessly striving
inspire.author: Paul Kalanithi

inspire.quote: You get paid linearly for analyzing and solving problems. You get paid non-linearly for spotting and siezing opportunities
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: To get what you want, deserve what you want. Trust, success, and admiration are earned
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Victory awaits him who has everything in order – luck people call it. Defeat is certain for him who has neglected to take the necessary precautions in time; this is called bad luck
inspire.author: Roald Amundsen (The South Pole)

inspire.quote: My only measure of success is how much time you have to kill
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: The human brain doesn’t learn through consumption. It learns through creation
inspire.author: Jim Kwik

inspire.quote: The world is changed by your example. Not by your opinion
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: There are only two options: a) make progress b) invent excuses
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Doing the right things when you are feeling good is easy. Doing the right things when you are not feeling it separates the winners from the losers
inspire.author: Bill Masur

inspire.quote: There are three ways to ultimate success: The first way is to be kind. The second way is to be kind. The third way is to be kind
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Get really good at something. That’s your real security
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: If good happens, good; if bad happens, good
inspire.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

inspire.quote: A great man is always willing to be little
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: There’s no need to show off when you know who you are
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Pride makes us artificial and humility makes us real
inspire.author: Thomas Merton

inspire.quote: Mastery begins with humility
inspire.author: Robin Sharma

inspire.quote: Think lightly of yourself and deeply of the world
inspire.author: Miyamoto Musashi

inspire.quote: Every person that you meet knows something you don’t; learn from them. H
inspire.author: Jackson Brown Jr

inspire.quote: We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility
inspire.author: Rabindranath Tagore

inspire.quote: The biggest challenge after success is shutting up about it
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: Never look down on anybody unless you’re helping them up
inspire.author: Jesse Jackson

inspire.quote: To lead the people, walk behind them
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Perfection is impossible without humility
inspire.author: Why should I strive for perfection, if I am already good enough? Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: Humility is the essence of love and intelligence; it is not an achievement
inspire.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

inspire.quote: Humility, that low, sweet root, from which all heavenly virtues shoot
inspire.author: Thomas Moore

inspire.quote: Humility will open more doors than arrogance ever will
inspire.author: Zig Ziglar

inspire.quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: Humility is nothing but truth, and pride is nothing but lying
inspire.author: Saint Vincent de Paul

inspire.quote: Humility is the solid foundation of all virtues
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: The best of people is the one who humbles himself the more his rank increases
inspire.author: Prophet Muhammad

inspire.quote: The only wisdom we can hope to acquire is the wisdom of humility. T.S
inspire.author: Eliot

inspire.quote: It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it’s thinking of yourself less. C. S
inspire.author: Lewis

inspire.quote: If you are humble nothing will touch you, neither praise nor disgrace, because you know what you are
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Sometimes you have to lose something to gain something better. A door has to shut before a new door can open
inspire.author: Joel Osteen

inspire.quote: Don’t seek praise. Let your effort speak for itself
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Humility is the proper estimate of oneself
inspire.author: Charles Spurgeon

inspire.quote: Do good by stealth, and blush to find it fame
inspire.author: Alexander Pope

inspire.quote: I speak to everyone in the same way, whether he is the garbage man or the president of the university
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The young want massive confidence. The wise avoid it
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Two things define you. Your patience when you have nothing, and your attitude when you have everything
inspire.author: Imam Ali

inspire.quote: Grateful yet ambitious. Wordly yet wise. Strong yet loving
inspire.author: Robin Sharma

inspire.quote: Pride is the problem, humility is the answer
inspire.author: Joyce Meyer

inspire.quote: We are all stumblers, and the beauty and meaning of life are in the stumbling
inspire.author: David Brooks

inspire.quote: I know nothing except the fact of my ignorance
inspire.author: Diogenes

inspire.quote: I have three precious things which I hold fast and prize. The first is gentleness; the second is frugality; the third is humility, which keeps me from putting myself before others. Be gentle and you can be bold; be frugal and you can be liberal; avoid putting yourself before others and you can become a leader among men
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Perhaps wisdom…is realizing how small I am, and unwise, and how far I have yet to go
inspire.author: Anthony Bourdain

inspire.quote: In reality, humility means nothing other than complete honesty about yourself
inspire.author: William Countryman

inspire.quote: People search for certainty. But there is no certainty. Richard P
inspire.author: Feynman

inspire.quote: When I look at a person, I see a person – not a rank, not a class, not a title
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: To share your weakness is to make yourself vulnerable; to make yourself vulnerable is to show your strength
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: Humility is the surest sign of strength
inspire.author: Thomas Merton

inspire.quote: Humility is the foundation of all the other virtues hence, in the soul in which this virtue does not exist there cannot be any other virtue except in mere appearance
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: Humility is the key to moral excellence. It is the noblest quality a person can possess. […] It is the mother of all possibilities
inspire.author: Venerable Master Hsin Yun

inspire.quote: True humility does not know that it is humble. If it did, it would be proud from the contemplation of so fine a virtue
inspire.author: Martin Luther

inspire.quote: Humility is the greatest quality that a man can have, and arrogance is undoubtedly the worst. Maulana W
inspire.author: Khan

inspire.quote: Humility is the most beautiful virtue that we can develop
inspire.author: Joyce Meyer

inspire.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground
inspire.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Religion is to do right. It is to love, it is to serve, it is to think, it is to be humble
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: No amount of experimentation can ever prove me right; a single experiment can prove me wrong
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self
inspire.author: Ernest Hemingway

inspire.quote: It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit. Harry S. Truman (33rd U.S
inspire.author: President)

inspire.quote: Avoid having your ego so close to your position that when your position falls, your ego goes with it
inspire.author: Colin Powell

inspire.quote: It is unwise to be too sure of one’s own wisdom. It is healthy to be reminded that the strongest might weaken and the wisest might err
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: What are the things that you can’t see that are important? I would say justice, truth, humility, service, compassion, love. You can’t see any of those, but they’re the guiding lights of a life. Jimmy Carter (39th U.S
inspire.author: President)

inspire.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can’t lose
inspire.author: Bill Gates (Microsoft)

inspire.quote: Who is more humble? The scientist who looks at the universe with an open mind and accepts whatever the universe has to teach us, or somebody who says everything in this book must be considered the literal truth and never mind the fallibility of all the human beings involved?
inspire.author: Carl Sagan

inspire.quote: Do you wish people to think well of you? Don’t speak well of yourself
inspire.author: Blaise Pascal

inspire.quote: Nobody has ever expected me to be president. In my poor, lean lank face nobody has ever seen that any cabbages were sprouting. Abraham Lincoln (16th U.S
inspire.author: President)

inspire.quote: I have been driven many times upon my knees by the overwhelming conviction that I had no where else to go. My own wisdom and that of all about me seemed insufficient for that day
inspire.author: Abraham Lincoln

inspire.quote: If you’re not humble, life will visit humbleness upon you
inspire.author: Mike Tyson

inspire.quote: I truly believe we are all equal as human beings
inspire.author: Conor McGregor

inspire.quote: I hear my friends and my mom tell me I’m special, but honestly, I still don’t get it
inspire.author: LeBron James

inspire.quote: Everybody can be great…because anybody can serve. You don’t have to have a college degree to serve. You don’t have to make your subject and verb agree to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: Humility, like the darkness, reveals the heavenly lights
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: The world tells us to seek success, power and money; God tells us to seek humility, service and love
inspire.author: Pope Francis

inspire.quote: There is a universal respect and even admiration for those who are humble and simple by nature, and who have absolute confidence in all human beings irrespective of their social status
inspire.author: Nelson Mandela

inspire.quote: Accept everything which happens, even if it seem disagreeable, because it leads to this, the health of the universe
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: A true genius admits that he/she knows nothing
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Blushing is the color of virtue
inspire.author: Diogenes

inspire.quote: When we feel humiliated, the best reaction is humility
inspire.author: Simon Sinek

inspire.quote: It takes a big person to do something small
inspire.author: Joel Osteen

inspire.quote: Humility is absolutely necessary for true learning. Robert T
inspire.author: Kiyosaki

inspire.quote: Never curse a fall. The ground is where humility lives
inspire.author: Yasmin Mogahed

inspire.quote: Without humility there can be no humanity
inspire.author: John Buchan

inspire.quote: Learn to laugh at yourselves as one must laugh!
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: The soul is healed by being with children
inspire.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

inspire.quote: Humility is not a trait I often associate with America
inspire.author: Mira Nair

inspire.quote: The greatest patience is humility
inspire.author: Atiśa Dīpa kara Śrījñāna

inspire.quote: Someone who brags is a red flag
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Work hard, stay humble
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Arrogance repels. Humility inspires
inspire.author: Robin Sharma

inspire.quote: Humility wins. Love conquers
inspire.author: Robin Sharma

inspire.quote: Greatness loves gratitude
inspire.author: Robin Sharma

inspire.quote: Modesty is a lubricant for unpleasant intrusions
inspire.author: Norman Mailer

inspire.quote: He who tries to shine dims his own light
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: True humility is contentment
inspire.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

inspire.quote: If I only had a little humility, I’d be perfect
inspire.author: Ted Turner

inspire.quote: Nobody stands taller than those willing to stand corrected
inspire.author: William Safire

inspire.quote: There is beauty and humility in imperfection
inspire.author: Guillermo del Toro

inspire.quote: Be humble, hungry and the hardest worker in the room
inspire.author: Dwayne Johnson (The Rock)

inspire.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else. Booker T
inspire.author: Washington

inspire.quote: Think good thoughts. Speak good words. Take good actions
inspire.author: Rhonda Byrne

inspire.quote: Amateurs put blinders and miss opportunities. Professionals stay humble and learn the lessons
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Stand in utter humility at the sight of your true potential for mastery
inspire.author: Robin Sharma

inspire.quote: In humility is the greatest freedom. As long as you have to defend the imaginary self that you think is important, you lose your peace of heart
inspire.author: Thomas Merton

inspire.quote: The greatest friend of truth is time, her greatest enemy is prejudice, and her constant companion is humility
inspire.author: Charles Caleb Colton

inspire.quote: Real genius is nothing else but the supernatural virtue of humility in the domain of thought
inspire.author: Simone Weil

inspire.quote: I believe the first test of a truly great man is in his humility
inspire.author: John Ruskin

inspire.quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow
inspire.author: Aaron Lauritsen

inspire.quote: Stay true in the dark and humble in the spotlight. Harold B
inspire.author: Lee

inspire.quote: Do you wish to be great? Then begin by being. Do you desire to construct a vast and lofty fabric? Think first about the foundations of humility. The higher your structure is to be, the deeper must be its foundation
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: Humility, gentleness, and helpfulness go so much further and open doors you cannot imagine
inspire.author: Ann Tran

inspire.quote: Talent means nothing, while experience, acquired in humility and with hard work, means everything
inspire.author: Patrick Süskind

inspire.quote: I long to accomplish a great and noble tasks, but it is my chief duty to accomplish humble tasks as though they were great and noble. The world is moved along, not only by the mighty shoves of its heroes, but also by the aggregate of the tiny pushes of each honest worker
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: It is a wholesome and necessary thing for us to turn again to the earth and in the contemplation of her beauties to know of wonder and humility
inspire.author: Rachel Carson

inspire.quote: Never, ‘for the sake of peace and quiet,’ deny your own experience or convictions
inspire.author: Dag Hammarskjold

inspire.quote: Pride must die in you, or nothing of heaven can live in you
inspire.author: Andrew Murray

inspire.quote: On the highest throne in the world, we still sit only on our own bottom
inspire.author: Michel de Montaigne

inspire.quote: I have nothing to declare except my genius
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: Chickens don’t praise their own soup
inspire.author: Martinican proverb

inspire.quote: Don’t accept your dog’s admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful
inspire.author: Ann Landers

inspire.quote: If I had to name my greatest strength, I guess it would be my humility. Greatest weakness, it’s possible that I’m a little too awesome
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: There are two kinds of egotists: Those who admit it, and the rest of us. Laurence J
inspire.author: Peter

inspire.quote: Just remember, when someone has an accent, it means that he knows one more language than you do
inspire.author: Sidney Sheldon

inspire.quote: Who knows himself a braggart, let him fear this, for it will come to pass that every braggart shall be found an ass
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: I want to establish that I’m a "dumb sh*t" who doesn’t know much relative to what I need to know
inspire.author: Ray Dalio (American billionaire, investor and philanthropist)

inspire.quote: Whenever the world throws rose petals at you, which thrill and seduce the ego, beware. The cosmic banana peel is suddenly going to appear underfoot to make sure you don’t take it all too seriously, that you don’t fill up on junk food
inspire.author: Anne Lamott

inspire.quote: Flattery is all right so long as you don’t inhale
inspire.author: Adlai Stevenson

inspire.quote: I don’t want to see you. I don’t like you. I don’t like your face. You look like an insufferable egotist. You’re impertinent. You’re too sure of yourself
inspire.author: Ayn Rand

inspire.quote: Few things are harder to put up with than the annoyance of a good example
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: Early in life I had to choose between honest arrogance and hypocritical humility. I chose honest arrogance and have seen no occasion to change
inspire.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

inspire.quote: If your sentence starts with "I could be wrong", it’s a good sign you should shut your mouth or ask a question
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: I shall not commit the fashionable stupidity of regarding everything I cannot explain as a fraud
inspire.author: Carl Jung

inspire.quote: A lot of people think that to be a motherfucker is to be a person who is the dominant figure. But I actually think that true motherfuckerhood … really has to do with being humble
inspire.author: Cheryl Strayed

inspire.quote: Don’t talk about yourself; it will be done when you leave
inspire.author: Wilson Mizner

inspire.quote: Even when it speaks, humility listens
inspire.author: Thomas Merton

inspire.quote: You are not a drop in the ocean. You are the entire ocean in a drop
inspire.author: Rumi

inspire.quote: There is no birth of consciousness without pain
inspire.author: Carl Jung

inspire.quote: Be silent and listen: have you recognized your madness and do you admit it?
inspire.author: Carl Jung

inspire.quote: In humility and honesty you’ll find pain, envy and fear but you’ll also find strength, beauty and truth
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: True humility is when you can surprise yourself more than others; the rest is either shyness or good marketing
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: Something beautiful can happen to people when their world falls apart: humility, nobility and wisdom emerge just when our knees hit the floor
inspire.author: Marianne Williamson

inspire.quote: Those who are believed to be most abject and humble are usually the most ambitious and envious
inspire.author: Baruch Spinoza

inspire.quote: Humility is a strange thing. The minute you think you’ve got it, you’ve lost it. E. D
inspire.author: Hulse

inspire.quote: There are only two kinds of men: the righteous who think they are sinners and the sinners who think they are righteous
inspire.author: Blaise Pascal

inspire.quote: All streams flow to the sea because it is lower than they are. Humility gives it its power
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Confidence is important but ego is something false. Humility is the way to build confidence
inspire.author: Frank Shamrock

inspire.quote: Realize that you are simultaneously everything and nothing – and decide what you want to be. Ray Dalio (Life principle 1
inspire.author: 5d in his book Principles)

inspire.quote: Life is a mirror and will reflect back to the thinker what he thinks into it
inspire.author: Ernest Holmes

inspire.quote: Humility is the most difficult of all virtues to achieve; nothing dies harder than the desire to think well of oneself. T.S
inspire.author: Eliot

inspire.quote: You must be humble, but never "modest"
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: The tyrant dies and his rule is over, the martyr dies and his rule begins
inspire.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspire.quote: The truth is a trap: you cannot get it without it getting you; you cannot get the truth by capturing it, only by its capturing you
inspire.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspire.quote: The measure of who we are is how we react to something that does not go our way
inspire.author: Gregg Popovich

inspire.quote: You are going to die
inspire.author: Shay Carl

inspire.quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: Often the problem turns out to be you
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Two possibilities exist: either we are alone in the Universe or we are not. Both are equally terrifying. Arthur C
inspire.author: Clarke

inspire.quote: The idea that some lives matter less is the root of all that is wrong with the world. Dr
inspire.author: Paul Farmer

inspire.quote: Keep me away from the wisdom which does not cry, the philosophy which does not laugh and the greatness which does not bow before children
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: Men fight for liberty and win it with hard knocks. Their children, brought up easy, let it slip away again, poor fools. And their grandchildren are once more slaves. D. H
inspire.author: Lawrence

inspire.quote: I maintain that Truth is a pathless land, and you cannot approach it by any path whatsoever, by any religion, by any sect
inspire.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

inspire.quote: It is the desire for success that prevents humility; and without humility how can there be understanding?
inspire.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

inspire.quote: I’ve done what I could, let those who can do better
inspire.author: Alexander Solzhenitsyn

inspire.quote: The point is urgency. Appreciation. Humility. The present moment
inspire.author: Ryan Holiday

inspire.quote: Reminding ourselves each day that we will die, helps us treat our time as a gift
inspire.author: Ryan Holiday

inspire.quote: The soft overcomes the hard. The slow overcomes the fast
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: The greatest wisdom consists in knowing one’s own follies
inspire.author: Madeleine De Souvre Sable

inspire.quote: The greatest lesson in life is to know that even fools are right sometimes
inspire.author: Winston Churchill

inspire.quote: Talent is God given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful
inspire.author: John Wooden

inspire.quote: There is something in humility which strangely exalts the heart
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: Humility consists in not esteeming ourselves above other men, and in not seeking to be esteemed above them
inspire.author: Francis de Sales

inspire.quote: People speak well of the man who does not speak too much of himself
inspire.author: @TheStoicEmperor

inspire.quote: Humility is recognition of personal insufficiency and the willingness to learn. To learn is to die voluntarily and be born again, in great ways and small
inspire.author: Jordan Peterson

inspire.quote: I am wiser than this man, for neither of us appears to know anything great and good; but he fancies he knows something, although he knows nothing; whereas I, as I do not know anything, so I do not fancy I do
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them. John C
inspire.author: Maxwell

inspire.quote: Audacity gets you to shoot for big goals and humility gives you the open-mindedness to take in the best thinking available to you to get you to those goals
inspire.author: Ray Dalio

inspire.quote: What if, for starters, instead of constantly trying to prove how much smarter we are than others, we look for the intelligence in what others do
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: Humility is clearer-eyed than ego — and that’s important because humility always works harder than ego
inspire.author: Ryan Holiday

inspire.quote: The faculty to think objectively is reason; the emotional attitude behind reason is that of humility
inspire.author: Erich Fromm

inspire.quote: To live free is to live in humility: you don’t pretend, you don’t show off
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé (See also: simple quotes)

inspire.quote: We’re all the stars of our own movies, but cutting back on the number of Do you know who I am? thoughts made my life infinitely smoother
inspire.author: Dan Harris

inspire.quote: My opponent is my teacher. My ego is my enemy
inspire.author: Renzo Gracie

inspire.quote: It is not who is right, but what is right, that is of importance
inspire.author: Thomas Huxley

inspire.quote: We can’t bring anything to us unless we are grateful for what we already have
inspire.author: Rhonda Byrne

inspire.quote: Humility requires discipline of the tongue
inspire.author: Joyce Meyer

inspire.quote: Be like the bamboo the higher you grow the deeper you bow
inspire.author: Chinese proverb

inspire.quote: Everyone praises their own work (or possession), no matter how inferior it is
inspire.author: Russian proverb

inspire.quote: Self-praise is no recommendation
inspire.author: Romanian proverb

inspire.quote: Spoil not an act of kindness by speaking of it
inspire.author: Proverb

inspire.quote: To a person who has true humility, words are vows
inspire.author: Filipino proverb

inspire.quote: Even if you believe you are right, consider the possibility that you could be wrong
inspire.author: Joyce Meyer

inspire.quote: No one may pride himself at being more than an individual, and no one despondently think that he is not an individual
inspire.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspire.quote: Be careful, ever so careful, in trumpeting your own achievements, and always talk less about yourself than about other people. Modesty is generally preferable
inspire.author: Robert Greene

inspire.quote: We have to allow ourselves to realize that we are complete fools; otherwise, we have nowhere to begin
inspire.author: Chögyam Trungpa

inspire.quote: Some ask if lowering one’s pride is conceding defeat. I think not. Humility is a sign of inner strength and wisdom
inspire.author: Haemin Sunim

inspire.quote: Pride is concerned with who is right while humility is concerned with what is right
inspire.author: Ezra Taft Benson

inspire.quote: Humility, like gratitude, is not so much a technique as it is a way of life
inspire.author: Ed Latimore

inspire.quote: Keep your head up in failure, and your head down in success
inspire.author: Jerry Seinfeld

inspire.quote: A proud man is always looking down on things and people; and, of course, as long as you are looking down, you cannot see something that is above you. C.S
inspire.author: Lewis

inspire.quote: Peace begins with a smile
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: The world is now too small for anything but brotherhood
inspire.author: Arthur Powell Davies

inspire.quote: Love is the purest form of a soul at peace
inspire.author: Matthew Donnelly

inspire.quote: Little people are intolerant, selfish and impatient. Wise people are calm, loving and understanding
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: If you want peace, you don’t talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies
inspire.author: Desmond Tutu

inspire.quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; its those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world
inspire.author: Desmond Tutu (Nobel Peace Prize 1984)

inspire.quote: I do not want the peace that passeth understanding. I want the understanding which bringeth peace
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: When you make peace with yourself, you make peace with the world
inspire.author: Maha Ghosananda

inspire.quote: Why can’t people just sit and read books and be nice to each other?
inspire.author: David Baldacci

inspire.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace
inspire.author: Jimi Hendrix

inspire.quote: You can’t separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom
inspire.author: Malcolm X

inspire.quote: You were placed on this earth to create not to compete
inspire.author: Robert Anthony

inspire.quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace
inspire.author: Amelia Earhart

inspire.quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: We will know peace the day we truly know ourselves
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: World peace begins with inner peace
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: Peace in ourselves, peace in the world
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: Don’t gain the world and lose your soul, wisdom is better than silver or gold
inspire.author: Bob Marley

inspire.quote: You can’t shake hands with a clenched fist
inspire.author: Indira Gandhi

inspire.quote: First keep the peace within yourself, then you can also bring peace to others
inspire.author: Thomas a Kempis

inspire.quote: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Peace, which costs nothing, is attended with with infinitely more advantage than any victory with all its expense
inspire.author: Thomas Paine

inspire.quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you
inspire.author: Deepak Chopra

inspire.quote: If there must be trouble let it be in my day, that my child may have peace
inspire.author: Thomas Paine

inspire.quote: If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there’d be peace
inspire.author: John Lennon

inspire.quote: To forgive is the highest, most beautiful form of love. In return, you will receive untold peace and happiness
inspire.author: Robert Muller

inspire.quote: True peace is not merely the absence of tension: it is the presence of justice
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: If we ourselves remain angry and then sing world peace, it has little meaning. First, our individual self must learn peace. This we can practice. Then we can teach the rest of the world
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: I am not only a pacifist but a militant pacifist. I am willing to fight for peace. Nothing will end war unless the people themselves refuse to go to war
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I have come into this world to see this: the sword drop from men’s hands even at the height of their arc of rage because we have finally realized there is just one flesh we can wound
inspire.author: Hafiz of Persia

inspire.quote: There is a higher court than courts of justice, and that is the court of conscience. It supersedes all other courts
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Let us bring equality, justice, and peace for all. Not just the politicians and the world leaders, we all need to contribute. Me. You. It is our duty
inspire.author: Malala Yousafzai (Nobel Prize Winner 2014)

inspire.quote: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: You cannot find peace by avoiding life
inspire.author: Virginia Woolf

inspire.quote: Make peace with your broken pieces
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Worrying does not take away tomorrow’s troubles, it takes away today’s peace
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: There is no way to peace, peace is the way. A.J
inspire.author: Muste

inspire.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow
inspire.author: Melody Beattie

inspire.quote: The practice of peace and reconciliation is one of the most vital and artistic of human actions
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don’t do anything about it
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Peace is not only better than war, but infinitely more arduous
inspire.author: George Bernard Shaw

inspire.quote: Peace is not achieved by controlling nations, but mastering our thoughts
inspire.author: John Harricharan

inspire.quote: Peace is not the absence of war but the presence of justice
inspire.author: Harrison Ford

inspire.quote: Peace is not the absence of war; it is a virtue; a state of mind; a disposition for benevolence; confidence; and justice
inspire.author: Baruch Spinoza

inspire.quote: Peace is a daily, a weekly, a monthly process, gradually changing opinions, slowly eroding old barriers, quietly building new structures. John F
inspire.author: Kennedy

inspire.quote: Peace is costly but it is worth the expense
inspire.author: African proverb

inspire.quote: Peace is the only battle worth waging
inspire.author: Albert Camus

inspire.quote: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other
inspire.author: Mother Teresa (Nobel Peace Prize 1979)

inspire.quote: Peace cannot be achieved through violence, it can only be attained through understanding
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: I believe our sorrow can make us a better country. I believe our righteous anger can be transformed into more justice and more peace
inspire.author: Barack Obama (Nobel Peace Prize 2009)

inspire.quote: Resolutely train yourself to attain peace
inspire.author: Buddha

inspire.quote: A running world is a peaceful world
inspire.author: Eliud Kipchoge (First man to run a marathon under two hours)

inspire.quote: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner
inspire.author: Nelson Mandela (Nobel Peace Prize 1993)

inspire.quote: No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin, or his background, or his religion. People must learn to hate, and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love, for love comes more naturally to the human heart than its opposite
inspire.author: Nelson Mandela

inspire.quote: I was a drum major for peace
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr (Nobel Peace Prize 1964)

inspire.quote: There is something strangely inconsistent about a nation and a press that would praise you when you say, ‘Be nonviolent toward Jim Clark,’ but will curse and damn you when you say, ‘Be nonviolent toward little brown Vietnamese children.’ There is something wrong with that press
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: Only art and music have the power to bring peace
inspire.author: Yoko Ono

inspire.quote: Some people call me the girl who was shot by the Taliban. And some, the girl who fought for her rights
inspire.author: Malala Yousafzai (Nobel Peace Prize 2014)

inspire.quote: There is no greater violence than to deny the dreams of our children
inspire.author: Kailash Satyarthi (Nobel Peace Prize 2014)

inspire.quote: The biggest challenge or biggest crisis knocking on the doors of humankind is fear and intolerance
inspire.author: Kailash Satyarhi (Nobel Peace Prize 2014)

inspire.quote: I know not with what weapons World War III will be fought, but World War IV will be fought with sticks and stones
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable. John F
inspire.author: Kennedy

inspire.quote: The care of human life and happiness, and not their destruction, is the first and only object of good government
inspire.author: Thomas Jefferson

inspire.quote: We will not learn how to live together in peace by killing each other’s children
inspire.author: Jimmy Carter

inspire.quote: Working for peace in the future is to work for peace in the present moment
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: Part 1. I believe that to meet the challenges of our times, human beings will have to develop a greater sense of universal responsibility
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama (Real name is Tenzin Gyatso, Nobel Peace Prize 1989)

inspire.quote: Part 2. Each of us must learn to work not just for oneself, one’s own family or nation, but for the benefit of all humankind. Universal responsibility is the key to human survival. It is the best foundation for world peace
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: Peace by persuasion has a pleasant sound, but I think we should not be able to work it. We should have to tame the human race first, and history seems to show that that cannot be done
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: Non-cooperation is a measure of discipline and sacrifice, and it demands respect for the opposite views
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi (Nominated 5 times for Nobel Peace Prize)

inspire.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I’m a dreamer, but I’m not the only one. I hope someday you’ll join us, and the world will live as one
inspire.author: John Lennon

inspire.quote: All we are saying is give peace a chance
inspire.author: John Lennon

inspire.quote: Peace is every step
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: Peace is its own reward
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Peace begins when expectation ends
inspire.author: Sri Chinmoy

inspire.quote: Dream always of a peaceful, warless, disarmed world
inspire.author: Robert Muller

inspire.quote: We make war that we may live in peace
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: #PeaceDay should be everyday
inspire.author: Michael Douglas (UN Messenger of Peace)

inspire.quote: Every drop in the ocean counts
inspire.author: Yoko Ono

inspire.quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: Peace without justice is an impossibility
inspire.author: Desmond Tutu (Nobel Peace Prize 1984)

inspire.quote: Love is my weapon. Music is my religion. Peace is in my soul
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: I am centered. I am balanced. I am at peace
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Life is much easier when you just chill out
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Peace is never a perfect achievement
inspire.author: Kofi Annan (Nobel Peace Prize 2001)

inspire.quote: I, too, am America
inspire.author: Langston Hughes

inspire.quote: Human suffering anywhere concerns men and women everywhere
inspire.author: Elie Wiesel

inspire.quote: One little person, giving all of her time to peace, makes news. Many people, giving some of their time, can make history
inspire.author: Peace Pilgrim

inspire.quote: Everyday we do things, we are things that have to do with peace. If we are aware of our life…, our way of looking at things, we will know how to make peace right in the moment, we are alive
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: You who are journalists, writers, citizens, you have the right and duty to say to those you have elected that they must practice mindfulness, calm and deep listening, and loving speech. This is universal thing, taught by all religions
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh (See also: Peace Is Every Step, Amazon book)

inspire.quote: A civilized nation can have no enemies, and one cannot draw a line across a map, a line that doesn’t even exist in nature and say that the ugly enemy lives on the one side, and good friends live on the other
inspire.author: Thor Heyerdahl

inspire.quote: Peace has to be created, in order to be maintained. It is the product of faith, strength, energy, will, sympathy, justice, imagination, and the triumph of principle. It will never be achieved by passivity and quietism
inspire.author: Dorothy Thompson

inspire.quote: Part 1. Peace is the highest and most strenuous act of the soul, but an entirely harmonious act, in which all our powers and affections are blending in a beautiful proportion, and sustain and perfect one another
inspire.author: William Ellery Channing

inspire.quote: Part 2. It is more than the silence after storms
inspire.author: It is as the concord of all melodious sounds… an alliance of love with all beings, a sympathy with all that is pure and happy, a surrender of every separate will and interest, a participation of the spirit and life of the universe… William Ellery Channing

inspire.quote: Part 3. This is peace, and the true happiness of humanity
inspire.author: William Ellery Channing

inspire.quote: Peace is our gift to each other
inspire.author: Elie Wiesel (Nobel Peace Prize 1986)

inspire.quote: If not now, then when? If not you, then who? If we are able to answer these fundamental questions, then perhaps we can wipe away the blot of human slavery
inspire.author: Kailash Satyarthi (Nobel Peace Prize 2014)

inspire.quote: We who work for peace must not falter. We must continue to pray for peace and to act for peace in whatever way we can, we must continue to speak for peace and to live the way of peace; to inspire others, we must continue to think of peace and to know that peace is possible
inspire.author: Peace Pilgrim

inspire.quote: The great teachings unanimously emphasize that all the peace, wisdom, and joy in the universe are already within us; we don’t have to gain, develop, or attain them. We’re like a child standing in a beautiful park with his eyes shut tight. We don’t need to imagine trees, flowers, deer, birds, and sky; we merely need to open our eyes and realize what is already here, who we really are – as soon as we quit pretending we’re small or unholy
inspire.author: Bo Lozoff

inspire.quote: The greatest personalities that ever existed have been those who united human beings and put them on the road toward cooperation and effectiveness and peace. Those whom the world has held highest have helped to unite and not sever interconnectedness. They have not been the destroyers of differences but the harmonizer of differences
inspire.author: John Lovejoy Elliott

inspire.quote: Choose. The single clenched fist lifted and ready, or the open hand held out and waiting. Choose: For we meet by one or the other
inspire.author: Carl Sandburg

inspire.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: Barbecue may not be the road to world peace, but it’s a start
inspire.author: Anthony Bourdain

inspire.quote: Fighting for peace is like screwing for virginity
inspire.author: George Carlin

inspire.quote: Perpetual peace is only found in the graveyard
inspire.author: Immanuel Kant

inspire.quote: Dogs are our link to paradise. They don’t know evil or jealousy or discontent. To sit with a dog on a hillside on a glorious afternoon is to be back in Eden, where doing nothing was not boring – it was peace
inspire.author: Milan Kundera

inspire.quote: While conscience is our friend, all is at peace; however once it is offended, farewell to a tranquil mind
inspire.author: Lady Mary Wortley Montagu

inspire.quote: For peace of mind, resign as general manager of the Universe
inspire.author: Larry Eisenberg

inspire.quote: There is peace in the garden. Peace and results
inspire.author: Ruth Stout

inspire.quote: I first learned the concepts of non-violence in my marriage
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Peace is the virtue of civilization. War is its crime
inspire.author: Victor Hugo

inspire.quote: In peace the sons bury their fathers, but in war the fathers bury their sons
inspire.author: Croesus

inspire.quote: Never, ‘for the sake of peace and quiet,’ deny your own experience or convictions
inspire.author: Dag Hammarskjold

inspire.quote: Let us not deceive ourselves; we must elect world peace or world destruction
inspire.author: Bernard Baruch

inspire.quote: There can be no vulnerability without risk; there can be no community without vulnerability; there can be no peace, and ultimately no life, without community. M
inspire.author: Scott Peck

inspire.quote: When I say it’s you I like, I’m talking about that part of you that knows that life is far more than anything you can ever see or hear or touch. That deep part of you that allows you to stand for those things without which humankind cannot survive. Love that conquers hate, peace that rises triumphant over war, and justice that proves more powerful than greed
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: The opposite of peace is indifference to both peace and war—indifference to hunger and persecution, to imprisonment and humiliation, indifference to torture and persecution
inspire.author: Elie Wiesel

inspire.quote: The less we know ourselves, the more power we crave, the more violent we become
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: One day we must come to see that peace is not merely a distant goal we seek, but that it is a means by which we arrive at that goal. We must pursue peaceful ends through peaceful means
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: The earth is too small a star and we too brief a visitor upon it for anything to matter more than the struggle for peace
inspire.author: Colman McCarthy

inspire.quote: Is it not better for a man to die for a cause in which he believes, such as peace, than to suffer for a cause in which he does not believe, such as war?
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: They have not wanted Peace at all; they have wanted to be spared war – as though the absence of war was the same as peace
inspire.author: Dorothy Thompson

inspire.quote: You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: Ultimately the only peace and security you can hope for from your enemies is their disappearance
inspire.author: Robert Greene

inspire.quote: Conflict is inevitable; you will never have total peace
inspire.author: Robert Greene

inspire.quote: When there is no enemy within, the enemies outside cannot hurt you
inspire.author: African proverb

inspire.quote: While you are proclaiming peace with your lips, be careful to have it even more fully in your heart
inspire.author: Francis of Assisi

inspire.quote: One is left with the horrible feeling now that war settles nothing; that to win a war is as disastrous as to lose one
inspire.author: Agatha Christie

inspire.quote: If I have been of service, if I have glimpsed more of the nature and essence of ultimate good, if I am inspired to reach wider horizons of thought and action, if I am at peace with myself, it has been a successful day
inspire.author: Alex Noble

inspire.quote: We are not going to deal with the violence in our communities, our homes, and our nation, until we learn to deal with the basic ethic of how we resolve our disputes and to place an emphasis on peace in the way we relate to one another
inspire.author: Marian Wright Edelman

inspire.quote: We have two ears and one mouth, so we should listen more than we say
inspire.author: Zeno of Citium

inspire.quote: Everyone’s a pacifist between wars. It’s like being a vegetarian between meals
inspire.author: Colman McCarthy

inspire.quote: Those who are at war with others are not at peace with themselves
inspire.author: William Hazlitt

inspire.quote: Thou hast made us for thyself, O Lord, and our heart is restless until it finds its rest in thee
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: It’s time for us to turn to each other, not on each other
inspire.author: Jesse Jackson

inspire.quote: Dad, how do soldiers killing each other solve the world’s problems?
inspire.author: Bill Watterson (Calvin and Hobbes)

inspire.quote: Be selective in your battles. Sometimes peace is better than being right
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Either war is obsolete or men are. R
inspire.author: Buckminster Fuller

inspire.quote: If there is to be peace in the world, there must be peace in the nations. If there is to be peace in the nations, there must be peace in the cities. If there is to be peace in the cities, there must be peace between neighbors. If there is to be peace between neighbors, there must be peace in the home. If there is to be peace in the home, there must be peace in the heart
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: We have to prepare the child for the path, not the path for the child
inspire.author: Tim Elmore

inspire.quote: When you teach your son, you teach your son’s son
inspire.author: The Talmud

inspire.quote: To be a parent is to be chief designer of a product more advanced than any technology and more interesting than the greatest work of art
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: Evidence of good parenting: the child has no desire to be famous
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: Your children will reap what you sow
inspire.author: Virgil

inspire.quote: My goal is not to be liked, it’s to raise loving and responsible kids
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: A lot of parents will do anything for their kids, except let them be themselves
inspire.author: Banksy

inspire.quote: I don’t think anyone can grow unless he’s loved exactly as he is now, appreciated for what he is rather than what he will be
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Don’t handicap your children by making their lives easy. Robert A
inspire.author: Heinlein

inspire.quote: Your children need your presence more than your presents
inspire.author: Jesse Jackson

inspire.quote: Instead of buying your children all the things you never had, you should teach them all the things you were never taught. Material wears out but knowledge stays
inspire.author: Bruce Lee

inspire.quote: We cannot always build the future for our youth, but we can build our youth for the future. Franklin D
inspire.author: Roosevelt

inspire.quote: A mother is she who can take the place of all others but whose place no one else can take
inspire.author: Cardinal Meymillod

inspire.quote: Someone’s sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago
inspire.author: Warren Buffett

inspire.quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: Never help a child with a task at which he feels he can succeed
inspire.author: Maria Montessori

inspire.quote: Question for parents: do you want to make your children safe, or strong?
inspire.author: Jordan Peterson (12 Rules for Life, Amazon book)

inspire.quote: We’re a nation of exhausted and overstressed adults raising overscheduled children
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be. Frank A
inspire.author: Clark

inspire.quote: The small hopes and plans and pleasures of children should be tenderly respected by grown-up people, and never rudely thwarted or ridiculed
inspire.author: Louisa May Alcott (Little Men)

inspire.quote: My understanding of the way a child grows is that you create the garden, you don’t grow the flower. You can merely fertilize the earth and keep it soft and moist, and then the flower grows as best it can
inspire.author: Ram Dass

inspire.quote: Every child should be taught that life is unfair so that we don’t end up with a bunch of adults who act like the world owes them something
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy

inspire.quote: The task isn’t to tell children that they are amazing, it’s to model for them how one might live a very decent, self-accepting, humour filled and confident life knowing one isn’t anything of the sort – but fortunately, no one else is either. Alain de Botton (See also: How to Lend a Child Confidence, theschooloflife
inspire.author: com)

inspire.quote: The task of a parent: to acclimatise the child to the true (often horrific) nature of reality without it giving up hope or the will to live
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence
inspire.author: Denis Waitley

inspire.quote: Tell kids stories about your failures
inspire.author: Tim Elmore

inspire.quote: The best way, perhaps the only way, to change others is to become an example
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: True, unconditional, love is the province of parents and saints
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: The experience of raising young children – when they’re happy, you’re happy
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: You can’t be wrong if you teach your kids playing, creating, listening, but most of all, loving
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Children have never been very good at listening to their elders, but they have never failed to imitate them
inspire.author: James Baldwin

inspire.quote: It is the responsibility of every adult to make sure that children hear what we have learned from the lessons of life and to hear over and over that we love them and that they are not alone
inspire.author: Marian Wright Edelman

inspire.quote: One of the universal fears of childhood is the fear of not having value in the eyes of the people whom we admire so much
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Play is often talked about as if it were a relief from serious learning. But for children play is serious learning. Play is really the work of childhood
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: 6-year-olds should play outside and ask questions, not sit on a chair and memorize answers
inspire.author: Johnny Uzan

inspire.quote: The best way of killing a rose is to force it open when it is still only the promise of a bud
inspire.author: José Saramago (The Cave)

inspire.quote: Parenthood is a great way to develop a leader’s mentality. Whatever the circumstances, there’s always one pair of eyes looking up to you
inspire.author: Johnny Uzan

inspire.quote: If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Every father should remember one day his son will follow his example, not his advice
inspire.author: Charles Kettering

inspire.quote: Children are a poor man’s riches
inspire.author: English proverb

inspire.quote: At the end of the day my most important job is still mom-in-chief
inspire.author: Michelle Obama

inspire.quote: A mother’s arms are made of tenderness and children sleep soundly in them
inspire.author: Victor Hugo

inspire.quote: Spend more time smiling than frowning and more time praising than criticizing
inspire.author: Richard Branson (Virgin)

inspire.quote: Your child will learn more from your beautiful thinking, talking and behaviour than anything else in the world
inspire.author: Yoko Ono

inspire.quote: It is time for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity there is beauty and there is strength
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: Use your success, wealth and influence to put them in the best position to realize their own dreams and find their true purpose. Put them through school, set them up with job interviews and help them become leaders in their own right. Hold them to the same level of hard work and dedication that it took for you to get to where you are now, and where you will eventually go. Kobe Bryant (See also: Letter to My Younger Self, theplayerstribune
inspire.author: com)

inspire.quote: I am convinced that every effort must be made in childhood to teach the young to use their own minds. For one thing is sure: If they don’t make up their minds, someone will do it for them
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: I wish with all my heart that every child could be so imbued with a sense of the adventure of life that each change, each readjustment, each surprise – good or bad – that came along would be welcomed as part of the whole enthralling experience
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Modern education is premised strongly on materialistic values. It is vital that when educating our children’s brains that we do not neglect to educate their hearts, a key element of which has to be the nurturing of our compassionate nature
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men
inspire.author: Frederick Douglas

inspire.quote: You may give them your love but not your thoughts, for they have their own thoughts
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran (The Prophet)

inspire.quote: Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a person’s character lies in their own hands
inspire.author: Anne Frank

inspire.quote: More kids are ruined by the behavior of their parents than by the amount they inherit. Children learn from your actions
inspire.author: Warren Buffett

inspire.quote: When a man dies, if he can pass enthusiasm along to his children, he has left them an estate of incalculable value
inspire.author: Thomas Edison

inspire.quote: We must do everything in our power to cease the behaviour that makes children everywhere feel afraid
inspire.author: Alice Walker

inspire.quote: Treat people as if they were what they ought to be and you help them to become what they are capable of being
inspire.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

inspire.quote: The surest way to corrupt a youth is to instruct him to hold in higher esteem those who think alike than those who think differently
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche (The Dawn)

inspire.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father’s protection
inspire.author: Sigmund Freud

inspire.quote: Educate your children to self-control, to the habit of holding passion and prejudice and evil tendencies subject to an upright and reasoning will, and you have done much to abolish misery from their future and crimes from society
inspire.author: Benjamin Franklin

inspire.quote: Do I want to be a hero to my son? No, I would like to be a very real human being. That’s hard enough
inspire.author: Robert Downey Jr

inspire.quote: If you have never been hated by your child, you have never been a parent
inspire.author: Bette Davis

inspire.quote: Let kids be kids
inspire.author: David Perell

inspire.quote: Encourage talking
inspire.author: David Perell

inspire.quote: Kids spell love T-I-M-E
inspire.author: John Crudele

inspire.quote: Everything depends on upbringing
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy (War and Peace)

inspire.quote: Noble fathers have noble children
inspire.author: Euripides

inspire.quote: Their lives should be good, not easy
inspire.author: @DailyDadEmail

inspire.quote: Parenthood is the opiate of the masses
inspire.author: Chuck Palahniuk

inspire.quote: Strengthen a parent and you strengthen a child
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: A parents words become the children’s thoughts
inspire.author: Bill Masur

inspire.quote: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters
inspire.author: George Herbert

inspire.quote: A boy needs a father to show him how to be in the world
inspire.author: Ian Morgan Cron

inspire.quote: Children are apt to live up to what you believe of them
inspire.author: Lady Bird Johnson

inspire.quote: Most parents : "Be safe". Wise parents : "Become strong"
inspire.author: Fateh Singh

inspire.quote: Your kids are wildflowers. Give them the right environment
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Mother is a verb. It’s something you do. Not just who you are
inspire.author: Cheryl Lacey Donovan

inspire.quote: There are not perfect parents just as there are no perfect children
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: The child supplies the power but the parents have to do the steering
inspire.author: Benjamin Spock

inspire.quote: My father didn’t tell me how to live. He lived and let me watch him do it
inspire.author: Clarence Budington Kelland

inspire.quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children. Charles R
inspire.author: Swindoll

inspire.quote: The love you give your kids will travel several generations into the future
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: Fathering is not something perfect men do, but something that perfects the man
inspire.author: Frank Pittman

inspire.quote: Children aren’t coloring books. You don’t get to fill them with your favorite colors
inspire.author: Khaled Hosseini

inspire.quote: Let parents bequeath to their children not riches, but the spirit of reverence
inspire.author: Plato

inspire.quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it
inspire.author: Edith Wharton

inspire.quote: It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves that will make them successful human beings
inspire.author: Ann Landers

inspire.quote: Coach me and I will learn. Challenge me and I will grow. Believe in me and I will win
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: The joy of mentoring isn’t in seeing your proteges follow in your footsteps. It’s in helping them discover and develop their own principles and passions
inspire.author: Adam Grant

inspire.quote: As human beings, our job in life is to help people realize how rare and valuable each one of us really is, that each of us has something that no one else has – or ever will have – something inside that is unique to all time. It’s our job to encourage each other to discover that uniqueness and to provide ways of developing its expression
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: What I would like to give my daughter is the habit of living with freedom. And this is something that must be given by example, not by exhortation
inspire.author: Erica Jong

inspire.quote: God could not be everywhere, and therefore he made mothers
inspire.author: Rudyard Kipling

inspire.quote: What really matters is helping others win, too, even if it means slowing down and changing our course now and then
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: In every neighborhood, all across our country, there are good people insisting on a good start for the young, and doing something about it
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: One of the greatest dignities of humankind is that each successive generation is invested in the welfare of each new generation
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: All of our growth is rooted in the firm trust that all of those who first cared about us maintained
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Teach your kids that talent doesn’t exist and that people who persevere are the wise ones
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The quality of a father can be seen in the goals, dreams and aspirations he sets not only for himself, but for his family
inspire.author: Reed Markham

inspire.quote: Mostly you just have to keep plugging and keep loving — and hoping that your child forgives you according to how you loved him, judged him, forgave him, and stood watching over him as he slept, year after year
inspire.author: Ben Stein

inspire.quote: There is no single effort more radical in its potential for saving the world than a transformation of the way we raise our children
inspire.author: Marianne Williamson

inspire.quote: Mothers are the only ones that think nothing is beyond their control when it comes to their children
inspire.author: Ali Fazal

inspire.quote: I have found the very best way to advise your children is to find out what they want to do and advise them to do it. Harry S
inspire.author: Truman

inspire.quote: If you want your children to improve, let them overhear the nice things you say about them to others
inspire.author: Haim Ginott

inspire.quote: High standards, consistency, but most importantly, unconditional love, is what will help you raise good kids
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: You really have to be yourself. The best thing that you can do, for anybody, is just to offer one more honest adult in their lives
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: You cannot fix your children and you cannot plan their lives. You can guide, support, nurture and love them in the best way you can
inspire.author: Iyanla Vanzant

inspire.quote: I am inviting you to go deeper, to learn and to practice so that you become someone who has a great capacity for being solid, calm, and without fear, because our society needs people like you who have these qualities, and your children, our children, need people like you, in order to go on, in order to become solid, and calm, and without fear
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: When parents are too hands-on, kids fail to learn self-reliance. Instead of hovering like a helicopter parent, try submarine parenting: give kids the freedom to explore and surface if there’s a distress signal
inspire.author: Adam Grant
