inspire.quote: Snowplow parents prepare the road for kids. Responsible parents prepare kids for the road. Resilience is built not by eliminating struggle, but by normalizing it. Teach kids to see obstacles as temporary hurdles
inspire.author: Adam Grant

inspire.quote: Parents focus too much on grades and goals, and too little on generosity. Kids raised to be kind are more successful in school and work — and happier too. At family dinner, don’t just ask kids what they achieved. Ask who they helped and who helped them
inspire.author: Adam Grant

inspire.quote: These six words can save your child so much unnecessary pain: "I love you as you are"
inspire.author: Scott Barry Kaufman

inspire.quote: Teach your kids about money before they’re old enough to earn their own
inspire.author: Morgan Housel

inspire.quote: There’s someone around you who looks up to you. They may be struggling, full of doubt or afraid. You can change their life with four words. "I believe in you". Said at the right time, those are the most powerful words in the world
inspire.author: Johnny Uzan

inspire.quote: If you want to inhibit kids’ growth, keep telling them they are smart. If you want to give compliments and nurture growth, praise their curiosity and efforts
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Tips for Parents: 1. You are not always right. Don’t play God with your children. Model for them that it’s okay to be wrong sometimes. And if they question you, it’s not disrespect: It’s independent thinking, and that’s something to encourage, not shame
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: Best parenting advice I can give: Get your own sh*t together so you pass on as little of your own baggage as possible. The less weight your kids start with the more opportunities they’ll have
inspire.author: Mark Allan Bovair

inspire.quote: Kids will follow your example. Not your advice. Don’t just tell them to: do more physical activity, eat healthier food, get outside more, do the right thing, be kind to others, read books. Make sure you are doing these things so your kids will follow. Lead by example
inspire.author: Jack Coulson

inspire.quote: Being in shape is one of the greatest gifts you’ll ever give your children
inspire.author: Dan Go

inspire.quote: The goal of raising children should be to create adults with the proper balance of self-love and discipline
inspire.author: Bill Masur

inspire.quote: Insanity is hereditary; you get it from your children
inspire.author: Sam Levenson

inspire.quote: Having children makes you no more a parent than having a piano makes you a pianist
inspire.author: Michael Levine

inspire.quote: Being a father is the single greatest feeling on earth. Not including those wonderful years I spent without a child, of course
inspire.author: Ryan Reynolds

inspire.quote: Tip: It’s important parents take little "time outs" for themselves too. Even if you feel pretty guilty when you return 14 years later
inspire.author: Ryan Reynolds

inspire.quote: Went to Disneyland because my daughter’s obsessed with Mickey Mouse. She was so excited when I got home and told her
inspire.author: Ryan Reynolds

inspire.quote: The problem with teaching children to think for themselves is they might come to disagree with us
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: Children empty our pockets and fill our souls
inspire.author: Tim Fargo

inspire.quote: Most children threaten at times to run away from home. This is the only thing that keeps some parents going
inspire.author: Phyllis Diller

inspire.quote: By the time a man realizes that maybe his father was right, he usually has a son who thinks he’s wrong
inspire.author: Charles Wadsworth

inspire.quote: The quickest way for a parent to get a child’s attention is to sit down and look comfortable
inspire.author: Lane Olinghouse

inspire.quote: A lot of parents pack up their troubles and send them off to summer camp
inspire.author: Raymond Duncan

inspire.quote: Don’t worry that children never listen to you; worry that they are always watching you
inspire.author: Robert Fulghum

inspire.quote: I haven’t talked to my sons for a few days so I changed the Hulu, Netflix and Amazon passwords. I heard from all 3 of them within 20 minutes
inspire.author: Ursula (@3sunzzz)

inspire.quote: What a kid I got, I told him about the birds and the bees and he told me about the butcher and my wife
inspire.author: Rodney Dangerfield

inspire.quote: A child, like your stomach, doesn’t need all you can afford to give it. Frank A
inspire.author: Clark

inspire.quote: You can learn many things from children. How much patience you have, for instance. Franklin P
inspire.author: Adams

inspire.quote: You have a lifetime to work, but children are only young once
inspire.author: Polish proverb

inspire.quote: What makes children happy doesn’t always prepare them to be courageous, engaged adults
inspire.author: Brené Brown (Daring Greatly, Amazon book)

inspire.quote: Parents wonder why the streams are bitter, when they themselves poison the fountain
inspire.author: John Locke

inspire.quote: The problem with teaching children to be unmaterialistic is that they become impossible to bribe
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: So much better if parents remember they don’t own their children, merely borrow them from the universe for a few years
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: If you want to see the poor remain poor, generation after generation, just keep the standards low in their schools and make excuses for their academic shortcomings and personal misbehavior. But please don’t congratulate yourself on your compassion
inspire.author: Thomas Sowell

inspire.quote: You’re only as happy as your unhappiest child
inspire.author: Andrew Rae

inspire.quote: Why bring children into this world just to send them to daycare and come back home when they’re already sleeping
inspire.author: @zen_fi

inspire.quote: One of the reasons we judge each other so harshly in this world of parenting is because we perceive anyone else who’s doing anything differently than what we’re doing as criticizing our choices
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: A mother feels empty when her child become self-sufficient. A father feels worthy when his child become self-sufficient
inspire.author: Alex Sauer

inspire.quote: Mothers try to slow her sons manhood. Fathers try to speed his sons manhood
inspire.author: Alex Sauer

inspire.quote: It’s nice to have a career where you add value to the world. But raising competent and caring kids is one of society’s greatest contributions. A whole generation is prioritizing work instead of their families. Y’all have been brainwashed. No wonder our society is struggling
inspire.author: Ryan Stephens

inspire.quote: Curious that we spend more time congratulating people who have succeeded than encouraging people who have not
inspire.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

inspire.quote: Kids need love, support and guidance. If you’re too soft, they become lazy. If you’re too demanding, they become imprisoned
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Don’t cut your child’s wing and then later ask him to fly
inspire.author: Haemin Sunim

inspire.quote: There is only one pretty child in the world, and every mother has it
inspire.author: Chinese proverb

inspire.quote: It is greed to do all the talking and never to listen
inspire.author: Democritus

inspire.quote: Modeling a behavior is 100x stronger than telling someone to act differently. Kids imitate the habits of their parents. Teammates match the competitive energy of one another. Employees learn to manage like their supervisor. Be the standard and others will raise their standards
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: Your success as a parent is not determined by whether your kids get into elite schools or prestigious professions. The real test of parenting is not what children achieve, but who they become — and how they treat others
inspire.author: Adam Grant (See also: kindness quotes)

inspire.quote: Parents can believe that mistakes are good, and helpful and positive and productive for growth and learning, or they can think that they’re bad
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Bring up your son with affection till he is five years of age, then be strict with him for the next ten years, and when a son attains the age of sixteen, start treating him like a friend
inspire.author: Chanakya

inspire.quote: If you’re a parent and your child has no ambition to become famous, you’re doing something right
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: The ability to develop self-control depends upon being able to accurately predict the consequences of your own behavior. That’s why parental consistency is so important. Without it, a child wanders lost
inspire.author: John Rosemond

inspire.quote: We must be what we wish our children to be. They will form their characters from ours. John S.C
inspire.author: Abbott (See also: leadership quotes)

inspire.quote: There’s a world of difference between insisting on someone’s doing something and establishing an atmosphere in which that person can grow into wanting to do it
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: The way we talk to our children becomes their inner voice
inspire.author: Peggy O’Mara

inspire.quote: Children are human beings to whom respect is due, superior to us by reason of their innocence and of the greater possibilities of their future… Let us treat them with all the kindness which we would wish to help to develop in them
inspire.author: Maria Montessori

inspire.quote: I believe that what we become depends on what our fathers teach us at odd moments, when they aren’t trying to teach us. We are formed by little scraps of wisdom
inspire.author: Umberto Eco

inspire.quote: Don’t teach your sons to obey you. Teach them to think for themselves
inspire.author: @LifeMathMoney

inspire.quote: Don’t force your kid to comply with the school’s standards. Get him to find his own standards. Then hold him accountable
inspire.author: Johnny Uzan

inspire.quote: Children are made readers on the laps of their parents
inspire.author: Emilie Buchwald

inspire.quote: The guy who inspired me to hit the gym was my dad. He never pushed me to go. I just saw him go every morning & that was enough
inspire.author: Dan Go

inspire.quote: A child learns quicker to talk than to be silent
inspire.author: Norwegian proverb

inspire.quote: How do you celebrate your kids’ failures?
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Never is a man more of a man than when he is the father of a newborn
inspire.author: Matthew McConaughey

inspire.quote: Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do
inspire.author: Benjamin Spock

inspire.quote: Look at things in terms of growth rather than perfection
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: Look at things in terms of challenges rather than problems
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Life starts out as partly destiny and partly free will, but then you have kids, and it’s all destiny
inspire.author: Robert Brault

inspire.quote: At every stage of parenting, the worries of the previous stage feel madly exaggerated
inspire.author: Alain de Botton (As new parents, you will receive tons of advices…)

inspire.quote: Everybody knows how to raise children, except the people who have them. P. J
inspire.author: O’Rourke

inspire.quote: The young and the old don’t understand each other perfectly, but the old understand the young better than the young understand the old. The old have been young, but the young haven’t been old yet
inspire.author: Paul Graham

inspire.quote: It all starts in childhood. Neurons are wired together by our early childhood experiences. If you want a better world, teach the world better parenting
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: Respect all the reasonable forms of activity in which the child engages and try to understand them
inspire.author: Maria Montessori

inspire.quote: To understand the baby’s mind, it is absolutely essential to take the path of observation and discovery
inspire.author: Maria Montessori

inspire.quote: The greatness of the human personality begins at the hour of birth
inspire.author: Maria Montessori

inspire.quote: It’s not possible to be a parent without having times of worry
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: The people who first feed us, hold us, play with us, and talk with us help us to begin to understand who we are and who we may become. A child’s very birth cries out for acceptance and care. Without these early on, he cannot survive
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: What you do or fail to do ripples across generations
inspire.author: Carlos Del Valle

inspire.quote: You can obey a request much better than a command
inspire.author: Publius Syrus

inspire.quote: No man should bring children into the world who is unwilling to persevere to the end in their nature and education
inspire.author: Plato

inspire.quote: You sow impatience when you don’t apologize for your impatience
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Students with helicopter parents are more likely to burn out. They fail to develop the self-control and confidence to handle challenges
inspire.author: Adam Grant

inspire.quote: Modern version of parenting: Shove an iPad in the child’s face anytime you’re actually required to be a parent. Teaches the child absolutely nothing about how to behave and interact with human beings
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy

inspire.quote: First rule of parenting (and being a good person): You can pretend you care but you can’t pretend you are there
inspire.author: James Altucher

inspire.quote: This is the tragedy of modernity: as with neurotically overprotective parents, those trying to help are often hurting us the most
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: If your kids misbehave and you get angry at them, the lesson you’re teaching them is about anger, not about behaving better. Be the person that you want your children to become
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: If you as parents cut corners, your children will too. If you lie, they will too. If you spend all your money on yourselves and tithe no portion of it for charities, colleges, churches, synagogues, and civic causes, your children won’t either. And if parents snicker at racial and gender jokes, another generation will pass on the poison adults still have not had the courage to snuff out
inspire.author: Marian Wright Edelman

inspire.quote: Being a role model is the most powerful form of education. Too often fathers neglect it because they get so caught up in making a living they forget to make a life
inspire.author: John Wooden

inspire.quote: To let the child do as he likes, when he has not yet developed any powers of control, is to betray the idea of freedom
inspire.author: Maria Montessori

inspire.quote: We’re raising children who have little tolerance for disappointment
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: You cannot shame or belittle people into changing their behaviors
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: If you’re teaching today what you were teaching five years ago, either the field is dead or you are
inspire.author: Noam Chomsky

inspire.quote: The best way to give feedback is to ask questions
inspire.author: Rorty Witt

inspire.quote: Children become what they are told they are. Speak positively to your kids
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: Open doors to unknown directions to the child so he can explore. Don’t make him afraid of the unknown, give him support
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Ordinary parents do things for their kids and let them wait. Wise parents wait and let their kids fail
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Showing an active interest in what a child is doing is sometimes the best compliment of all
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: I’m proud of you for the times you came in second, or third, or fourth, but what you did was the best you had ever done
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: We want to raise our children so that they can take a sense of pleasure in both their own heritage and the diversity of others
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: If the day ever came when we were able to accept ourselves and our children exactly as we and they are, then, I believe, we would have come very close to an ultimate understanding of what "good" parenting means
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: When I have kids someday, I think the most valuable thing I could teach them is being comfortable around people and opinions they disagree with
inspire.author: Harj Taggar

inspire.quote: One person believing in you can change everything. If you can, be that person for someone else
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: Please think of the children first. If you ever have anything to do with their entertainment, their food, their toys, their custody, their child care, their health care, their education — listen to the children, learn about them, learn from them. Think of the children first
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Kids don’t need to be punished. They need to be told why their behavior was wrong and how they can make it right. Kids don’t just need to feel that they can count on others. They need to feel that others are relying on them too
inspire.author: Adam Grant

inspire.quote: The parenting style that is good for grit is also the parenting style good for most other things: Be really, really demanding, and be very, very supportive
inspire.author: Angela Duckworth

inspire.quote: The best advice to give is often just "you’re on the right track
inspire.author: " Sahil Lavingia

inspire.quote: My motto is "Do not do that which other can do as well". Booker T
inspire.author: Washington

inspire.quote: Anything that we can do to help foster the intellect and spirit and emotional growth of our fellow human beings, that is our job. Those of us who have this particular vision must continue against all odds. Life is for service
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: I’m proud of you. I hope that you are proud of you too
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Today is the beginning of whatever you want
inspire.author: Kimberly Jones

inspire.quote: Have the courage to start, the perseverance to continue and the kindness to make it all beautiful
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Do it for love, not rewards
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Don’t believe you have to be like anybody to be somebody
inspire.author: Nike

inspire.quote: You can get help from teachers but you have a lot to learn by yourself sitting alone in a room. Dr
inspire.author: Seuss

inspire.quote: When you see a good man, try to emulate his example, and when you see a bad man, search yourself for his faults
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: It’s you I like. It’s not the things you wear. It’s not the way you do your hair. But it’s you I like, the way you are right now, the way down deep inside you. Not the things that hide you. It’s you I like
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Cultivate authenticity: let go of what people think
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: The things that make me different are the things that make me. Winnie the Pooh (A. A
inspire.author: Milne)

inspire.quote: I think everybody’s weird. We should all celebrate our individuality and not be embarrassed or ashamed of it
inspire.author: Johnny Depp

inspire.quote: It’s okay to feel whatever it is that we feel
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Don’t compare yourself with anyone else, because you have potential inside you that no one else on the planet has
inspire.author: Rhonda Byrne

inspire.quote: Today is another opportunity to learn anything you want
inspire.author: Johnny Uzan

inspire.quote: Did you know that it’s all right to marvel? There are all kinds of marvelous things!
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: I hope you’re able to grow to respect whoever you are inside
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Keep your word. Do what you say you will do
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: People’s expectations from you are their problem, not yours
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. Winnie the Pooh (A.A
inspire.author: Milne)

inspire.quote: Discovering the truth about ourselves is a lifetime’s work, but it’s worth the effort
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: When your heart has room for everybody then your heart is full of love
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: It’s true. Each one of us is special. That’s because of who we are inside
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: You’ve made this day a special day by just your being you. There’s only one person in the whole world like you and people can like you just because you’re you
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Congratulate yourself if you have done something strange, extravagant and broken the monotony
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: Today you are You, that is truer than true. There is no one alive who is Youer than you. Dr
inspire.author: Seuss

inspire.quote: The minute you stop caring what others think, is the minute you start being yourself
inspire.author: Gabby Bernstein

inspire.quote: If you don’t like what someone has to say, argue with them
inspire.author: Noam Chomsky

inspire.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular. Roy T
inspire.author: Bennett (The Light in the Heart)

inspire.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself and not a second-rate version of someone else
inspire.author: Judy Garland

inspire.quote: If you could only sense how important you are to the lives of those you meet; how important you can be to the people you may never even dream of. There is something of yourself that you leave at every meeting with another person
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: About all you can do in life is be who you are. Some people will love you for you. Most will love you for what you can do for them, and some won’t like you at all
inspire.author: Rita Mae Brown

inspire.quote: There’s a point, around the age of twenty, when you have to choose whether to be like everybody else the rest of your life, or to make a virtue of your peculiarities. Ursula K
inspire.author: Le Guin (The Dispossessed)

inspire.quote: We are all equal in the fact that we are all different. We are all the same in the fact that we will never be the same.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C

inspire.quote: In fighting and in everyday life you should be determined though calm
inspire.author: Miyamoto Musashi

inspire.quote: Spend your free time the way you like, not the way you think you’re supposed to
inspire.author: Susan Cain (Quiet, Amazon book)

inspire.quote: Ask the questions you’re not supposed to ask, so you can find the answers you’re not supposed to find
inspire.author: David Perell

inspire.quote: It’s okay to be cautious but remember that it’s even better to fail and learn and try again
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: All your dreams can come true if you have the courage to pursue them
inspire.author: Walt Disney

inspire.quote: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up
inspire.author: Nelson Mandela

inspire.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we’ve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: Don’t you ever let a soul in the world tell you that you can’t be exactly who you are
inspire.author: Lady Gaga

inspire.quote: If you don’t get out of the box you’ve been raised in, you won’t understand how much bigger the world is
inspire.author: Angelina Jolie

inspire.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: To all the little girls watching…never doubt that you are valuable and powerful and deserving of every chance and opportunity in the world
inspire.author: Hillary Clinton

inspire.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are
inspire.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspire.quote: You must do the thing you think you cannot do
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Opt for privacy and solitude. That doesn’t make you antisocial or cause you to reject the rest of the world. But you need to breathe. And you need to be
inspire.author: Albert Camus (Notebooks)

inspire.quote: Your dream starts as a kid. You get older and your aspirations grow, because you believe you can do it
inspire.author: Rafael Nadal

inspire.quote: Give the world the best you have, and it may never be enough. Give your best anyway
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; it’s those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world
inspire.author: Desmond Tutu

inspire.quote: The time is always right to do what is right
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: Nothing is particularly hard if you break it down into small jobs
inspire.author: Henry Ford

inspire.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: We must all face the choice between what is right and what is easy
inspire.author: Albus Dumbledore (Harry Potter)

inspire.quote: There is no substitute for hard work. Thomas A
inspire.author: Edison

inspire.quote: Dreaming has no age limit
inspire.author: Nike

inspire.quote: Just try again
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Learn voraciously
inspire.author: Sam Altman

inspire.quote: Even in dreams be kind
inspire.author: Jack Kerouac

inspire.quote: We grow great by dreams
inspire.author: Woodrow Wilson

inspire.quote: Be silly, be honest, be kind
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: If you wish to be a writer, write
inspire.author: Epictetus (Discourses)

inspire.quote: Anything you want in life takes effort
inspire.author: Noah Kagan

inspire.quote: Don’t let the noise silence your dreams
inspire.author: Brian Norgard

inspire.quote: Be open to all teachers and all teachings
inspire.author: Ram Dass

inspire.quote: Chasing rewards and fame is a dead-end street
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: You always pass failure on the way to success
inspire.author: Mickey Rooney

inspire.quote: Don’t ever ask permission to lead, you just lead
inspire.author: Kamala Harris

inspire.quote: Believe and your dreams will grow like wildflowers
inspire.author: Rhonda Byrne

inspire.quote: Only surround yourself with people who will lift you higher
inspire.author: Oprah Winfrey

inspire.quote: You always make each day such a special day. You know how? By just your being you
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: This too shall pass
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: I’m proud of you for the times you came in second, or third, or fourth, but what you did was the best you had ever done
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Some days, doing "the best we can" may still fall short of what we would like to be able to do, but life isn’t perfect — on any front — and doing what we can with what we have is the most we should expect of ourselves or anyone else
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Learn to help yourself. Don’t count on other people to help you. Stay hard
inspire.author: David Goggins

inspire.quote: Some of my most important learnings came from failures that I thought were the end of the world in the moment
inspire.author: Justin Kan

inspire.quote: Don’t worry, this isn’t your last mistake
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: No matter how many mistakes you make or how slow you progress, you are still way ahead of everyone who isn’t trying
inspire.author: Tony Robbins

inspire.quote: Don’t quit. Sometimes the sky is more beautiful after the sun has set
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Do stuff. Be clenched, curious. Not waiting for inspiration’s shove or society’s kiss on your forehead. Pay attention. It’s all about paying attention. Attention is vitality. It connects you with others. It makes you eager. Stay eager
inspire.author: Susan Sontag (Vassar College Commencement Speech)

inspire.quote: Let yourself dream like nobody can stop you
inspire.author: Iyanla Vanzant

inspire.quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It’s not. Dr
inspire.author: Seuss

inspire.quote: If you only walk on sunny days you’ll never reach your destination
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Believe in yourself and trust that your mind and heart can break barriers
inspire.author: Eliud Kipchoge (First man to run a marathon under two hours)

inspire.quote: It’s gonna take a while. It’s normal to take a while. You just gotta fight your way through
inspire.author: Ira Glass

inspire.quote: What they say is required is not really what is required
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: Asking questions will get you further than giving answers. Doing the right things is more important than going fast
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Let me never fall into the vulgar mistake of dreaming that I am persecuted whenever I am contradicted
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: I care not so much what I am to others as what I am to myself. I will be rich by myself, and not by borrowing
inspire.author: Michel de Montaigne

inspire.quote: It’s harder to become a good man without a good father. But if you succeed, you become a great man
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: Cultivate gratitude and joy: let go of scarcity and fear of the dark
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: If you are never alone, you cannot know yourself. And if you do not know yourself, you will begin to fear the void
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho (Manuscript Found in Accra)

inspire.quote: If there’s anything that bothers me, it’s one person demeaning another
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Do you train for passing tests or do you train for creative inquiry?
inspire.author: Noam Chomsky

inspire.quote: When you drop your ego you can learn from everyone
inspire.author: Carlos Del Valle

inspire.quote: What I learned on my own I still remember
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb (The Bed of Procrustes)

inspire.quote: The best teacher is experience and not through someone’s distorted point of view
inspire.author: Jack Kerouac

inspire.quote: Being wrong isn’t a bad thing like they teach you in school. It is an opportunity to learn something
inspire.author: Richard Feynman

inspire.quote: An entire sea of water can’t sink a ship unless it gets inside the ship. Similarly, the negativity of the world can’t put you down unless you allow it to get inside you
inspire.author: Goi Nasu

inspire.quote: Once you truly understand that it is okay to lose or fail, you are free, you have nothing to fear, and only then, can nothing in this world hold you back
inspire.author: Yahya Mohamed

inspire.quote: Rapid learning requires a high tolerance for looking stupid. The path to answers begins with the admission that we don’t know them. Adopting the appearance of knowledge is a way to impress, but not a way to improve. Ignorant questions are preferable to premature answers
inspire.author: @TheStoicEmperor

inspire.quote: The hard path is often the right one. The river teaches more than the shore
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Creating makes you smarter. Consuming doesn’t. Traveling makes you smarter. Tourism doesn’t. Learning makes you smarter. Memorization doesn’t. Focusing makes you smarter. Mindlessness doesn’t. Humility makes you smarter. Pride doesn’t
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: I have three precious things which I hold fast and prize. The first is gentleness; the second is frugality; the third is humility
inspire.author: Lao Tzu (Tao Te Ching)

inspire.quote: When I was young, I admired clever people. Now that I am old, I admire kind people
inspire.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

inspire.quote: Choose as a guide one whom you will admire more when you see him act than when you hear him speak
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: The single greatest source of wealth is between your ears
inspire.author: Brian Tracy

inspire.quote: You can only fight the way you practice
inspire.author: Miyamoto Musashi

inspire.quote: It’s good to be curious about many things
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: You can win a lot in life just by being the last one to give up
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: We obtain our education at home, at school, and, most important, from life itself
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Life is mostly froth and bubble. Two things stand like stone. Kindness in another’s trouble, courage in your own
inspire.author: Adam Lindsay Gordon

inspire.quote: Did something disappoint you? Did something sadden you? The school of life wanted to teach you an important lesson through that experience
inspire.author: Haemin Sunim

inspire.quote: The way to expand our lives is to model the lives of those people who are already succeeding
inspire.author: Tony Robbins

inspire.quote: If you can see your path laid out in front of you step by step, you know it’s not your path. Your own path you make with every step you take. That’s why it’s your path
inspire.author: Joseph Campbell

inspire.quote: The only job security you’ll find in the 21st century is within yourself – your own ability to adapt to dynamic market conditions
inspire.author: Jameson Lopp

inspire.quote: Follow your dreams; you may not make money, but will never be poor. Follow other people’s dreams; you can make money but will never be rich
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho (See also: dream quotes)

inspire.quote: Curiosity is the start of the search for truth. It is a leap from "being part of a mold" to "exploring outside of the boundary." Everybody should be curious. Endlessly. Don’t be a lifeless zombie. Wake up, get curious and explore beyond your boundary today
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: All teachings are mere references. The true experience is living your own life
inspire.author: Deng Ming-Dao

inspire.quote: Remember: talent is luck, perseverance is not
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: "I have done my best", that is about all the philosophy of living that one needs
inspire.author: Lin Yutang

inspire.quote: It feels good to be kind
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: A friend may be waiting behind a stranger’s face
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: The secret to being likeable is to not care if people like you
inspire.author: Ed Latimore

inspire.quote: Now this is exactly what your society did to you when you were born. You were not allowed to enjoy the solid, nutritious food of life — namely, work, play, fun, laughter… You were given a taste for the drug called approval, appreciation, attention
inspire.author: Anthony de Mello

inspire.quote: I’m Tibetan, I’m Buddhist and I’m the Dalai Lama, but if I emphasize these differences it sets me apart and raises barriers with other people. What we need to do is to pay more attention to the ways in which we are the same as other people
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: We are sun and moon, dear friend; we are sea and land. It is not our purpose to become each other; it is to recognize each other, to learn to see the other and honor him for what he is: each the other’s opposite and complement
inspire.author: Hermann Hesse (Narcissus and Goldmund)

inspire.quote: The best way to live a miserable life is to pay attention to what other people are saying about you
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: There are good ships and wood ships, ships that sail the sea, but the best ships are friendships, may they always be!
inspire.author: Irish Proverb

inspire.quote: Education is the key to unlocking the world, a passport to freedom
inspire.author: Oprah Winfrey

inspire.quote: Grades seem important until you realize you can build something with what you’ve learned
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: I never pay attention to anything by "experts". I calculate everything myself
inspire.author: Richard Feynman

inspire.quote: In a global economy, where the most valuable skill you can sell is your knowledge, a good education is no longer just a pathway to opportunity, it is a prerequisite
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: If you want to master something, teach it. The more you teach, the better you learn. Teaching is a powerful tool to learning
inspire.author: Richard Feynman

inspire.quote: Just do what you do and do it well. Stop worrying about what other people are doing, or what they will say about what you are doing
inspire.author: Iyanla Vanzant

inspire.quote: Things you learned in school that you need to forget: Grades are more important than knowledge. The key to success is obedience and conformity. Your individual interests are largely irrelevant. Social hierarchies are rigid and hard to break
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: The obedient student will memorize and forget. The interested seeker will explore and remember
inspire.author: @TheStoicEmperor

inspire.quote: A message to my future children: "Learn to sell. Learn to write. Learn to speak. Learn to code." Four skills and you’re set for life
inspire.author: David Perell

inspire.quote: Develop into a lifelong self-learner through voracious reading; cultivate curiosity and strive to become a little wiser every day
inspire.author: Charlie Munger

inspire.quote: All rules for study are summed up in this one: learn only in order to create
inspire.author: Friedrich Schelling (On University Studies)

inspire.quote: All students can learn and succeed, but not on the same day in the same way. William G
inspire.author: Spady

inspire.quote: One child, one teacher, one pen and one book can change the world
inspire.author: Malala Yousafzai

inspire.quote: The wisest use social media. The others are being used by social media. Stay alert
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The Internet makes it easier to self-develop and easier to self-destruct
inspire.author: Johnny Uzan

inspire.quote: Be cautious with any product that’s been optimized for addiction. Including this one
inspire.author: Johnny Uzan

inspire.quote: Having a stack of social media apps on your phone is the equivalent of walking with candies in your pockets all day long
inspire.author: Johnny Uzan

inspire.quote: The deception of success is greater now than ever before because social media curates the best, happiest and biggest moments to show us
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: Social media gives us a false impression of the success of others. Social media is a highlight real. We see the success, but not the hard work. We see trophies, not sweat. We see diplomas, not homework. We see performances, not rehearsals
inspire.author: David Perell

inspire.quote: Become mindful observers of the market-driven, ad-driven world we live in. Advertising is designed to create a need where one does not exist
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: Your time has monetary value to advertisers, influencers, and Netflix. It should have a deeper value to you. It is your life. Don’t give it away too cheaply
inspire.author: @TheStoicEmperor

inspire.quote: Most valuable information is widely accessible. Great books of centuries past are free online. Thinkers of today argue publicly on Twitter. YouTube is a lecture hall that seats millions. Podcasts are private tutors for the masses. A golden age for the self-motivated learner
inspire.author: @TheStoicEmperor

inspire.quote: When it comes to social media, there are just times I turn off the world. Sometimes you have to give yourself space to be quiet, which means you’ve got to set those phones down
inspire.author: Michelle Obama

inspire.quote: Some time in your day today, try to turn off all the noises you can around you, and give yourself some ‘quiet time.’ In the silence, let yourself think about something. … Or if possible, think about nothing
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: I think there should be regulations on social media to the degree that it negatively affects the public good
inspire.author: Elon Musk

inspire.quote: Our attention spans have been reduced by the immediate gratification provided by smartphones and social media
inspire.author: Katherine Ryan

inspire.quote: Social media is an advertisement for the superficial extroverted self
inspire.author: Hozier

inspire.quote: Smartphone is definitely smarter than us to be able to keep us addicted to it
inspire.author: Munia Khan

inspire.quote: I thought not fitting in was something I had to fix. Now I see it as my superpower
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The first step to accepting yourself is to stop comparing yourself to others
inspire.author: Joe Duncan

inspire.quote: Fail by chasing trends, succeed by pursuing sincere interests
inspire.author: Brian Norgard

inspire.quote: Why are you trying so hard to fit in, when you’re born to stand out?
inspire.author: Oliver James

inspire.quote: I prefer listening to talking, reading to socializing, and cozy chats to group settings
inspire.author: Susan Cain

inspire.quote: If you can’t be a highway then just be a trail. If you can’t be the sun be a star. It isn’t by size that you win or you fail. Be the best of whatever you are
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Accept right now that you are magnificent. Being your real, true, authentic self is what’s most awesome about you
inspire.author: Gabby Bernstein

inspire.quote: You must not be afraid of your uniqueness and you must care less and less what people think of you. You have no responsibility to live up to what other people think you ought to accomplish. I have no responsibility to be like they expect me to be
inspire.author: Richard Feynman

inspire.quote: It doesn’t matter whether you’re poor or rich, where you’re from, what religion you follow, what language you speak, everyone is equal on the pitch
inspire.author: Rascha Ahmad

inspire.quote: Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric
inspire.author: Bertrand Russell

inspire.quote: You must understand that there is more than one path to the top of the mountain
inspire.author: Miyamoto Musashi

inspire.quote: We are so scared of being judged that we look for every excuse to procrastinate
inspire.author: Erica Jong

inspire.quote: Don’t be scared to walk alone. Don’t be scared to like it
inspire.author: John Mayer

inspire.quote: The path you forge will be your happiest, most meaningful and most useful
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Mistakes are part of the dues one pays for a full life
inspire.author: Sophia Loren

inspire.quote: The best way to learn something is to do it, then to teach it
inspire.author: Matthew Kobach

inspire.quote: Do you read? It’s a mighty handy thing. I learned how. You’ll learn
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: When you stop learning you stop living in any vital and meaningful sense
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Nothing will teach you how to do something faster than trying and failing
inspire.author: Sahil Lavingia

inspire.quote: Treat failure like a scientist. Your failures are not you. They are simply data points that help guide the next experiment
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: The best learning happens through self-discovery. The things that you go out and discover yourself is knowledge that truly has meaning to you
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy

inspire.quote: Talent puts you on a path but doesn’t get you to the destination. The longer the time frame, the more hard work and relentless improvement matter
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: The world is filled with teachers. Every creature in this universe teaches us something. You only have to be a good student
inspire.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

inspire.quote: If you’re going to live a long time, you have to keep learning – what you formerly knew is never enough. So if you don’t learn to constantly revise your earlier conclusions, and get better ones, you are – I always use the same metaphor – you’re like a one-legged man in an ass-kicking contest
inspire.author: Charlie Munger

inspire.quote: As the rate of change in the world increases, your ability to learn becomes more important than what you already know
inspire.author: Johnny Uzan

inspire.quote: We have to be willing to fail, to be wrong, to start over again with lessons learned
inspire.author: Angela Lee Duckworth

inspire.quote: Repetition is the mother of skill
inspire.author: Tony Robbins

inspire.quote: One may walk over the highest mountain one step at a time
inspire.author: Barbara Walters

inspire.quote: You’re truly happy when you love without counting
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: If you can see the sky, then you have free access to awe
inspire.author: Kyle Kowalski

inspire.quote: The more you learn, the better feeling you have about yourself and the world we live in
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Cultivate self-compassion: let go of perfectionism
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: If you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely
inspire.author: Roald Dahl

inspire.quote: So stay true to your own nature. If you like to do things in a slow and steady way, don’t let others make you feel as if you have to race. If you enjoy depth, don’t force yourself to seek breadth. If you prefer single-tasking to multi-tasking, stick to your guns. Being relatively unmoved by rewards gives you the incalculable power to go your own way
inspire.author: Susan Cain

inspire.quote: Following your genuine intellectual curiosity is a better foundation for a career than following whatever is making money right now
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: You do not need to waste your time doing those things that are unnecessary and trifling. You do not have to be rich. You do not need to seek fame or power. What you need is freedom, solidity, peace and joy. You need the time and energy to be able to share these things with others
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: Enjoy what you can and ignore the rest. Let’s not waste any energy fighting things that are outside our control
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Don’t let anyone make you feel that you don’t deserve the good things that happen in your life
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Success is about what you do everyday when no one is looking
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: Knowledge and ability were tools, not things to show off
inspire.author: Haruki Murakami (1Q84)

inspire.quote: When you stop competing you will start succeeding
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: Don’t use humor as a weapon. Employ it as a defense
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: Doing what everyone else thinks you should do is almost always a sure path to average
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Come out of the masses. Stand alone like a lion and live your life according to your own light
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: You are a very special person. There is only one like you in the whole world. There’s never been anyone exactly like you before, and there will never be again. Only you. And people can like you exactly as you are
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Obstacles are the cost of greatness
inspire.author: Robin Sharma

inspire.quote: Work hard, be kind, and amazing things will happen
inspire.author: Conan O’Brien

inspire.quote: I wasn’t there to compete. I was there to win
inspire.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

inspire.quote: Someone once told me growth and comfort do not coexist
inspire.author: Ginni Rometty

inspire.quote: All the power is within you. You can do anything
inspire.author: Swami Vivekananda

inspire.quote: The place between your comfort zone and your dream is where life takes place
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: Stop whining, start grinding
inspire.author: Eric Thomas

inspire.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear
inspire.author: George Addair

inspire.quote: To be a star, you must shine your own light, follow your own path, and don’t worry about darkness, for that is when the stars shine brightest
inspire.author: Napoleon Hill

inspire.quote: The question isn’t who is doing to let me, it’s who is going to stop me
inspire.author: Ayn Rand

inspire.quote: I am not afraid… I was born to do this
inspire.author: Joan of Arc

inspire.quote: "No" simply means begin again at one level higher
inspire.author: Peter Diamandis

inspire.quote: Do what you have to do until you can do what you want to do
inspire.author: Oprah Winfrey

inspire.quote: Those who truly want something will keep trying until they die
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Don’t worry about looking good – worry about achieving your goals
inspire.author: Ray Dalio

inspire.quote: How bad do you want it?
inspire.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

inspire.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today. H.G
inspire.author: Wells

inspire.quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight
inspire.author: Japanese proverb

inspire.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: Conformity gets you nowhere
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: Blood, sweat and respect. First two you give. Last one you earn
inspire.author: Dwayne Johnson (The Rock)

inspire.quote: Action is the real measure of intelligence
inspire.author: Napoleon Hill

inspire.quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you
inspire.author: Steve Martin

inspire.quote: Show the world how much you’ll fight for the winners circle
inspire.author: Pat Riley

inspire.quote: Everything you can imagine is real
inspire.author: Pablo Picasso

inspire.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success
inspire.author: Dale Carnegie

inspire.quote: Learn to be comfortable in the uncomfortable. Learn to be peaceful, not bored. Learn to be inspired, not scared
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: You’re probably on the right track if you feel like a sidewalk worm during a rainstorm
inspire.author: Larry Page (Google)

inspire.quote: Make each day your masterpiece
inspire.author: John Wooden

inspire.quote: What you want exists. Don’t settle until you get it
inspire.author: Jay Shetty

inspire.quote: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot. Make it hot by striking
inspire.author: William Butler Yeats

inspire.quote: I can’t believe that God put us on this earth to be ordinary
inspire.author: Lou Holtz

inspire.quote: The more silence you have in your life, the louder your work can be
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: I want the world to be better because I was here
inspire.author: Will Smith

inspire.quote: What’s the tiniest step you can take? Do that first
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The habit of persistence is the habit of victory
inspire.author: Herbert Kaufman

inspire.quote: Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great. John D
inspire.author: Rockefeller

inspire.quote: Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself
inspire.author: Andrew Carnegie

inspire.quote: Motivation is a fire from within. If someone else tries to light that fire under you, chances are it will burn very briefly
inspire.author: Stephen Covey

inspire.quote: Deep down you know what you want. Deep down you have what it takes
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: To seek greatness is the only righteous vengeance
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up
inspire.author: Babe Ruth

inspire.quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it
inspire.author: Walt Disney

inspire.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing
inspire.author: Walt Disney

inspire.quote: Most great people have achieved their greatest success just one step beyond their greatest failure
inspire.author: Napoleon Hill

inspire.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly. Robert F
inspire.author: Kennedy

inspire.quote: Success isn’t about how your life looks to others. It’s about how it feels to you
inspire.author: Michelle Obama

inspire.quote: I was taught that the way of progress was neither swift nor easy
inspire.author: Marie Curie

inspire.quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Discipline helps you finish a job, and finishing is what separates excellent work from average work
inspire.author: Pat Summitt

inspire.quote: Win from within
inspire.author: Usain Bolt

inspire.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary
inspire.author: Vince Lombardi

inspire.quote: I’ve always believed that if you put in the work, the results will come
inspire.author: Michael Jordan

inspire.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right
inspire.author: Henry Ford

inspire.quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going
inspire.author: Winston Churchill

inspire.quote: It’s fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure
inspire.author: Bill Gates (Microsoft)

inspire.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm
inspire.author: Winston Churchill

inspire.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Never, never, never give up
inspire.author: Winston Churchill

inspire.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there
inspire.author: Theodore Roosevelt

inspire.quote: You can often change your circumstances by changing your attitude
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take
inspire.author: Wayne Gretzky

inspire.quote: Diligence is the mother of good luck
inspire.author: Benjamin Franklin

inspire.quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things
inspire.author: Benjamin Franklin

inspire.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started
inspire.author: Mark Twain (More info on the source here)

inspire.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action
inspire.author: Tony Robbins

inspire.quote: Unless someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It’s not. Dr
inspire.author: Seuss

inspire.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run
inspire.author: Babe Ruth

inspire.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life. Don’t be trapped by dogma
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: It is not the strength of the body that counts, but the strength of the spirit. J.R.R
inspire.author: Tolkien

inspire.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun’s rays do not burn until brought to a focus
inspire.author: Alexander Graham Bell

inspire.quote: I have been impressed with the urgency of doing. Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Being willing is not enough; we must do
inspire.author: Leonardo da Vinci

inspire.quote: If you can’t fly then run, if you can’t run then walk, if you can’t walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going
inspire.author: Jim Rohn

inspire.quote: Action is character. F
inspire.author: Scott Fitzgerald

inspire.quote: Action precedes motivation. Robert J
inspire.author: McKain

inspire.quote: Leap, and the net will appear
inspire.author: John Burroughs

inspire.quote: Stop overthinking, start doing
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Wake up determined. Go to bed satisfied
inspire.author: Dwayne Johnson (The Rock)

inspire.quote: I like getting to that point where it’s hard, and then, pushing harder
inspire.author: Zach Miller

inspire.quote: Light tomorrow with today
inspire.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

inspire.quote: There is always room at the top
inspire.author: Daniel Webster

inspire.quote: We must act
inspire.author: Marie Curie

inspire.quote: Talk less. Work and show the result
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: I prefer to die trying
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Be your own hero
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Successful people are simply those with successful habits
inspire.author: Brian Tracy

inspire.quote: Remember why you started
inspire.author: Erin Janus

inspire.quote: Success is my only option, failure’s not
inspire.author: Eminem

inspire.quote: Show them what crazy dreams can do
inspire.author: Nike

inspire.quote: Nothing is given. Everything is earned
inspire.author: LeBron James

inspire.quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone
inspire.author: Michael John Bobak

inspire.quote: Always ask yourself if what you’re doing today is getting you closer to where you want to be tomorrow
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Be a practical dreamer backed by action
inspire.author: Bruce Lee

inspire.quote: If you can’t stop thinking about it, don’t stop working for it
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: I didn’t come this far to only go this far
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: The moment you want to quit is the moment you need to keep pushing
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: One day or day one. It’s your choice
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: You are your only limit
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: You could be anyone if you put the time
inspire.author: Conor McGregor

inspire.quote: I am not talented. I am obsessed
inspire.author: Conor McGregor

inspire.quote: Needing motivation is a sign of your goals lacking meaning
inspire.author: Carlos Del Valle

inspire.quote: The real secret to success is enthusiasm
inspire.author: Walter Chrysler

inspire.quote: What you allow is what will continue
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Don’t stop until you’re proud
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Don’t look back – you’re not going that way
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: You are capable of amazing things
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Better an oops than a what if
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Storms make trees take deeper roots
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Do your thing and don’t care if they like it
inspire.author: Tina Fey

inspire.quote: Don’t wish for it. Work for it
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Will it be easy? No. Will it be worth it? Absolutely
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Progress is the ultimate motivation
inspire.author: Tony Robbins

inspire.quote: Feel the fear
inspire.author: Do it anyway! Jillian Michaels

inspire.quote: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right
inspire.author: Napoleon Hill

inspire.quote: Half-heartedness never won a battle
inspire.author: William McKinley

inspire.quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent
inspire.author: Norman Ralph Augustine

inspire.quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: There are four basic human needs; food, sleep, sex and revenge
inspire.author: Banksy

inspire.quote: If you are not doing what you love, you are wasting your time
inspire.author: Billy Joel

inspire.quote: I was not the most talented but I was the one who worked the hardest and it made all the difference
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Think new thoughts and you will change your mind. Change your mind and you will change your life
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been
inspire.author: George Eliot

inspire.quote: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny. C.S
inspire.author: Lewis

inspire.quote: The more you are motivated by love, the more fearless and free your action will be
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears
inspire.author: Les Brown

inspire.quote: We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves strong. The amount of work is the same
inspire.author: Carlos Castaneda

inspire.quote: Never bend your head. Hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: I have had all of the disadvantages required for success
inspire.author: Larry Ellison (Oracle)

inspire.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor
inspire.author: Truman Capote

inspire.quote: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: To dare is to lose one’s footing momentarily. Not to dare is to lose oneself
inspire.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspire.quote: What are the most powerful words in the universe? The ones you use to talk to yourself
inspire.author: Karen Salmansohn

inspire.quote: What I’m looking for is not out there, it is in me
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: My mama always used to tell me: ‘If you can’t find somethin’ to live for, you best find somethin’ to die for
inspire.author: Tupac

inspire.quote: If you do not conquer self, you will be conquered by self
inspire.author: Napoleon Hill

inspire.quote: You have to be at your strongest when you’re feeling at your weakest
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: It doesn’t get easier. You get stronger
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: There is no class so pitiably wretched as that which possesses money and nothing else
inspire.author: Andrew Carnegie

inspire.quote: A man, as a general rule, owes very little to what he is born with – a man is what he makes of himself
inspire.author: Alexander Graham Bell

inspire.quote: Sentiment without action is the ruin of the soul
inspire.author: Edward Abbey

inspire.quote: A happy life consists not in the absence, but in the mastery of hardships
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: It is not the path which is the difficulty; rather, it is the difficulty which is the path
inspire.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspire.quote: A hero is one who knows how to hang on for one minute longer
inspire.author: Norwegian proverb

inspire.quote: Finishing something will give you satisfaction. Finishing something important to you will give you meaning. A meaningful life is a good life
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The most important thing is to continue. Forget about others, forget about the scoreboard, forget about your failures. Just keep pushing
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The way you train reflects the way you fight. People say I’m not going to train too hard, I’m going to do this in training, but when it’s time to fight I’m going to step up. There is no step up. You’re just going to do what you did every day
inspire.author: Georges St-Pierre

inspire.quote: To avoid criticism, say nothing, do nothing, be nothing
inspire.author: Elbert Hubbard

inspire.quote: The difference between a stumbling block and a stepping stone is how high you raise your foot
inspire.author: Benny Lewis

inspire.quote: What comes easy won’t last. What lasts won’t come easy
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: You don’t "discover" your place in the world. You carve it out
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: Winners focus on winning. Losers focus on winners
inspire.author: @Eric Thomas

inspire.quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win
inspire.author: Vince Lombardi

inspire.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough
inspire.author: Og Mandino

inspire.quote: As soon as I start to feel comfortable I know it’s a signal to level up
inspire.author: Dan Go

inspire.quote: Motivation is short lived. Only genuine desire has the power to sustain a person for the long haul
inspire.author: James Pierce

inspire.quote: Perceived value motivates you to act. Actual value motivates you to repeat
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: Most people think they lack motivation when they really lack clarity
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: The ultimate inspiration is the deadline
inspire.author: Nolan Bushnell

inspire.quote: If everyone waited until they felt "motivated" to do something, we’d never get anything done. Stop looking for motivation. Take action. The motivation will follow
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy

inspire.quote: You’ve got to get up every morning with determination if you’re going to go to bed with satisfaction
inspire.author: George Lorimer

inspire.quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you’ll be able to see further
inspire.author: Thomas Carlyle

inspire.quote: Don’t expect to be motivated every day to get out there and make things happen. You won’t be. Don’t count on motivation. Count on discipline
inspire.author: Jocko Willink

inspire.quote: Don’t do what you can do – try what you can’t do
inspire.author: William Faulkner

inspire.quote: Motivated people always find a way. Unmotivated people will always find a way not to
inspire.author: Ed Latimore

inspire.quote: Embrace bad news to learn where you need the most improvement
inspire.author: Bill Gates

inspire.quote: Learn to be happy with the endless try/fail/learn approach. True growth is slow and steady
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Self-knowledge brings peace and peace brings success
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Without ambition, one starts nothing. Without work, one finishes nothing. The prize will not be sent to you. You have to win it
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: You have the power to change your life. Just start with changing your thoughts
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: You are the leader you’ve been waiting for
inspire.author: Gloria Steinem

inspire.quote: We need to reshape our own perception of how we view ourselves. We have to step up as women and take the lead
inspire.author: Beyoncé

inspire.quote: Everything you want to be, you already are. You’re simply on the path to discovering it
inspire.author: Alicia Keys

inspire.quote: What makes me feel strong? Being in love and work
inspire.author: Susan Sontag

inspire.quote: The more you can be authentic, the happier you’re going to be, and life will work itself around that
inspire.author: Melinda Gates

inspire.quote: We spend far too much time complaining about the way things are, and forget that we have the power to change anything and everything
inspire.author: Bozoma Saint John

inspire.quote: Clinging to the past is the problem. Embracing change is the answer
inspire.author: Gloria Steinem

inspire.quote: Your story is what you have, what you will always have. It is something to own
inspire.author: Michelle Obama

inspire.quote: We need to do a better job of putting ourselves higher on our own ‘to do’ list
inspire.author: Michelle Obama

inspire.quote: It’s ok to need. It’s ok to ask. It’s ok to receive
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: It is not your job to be everything to everyone
inspire.author: Courtney Carver

inspire.quote: You’re beautiful when you’re generous and even more when you have self-respect
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained
inspire.author: Marie Curie

inspire.quote: Start now. Start where you are. Start with fear. Start with pain. Start with doubt. Start with hands shaking. Start with voice trembling. Just start
inspire.author: Sara Blakely (Spanx)

inspire.quote: Your only responsibility is to be yourself. If they leave, it’s on them
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: It’s ok to not do what people ask you to do without explaining yourself
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: I decided I can’t pay a person to rewind time, so I may as well get over it
inspire.author: Serena Williams

inspire.quote: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning
inspire.author: Gloria Steinem

inspire.quote: We want women leaders today as never before. Leaders who are not afraid to be called names and who are willing to go out and fight. I think women can save civilization
inspire.author: Emily Murphy

inspire.quote: The great secret of true success, of true happiness, is this: the man or woman who asks for no return, the perfectly unselfish person, is the most successful
inspire.author: Swami Vivekananda

inspire.quote: Let your legacy be how you loved while you were here and not the stuff you left behind. Courtney Carver (bemorewithless
inspire.author: com)

inspire.quote: If you don’t have time for what matters, stop doing things that don’t
inspire.author: Courtney Carver

inspire.quote: Get clear on what matters by getting rid of everything that doesn’t
inspire.author: Courtney Carver

inspire.quote: There are so many people who don’t know what they want. And I think that, in this world, that’s the only thing you have to know — exactly what you want
inspire.author: Agnes Martin

inspire.quote: None of us will have any impact or any influence if we are quiet. So don’t be quiet. Be loud as hell
inspire.author: Bozoma Saint John

inspire.quote: Just fucking start. The perfect time you’ve been waiting for is actually right now. You’ll never get what you want by staying where you are
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: In each moment, what we choose to say and do plants the seed of our future
inspire.author: Tara Brach (Radical Acceptance)

inspire.quote: Growth demands a temporary surrender of security
inspire.author: Gail Sheehy

inspire.quote: Give thanks for what you are now, and keep fighting for what you want to be tomorrow
inspire.author: Fernanda Miramontes-Landeros

inspire.quote: As long as I’m so afraid of being alone, I’ll never be real. I’m hiding from myself
inspire.author: Susan Sontag

inspire.quote: Failure is so important. It is the ability to resist failure or use failure that often leads to greater success. J.K
inspire.author: Rowling

inspire.quote: A woman unaffected by insults has made her enemies absolutely powerless
inspire.author: Kimberly Jones

inspire.quote: It is easy to be proud and harsh and selfish – so easy. But we have been created for better things
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: You are here to be healthy, kind, helpful, beautiful – you are here to be yourself
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: I am whole, perfect, strong, powerful, loving, harmonious, and happy
inspire.author: Rhonda Byrne

inspire.quote: Don’t rush, it takes time to grow into who you are
inspire.author: Lalah Delia

inspire.quote: This is your life. Do what you love, and do it often
inspire.author: Holstee Manifesto

inspire.quote: The question isn’t who’s going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me
inspire.author: Ayn Rand

inspire.quote: What I want young women and girls to know is: you are powerful and your voice matters
inspire.author: Kamala Harris

inspire.quote: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun
inspire.author: Katharine Hepburn

inspire.quote: I don’t go by the rule book. I lead from the heart, not the head
inspire.author: Princess Diana

inspire.quote: Power is not given to you. You have to take it
inspire.author: Beyoncé Knowles

inspire.quote: Do not think you can be brave with your life and your work and never disappoint anyone. It doesn’t work that way
inspire.author: Oprah Winfrey

inspire.quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: The battle for the individual rights of women is one of long standing and none of us should countenance anything which undermines it
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: We can do no great things, only small things with great love
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: The great ambition of women is to inspire love
inspire.author: Molière

inspire.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage
inspire.author: Anaïs Nin

inspire.quote: Women should be tough, tender, laugh as much as possible, and live long lives
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: We are going to the moon that is not very far. Man has so much farther to go within himself
inspire.author: Anaïs Nin

inspire.quote: Women are the largest untapped reservoir of talent in the world
inspire.author: Hillary Clinton

inspire.quote: If I mistake not, a strong sense of duty is no bad part of a woman’s portion
inspire.author: Jane Austen

inspire.quote: Women are never so strong as after their defeat
inspire.author: Alexandre Dumas

inspire.quote: I have not yet spoken my last word about women. I believe that if a woman succeeds in withdrawing from the mass, or rather raising herself from above the mass, she grows ceaselessly and more than a man
inspire.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

inspire.quote: Each of us has a unique part to play in the healing of the world
inspire.author: Marianne Williamson

inspire.quote: You educate a man; you educate a man. You educate a woman; you educate a generation
inspire.author: Brigham Young

inspire.quote: I am awfully greedy; I want everything from life. I want to be a woman and to be a man, to have many friends and to have loneliness, to work much and write good books, to travel and enjoy myself, to be selfish and to be unselfish… You see, it is difficult to get all which I want. And then when I do not succeed I get mad with anger
inspire.author: Simone de Beauvoir

inspire.quote: Destiny is a name often given in retrospect to choices that had dramatic consequences. J. K
inspire.author: Rowling

inspire.quote: A girl should be two things: who and what she wants
inspire.author: Coco Chanel

inspire.quote: You are not your bad days
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: Give "someday" a deadline
inspire.author: " Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: Believe you deserve the best
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: It’s time to write a new story
inspire.author: Kimberly Jones

inspire.quote: You manage things; you lead people
inspire.author: Grace Murray Hopper

inspire.quote: Respect everyone and wish them well
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: She is a joy because she is herself
inspire.author: Leo Christopher

inspire.quote: The opposite of perfection is freedom
inspire.author: Courtney Carver

inspire.quote: Prove yourself to yourself. Not others
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: You’ll never regret being overprepared
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: Aspire to become the greatest version of yourself
inspire.author: Sara Blakely

inspire.quote: Appreciation of what you have brings what you want
inspire.author: Rhonda Byrne

inspire.quote: Let’s stop apologizing for things we aren’t sorry for
inspire.author: Courtney Carver

inspire.quote: When things change inside you, things change around you
inspire.author: Kimberly Jones

inspire.quote: A generous heart is the highest sign of a beautiful soul
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Stop using what others might think as an excuse to not try
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: I don’t fit into any stereotypes. And I like myself that way.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C

inspire.quote: Just do the best you can right now
inspire.author: Lalah Delia

inspire.quote: Every day is an opportunity for a new life
inspire.author: Rhonda Byrne

inspire.quote: You have what it takes to be a victorious, independent, fearless woman
inspire.author: Tyra Banks

inspire.quote: Don’t be the girl who fell. Be the girl who got back up
inspire.author: Jenette Stanley

inspire.quote: Asking for support is not a sign of weakness, it’s a sign of strength
inspire.author: Amanda Goetz

inspire.quote: Don’t be afraid to speak up for yourself. Keep fighting for your dreams
inspire.author: Gabby Douglas

inspire.quote: It took me quite a long time to develop a voice, and now that I have it, I am not going to be silent
inspire.author: Madeleine Albright

inspire.quote: No matter what you look like or think you look like, you’re special and loved and perfect just the way you are
inspire.author: Ariel Winter

inspire.quote: We are responsible for creating the conditions we desire. Take responsibility for what you think, say and do
inspire.author: Iyanla Vanzant

inspire.quote: We need women who are so strong they can be gentle, so educated they can be humble, so fierce they can be compassionate, so passionate they can be rational, and so disciplined they can be free
inspire.author: Kavita Ramdas

inspire.quote: Sometimes you have to stop being scared and just go for it. Either it will work out, or it won’t. That’s life
inspire.author: Do it scared! Kimberly Jones

inspire.quote: A lot can happen in a year. Whatever seems almost impossible today can be your new reality soon. Stay consistent and give 100%
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: Whatever spare moments I had at night, during lunch, or on the weekends I gave to my day dream. Until one day my day dream became my reality. Never give up on your day dream
inspire.author: Sara Blakely (Spanx)

inspire.quote: Accept right now that you are magnificent. Being your real, true, authentic self is what’s most awesome about you
inspire.author: Gabby Bernstein

inspire.quote: She is so much more than just a small spark and a gentle breeze
inspire.author: Leo Christopher

inspire.quote: You are imperfect, you are wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: Be clenched, curious. Not waiting for inspiration’s shove or society’s kiss on your forehead
inspire.author: Susan Sontag

inspire.quote: All my work says be serious, be passionate, wake up
inspire.author: Susan Sontag

inspire.quote: Say it with me: I deserve it
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: I’ll find a way
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Don’t talk shit. Do shit
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: I don’t care what you think about me. I don’t think about you at all
inspire.author: Coco Chanel

inspire.quote: If you want something said, ask a man; if you want something done, ask a woman
inspire.author: Margaret Thatcher

inspire.quote: Women marry men hoping they will change. Men marry women hoping they will not
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: For a woman to get half as much credit as a man, she has to work twice as hard, and be twice as smart. Fortunately, that isn’t difficult
inspire.author: Charlotte Whitton

inspire.quote: I am not eccentric. It’s just that I am more alive than most people. I am an unpopular electric eel set in a pond of catfish
inspire.author: Edith Sitwell

inspire.quote: Every man I meet wants to protect me. I can’t figure out what from
inspire.author: Mae West

inspire.quote: A woman without a man is like a fish without a bicycle
inspire.author: Gloria Steinem
