inspire.quote: We over do so we don’t have to over feel
inspire.author: Courtney Carver

inspire.quote: The only way to change is to face reality. The only way to see reality is to be courageous
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The first problem for all of us, men and women, is not to learn, but to unlearn
inspire.author: Gloria Steinem

inspire.quote: A feminist is anyone who recognizes the equality and full humanity of women and men
inspire.author: Gloria Steinem

inspire.quote: The only way to get what you want is to do the shit you’re avoiding. The stuff you’ve been putting off every day. The little things you keep saying you’ll do tomorrow. That’s why you feel stuck
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: Women are their own worst enemies. And guilt is the main weapon of self-torture
inspire.author: Erica Jong (Fear of Flying)

inspire.quote: The evils we do to others give us less pain than those we do to ourselves
inspire.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

inspire.quote: Your mind is a tool, not a place to live
inspire.author: @wisdom_theory

inspire.quote: Leave the door open for the unknown, the door into the dark. That’s where the most important things come from, where you yourself came from, and where you will go
inspire.author: Rebecca Solnit

inspire.quote: Female immaturity: Blames others, no boundaries, manipulative, attention seeking, entitled, use sexuality for power, arrogant, gossippy. Maturity: Accountable, intuitive and empathic, nurturing, submissive, sexually healing and, seeks intimacy, humble, loving
inspire.author: Taylor Burrowes

inspire.quote: Listen to your intuition when it tells you who you shouldn’t trust. Everyone has a vibe. Train yourself to read it
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: If you won’t run your subconscious mind yourself, someone else will run it for you
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: I am a woman without a future. I prefer what is. That is freedom
inspire.author: Byron Katie

inspire.quote: Change is a process, not an event
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: If you don’t like something, take away it’s only power — your attention
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: Far too many people are looking for the right person, instead of trying to be the right person
inspire.author: Gloria Steinem

inspire.quote: The art of acting morally is behaving as if everything we do matters
inspire.author: Gloria Steinem

inspire.quote: They are emotional and reactive, you are calm and calculated
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: Many times your intuition knows better than other people’s opinions. Remember that next time you look for advice
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: Our job is not to deny the story, but to defy the ending — to rise strong, recognize our story, and rumble with the truth until we get to a place where we think, "Yes". This is what happened. And I will choose how the story ends
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: Use your idols for inspiration. But keep them at a distance. Your perception of them is often far better than reality
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy

inspire.quote: You cannot understand anyone, until you begin to understand yourself, for the world is a reflection of your own thoughts
inspire.author: @TheGodLight

inspire.quote: Fill your mind with me; love me; serve me; worship me always. Seeking me in your heart, you will at last be united with me
inspire.author: Bhagavad Gita

inspire.quote: The wiser you get the more you accept what comes
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The teacher I need is always the one in front of me
inspire.author: Byron Katie

inspire.quote: Let no one plant seeds of fear and doubt in your head
inspire.author: Gal Shapira

inspire.quote: If I had to count the number of people who didn’t want me to win… I’d still be counting. That’s why I mind my business and win without wondering who’s cheering
inspire.author: Then I sit back and look straight ahead like…what’s next? Bozoma Saint John

inspire.quote: Man is what he believes
inspire.author: Anton Chekhov

inspire.quote: A great man is hard on himself; a small man is hard on others
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: If you perform the sacrifice of doing your duty, you do not have to do anything else. Devoted to duty, man attains perfection
inspire.author: Bhagavad Gita

inspire.quote: A person can achieve everything by being simple and humble
inspire.author: The Vedas

inspire.quote: The most persevering becomes the most talented
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: To have become a deeper man is the privilege of those who have suffered
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: You will earn the respect of all men if you begin by earning the respect of yourself
inspire.author: Musonius Rufus

inspire.quote: When you find peace within yourself, you also find peace without
inspire.author: Naga Devi

inspire.quote: The crucial thing is to find a truth which is truth for me, to find the idea for which I am willing to live and die
inspire.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspire.quote: Live your life in such a way that you neither hide nor have a wish to display your life to people
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: If you want to save the world, save your little corner of the world
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: The inner fire is the most important thing mankind possesses
inspire.author: Edith Sodergran

inspire.quote: The more self-knowledge you have, the calmer you can be
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Working hard can give you meaning. Silence can give you peace
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Knowledge will give you power, but character respect
inspire.author: Bruce Lee

inspire.quote: What you aim at determines what you see
inspire.author: Jordan Peterson

inspire.quote: A wise man becomes free when he is ready to die at any moment
inspire.author: Diogenes

inspire.quote: The ignorant work for their own profit; the wise work for the welfare of the world, without thought for themselves
inspire.author: Bhagavad Gita

inspire.quote: Once you’re calm and fit, you have everything worth having, as the rest just comes and goes
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: You should think in such a way that everybody could look into your soul and see what is transpiring there
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: Progress is made in solitude; profit is made in public
inspire.author: Sven Schnieders

inspire.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man’s character, give him power
inspire.author: Abraham Lincoln

inspire.quote: True wealth: Worriless sleeping, clear conscience, reciprocal gratitude, absence of envy, muscle strength, frequent laughs, no meals alone, no gym classes, good digestive functions, no meeting rooms, periodic surprises, foamy coffee, crusty bread, ability to nap, access to a hammock
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: There is nothing with which every man is so afraid as getting to know how enormously much he is capable of doing and becoming
inspire.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspire.quote: The wiser you get, the less you care to look like a fool
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Always remember: Silence and smile are two very powerful tools. Smile is the way to solve many problems. Silence is the way to avoid many problems
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Happiness isn’t about making more money, but rather freedom. The freedom to say no to things you don’t want to do. The freedom to say no to people you don’t like. The freedom to not feel like you are obligated to say "yes". Freedom is saying yes when you want to
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: The greater the success, the more it was due to one thing: focus
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Those who apply themselves too closely to little things often become incapable of great things
inspire.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

inspire.quote: We need men who can dream of things that never were. John F
inspire.author: Kennedy

inspire.quote: My idea of the modern stoic sage is someone who transforms fear into prudence, pain into information, mistakes into initiation, and desire into undertaking
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: The day you are no longer afraid of standing alone, you become a professional
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: Conversation enriches the understanding, but solitude is the school of genius
inspire.author: Edward Gibbon

inspire.quote: You don’t succeed by being perfect. You succeed by doing good work, consistently
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: The first question a leader should ask is: "How can I make those around me more successful?" John C
inspire.author: Maxwell

inspire.quote: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality
inspire.author: Plutarch

inspire.quote: Riches have shut off many a man from the attainment of wisdom
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: All fortune belongs to him who has a contented mind
inspire.author: The Panchatantra

inspire.quote: It is in your hands, to make a better world for all who live in it
inspire.author: Nelson Mandela

inspire.quote: It is better, proverbially, to rule your own spirit than to rule a city
inspire.author: Jordan Peterson

inspire.quote: The secret of success is learning how to use pain and pleasure instead of having pain and pleasure use you. If you do that, you’re in control of your life. If you don’t, life controls you
inspire.author: Tony Robbins

inspire.quote: Be more concerned with your character than with your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are
inspire.author: John Wooden

inspire.quote: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way
inspire.author: Dale Carnegie

inspire.quote: Pride is much the same in all men, the only difference is the method and manner of showing it
inspire.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

inspire.quote: We just keep swimming and let the tide take care of itself
inspire.author: Warren Buffett

inspire.quote: If you want to overcome the whole world, overcome yourself
inspire.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

inspire.quote: One can know a man from his laugh, and if you like a man’s laugh before you know anything of him, you may confidently say that he is a good man
inspire.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

inspire.quote: Try not to become a man of success but rather to become a man of value
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I like men who have a future and women who have a past
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: Earth provides enough to satisfy every man’s needs, but not every man’s greed
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The heart of man is very much like the sea, it has its storms, it has its tides and in its depths it has its pearls too
inspire.author: Vincent van Gogh

inspire.quote: The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: A sense of humour is the only divine quality of man
inspire.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

inspire.quote: Man serves the interests of no creature except himself
inspire.author: George Orwell

inspire.quote: The stronger a man is, the more gentle he can afford to be
inspire.author: Elbert Hubbard

inspire.quote: I like criticism. It makes you strong
inspire.author: LeBron James

inspire.quote: Wealth is not about having a lot of money; it’s about having a lot of options
inspire.author: Chris Rock

inspire.quote: Seek truth over comfort
inspire.author: Anthony Pompliano

inspire.quote: Outmaneuver your old self
inspire.author: Jack Butcher

inspire.quote: Comfort is the worst addiction
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: A big ego leads to a narrow life
inspire.author: Kunal (@CrazyPolymath)

inspire.quote: You have to be yourself to be free
inspire.author: @trey_wing6

inspire.quote: Make peace with the present moment
inspire.author: Eckhart Tolle

inspire.quote: Get wealthy, get healthy, get happy
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: Man is a genius when he is dreaming
inspire.author: Akira Kurosawa

inspire.quote: Smart people all seek self-reliance
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: One man with courage makes a majority
inspire.author: Andrew Jackson

inspire.quote: A man is responsible for his ignorance
inspire.author: Milan Kundera

inspire.quote: The mind of man is capable of anything
inspire.author: Joseph Conrad

inspire.quote: You can do anything, but not everything
inspire.author: David Allen

inspire.quote: Don’t work more. Focus more
inspire.author: Nathan Gotch

inspire.quote: It’s only pain that can make you change
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: Wise people never think they know it all
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: Mastery is saying no to almost everything
inspire.author: Jack Butcher

inspire.quote: Don’t talk about plans. Only show results
inspire.author: Ed Latimore

inspire.quote: Believers are in groups. Seekers are alone
inspire.author: Sadhguru

inspire.quote: Forget your past. Never forget your dreams
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The price tag of leadership is self-discipline. John C
inspire.author: Maxwell

inspire.quote: You are the most valuable asset in your portfolio
inspire.author: Jack Butcher

inspire.quote: It’s what you learn after you know it all that counts
inspire.author: John Wooden

inspire.quote: Fools hate to look like fools. Wise men don’t care
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: A man is made by his beliefs. As he believes. So he becomes
inspire.author: Bhagavad Gita

inspire.quote: Don’t let jerks live rent-free in your head
inspire.author: Sam Altman

inspire.quote: Here’s all you have to know about men and women: women are crazy, men are stupid. And the main reason women are crazy is that men are stupid
inspire.author: George Carlin

inspire.quote: I’m teaching my daughter that the sun goes down each night because it’s mad at her. Probably gonna write a book on parenting at some point
inspire.author: Ryan Reynolds

inspire.quote: On Fathers Day, my daughter smiled at me. It was all the gift I needed as I packed a bag and left for 6 years to write a book on parenting
inspire.author: Ryan Reynolds

inspire.quote: The trouble with the rat race is that even if you win, you’re still a rat
inspire.author: Lily Tomlin

inspire.quote: Wherever there is a crowd there is untruth
inspire.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspire.quote: He who indulges in empty fears earns himself real fears
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: It is very important in life to know when your cue comes
inspire.author: Søren Kierkegaard

inspire.quote: You aren’t nervous about the performance, you’re nervous about the results
inspire.author: James Pierce

inspire.quote: When a man is young, he tries to please his parents. When he gets married, he tries to please his spouse. When he becomes a father, he tries to please his children. When he grows old, he tries to please god. One day, he comes to discover that his life has never been his own
inspire.author: Kapil Gupta

inspire.quote: After one dies, the happiness game ends. The money game ends. The relationship game ends. The success game ends. The self-improvement game ends. The parenting game ends. The status game ends. The fear of death game ends. Everything in this life is but a fleeting game
inspire.author: Kapil Gupta

inspire.quote: The greater the success, the less it was due to one thing
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: Pain and suffering are always inevitable for a large intelligence and a deep heart. The really great men must, I think, have great sadness on earth
inspire.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

inspire.quote: For one who has conquered his mind, a mind is best of friends, but for one who has failed to do so, a mind is the greatest enemy
inspire.author: Bhagavad Gita

inspire.quote: A man without courage is to me the most despicable thing under the sun, a travesty on the whole scheme of creation
inspire.author: Jack London

inspire.quote: The men who act without thinking, and the men who both think and act, are the ones who mould the world. The man who thinks and does not act never moulds the world. He may think that he does — but that, too, is only a thought, the thought of a deedless, actionless thinker
inspire.author: Jack London

inspire.quote: The greatest of the arts is the conquering of men
inspire.author: Jack London

inspire.quote: Create and find meaning. Consume and lose it
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: We have been conditioned to feel that we lack something. So we are always trying to add something to ourselves: security, self-esteem, externalized love, material things. Yet as drinking saltwater only makes you more thirsty, none of those things are ever finally enough
inspire.author: Thibaut (See also: self-esteem quotes)

inspire.quote: Never diminish someone’s dream, no matter how absurd it seems
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: As you get smarter, you stop taking everything personally, because you realize the world doesn’t revolve around you
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: Nourish yourself with grand and austere ideas of beauty that feed the soul… Seek solitude
inspire.author: Eugène Delacroix

inspire.quote: The wise man avoids groups at any and all costs
inspire.author: Kapil Gupta

inspire.quote: Silence is the best resolve for him who distrusts himself
inspire.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

inspire.quote: Make focusing on the long-term your default mode
inspire.author: Matthew Kobach

inspire.quote: Do good, reap good; do evil, reap evil
inspire.author: Chinese proverb

inspire.quote: A man who has committed a mistake and doesn’t correct it is committing another mistake
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: Maximize your best ideas and minimize your mistakes. Simple yet hard
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Be forgiving with your past self. Be strict with your present self. Be flexible with your future self
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: Stick to the basics. Do your job. Avoid stupidity. Speak for yourself. Be attentive to details. Put results ahead of being right. Go to bed smarter than when you woke up
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Inner emptiness is not a void to be filled with comforts; it is a window to be looked through
inspire.author: Alan Watts

inspire.quote: If a man needs no one to like him, agree with him, praise him, validate him, forgive him, acknowledge him, invite him, or accept him, if he is indifferent to the winds of circumstance and to the hand of fortune… Such a man floats through life, free of all burdens
inspire.author: Kapil Gupta

inspire.quote: For the unwise man there are things to do. For the wise man there are things to understand
inspire.author: Kapil Gupta

inspire.quote: If a man can reduce his needs to zero, he is truly free: there is nothing that can be taken from him and nothing anyone can do to hurt him…And he or she can also be still
inspire.author: John Boyd

inspire.quote: Whenever you deeply accept this moment as it is — no matter what form it takes — you are still, you are at peace
inspire.author: Eckhart Tolle

inspire.quote: It is not the brains that matter most, but that which guides them — the character, the heart, generous qualities, progressive ideas
inspire.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

inspire.quote: During the day you should behave in such a way that you can sleep at night in peace; and in your youth you should behave in such a way that you can live in your old age in peace
inspire.author: Indian proverb

inspire.quote: Men have true freedom only if they are indifferent to the past and the future. As soon as they regret or expect, there’s attachment and suffering
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé (See also: freedom quotes, inner peace quotes)

inspire.quote: People become intelligent despite what they learn in school, not because of it
inspire.author: James Pierce

inspire.quote: Everyone is a fool, including you. Realizing this on a deep level turns you from a regular fool into a wise fool
inspire.author: James Pierce

inspire.quote: To have doubted one’s own first principles is the mark of a civilized man. Oliver W
inspire.author: Holmes Jr

inspire.quote: You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him discover it himself
inspire.author: Galileo Galilei

inspire.quote: A person can achieve everything by being simple and humble
inspire.author: The Vedas

inspire.quote: Everyone you admire was once a beginner
inspire.author: Jack Butcher

inspire.quote: Young people willing to push super hard to make something happen are among the most powerful forces in the world
inspire.author: Sam Altman

inspire.quote: Judge nothing, you will be happy. Forgive everything, you will be happier. Love everything, you will be happiest
inspire.author: Sri Chinmoy

inspire.quote: Ignore those who tell you which way to go without first understanding where you are
inspire.author: James Pierce

inspire.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are. E. E
inspire.author: Cummings

inspire.quote: When people try to tell you who you are, don’t believe them
inspire.author: Maria Popova

inspire.quote: Do nothing for prestige or status or money or approval alone
inspire.author: Maria Popova

inspire.quote: You’re never going to be happy being anyone other than yourself
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: If we are not regularly deeply embarrassed by who we are, the journey to self-knowledge hasn’t begun
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: Life will never conform to all of our desires. Ever
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: Don’t hope for a life without problems. There’s no such thing. Instead, hope for a life full of good problems
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious
inspire.author: Stephen Hawking

inspire.quote: Beautiful people are not always good, but good people are always beautiful
inspire.author: Imam Ali

inspire.quote: If you’re making mistakes it means you’re out there doing something
inspire.author: Neil Gaiman

inspire.quote: Don’t be afraid to be an idealist
inspire.author: Maria Popova

inspire.quote: Keep true to the dreams of your youth
inspire.author: Friedrich Schiller

inspire.quote: You are your own teacher. Investigate yourself to find the truth – inside, not outside. Knowing yourself is most important
inspire.author: Ajahn Chah

inspire.quote: Know yourself. Accept yourself for who you are, right where you are. And then create some boundaries in your routine that aren’t serving you today in order to get closer to the life and work you truly desire
inspire.author: Mel Robbins

inspire.quote: Do things for joy or for learning, not for attention
inspire.author: @dailyzen

inspire.quote: You really don’t want to be famous. Read the biography of any famous person
inspire.author: Kevin Kelly

inspire.quote: Many people undermine success in the long-term by optimizing for status in the short-term
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: Improvement at anything is based on thousands of tiny failures, and the magnitude of your success is based on how many times you’ve failed at something
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: Pleasure is not happiness. Pleasure is what’s marketed to us. It’s what we fixate on. It’s what we use to numb and distract ourselves
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: You’ll stop caring what people think about you when you realize how seldom they do
inspire.author: David Foster Wallace

inspire.quote: Chances are you’re starting to give too many fucks about too many unnecessary things
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: You can’t stop people from saying bad things about you. All you can do is make them liars
inspire.author: Thomas Sowell

inspire.quote: If you want to be average, focus on the performance. If you want to be the best, focus on making practice harder than performance
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones that do
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: The person seeking to learn wins what the person seeking to impress loses
inspire.author: Angela Jiang

inspire.quote: Daily silence and solitude is what you need to stop caring what they think
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Stop relying on praise from others to feel good about yourself
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: The older I get, the more I understand that it’s okay to live a life others don’t understand
inspire.author: Jenna Woginrich

inspire.quote: You have to be authentic, you have to be true, and you have to believe in your heart
inspire.author: Howard Schultz

inspire.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of someone else
inspire.author: Judy Garland

inspire.quote: Don’t listen to the person who has the answers; listen to the person who has the questions
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: You can do anything you set your mind to
inspire.author: Eminem

inspire.quote: I believe anyone can conquer fear by doing the things he fears to do, provided he keeps doing them until he gets a record of successful experience behind him
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don’t matter and those who matter don’t mind. Dr
inspire.author: Seuss

inspire.quote: In order to control myself I must first accept myself by going with and not against my nature
inspire.author: Bruce Lee

inspire.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment
inspire.author: Jim Rohn

inspire.quote: There’s no substitute for hard work. Thomas A
inspire.author: Edison

inspire.quote: There is no sadder sight than a young pessimist
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: There is nothing quite so tragic as a young cynic, because it means the person has gone from knowing nothing to believing nothing
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Being ignorant is not so much a shame, as being unwilling to learn
inspire.author: Benjamin Franklin

inspire.quote: The enemy is a very good teacher
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: If I cannot do great things. I can do small things in a great way
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: The difference between winning and losing is most often not quitting
inspire.author: Walt Disney

inspire.quote: Let not your mind run on what you lack as much as on what you have already
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: Happiness and confidence are the prettiest things you can wear
inspire.author: Taylor Swift

inspire.quote: We must tell girls their voices are important
inspire.author: Malala Yousafzai

inspire.quote: Everyone should be their own biggest fan
inspire.author: Kanye West

inspire.quote: Every day, you have the power to choose our better history — by opening your hearts and minds, by speaking up for what you know is right
inspire.author: Michelle Obama

inspire.quote: If you’re walking down the right path and you’re willing to keep walking, eventually you’ll make progress
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: Everything will be ok in the end. If it’s not ok, it’s not the end
inspire.author: John Lennon

inspire.quote: The humble are beautiful
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Real resonates
inspire.author: Jack Butcher

inspire.quote: Turn the pain into power
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Quit talking and being doing
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Attachment leads to suffering
inspire.author: Buddha

inspire.quote: Life is better when you’re laughing
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Mainstream news is mental programming
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy

inspire.quote: Be a student of the world, not a judge
inspire.author: @dailyzen

inspire.quote: Just be real, that’s all you got to do
inspire.author: @trey_wing6

inspire.quote: Don’t trade your authenticity for approval
inspire.author: Kanye West

inspire.quote: Life is a balance of holding on and letting go
inspire.author: Rumi

inspire.quote: Have conviction. It makes you irresistible
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy

inspire.quote: Time ripens all things, no man is born wise
inspire.author: Miguel de Cervantes

inspire.quote: Focus on what matters and let go of what doesn’t
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: The more something scares you, the more you should do it
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: You must either modify your dreams or magnify your skills
inspire.author: Jim Rohn

inspire.quote: Don’t let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace
inspire.author: 14th Dalai Lama

inspire.quote: Don’t take advice from someone who’s never played the part
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy

inspire.quote: Youth comes but once in a lifetime
inspire.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

inspire.quote: It’s easy to stand in the crowd but it takes courage to stand alone
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: Ask yourself what makes you come alive, and go do that, because what the world needs is people who have come alive
inspire.author: Howard Thurman

inspire.quote: Be a good steward of your gifts. Protect your time. Feed your inner life. Avoid too much noise. Read good books, have good sentences in your ears. Be by yourself as often as you can. Walk
inspire.author: Jane Kenyon

inspire.quote: The world is a very malleable place. If you know what you want, and you go for it with maximum energy and drive and passion, the world will often reconfigure itself around you much more quickly and easily than you would think
inspire.author: Marc Andreessen

inspire.quote: If you are in your twenties and scared of failing, you are failing. No one expects anything from you. Go out there. Explore. Try. Fail. You will be grateful in your thirties
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: There’s something inside that’s ready to bloom if you can just care enough, and I know you can
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The world is kind to young people who are driven and curious
inspire.author: David Perell

inspire.quote: Promote what you love instead of bashing what you hate
inspire.author: Ed Latimore

inspire.quote: You have nothing to lose in your twenties, except for your self-esteem if you take no risk
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: Look at the world both analytically and differently. Don’t ask yourself what technology is trendy or popular, but rather what has yet to be known or accomplished
inspire.author: Amber Yang

inspire.quote: A self that goes on changing is a self that goes on living
inspire.author: Virginia Woolf

inspire.quote: Everyone learns by imitation. Don’t be afraid to copy the shit out of your idols when you are just getting started. Over time, you can add your own style and flavor
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy

inspire.quote: You can accomplish anything if you can prioritize ruthlessly and control your attention. Both of these have become particularly hard in the present age. As such those who can control these two critical factors will rule the world
inspire.author: @TheAncientSage

inspire.quote: Don’t worry about getting perfect, just keep getting better. Frank E
inspire.author: Peretti

inspire.quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: Adolescence is just one big walking pimple
inspire.author: Carol Burnett

inspire.quote: Stop f***ing eating sugar. Get some sleep. Move throughout the day. Get some sunlight. Drink some saltwater and hydrate. Take care of your shit. Get the basics down
inspire.author: Aubrey Marcus

inspire.quote: When I was younger I used to think that I never wanted to become the guy who didn’t have Saturday night plans and woke up early the next day. Now that I’m older, I’m that guy. And it’s great
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: To an adolescent, there is nothing in the world more embarrassing than a parent
inspire.author: Dave Barry (See also: parenting quotes)

inspire.quote: The desire to belong often overpowers the desire to improve
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: Before following the crowd, ask yourself if their average result is acceptable to you
inspire.author: James Pierce

inspire.quote: At some point, you have to break from what your parents expect of you and do what’s right for you. And if you don’t, you haven’t lived your life
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: It’s about knowing yourself and what you’re good at. Females, males – anyone can be anything they want to be
inspire.author: Payal Kadakia (ClassPass)

inspire.quote: Modernity turns everyone into an attention addict; the antidote is solitude, and the withdrawal symptom is loneliness
inspire.author: Sven Schnieders

inspire.quote: Our societies are so good at teaching us how to generate ambitions. We also need to learn the art of – occasionally – surrendering them
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: If you want to find your direction in life, remove your misdirection
inspire.author: James Pierce

inspire.quote: Consensus does not equal truth. Especially when consensus is socially enforced
inspire.author: @LifeMathMoney

inspire.quote: I’ve found meaning and success by going right when others went left, and down when others went up
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Growth starts when you realize no one cares about you and your mistakes
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: Not caring about what others think of you is the ultimate form of freedom. No amount of money or status can get you that freedom. It costs $0 and lots of courage
inspire.author: Preethi Kasireddy (See also: inner peace quotes)

inspire.quote: Haters are people terrified of their own emptiness. Critics are people who want to be those who they criticize
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: The more something threatens your identity, the more you will avoid it
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: You become wise when you realize only a handful of things are worth it
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé (See also: health quotes, hard work quotes, relationship quotes)

inspire.quote: The smarter you get, the less you react when it’s not worth it
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: Be forgiving with your past self. Be strict with your present self. Be flexible with your future self
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: Focus on what brings you energy, not what sucks it away
inspire.author: @dailyzen

inspire.quote: Whatever scares or discomforts you is your teacher
inspire.author: @dailyzen

inspire.quote: Your actions are a consequence of your thoughts. Your thoughts are a consequence of what you consume. And in the modern age, what you consume is largely a consequence of how you select and refine your social media feed. Choose better inputs. Get better outputs
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: The challenge of our time is relearning how to concentrate. The past decade has seen an unparalleled assault on our capacity to fix our minds steadily on anything. To sit still and think, without succumbing to an anxious reach for a machine, has become almost impossible
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: Allow yourself the uncomfortable luxury of changing your mind
inspire.author: Maria Popova

inspire.quote: A happy person doesn’t have to convince other people they are happy. Either you are or you’re not. And if you are, you’re not taking selfies to show people
inspire.author: Shane Parrish (See also: zen quotes)

inspire.quote: Rather than struggling to become bigger fish, we might concentrate our energies on finding smaller ponds or smaller species to swim with, so our own size will trouble us less
inspire.author: Alain de Botton

inspire.quote: Early on, find things where you have any interest and take on accountability. Don’t worry about short-term compensation. If you dive into the edge of knowledge, which nobody knows how to solve, and solve the hard problems, people will line up behind you. The leverage will come
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: Competition is fun when you are talented. Competition is dreadful when you are average. Competition is unnecessary when you are unique
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: Ignore people who don’t respect you. Ignore news that don’t impact you. Ignore food that doesn’t feed you. Ignore all politics. Ignore unnecessary competitions. Ignore emotions that mislead you. Ignore thoughts that won’t help you
inspire.author: @orangebook_

inspire.quote: To be nobody-but-yourself — in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else — means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight. E.E
inspire.author: Cummings

inspire.quote: Be who you were created to be and you will set the world on fire
inspire.author: Catherine of Siena

inspire.quote: Take up the battle, take it up. It’s yours. This is your life, this is your world
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: Doctors won’t make you healthy. Nutritionists won’t make you slim. Teachers won’t make you smart. Gurus won’t make you calm. Mentors won’t make you rich. Trainers won’t make you fit. Ultimately, you have to take responsibility. Save yourself
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: You will not get what you want, you will get what you need
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The future belongs to people who can think, hustle, and create
inspire.author: Ed Latimore

inspire.quote: The best fighter is never angry
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: We have somehow conned ourselves into the notion that this moment is ordinary
inspire.author: Alan Watts

inspire.quote: Only that you do the right thing, nothing else matters
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: All of us are alive because someone took care of us when we were small
inspire.author: Aaron Thier

inspire.quote: Life could be limitless joy, if we would only take it for what it is, in the way it is given to us
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: Expect nothing. Live frugally on surprise
inspire.author: Alice Walker (Revolutionary Petunias)

inspire.quote: The greatest gift you ever give is your honest self
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Too many people believe that everything must be pleasurable in life, which makes them constantly search for distractions and short-circuits the learning process
inspire.author: Robert Greene (Mastery)

inspire.quote: The closer you are to the truth, the more silent you become inside
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: Understand: the future belongs to groups that are fluid, fast, and nonlinear
inspire.author: Robert Greene

inspire.quote: The inspired minority triumphs over the inert masses
inspire.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

inspire.quote: If you are always trying to be normal, you will never know how amazing you can be
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: What you are being challenged by may be the very thing you’ve been waiting for
inspire.author: Iyanla Vanzant

inspire.quote: Extreme people get extreme results
inspire.author: Sam Altman

inspire.quote: Never worry about being obsessive. I like obsessive people. Obsessive people make great art
inspire.author: Susan Sontag

inspire.quote: Sing the song that only you can sing, write the book that only you can write, build the product that only you can build… live the life that only you can live
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: One of the main reasons people fall short of their potential is they care more about looking good than getting better. Excellence is the product of high aspirations and low ego
inspire.author: Adam Grant

inspire.quote: Our ambition should not be to win but to play with our full effort. Our intention is not to be thanked or recognized, but to help and to do what we think is right. Our focus is not on what happens to us but on how we respond. In this, we will find contentment and resilience
inspire.author: Ryan Holiday (Daily Stoic)

inspire.quote: The only Zen you’ll find on mountain tops is the Zen you bring up there with you
inspire.author: Alan Watts

inspire.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular. Roy T
inspire.author: Bennett (The Light in the Heart)

inspire.quote: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are
inspire.author: Joseph Campbell

inspire.quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: A man when he has done a good act, does not call out for others to come and see, but he goes on to another act, as a vine goes on to produce again the grapes in season
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: It just seems clear to me that as long as we are all here, it’s pretty clear that the struggle is to share the planet, rather than divide it
inspire.author: Alice Walker

inspire.quote: In the age of instant gratification, those who can endure discomfort are the most free
inspire.author: Alex Sauer

inspire.quote: The mediocre man consumes. The ordinary man seeks. The great man creates. The superior man does the right thing
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: The day a man becomes superior to pleasure, he will also be superior to pain
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: As soon as we free ourselves from the mirage of hurrying time, we are alive again, as in childhood, to the ecstasies of ordinary life
inspire.author: Alan Watts

inspire.quote: My formula for greatness in a human being is amor fati: that one wants nothing to be different, not forward, not backward, not in all eternity. Not merely bear merely what is necessary, still less conceal it… but love it
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: He is the man who can have tragedy in his heart and comedy in his head. G.K
inspire.author: Chesterton (Tremendous Trifles)

inspire.quote: Listening is where love begins: listening to ourselves and then to our neighbors
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Our society is much more interested in information than wonder, in noise rather than silence… And I feel that we need a lot more wonder and a lot more silence in our lives
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: First stop lying, then start speaking the truth
inspire.author: Jordan Peterson

inspire.quote: I only ask to be free, the butterflies are free
inspire.author: Charles Dickens

inspire.quote: To be calm is the highest achievement of the self
inspire.author: Zen proverb (See also: zen quotes)

inspire.quote: This is your life and it’s ending one minute at a time
inspire.author: Tyler Durden (Fight Club)

inspire.quote: Love the sinner and hate the sin
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: You have power over your mind, not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: My favorite things in life don’t cost any money. It’s really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: Live your life as though your every act were to become a universal law
inspire.author: Immanuel Kant

inspire.quote: I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish humble tasks as though they were great and noble
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: What I’m looking for is not out there, it is in me
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you, not by angels or by demons, heaven or hell
inspire.author: Buddha

inspire.quote: Gossip dies when it reaches the ears of a wise and secure person
inspire.author: Wesley Snipes

inspire.quote: Only by saying no that you can concentrate on the things that are really important
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: You never really learn much from hearing yourself speak
inspire.author: George Clooney

inspire.quote: You know what the issue is with this world? Everyone wants a magical solution to their problem, and everyone refuses to believe in magic
inspire.author: Alice in Wonderland

inspire.quote: There is no hurry, and in a way there is no future. It is all here – so take it easy, take your time, and get acquainted with it
inspire.author: Alan Watts

inspire.quote: The salvation of mankind depends upon independent thinkers directing their thoughts rightly
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: If I’d followed all the rules, I’d never have gotten anywhere
inspire.author: Marilyn Monroe

inspire.quote: You’re only given a little spark of madness; you mustn’t lose it
inspire.author: Robin Williams

inspire.quote: A true man hates no one
inspire.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

inspire.quote: Be uncommon
inspire.author: Michael Medici

inspire.quote: Everything is my fault
inspire.author: Tom Bilyeu

inspire.quote: Above all, try something. Franklin D
inspire.author: Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Stay humble or be humbled
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: It’s weird not to be weird
inspire.author: John Lennon

inspire.quote: Beauty will save the world
inspire.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky (The Idiot)

inspire.quote: Happiness is not the point
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: Freedom lies in being bold
inspire.author: Robert Frost

inspire.quote: Whatever you feel you become
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Existence wants you to be you
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Don’t explain your philosophy. Embody it
inspire.author: Epictetus

inspire.quote: Only the autodidacts are free
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: What worries you, masters you
inspire.author: John Locke

inspire.quote: Great intellects are skeptical
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: I am responsible for what I see
inspire.author: Gabby Bernstein

inspire.quote: Don’t settle, and don’t struggle
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: Solitude is the school of genius
inspire.author: Edward Gibbon

inspire.quote: The right time is always right now
inspire.author: Casey Neistat

inspire.quote: Inner peace is the ultimate luxury
inspire.author: Carlos Del Valle

inspire.quote: To understand is to know what to do
inspire.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

inspire.quote: The soul is awakened through service
inspire.author: Erica Jong

inspire.quote: The things you own end up owning you
inspire.author: Chuck Palahniuk

inspire.quote: Patience is the greatest of all virtues
inspire.author: Cato the Elder

inspire.quote: Things worth having are worth waiting for
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: The world just wants your authentic truth
inspire.author: Gabby Bernstein

inspire.quote: The shadows are as important as the light
inspire.author: Charlotte Brontë

inspire.quote: Live the life you want other people to live
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: The struggle ends when the gratitude begins
inspire.author: Neale Donald Walsch

inspire.quote: Conquer yourself and the world lies at your feet
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: Be tolerant with others and strict with yourself
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: Getting over yourself offers exponential returns. Shane Parrish (See also: fs
inspire.author: blog if you want to become wiser)

inspire.quote: Defensiveness is weakness. Vulnerability is strength
inspire.author: Justin Kan

inspire.quote: I’m proud of you. I hope that you are proud of you too
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: Being poor is not having too little, it is wanting more
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: Never lose hope, my heart. Miracles dwell in the invisible
inspire.author: Rumi

inspire.quote: As far as your self-control goes, as far goes your freedom
inspire.author: Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach

inspire.quote: To shut your eyes is to travel
inspire.author: Emily Dickinson

inspire.quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make
inspire.author: Jane Goodall

inspire.quote: Angels can fly because they can take themselves lightly. G.K
inspire.author: Chesterton (Orthodoxy)

inspire.quote: There is no strength without adversity and no change without courage
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: A person is the product of their dreams. So make sure to dream great dreams. And then try to live your dream
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: Your greatest struggles become your greatest victories
inspire.author: Joe De Sana

inspire.quote: The one thing that you have that nobody else has is you. Your voice, your mind, your story, your vision. So write and draw and build and play and dance and live as only you can
inspire.author: Neil Gaiman

inspire.quote: Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can’t see from the center. Big, undreamed-of things – the people on the edge see them first
inspire.author: Kurt Vonnegut

inspire.quote: What if people thought about their life not in terms of what they’ve accomplished or accumulated or experienced, but in terms of the effects they’ve had on others
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: Shoot for the top, always. You know you’ll never make it, but what’s the fun if you don’t shoot for the top? Ursula K
inspire.author: Le Guin

inspire.quote: Look closely at the present you are constructing: it should look like the future you are dreaming
inspire.author: Alice Walker

inspire.quote: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion
inspire.author: Jack Kerouac

inspire.quote: Get a move on…Don’t worry whether anyone will give you credit for it…Be satisfied with even the smallest progress, and treat the outcome of it all as unimportant
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: Don’t bend; don’t water it down; don’t try to make it logical; don’t edit your own soul according to the fashion. Rather, follow your most intense obsessions mercilessly
inspire.author: Franz Kafka

inspire.quote: As human beings, our job in life is to help people realize how rare and valuable each one of us really is, that each of us has something that no one else has – or ever will have – something inside that is unique to all time. It’s our job to encourage each other to discover that uniqueness and to provide ways of developing its expression
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: From the time you were very little, you’ve had people who have smiled you into smiling, people who have talked you into talking, sung you into singing, loved you into loving. Let’s take some time to think of those extra special people
inspire.author: Fred Rogers

inspire.quote: If you have the courage to put your intellectual integrity before your reputation, nothing can break you
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: A man who really wants to be free has to accept immense responsibilities. He cannot dump his responsibilities on anybody else
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: You create yourself moment to moment. You are not born as a fixed entity, but only as a infinite potentiality
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: You really can change the world if you care enough
inspire.author: Marian Wright Edelman

inspire.quote: Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet
inspire.author: Stephen Hawking

inspire.quote: What if everything you are going through is preparing you for what you asked for
inspire.author: Justin Perry

inspire.quote: In heaven, all the interesting people are missing
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: If someone says you’re weird, say "thank you"
inspire.author: Ellen DeGeneres

inspire.quote: You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks
inspire.author: Winston Churchill

inspire.quote: The cucumber is bitter? Then throw it out. There are brambles in the path? Then go around. That’s all you need to know
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: The public have an insatiable curiosity to know everything, except what is worth knowing
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: Rich people plan for three generations. Poor people plan for Saturday night
inspire.author: Gloria Steinem

inspire.quote: Virtue is what you do when nobody is looking. The rest is marketing
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: I have great faith in fools – self-confidence my friends will call it
inspire.author: Edgar Allan Poe (Marginalia)

inspire.quote: To see a candle’s light one must take it into a dark place. Ursula K
inspire.author: Le Guin

inspire.quote: If you are living for the weekend you are already dead
inspire.author: Bill Masur

inspire.quote: You wanna fly, you got to give up the shit that weighs you down
inspire.author: Toni Morrison (Song of Solomon)

inspire.quote: Try to exclude the possibility of suffering which the order of nature and the existence of free wills involve, and you find that you have excluded life itself. C.S
inspire.author: Lewis (The Problem of Pain)

inspire.quote: Sometimes people don’t want to hear the truth because they don’t want their illusions destroyed
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: Cling to certainty, if it makes you feel better. Just be aware that what you’re clinging to is the opposite of life
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: The avoidance of suffering is a form of suffering. The avoidance of struggle is a struggle. Hiding what is shameful is itself a form of shame
inspire.author: Mark Manson (See also: pain quotes)

inspire.quote: Not being able to govern events, I govern myself, and apply myself to them, if they will not apply themselves to me
inspire.author: Michel de Montaigne

inspire.quote: The first and best victory is to conquer self. To be conquered by self is, of all things, the most shameful and objectionable
inspire.author: Plato

inspire.quote: I will permit no man to narrow and degrade my soul by making me hate him. Booker T
inspire.author: Washington

inspire.quote: You will continue to suffer if you have an emotional reaction to everything that is said to you. True power is sitting back and observing everything with logic. If words control you that means everyone else can control you. Breathe and allow things to pass
inspire.author: Bruce Lee (See also this article for source)

inspire.quote: People are living just to impress. They must be really very poor inside, because only people suffering from inferiority complex want to impress others. A really superior person never compares himself with anybody else
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: Love the hand that fate deals you and play it as your own, for what could be more fitting?
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: We spend far more time doing what’s easy than doing what’s right
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Failure hurts but passes quickly. Regret hurts forever
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Anything of quality has gone through a distillation process
inspire.author: @AmuseChimp

inspire.quote: If you are easily provoked you are easily controlled
inspire.author: The Stoic Emperor

inspire.quote: Finding information is easier than ever. Filtering information is harder than ever. We are bombarded with irrelevant data and unsolicited stimulation. Choosing what to ignore is as important as choosing what to pay attention to
inspire.author: The Stoic Emperor

inspire.quote: We are slaves to distraction, incessantly active, and are ever striving to become
inspire.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

inspire.quote: When the self is not occupied with its own becoming there is an unpremeditated clarity, a deep ecstasy
inspire.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

inspire.quote: It is preoccupation with possession, more than anything else, that prevents men from living freely and nobly
inspire.author: Bertrand Russell

inspire.quote: The things that we understand, create silence. The things that we do not, create emotion
inspire.author: Kapil Gupta

inspire.quote: We act as though comfort and luxury were the chief requirements of life, when all we need to make us happy is something to be enthusiastic about
inspire.author: Charles Kingsley

inspire.quote: Don’t feel entitled to anything you didn’t sweat and struggle for
inspire.author: Marian Wright Edelman

inspire.quote: Take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame
inspire.author: Erica Jong

inspire.quote: There is no security for those who seek it outside of themselves
inspire.author: Byron Katie

inspire.quote: Hoping for the best, prepared for the worst, and unsurprised by anything in between
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: Don’t handicap your children by making their lives easy
inspire.author: Robert Heinlein

inspire.quote: I want to age like sea glass. Smoothed by tides but not broken. I want my hard edges to soften. I want to ride the waves and go with the flow. I want to catch a wave and let it carry me to where I belong. I want to be picked up and held gently by those who delight in my well earned patina and appreciate the changes I went through to achieve that beauty. I want to enjoy the journey and always remember that if you give the ocean something breakable it will turn it into something beautiful. I want to age like sea glass
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: One day, you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again. C.S
inspire.author: Lewis (The Chronicles of Narnia)

inspire.quote: The person asking the questions is sometimes more valuable than the person providing the answers
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: You have to be willing to look like an idiot in the short term to look like a genius in the long term
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: The cleverest of all, in my opinion, is the man who calls himself a fool at least once a month
inspire.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

inspire.quote: The most expensive way to pay for anything is with time
inspire.author: Brian Norgard

inspire.quote: The modern mind is overstimulated and the modern body is understimulated and overfed. Meditation, exercise, and fasting restore an ancient balance
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: The amateur avoids boredom, pain, discomfort, loneliness, fear. The wise keep going no matter what
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Do you wish to be great? Then begin by being. Do you desire to construct a vast and lofty fabric? Think first about the foundations of humility. The higher your structure is to be, the deeper must be its foundation
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: When you go through life with preferences but don’t let your happiness depend on any one of them, then you’re awake
inspire.author: Anthony de Mello

inspire.quote: If a man can reduce his needs to zero, he is truly free: there is nothing that can be taken from him; nothing can hurt him
inspire.author: John Boyd

inspire.quote: If you live according to nature, you will never be poor. If you live according to opinion, you will never be rich
inspire.author: Epicurus

inspire.quote: What is rare is not raw talent, skill, or even confidence, but humility, diligence, and self-awareness
inspire.author: Ryan Holiday

inspire.quote: The stupider you are, the smarter you think you are, and vice versa
inspire.author: Richard Feynman

inspire.quote: There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all. Peter F
inspire.author: Drucker

inspire.quote: For water continually dropping will wear hard rocks hollow
inspire.author: Plutarch

inspire.quote: He who subdues his temper vanquishes his greatest enemy
inspire.author: Publilius Syrus

inspire.quote: Those who are wise won’t be busy, and those who are too busy can’t be wise
inspire.author: Lin Yutang

inspire.quote: He who stands on tiptoe doesn’t stand firm. He who rushes ahead doesn’t go far
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful
inspire.author: Sigmund Freud

inspire.quote: My religion is to live and die without regret
inspire.author: Milarepa

inspire.quote: The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit
inspire.author: Nelson Henderson

inspire.quote: Any fool can know. The point is to understand
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Imagination is the highest form of research
inspire.author: Albert Einstein (Based on this page, this quote is probably not from Einstein)

inspire.quote: I salute the man who is going through life always helpful, knowing no fear, and to whom aggressiveness and resentment are alien
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: A calm and modest life brings more happiness than the pursuit of success combined with constant restlessness
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Intellectuals solve problems, geniuses prevent them
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: If you want your children to be intelligent, read them fairy tales. If you want them to be more intelligent, read them more fairy tales
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: All I have is the stubbornness of a mule; no, that’s quite all, I also have a nose. Albert Einstein (Note: It’s refreshing to see someone as famous as Einstein laughing at himself
inspire.author: For more on this, check out the humanity and humility section)

inspire.quote: He who can no longer pause to wonder and stand rapt in awe, is as good as dead; his eyes are closed
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The search for truth is more precious than its possession
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I always get by best with my naivety, which is 20 percent deliberate
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: A happy man is too satisfied with the present to dwell too much on the future
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Nothing truly valuable arises from ambition or from a mere sense of duty; it stems rather from love and devotion toward men and toward objective things
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Weak people revenge. Strong people forgive. Intelligent people ignore
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Don’t listen to the person who has the answers; listen to the person who has the questions
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The only thing more dangerous than ignorance is arrogance
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The value of achievement lies in the achieving
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Long live impudence! It’s my guardian angel in this world
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Most people say that it is the intellect which makes a great scientist. They are wrong: it is character
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The ideals which have lighted me on my way and time after time given me new courage to face life cheerfully, have been truth, goodness, and beauty
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: If you are out to describe the truth, leave elegance to the tailor
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Three rules of work: Out of clutter find simplicity; From discord find harmony; In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: On the mysterious: It is the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science. He who knows it not and can no longer wonder, no longer feel amazement, is as good as dead, a snuffed-out candle
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I am by heritage a Jew, by citizenship a Swiss, and by makeup a human being, and only a human being, without any special attachment to any state or national entity whatsoever
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools
inspire.author: Albert Einstein
Albert Einstein
inspire.quote: To see with one’s own eyes, to feel and judge without succumbing to the suggestive power of the fashion of the day, to be able to express what one has seen and felt in a trim sentence or even in a cunningly wrought word – is that not glorious? Is it not a proper subject for congratulation?
To raise new questions, new possibilities, to regard old problems from a new angle, requires creative imagination and marks real advance in science
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I do not at all believe in human freedom in the philosophical sense. Everybody acts not only under external compulsion but also in accordance with inner necessity
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger, more complex, and more violent. It takes a touch of genius, and a lot of courage, to move in the opposite direction
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The only thing I did was this: in long intervals I have expressed an opinion on public issues whenever they appeared to me so bad and unfortunate that silence would have made me feel guilty of complicity
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: How strange is the lot of us mortals! Each of us is here for a brief sojourn; for what purpose he knows not, though he sometimes thinks he senses it
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The value of a man should be seen in what he gives and not in what he is able to receive
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: When I am judging a theory, I ask myself whether, if I were God, I would have arranged the world in such a way
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I believe in intuition and inspiration. At times I feel certain I am right while not knowing the reason
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The only real valuable thing is intuition
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The only source of knowledge is experience
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: If you can’t explain it simply, you don’t understand it well enough
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I lived in that solitude which is painful in youth, but delicious in maturity
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: At any rate, I am convinced that He does not play dice
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I want to know God’s thoughts; the rest are details
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Make everything as simple as possible, but not simpler
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The world is not dangerous because of those who do harm but because of those who look at it without doing anything
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The most incomprehensible thing about the world is that it is at all comprehensible
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The most powerful force in the universe is compound interest
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: No problem can be solved from the same level of consciousness that created it
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Try not to become a man of success but rather to become a man of value
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: You never fail until you stop trying
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: A little knowledge is dangerous. So is a lot
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: God is subtle but he is not malicious
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Information is not knowledge
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: One flower is beautiful, a surfeit of flowers is vulgar
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Where there’s a will there’s a way
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The idle man does not know what it is to enjoy rest
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Great spirits have always found violent opposition from mediocrities
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The man of science is a poor philosopher
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: If the facts don’t fit the theory, change the facts
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I never think of the future – it comes soon enough
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: When the solution is simple, God is answering
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Coincidence is God’s way of remaining anonymous
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Never memorize something that you can look up
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: A person starts to live when he can live outside himself
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: As far as I’m concerned, I prefer silent vice to ostentatious virtue
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: God always takes the simplest way
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life’s coming attractions
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Each of us has to do his little bit toward transforming this spirit of the times
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Never give up on what you really want to do. The person with big dreams is more powerful than one with all the facts
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I, an old man, greet you Japanese schoolchildren from afar and hope that your generation may some day put mine to shame
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The destiny of civilized humanity depends more than ever on the moral forces it is capable of generating
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Measured objectively, what a man can wrest from Truth by passionate striving is utterly infinitesimal. But the striving frees us from the bonds of the self and makes us comrades of those who are the best and the greatest
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: A new type of thinking is essential if mankind is to survive and move toward higher levels
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: As for the search for truth, I know from my own painful searching, with its many blind alleys, how hard it is to take a reliable step, be it ever so small, towards the understanding of that which is truly important
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: A theory is the more impressive the greater the simplicity of its premises, the more different kinds of things it relates, and the more extended its area of applicability
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution. It is, strictly speaking, a real factor in scientific research
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Only those who attempt the absurd can achieve the impossible
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: A person who is religiously enlightened appears to me to be one who has, to the best of his ability, liberated himself from the fetters of his selfish desires and is preoccupied with thoughts, feelings, and aspirations to which he clings because of their superpersonal value
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: On receiving Lord & Taylor Award: It gives me great pleasure, indeed, to see the stubbornness of an incorrigible nonconformist warmly acclaimed
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The really valuable thing in the pageant of human life seems to me not the State but the creative, sentient individual, the personality; it alone creates the noble and the sublime, while the herd as such remains dull in thought and full in feeling
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The formulation of a problem is often more essential than its solution, which may be merely a matter of mathematical or experimental skill.The formulation of a problem is often more essential than its solution, which may be merely a matter of mathematical or experimental skill
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The pursuit of truth and beauty is a sphere of activity in which we are permitted to remain children all our lives
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The man who regards his own life and that of his fellow creatures as meaningless is not merely unfortunate but almost disqualified for life
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The really good music, whether of the East or of the West, cannot be analyzed
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: If I were not a physicist, I would probably be a musician. I often think in music. I live my daydreams in music. I see my life in terms of music
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I’m doing just fine, considering that I have triumphantly survived Nazism and two wives
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Bureaucracy is the death of all sound work
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: You can’t blame gravity for falling in love
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: I have reached an age when, if someone tells me to wear socks, I don’t have to
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Women always worry about things that men forget; men always worry about things women remember
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves
inspire.author: Albert Einstein
Albert Einstein
inspire.quote: A question that sometimes drives me hazy: am I or are the others crazy?

There is a race between mankind and the universe. Mankind is trying to build bigger, better, faster, and more foolproof machines. The universe is trying to build bigger, better, and faster fools. So far the universe is winning
inspire.author: Albert Einstein
Albert Einstein
inspire.quote: After receiving a distinction from Chicago Decalogue Society: How unfortunate a state must a community find itself if it cannot produce a more suitable candidate upon whom to confer such a distinction?

As for the words of warm praise addressed to me, I shall carefully refrain from disputing them. For who still believes that there is such a thing as genuine modesty? I should run the risk of being taken for just an old hypocrite
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Science is a wonderful thing if one does not have to earn one’s living at it
inspire.author: Albert Einstein
Albert Einstein
inspire.quote: If we knew what it was we were doing, it would not be called research, would it?

What a strange thing must be a girl’s soul! Do you really believe that you could find permanent happiness through others, even if this be the one and only beloved man? I know this sort of animal personally, from my own experience as I am one of them myself. Not too much should be expected from them, this I know quite exactly. Today we are sullen, tomorrow high-spirited, after tomorrow cold, then again irritated and half-sick of life. And so it goes
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Do not worry about your difficulties in mathematics. I can assure you mine are still greater
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I’m not sure about the the universe
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The wireless telegraph is not difficult to understand. The ordinary telegraph is like a very long cat. You pull the tail in New York, and it meows in Los Angeles. The wireless is the same, only without the cat
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Everyone is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid (No solid evidence that Einstein said this one)
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Put your hand on a hot stove for a minute, and it seems like an hour. Sit with a pretty girl for an hour, and it seems like a minute. That’s relativity
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Too many of us look upon Americans as dollar chasers. This is a cruel libel, even if it is reiterated thoughtlessly by the Americans themselves
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Those who thoughtlessly make use of the miracles of science and technology, without understanding more about them than a cow eating plants understands about botany, should be ashamed of themselves
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: One had to cram all this stuff into one’s mind for the examinations, whether one liked it or not. This coercion had such a deterring effect on me that, after I had passed the final examination, I found the consideration of any scientific problems distasteful to me for an entire year
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: No one here at the Technikum is up to date in modern physics ? I have already tapped all of them without success. Would I too become so lazy intellectually if I were ever doing well?
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The hardest thing to understand in the world is the income tax
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Black holes are where God divided by zero
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The devil has put a penalty on all things we enjoy in life. Either we suffer in health or we suffer in soul or we get fat
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: If A equals success, then the formula is A equals X plus Y and Z, with X being work, Y play, and Z keeping your mouth shut
inspire.author: Albert Einstein
