inspire.quote: He who has so little knowledge of human nature as to seek happiness by changing anything but his own disposition will waste his life in fruitless efforts
inspire.author: Samuel Johnson

inspire.quote: Better to be emotionally intelligent than intellectually intelligent
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: Your attitude is more important than your capabilities. Similarly, your decision is more important than your capabilities
inspire.author: Jack Ma

inspire.quote: To be upset over what you don’t have is to waste what you do have
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: You can’t always have a good day. But you can always face a bad day with a good attitude
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Ability is what you’re capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it
inspire.author: Lou Holtz

inspire.quote: People of little understanding are most apt to be angry when their sense is called into question
inspire.author: Samuel Richardson

inspire.quote: So is cheerfulness, or a good temper, the more it is spent, the more remains
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight
inspire.author: Arthur Ashe

inspire.quote: It isn’t what happens to us that causes us to suffer; it’s what we say to ourselves about what happens
inspire.author: Pema Chodron

inspire.quote: Character is the result of two things: mental attitude and the way we spend our time
inspire.author: Elbert Hubbard

inspire.quote: Correction does much, but encouragement does more
inspire.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

inspire.quote: Don’t spend your precious time asking "Why isn’t the world a better place?" It will only be time wasted. The question to ask is "How can I make it better?" To that there is an answer
inspire.author: Leo Buscaglia

inspire.quote: A happy person is not a person in a certain set of circumstances, but rather a person with a certain set of attitudes
inspire.author: Hugh Downs

inspire.quote: You cannot tailor-make the situations in life but you can tailor-make the attitudes to fit those situations
inspire.author: Zig Ziglar

inspire.quote: Our attitude towards life determines life’s attitude towards us
inspire.author: Earl Nightingale

inspire.quote: The less I needed, the better I felt
inspire.author: Charles Bukowski

inspire.quote: Less stuff equals more freedom
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: If buying stuff hasn’t made you happy, maybe getting rid of it will
inspire.author: Joshua Becker

inspire.quote: Simplicity boils down to two steps: Identify the essential. Eliminate the rest
inspire.author: Leo Babauta

inspire.quote: He who is contented is rich
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: I will not say yes when my heart says no
inspire.author: Courtney Carver

inspire.quote: Receive without conceit, release without struggle
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: The greatest wealth is a poverty of desires
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: A man is rich in proportion to the number of things he can afford to let alone
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: The art of being wise is the art of knowing what to overlook
inspire.author: William James

inspire.quote: Saying no is more important than saying yes
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: Every increased possession loads us with new weariness
inspire.author: John Ruskin

inspire.quote: He is not rich, that enjoyeth not his own goods
inspire.author: Pythagoras

inspire.quote: Make room for things that matter by removing everything that doesn’t
inspire.author: Brian Gardner

inspire.quote: Why should we pay so much attention to what the majority thinks?
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: The more you have, the more you are occupied. The less you have, the more free you are
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: There is no greatness where there is not simplicity, goodness, and truth
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: Let’s stop telling each other how busy we are
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: The more simple we are, the more complete we become
inspire.author: August Rodin

inspire.quote: To be richer, happier, and freer, all you need to do is want less
inspire.author: Francine Jay

inspire.quote: It is vain to do with more what can be done with less
inspire.author: William Of Occam

inspire.quote: Slow down. Do less
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Men are not great or small because of their material possessions. They are great or small because of what they are
inspire.author: James Cash Penney

inspire.quote: Order your soul. Reduce your wants
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: My greatest skill has been to want little
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Getting rid of everything that doesn’t matter allows you to remember who you are. Simplicity doesn’t change who you are, it brings you back to who you are
inspire.author: Courtney Carver

inspire.quote: Too many people spend money they haven’t earned to buy things they don’t want to impress people they don’t like
inspire.author: Will Rogers

inspire.quote: Things that matter most must never be at the mercy of things that matter least
inspire.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

inspire.quote: Besides the noble art of getting things done, there is the noble art of leaving things undone. The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of non-essentials
inspire.author: Lin Yutang

inspire.quote: Eliminate physical clutter. More importantly, eliminate spiritual clutter. D.H
inspire.author: Mondfleur

inspire.quote: Small needs lead to a large life
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Nothing is more simple than greatness; indeed, to be simple is to be great
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson (See also: simple quotes)

inspire.quote: Eat, drink and love… the rest is not worth a nickel
inspire.author: Lord Byron

inspire.quote: How many things are there which I do not want
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: The most important things in life aren’t things
inspire.author: Kenneth Clarke

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the peak of civilization
inspire.author: Jessie Sampter

inspire.quote: Simplicity is a state of mind
inspire.author: Charles Wagner

inspire.quote: Simplicity is when you remove anything useless
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the end result of long, hard work, not the starting point
inspire.author: Frederick Maitland

inspire.quote: Simplicity is making the journey of this life with just baggage enough
inspire.author: Charles Warner

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the most difficult thing to secure in this world; it is the last limit of experience and the last effort of genius
inspire.author: George Sand

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the nature of great souls
inspire.author: Papa Ramadas

inspire.quote: Our life is frittered away by detail. Simplify, simplify
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Beware the barrenness of a busy life
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication
inspire.author: Leonardo da Vinci

inspire.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Manifest plainness, embrace simplicity, reduce selfishness, have few desires
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one’s own in the midst of abundance
inspire.author: Buddha

inspire.quote: Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple. Dr
inspire.author: Seuss

inspire.quote: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger, more complex, and more violent. It takes a touch of genius — and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction. Ernst F
inspire.author: Schumacher

inspire.quote: Nature is pleased with simplicity. And nature is no dummy
inspire.author: Isaac Newton

inspire.quote: That’s been one of my mantras – focus and simplicity. Simple can be harder than complex: You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple. But it’s worth it in the end because once you get there, you can move mountains
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: All the great things are simple, and many can be expressed in a single word: freedom, justice, honor, duty, mercy, hope
inspire.author: Winston Churchill

inspire.quote: To be content, look backward on those who possess less than yourself, not forward on those who possess more. If this does not make you content, you don’t deserve to be happy
inspire.author: Benjamin Franklin

inspire.quote: Let your affairs be as two or three, and not a hundred or a thousand instead of a million count half a dozen, and keep your accounts on your thumb-nail
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: As you simplify your life, the laws of the universe will be simpler; solitude will not be solitude, poverty will not be poverty, nor weakness weakness
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Make everything as simple as possible, but not simpler
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: If you look at what you have in life, you’ll always have more. If you look at what you don’t have in life, you’ll never have enough
inspire.author: Oprah Winfrey

inspire.quote: There seems to be some perverse human characteristic that likes to make easy things difficult
inspire.author: Warren Buffett

inspire.quote: It is not daily increase but daily decrease, hack away the unessential. The closer to the source, the less wastage there is
inspire.author: Bruce Lee

inspire.quote: Simple can be harder than complex. You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: Complexity is your enemy. Any fool can make something complicated. It is hard to make something simple
inspire.author: Richard Branson

inspire.quote: Don’t confuse having a career with having a life
inspire.author: Hillary Clinton

inspire.quote: One should use common words to say uncommon things
inspire.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

inspire.quote: One day I will find the right words, and they will be simple
inspire.author: Jack Kerouac

inspire.quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little
inspire.author: Plato

inspire.quote: Smile, breathe and go slowly
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: The expression of truth is simplicity
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: The greatest ideas are the simplest
inspire.author: William Golding

inspire.quote: Simplicity compounds. Complexity zeros out
inspire.author: Shane Parrish

inspire.quote: The things you own end up owning you
inspire.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

inspire.quote: Squint at the world. You will see more, by seeing less
inspire.author: John Maeda (The Laws Of Simplicity)

inspire.quote: I have just three things to teach: simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Simplify, then add lightness
inspire.author: Colin Chapman

inspire.quote: If you’re not saying "HELL YEAH!" about it, say "no
inspire.author: " Derek Sivers (Hell yeah! Youtube video)

inspire.quote: The simplest things are often the truest
inspire.author: Richard Bach

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the keynote of all true elegance
inspire.author: Coco Chanel

inspire.quote: If it isn’t a clear yes, then it’s a clear no
inspire.author: Greg McKeown

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the essence of happiness
inspire.author: Cedric Bledsoe

inspire.quote: The most complicated skill is to be simple
inspire.author: Dejan Stojanovic

inspire.quote: The greatest truths are the simplest: so likewise are the greatest men
inspire.author: Augustus William Hare

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the friend of execution
inspire.author: Sesan Kareem

inspire.quote: Don’t rush. Go slowly. Be present
inspire.author: Leo Babauta

inspire.quote: Owning less is great. Wanting less is better
inspire.author: Joshua Becker

inspire.quote: You don’t need more space, you need less stuff
inspire.author: Joshua Becker

inspire.quote: Give all you can give and take only what you need
inspire.author: The Minimalists

inspire.quote: A place for everything, and everything in its place
inspire.author: Francine Jay (Miss Minimalist)

inspire.quote: Discern the vital few from the trivial many
inspire.author: Greg McKeown

inspire.quote: If it doesn’t matter, get rid of it
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: My philosophy? Simplicity plus variety
inspire.author: Hank Stram

inspire.quote: I love to go and see all the things I am happy without
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: Poverty is my pride
inspire.author: Muhammed

inspire.quote: Sell your possessions and give to the poor
inspire.author: Jesus Christ

inspire.quote: Live simply that others might simply live
inspire.author: Elizabeth Ann Seton

inspire.quote: The height of sophistication is simplicity
inspire.author: Clare Boothe Luce

inspire.quote: It is better to be good than to be original
inspire.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

inspire.quote: In simplicity there is truth
inspire.author: River Phoenix

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the glory of expression
inspire.author: Walt Whitman

inspire.quote: It takes a long time to learn how to do something simple
inspire.author: Marty Rubin

inspire.quote: Complexity creates confusion, simplicity focus
inspire.author: Edward de Bono

inspire.quote: Or, rather, let us be more simple and less vain
inspire.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

inspire.quote: He is the richest who is content with the least
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things
inspire.author: Robert Brault

inspire.quote: The art of art, the glory of expression and the sunshine of the light of letters, is simplicity
inspire.author: Walt Whitman

inspire.quote: Fear less, hope more; Eat less, chew more; Whine less, breathe more; Talk less, say more; Love more, and all good things will be yours!
inspire.author: Swedish Proverb

inspire.quote: More good has been accomplished by simple people seeking their own honest ends than by all the philanthropists in history
inspire.author: Robert Brault

inspire.quote: Most of what we say and do is not essential. If you can eliminate it, you’ll have more time, and more tranquility. Ask yourself at every moment, ‘Is this necessary?’
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: Find joy in simplicity, self-respect, and indifference to what lies between virtue and vice. Love the human race. Follow the divine
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: My task is to simplify and then go deeper, making a commitment to what remains. That’s what I’ve been after. To care and polish what remains till it glows and comes alive from loving care
inspire.author: Sue Bender

inspire.quote: As we live and as we are, Simplicity – with a capital ‘S’ – is difficult to comprehend nowadays. We are no longer truly simple. We no longer live in simple terms or places. Life is a complex struggle now. It is now valiant to be simple: a courageous thing to even want to be simple. It is a spiritual thing to comprehend what simplicity means
inspire.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

inspire.quote: I do believe in simplicity. It is astonishing as well as sad, how many trivial affairs even the wisest thinks he must attend to in a day; how singular an affair he thinks he must omit. When the mathematician would solve a difficult problem, he first frees the equation of all incumbrances, and reduces it to its simplest terms. So simplify the problem of life, distinguish the necessary and the real. Probe the earth to see where your main roots run
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: The best things in life are nearest: Breath in your nostrils, light in your eyes, flowers at your feet, duties at your hand, the path of right just before you. Then do not grasp at the stars, but do life’s plain, common work as it comes, certain that daily duties and daily bread are the sweetest things in life
inspire.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

inspire.quote: We can travel a long way and do many things, but our deepest happiness is not born from accumulating new experiences. It is born from letting go of what is unnecessary, and knowing ourselves to be always at home
inspire.author: Sharon Salzberg

inspire.quote: I do not think that any civilization can be called complete until it has progressed from sophistication to unsophistication, and made a conscious return to simplicity of thinking and living
inspire.author: Lin Yutang

inspire.quote: In character, in manner, in style, in all things, the supreme excellence is simplicity
inspire.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

inspire.quote: However mean your life is, meet it and live it: do not shun it and call it hard names. Cultivate poverty like a garden herb, like sage. Do not trouble yourself much to get new things, whether clothes or friends. Things do not change, we change. Sell your clothes and keep your thoughts
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Most of the luxuries and many of the so-called comforts of life are not only not indispensable, but positive hindrances to the elevation of mankind
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the final achievement. After one has played a vast quantity of notes and more notes, it is simplicity that emerges as the crowning reward of art
inspire.author: Frederic Chopin

inspire.quote: Do not beat around the bush. Do not take winding detours. Follow a straight line to the objective; simplicity is the shortest distance between two points
inspire.author: Bruce Lee

inspire.quote: For the longest time, I thought I needed to be more organized. Now I know I just needed less stuff
inspire.author: Alysa Bajenaru

inspire.quote: When you’re clear about your purpose and your priorities, you can painlessly discard whatever does not support these, whether it’s clutter in your cabinets or commitments on your calendar
inspire.author: Victoria Moran

inspire.quote: A simple life is not seeing how little we can get by with—that’s poverty—but how efficiently we can put first things first
inspire.author: Victoria Moran

inspire.quote: Enjoy the simple, the natural and the plain. Along with that comes the ability to do things spontaneously and have them work
inspire.author: Benjamin Hoff

inspire.quote: True simplicity is, well, you just keep on going and going until you get to the point where you go, ‘Yeah, well, of course.’ Where there’s no rational alternative
inspire.author: Jonathan Ive

inspire.quote: Simplicity is not the absence of clutter, that’s a consequence of simplicity. Simplicity is somehow essentially describing the purpose and place of an object and product. The absence of clutter is just a clutter-free product. That’s not simple
inspire.author: Jonathan Ive

inspire.quote: It is simplicity that makes the uneducated more effective than the educated when addressing popular audiences
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: It is the sweet, simple things of life which are the real ones after all
inspire.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

inspire.quote: Expert: Someone who brings confusion to simplicity
inspire.author: Gregory Nunn

inspire.quote: It’s not what’s under the tree, it’s who’s around it
inspire.author: Charlie Brown

inspire.quote: Better to have spent a minute meditating than tweeting
inspire.author: The Mimimalists

inspire.quote: It’s not a good deal if you don’t need it
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: A child of five could understand this. Send someone to fetch a child of five
inspire.author: Groucho Marx

inspire.quote: If you can spend a perfectly useless afternoon in a perfectly useless manner, you have learned how to live
inspire.author: Lin Yutang

inspire.quote: Simplicity is hard to build, easy to use, and hard to charge for. Complexity is easy to build, hard to use, and easy to charge for
inspire.author: Chris Sacca

inspire.quote: There is one advantage to having nothing, it never needs repair. Frank A
inspire.author: Clark

inspire.quote: I think we are drawn to dogs because they are the uninhibited creatures we might be if we weren’t certain we knew better. They fight for honor at the first challenge, make love with no moral restraint, and they do not for all their marvelous instincts appear to know about death. Being such wonderfully uncomplicated beings, they need us to do their worrying
inspire.author: George Bird Evans

inspire.quote: Simplify your life. You don’t grow spiritual, you shrink spiritual
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: I didn’t have time to write a short letter, so I wrote a long one instead
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: To poke a wood fire is more solid enjoyment than almost anything else in the world
inspire.author: Charles Dudley Warner

inspire.quote: People love chopping wood. In this activity one immediately sees results
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Simplicity and harmony are the ultimate conditions to be attained in all things
inspire.author: Horace Fletcher

inspire.quote: Wherever I am, let me never forget to distinguish want from need
inspire.author: Barbara Kingsolver

inspire.quote: Progress is man’s ability to complicate simplicity
inspire.author: Thor Heyerdahl

inspire.quote: The truth is rarely pure and never simple
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: Why should we live with such hurry and waste of life? We are determined to be starved before we are hungry
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: It’s not enough to be busy, so are the ants
inspire.author: The question is: what are we busy about? Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Much of the stress that people feel doesn’t come from having too much to do. It comes from not finishing what they’ve started
inspire.author: Leo Babauta

inspire.quote: Simplicity before understanding is simplistic; simplicity after understanding is simple
inspire.author: Edward de Bono

inspire.quote: Every solution to every problem is simple. It’s the distance between the two where the mystery lies
inspire.author: Derek Landy

inspire.quote: Everything is both simpler than we can imagine, and more complicated that we can conceive
inspire.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

inspire.quote: Our souls are not hungry for fame, comfort, wealth, or power. Our souls are hungry for meaning, for the sense that we have figured out how to live so that our lives matter
inspire.author: Harold Kushner

inspire.quote: Real happiness is cheap enough, yet how dearly we pay for its counterfeit
inspire.author: Hosea Ballou

inspire.quote: Simplicity is an acquired taste. Mankind, left free, instinctively complicates life
inspire.author: Katharine Elizabeth Fullerton Gerould

inspire.quote: Truthfully, though, most organizing is nothing more than well-planned hoarding
inspire.author: Joshua Fields Millburn (The Minimalists)

inspire.quote: The highest excellence is like water. The excellence of water appears in its benefiting all things, and in its occupying, without striving, the low place which all men dislike
inspire.author: Lao Tzu

inspire.quote: Simplicity is the only thing that sufficiently reorients our lives so that possessions can be genuinely enjoyed without destroying us
inspire.author: Richard Foster

inspire.quote: The unfolding of your words gives light; it imparts understanding to the simple
inspire.author: Psalm 119:130

inspire.quote: Discovery is the ability to be puzzled by simple things
inspire.author: Noam Chomsky

inspire.quote: The height of cultivation always runs to simplicity
inspire.author: Bruce Lee

inspire.quote: What we need are few. What we want are many
inspire.author: Sheng Yen

inspire.quote: Instead of presents, give presence
inspire.author: Leo Babauta

inspire.quote: Never use a long word when a short one will do
inspire.author: Louisa May Alcott

inspire.quote: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive
inspire.author: Henry Miller

inspire.quote: Maybe a person’s time would be as well spent raising food as raising money to buy food. Frank A
inspire.author: Clark

inspire.quote: Knowledge is a process of piling up facts; wisdom lies in their simplification. Martin H
inspire.author: Fischer

inspire.quote: I think we are in a non-essentialist bubble — everything seems important — so of course nothing is
inspire.author: Greg McKeown

inspire.quote: Every time I’m doing something that is not essential, I am giving up on something that is essential
inspire.author: Greg McKeown

inspire.quote: I would rather own little and see the world, than own the world and see little of it
inspire.author: Alexander Sattler

inspire.quote: What a unique treasure are the things we have learned to live without, for no thief can take them from us
inspire.author: Robert Brault

inspire.quote: Remember that in giving any reason at all for refusing, you lay some foundation for a future request
inspire.author: Arthur Helps

inspire.quote: Don’t forget it: He has most who needs least. Don’t create needs for yourself. St
inspire.author: Josemaría Escrivá

inspire.quote: If everything is important, then nothing is. Patrick M
inspire.author: Lencioni

inspire.quote: Learning isn’t acquiring knowledge so much as it is trimming information that has already been acquired
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: When everything is urgent, nothing is urgent
inspire.author: The Minimalists

inspire.quote: Those who are wise won’t be busy, and those who are too busy can’t be wise
inspire.author: Lin Yutang

inspire.quote: Forget sale price. Everything is 100% off when you don’t buy it
inspire.author: Joshua Fields Millburn

inspire.quote: He who is not contented with what he has, would not be contented with what he would like to have
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: The secret of happiness, you see, is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: A common man marvels at uncommon things. A wise man marvels at the commonplace
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: Anything that costs you your peace is too expensive
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Do not talk a little on many subjects, but much on a few
inspire.author: Pythagoras

inspire.quote: Simplicity is about subtracting the obvious and adding the meaningful
inspire.author: John Maeda

inspire.quote: Keep only those things that speak to your heart. Then take the plunge and discard all the rest
inspire.author: Marie Kondo (The Life-Changing Magic of Tidying Up)

inspire.quote: I am beginning to learn that it is the sweet, simple things in life which are the real ones after all
inspire.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

inspire.quote: Minimalism is the pathway to the better life you’ve been searching for all along. Joshua Becker (Check out What is minimalism? by becomingminimalist
inspire.author: com)

inspire.quote: Minimalism is the intentional promotion of the things we most value and the removal of everything that distracts us from it
inspire.author: Joshua Becker

inspire.quote: These times are too progressive. Everything has changed too fast. Railroads and telegraphs and kerosene and coal stoves – they’re good to have but the trouble is, folks get to depend on ’em
inspire.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder (Think about today!)

inspire.quote: It is desirable that a man live in all respects so simply and preparedly that if an enemy take the town… he can walk out the gate empty-handed and without anxiety
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: The essence of philosophy is that a man should so live that his happiness shall depend as little as possible on external things
inspire.author: Epictetus

inspire.quote: Our affluent society contains those of talent and insight who are driven to prefer poverty, to choose it, rather than submit to the desolation of an empty abundance
inspire.author: Michael Harrington

inspire.quote: I like to walk about among the beautiful things that adorn the world; but private wealth I should decline, or any sort of personal possessions, because they would take away my liberty
inspire.author: George Santayana

inspire.quote: The point of simple living, for me, has got to be: a soft place to land, a wide margin for error, room to breathe, lots of places to find baseline happiness in each and every day
inspire.author: Leo Babauta

inspire.quote: I just naturally want to do things that make sense. In my personal life too, I don’t care what other rich people are doing. I don’t want a 405 foot boat just because someone else has a 400 foot boat
inspire.author: Warren Buffett

inspire.quote: I am strongly drawn to the simple life and am often oppressed by the feeling that I am engrossing an unnecessary amount of the labor of my fellow. I regard class differences as contrary to justice and, in the last resort, based on force. I also consider that plain living is good for everybody, physically and mentally
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: But I deal with this meditating and by understanding I’ve been put on the planet to serve humanity. I have to remind myself to live simply and not to overindulge, which is a constant battle in a material world
inspire.author: Sandra Cisneros

inspire.quote: A little simplification would be the first step toward rational living, I think
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: Essentialism is the art of discerning between external noise and internal voice
inspire.author: Lawton Ursrey

inspire.quote: Essentialism: only once you give yourself permission to stop trying to do it all, to stop saying yes to everyone, can you make your highest contribution towards the things that really matter
inspire.author: Greg McKeown

inspire.quote: Frugality is one of the most beautiful and joyful words in the English language, and yet one that we are culturally cut off from understanding and enjoying
inspire.author: Elise Boulding

inspire.quote: I woke up early and took the first train to take me away from the city. The noise and all its people. I was alone on the train and had no idea where I was going, and that’s why I went there
inspire.author: Charlotte Eriksson

inspire.quote: I walked for a while until I found the water, the most peaceful place I know. There I sat and stayed the whole day, with nothing and everything on my mind, cleaning my head. Silence, I learned, is some times the most beautiful sound
inspire.author: Charlotte Eriksson

inspire.quote: Essentialism […] It doesn’t mean just doing less for the sake of less either. It is about making the wisest possible investment of your time and energy in order to operate at our highest point of contribution by doing only what is essential
inspire.author: Greg McKeown (See also: Essentialism: The Disciplined Pursuit Of Less, Amazon book)

inspire.quote: Essentialism is not about how to get more things done, it’s about how to the get the right things done
inspire.author: Greg McKeown

inspire.quote: Identify what’s most important to you. Eliminate as much as you possibly can of everything else
inspire.author: Mark and Angel

inspire.quote: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak
inspire.author: Hans Hofmann

inspire.quote: The more we simplify our material needs the more we are free to think of other things
inspire.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

inspire.quote: I’m not impressed by your looks, money, social status or job title. I’m impressed by the way you treat other human beings
inspire.author: Jim Kwik

inspire.quote: Houses are full of things that gather dust
inspire.author: Jack Kerouac

inspire.quote: The material pursuit of self-esteem reduces self-esteem
inspire.author: George Monbiot

inspire.quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul
inspire.author: Democritus

inspire.quote: Possessions are usually diminished by possession
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: Complete possession is proved only by giving. All you are unable to give possesses you
inspire.author: Andre Gide

inspire.quote: Until we have begun to go without them, we fail to realize how unnecessary many things are. We’ve been using them not because we needed them but because we had them
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: Every right implies a responsibility; Every opportunity, an obligation, Every possession, a duty. John D
inspire.author: Rockefeller

inspire.quote: I have to remind myself to live simply and not overindulge, which is a constant battle in a material world
inspire.author: Sandra Cisneros

inspire.quote: If these things haven’t delivered on their promises yet, it may be time to let them go
inspire.author: Francine Jay (Miss Minimalist)

inspire.quote: The modern consumerist system is designed to take your money and time away from you
inspire.author: Anthony Ongaro

inspire.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: Material blessings, when they pay beyond the category of need, are weirdly fruitful of headache
inspire.author: Philip Wylie

inspire.quote: There is no such thing as material covetousness. All covetousness is spiritual. …Any so-called material thing that you want is merely a symbol: you want it not for itself, but because it will content your spirit for the moment
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: I’m one of the least materialistic people that exist, because material possessions don’t mean much to me. They’re beautiful, I enjoy them, they can enhance your life to a certain degree, but they’re ultimately not important
inspire.author: Tom Ford (Famous fashion designer)

inspire.quote: The consumption society has made us feel that happiness lies in having things, and has failed to teach us the happiness of not having things
inspire.author: Elise Boulding

inspire.quote: We go on multiplying our conveniences only to multiply our cares. We increase our possessions only to the enlargement of our anxieties. Anna C
inspire.author: Brackett

inspire.quote: Increase of material comforts, it may be generally laid down, does not in any way whatsoever conduce to moral growth
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The rise of social media is proving problematic. Younger age groups of children and adults are now becoming heavily absorbed in it, unaware that social media presents rose-tinted versions of life as the truth, and it’s against this fiction that they’re comparing themselves
inspire.author: Thibaut

inspire.quote: It is preoccupation with possessions, more than anything else, that prevents us from living freely and nobly
inspire.author: Bertrand Russell

inspire.quote: It is the logic of consumerism that undermines the values of loyalty and permanence and promotes a different set of values that is destructive of family life
inspire.author: Christopher Lasch

inspire.quote: Man should not consider his material possession his own, but as common to all, so as to share them without hesitation when others are in need
inspire.author: Thomas Aquinas

inspire.quote: Anything you cannot relinquish when it has outlived its usefulness possesses you, and in this materialistic age a great many of us are possessed by our possessions
inspire.author: Peace Pilgrim

inspire.quote: Our greatest illusion is reliance upon the security and permanence of material possessions. We must search for some other coin
inspire.author: John Cudahy

inspire.quote: The roots of addiction can be seen in our search for happiness in something outside of our self, be it drugs, relationships, material possessions
inspire.author: Lee L Jampolsky

inspire.quote: Everything we possess that is not necessary for life or happiness becomes a burden, and scarcely a day passes that we do not add to it
inspire.author: Robert Brault

inspire.quote: Reject the basic assumptions of civilization, especially the importance of material possessions
inspire.author: Chuck Palahniuk

inspire.quote: Materialism is the only form of distraction from true bliss
inspire.author: Douglas Horton

inspire.quote: There must be more to life than having everything
inspire.author: Maurice Sendak

inspire.quote: Riches do not consist in the possession of treasures, but in the use made of them
inspire.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

inspire.quote: An object in possession seldom retains the same charm that it had in pursuit
inspire.author: Pliny the Elder

inspire.quote: The wonderful things in life are the things you do, not the things you have
inspire.author: Reinhold Messner

inspire.quote: The nightmare of materialism, which has turned the life of the universe into an evil, useless game, is not yet past; it holds the awakening soul still in its grip
inspire.author: Wassily Kandinsky

inspire.quote: Our chief comforts often produce our greatest anxieties, and the increase in our possessions is but an inlet to new disquietudes
inspire.author: Oliver Goldsmith

inspire.quote: Materialism and all its miseries can never be conquered by materialism
inspire.author: Swami Vivekananda

inspire.quote: Let there be as little materialism as possible, with the maximum of spirituality
inspire.author: Swami Vivekananda

inspire.quote: The art of simplicity is a puzzle of complexity
inspire.author: Douglas Horton

inspire.quote: Progress is in simplification, which often follows complexity
inspire.author: Pearl Zhu

inspire.quote: Complexity is impressive, but simplicity is genius
inspire.author: Lance Wallnau

inspire.quote: Simple pleasures are the last healthy refuge in a complex world
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: Simple truths are a relief from grand speculations
inspire.author: Vauvenargues

inspire.quote: Simplicity is a key to avoiding complication. Part of the definition of simplicity is ‘not complex or complicated; sincere’
inspire.author: Joyce Meyer

inspire.quote: People often associate complexity with deeper meaning, when often after precious time has been lost, it is realized that simplicity is the key to everything
inspire.author: Gary Hopkins

inspire.quote: People who pride themselves on their "complexity" and deride others for being "simplistic" should realize that the truth is often not very complicated. What gets complex is evading the truth
inspire.author: Thomas Sowell

inspire.quote: Simplicity is a great virtue but it requires hard work to achieve it and education to appreciate it. And to make matters worse: complexity sells better. Edsger W
inspire.author: Dijkstra

inspire.quote: Reduce the complexity of life by eliminating the needless wants of life, and the labors of life reduce themselves
inspire.author: Edwin Way Teale

inspire.quote: Making the simple complicated is commonplace; making the complicated simple, awesomely simple, that’s creativity
inspire.author: Charles Mingus

inspire.quote: Avoid the superficial, penetrate the complex, go to the heart of the problem, and pinpoint the key factors
inspire.author: Bruce Lee

inspire.quote: Simplicity is a most complex form
inspire.author: Duke Ellington

inspire.quote: Plain question and plain answer make the shortest road out of most perplexities
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: Complex things are easy to do. Simplicity’s the real challenge
inspire.author: Robert James Waller

inspire.quote: The role of genius is not to complicate the simple, but to simplify the complicated
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: Complexity means distracted effort. Simplicity means focused effort
inspire.author: Edward de Bono

inspire.quote: Growth creates complexity, which requires simplicity
inspire.author: Andy Stanley

inspire.quote: I don’t need a lot of money. Simplicity is the answer for me
inspire.author: Linda McCartney

inspire.quote: You might get 85 years on this planet – don’t spend 65 paying off a lifestyle you can’t afford
inspire.author: Cait Flanders

inspire.quote: Ten years from now it won’t really matter what shoes you wore today, how your hair looked, or what brand of clothes you wore. What will matter is how you lived, how you loved, and what you learned along the way
inspire.author: Marc and Angel

inspire.quote: Voluntary simplicity means going fewer places in one day rather than more, seeing less so I can see more, doing less so I can do more, acquiring less so I can have more
inspire.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

inspire.quote: The object of life is not to be on the side of the majority, but to escape finding oneself in the ranks of the insane
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: None can be an impartial or wise observer of human life but from the vantage ground of what we should call voluntary poverty
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: How much time he gains who does not look to see what his neighbour says or does or thinks, but only at what he does himself, to make it just and holy
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has
inspire.author: Epictetus

inspire.quote: It would add very much to the pleasure of life and to its sanctity if we cultivated the habit of seeing what is beautiful and divine in ordinary things, though this is not easy, because our natural tendency is to think and talk most of what is extraordinary
inspire.author: Alfred Rowland

inspire.quote: All goes back to the earth, and so I do not desire pride of excess or power, but the contentments made by men who have had little: the fisherman’s silence receiving the river’s grace, the gardener’s musing on rows
inspire.author: Wendell Berry

inspire.quote: We really must understand that the lust for affluence in contemporary society is psychotic. It is psychotic because it has completely lost touch with reality. We crave things we neither need nor enjoy
inspire.author: Richard Foster

inspire.quote: The Master said, "A true gentleman is one who has set his heart upon the Way. A fellow who is ashamed merely of shabby clothing or modest meals is not even worth conversing with". Analects 4
inspire.author: 9 Confucius

inspire.quote: To live content with small means; to seek elegance rather than luxury, and refinement rather than fashion; to be worthy, not respectable, and wealthy, not, rich; to listen to stars and birds, babes and sages, with open heart; to study hard; to think quietly, act frankly, talk gently, await occasions, hurry never; in a word, to let the spiritual, unbidden and unconscious, grow up through the common – this is my symphony
inspire.author: William Henry Channing

inspire.quote: To the Technocrats: Have mercy on us. Relax a bit, take time out for simple pleasures. For example, the luxuries of electricity, indoor plumbing, central heating, instant electronic communication and such, have taught me to relearn and enjoy the basic human satisfactions of dipping water from a cold clear mountain stream; of building a wood fire in a cast-iron stove; of using long winter nights for making music, making things, making love; of writing long letters, in longhand with a fountain pen, to the few people on this earth I truly care about
inspire.author: Edward Abbey

inspire.quote: I’ve heard my teacher say, where there are machines, there are bound to be machine worries; where there are machine worries, there are bound to be machine hearts. With a machine heart in your breast, you’ve spoiled what was pure and simple; and without the pure and simple, the life of the spirit knows no rest
inspire.author: Zhuangzi

inspire.quote: Poor food and water for dinner, a bent arm for a pillow – that is where joy resides. For me, wealth and renown without honor are nothing but drifting clouds
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: I go about looking at horses and cattle. They eat grass, make love, work when they have to, bear their young. I am sick with envy of them
inspire.author: Sherwood Anderson

inspire.quote: I think we’ve been oversold the value of more and undersold the value of less
inspire.author: Greg McKeown

inspire.quote: Teach us delight in simple things, and mirth that has no bitter springs
inspire.author: Rudyard Kipling

inspire.quote: Pride divides the men, humility joins them
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: Pride makes us artificial and humility makes us real
inspire.author: Thomas Merton

inspire.quote: A great man is always willing to be little
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: True humility is contentment
inspire.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

inspire.quote: Be silent as to services you have rendered, but speak of favours you have received
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: The higher we are placed, the more humbly we should walk
inspire.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

inspire.quote: No truly great person ever thought themselves so
inspire.author: William Hazlitt

inspire.quote: Serenity, regularity, absence of vanity, sincerity, simplicity, veracity, equanimity, Fixity, non-irritability, adaptability, Humility, tenacity, integrity, nobility, magnanimity, charity, generosity, purity. Practise daily these eighteen "ities" You will soon attain immortality
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: My religion consists of a humble admiration of the illimitable superior spirit who reveals himself in the slight details we are able to perceive with our frail and feeble mind
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: He that places himself neither higher nor lower than he ought to do exercises the truest humility
inspire.author: Charles Caleb Colton

inspire.quote: Be modest, humble, simple. Control your anger
inspire.author: Abraham Cahan

inspire.quote: Forget popularity. Just do your thing with passion, humility and honesty
inspire.author: Marc and Angel

inspire.quote: I believe the first test of a truly great man is in his humility
inspire.author: John Ruskin

inspire.quote: The only way you will advance spiritually is through humility
inspire.author: Frederick Lenz

inspire.quote: When there’s nothing but humility, there’s nothing but spiritual oneness
inspire.author: Frederick Lenz

inspire.quote: Pride is concerned with who is right. Humility is concerned with what is right
inspire.author: Ezra Taft Benson

inspire.quote: Learn to laugh at yourselves as one must laugh!
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: Greatness of spirit is accompanied by simplicity and sincerity
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: Think 8 hours, work 2 hours
inspire.author: Mirko Ilic

inspire.quote: Design means being good, not just looking good
inspire.author: Clement Mok

inspire.quote: We adore chaos because we love to produce order. M. C
inspire.author: Escher

inspire.quote: Simple is hard. Easy is harder. Invisible is hardest
inspire.author: Jean-Louis Gassée

inspire.quote: Order and simplification are the first steps toward the mastery of a subject
inspire.author: Thomas Mann

inspire.quote: Clutter and confusion are failures of design, not attributes of information
inspire.author: Edward Tufte

inspire.quote: Simplicity is not the goal. It is the by-product of a good idea and modest expectations
inspire.author: Paul Rand

inspire.quote: In order to be a good gatekeeper, you have to think of your house as sacred space, not storage space
inspire.author: Francine Jay (Miss Minimalist)

inspire.quote: The problem: we put more value on our stuff than on our space
inspire.author: Francine Jay (Miss Minimalist)

inspire.quote: I live lightly and gracefully, with only the objects I find functional or beautiful
inspire.author: Francine Jay (Miss Minimalist)

inspire.quote: Rather than cluttering up your home, stealing your time, and draining your wallet, the stuff in your life should serve a purpose and make you happy. If that isn’t the case, then your stuff owns you
inspire.author: Tammy Strobel

inspire.quote: Almost all quality improvement comes via simplification of design, manufacturing, layout, processes, and procedures
inspire.author: Tom Peters

inspire.quote: We must have order, allocating to each thing its proper place and giving to each thing is due according to its nature
inspire.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

inspire.quote: The architect should strive continually to simplify; the ensemble of the rooms should then be carefully considered that comfort and utility may go hand in hand with beauty
inspire.author: Bruce Lee

inspire.quote: A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away
inspire.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

inspire.quote: Have nothing in your houses that you do not know to be useful, or believe to be beautiful
inspire.author: William Morris

inspire.quote: One can furnish a room very luxuriously by taking out furniture rather than putting it in
inspire.author: Francis Jourdain

inspire.quote: Design is the conscious effort to impose a meaningful order
inspire.author: Victor Papanek

inspire.quote: I feel that my environment reflects my belief in the grace and art and elegance of living simply
inspire.author: bell hooks

inspire.quote: Architecture has the power to create order out of unholy confusion
inspire.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

inspire.quote: Less is more
inspire.author: Ludwig Mies van der Rohe

inspire.quote: Good design means as little design as possible
inspire.author: Dieter Rams

inspire.quote: Elegance is refusal
inspire.author: Coco Chanel

inspire.quote: Simplicity, carried to an an extreme, becomes elegance
inspire.author: Jon Franklin

inspire.quote: Only great minds can afford a simple style
inspire.author: Stendhal

inspire.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don’t need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: Beauty of style and harmony and grace and good rhythm depend on simplicity
inspire.author: Plato

inspire.quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: Sometimes people are beautiful, not in looks, not in what they say, just in what they are
inspire.author: Markus Zusak

inspire.quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy
inspire.author: Anne Frank

inspire.quote: Anyone who keeps the ability to see beauty never grows old
inspire.author: Franz Kafka

inspire.quote: True elegance for me is the manifestation of an independent mind
inspire.author: Isabella Rossellini

inspire.quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful
inspire.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

inspire.quote: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Elegance is achieved when all that is superfluous has been discarded and the human being discovers simplicity and concentration: the simpler and more sober the posture, the more beautiful it will be
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Elegance is elimination
inspire.author: Cristobal Balenciaga

inspire.quote: Peace is the beauty of life. It is sunshine. It is the smile of a child, the love of a mother, the joy of a father, the togetherness of a family. It is the advancement of man, the victory of a just cause, the triumph of truth
inspire.author: Menachem Begin

inspire.quote: Adornment, what a science! Beauty, what a weapon! Modesty, what elegance!
inspire.author: Coco Chanel

inspire.quote: Elegance means appreciating things as they are. There is a sense of delight and of fearlessness
inspire.author: Chogyam Trungpa

inspire.quote: I think happiness is what makes you pretty. Period. Happy people are beautiful. They become like a mirror and they reflect that happiness
inspire.author: Drew Barrymore

inspire.quote: The sculptor produces the beautiful statue by chipping away such parts of the marble block as are not needed — it is a process of elimination
inspire.author: Elbert Hubbard

inspire.quote: A person with taste is merely one who can recognize the greatest beauty in the simplest things
inspire.author: Barbara Taylor Bradford

inspire.quote: You are imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. And you are beautiful
inspire.author: Amy Bloom

inspire.quote: Real elegance is simply a true encounter with oneself
inspire.author: Carole Bouquet

inspire.quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword
inspire.author: John Ray

inspire.quote: There is beauty, heartbreaking beauty, everywhere
inspire.author: Edward Abbey

inspire.quote: True contentment is not about acquiring more, but being satisfied with greater simplicity and fulfilled by what you already have. Carley Hauck https://www.mindful
inspire.author: org

inspire.quote: Slowly cut things out until you’re left only with what you love, with what’s necessary, with what makes you happy. Leo Babauta https://zenhabits
inspire.author: net/

inspire.quote: The first step in crafting a life you want is to get rid of everything you don’t. Joshua Becker https://www.becomingminimalist
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: Imagine a life with less. Less stuff, less clutter, less stress and debt and discontent. Ryan Nicodemus https://www.theminimalists
inspire.author: com/nicodemus/

inspire.quote: Forget sale price. Everything is 100% off when you don’t buy it. Joshua Fields Millburn https://www.theminimalists
inspire.author: com/millburn/

inspire.quote: If you don’t have time to do what matters, stop doing things that don’t. Courtney Carver https://bemorewithless
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: More was never the answer. The answer, it turned out, was always less. Cait Flanders https://caitflanders
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: Slow down. You move too fast. Jacki Hollywood Brown https://unclutterer
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: If we don’t know what to get each other for gifts – maybe we shouldn’t exchange gifts? Rachel http://www.theminimalistmom
inspire.author: com

inspire.quote: "No" is a complete sentence. Anne Lamott (wisdomquotes.com loves this one 🙂 ) https://twitter.com/annelamott https://www.facebook
inspire.author: com/AnneLamott/

inspire.quote: Simple living doesn’t solve all my problems, it just removes distractions. Melissa Camara Wilkins https://melissacamarawilkins
inspire.author: com

inspire.quote: Without grace, minimalism is another metric for perfection. Erin Loechner http://designformankind
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: When life is crazy, it’s time to empty your plate. Alysa Bajenaru http://inspiredrd
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: At some point I realized that I wasn’t organizing my life; I was organizing my clutter. Francine Jay http://www.missminimalist
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: When things get tough, come back to the simple. Practising Simplicity http://www.practisingsimplicity
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: By becoming a little more present and mindful you’ll probably make less mistakes, and feel less stressed out too. The Mindfulness Project https://www.londonmindful
inspire.author: com/blog

inspire.quote: Shedding unnecessary stuff and commitments will free up space in your life for abundance of the best kind. Evelyn http://smallishblog
inspire.author: com

inspire.quote: We gave away most of our belongings. Interestingly, the more we gave away, the better we felt. Tammy Strobel, https://www.rowdykittens
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: The more intentional you are in your choices, the more every change makes room for more changes I just love that there’s this endless potential. Dee Williams, https://padtinyhouses
inspire.author: com/dee-williams/

inspire.quote: The things you wear don’t make you beautiful; they accentuate the beauty that’s already there. Colin Wright, http://exilelifestyle
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: 99 percent of what stressed you out today won’t matter a month from now. Marc and Angel http://www.marcandangel
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: You need time to think, time to dream, time to talk and time to do nothing at all. Brooke McAlary, https://slowyourhome
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: Intentional living and spending leads to more money and freedom. Anthony Ongaro https://www.breakthetwitch
inspire.author: com/

inspire.quote: Possessions, outward success, publicity, luxury – to me these have always been contemptible. I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best for both the body and the mind
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Every next level of your life will demand a different you
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes
inspire.author: Carl Jung

inspire.quote: The scariest moment is always just before you start
inspire.author: Stephen King

inspire.quote: The wisest men follow their own direction
inspire.author: Euripides

inspire.quote: Little by little, one travels far. J. R. R
inspire.author: Tolkien

inspire.quote: I exist as I am, that is enough
inspire.author: Walt Whitman

inspire.quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: Great things never came from comfort zones
inspire.author: Neil Strauss

inspire.quote: Paths are made by walking
inspire.author: Franz Kafka

inspire.quote: Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Learn to sell. Learn to build. If you can do both, you will be unstoppable
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: From error to error one discovers the entire truth
inspire.author: Sigmund Freud

inspire.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: Learn to be calm and you will always be happy
inspire.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

inspire.quote: It will be the toughest thing you’ll ever do, but your heart is never wrong
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: An ounce of action is worth a ton of theory
inspire.author: Friedrich Engels

inspire.quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune
inspire.author: Miguel de Cervantes

inspire.quote: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Say no to instant gratification so you can say yes to massive long-term gains
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: You are the person you have been waiting for
inspire.author: Joe Dispenza

inspire.quote: Begin now to be what you will be hereafter
inspire.author: Saint Jerome

inspire.quote: Everything is possible. The impossible just takes longer
inspire.author: Dan Brown

inspire.quote: The brain is wider than the sky
inspire.author: Emily Dickinson

inspire.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference
inspire.author: Robert Frost

inspire.quote: If you are free, you need to free somebody else. If you have some power, then your job is to empower somebody else
inspire.author: Toni Morrison

inspire.quote: Listen, smile, agree, and then do whatever the fuck you were doing to do anyway
inspire.author: Robert Downey Jr

inspire.quote: Individuals search for truth, groups search for consensus
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper. W.B
inspire.author: Yeats

inspire.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: I have the choice of being constantly active and happy or introspectively passive and sad. Or I can go mad by ricocheting in between
inspire.author: Sylvia Plath

inspire.quote: When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things
inspire.author: Joe Namath

inspire.quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self
inspire.author: Ernest Hemingway

inspire.quote: If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary
inspire.author: Jim Rohn

inspire.quote: Understand: you are one of a kind. Your character traits are a kind of chemical mix that will never be repeated in history. There are ideas unique to you, a specific rhythm and perspective that are your strengths, not your weaknesses. You must not be afraid of your uniqueness
inspire.author: Robert Greene

inspire.quote: If you’re willing to bleed a little every day, you may win big later
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: Extreme people get extreme results
inspire.author: Sam Altman

inspire.quote: We have to do the best we are capable of. This is our sacred human responsibility
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Take your time, play the long game, embrace the boring, the difficulties, the uncomfortable. This is how it will happen
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Great things are not accomplished by those who yield to trends and fads and popular opinion
inspire.author: Jack Kerouac

inspire.quote: Adversity reveals genius, prosperity conceals it
inspire.author: Horace

inspire.quote: I would rather be a superb meteor, every atom of me in magnificent glow, than a sleepy and permanent planet
inspire.author: Jack London

inspire.quote: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat. F
inspire.author: Scott Fitzgerald

inspire.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it
inspire.author: Helen Keller

inspire.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started
inspire.author: Mark Twain

inspire.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better
inspire.author: Samuel Beckett

inspire.quote: A ship is always safe a shore but that is not what it’s built for
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. As with all matters of the heart, you’ll know when you find it
inspire.author: Steve Jobs

inspire.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you
inspire.author: Jesus Christ

inspire.quote: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars
inspire.author: Les Brown

inspire.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later
inspire.author: Og Mandino

inspire.quote: You will become as small as your controlling desire; as great as your dominant aspiration
inspire.author: James Allen

inspire.quote: When you know what you want, and want it bad enough, you will find a way to get it
inspire.author: Jim Rohn

inspire.quote: If you don’t know where you are going, you will probably end up somewhere else. Laurence J
inspire.author: Peter

inspire.quote: Don’t let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do
inspire.author: John Wooden

inspire.quote: If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: You don’t need to see the whole staircase, just take the first step
inspire.author: Martin Luther King Jr

inspire.quote: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd
inspire.author: Miguel de Cervantes

inspire.quote: All for one and one for all
inspire.author: Alexandre Dumas

inspire.quote: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: Whether you believe you can do a thing or not, you are right
inspire.author: Henry Ford

inspire.quote: You have to risk going too far to discover just how far you can really go
inspire.author: Jim Rohn

inspire.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how
inspire.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

inspire.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken
inspire.author: Oscar Wilde

inspire.quote: You make your own luck if you stay at it long enough
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: If you can imagine it, we can make it
inspire.author: John Dykstra

inspire.quote: Either get busy living or get busy dying
inspire.author: Stephen King

inspire.quote: Seek truth, not comfort
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Pain or love or danger makes you real again
inspire.author: Jack Kerouac

inspire.quote: Begin, be bold and venture to be wise
inspire.author: Horace

inspire.quote: We are our choices
inspire.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

inspire.quote: A goal should scare you a little and excite you a lot
inspire.author: Joe Vitale

inspire.quote: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now
inspire.author: Napoleon Hill

inspire.quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go. T.S
inspire.author: Eliot

inspire.quote: You can be happy where you are
inspire.author: Joel Osteen

inspire.quote: You change the world by being yourself
inspire.author: Yoko Ono

inspire.quote: They can because they think they can
inspire.author: Virgil

inspire.quote: Fortune sides with him who dares
inspire.author: Virgil

inspire.quote: Resist much, obey little
inspire.author: Walt Whitman

inspire.quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears
inspire.author: Albert Camus

inspire.quote: Live, travel, adventure, bless, and don’t be sorry
inspire.author: Jack Kerouac

inspire.quote: And your very flesh shall be a great poem
inspire.author: Walt Whitman

inspire.quote: Our true nationality is mankind. H. G
inspire.author: Wells

inspire.quote: My message to you is simple, keep believing, keep marching, keep building, keep raising your voice
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: Feet, what do I need them for if I have wings to fly
inspire.author: Frida Kahlo

inspire.quote: The easiest way to change the world is to change yourself
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Never let the odds keep you from doing what you know in your heart you were meant to do. H
inspire.author: Jackson Brown Jr

inspire.quote: Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit. E.E
inspire.author: Cummings

inspire.quote: I want to stay as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can’t see from the center
inspire.author: Kurt Vonnegut

inspire.quote: If you take risks and face your fate with dignity, there is nothing you can do that makes you small; if you don’t take risks, there is nothing you can do that makes you grand, nothing
inspire.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

inspire.quote: We did not come to fear the future. We came here to shape it
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: At the end of the day it’s not about what you have or even what you’ve accomplished… it’s about who you’ve lifted up, who you’ve made better, it’s about what you’ve given back
inspire.author: Denzel Washington

inspire.quote: Act enthusiastic and you will be enthusiastic
inspire.author: Dale Carnegie (See also: uplifting quotes)

inspire.quote: Magic is believing in yourself, if you can do that, you can make anything happen
inspire.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

inspire.quote: I believe that man will not merely endure; he will prevail
inspire.author: William Faulkner

inspire.quote: We don’t rise to the level of our expectations. We fall to the level of our training
inspire.author: Archilochus

inspire.quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is: infinite
inspire.author: William Blake

inspire.quote: I took a deep breath and listened to the old brag of my heart. I am, I am, I am
inspire.author: Sylvia Plath

inspire.quote: You will find poetry nowhere unless you bring some of it with you
inspire.author: Joseph Joubert

inspire.quote: And above all, watch with glittering eyes the whole world around you because the greatest secrets are always hidden in the most unlikely places. Those who don’t believe in magic will never find it
inspire.author: Roald Dahl

inspire.quote: The mind is like an iceberg, it floats with one-seventh of its bulk above water
inspire.author: Sigmund Freud

inspire.quote: Build a man a fire, and he’ll be warm for a day. Set a man on fire, and he’ll be warm for the rest of his life
inspire.author: Terry Pratchett

inspire.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new lands but seeing with new eyes
inspire.author: Marcel Proust

inspire.quote: Abandon yourself to the moment, and you will find every day new openings, new light, new insight. And those new insights will go on changing you. One day, suddenly you will see you are each moment new
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: You have to be able to tolerate what you don’t necessarily like so you can be free
inspire.author: Larry Flynt

inspire.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness
inspire.author: John Steinbeck

inspire.quote: Someday, somehow, this will all make sense
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: Better to have, and not need, than to need, and not have
inspire.author: Franz Kafka

inspire.quote: You are free, and that is why you are lost
inspire.author: Franz Kafka

inspire.quote: From a certain point onward there is no longer any turning back. That is the point that must be reached
inspire.author: Franz Kafka

inspire.quote: Don’t fight the pain. Accept it, understand it, live it. If you seek pleasure instead you avoid learning
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: You have as much laughter as you have faith
inspire.author: Martin Luther

inspire.quote: We shall not cease from exploration. And the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time. T.S
inspire.author: Eliot

inspire.quote: Rise to the level of your ideals, not the average of your environment
inspire.author: @TheStoicEmperor

inspire.quote: There is no great genius without a mixture of madness
inspire.author: Aristotle

inspire.quote: What we call the beginning is often the end. And to make an end is to make a beginning. The end is where we start from. T.S
inspire.author: Eliot

inspire.quote: To find yourself, think for yourself
inspire.author: Socrates

inspire.quote: Cynicism is easy. Mimicry is easy. Optimistic contrarians are the rarest breed
inspire.author: Naval Ravikant

inspire.quote: We are here to laugh at the odds and live our lives so well that Death will tremble to take us
inspire.author: Charles Bukowski

inspire.quote: Unless you believe, you will not understand
inspire.author: Augustine of Hippo

inspire.quote: You will always find an answer in the sound of water
inspire.author: Zhuangzi

inspire.quote: Anything I come across that feels impossible, I probably need to take a second look
inspire.author: Joe Gebbia (Co-founder AirBnb)

inspire.quote: Every word is like an unnecessary stain on silence and nothingness
inspire.author: Samuel Beckett

inspire.quote: The less effort, the faster and more powerful you will be
inspire.author: Bruce Lee (See also: powerful quotes)

inspire.quote: Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again. C.S
inspire.author: Lewis

inspire.quote: Goodness makes greatness truly valuable, and greatness make goodness much more serviceable
inspire.author: Matthew Henry

inspire.quote: You must realize that one day you will die. Until then you are worthless
inspire.author: Chuck Palahniuk

inspire.quote: Some people never go crazy. What truly horrible lives they must lead
inspire.author: Charles Bukowski

inspire.quote: Do not think you will necessarily be aware of your own enlightenment
inspire.author: Dogen

inspire.quote: Do not judge, and you will never be mistaken
inspire.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

inspire.quote: Do not ask for what you will wish you had not got
inspire.author: Seneca

inspire.quote: If you suddenly stumble upon the right door, you will not be able to recognize that it is right
inspire.author: Osho

inspire.quote: You have to die a few times before you can really live
inspire.author: Charles Bukowski

inspire.quote: Live so that you can at least get the benefit of the doubt
inspire.author: Kin Hubbard

inspire.quote: You have to be odd to be number one. Dr
inspire.author: Seuss

inspire.quote: I do not believe in taking the right decision, I take a decision and make it right
inspire.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

inspire.quote: The more you know yourself, the less you have something to prove, the more you can relax
inspire.author: Maxime Lagacé

inspire.quote: If you think, then you will be prepared. If you are prepared, then you will have no worries
inspire.author: Li Ka Shing

inspire.quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger
inspire.author: Buddha

inspire.quote: The most important things are the hardest to say, because words diminish them
inspire.author: Stephen King

inspire.quote: Do not speak of your happiness to one less fortunate than yourself
inspire.author: Plutarch

inspire.quote: Know how to listen, and you will profit even from those who talk badly
inspire.author: Plutarch

inspire.quote: If you make friends with yourself you will never be alone
inspire.author: Maxwell Maltz

inspire.quote: Genius might be the ability to say a profound thing in a simple way
inspire.author: Charles Bukowski

inspire.quote: Truth, and goodness, and beauty are but different faces of the same all
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: Nothing is so firmly believed as that which we least know
inspire.author: Michel de Montaigne

inspire.quote: Think like a wise man but communicate in the language of the people. W.B
inspire.author: Yeats

inspire.quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be
inspire.author: Kurt Vonnegut

inspire.quote: A harmful truth is better than a useful lie
inspire.author: Thomas Mann

inspire.quote: Please all, and you will please none
inspire.author: Aesop

inspire.quote: One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful
inspire.author: Sigmund Freud

inspire.quote: Hating skin color is contempt for God's divine creative imagination. Honoring it is appreciation for conscious, beautiful-love-inspired diversity.
inspire.author: T.F. Hodge

inspire.quote: You have to find your own shtick. A Picasso always looks like Picasso painted it. Hemingway always sounds like Hemingway. A Beethoven symphony always sounds like a Beethoven symphony. Part of being a master is learning how to sing in nobody else's voice but your own.
inspire.author: Hugh MacLeod

inspire.quote: You need to trustTo surrenderTo ask for guidanceGo within for the answersThey're within youYou have the answersAll you need do is ask
inspire.author: Karen Hackel

inspire.quote: To die,so young to die.No, no, not I,I love the warm sunny skies,light, song, shining eyes,I want no war, no battle cry,No, no, not I.
inspire.author: Hannah Senesh

inspire.quote: Mindfulness, also called wise attention, helps us see what we’re adding to our experiences, not only during meditation sessions but also elsewhere.
inspire.author: Sharon Salzberg

inspire.quote: Writing is the thing that props me up.
inspire.author: Horton Foote

inspire.quote: When you enter a grove peopled with ancient trees, higher than the ordinary, and shutting out the sky with their thickly inter-twined branches, do not the stately shadows of the wood, the stillness of the place, and the awful gloom of this doomed cavern then strike you with the presence of a deity?
inspire.author: Seneca the Elder

inspire.quote: Four times during the first six days they were assembled and briefed and then sent back. Once, they took off and were flying in formation when the control tower summoned them down. The more it rained, the worse they suffered. The worse they suffered, the more they prayed that it would continue raining. All through the night, men looked at the sky and were saddened by the stars. All through the day, they looked at the bomb line on the big, wobbling easel map of Italy that blew over in the wind and was dragged in under the awning of the intelligence tent every time the rain began. The bomb line was a scarlet band of narrow satin ribbon that delineated the forward most position of the Allied ground forces in every sector of the Italian mainland.For hours they stared relentlessly at the scarlet ribbon on the map and hated it because it would not move up high enough to encompass the city.When night fell, they congregated in the darkness with flashlights, continuing their macabre vigil at the bomb line in brooding entreaty as though hoping to move the ribbon up by the collective weight of their sullen prayers. "I really can't believe it," Clevinger exclaimed to Yossarian in a voice rising and falling in protest and wonder. "It's a complete reversion to primitive superstition. They're confusing cause and effect. It makes as much sense as knocking on wood or crossing your fingers. They really believe that we wouldn't have to fly that mission tomorrow if someone would only tiptoe up to the map in the middle of the night and move the bomb line over Bologna. Can you imagine? You and I must be the only rational ones left."In the middle of the night Yossarian knocked on wood, crossed his fingers, and tiptoed out of his tent to move the bomb line up over Bologna.
inspire.author: Joseph Heller

inspire.quote: People will find transformation and transcendence in a McDonald's hash brown if it's all they've got.
inspire.author: Patton Oswalt

inspire.quote: I learned long ago that when change comes, you gotta slow down and take note of it. In the midst of that change is all the possibility in the world.
inspire.author: Bertice Berry

inspire.quote: Getting carried away is stupid, it won't get me anywhere.-Nana Komatsu
inspire.author: Ai Yazawa

inspire.quote: ليس الخلاص عندي في رفض الحياه ,فاني لأحس ضمه الحريه في عشرات المئات من قيود الملذات ,كلا..لن اغلق حواسي , ان مباهج النظر, والسمع واللمس ستحمل دائما طابع النعيم الاكبر , اجل ان كل اوهامي ستتقد لتكون انوارا في مهرجان الافراح وستنضج كل اشواقي لتكون ثمارا في ربيع الحب وهو موقف ايجابي من الحياه والطبيعه.
inspire.author: رابندرات طاغور

inspire.quote: Anguish is the universal language
inspire.author: Alice Fulton

inspire.quote: Stories are the collective wisdom of everyone who has ever lived. Your job as a storyteller is not simply to entertain. Nor is it to be noticed for the way you turn a phrase. You have a very important job--one of the most important. Your job is to let people know that everyone shares their feelings--and that these feelings bind us. Your job is a healing art, and like all healers, you have a responsibility. Let people know they are not alone. You must make people understand that we are all the same.
inspire.author: Brian  McDonald

inspire.quote: we tend to steer our lives in the direction of the lessons we need to learn
inspire.author: Don Campbell
