Gold has not the fragrance of a flower. So different persons have various modes of excellence, and we must have an eye to all.
inspire.author: William Wilberforce

inspire.quote: The writer's only responsibility is to his art. He will be completely ruthless if he is a good one. He has a dream. It anguishes him so much he must get rid of it. He has no peace until then. Everything goes by the board: honor, pride, decency, security, happiness, all, to get the book written. If a writer has to rob his mother, he will not hesitate; the 'Ode on a Grecian Urn' is worth any number of old ladies.
inspire.author: William Faulkner

inspire.quote: Talent without discipline is like an octopus on roller skates. There's plenty of movement, but you never know if it's going to be forward, backwards, or sideways.
inspire.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

inspire.quote: A healer's power stems not from any special ability, but from maintaining the courage and awareness to embody and express the universal healing power that every human being naturally possesses.
inspire.author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

inspire.quote: Man is a spiritual being, a soul, and at some period of his life everyone is possessed with an irresistible desire to know his relationship to the Infinite. . . . There is something within him which urges him to rise above himself, to control his environment, to master the body and all things physical and live in a higher and more beautiful world.
inspire.author: David O. McKay

inspire.quote: Be like a postage stamp. Stick to it until you get there
inspire.author: Bob Proctor

inspire.quote: He ran as he'd never run before, with neither hope nor despair. He ran because the world was divided into opposites and his side had already been chosen for him, his only choice being whether or not to play his part with heart and courage. He ran because fate had placed him in a position of responsibility and he had accepted the burden. He ran because his self-respect required it. He ran because he loved his friends and this was the only thing he could do to end the madness that was killing and maiming them.
inspire.author: Karl Marlantes

inspire.quote: You got to realize; you're the Devil as much as you're God.
inspire.author: Charles Manson

inspire.quote: Every day is a journey filled with twists and turns. Every day, if you smile, you will feel alive, my son.
inspire.author: Santosh Kalwar

inspire.quote: Life is a mystery, and it should be so, for the sorrow that accompanies being human and the choices one will have to make are a burden, too heavy for most to know before their time comes.
inspire.author: Alice Hoffman

inspire.quote: Everyone wants a prodigy to fail; it makes our mediocrity more bearable.
inspire.author: Harold Bloom

inspire.quote: Resources are hired to give results, not reasons.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: When we are aware of our weaknesses or negative tendencies, we open the opportunity to work on them.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: Believe in yourself, your abilities and your own potential. Never let self-doubt hold you captive. You are worthy of all that you dream of and hope for.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: There is only one all pervading God. It has only one message - Love all, encompass all and transcend the limits of the selfish gene.
inspire.author: Amit Ray

inspire.quote: God existed before every religion; He exists in spite of all religions.
inspire.author: Danail Hristov

inspire.quote: It is only by risking our persons from one hour to another that we live at all.
inspire.author: William James

inspire.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart, so better things can fall together.
inspire.author: Marylin Monroe

inspire.quote: For every moment of triumph, for every instance of beauty, many souls must be trampled.
inspire.author: Hunter S. Thompson

inspire.quote: We all pay for life with death, so everything in between should be free.
inspire.author: Bill Hicks

inspire.quote: A bridge of silver wings stretches from the dead ashes of an unforgiving nightmareto the jeweled vision of a life started anew.
inspire.author: Aberjhani

inspire.quote: The person who tries to live alone will not succeed as a human being. His heart withers if it does not answer another heart. His mind shrinks away if he hears only the echoes of his own thoughts and finds no other inspiration.
inspire.author: Pearl S. Buck

inspire.quote: repeat after me:you oweno oneyour forgiveness. - except maybe yourself.
inspire.author: Amanda Lovelace

inspire.quote: Don't blow off another's candle for it won't make yours shine brighter.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: I want to be the best version of myself for anyone who is going to someday walk into my life and need someone to love them beyond reason.
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: The moment a little boy is concerned with which is a jay and which is a sparrow, he can no longer see the birds or hear them sing.
inspire.author: Eric Berne

inspire.quote: A man's work is nothing but this slow trek to rediscover, through the detours of art, those two or three great and simple images in whose presence his heart first opened.
inspire.author: Albert Camus

inspire.quote: Whining is not only graceless, but can be dangerous. It can alert a brute that a victim is in the neighborhood.
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: You can have everything you want if you can put your heart and soul into everything you do.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Be an Encourager: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Love is forgiving, accepting, moving on, embracing, and all encompassing. And if you’re not doing that for yourself, you cannot do that with anyone else.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: No matter how much experience you have, there’s always something new you can learn and room for improvement.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: A book is a device to ignite the imagination.
inspire.author: Alan Bennett

inspire.quote: It had been startling and disappointing to me to find out that story books had been written by people, that books were not natural wonders, coming up of themselves like grass. Yet regardless of where they come from, I cannot remember a time when I was not in love with them -- with the books themselves, cover and binding and the paper they were printed on, with their smell and their weight and with their possession in my arms, captured and carried off to myself. Still illiterate, I was ready for them, committed to all the reading I could give them ...
inspire.author: Eudora Welty

inspire.quote: You're better than this. Better than whatever it is you're going to do now.
inspire.author: Richelle Mead

inspire.quote: Happy is the man who has broken the chains which hurt the mind, and has given up worrying once and for all."Be patient and tough; one day this pain will be useful to you.
inspire.author: Ovid

inspire.quote: Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Writing is something that you don't know how to do. You sit down and it's something that happens, or it may not happen. So, how can you teach anybody how to write? It's beyond me, because you yourself don't even know if you're going to be able to. I'm always worried, well, you know, every time I go upstairs with my wine bottle. Sometimes I'll sit at that typewriter for fifteen minutes, you know. I don't go up there to write. The typewriter's up there. If it doesn't start moving, I say, well this could be the night that I hit the dust.
inspire.author: Charles Bukowski

inspire.quote: I stay cool, and dig all jive,That's the way I stay alive.My motto, as I live and learn, isDig and be dugIn return.
inspire.author: Langston Hughes

inspire.quote: To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Your Life Is Happening Right Now: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Be careful the stories you're telling yourself about your current circumstances; a head full of negative thoughts has no space for positive ones.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens. That's how change occurs.
inspire.author: Jillian Michaels

inspire.quote: Reading is like travel, allowing you to exit your own life for a bit, and to come back with a renewed, even inspired, perspective.
inspire.author: Laurie Helgoe

inspire.quote: And now that its ruby eyes are set into the gold, you cannot see their tear-shape, so they seem to be laughing rather than crying. It is a constant reminder to me of the human ability to create something beautiful even when things are at the darkest.
inspire.author: Cressida Cowell

inspire.quote: When love dies, the heart's ashes do not leave on the wind—they rest on the mantelpiece of the soul, darkening the sunrise we once saw to be beautiful.
inspire.author: A. M. Hudson

inspire.quote: Bad luck with women is a determined man's road to success. For every affliction, he makes, out of indignation, yet another advancement in order to exceed the man that the woman chose over him. This goes to show that great men are made great because they once learned how to fight the feeling of rejection.
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: That's why it's called a practice. We have to practice a practice if it is to be of value.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: Love, as life, is a journey. Finding true love for the ever after is an amazing achievement.
inspire.author: Fadi Hattendorf

inspire.quote: You have a masterpiece inside you, you know. One unlike any that has ever been created, or ever will be. If you go to your grave without painting your masterpiece, it will not get painted. No one else can paint it. Only you.
inspire.author: Gordon MacKenzie

inspire.quote: And life is a good thing for a writer. It's where we get our raw material, for a start. We quite like to stop and watch it.
inspire.author: Neil Gaiman

inspire.quote: What is more precious: a thousand answers derived from one question? Or, one answer…from a thousand questions?
inspire.author: G. F. Smith

inspire.quote: Do not empower your negative thoughts by giving them "legs" so they can run around your mind, creating worries,frustrations, and anxiety in your life.
inspire.author: Rodolfo Costa

inspire.quote: The only difference between a grown-up's mistake and a child's is the size of the consequence.
inspire.author: Teresa R. Funke

inspire.quote: Most of us who turn to any subject with love remember some morning or evening hour when we got on a high stool to reach down an untried volume, or sat with parted lips listening to a new talker, or for very lack of books began to listen to the voices within, as the first traceable beginning of our love.
inspire.author: George Eliot

inspire.quote: When you face a new challenge, remember the skills, talent, guts and resources that got you through before.
inspire.author: Lynn A. Robinson

inspire.quote: Sometimes you must stand still in order to get moving to where GOD wants you to go.
inspire.author: D. A. MC Bride

inspire.quote: Anybody with leisure can do that who is willing to begin where everything ought to be begun--that is, at the beginning. Nothing worth calling good can or ever will be started full grown. The essential of any good is life, and the very body of created life, and essential to it, being its self operant, is growth. The larger start you make, the less room you leave for life to extend itself. You fill with the dead matter of your construction the places where assimilation ought to have its perfect work, building by a life-process, self-extending, and subserving the whole. Small beginnings with slow growings have time to root themselves thoroughly--I do not mean in place nor yet in social regard, but in wisdom. Such even prosper by failures, for their failures are not too great to be rectified without injury to the original idea.
inspire.author: George MacDonald

inspire.quote: We have a right to decide how we want our bodies to look and feel, but unfortunately we do not exercise these rights. Instead, we tend to drift along, victims of our own ignorance of the fact that we can have what we want, if we are willing to take that first step toward developing the self-discipline to govern our thoughts.
inspire.author: Holly Mosier

inspire.quote: We co-create our reality with others in unseen ways.
inspire.author: Doug Dillon

inspire.quote: God doesn't like it when we ask Him for the smallest things, dare to make your dream so big that He can conveniently fit into it and make your dream come true.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: Satisfaction in life doesn't jump on you, you work for it, you earn it. You will not sit in a place, fold your hands and expect to be satisfied with life.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: What have you gained since you haven't prayed? What will you lose if you pray?
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: We all have issues & we have usually come by them honestly.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: But that initial, comet-blazing-across-the-sky, Big Idea is only the beginning. Each book is composed of a mosaic of thousands of little ideas, ideas that invariably come to me at two in the morning when my alarm is set for seven.
inspire.author: Lauren Willig

inspire.quote: Paranormal events are just edges of the infinite we "happen" to encounter.
inspire.author: Doug Dillon

inspire.quote: There's always that song that brings you back to the past. That makes you pause in the middle of what you're doing just so you could hear it clearly. The words bringing you back to a time that seemed nearly impossible, the words making you think for one moment that time itself has actually stopped. And there's nothing but you & perfect melody that brings you one step closer to what used to be.
inspire.author: Kira Jeffries

inspire.quote: Extend your "best before" date by living a youthful life.
inspire.author: Lorii Myers

inspire.quote: Cultivate plants which attract lovely company.
inspire.author: Kathryn  Hall

inspire.quote: Life is real, and you canot live a lie.
inspire.author: Andrew-Knox B Kaniki

inspire.quote: In this world, people actually don't live a life for themselves but usually live a life for someone they love.
inspire.author: Vinayak

inspire.quote: It’s never been easier for audiences to skip, filter, or avoid advertising, so the best ideas are the ones that respect that the audience needs to get something out of the work; it should inspire, satisfy, or motivate them. You can’t just bombard people with messages anymore.
inspire.author: Ajaz Ahmed

inspire.quote: Don’t be afraid to stand tall in YOUR truth! Boldly and confidently face everything that has, and is, keeping you bound. Fight for your inner peace! Fight for your happiness! Fight for everything and everybody that’s important to you! You are NOT a victim! Don’t even play into that. You owe it to yourself to LIVE! Live your life without the regrets, without the resentments, without the unforgiveness, without the blame game, without the self-pity, without any and everything that keeps you from experiencing true joy within! You are too important to waste your life away! Learn to appreciate and value your life, but most importantly, learn to appreciate and value yourself! You count too, no matter what you’ve done!
inspire.author: Stephanie Lahart

inspire.quote: Momentum builds success.
inspire.author: Suzy Kassem

inspire.quote: But can one actually see beauty with eyes blurred by the lack of almost everything a human being needs?
inspire.author: Paulo Lins

inspire.quote: Opposition can be your friend. Opposition can be the fire that tempers the better sword, as well as the ice that cools a fiery temper. Don't ever run from it; learn from it!
inspire.author: Jack R. Rose

inspire.quote: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, focus your energy on what you can create.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Don't let your emotions get in the way of rational decision making.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Believe, my child. Faith is the food of survival.
inspire.author: Tobsha Learner

inspire.quote: Arithmetic is the death of story.
inspire.author: Jincy Willett

inspire.quote: There's a kid or some kids somewhere. I'll never know them. They're particle-puzzle-cubing right now. They might be mini-misanthropes from Moosefart, Montana. They might be demi-dystopians from Dogdick, Delaware. They dig my demonic dramas. The metaphysic maims them. They grasp the gravity. They'll duke it out with their demons. They'll serve a surfeit of survival skills. They won't be chronologically crucified.They'll shore up my shit. They'll radically revise it. They'll pass it along.
inspire.author: James Ellroy

inspire.quote: When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference… You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your concern, your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Isn't it amazing how we always have to put our mark on things? And how, from the natural world, we find evidence over and over again that reminds us, not so much of the birds, but of our own stories and our own kinds of art?
inspire.author: Rosamond Purcell

inspire.quote: I only wish the NRA and its jellyfish, well-paid supporters in legislatures both State and Federal would be careful to recite the whole of it, and then tell us how a heavily armed man, woman, or child, recruited by no official, led by no official, given no goals by any official, motivated or restrained only by his or her personality and perceptions of what is going on, can be considered a member of a well-regulated militia.
inspire.author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.

inspire.quote: Even if we try to conform to ideals and strive for perfection, we will always be pulled back to our core identity because it’s the path of least resistance for our souls – an energy force that wants nothing more than for us to honor and accept who we are and discover what we’re meant to do in the world.
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: In the height of the gusts, in my high position, where the seas did not break, I found myself compelled to cling tightly to the rail to escape being blown away. My face was stung to severe pain by the high-driving spindrift, and I had a feeling that the wind was blowing the cobwebs out of my sleep-starved brain.
inspire.author: Jack London

inspire.quote: The simple and familiar hold the secrets of the complex and unknown.
inspire.author: Edward B. Burger

inspire.quote: Your ability to make me feel like I was less than I was, took awhile to recover from. But after ripping my own self worth to shreds for so long, I realized that I wasn't less just because I was more than your inexperienced hands could handle.
inspire.author: Alfa H

inspire.quote: Seek first the kingdom of heaven WITHIN, whereby lies an abundance of treasures and resources that you need
inspire.author: Lisa Washington

inspire.quote: Scientists used to do an experiment whereby a dog’s repeated reward for performing a task was unaccountably replaced by punishment. The dog, knowing it would be penalized for doing well or doing badly, would become melancholic and inactive. This and other unforeseeable results were funded by taxing up to sixty percent of people’s earnings. People became strangely melancholic and inactive
inspire.author: Steve Aylett

inspire.quote: As helpers, we often feel the need to see our impact in tangible, measurable ways. We allow negative language into our head about the "broken system;" we look through a lens of "it doesn’t matter, I can’t make a difference". These ideas are surely contributing to our burnout.
inspire.author: Jenn Bruer

inspire.quote: Choose to hustle now, to work hard now, to make all the sacrifice now. So that you can enjoy your tomorrow. Whatever it is that you suppose to do now. If you don't do it now, it will affect you badly for the rest of your life.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue what you want.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, knowing something is more important than fear and taking action in the face of fear.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: If you cannot find a good companion to walk with, walk alone, like an elephant roaming the jungle. It is better to be alone than to be with those who will hinder your progress.
inspire.author: Gautama Buddha

inspire.quote: In the absence of a formally agreed, worldwide dictionary definition of 'Quotography' (in 2016), here are my two cents worth: 'Quotography is the art of pairing unique quotations with complementary images in order to express thought-provoking ideas, challenging concepts, profound sentiments'.
inspire.author: Alex Morritt

inspire.quote: The secret to being successful in any field is getting very interested in it... I could force myself to be fairly good in a lot of things, but I couldn't excel in anything in which I didn't have an intense interest
inspire.author: Peter Bevelin

inspire.quote: I wanted feeling to guide us in life, and not life to be the guide to feeling.
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: Don't let your mind talk you out of your dreams, trick you into giving up; don't let your mind become the greatest obstacle to success. To get your mind on the right track, the rest will follow.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: The laughter of the world is merely loneliness pathetically trying to reassure itself.
inspire.author: Neal A. Maxwell

inspire.quote: Fame you'll be famous, as famous as can be, with everyone watching you win on TV, Except when they don't because sometimes they won't..
inspire.author: Dr. Seuss

inspire.quote: until the end of the world,all whys will be answered,but now,you can only ask!
inspire.author: Bob Marley

inspire.quote: Inspiration is a guest that does not willingly visit the lazy.
inspire.author: Tchaikovsky

inspire.quote: If you can't fight and you can't flee, flow.
inspire.author: Robert Elias M.D.

inspire.quote: It turned out this man worked for the Dalai Lama. And she said gently-that they believe when a lot of things start going wrong all at once, it is to protect something big and lovely that is trying to get itself born-and that this something needs for you to be distracted so that it can be born as perfectly as possible.
inspire.author: Anne Lamott

inspire.quote: The level of success you achieve will be in direct proportion to the depth of your commitment.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Lots of people would be as cowardly as me if they were brave enough.
inspire.author: Terry Pratchett

inspire.quote: Never give advice unless you have walked the walk, because anybody can talk the talk.
inspire.author: Valencia Mackie

inspire.quote: Unless God has raised you up for this very thing, you will be worn out by the opposition of men and devils. But if God be for you, who can be against you? Are all of them together stronger than God? O be not weary of well doing!
inspire.author: John Wesley

inspire.quote: Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Not only is there often a right and wrong, but what goes around does come around, Karma exists, chickens do come home to roost, and as my mother, Phyllis, liked to say, "There is always a day of reckoning." The good among the great understand that every choice we make adds to the strength or weakness of our spirits—ourselves, or to use an old fashioned word for the same idea, our souls. That is every human’s life work: to construct an identity bit by bit, to walk a path step by step, to live a life that is worthy of something higher, lighter, more fulfilling, and maybe even everlasting.
inspire.author: Donald Van de Mark

inspire.quote: All paradises, all utopias are designed by who is not there, by the people who are not allowed in.[Conversation with Elizabeth Farnsworth, PBS NewsHour, March 9, 1998]
inspire.author: Toni Morrison

inspire.quote: There is strange comfort in knowing that no matter what happens today, the Sun will rise again tomorrow.
inspire.author: Aaron Lauritsen

inspire.quote: Vital lives are about action. You can't feel warmth unless you create it, can't feel delight until you play, can't know serendipity unless you risk.
inspire.author: Joan Erickson

inspire.quote: Nobody is exempt from the trials of life, but everyone can always find something positive in everything even in the worst of times.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Tears are a river that takes you somewhere…Tears lift your boat off the rocks, off dry ground, carrying it downriver to someplace better.
inspire.author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés

inspire.quote: Every villian is a hero in his own mind.
inspire.author: Tom Hiddleston

inspire.quote: Your life is your spiritual path.It's what's right in front of you. You can't live anyone else's life. The task is to live yours and stop trying to copy one you think looks better.
inspire.author: Sandy Nathan

inspire.quote: One morning you wake up with more life behind you than in front of you, not being able to understand how it’s happened.
inspire.author: Fredrik Backman

inspire.quote: I just want to do something that matters. Or be something that matters. I just want to matter.
inspire.author: John Green

inspire.quote: I think fitting in is highly overrated. I’d rather just fit out... Fitting out means being who you are, even when people insist that you have to change. Fitting out means taking up space, not apologizing for yourself, and not agreeing with those who seek to label you with stereotypes.
inspire.author: Golda Poretsky

inspire.quote: Leaders are limited by their vision rather than by their abilities.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Be curious about the world in which you live. Look things up. Chase down every reference. Go deeper than anybody else--that's how you'll get ahead.
inspire.author: Austin Kleon

inspire.quote: A deadline is negative inspiration. Still, it's better than no inspiration at all.
inspire.author: Rita Mae Brown

inspire.quote: What I think the political correctness debate is really about is the power to be able to define. The definers want the power to name. And the defined are now taking that power away from them.
inspire.author: Toni Morrison

inspire.quote: Failure is an event, never a person.
inspire.author: William D. Brown

inspire.quote: It is never too late to turn on the light. Your ability to break an unhealthy habit or turn off an old tape doesn't depend on how long it has been running; a shift in perspective doesn't depend on how long you've held on to the old view. When you flip the switch in that attic, it doesn't matter whether its been dark for ten minutes, ten years or ten decades. The light still illuminates the room and banishes the murkiness, letting you see the things you couldn't see before.Its never too late to take a moment to look.
inspire.author: Sharon Salzberg

inspire.quote: One of the best ways to influence people is to make those around you feel important.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: If you care about someone enough, you’ll always be there for them no matter what.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: My Lord God, I have no idea where I am going. I do not see the road ahead of me. I cannot know for certain where it will end. Nor do I really know myself, and the fact that I think that I am following your will does not mean that I am actually doing so. But I believe that the desire to please you does in fact please you. And I hope I have that desire in all that I am doing. I hope that I will never do anything apart from that desire. And I know that if I do this you will lead me by the right road though I may know nothing about it. Therefore will I trust you always though I may seem to be lost and in the shadow of death. I will not fear, for you are ever with me, and you will never leave me to face my perils alone.
inspire.author: Thomas Merton

inspire.quote: Being grateful does not mean that everything is necessarily good. It just means that you can accept it as a gift.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Imagination is the highest form of research.
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: When we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
inspire.author: Maya Angelou

inspire.quote: Anger ... it's a paralyzing emotion ... you can't get anything done. People sort of think it's an interesting, passionate, and igniting feeling — I don't think it's any of that — it's helpless ... it's absence of control — and I need all of my skills, all of the control, all of my powers ... and anger doesn't provide any of that — I have no use for it whatsoever."[Interview with CBS radio host Don Swaim, September 15, 1987.]
inspire.author: Toni Morrison

inspire.quote: Always remember, your focus determines your reality.
inspire.author: George Lucas

inspire.quote: Don’t let others tell you what you can’t do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: It's not what you say out of your mouth that determines your life, it's what you whisper to yourself that has the most power!
inspire.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

inspire.quote: No matter how bad things are, you can always make things worse.
inspire.author: Randy Pausch

inspire.quote: Everyone wants to live on top of the mountain, but all the happiness and growth occurs while you're climbing it.
inspire.author: Andy Rooney

inspire.quote: Life, with its rules, its obligations, and its freedoms, is like a sonnet: You're given the form, but you have to write the sonnet yourself. - Mrs. Whatsit
inspire.author: Madeleine L'Engle

inspire.quote: The only way to make sense out of change is to plunge into it, move with it, and join the dance.
inspire.author: Alan Wilson Watts

inspire.quote: The things we do outlast our mortality. The things we do are like monuments that people build to honor heroes after they've died. They're like the pyramids that the Egyptians built to honor the pharaohs. Only instead of being made of stone, they're made out of the memories people have of you.
inspire.author: R.J. Palacio

inspire.quote: Poetry is just the evidence of life. If your life is burning well, poetry is just the ash.
inspire.author: Leonard Cohen

inspire.quote: You are not the victim of the world, but rather the master of your own destiny. It is your choices and decisions that determine your destiny.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Always have a willing hand to help someone, you might be the only one that does.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Great leaders create more leaders, not followers.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Why must people kneel down to pray? If I really wanted to pray I’ll tell you what I'd do. I'd go out into a great big field all alone or in the deep, deep woods and I'd look up into the sky—up—up—up—into that lovely blue sky that looks as if there was no end to its blueness. And then I'd just feel a prayer.
inspire.author: L.M. Montgomery

inspire.quote: What the superior man seeks is in himself; what the small man seeks is in others.
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration.
inspire.author: Thomas A. Edison

inspire.quote: If you don’t give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: A smart person knows how to talk. A wise person knows when to be silent.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: The first and final thing you have to do in this world is to last it and not be smashed by it.
inspire.author: Ernest Hemingway

inspire.quote: I like to imagine that the world is one big machine. You know, machines never have any extra parts. They have the exact number and type of parts they need. So I figure if the entire world is a big machine, I have to be here for some reason. And that means you have to be here for some reason, too.
inspire.author: Brian Selznick

inspire.quote: The tree which moves some to tears of joy is in the eyes of others only a green thing that stands in the way. Some see nature all ridicule and deformity... and some scarce see nature at all. But to the eyes of the man of imagination, nature is imagination itself.
inspire.author: William Blake

inspire.quote: Be the positive impact on the lives of others.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: There are never enough 'I love you's.
inspire.author: Lenny Bruce

inspire.quote: People tend to be generous when sharing their nonsense, fear, and ignorance. And while they seem quite eager to feed you their negativity, please remember that sometimes the diet we need to be on is a spiritual and emotional one. Be cautious with what you feed your mind and soul. Fuel yourself with positivity and let that fuel propel you into positive action.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: Discipline Your Mind to Think Positively: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: A Manifesto for Introverts1. There's a word for 'people who are in their heads too much': thinkers.2. Solitude is a catalyst for innovation.3. The next generation of quiet kids can and must be raised to know their own strengths.4. Sometimes it helps to be a pretend extrovert. There will always be time to be quiet later.5. But in the long run, staying true to your temperament is key to finding work you love and work that matters.6. One genuine new relationship is worth a fistful of business cards.7. It's OK to cross the street to avoid making small talk.8. 'Quiet leadership' is not an oxymoron.9. Love is essential; gregariousness is optional.10. 'In a gentle way, you can shake the world.' -Mahatma Gandhi
inspire.author: Susan Cain

inspire.quote: One does not surrender a life in an instant. That which is lifelong can only be surrendered in a lifetime.
inspire.author: Elisabeth Elliot

inspire.quote: Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses in your life; you realize everything that happens in life is a result of the previous choice you’ve made and start making new choices to change your life.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Anyone who is having troubles should pray. Anyone who is happy should sing praises. Anyone who is sick should call the church's elders. They should pray for and pour oil on the person in the name of the Lord. And the prayer that is said with faith will make the sick person well; the Lord will heal that person. And if the person has sinned, the sins will be forgiven. Confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so God can heal you. When a believing person prays, great things happen. (James 5:13-16)
inspire.author: Anonymous

inspire.quote: If you want to concentrate deeply on some problem, and especially some piece of writing or paper-work, you should acquire a cat. Alone with the cat in the room where you work ... the cat will invariably get up on your desk and settle placidly under the desk lamp ... The cat will settle down and be serene, with a serenity that passes all understanding. And the tranquility of the cat will gradually come to affect you, sitting there at your desk, so that all the excitable qualities that impede your concentration compose themselves and give your mind back the self-command it has lost. You need not watch the cat all the time. Its presence alone is enough. The effect of a cat on your concentration is remarkable, very mysterious.
inspire.author: Muriel Spark

inspire.quote: The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure. If you always do what is easy and choose the path of least resistance, you never step outside your comfort zone. Great things don’t come from comfort zones.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: I could taste the salt on her lips, each kiss like a summer wave breaking on an empty beach.
inspire.author: Michael Faudet

inspire.quote: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event. Discipline your mind to think positively; to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Think of yourself as a brand. You need to be remembered. What will they remember you for? What defines you? If you have it in you, do something that defines you. Invent something, develop a unique skill, get noticed for something — it creates a talking point.
inspire.author: Chris Arnold

inspire.quote: Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Dream big. Wake up. Take the first step into the unknown.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Don't you know no one can escapethe power of creatures reaching outwith breath alone?
inspire.author: Marina Tsvetaeva

inspire.quote: Which road, which road did you takeThat brought you here at last?No road, no road did I take.I leaped, I leaped from dream to dream.
inspire.author: Franz Werfel

inspire.quote: I’m not saying that you should deny the difficult events of your life. But the fact that you survived is also a wonderful story to tell. And that story, the story of the way you came through a difficult situation, found resources within yourself or outside of yourself, gleaned from that experience what you wanted and what you didn’t want going forward — that is a story that can inspire you and others to heal and grow.
inspire.author: Golda Poretsky

inspire.quote: Boredom is the fear of self.
inspire.author: Marie Josephine Suin De Beausacq

inspire.quote: The mind travels faster than the pen; consequently, writing becomes a question of learning to make occasional wing shots, bringing down the bird of thought as it flashes by. A writer is a gunner, sometimes waiting in the blind for something to come in, sometimes roaming the countryside hoping to scare something up.
inspire.author: E.B. White

inspire.quote: If you really want to be a writer, nobody can stop you -- and if you don't, nobody can help you.
inspire.author: Alma Alexander

inspire.quote: They may try to stop you by their words and deeds, but like air you will rise above it all. You are unstoppable
inspire.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

inspire.quote: What if nobody showed up at Armageddon?
inspire.author: C R Strahan

inspire.quote: We can be friends. We can be anything we want to be.
inspire.author: Muriel Barbery

inspire.quote: Just start the sentence...and see what happens. This is how we write.
inspire.author: Jincy Willett

inspire.quote: The secret to a happiness is a small ego. And a big wallet. Good wine helps, too. But that's not really a secret, is it?
inspire.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

inspire.quote: What you have learned from experience is worth much more than gold. If you have a house it may burn down. Any kind of possession can be lost, but your experience is yours forever. Keep it and find a way to use it.
inspire.author: Somaly Mam

inspire.quote: I'm sure it is," she replied. Her expression turned fierce, making her look far different from the scattered teacher I knew. "But listen to me when I say this. You are exceptional, taleneted, and brilliant young woman. Do not ever let anyone make you feel like you're less. Do not ever let anyone make you feel invisible. Do not let anyone-not even a teacher who constantly sends you for coffee-push you around." She put her glasses back on and began randomly lifting up pieces of papers. At last, she found a pen and grinned triumphantly."Now, then. What is your brother's name?
inspire.author: Richelle Mead

inspire.quote: The restless spirit never loses its wings. If sometimes it cannot fly, it is because during those moments the sky vanishes.
inspire.author: R.N. Prasher

inspire.quote: Not even waste/is inviolate./The day misspent,/the love misplaced,/has inside it/the seed of redemption./Nothing is exempt from resurrection.
inspire.author: Kay Ryan

inspire.quote: Nothing is born into this world without labor.
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: An average man is egoistic, proud and has strong self esteem. They always require partners who massage their ego not those who will drag their ego to the mud.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: My circumstances of unrelieved responsibility and permanent distraction necessitated the short story form.
inspire.author: Raymond Carver

inspire.quote: اگر انسانی، انسانی را به خاطر گناهی سرزنش کند، نمیرد تا خود به آن گناه مرتکب شود.
inspire.author: امام صادق علیه السلام

inspire.quote: Suffering usually relates to wanting things to be different from the way they are.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: Always try and be a better person than you were yesterday, cause we aren't guaranteed tomorrow.
inspire.author: Tina A. Morgan

inspire.quote: Someone once told me that the finer points of devotion are about the size of a pinhole, and there are millions of them. And if you could connect each dot, then you’ve got a diagram of what you think you thought you knew, and if you’re willing to admit that you know nothing…you have the blueprint for a breakthrough.
inspire.author: Shane Koyczan

inspire.quote: I've come to realize that sometimes, what you love most is what you have to fight the hardest to keep.
inspire.author: Kirsten Hubbard

inspire.quote: There is no duty we so much underrate as the duty of being happy.
inspire.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

inspire.quote: The more invested I am in my own ideas about reality, the more those experiences will feel like victimizations rather than the ups and downs of relating. Actually, I believe that the less I conceptualize things that way, the more likely it is that people will want to stay by me, because they will not feel burdened, consciously or unconsciously, by my projections, judgments, entitlements, or unrealistic expectations.
inspire.author: David Richo

inspire.quote: Your life is a movie. You are the main character. You say your scripts and act to your lines. Of course you do your lines in each scene. There is a hidden camera and a director who you can ask for help anytime up above.
inspire.author: Happy Positivity

inspire.quote: Until one is committed there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back, always ineffectiveness. Concerning all acts of initative or creation, there is one elementary truth...that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then Providence moves. too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would otherwise never have occurred. A whole stream of events issues from the decision, raising in ones's favor all manner of incidents and meetings and material assistance which no man would have believed would have come his way. Whatever you think you can do or believe you can do, begin it. Action has magic, grace, and power in it.
inspire.author: W.H. Murray The Scottish Himalayan Expedition

inspire.quote: When true happiness shows up, the ego is bored with it: It's too plain, too ordinary, and it doesn't leave us feeling special or above the fray. It doesn't take away our problems, which is the ego's idea of happiness. The ego wants no more difficulties: no ore sickness, no more need for money, no more work, no more bad feelings, only unending pleasure and bliss. Such perfection is the ego's idea of a successful life. However, the happiness the ego dreams of will never be attained by anyone. The ego denies the reality of this dimension, where challenges are necessary to evolution and blissful states and pleasure come and go.
inspire.author: Gina Lake

inspire.quote: A good idea always attracts other good ideas.
inspire.author: Patrick Ness

inspire.quote: I am writing in the garden. To write as one should of a garden one must write not outside it or merely somewhere near it, but in the garden.
inspire.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

inspire.quote: To recognize that the greatest error is not to have tried and failed, but that in trying, we did not give it our best effort
inspire.author: Gene Kranz

inspire.quote: File under "Hard Truths": the creative muse is fiction. If you sit around waiting for the right moment to create, you will die waiting.
inspire.author: Antony Johnston

inspire.quote: So the next time you see a person with a compose face and a soft voice, remember that inside her mind she might be solving an equation, composing a sonnet, designing a hat. She might, that is, be deploying the powers of quiet.
inspire.author: Susan Cain

inspire.quote: And one fine day the goddess of the wind kisses the foot of man, that mistreated, scorned foot, and from that kiss the soccer idol is born. He is born in a straw crib in a tin-roofed shack and he enters the world clinging to a ball.
inspire.author: Eduardo Galeano

inspire.quote: I'm not a big fan of inspiration. I'm too old to sit and wait for the muse to give me a little kiss... I write a lot, and I'm not afraid to make mistakes or to write badly. I can alsways fix something weak and dull. But I can't fix a blank page.
inspire.author: Ron Koertge

inspire.quote: Your husband may not be a wealth of pregnancy information, but he is a wealth of 'you' information. He probably knows you better than anyone else in this world (which means he understands your current neediness pretty well). He also probably loves you more than anyone else in this world. So, while he may not be the person to turn to if you need to know how to soothe breast tenderness, he's the perfect person to turn to when you need a hand to hold.
inspire.author: Erin MacPherson

inspire.quote: I’ve stripped my life down," he told me. "I don’t need much. I have all the company I want to keep right in here." He shot himself in the head with his fingers. "People don’t understand about the need to live simply. They make appointments all day. They even schedule their own deaths. The first time they’ll have freedom to really be themselves is when they no longer exist. But up here, there’s nothing but me and the sky. A million billion stars.
inspire.author: Holly Black

inspire.quote: Thoughts don't become things; thoughts ARE things.
inspire.author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

inspire.quote: When Suzie introduced Helen, she told the audience that one of the best things about books is that they are an interactive art form: that while the author may describe in some detail how a character looks, it is the reader's imagination that completes the image, making it his or her own. "That's why we so often don't like movies made from books, right?" Suzie said. "We don't like someone else's interpretation of what we see so clearly." She talked, too, about how books educate and inspire, and how they soothe the soul-"like comfort food without the calories," she said. She talked about the tactile joys of reading, the feel of a page beneath one's fingers; the elegance of typeface on a page. She talked about how people complain that they don't have time to read, and reminded them that if they gave up half an hour of television a day in favor of reading, they could finish twenty-five books a year. "Books don't take time away from us," she said. "They give it back. In this age of abstraction, of multitasking, of speed for speed's sake, they reintroduce us to the elegance-and the relief!-of real, tick-tock time.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Berg

inspire.quote: Rise early and seize each day, learn much and use this knowledge well, spend time with those you love, never abuse your pets, use logic to fight the irrational (for it is everywhere), defend the environment and its wildlife as a knight would protect King Arthur, meld mind and heart for greatest creativity, follow your dreams, and become all that you can be.
inspire.author: Charles Kohlhase

inspire.quote: To those peoples in the huts and villages of half the globe struggling to break the bonds of mass misery, we pledge our best efforts to help them help themselves, for whatever period is required - not because the Communists may be doing it, not because we seek their votes, but because it is right. If a free society cannot help the many who are poor, it cannot save the few who are rich.
inspire.author: John F. Kennedy

inspire.quote: And so must learn to love with our mouths and voices, as well as with our eyes, flesh, heart, brains, and with everything we have, right down to our toenails. There is not anything about us that cannot love, and that is not called to love, and that is not destined to be turned, conformed, and reduced to pure love. It ...is the priceless deposit left by the burning away of selfishness.
inspire.author: Mike Mason

inspire.quote: There's this mental illness, right? It's called 'anhedonia.' It means 'without pleasure.' You can look it up, though all you really need to do is look around." She motioned to the door the other women had disappeared through, and to the world at large. "A good deal of people, mostly women, spend their entire lives in this state. It's a sort of half-death. But if you recognize this, you can fix it...You focus on bliss. Small pleasures. Fill your day with as many as you can fit into twenty-four hours. You devote every possible moment not to fulfilling another person-a man-but yourself."-Suzanne"Sounds hedonistic"- Joanna"But once you can do this, you start attracting everyone to you. You dont need compare yourself to some other girl, no matter how young or firm or perky she is.....Trust me. A woman like this, one at her best? We're the color of the world. We're the light and the beauty. So focus on your pleasure, and the man you want can't help but realize...that he may be a prince...but your a goddess.-Suzanne
inspire.author: Vicki Pettersson

inspire.quote: Never stop acquiring the commonsense, it is as good as the knowledge.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: You were saved not by work, but for work. Do it till all is done. By your Inventions, Innovations, Initiatives, Improvements, Involvements, Imaginations, Information, Interventions and Inspirations... Go the extra mile and dare to do it.
inspire.author: Israelmore Ayivor

inspire.quote: Professor [John] Tyndall once said the finest inspiration he ever received was from an old man who could scarcely read. This man acted as his servant. Each morning the old man would knock on the door of the scientist and call, 'Arise, Sir: it is near seven o'clock and you have great work to do today.
inspire.author: Elbert Hubbard

inspire.quote: Optimists move through life with a happy exterior. What happens on the inside shows up on the outside.
inspire.author: Marilyn Suttle

inspire.quote: Unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall much be required.
inspire.author: Anonymous

inspire.quote: You're the only one that can put pressure on yourself... No one else can put pressure on you. It's self-inflicted. For me, I just want to go out and play football.
inspire.author: Maurice Jones-Drew

inspire.quote: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
inspire.author: Thomas Jefferson

inspire.quote: Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Always find opportunities to make someone smile, and to offer random acts of kindness in everyday life.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.
inspire.author: Jane Goodall

inspire.quote: Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection
inspire.author: Sharon Salzberg

inspire.quote: Love is the absence of judgment.
inspire.author: Dalai Lama XIV

inspire.quote: Cry. Forgive. Learn. Move on. Let your tears water the seeds of your future happiness.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: Time doesn’t heal emotional pain, you need to learn how to let go.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: To shine your brightest light is to be who you truly are.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected. Maybe they always have been and will be. Maybe we've lived a thousand lives before this one and in each of them we've found each other. And maybe each time, we've been forced apart for the same reasons. That means that this goodbye is both a goodbye for the past ten thousand years and a prelude to what will come.
inspire.author: Nicholas Sparks

inspire.quote: Be thankful for everything that happens in your life; it’s all an experience.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: I read once that the ancient Egyptians had fifty words for sand & the Eskimos had a hundred words for snow. I wish I had a thousand words for love, but all that comes to mind is the way you move against me while you sleep & there are no words for that.
inspire.author: Brian Andreas

inspire.quote: Sometimes you have to lose all you have to find out who you truly are.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Stop comparing yourself to other people, just choose to be happy and live your own life.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: You are not rich until you have a rich heart.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Do not let the memories of your past limit the potential of your future. There are no limits to what you can achieve on your journey through life, except in your mind.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Ignore those that make you fearful and sad, that degrade you back towards disease and death.
inspire.author: Rumi Jalalud-Din

inspire.quote: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
inspire.author: Jack London

inspire.quote: Do not set aside your happiness. Do not wait to be happy in the future. The best time to be happy is always now.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: To give pleasure to a single heart by a single act is better than a thousand heads bowing in prayer.
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: For me, I am driven by two main philosophies: know more today about the world than I knew yesterday and lessen the suffering of others. You'd be surprised how far that gets you.
inspire.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

inspire.quote: Help others without any reason and give without the expectation of receiving anything in return.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Great things happen to those who don't stop believing, trying, learning, and being grateful.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Listen with curiosity. Speak with honesty. Act with integrity. The greatest problem with communication is we don’t listen to understand. We listen to reply. When we listen with curiosity, we don’t listen with the intent to reply. We listen for what’s behind the words.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: You have come to earth to entertain and to be entertained.
inspire.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

inspire.quote: The death of a dream can in fact serve as the vehicle that endows it with new form, with reinvigorated substance, a fresh flow of ideas, and splendidly revitalized color. In short, the power of a certain kind of dream is such that death need not indicate finality at all but rather signify a metaphysical and metaphorical leap forward.
inspire.author: Author-Poet Aberjhani

inspire.quote: Accepting personal responsibility for your life frees you from outside influences – increases your self-esteem – boosts confidence in your ability to decisions – and ultimately leads to achieve success in life.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: It is not possible to know how far the influence of any amiable, honest-hearted duty-doing man flies out into the world, but it is very possible to know how it has touched one's self in going by.
inspire.author: Charles Dickens

inspire.quote: Without inspiration, we’re all like a box of matches that will never be lit.
inspire.author: David Archuleta

inspire.quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.
inspire.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

inspire.quote: Come to the edge.We might fall.Come to the edge.It's too high!COME TO THE EDGE!And they cameAnd he pushedAnd they flew.
inspire.author: Christopher Logue

inspire.quote: Generasi kempong tidak punya waktu dan tidak memiliki tradisi untuk tahu beda antara kalimat sindiran dengan bukan sindiran. Tak tahu apa itu ironi, sarkasme, sanepan, istidraj ... Generasi kempong sangat rentan terhadap apa saja, termasuk informasi ... Tidak ada etos kerja. Tidak ada ideologi dharma, atau falya’mal ‘amalan shalihan ... Yang dipunyai hanya obsesi hasil, khayal kepemilikan dan kenikmatan.
inspire.author: Emha AInun NAdjib

inspire.quote: YOU. ARE. PERFECT. You are. Im talking to YOU. and dont you dare think otherwise...embrace the entity of yourself...you are a puzzle piece and you are meant to be puzzling.
inspire.author: Kaiden Blake

inspire.quote: The really magical things are the ones that happen right in front of you. A lot of the time you keep looking for beauty, but it is already there. And if you look with a bit more intention, you see it.
inspire.author: Vik Muniz

inspire.quote: Play to win, not "not to lose".
inspire.author: Dondi Scumaci

inspire.quote: True friends don't come with conditions.
inspire.author: Aaron Lauritsen

inspire.quote: The material world is all feminine. The feminine engergy makes the non-manifest, manifest. So even men (are of the feminine energy). We have to relinquish our ideas of gender in the conventional sense. This has nothing to do with gender, it has to do with energy. So feminine energy is what creates and allows anything which is non-manifest, like an idea, to come into form, into being, to be born. All that we experience in the world around us, absolutely everything (is feminine energy). The only way that anything exists is through the feminine force.
inspire.author: Zeena Schreck

inspire.quote: They say what doesn't kill the soul will make you stronger, but you can't be a stone-hearted man.
inspire.author: Anthony Green

inspire.quote: If I do not know the will of my Father, and what He requires of me in a certain transaction, if I ask Him to give me wisdom concerning any requirement in my life, or in regard to my own course, or that of my friends, my family, my children, or those that I preside over, and get no answer from Him, and then do the very best that my judgement will teach me, He is bound to own and honor that transaction, and He will do so to all intents and purposes.
inspire.author: Brigham Young

inspire.quote: It is not merely enough to love literature if one wishes to spend one's life as a writer. It is a dangerous undertaking on the most primitive level. For, it seems to me, the act of writing with serious intent involves enormous personal risk. It entails the ongoing courage for self-discovery. It means one will walk forever on the tightrope, with each new step presenting the possiblity of learning a truth about oneself that is too terrible to bear.
inspire.author: Harlan Ellison

inspire.quote: If you are a Buddhist, inspire yourself by thinking of the bodhisattva. If you are a Christian, think of the Christ, who came not to be served by others but to serve them in joy, in peace, and in generosity. For these things, these are not mere words, but acts, which go all the way, right up to their last breath. Even their death is a gift, and resurrection is born from this kind of death. (157)
inspire.author: Jean-Yves Leloup

inspire.quote: God is not interested in your art but, your heart.
inspire.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

inspire.quote: True beauty radiates not from outer cosmetics, but from the simple joy of making a difference for those that need your voice, passion, and time without expecting or wanting anything in return...
inspire.author: Deborah Barnes

inspire.quote: It's often a matter of sitting in front of the computer and worrying. It's what writing comes down to--worrying that things aren't going to work out.
inspire.author: Khaled Hosseini

inspire.quote: You can close your eyes to the things you don't want to see, but you can't close your heart to the things you don't want to feel.
inspire.author: Jonny Depp

inspire.quote: take criticism, smash it into dust, add color & use it to paint breathtaking images of unicorns frolicking thru endless fields of greatness
inspire.author: Matthew Gray Gubler

inspire.quote: I have liv'd long enough for others, like the Dog in the Wheel, and it is now the Season to begin for myself: I cannot change that Thing call'd Time, but I can alter its Posture and, as Boys do turn a looking-glass against the Sunne, so I will dazzle you all.
inspire.author: Peter Ackroyd

inspire.quote: I ran across an excerpt today (in English translation) of some dialogue/narration from the modern popular writer, Paulo Coelho in his book: Aleph.(Note: bracketed text is mine.)... 'I spoke to three scholars,' [the character says 'at last.'] ...two of them said that, after death, the [sic (misprint, fault of the publisher)] just go to Paradise. The third one, though, told me to consult some verses from the Koran. [end quote]' ...I can see that he's excited. [narrator]' ...Now I have many positive things to say about Coelho: He is respectable, inspiring as a man, a truth-seeker, and an appealing writer; but one should hesitate to call him a 'literary' writer based on this quote. A 'literary' author knows that a character's excitement should be 'shown' in his or her dialogue and not in the narrator's commentary on it. Advice for Coelho: Remove the 'I can see that he's excited' sentence and show his excitement in the phrasing of his quote.(Now, in defense of Coelho, I am firmly of the opinion, having myself written plenty of prose that is flawed, that a novelist should be forgiven for slipping here and there.)Lastly, it appears that a belief in reincarnation is of great interest to Mr. Coelho ... Just think! He is a man who has achieved, (as Leonard Cohen would call it), 'a remote human possibility.' He has won lots of fame and tons of money. And yet, how his preoccupation with reincarnation—none other than an interest in being born again as somebody else—suggests that he is not happy!
inspire.author: Roman Payne

inspire.quote: To study and constantly, is this not a pleasure? To have friends come from far away places, is this not a joy? If people do not recognize your worth, but this does not worry you, are you not a true gentleman?
inspire.author: Confucius

inspire.quote: Inhale when I inhale. Exhale when I exhale. Breathe with me,for two beating hearts breathing one breath together become one.
inspire.author: Christina Westover

inspire.quote: A too closely watched flower/blossoms the wrong color./Excess attention to the jonquil/turns it gentian. Flowers/need it tranquil to get/their hues right. Some/only open at midnight.
inspire.author: Kay Ryan

inspire.quote: If you have a painting in you, paint. If you have a song to sing, sing. Don’t judge your creation. Just create it. Banish doubt and fear and step out of your own way if you have to. Write if you’re a writer and invent if you’re an inventor. Do what you were born to do. Only then will you know a remarkable life.
inspire.author: Toni Sorenson

inspire.quote: Wanting positive experience is a negative experience; accepting negative experience is apositive experience.
inspire.author: Mark Manson

inspire.quote: It wasn't about believing this or that, it wasn't even about good and evil and right and wrong, it was about finding the strength to bear the discomfort that came with being in the world.
inspire.author: Mark Haddon

inspire.quote: Stop trying to be less of who you are. Let this time in your life cut you open and drain all of the things that are holding you back.
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: Your beliefs affect your choices. Your choices shape your actions. Your actions determine your results. The future you create depends upon the choices you make and the actions you take today.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: The scientist does not study nature because it is useful to do so. He studies it because he takes pleasure in it, and he takes pleasure in it because it is beautiful. If nature were not beautiful it would not be worth knowing, and life would not be worth living. I am not speaking, of course, of the beauty which strikes the senses, of the beauty of qualities and appearances. I am far from despising this, but it has nothing to do with science. What I mean is that more intimate beauty which comes from the harmonious order of its parts, and which a pure intelligence can grasp.
inspire.author: Henri Poincaré

inspire.quote: Dedicate yourself to what gives your life true meaning and purpose; make a positive difference in someone's life.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: And empty words are evil.
inspire.author: Homer

inspire.quote: Stop comparing yourself to others. Always strive to improve yourself to become better today than you were yesterday to serve those around you and the world.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: The struggles we endure today will be the ‘good old days’ we laugh about tomorrow.
inspire.author: Aaron Lauritsen

inspire.quote: If something burns your soul with purpose and desire, it’s your duty to be reduced to ashes by it. Any other form of existence will be yet another dull book in the library of life.
inspire.author: Charles Bukowski

inspire.quote: I learned...that inspiration does not come like a bolt, nor is it kinetic, energetic striving, but it comes into us slowly and quietly and all the time, though we must regularly and every day give it a little chance to start flowing, prime it with a little solitude and idleness.
inspire.author: Brenda Ueland

inspire.quote: The greatest thing about dreams is they don’t expire. They can lay dormant for years and when you pull them out and dust them off, they shine like new.
inspire.author: Casi McLean

inspire.quote: Picasso had a saying - 'good artists copy, great artists steal' - and we have always been shameless about stealing great ideas.
inspire.author: Walter Isaacson

inspire.quote: When God takes out the trash, don't go digging back through it. Trust Him.
inspire.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

inspire.quote: You are strong enough to survive the fall
inspire.author: Leigh Bardugo

inspire.quote: Hash, x. There is no definition for this word - nobody knows what hash is.Famous, adj. Conspicuously miserable.Dictionary, n. A malevolent literary device for cramping the growth of a language and making it hard and inelastic. This dictionary, however, is a most useful work.
inspire.author: Ambrose Bierce

inspire.quote: Silence is the language of Om. We need silence to be able to reach our Self. Both internal and external silence is very important to feel the presence of that supreme Love.
inspire.author: Amit Ray

inspire.quote: People wonder why so many writers come to live in Paris. I’ve been living ten years in Paris and the answer seems simple to me: because it’s the best place to pick ideas. Just like Italy, Spain.. or Iran are the best places to pick saffron. If you want to pick opium poppies you go to Burma or South-East Asia. And if you want to pick novel ideas, you go to Paris.
inspire.author: Roman Payne

inspire.quote: But I suppose you must touch life in order to spring from it.
inspire.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

inspire.quote: Never run from the enemy, tackle them
inspire.author: Victoria Addino

inspire.quote: People always ask me"Son what does it takeTo reach out and touch your dreams?"To them I always sayAre you hungry?Are you thirsty?Is it a fire that burns you up inside?How bad do you want it?How bad do you need it?Are you eating, sleeping, dreamingWith that one thing on your mind?How bad do you want it?How bad do you need it?Cause if you want it allYou've got to lay it all out on the line
inspire.author: Tim McGraw

inspire.quote: Vulnerability is not knowing victory or defeat, it’s understanding the necessity of both; it’s engaging. It’s being all in.
inspire.author: Brené Brown

inspire.quote: No. In my eyes, she was most beautiful because at a time when she had every right to be terrified, she managed to show comfort to another person who needed it.
inspire.author: Bella Forrest

inspire.quote: Read deeply. Stay open. Continue to wonder.
inspire.author: Austin Kleon

inspire.quote: Follow your bliss and doors will open where there were no doors before.
inspire.author: Joseph Campbell

inspire.quote: You don't need to wait for inspiration to write. It's easier to be inspired while writing than while not writing...
inspire.author: Josip Novakovich

inspire.quote: We are wiser than we know.
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: I am the lover's gift; I am the wedding wreath;I am the memory of a moment of happiness;I am the last gift of the living to the dead;I am a part of joy and a part of sorrow.
inspire.author: Gibran Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: It is difficult to make the right choice if you fear choosing wrongly.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Doubt is a question mark; faith is an exclamation point. The most compelling, believable, realistic stories have included them both.
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: A queenoffers her hand to be kissed,& can form it into a fistwhile smiling the whole damn time.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Acevedo

inspire.quote: One night a friend lent me a book of short stories by Franz Kafka. I went back to the pension where I was staying and began to read The Metamorphosis. The first line almost knocked me off the bed. I was so surprised. The first line reads, "As Gregor Samsa awoke that morning from uneasy dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a gigantic insect. . . ." When I read the line I thought to myself that I didn’t know anyone was allowed to write things like that. If I had known, I would have started writing a long time ago. So I immediately started writing short stories.
inspire.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

inspire.quote: Never allow the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game!
inspire.author: Babe Ruth

inspire.quote: Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember ~ the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.
inspire.author: Zig Ziglar

inspire.quote: To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.
inspire.author: Maurice Young

inspire.quote: This is your life – not your parents’, teachers’ or significant other’s. If you ever find yourself on a path that just doesn’t feel safe anymore, you have every right to stop the car, get out – change your shoes and start walking.
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: ... human beings fear the unknown. So, whatever's freaking you out, grab it by the balls and say hello.
inspire.author: Justin Halpern

inspire.quote: YOU are your love of a lifetime.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: If life throws you a few bad notes or vibrations, don't let them interrupt or alter your song.
inspire.author: Suzy Kassem

inspire.quote: Why sadness was created?So we could rest from laughing.
inspire.author: Nelson M. Lubao

inspire.quote: An intelligent woman is a goldmine! She has the ability to learn, reason and understand things better and faster than her contemporaries. She is competent, alert and can reason out stuffs easily.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: I make music for ears, not eyes
inspire.author: Adele

inspire.quote: One doesn't have to be religious to lead a moral life or attain wisdom.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: You do it for yourself. You don’t expect to change the world. You don’t even expect to influence your family or your friends. You do it because you can’t not do it and be who you are. Or who you’re meant to be.
inspire.author: Martin Sheen

inspire.quote: No man is ever just one thing.
inspire.author: Michael Scott

inspire.quote: Everything is temporary, almost like a passing fase, some of laughter Some of pain. What we would do, If we had the chance to explore What we had taken for Granted the very day before, Some would say I'm selfish, To hold a little sadness in my eyes, But they don't feel the sorrow When I can't do, all that helps me feel alive. I can express my emotions, but I can't run wild and free, My mind and soul would handle it but hell upon my hip, ankle and knees, This disorder came about,as a friendship said its last goodbyes, Soooo this is what I got given for all the years I stood by? I finally stand still to question it, life it is in fact? What the fuck is the purpose of it all if you get stabbed in the back? And after the anger fills the air, the regret takes it places, I never wanted to be that girl, Horrid, sad and faded... So I took with a grain of salt, my new found reality, I am not of my pain,the disability doesnt define me. I find away to adjust, also with the absence of my friend,I trust the choices I make, allow my heart to mend. I pick up the piecesI retrain my leg, I find where I left off And I start all over again, You see what happens... When a warrior gets tested; They grow from the ashes Powerful and invested. So I thank all this heartache,As I put it to a rest, I move forward with my life And I'll build a damn good nest.
inspire.author: Nikki Rowe

inspire.quote: Contrary to what we've been told, life is simple. We complicate matters with our choices.
inspire.author: Michelle Richardson

inspire.quote: I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday, I have today and I know Him who holds tomorrow so I know tomorrow will be beautiful for me.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: Aim for what u want and the year will all make a sense.
inspire.author: cecilia ahern

inspire.quote: Love is total surrender, total acceptance and total commitment.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Love hurts.Think back over romance novels you’ve loved or the genre-defining books that drive our industry. The most unforgettable stories and characters spring from crushing opposition. What we remember about romance novels is the darkness that drives them. Three hundred pages of folks being happy together makes for a hefty sleeping pill, but three hundred pages of a couple finding a way to be happy in the face of impossible odds makes our hearts soar. In darkness, we are all alone.So don’t just make love, make anguish for your characters. As you structure a story, don’t satisfy your hero’s desires, thwart them. Make sure your solutions create new problems. Nurture your characters doubts and despair. Make them earn the happy ending they want, even better…make them deserve it. Delay and disappointment charge situations and validate character growth. Misery accompanies love. It’s no accident that many of the stories we think of as timeless romances in Western Literature are fiercely tragic: Romeo and Juliet, Tristan and Isolde, Cupid and Psyche… the pain in them drags us back again and again, hoping that this time we’ll find a way out of the dark.Only if you let your characters get lost will we get lost in them. And that, more than anything else, is what romance can and should do for its protagonists and its readers: lead us through the labyrinth, skirt the monstrous despair roaming its halls, and find our way into daylight.
inspire.author: Damon Suede

inspire.quote: How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Believe in your heart that you're meant to live a life full of passion, purpose, magic and miracles.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Directing the mind to stay in the present can be a formidable task.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: When we aren't curious in conversations we judge, tell, blame and even shame, often without even knowing it, which leads to conflict." -The Power Of Curiosity: How To Have Real Conversations That Create Collaboration, Innovation and Understanding
inspire.author: Kirsten Siggins

inspire.quote: Never let kindness be your weakness, never let your weaknesses be your downfal
inspire.author: V. Pain

inspire.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
