inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control the way you think about all the events. You always have a choice. You can choose to face them with a positive mental attitude.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Do what you love, love what you do, and with all your heart give yourself to it.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: اكتب ما شئت، واقرأ ما شئت، فلن ينفعك ذلك إلا بالعمل. فإن كتابة أو قراءة الواو والراء والدال لا تشم منها رائحة الورد
inspire.author: أشرف حسن طبل

inspire.quote: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: I am not a little bit of many things; but I am the sufficient representation of many things. I am not an incompletion of all these races; but I am a masterpiece of the prolific. I am an entirety, I am not a lack of anything; rather I am a whole of many things. God did not see it needful to make me generic. He thinks I am better than that.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Oh what a wonderful soul so bright inside you. Got power to heal the sun’s broken heart, power to restore the moon’s vision too.
inspire.author: Aberjhani

inspire.quote: won't you celebrate with mewhat i have shaped intoa kind of life? i had no model.born in babylonboth nonwhite and womanwhat did i see to be except myself?i made it uphere on this bridge betweenstarshine and clay,my one hand holding tightmy other hand; come celebratewith me that everydaysomething has tried to kill meand has failed.
inspire.author: Lucille Clifton

inspire.quote: I know too well how dangerous hope can be, how it grows and sometimes dies, taking its host with it. It's more powerful than anything Dr.Fibs keeps in his labs, more precious than all the secrets inside Sublevel Two.
inspire.author: Ally Carter

inspire.quote: Do you really believe in destiny?" "How can I not believe in destiny, when there is no difference between my memories and my dreams at night? There's no difference between their reality. And if I dream something first, I remember it later when I am actually walking in the place or looking at the person I first dreamed of. Days later. Or years later. Destiny~ she walks with me.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: but I have no mind for business and considered staying awake to be enough of an accomplishment.
inspire.author: David Sedaris

inspire.quote: Everything in creation has its appointed painter or poet and remains in bondage like the princess in the fairy tale 'til its appropriate liberator comes to set it free.
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: Sometimes I think I live in a gap between two worlds, one world that I have to wake up to, be adherent of the rules and live in a place that is dictated by others. A place I sometimes feel the fear of aging and dying before I have figured out what it is I am here to do.That other world is sweet, fresh and misty, inviting adventure into the unknown, melding ancient wisdom with new discovery; the sunlight turning into moonlight and the spell of eternal life is never broken.Perhaps in that gap I should repair the forgotten bridge from one side to the other, but truth be told, I don't want to. I don't want to because I don't have the energy to fix what is broken within. I am a wild, wandering nomad, I belong everywhere and nowhere all at the same time, and in that gap between worlds, I am free.
inspire.author: Riitta Klint

inspire.quote: The youth gets together his materials to build a bridge to the moon, or, perchance, a palace or temple on the earth, and, at length, the middle-aged man concludes to build a woodshed with them.
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: Diversity of character is due to the unequal time given to values. Only through each other will we see the importance of the qualities we lack and our unfinished soul's potential.
inspire.author: Shannon L. Alder

inspire.quote: Soccer forces life to move on. There’s always a new match. A new season. There’s always a dream that everything can get better. It’s a game of wonders.
inspire.author: Fredrik Backman

inspire.quote: Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses in your life; you realize everything that happens in life is a result of the previous choice you’ve made and start making new choices to change your life.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: The words were unexpected, but so incisively true. So much of prayer is like that - an encounter with a truth that has sunk to the bottom of the heart, that wants to be found, wants to be spoken, wants to be elevated into the realm of sacredness.
inspire.author: sue monk kidd

inspire.quote: Even after the stormiest weather, a true warrior will still reflect the brilliant rays of the magnificent sun through both his or her eyes. You may get hit by sudden lighting or take severe beatings from the cruel wind, but you will always get back up and stand strong on your feet again, soak in the sunlight, and be prepared to get hit by even the most merciless hail - time and time again.
inspire.author: Suzy Kassem

inspire.quote: But yield who will to their separation, My object in living is to uniteMy avocation and my vocationAs my two eyes make one in sight.
inspire.author: Robert Frost

inspire.quote: Those who might be tempted to give way to despair should realize that nothing accomplished in this order can ever be lost, that confusion, error and darkness can win the day only apparently and in a purely ephemeral way, that all partial and transitory disequilibrium must perforce contribute towards the greater equilibrium of the whole, and that nothing can ultimately prevail against the power of truth.
inspire.author: René Guénon

inspire.quote: Surround yourself with people who believe in your dreams, encourage your ideas, support your ambitions, and bring out the best in you.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Someday stars will wind down or blow up. Someday death will cover us all like the water of a lake and perhaps nothing will ever come to the surface to show that we were ever there. But we WERE there, and during the time we lived, we were alive. That's the truth - what is, what was, what will be - not what could be, what should have been, what never can be.
inspire.author: Orson Scott Card

inspire.quote: All humanity is one undivided and indivisible family. I cannot detach myself from the wickedest soul.
inspire.author: Mahatma Gandhi

inspire.quote: People have boldness to criticize but not to sensitize.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: Curiosity is the single most important attribute with which humans are born. More than a simple desire to discover or know things, curiosity is a powerful tool, like a scalpel or a searchlight. Curiosity changes us. It is also a way to effect change, perhaps even on a global level.
inspire.author: Loren Rhoads

inspire.quote: It's good to see the snakes revealing themselves. They weren't actually hidden at all. People hide behind the masks, but eventually you see them for who they truly are.
inspire.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

inspire.quote: That’s what being alive is, Thing! It’s being badly prepared for everything! Because you only get one chance, Thing!
inspire.author: Terry Pratchett

inspire.quote: Crises marked by anxiety, doubt, and despair have always been those periods of personal unrest that occur at the times when a man is sufficiently unsettled to have an opportunity for personal growth. We must always see our own feelings of uneasiness as being our chance for "making the growth choice rather than the fear choice.
inspire.author: Sheldon B. Kopp

inspire.quote: Facing your fears robs them of their power
inspire.author: Mark Burnett

inspire.quote: An act of kindness may take only a moment of our time, but when captured in the heart the memory lives forever.
inspire.author: Molly Friedenfeld

inspire.quote: Because the development of inner calm & energy happens completely within & isn’t dependent on another person or a particular situation, we begin to feel a resourcefulness and independence that is quite beautiful—and a huge relief.
inspire.author: Sharon Salzberg

inspire.quote: Hadapilah hari ini!Inilah saatnya untuk menuntut hidup yang nyata,Dalam rentang waktu yang pendek ini, kita mendapat kesempatan untuk:Berkembang dengan gembira, bertindak dengan mulia.Menciptakan keindahan yang mempesona,Karena hari kemarin cuma mimpi dan hari esok cuma bayang-bayang.Tapi bila hari ini kita jalani dengan baik, setiap hari kemarin akan menjadi mimpi yang indah.Dan setiap hari esok menjadi bayang-bayang harapan.Jadi manfaatkanlah hari ini sebaik-baiknya.
inspire.author: Kalidasa

inspire.quote: Sometimes you must reach beyond yourself to reach yourself within.. yourself.
inspire.author: Markiplier

inspire.quote: The point is, art never stopped a war and never got anybody a job. That was never its function. Art cannot change events. But it can change people. It can affect people so that they are changed... because people are changed by art – enriched, ennobled, encouraged – they then act in a way that may affect the course of events... by the way they vote, they behave, the way they think.
inspire.author: Leonard Bernstein

inspire.quote: Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul like you.
inspire.author: Shannon L. Alder

inspire.quote: In the sky there are always answers and explanations for everything: every pain, every suffering, joy and confusion.
inspire.author: Ishmael Beah

inspire.quote: Everything you need to know you have learned through your journey.
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: It’s pretty confusing."Good. Be confused. Confusion is where inspiration comes from.
inspire.author: Robyn Mundell

inspire.quote: What kind of life can you have in a house without books?
inspire.author: Sherman Alexie

inspire.quote: I must work harder to achieve my goal of not seeking approval from those whose approval I'm not even sure is important to me.
inspire.author: Lauren Graham

inspire.quote: Reminds us that greatness lies even in the smallest of moments, in the humblest of hearts, and we shall, each of us, be called to greatness. Whether we shall rise to meet it or let it slip away is the challenge put before us all.
inspire.author: Libba Bray

inspire.quote: Crying does not indicate that you are weak. Since birth, it has always been a sign that you are alive.
inspire.author: Charlotte Brontë

inspire.quote: Control Your Own Destiny or Someone Else Will
inspire.author: Jack Welch

inspire.quote: Like madness is the glory of this life.
inspire.author: Shakespeare

inspire.quote: No human should mislead another by promising them something they know to be untrue.
inspire.author: Santosh Kalwar

inspire.quote: I'm restless. Things are calling me away. My hair is being pulled by the stars again.
inspire.author: Anaïs Nin

inspire.quote: We do not start as dust. We do not end as dust. We make more than dust.That's all we ask of you. Make more than dust.
inspire.author: David Levithan

inspire.quote: The most intriguing people you will encounter in this life are the people who had insights about you, that you didn't know about yourself.
inspire.author: Shannon L. Alder

inspire.quote: Pride is a funny thing; it can make what is truly worthless appear to be a treasure.
inspire.author: Alice Hoffman

inspire.quote: How you react emotionally is a choice in any situation.
inspire.author: Judith Orloff

inspire.quote: We are important and our lives are important, magnificent really, and their details are worthy to be recorded. This is how writers must think, this is how we must sit down with pen in hand. We were here; we are human beings; this is how we lived. Let it be known, the earth passed before us. Our details are important. Otherwise, if they are not, we can drop a bomb and it doesn't matter. . . Recording the details of our lives is a stance against bombs with their mass ability to kill, against too much speed and efficiency. A writer must say yes to life, to all of life: the water glasses, the Kemp's half-and-half, the ketchup on the counter. It is not a writer's task to say, "It is dumb to live in a small town or to eat in a café when you can eat macrobiotic at home." Our task is to say a holy yes to the real things of our life as they exist – the real truth of who we are: several pounds overweight, the gray, cold street outside, the Christmas tinsel in the showcase, the Jewish writer in the orange booth across from her blond friend who has black children. We must become writers who accept things as they are, come to love the details, and step forward with a yes on our lips so there can be no more noes in the world, noes that invalidate life and stop these details from continuing.
inspire.author: Natalie Goldberg

inspire.quote: I confess I do not know why, but looking at the stars always makes me dream.
inspire.author: Vincent Van Gogh

inspire.quote: When the poet Paul Valery once asked Albert Einstein if he kept a notebook to record his ideas, Einstein looked at him with mild but genuine surprise. "Oh, that's not necessary," he replied . "It's so seldom I have one.
inspire.author: Bill Bryson

inspire.quote: Men are born to succeed, not to fail.
inspire.author: Henry David Thoreau

inspire.quote: We are at our most powerful the moment we no longer need to be powerful.
inspire.author: Eric Micha'el Leventhal

inspire.quote: If you think you are beaten, you areIf you think you dare not, you don't,If you like to win, but you think you can'tIt is almost certain you won't.If you think you'll lose, you're lostFor out of the world we find,Success begins with a fellow's willIt's all in the state of mind.If you think you are outclassed, you areYou've got to think high to rise,You've got to be sure of yourself beforeYou can ever win a prize.Life's battles don't always goTo the stronger or faster man,But soon or late the man who winsIs the man WHO THINKS HE CAN!
inspire.author: Walter D. Wintle

inspire.quote: The downfall of the attempts of governments and leaders to unite mankind is found in this- in the wrong message that we should see everyone as the same. This is the root of the failure of harmony. Because the truth is, we should not all see everyone as the same! We are not the same! We are made of different colours and we have different cultures. We are all different! But the key to this door is to look at these differences, respect these differences, learn from and about these differences, and grow in and with these differences. We are all different. We are not the same. But that's beautiful. And that's okay.In the quest for unity and peace, we cannot blind ourselves and expect to be all the same. Because in this, we all have an underlying belief that everyone should be the same as us at some point. We are not on a journey to become the same or to be the same. But we are on a journey to see that in all of our differences, that is what makes us beautiful as a human race, and if we are ever to grow, we ought to learn and always learn some more.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: I refuse to believe that Hendrix had the last possessed hand,that Joplin had the last drunken throat,that Morrison had the last enlightened mind.
inspire.author: Patti Smith

inspire.quote: The ‘Muse’ is not an artistic mystery, but a mathematical equation. The gift are those ideas you think of as you drift to sleep. The giver is that one you think of when you first awake.
inspire.author: Roman Payne

inspire.quote: Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.
inspire.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

inspire.quote: My love is something valuable to me which I ought not to throw away without reflection.
inspire.author: Sigmund Freud

inspire.quote: There is no such thing as a problem without a gift for you in its hands. You seek problems because you need their gifts.
inspire.author: Richard Bach

inspire.quote: It was so strange, the way that life moved forward: the twists and the dead ends, the sudden opportunities. She supposed if you could predict or foresee everything that was going to happen, you’d lose the motivation to go through it all. The promise was always in the possibility.
inspire.author: Lauren Oliver

inspire.quote: Imagine others complexly.
inspire.author: John Green

inspire.quote: Live the Life of Your Dreams: Be brave enough to live the life of your dreams according to your vision and purpose instead of the expectations and opinions of others.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: The past is a place of reference, not a place of residence; the past is a place of learning, not a place of living.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
inspire.author: Lou Holtz

inspire.quote: Life becomes easier and more beautiful when we can see the good in other people.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Don't let the expectations and opinions of other people affect your decisions. It's your life, not theirs. Do what matters most to you; do what makes you feel alive and happy. Don't let the expectations and ideas of others limit who you are. If you let others tell you who you are, you are living their reality — not yours. There is more to life than pleasing people. There is much more to life than following others' prescribed path. There is so much more to life than what you experience right now. You need to decide who you are for yourself. Become a whole being. Adventure.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
inspire.author: Marcus Aurelius

inspire.quote: Make improvements, not excuses. Seek respect, not attention.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Don’t waste your time in anger, regrets, worries, and grudges. Life is too short to be unhappy.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Keep GoingYour hardest times often lead to the greatest moments of your life. Keep going. Tough situations build strong people in the end.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Learn to light a candle in the darkest moments of someone’s life. Be the light that helps others see; it is what gives life its deepest significance.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.
inspire.author: Vincent Willem van Gogh

inspire.quote: Believe in Your HeartBelieve in your heart that you're meant to live a life full of passion, purpose, magic and miracles.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals. If you aren’t grateful for what you already have, what makes you think you would be happy with more.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: No amount of regretting can change the past, and no amount of worrying can change the future.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Acts of Kindness:A random act of kindness, no matter how small, can make a tremendous impact on someone else's life.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Follow your heart, listen to your inner voice, stop caring about what others think.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Understanding is the first step to acceptance, and only with acceptance can there be recovery.
inspire.author: J.K. Rowling

inspire.quote: Life is about accepting the challenges along the way, choosing to keep moving forward, and savoring the journey.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: And still, after all this time,The sun never says to the earth,"You owe Me."Look what happens withA love like that,It lights the Whole Sky.
inspire.author: Hafiz

inspire.quote: Don't JustDon't just learn, experience.Don't just read, absorb.Don't just change, transform.Don't just relate, advocate.Don't just promise, prove.Don't just criticize, encourage.Don't just think, ponder.Don't just take, give.Don't just see, feel.Don’t just dream, do. Don't just hear, listen.Don't just talk, act.Don't just tell, show.Don't just exist, live.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Even if you cannot change all the people around you, you can change the people you choose to be around. Life is too short to waste your time on people who don’t respect, appreciate, and value you. Spend your life with people who make you smile, laugh, and feel loved.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: You cannot control the behavior of others, but you can always choose how you respond to it.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: You need to learn how to select your thoughts just the same way you select your clothes every day. This is a power you can cultivate. If you want to control things in your life so bad, work on the mind. That's the only thing you should be trying to control.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

inspire.quote: Treat everyone with politeness and kindness, not because they are nice, but because you are.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Top 15 Things Money Can’t BuyTime. Happiness. Inner Peace. Integrity. Love. Character. Manners. Health. Respect. Morals. Trust. Patience. Class. Common sense. Dignity.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: There are years that ask questions and years that answer.
inspire.author: Zora Neale Hurston

inspire.quote: If you treat an individual as he is, he will remain how he is. But if you treat him as if he were what he ought to be and could be, he will become what he ought to be and could be.
inspire.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

inspire.quote: Surround yourself with those conducive to you being your highest self.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Not everything can stand the test of time, but a story can.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Reading opens pockets of the mind.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Surrender to the story.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: One must learn the rules so one can break them properly.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Lighten up. Brighten up. Smile.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: A fiery spirit bursts from your soul.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Wherever you are, wherever you go, be sure to spread the light.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Love is the way to happiness.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be life.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Don't just hit a home run. Knock it out of the park.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Sometimes you're the protagonist, and someone else is the hero.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The more of those little light bulbs that can turn on the better. Eventually you'll have enough to light up a movie screen.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Take a deep breath. Inhale peace. Exhale happiness.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Fight the darkness. Fight for the light.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Explore your own peace.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Write truthfully, write from the heart, and your words will live.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: In love there is truth, and in truth there is peace.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: See the truth. Feel the truth. Be the truth.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Create from the heart.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Learning is essential for living the life you love.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Love is enough.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Go. Write. Win!
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Listen to yourself and you are heard.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: As long as it comes from the heart, in the end, it will be good.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Write before the sun comes up.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The more you read, the more you write, and the more you free yourself to do so, the better writer you will become.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The world is blessed to welcome you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Live in the now and the how will take care of itself.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be your best gift.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: I prefer to be honest. It leaves little room for error.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Assess the day.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Let the good stuff in. Keep the bad stuff out.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Soup is cozy.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Remove the stagnant energy within.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Collect yourself. Gather yourself. Center yourself.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Lead with your heart. The rest will follow.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Positive thoughts shape a positive world.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: When we think, we hurt. When we feel, we heal.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: I am worthy. I am worthy of light. I am worthy of love. I am worthy of happiness. I am worthy of peace. I am worthy of me.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be strong in who you are.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Live freely.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: You have to be with you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: If you wait for permission, you're going to be waiting for a long time.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Pick an outfit a day.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: I put everything I have toward something I believe in.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Stay in a place of peace.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The richness of life is in art.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be present in you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Live according to your truest intention.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Let love guide the day.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Take what applies to you and leave the rest.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Ice cream soothes the soul.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Writing takes me away.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Live whatever draws out the magic within.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Build what you believe in.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Modeling is the culmination of lighting, texture, body movement, and your soul's expression.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be laid-back.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Live in your energy.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be in an artistic mindset.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Sometimes we just need to look at something beautiful to refresh our souls. Shout-out to the places and people who enliven our spirits. Thank you.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: Whatever it is you want to be good at, you have to make sure you continue to read, and learn, and seek joy elsewhere, because you never know where inspiration will strike.
inspire.author: Sid Meier

inspire.quote: Love is not a joke. What is a joke are the people who treat it that way.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Golden framed and heavy, the painting.Ocean waves curled in suspended time,white-lipped and silent beneath brush-stroked bluesof sky. Gulls are captured there, mid-flight, fishing moments stolen in time, they soar without moving.
inspire.author: Christina M. Ward

inspire.quote: I made your favorite." Nannie says, her elegant hand trembles,so subtle it hides behind a smile. She listenscarefully,responds quickly, eases the baked macaroni from the oven.We wash our hands with bars of smooth soap in delicate shapes.We are quiet, careful not to touch the glass of doors.We do not leave fingerprints here.
inspire.author: Christina M. Ward

inspire.quote: If you cannot be an inspiration, make sure you are not a hindrance.
inspire.author: Bamigboye Olurotimi

inspire.quote: I love that we get a new day... A new opportunity to move our lives in a positive direction... Let's be unencumbered by yesterday's nonsense... a fresh start... Take a deep breath, smile, and start again.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: Spread the light.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Life seems vast when you live every moment,Therefore without any pause enjoy every second
inspire.author: Benisha Perumal Nadar

inspire.quote: I see life as a roadside inn where I have to stay until the coach from the abyss pulls up. I don't know where it will take me, because I don't know anything. I could see this inn as a prison, for I'm compelled to wait in it; I could see it as a social centre, for it's here that I meet others.
inspire.author: Fernando Pessoa

inspire.quote: I speak out because I know the pain of staying silent.
inspire.author: Cleo Wade

inspire.quote: Sometimes all it takes to awaken a dream is meeting someone who is living the dream.
inspire.author: Omony Geoffrey Ocaya

inspire.quote: Hope, Kabir. Hope gives you the courage to move on.
inspire.author: Beena Khan

inspire.quote: No man is a failure, for only he must not quit.
inspire.author: Davinder Pahra

inspire.quote: Inspiration can be fleeting. Self-motivation is everlasting if it is sincere.
inspire.author: Rob Steger

inspire.quote: What can one do about one's skin? We, who are clay blended by the Master Potter, come from the kiln of Creation in many hues. How can people say one skin is colored, when each has its own coloration?What should it matter that one bowl is dark and the other pale, if each is of good design and serves its purpose well.
inspire.author: Polingaysi Qoyawayma (Elizabeth Q. White)

inspire.quote: Motivation is the blanket of your spirit. It gives you warm, sheath and safety for your vision, positivity and energy to protect them from lower, negative, toxic and detrimental vibes. It keeps them alive! Always bathe it.
inspire.author: Lord Robin

inspire.quote: [When asked where his drive comes from] " You're bullied, you're miserable...every artist has someone who told them they weren't worth dirt and someone who told them that they were the second coming of the baby Jesus and they believed them both, and that's the fuel that stirs the fire.
inspire.author: Bruce Springsteen

inspire.quote: Don't become so busy getting yours that your heavenly treasures dwindle.
inspire.author: VaeEshia Ratcliff-Davis

inspire.quote: Your life is like a movie and you’re the main character, so make it the greatest movie you’ve ever seen.
inspire.author: Motlase Morwane

inspire.quote: If you understand what the phrase, "I'd rather be a hammer than a nail" means, and concur, then you are one out of a multitude and I congratulate you in the fullest sense of the sentiment.
inspire.author: Charles Van-Heyden

inspire.quote: The very same people who kick you when you are down will worship your triumphant version.
inspire.author: Michael H. Forde

inspire.quote: You give me a pen, and I will conquer the world.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Never be complacent with anything less than greatness.
inspire.author: Michael H. Forde

inspire.quote: Be resilient, be outspoken; be a spokesperson for your success.
inspire.author: Michael H. Forde

inspire.quote: The worst of it is, that as a revolutionary she is out of fashion. Before, she was an inspiration. But inspiration is not wanted now, it seems. One must be practical, one must be administrative, one must understand economics and systems. She pines. She said to me, that very evening, 'Our Moses was luckier than he knew, to die before he went into the promised land.
inspire.author: Sylvia Townsend Warner

inspire.quote: Sometimes we need to go back to the grief, to that moment, and really dig into what happened, how we suffered, how we broke, before we can start putting the pieces back together and move forward.
inspire.author: Anne Fricke

inspire.quote: Our families need our experience, but society needs expertise
inspire.author: Vijay Sridhara

inspire.quote: There’s a great deal of life in a dance, one must know, full of twirling anticipation and gliding wonder.It has the power to bring strangers together, To open one’s soul to the possibilities of love. It reminds us of the unspoken truth—that we are all children, In need of a wild song and bit of careless freedom.
inspire.author: Erin Forbes

inspire.quote: By looking back in time, one can learn how to act, and at the same time, how not to. Thus a case for History can be made.
inspire.author: Likhith Naidu Tati

inspire.quote: Your comfort zone is a place where you keep yourself in a self-illusion and nothing can grow there but your potentiality can grow only when you can think and grow out of that zone.
inspire.author: Rashedur Ryan Rahman

inspire.quote: Turn obstacles into opportunities and problems into possibilities.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: If you stand right at the edge of the night sky, some place where one o’clock leaves to meet two, the breeze will carry your words up to the stars. And they’ll swallow your secrets until its time to hand them over to the truths in the sky- the ones that draw maps in the black. They carve their answers into the backs of my hands, the grooves of the words running deep in my palms.
inspire.author: Marlen Komar

inspire.quote: Always be open to inspiration. You never know where it may come from. Begin with an open mind, end with an inspired heart.
inspire.author: Sheri   Fink

inspire.quote: The essence of life does not consist in the lushness of your possessions, but in the richness of your heart.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: And me, standing under the splintered night, catching fractured glimpses into the black behind the black, hearing the prayers of stars, the angry whispers of the dark summer night.Its voice cracks,on your name.My eyes close,on your name.
inspire.author: Marlen Komar

inspire.quote: Many writers write because they’ve been there, seen that, did it and burnt their fingers
inspire.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

inspire.quote: Those who win never give up.Those who give up never win.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Pain is such a useful thing. It corrects us when we're wrong. It shapes our character. It teaches us that we're alive.
inspire.author: C.J. Redwine

inspire.quote: Comfort zone: simply means the routine of one’s daily life – it is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Be thankful for the efforts of people who worked hard to get you where you are; you should not take it for granted and treat them with indifference.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Being in a relationship with some people is like pushing a boat through sand. I used to have the time and energy for that kind of nonsense, but not anymore. Relationships should be a wonderful journey of exploration and love; not grinding resistance.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: Be the positive impact on someone’s life.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Never stop dreaming, never stop believing, never give up, never stop trying, and never stop learning.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Those who win never quit; those who quit never win.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Grateful people are happy people. The more things you are grateful for, the happier you will be.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Do not be complacent about your achievements and not to strive for continual improvement when you get to the top. As soon as you let success go to your head, you sink into following familiar patterns and play it safe. In other words, you risk losing your edge.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Neatness and cleanliness is not a function of how rich or poor you are but that of mentality and principle.
inspire.author: Ikechukwu Izuakor

inspire.quote: Patience, more than the ability to bear pains or endure waiting, is to be calm no matter what happens – constantly take action to turn it to positive growth opportunities – and have faith to believe that it will all work out in the end while you are waiting.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Learning to focus on the big picture will help you keep things in a proper perspective.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: First knowledge is the knowledge of God.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: One author said "I write because I want to live a footprint in the sands of history." It's hard to live a footprint in the sands of history when giants are passing through the same sands unless you are one of the giants
inspire.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

inspire.quote: I’ve got some questions,Are you sick of feelin’ sorry?And people sayin’ not to worry?Sick of hearing this hakuna matata motto,From people who won the lotto,We’re not that lucky.Have you noticed that you’re breathing?Look around and count your blessings,So when you’re sick of all this stressin’ and guessin’I’m suggestin’ you turn this up and let them hear you sing it
inspire.author: Set It Off

inspire.quote: We must work together on a common vision and a common goal.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Keep exploring, you will discover new path.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Living a daring life is zealous pursuit.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: There is nothing so convincing as a thing well done.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Inspiration moves one from Pessimism to Optimism, from Doubt to Faith, from Despair to Hope, and from Darkness to Light!- RVM
inspire.author: RVM

inspire.quote: Do all the work while you still have strength.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: To be vulnerable, to be raw, to virtually expose your guts, I like doing that.
inspire.author: Lana Parrilla

inspire.quote: Love can be a natural endowment, a present, or a gift. If it is not just a donation, it can be a divine talent. Since love is a silver bullet, it can make the unimaginable possible through the power of its inspiration. ("Love as dizzy as a cathedral")
inspire.author: Erik Pevernagie

inspire.quote: I hadn't ever thought that a man could love me in the same way that my friends love me; that I could love a man with the same commitment and care with which I love them. Maybe all this time I had been in a great marriage without even realising.
inspire.author: Dolly Alderton

inspire.quote: If you try to be everything to everyone, you become nothing
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Share your mistakes with the world because you once wished that someone would have done the same.
inspire.author: Amara Leggett

inspire.quote: Don't work to hard on appearing to be right, but on being right
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Remembering the why will inspire the how
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: And I wondered, who is it that’s aware that I’m thinking? And suddenly I was thrown into this amazing feeling of freedom. I was no longer a fragment of the universe, I was the universe."~Jim Carrey
inspire.author: Jim Carrey

inspire.quote: A man act as he thinks.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: The sun shines powerfully and the flowers express themselves beautifully regardless of your opinion, gratitude, or indifference. They live out their purpose... UNAPOLOGETICALLY. I love that!
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: I'm not a machine. I'm a person navigating this incredible life. There are days I wake up and seize every fresh new opportunity, days I walk through as a "same crap-different day" zombie, days I feel incredibly proud for navigating it right, and days I have so much fun getting it wrong.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: My heart desire is for souls to be saved through God's grace.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Whoever listens to correction , obey the commands to repent of every evil done.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Vulnerability is a type of comfort.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: When I cast my mind back and compare it with the treadmill stress that my life is now, I think ah, those were the days. I didn't know I was born. Sometimes it's not being at the top that's the truly joyous part of success, it's getting there.
inspire.author: Claudia Carroll

inspire.quote: Perfection is God’s territory. Our human territory is a practice field. And it’s filled with mistakes and accidents and false starts and defeats. And every now and again, a victory. This is how we become equipped, not for perfection, but for life.
inspire.author: Sean Coons

inspire.quote: If we do not wish to perish, we must pray.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Refuse to succumb to the ultimate aim of the Propaganda Age, which is to flood you with ever-changing distractions and thereby fool you into thinking there is no such thing as truth.
inspire.author: Sean Coons

inspire.quote: This day offers a full range of amazing experiences and blessings. You may laugh, you may cry, you may get tired, you may get wet, you may fall in love, you may get dirty... adventure is like that. Treat today like an adventure... EXPLORE... don't walk around it.... JUMP IN!
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: As much as possible, allow yourself to be a raw nerve end that internalizes whatever is experienced in life.
inspire.author: Jeff VanderMeer

inspire.quote: Where we are today was an impossibility yesterday, what we see as impossible today is a possibility tomorrow. There is no such thing as an impossible dream.I’m here to inspire young people to believe in Possibilities.
inspire.author: Edem Agbana

inspire.quote: It is a bit of a dream. And so we'll dream it. With a little courage, we can dream it for the rest of our lives.
inspire.author: Roxanne Veletzos

inspire.quote: Do something everyday towards the fulfillment of your dreams.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Then the vision of an enormous town presented itself, of a monstrous town more populous than some continents and in its man-mad might as if indifferent to heaven's frowns and smiles; a cruel devourer of the world's light. There was room enough there to place any story, depth enough there for any passion, variety enough there for any setting, darkness enough there to bury five millions of lives.
inspire.author: Joseph Conrad

inspire.quote: Then the vision of an enormous town presented itself, of a monstrous town more populous than some continents and in its man-made might as if indifferent to heaven's frowns and smiles; a cruel devourer of the world's light. There was room enough there to place any story, depth enough there for any passion, variety enough there for any setting, darkness enough there to bury five millions of lives.
inspire.author: Joseph Conrad

inspire.quote: Everyone deals with crap in life. You're not supposed to sit around and let the crap deal with you because you deal with the crap.
inspire.author: Charleen Pan

inspire.quote: I am feeling demotivated today! But that itself is a motivation to do some work that keeps me motivated to expect the good results. Results that will be good enough to motivate me for tomorrow.
inspire.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

inspire.quote: God delights to hear people pray.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Difficulties are necessary to know the Divine Being.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Love leads the way to the Lord of life.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Sorrow is never shared.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Psychiatrists say unrealistic expectations lead to depression, but why else are we alive if not to dream? Every expectation is unrealistic until it is made a spectacular reality through inspiration, hard work, and persistence.
inspire.author: Stewart Stafford

inspire.quote: I think today is a day for the heart. What do you think?
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Drizzle happiness wherever you go.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: One is far better off feeling than one is thinking.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Love is perfectly imperfect.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The stars are there to guide us to our dreams, but we must make an effort to follow.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Laughter lightens the soul.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The truth is powerful.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Reach from the heart, speak from the soul, and shine with love.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Trust within.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: You were born to be amazing. Why be anything else?
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The reason people treat you like trash is because that is what they are.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Bring your elite energy to the table.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be the author who deserves admiration and trust.
inspire.author: Mark Coker

inspire.quote: Praying is the heavenly paradise.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: A great snow is the calm death of struggle and the transformative birth of life.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: To be a champion you have to believe in yourself when nobody else will.
inspire.author: Sugar Ray Robinson

inspire.quote: Live boldly. Love boldly.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Extend your calm.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Follow your own circle. See where it takes you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Have a firmer grasp or grip on your dream. Then you can anchor yourself in that, and you won't be swayed on way or another.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Have a firmer grasp or grip on your dream. Then you can anchor yourself in that, and you won't be swayed one way or another.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: And now you're nineteen, dancing around the kitchen with bare feet and batter-covered hands. You haven't got a care for those minute heartbreaks of the past. You've got the rest of your life ahead of you, and your heart brims with a love that outlasts.
inspire.author: Erin Forbes

inspire.quote: In the brilliance of the evening, Her lofty shadow skins the light. Caught between reflections weaving, Wings extended, gold and white.Lilting song, ballad sweetening, Songbird of the heavens gleaming.In all that is, in all that shall be.An angel with unearthly sight.
inspire.author: Erin Forbes

inspire.quote: Love boldly. Live boldly.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: We have the ability to shape our lives.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Take a deep dive within.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: One has to take care of oneself first.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: It is important to make full use of every day.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Shine at your fullest.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: This is the new year the new you. You can pass through another year, coasting on cruise control. Or you can step out of your comfort zone, trying things you have never done before, & make 2012 as the year that you elevate from where you are & soar high. Make it happen!
inspire.author: Pablo

inspire.quote: First of all, let me assert my firm belief that the only thing we have to fear is fear itself - nameless, unreasoning, unjustified terror which paralyzes needed efforts to convert retreat into advance.
inspire.author: Franklin Roosevelt

inspire.quote: The bird of paradise alights only upon the hand that does not grasp.
inspire.author: John Berry

inspire.quote: Lee’s hand shook as he filled the delicate cups. He drank his down in one gulp. "Don’t you see?" he cried. "The American Standard translation orders men to triumph over sin, and you can call sin ignorance. The King James translation makes a promise in ‘Thou shalt,’ meaning that men will surely triumph over sin. But the Hebrew word, the word timshel—‘Thou mayest’— that gives a choice. It might be the most important word in the world. That says the way is open. That throws it right back on a man. For if ‘Thou mayest’—it is also true that ‘Thou mayest not.’ Don’t you see?
inspire.author: John Steinbeck

inspire.quote: Did you have a rough month? I did :( but, you know what? There’s no time to dwell on a missed opportunity or worry about what I should’ve done or said, beating myself up & making myself miserable about my mistakes. That doesn’t work. So will take notes from that, put it behind me, move on & finish the year STRONG
inspire.author: Pablo

inspire.quote: On the second floor was the office in which Houston pounded an ancient typewriter with two fingers, always setting an example of unceasing hard work for his admiring students. They had no hint of the fact that their hard-driving dean had contracted tuberculosis while serving as a GI in France in Word War I. Houstan always seemed vibrant and impassioned in the chase for justice as he tried to expose his students to everything relating to the law that might give them an advantage.. . ."I never worked hard until I got to the Howard Law School and met Charlie Houston," Marshal told me. "I saw this man's dedication, his vision, his willingness to sacrifice, and I told myself, 'You either shape up or ship out.' When you are being challenged by a great human being, you know that you can't ship out."So Houston rescued Marshall and launched him into a career as one of the greatest lawyers in American history.
inspire.author: Carl T. Rowan

inspire.quote: Of course, there will always be those who look only at technique, who ask 'how', while others of a more curious nature will ask 'why'. Personally, I have always preferred inspiration to information.
inspire.author: Man Ray

inspire.quote: Writing a story, regardless of length, begins always with a single word.
inspire.author: Don Roff

inspire.quote: I'm not particularly in favor of doctrine or creed, ordination, the elevation of holy texts, the institution of church, or, for that matter, Christianity. Like most religions, it has irreconcilable shortcomings and an unforgivable history. What I do favor is the attempt to make sense of things by living within a story. The Christian story, for good or ill, is my inheritance.
inspire.author: Elizabeth J. Andrew

inspire.quote: The whole concatenation of wild and artificial things, the natural ecosystem as modified by people over the centuries, the build environment layered over layers, the eerie mix of sounds and smells and glimpses neither natural nor crafted- all of it is free for the taking, for the taking in. Take it, take it in, take in more every weekend, every day, and quickly it becomes the theater that intrigues, relaxes, fascinates, seduces, and above all expands any mind focused on it. Outside lies utterly ordinary space open to any casual explorer willing to find the extraordinary. Outside lies unprogrammed awareness that at times becomes directed serendipity. Outside lies magic.
inspire.author: John Stilgoe

inspire.quote: The problem is not that you have problems; the problem is that you see having problems as a problem.
inspire.author: Maurice Makalu

inspire.quote: Whatever harm I would do to another, I shall do first to myself.As I respect and am kind to myself, so shall I respect and be kind to peers, to elders, to kits.I claim for others the freedom to live as they wish, to think and believe as they will. I claim that freedom for myself.I shall make each choice and live each day to my highest sense of right.
inspire.author: Richard Bach

inspire.quote: We train the mind so that we can enjoy greater peace, happiness, wisdom & equanimity.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: The Imagination merely enables us to wander into the darkness of the unknown where, by the dim light of the knowledge we carry, we may glimpse something that seems of interest. But when we bring it out and examine it more closely it usually proves to be only trash whose glitter had caught our attention. Imagination is at once the source of all hope and inspiration but also of frustration. To forget this is to court despair.
inspire.author: William Ian Beardmore Beveridge

inspire.quote: The erruption of feelings & emotions that follows a near-death exerience, or any event that causes us to stop & look deeply at the reality of our lives, is ripe with the potential for insight & clarity.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: When gangs took over the [abandoned public land in Philadelphia] and the neighborhood took a turn for the worse, horses became a way of saving lives. By getting boys interested in raising a horse rather than killing another human being, these cowboys gave the youth something positive: father figures, focus, and the ability to stand tall.
inspire.author: G. Neri

inspire.quote: The road to wealth is sown with false starts and failures that should in no way discourage the poor who make good or our neighbors with new found riches. We have to give it our all.
inspire.author: Roberto Bolaño

inspire.quote: Amida's unimpeded light is the sun of wisdom that destroys the mind of darkness.(Preface in Teaching, Practice, Faith, Enlightenment)
inspire.author: Kentetsu Takamori

inspire.quote: Inspiration comes unawares, from unaccountable sources that have nothing to do with planning or intelligence. Let it cool ever so slightly, and you are left, pen or brush in hand, with no inspiration at all. Gifted people need not, therefore, make a song and dance about being or supposing themselves superior. They simply happened to be born with that fortunate, subconscious equipment of theirs, and the mystery exists independently of intelligence or ambition.
inspire.author: Maurice Chevalier

inspire.quote: We are spiritual children of God the Father. We preach it. We sing it. But do we really understand it? Sometimes it’s easy to tell others they are loved, but not so easy to believe it of ourselves — not because we don’t think God loves His children, but because we may feel undeserving of His love. The adversary loves to remind us who we are not. Not pretty. Not smart. Not strong. But God would not have sacrificed His Son to save us if we aren’t worth saving.
inspire.author: Toni Sorenson

inspire.quote: The heart of a person only beats when it's surrounded by blood, by family.
inspire.author: Erica Goros

inspire.quote: Let us be sure that the lady of our choice possesses certain tangible qualities that we admire; and if in other ways she falls short of our ideal, we must be patient and call to mind those qualities that first induced us to begin our courting.
inspire.author: Lady Murasaki Shikibu

inspire.quote: Lately the muse has been treating me like Ike treated Tina.
inspire.author: Quentin R. Bufogle

inspire.quote: There will come a time in every girl's life when she realizes that your ex-girlfriend wasn't crazy. Actually, she was right (about you).
inspire.author: Nakia R. Laushaul

inspire.quote: A teacher will be frustrated if she is only motivated to teach what she has learned. Yet, if she is motivated because of the students, then she will learn from them how to teach.
inspire.author: Tanya R. Liverman

inspire.quote: His heart was as great as the world, but there was no room in it to hold the memory of a wrong
inspire.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

inspire.quote: Never let what you cannot do, stop you from doing what you can do!
inspire.author: Stephen Pierce

inspire.quote: Sang waktu tidak akn pernah berbaik hati pada kelalaian
inspire.author: Atik

inspire.quote: It's hard to tell where reality ends and illusions begins. They blend - then they separate
inspire.author: Lind Goodman

inspire.quote: Humility is not weakness but a price for greatness. Be humble for CHRIST sake and watch GOD take you to places you never dreamt.
inspire.author: James C. Uwandu

inspire.quote: See everything right in life and it will be right. See everything wrong in life and it will be wrong.
inspire.author: Meir Ezra

inspire.quote: I wonder if you don't have somebody in your life that just the very thought of that person makes you feel better. It would be wonderful if you could take a minute, at least a minute every day, to think of such a person. Just think. Just be quiet and think. It would make all the difference in the world.
inspire.author: Amy Hollingsworth

inspire.quote: We do indeed weave our spirit to the events and relationships of our lives. Life is as simple as that.
inspire.author: Caroline Myss

inspire.quote: Sky is not the limit
inspire.author: William Carbone

inspire.quote: Love is always possible.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be faithful, follow the light and you will lead a wonderful joyous life. Who wouldn't want that?
inspire.author: S.J. Stanners

inspire.quote: We are here to dance to the music of our souls, to live in the wonder of our presence, and to be who we are in the beauty of our divine being.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: One of the greatest gifts in life is travel.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Follow your heart and follow your happiness.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Empower yourself and surround yourself with others who empower you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: There is nature and energy in everything we do and all that we are.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Art lights up the world.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: You got to give it all you can possible do.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Springtime is soul of awakeness.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: My mission is my message
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: We are here to live life in love, peace, and happiness.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Today is a great day to remember who YOU are.
inspire.author: Julieanne O'Connor

inspire.quote: Pets are our loving guides and our faithful companions.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be the star that you are.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Don't copy. Create.
inspire.author: Joe Calloway

inspire.quote: Always keep a positive outlook on everything you do. Break down challenges to manageable tasks and keep moving forward. By tackling one task at a time, you will reach your goal before you know it.
inspire.author: Marta Pona

inspire.quote: It's What You Believe Not Just What You Do That Attracts Or Repels God.. Most Times Your Doings Are Birthed By Your Beliefs...God Is More Interested In The WHYs Than In The WHATs...
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: One of the best things you can do for yourself is to be kind to yourself.
inspire.author: Angel Moreira

inspire.quote: Take your garbage somewhere else 'cause I'm not buying it.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Take a spa week.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: World salad is a circular conversation to avoid the real topic.
inspire.author: Tracy A. Malone

inspire.quote: What if he figured out that a real life, a true life, a meaningful life, a grand life is one marked by courage and truth and honor and that is the kind of life he wants to live even if it impoverishes or kills him; even if it kills you; you the pragmatic man?
inspire.author: Roman McClay

inspire.quote: Music is the single most powerful medium in the world it transcends the universe and it is not confined by time or space, it is immortal.
inspire.author: Delma Pryce

inspire.quote: Your success is limited to how big or small you think...Think Global to go Global.
inspire.author: Tommy Swanhaus

inspire.quote: I feel alive in ghost mode.
inspire.author: Jordan Hoechlin

inspire.quote: What is lovely never dies, but passes into other loveliness, Star-dust, or sea-foam, flower or winged air.
inspire.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

inspire.quote: What we can change is our perceptions, which have the effect of changing everything.
inspire.author: Donna Quesada

inspire.quote: The thing I want you especially to understand is this feeling of divine revelation. I feel that this structure was "out there" all along I just couldn't see it. And now I can! This is really what keeps me in the math game-- the chance that I might glimpse some kind of secret underlying truth, some sort of message from the gods.
inspire.author: Paul   Lockhart

inspire.quote: There are... otherwise quite decent people who are so dull of nature that they believe that they must attribute the swift flight of fancy to some illness of the psyche, and thus it happens that this or that writer is said to create not other than while imbibing intoxicating drink or that his fantasies are the result of overexcited nerves and resulting fever. But who can fail to know that, while a state of psychical excitement caused by the one or other stimulant may indeed generate some lucky and brilliant ideas, it can never produce a well-founded, substantial work of art that requires the utmost presence of mind.
inspire.author: E.T.A. Hoffmann

inspire.quote: The best of humanity's recorded history is a creative balance between horrors endured and victories achieved, and so it was during the Harlem Renaissance.
inspire.author: Aberjhani

inspire.quote: We can make room for more experiences of radiance, peace, and beauty; and when we do, they arrive. When we make an intention to experience peace, when we value it enough to make room for it and invite it into our busy lives, it arrives bearing gifts. We make room for this guest, not by doing anything, but by just being, just allowing ourselves to rest, once and for all, in this sweet moment with no agenda, no purpose, no reason, but just to experience the moment as it is. We make room for peace and happiness by just noticing them. We notice that they are already here, and noticing them brings them more strongly into focus. Peace and happiness are always here, but they often go unnoticed.
inspire.author: Gina Lake

inspire.quote: Is being burnt a requisite for the making of art? Personally, I don't think it is. But art is poultice for a burn. It is a privilege to have, somewhere within you, a capacity for making something speak from your own seared experience.
inspire.author: Molly Peacock

inspire.quote: Loving oneselfIs the most primalOf all survival mechanisms
inspire.author: Karen Hackel

inspire.quote: Fight ever on: this earthly stuff If used God’s way will be enough. Face to the firing line o friendFight out life’s battle to the end. One soldier, when the fight was red,Threw down his broken sword and fled.Another snatched it, won the day, With what his comrade flung away.
inspire.author: Edwin Markham

inspire.quote: Good men do the most harm.
inspire.author: Henry Adams

inspire.quote: Love is the only energy I’ve ever used as a writer. I’ve never written out of anger, although anger has informed love.
inspire.author: Athol Fugard

inspire.quote: When you let go of past pain, believe in yourself, and follow your dreams—you can find true happiness!
inspire.author: Casi McLean

inspire.quote: -حياه الانسان هي مشوار طويل عبر الليل , ملي بالمتاعب والالام,تحيطه الاشباح مغير المرئيه,تجاه هدف واحيأمل القليلون في الوصول اليه ولا يتمهل أحد طويلا قبالته.واحدا تلو الاخر , وبينما هم سائرون ,يختفي رفاقنا عن انظارنا ,تقبضهم الاوامر الصامته للموت القاهر, وقصير جدا ذلك الوقت الذي نستطيع فيه مسااعدتهم , والذي تتحدد فيه سعادتهم او شقاؤهم.فليكن اذن أن ننثر الضياء في طريقهم, ونخفف أحزانهم بأكف التعاطف, ونمنحهم الغبطه الخالصه للتعاطف الذي لا يفتر ,بأن نقوي العزائم المنهاره ونوفر لهم الايمان في ساعات اليأس , ولنتوقف عن قياس مزاياهم وعيوبهم بمقاييس جامده, ولنفكر فقط في احتياجاتهم, في الاحزان والصعوبات والقهر والعمي الذي يكتنف حياتهم ويسبب لهم البؤس , ولنتذكر انهم كانوا رفاق المعاناه في نفس الظلمات, وممثلين في نفس التراجيديا معنا.
inspire.author: برتراند راسل  | bertrand russell

inspire.quote: Anything creative requires a bit of acting,and filling in blanks with imagination.
inspire.author: Christina Westover

inspire.quote: Faith is the door to the full inner life of the Church, a life which includes not only access to an authoritative teaching but above all to a deep personal experience which is at once unique and yet shared by the whole Body of Christ, in the Spirit of Christ.
inspire.author: Thomas Merton

inspire.quote: In tough and desperate times when your creativity begs to be birthed, loose the confines of the ground; stand up in your faith and walk atop the waves…
inspire.author: Stanice Anderson

inspire.quote: It's how we see the world that keeps the darkness beyond at bay. Keeps it from pouring through and devouring us. I think all of us might know that, way down deep.
inspire.author: Stephen King

inspire.quote: Think it. Write it. Sell it.
inspire.author: Dee J. Adams

inspire.quote: Meditation is essentially training our attention so that we can be more aware— not only of our own inner workings but also of what’s happening around us in the here & now.
inspire.author: Sharon Salzberg

inspire.quote: People need not fear the unknown if they have a capable of achieving what they need and what
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Being a senior doesn't automatically make one wise but the wise & foolish alike have things to teach us.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: You know how sometimes you remember a place you once loved, a movie you’ve enjoyed, only to be disappointed when you return to that place or see that movie for a second time? Well, it wasn’t disappointing. She sounds exactly as I remember her—and there is still something so warm and caring about her that it is difficult to hate her for how she abandoned us.
inspire.author: Christina Westover

inspire.quote: We must experience certain things in life, even in our childhood, so we can later look back and value the journey.
inspire.author: Tanya R. Liverman

inspire.quote: Language imparts identity, meaning, and perspective to our human condition. Writers are either polluters or part of the cleanup.
inspire.author: Mary Pipher

inspire.quote: The average Bhutanese knows much more about the world than the average American...(for Americans)It is more comfortable to watch fake news about celebrities than to know what's happening in China or southern Sudan. But events happening in China or Sudan affect us so much more because they are real.
inspire.author: Linda Leaming

inspire.quote: Real freedom lies in wildness,not in civilization!!
inspire.author: Charles Lindberg

inspire.quote: Strong delusions travel like cold germs on a sneeze.
inspire.author: Stephen King

inspire.quote: The number of those who have nothing to recommend them and of those in whom nothing but good can be found is probably equal
inspire.author: Lady Murasaki Shikibu

inspire.quote: Your tears only water your weeds
inspire.author: Red

inspire.quote: Writing is the voices inside our heads, our minds, the creativity that exists for us to, from nothing, create alternate worlds, manipulate a personality or to introduce a new kind of love, a new kind of hate or pain or happiness or wonder or... anything we want. Through words, we can do, we can be anything we want.
inspire.author: Allie Burke

inspire.quote: A good preview makes you want to see the whole movie.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be a burst of joy.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: All uniquely defines itself.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: If it's not going to matter tomorrow, it shouldn't matter today.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Pour your heart onto the page.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Vulnerability lets in light.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Look upon the world with wonder.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be one with today's adventure.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The gift of knowledge is empowering. The gift of wisdom is life-changing.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: You are your own magical elixir. Waste not one drop.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Fear is the enemy of success.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be yourself. Accomplish miracles.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: How could people not believe in magic when the whole world is made of it?
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The world is with you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Once you realize life is magic, you will never look upon the world with dimmed eyes again.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Sometimes you have to take a shot in the dark to discover the light.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Love is the answer.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Light your fire.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: There is magic in the old and magic in the new. The trick is to successfully combine the two.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: In the equation of life, the limit does not exist.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Doubt: How can I know? Truth: How can you not?
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: See your light.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Creativity is magic in the making.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: It's amazing what you can do when you get creative.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Hollywood shines by virtue of light within.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Have the discipline to listen to and to trust your instincts.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Every work of art tells a story.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Intuition is truth.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: All answers to life's key questions are found within.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Love your story.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: If ever I was running, it was towards you.
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: I love him in ways that I can’t explain to other people. They don’t understand… it’s not their fault.
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: I really believe that there is an invisible red thread tied between him and me, and that it has stretched and tangled for years — across oceans and lifetimes. I know that it won’t break because our souls are tied.
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: I could watch him do this until morning — never asking questions and never interrupting his work. I worship quietly — his intense focus and attention to detail and then, out of no where, I realize the inconvenient, inappropriate truth: ‘I love this man… and it has swallowed me.
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: I just want your voice aimed at me again. I want to absorb the direction of your eyes…
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: Everything hurts right now and nothing is helping because as the pain is getting worse — so is the love.
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: Those who don't value their words, will never value your wishes.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: You can grow like a tall tree, when you enjoy the sun, wind, rain, storms and the stars in the dark nights.
inspire.author: Amit Ray

inspire.quote: I want you to trust yourself, baby. Love is all that matters and you’ve always known that. You’ve known, since you were a very little girl, what your life is meant to be about…
inspire.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

inspire.quote: Ability, experience and books have solution for all the problems.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: A poet, you see, is a light thing, and winged and holy, and cannot compose before he gets inspiration and loses control of his senses and his reason has deserted him.
inspire.author: Plato

inspire.quote: Suffering is the noblest art, the quieter the better.
inspire.author: Chang-rae Lee

inspire.quote: Life is the only thing which can never be replaced when lost.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: If you like fantasy and you want to be the next Tolkien, don’t read big Tolkienesque fantasies — Tolkien didn’t read big Tolkienesque fantasies, he read books on Finnish philology. Go and read outside of your comfort zone, go and learn stuff.
inspire.author: Neil Gaiman

inspire.quote: If a picture paints a thousand words, then a let a picture inspire a thousand words.
inspire.author: Nicholas Boyd Crutchley

inspire.quote: Your youth is certainly finished and old age has definitely arrived if you feel that you are losing enthusiasm, excitement and energy towards your dreams and goals.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: To fall in love for any reason does cause fires of emotion. When we are in love, we ride on a positive energy as compared to not being in love. When we are love, we transcend conditional love to that of unconditional and we are now flowering in consciousness. Love is a very important element of consciousness as it becomes purer with Source union even as our consciousness is expanded further. Consciousness is love that is light.
inspire.author: Nandhi Tapasyogi

inspire.quote: He talked about the future with such certainty, he might have been talking about the past.
inspire.author: Michael Dobbs

inspire.quote: Compromise brings harmony to both, happiness to none.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: One thing I've learned: we don't stumble accidentally into an amazing life. It takes decision, a commitment to consistently work on ourselves.
inspire.author: Kamal Ravikant

inspire.quote: There is hero in everyone.Never doubt who you are.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Whatever you dream of, there will be fulfillment.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: If you think you've seen it all, put on your sunglasses, because you're about to be surprised.
inspire.author: Vannetta Chapman

inspire.quote: If there's a definition of freedom, I think it's this: living life on your terms.
inspire.author: Kamal Ravikant

inspire.quote: Between natural ability and education choose natural ability, as it will keep you happy and will fetch you the glory sooner.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: I like the disaster of the night sky, stars spilling this way and that as if they were upturned from a glass. I like the way good madness feels. I like the way laughter always spills. That's the word for it. It never just comes, it spills. I like the word 'again'. Again and again and again and again and again and again and again and again. I like the quiet sound a coffee cup makes when it's set down on a wooden table. So hushed. So inviting. Like morning light yawning through the window and stretching out onto the kitchen floor. I like the way girls' lips look like they're stained with berries. I like the way morning light breaks like a prism through the empty wine bottles on our dusty apartment floor. Glasses empty except for the midnight hour. I like the way blueberries stain my fingers during the summer. I like the way light hits your eyes and turns it into a color that doesn't exist anywhere else other than in this moment. I want it all. I want the breeze to call my name as it rushes down my street, looking for me. I want to feel grass underneath my bare feet and I want to feel the sun kiss freckles onto my cheeks. I want to hear you yell hello as you make your way towards me, not goodbye as you have to go. That's just a little bit about me.
inspire.author: Marlen Komar

inspire.quote: If careful attention is paid to the reality, we will see clearly, the real shortage is of the right skills, rather than of jobs. If the right skills are developed, the right start-ups and other enterprises will emerge and provide the jobs needed. It’s always the horse before the cart, not the other way round. At a personal level, it will require the realisation of the need for the acquisition of required skills, the discipline to pursue it and the commitment to push through. These will require a great deal of personal courage and effort. But then, the benefit will be immeasurable.
inspire.author: Emi Iyalla

inspire.quote: The fact is not kill entire populations is able to infect entire regions of land and control the only cure.
inspire.author: Ted Dekker

inspire.quote: Anything is Possible!
inspire.author: Sealove

inspire.quote: Your inspiration taps hidden reserves of promise that sustain people through times that induce despair. You enable people to envision a future that sustains the best from their past while also holding out new possibilities.
inspire.author: Ronald Heifetz

inspire.quote: I’ll try even when the odds are overwhelmingly against me. Only this time, strings will be pulled, bridges will be burned, and the worst of pandora’s box will see light of day.
inspire.author: Louise Philippe Dulay

inspire.quote: Only survival and ambition makes one confront their own fears.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Sales people produce their own fruits. They should own them, whether they taste great or horrible!
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: If the pushing-yourself-forward is the engine, then the patting-yourself-on-the-back should be the oil to keep going.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: When spirit of Christ calls, heed to the heavenly voice.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: A dream is not simply an idea to entertain a life gone bored. Rather, it is a reality waiting to ignite a world gone dark.
inspire.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

inspire.quote: Every life led to a series of quiet epiphanies - or at least to opportunities for epiphanies - and Chyna was washed by a poignant new grief when she thought about this grim aspect of the Templeton family's interrupted journeys. The kindnesses they might have done for others. The love they might have given. The things they might have come to understand in their hearts.
inspire.author: Dean Koontz

inspire.quote: The parameters are the things you bounce off of to create art.
inspire.author: Neil Gaiman

inspire.quote: Uncovering the right problem is half the solution.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Love leads the way to light.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita
