inspire.quote: Envy is an error.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Sales is like courting, you just need more than a cocktail.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: If it is to be, it's up to YOU!
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Easily gained is easily lost.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: In order to expect change, we must first change ourselves.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: You never jump far when you are standing still.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Practicing what you preach is a lot more difficult than preaching what you practice.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Talk about trouble and live troubled, talk about dreams and live passionately.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: True happiness is being happy without a reason.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Your life is empty, if you got nothing to die for.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Living in the past makes your future predictable.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Challenge your sales force, but above all, set your sales people up to succeed, not to fail.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Only survival and true ambition makes one confront their own fears."
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: You can't really lose a game you are not supposed to play.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: If you cant sell it to yourself, you cant sell it to someone else.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: If you don't like the game, change the rules.
inspire.author: Yuri van der Sluis

inspire.quote: Like I said in previous videos, if I don't come forward exposing this stuff, then I'm no different than a bully; if I don't stand by the words I've written or said, then I'd be a hypocrite!
inspire.author: Matthew Kenslow

inspire.quote: If you endured the pain, you will be purified.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Rocket-fueled rapt ambition; fate concedes to my volition. There is nothing I can't take wherever there's a win at stake.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: Wouldn’t it be perfect if I could fit in and never worry about what others were thinking? To be free of these vacant, immutable fantasies and released from this ceaseless want of emotional refuge? To be normal. Would that I were.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: Close your eyes. Hear the silent snow. Listen to your soul speak.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Breathe the present.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Take a yoga retreat week.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: That which is cool is driven by the soul.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Live like you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: A spiritual life is never boring.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Love is written by the soul.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be irresistible.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Beauty is light set free.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Creativity is strength.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Live in the flow of you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Your happiness is very powerful. Never waste it.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Keep living in your higher vibrational realm.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Always have class, but always kick ass.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Cry while writing it, and readers will cry while reading it.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Let yourself expand.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Ignore evil people.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Fill your day with you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Don't look behind you. You're not going that way.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be the energy you want others to absorb.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Every day, live in a way that honors who you are.

inspire.quote: We are the thoughts we choose to keep.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Music is a writer's heartbeat.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: I hear you in the morning sun.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: When a writer's heart is filled with the music of her soul, her words sing.

inspire.quote: If someone tells you something is impossible, make it possible.

inspire.quote: We encounter truth within.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The muse is the mystic force, but you are the master.

inspire.quote: In hindu tradition, before removing the herb or root from the original plant, they will do rituals called mooligai prana pratishtha, meaning any curse or impurities on that herb, the prana pratishtha will be done in such a way that even after the root is removed, it will continue to have life in it. A dead leaf cannot heal you. Only herbs with life can heal you.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: On that herb, the science of kayakalpa will be programmed. When you take that in, all the parasites sitting inside you which makes you addicted to food and activities which are not aligned to your kayakalpa, all those parasites will be sent out of you. You will be detoxed and free from those. So automatically your thought currents, lifestyle, even desires will be aligned to your immortality, to your kayakalpa.*the whole system needs to raise to that extreme powerful, intelligent awareness.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: You are not a living mechanism, you are a living organism.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: You have various internal organs like heart, lungs, brain, stomach, intestine, liver, kidney...*all these internal organs are centrally commanded, administered and made to function in a coordinated way on certain principles. *all of them have certain understanding and principle among them. That principle is called dharma.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: So each one of you has a dharma inside you. If you do little research, you can see very clearly, how your heart supports digestion, how your digestive system supports detox, how your kidney supports your lungs to function, how your lungs supply prana to the whole body and keep you active, alive, energetic. All of them work aligned to dharma, to certain principles.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: A very powerful, superior, independent intelligence is responsible for this whole organism. If you can just sit unclutched, you will understand that dharma. You will be able to decode the software on which you are functioning. You will see how the command to your lungs is passed, what kind of command is given to your heart, how your brain cognizes everything. Then your consciousness will automatically recognise the software coding based on which your organism is functioning.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: A poem either makes you alone or accompanied. It is either Self-Expedition or Global-Expression.
inspire.author: Madhushree Das

inspire.quote: There is a powerful independent intelligence system inside you which is coordinating your whole existence. How different internal organs are functioning and how they are interrelated, to how you think and feel about you, what kind of reaction / reaction you experience in your life, how life happens to you, how you perceive life, this whole science...It happens in a very systematic way in you.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: When you sit unclutched, you will see clearly: paramashiva is inside, this kailasa is your body, your heart is parashakti, your gut is mahaganapati, your lungs is nandi, all his parivara devatas are your internal organs. The independent intelligence, consciousness with which he operates this whole kailasa is one team.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: More and more unclutching, you will catch the whole software coding: why and when your heart is asked to pump more, why and when your lungs are asked to breathe deep, why and when your stomach is asked to digest fast, why and when your bp is asked to be low, why and when you experience stress in your brain, why and when you experience peace. *this whole internal coding of your organism will be revealed to you when you sit unclutched.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: If you know your dharma, you will use the same to build your teamily.*you will know exactly who you should inspire, who should be given fear, who should be given greed, who should be given inspiration, who should be given love, who should be given gifts, who should be given punishment. You will simply know the science of building your life.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: If you know what is the code, what kind of a methodology you use to coordinate your heart and lungs and brain, how you inspire them, keep them active, alive, healthy, you'll simply know how to keep your business and family active, alive, healthy.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: I want all of you to know: genetically itself Hindu women carry this knowledge. This knowledge is in the DNA of Hindu women. Hindu women are the best to make a stable family.Whether as head of the family or a sanyasi, nun, or in business, Hindu women are the best.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: हम सब जानते हैं कि ईश्वर तो सभी को सहज रूप से उपलब्ध हैं। और सबसे ज्यादा उपलब्ध तो आपके भीतर ही है।अपरिमित आनन्द, अपार शान्ति और अद्भुत रस, ऊर्जा के रूप में - आपकी चेतना के रूप में वो सदैव आपके भीतर ही मौजूद हैं।आवश्यकता है तो अंतस में गोता लगाने की। आवश्यकता है खुद को अपने वास्तविक स्वरूप का बोध करवाने की - अपनी सनातनता, नित्यता, शाश्वत सत्य और ईश्वरीय विधान को समझाने की। आवश्यकता है सोये हुए इसी सामर्थ्य को - चैतन्य को जगाने की।निरन्तर प्रार्थना आपको अपने इसी वास्तविक स्वरूप का बोध करवाती है। प्रार्थना उस परम आंनद, असीमित सामर्थ्य और ऊर्जा के स्रोत को पहचानने का प्रयास है जो आपके भीतर छुपा है। प्रार्थना का मतलब न सिर्फ स्वयं में ईश्वरीयतत्व को ढूंढना है बल्कि अन्य सभी मे भी उनके होने पर विश्वास करना है।मेरे आराध्य प्रभु से प्रार्थना है कि वो आपको स्वयं की भूमिका, उद्देश्य और महानता को जल्द ही पहचानने में सहायता करें जिससे आपकी वैचारिक एवं व्यवहारिक उच्चता और श्रेष्ठता सभी के लिए प्रेरणा का स्त्रोत बन जाएं। आज और आने वाला प्रत्येक नया दिन आपके लिए अत्यंत सुखद रहे, आपका घर-संसार खुशियों से सदैव भरा रहे, ऐसी सब मेरी हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं हैं।
inspire.author: Rajesh Goyal

inspire.quote: Collide into challenges. It's a place to rise up from.
inspire.author: Hiral Nagda

inspire.quote: If you start taking haritaki powder, don't think it will only cleanse your intestine and work only as a laxative and you will become healthy. That is only a small effect of haritaki. Every night if you take haritaki powder, not just it will bring you health, it will remove all the parasites from your muscle memory and intestine.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Life is a beautiful gambling. Either it can make you god or it can just destroy you. It is how you play. Life is neither good nor bad, it is how you play.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: The person who does delayed gratification lives a healthy, long life because the parasites in him can't trigger patterns in him. Delayed gratification will kill the parasites and the patterns triggered by the parasites.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: The person who unclutches and understands his source code - the source code of his internal software, becomes the best person to strategise even for social / economical / political success.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: I understood the source code software of myself, my body, how the various organs of my body are coordinated, how they are all inspired, excited, what inspires them, what makes them active, alive, energetic... I have understood that source code. Because of that, even poison could not kill me.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Karma is not what you committed or omitted. It is the unattended part of your inner space software - the blindspot of your inner software's functioning.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: My Poems were written without a purpose, other than the expression of faiths and ideals strongly realized and emotions keenly felt. They were written for the joy of writing, and for the satisfaction of an irresistible impulse. It is my belief that it is not the business of art either to teach or to preach.
inspire.author: Florence Earle Coates

inspire.quote: When a body is used actively, intensely, it is healthy. When the internal organs are kept intensely active, it has long life.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: When you use the body intensely and actively, you'll become energetic. The more you use the body, the more you become healthy.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: The more you use your internal organs, especially when you are fasting, every organ becomes more active and more usable. Every time you fast for continuous 24 hours, the whole system becomes active and alive.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: If you are very sincere about enlightenment, then twice a week, treat yourself royally, means stop eating; 24 hours absolutely no food. That's the best pampering you can do to you.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: The best food for your body is what is already gathered and stored. Allow the body to eat itself without giving food from outside.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Our bidadi banyan tree - kalpavriksha, has the unique power that even if you are not there in bidadi ashram physically, if you see the live webcam relay and do pranayama, you will experience the same thing!Each tree’s breathing space has certain energy when you do pranayama under that tree. That energy gets filled inside your system.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: People who want to achieve enlightenment, be with paramashiva and manifest paramashiva, if they don't become sincere, we need to work with those people. They need support, care, inspiration, sincerity, energy, everything. That is what I do and I am doing even now..
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: 13 September. Again barely two pages. At first I thought my sorrow over the Austrian defeats and my anxiety for the future (anxiety that appears ridiculous to me at bottom, and base too) would prevent me from doing any writing. But that wasn’t it, it was only an apathy that forever comes back and forever has to be put down again. There is time enough for sorrow when I am not writing. The thoughts provoked in me by the war resemble my old worries over F. in the tormenting way in which they devour me from every direction. I can’t endure worry, and perhaps have been created expressly in order to die of it. When I shall have grown weak enough –it won’t take very long –the most trifling worry will perhaps suffice to rout me. In this prospect I can also see a possibility of postponing the disaster as long as possible.
inspire.author: Franz Kafka

inspire.quote: Everything is going to be all right. Miracles happen every day.

inspire.quote: The only thing a closed book is good for is a table that wobbles. Be an open book.

inspire.quote: Extend your vacation whenever possible.

inspire.quote: Love is the key to everything. Love your life.

inspire.quote: When is now.

inspire.quote: Epiphanies awaken the soul.

inspire.quote: I fight evil, and words are my weapons of choice.

inspire.quote: Be one with yourself and revel in eternal bliss.

inspire.quote: When your heart is open, you feel all the beauty within you.

inspire.quote: Life is not a popularity contest.

inspire.quote: Look through the eyes of your highest self. What do you see?

inspire.quote: Believe so brightly that everyone sees the beauty in believing.

inspire.quote: Sometimes writing is like playing with fire... like trying to tame an uncontrollable beast.

inspire.quote: Follow life's bliss.

inspire.quote: Listen. Trust. Do.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: You always have it. It's always there.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Give all of life's oxygen to the fire that is your soul.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Don't look. See. Don't think. Feel. Don't hear. Listen.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: When we write, we discover answers, though the key is not in the discovery but in the timing of the implementation.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: A writer's breakthrough is a breakdown with a smile.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Life is short. Write naked.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Crying cleanses the soul.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Speak from your heart and feel your tension melt away.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Energy will go into what you love, and what you love will grow. Go for a walk and watch it bloom.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: You can curse the darkness, or you can dispel it.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Novelist by day; screenwriter by night.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Moving in the right direction is better than arriving at wrong destination. Obstacles are good because they either take our time or change our direction so that we reach the right destination at right time.
inspire.author: Shunya

inspire.quote: You are iron plated gold, running here and there to save yourself from rust. Stop identifying with the thin layer of iron; you are the gold underneath.
inspire.author: Shunya

inspire.quote: Imagine a person who keeps looking at places in "Google Maps" app whole day but doesn't actually go to any place.People who live in past or future are like that. They misuse the apps of mind that help us connect with past and future.
inspire.author: Shunya

inspire.quote: Be addicted to being amazing.
inspire.author: Angel Moreira

inspire.quote: You are the books you read, the films you watch, the music you listen to, the people you meet, the dreams you have, and the conversations you engage in. You are what you take from these. You are the sound of the ocean, breath of the fresh air, the brightest light and the darkest corner.You are a collective of every experience you have had in your life. You are every single second of every day. So drown yourself in a sea of knowledge and existence. Let the words run through your veins and the colors fill your mind until there is nothing left to do but explode, There are no wrong answers . Inspiration is everything. Sit back, relax, and take it all in.
inspire.author: Jac Vanek

inspire.quote: She wasn’t sure if it was strength or numbness… But either way… She was going to get up and get through this.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: Believe that you will succeed, and you will !
inspire.author: Dilshad Merchant

inspire.quote: You don't realize it at the time, but some of life's roadblocks, detours, and rejections are answered prayers.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better. Maya Angelou
inspire.author: Charlie Baxter

inspire.quote: Once you align your desires and beliefs, you can manifest anything in your life!
inspire.author: Theresa Lewis

inspire.quote: If the journey wasnt challenging the destination wouldn't be rewarding.It's the challenge that makes it great
inspire.author: Foster Mkhabele

inspire.quote: Although I'm not cheap, but I'm an affordable person by nature.
inspire.author: Nurudeen Ushawu

inspire.quote: We are all on the same page as we read God’s Word and thirst for a better understanding and closeness and relationship with Jesus.
inspire.author: Cheryl Rutledge-Brennecke

inspire.quote: The beginning is never the beginning. The ending is never the end.
inspire.author: Marlene G.

inspire.quote: Great things come with great smile. Wear it more !
inspire.author: Mac Alvi A. R

inspire.quote: Ending the toxic cycle within your own life isn't easy. When you don't come from a healthy family, you do your best to ensure a healthy one comes from you.
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: We don’t have it all, but we have everything we need.
inspire.author: Mac Alvi A. R

inspire.quote: I'm a conqueror, I am born to win. I am not here to be a slave to the system.
inspire.author: Nurudeen Ushawu

inspire.quote: Some write because they love to, some write because they have talent…, I write because I have something to say…, and I think that something has yet to be said just the way I want it to be said…
inspire.author: Busara Bin Hekima

inspire.quote: Forgive yourself as you strive to be your best self.
inspire.author: Angel Moreira

inspire.quote: Frazier's got two chances. Slim, and none. And Slim just left town.
inspire.author: Muhammad Ali

inspire.quote: Allow divine intuition and infinite wisdom to show you the dream and lead you to it!
inspire.author: Theresa Lewis

inspire.quote: The intention of your dressing becomes the intention of your day.
inspire.author: Michele Gustafson

inspire.quote: Dressing well is not about fashion or vanity. It’s about self-expression, self-acceptance, self-love, and teaching others how to treat you.
inspire.author: Michele Gustafson

inspire.quote: Clarity creates freedom.
inspire.author: Michele Gustafson

inspire.quote: Confidence comes from finishing.
inspire.author: Michele Gustafson

inspire.quote: Legacy lives in those you’ve changed.
inspire.author: Michele Gustafson

inspire.quote: There are two simple ways to create this window of connection with your Divine Self:When you are about to sleep or about to wake up, there is a short period where you are neither awake or asleep. This is when your mind is switched off, and you are directly connected with your Divine Self. Enter into silence, ask your Divine Self to draw you to itself. Then if you would like, ask for guidance, insight, or an answer. During the day you can take time out away from all gadgets, sit quietly, close your eyes, notice your breath, and give intention to make contact with your Divine Self, be open and receptive to all the inspiration and love offered to you.
inspire.author: Premlatha Rajkumar

inspire.quote: I see because I can.
inspire.author: Ankit Samrat

inspire.quote: I got up this morning with a plan to set the world on fire and I couldn't find my match.
inspire.author: Beverly Kelley

inspire.quote: Don't let the world tell you who you are. You get up and you show the world who you are.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Take your ego out of your story.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Let your story breathe.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The key is in the craft.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Listen when your heart speaks.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The greatest artists see what is invisible to the masses.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: We write until we find our way. Then the real fun begins.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Life is the stuff of miracles.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Shame is a state of mind.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Allow your mood to be sweet and your day will be sweet too.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Every day is a journey.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: You define you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: All the promise of a movie is in the trailer.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: As long as you're with you, that's all that matters.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: To my words: There was once a wall between us. Now we walk together and greet the world.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Creativity is nature. Nature is creativity.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: It's great to be here.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The truth is everything.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Critique don't criticize.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Write from the heart... always.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: With grace and beauty, feel.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Make your writing memorable.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be what the world needs.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: We are artists. When we can't find the beauty, we create it.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Work with yourself.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The heart of a story gives it life.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The story becomes clearer with time.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Happiness is individualized. Don't box it in. Let it fly.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Don't just raise the bar. Raise the roof.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: I think today is a day for the heart. What do you think.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: How can you learn to heal if the past is a place you want to stay in?
inspire.author: Beena Khan

inspire.quote: He brought up her old scars again, and now he couldn’t leave them on the shelf like books to gather dust.
inspire.author: Beena Khan

inspire.quote: Amid all the harsh words of a cruel world, let my voice speak out in tenderness. There is an inner light which must be nourished and cannot be replaced with a blind eye. Soft spirits are so much more than the simple result of hopeless romanticism. Each one is the soul of beauty and love combined.
inspire.author: Erin Forbes

inspire.quote: Not all heroes come swooping in to rescue a damsel in distress. I think the greatest heroes are the ones that inspire us, the ones that help us recognize the hero within ourselves.
inspire.author: Jacqueline Simon Gunn

inspire.quote: Embrace obstacles, they are always opportunities in disguise.
inspire.author: B.J. Forte

inspire.quote: Muslims should always be ready to struggle for what they believe in, for faith is not a matter of words but of deeds.
inspire.author: Tahia Al-Ismail

inspire.quote: Powerful people come in all packages. Sometimes unpredictable and unsuspecting packages. Each with their own priorities, dreams, challenges, gifts to give, and journey.
inspire.author: Julieanne O'Connor

inspire.quote: You have the inspiration of a jester, the soul of a backpacker and the heart of a warrior, and you’ve already done much better than you appreciate. You’re supported more than you realise. You’re in spitting distance now, just around the corner Each and every one of you is a work of art. Not everyone’s going to accept you, but the ones who do will never forget you. Come on, admit it, you’re not like the others, are you? And that’s not just okay, it’s fucking beautiful!Always remember, when you’re stuck between two planets, the only thing you can do is try something absurd.….. And you may just hear a river start.
inspire.author: Karl Wiggins

inspire.quote: When you love someone, you love someone.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: A changed soul, a forgiven heart, a journey of transformation.
inspire.author: Chimnese Davids

inspire.quote: Step into your own energy.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: The depth of life can’t be measured with successes and failures, and they don’t define life, rather life can be a trial and error as we commit mistakes and learn to do it right. Life can also be a series of mistakes and regrets at the end. We do have a choice and we subsequently end up being the victim of the consequences of our choices.
inspire.author: Prasanna Vignesh

inspire.quote: Don't be a fool...Never believe in people who say"money isn't everything" they say because their parents are Rich. Start hustling today ,that only can make you financially stable Its easy to say "money isn't everything" when You have 10 lacks in Your bank account .you can't afford food, clothes or anything without money... everything needs MONEY.
inspire.author: Vishnu Aravind

inspire.quote: I have everything I need to get everything I want.
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: Poetry stirs the soul and speaks to the mind to understand the beauty we call life ~ Mala Naidoo
inspire.author: Mala Naidoo

inspire.quote: Motivation is what happens when you take hold of an idea. Inspiration is what happens when an idea takes hold of you.
inspire.author: Wayne Dyer

inspire.quote: If you don't try you won't get!
inspire.author: Michael Koest

inspire.quote: Live your energy.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: You are wrong if you think Joy emanates only or principally from human relationships. God has placed it all around us. It is in everything and anything we might experience. We just have to have the courage to turn against our habitual lifestyle and engage in unconventional living.
inspire.author: Chris McCandless

inspire.quote: Dreams were meant to be born, not just dreamt about.
inspire.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

inspire.quote: The losses that we had came into our lives so we can find each other and help heal each other... you were the only goodness left in my life.
inspire.author: Beena Khan

inspire.quote: Be so amazing that they shut up and sit down.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: I'm a kind woman. I am not a mean girl and never will be.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Even though no one else can give you what you missed as a child, this doesn't mean you are doomed to never receive it. There is one person who can give you what you missed on- what you so desperately need and desire. That person is you.
inspire.author: Beverly Engel

inspire.quote: Dark Bakura: The odds are a bit against you. But that doesn't mean you've lost yet...
inspire.author: Kazuki Takahashi

inspire.quote: Serve many be great,Love each other design our fate
inspire.author: BJ Klock

inspire.quote: Always be courageous and not nervous.Raise your hand, stand up, wipe the sweat off your brow.Be steady, stop your knees from shaking.Speak up with a clear voice of confidence others want to hear from you!
inspire.author: Joseph S. Spence Sr.

inspire.quote: Expression of your internal joy is the gift of inspiration for everyone.
inspire.author: Purvi Raniga

inspire.quote: Love yourself like how you would want someone else to love you and like how you love.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Today let them call you Crazy,Tomorrow they will call you for Advice.
inspire.author: Amit Shah

inspire.quote: A great director gives life to a work of art- gives it a heartbeat... a pulse... opens its eyes to the world.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Accept nothing. Challenge everything.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Every painting tells a story.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Transform into your dream.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Vulnerability is the portal to feeling. Feeling is the portal to strength.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Walk in truth. Leave footprints of honesty.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: One day, your light will silence the darkness, and you will be surrounded by the beauty within.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Listen to what the sky is telling you.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: How you feel after watching something indicates not what you watched but where you are at.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: How you feel after reading something indicates not what you read but where you are at.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Signs don't shout; they whisper.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Some of the best writing is embarrassing; that's all there is to it.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Dance with the clouds.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Walk into the unknown with what you know in your heart.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Always choose love over fear.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: It's a new world. Stand up.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: In the end, we begin.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Life is magic.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be still in peace and reach your highest peak.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: There is no time for holding back.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Whatever you do, let it be lovely.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Our peace is our purpose.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: There is always a reason to look up.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Be the spark.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Fame is neither something to value nor to view as a threat.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: You're with you 24/7; you must love you the most.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Beauty is a heart with wings.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Believe in people, they fly for a day. Teach them to believe in themselves, they soar for a lifetime.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Screenwriting is like poker; in the end, you have to go all in.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Sometimes you just have to hold each other's hand and walk through it all.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Let us 'inspire' intently and breathe 'consciously' and instill the 'inspiration' that guides us to create a fearless future. We can then 'expire' infinitely and emanate insight and thought, and deliver tools for the others on the sideline. ("'My radio ")
inspire.author: Erik Pevernagie

inspire.quote: Knowledge of the sort you need does not begin with information, it begins with experience and perception. But there is a dark and twisty road from experience and perception to correct action.
inspire.author: Laurence Gonzales

inspire.quote: Magical Monday is an amalgamation of passion, perseverance and performance.
inspire.author: Subhashree Jena

inspire.quote: One of the best things you can do for yourself is to love yourself.
inspire.author: Angel Moreira

inspire.quote: The best way to create is to create from your heart—create what moves you. Teach the class you’ve always wanted to take, cook the meal you’ve always wanted to try, write the book you’ve always wanted to read. Do it your way. Do it the way that makes your heart sing.
inspire.author: Ashley Asti

inspire.quote: Katsuya Jōnouchi [to Esper Roba]: I have friends in this town...and you have your brothers! As long as you're not alone...you're always strong!
inspire.author: Kazuki Takahashi

inspire.quote: While some qualities are born within a person, others need to be made.
inspire.author: Anas O Hamshari B Sc

inspire.quote: Throughout history, the life of a businessperson always involves some risk; the higher the risk, the greater the reward. On the other hand, the life of an employee in any workforce involves minimal to no risk at all, resulting in a lifetime full of steadiness with little to no accomplishments during this lifetime. However, there is a crucial factor which can also be considered as a trait or characteristic that made many remarkable men and women throughout history reach high levels of their career paths, which is considered to be "success" in our modernworld: Audacity.
inspire.author: Anas O Hamshari B Sc

inspire.quote: you can find inspiration in anything if you look at it in the right way, marks and stretch in the walls can be used to discover a new texture, or you can experiment with stones and everyday objects.it just a matter of finding something that intrigues you visually and figuring out how you can explore these everyday findings and incorporate them into your way of working
inspire.author: Jonny Wan

inspire.quote: Be inspired to live your dream
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Shout-out to everyone who won't be going back to "normal"! Those who will refuse to allow the nonsense they used it. Those who will set new healthy standards. Those who will let go, forgive, and move on. Those who will finally act upon their goals and dreams. Those who will never again shrink themselves for those who refuse to grow. Those who will fall back in love with life. Those who will come out of this chaos stronger and more baddasss than ever!
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: Happiness is not a feeling, happiness is not an emotion, happiness is a decision that each of us make every single day when we wake up.
inspire.author: Chad E.  Foster

inspire.quote: If you’re not getting outside of your comfort zone, then you’re not growing
inspire.author: Chad E.  Foster

inspire.quote: History is wonder of the greatest sort.
inspire.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

inspire.quote: Follow the road to the end of the water. Sit down and watch the clouds appear.
inspire.author: Anonymous

inspire.quote: Anzu: I don't know where I should go either...everybody's like that! We're all scared, but we have to keep moving forward, even if we can't see the road in front of us...holding our heads up high...believing in what lies ahead...even while we sit here, that moment is coming closer every second...We've all got limited time...you know?...I know it's not easy to chase your dreams...But I want to believe that I have a chance. Even if it's just a tiny one...
inspire.author: Kazuki Takahashi

inspire.quote: Aku tidak pernah betul-betul pulang kerumah.Aku hanyalah petualang tersesat.
inspire.author: Niknik Gantini

inspire.quote: Setiap hari hadir retakan baru.Dan aku membiarkannya seolah itu adalah caraku bertahan.
inspire.author: Niknik Gantini

inspire.quote: Seperti hal nya Jogja.Semakin hari, semakin membuat jatuh cinta.
inspire.author: Niknik Gantini

inspire.quote: Ceritakan kisahmu hari ini, jadikan aku pendengar setiamu.Menepilah saat kau lelah, aku hanya ingin menjadi rumah segala keluh kesahmu.Ironis memang, tapi hanya itu yang aku bisa.
inspire.author: Niknik Gantini

inspire.quote: Karena Tuhan Maha romantis atas segala sesuatu sehingga selalu memberi kejutan indah bagi hamba-hamba nya yang ikhlas.
inspire.author: Niknik Gantini

inspire.quote: Tak ada yang istimewa.Tak ada yang paling istimewa.Tak ada yang perlu diistimewakan.Semua istimewa dengan caranya sendiri, kupikir.
inspire.author: Niknik Gantini

inspire.quote: Forget the past, dwell on today and focus on the future.
inspire.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

inspire.quote: Hope dies all the time. And yet we need to believe it will come back and attach itself to a new cause - a new love, a new house, something that gives us a sense of purpose, which is ultimately what hope is.
inspire.author: Hilton Als

inspire.quote: Die Schildkröte kämpft nie gegen die Wellen an, sondern nutzte sie für sich.
inspire.author: John Strelecky

inspire.quote: Delete the thoughts from your mind, which do nothing good to you!
inspire.author: Gunjan Bugde

inspire.quote: Be good. Be great. Come out swinging
inspire.author: Emilia Finn

inspire.quote: I don’t care to be perfect at anything in particular. Art is not perfection but feeling—emotion stripped down to the core. No, I don’t want to be perfect, but I want to be good, To wrap myself in truth and beauty, and share itWith those who care to listen.I want someone to look at my writing and say, "that’s her,"Familiar with my flights of fancy, Acquainted with my air of artistry. And if each word fades out in time,Known only to the depths of a few sweet souls. I shall value that prose all the more. To speak the unspoken,To commune with kindred spirits. That is the purpose for which my words are born.
inspire.author: Erin Forbes

inspire.quote: There is no hurdle too high for you to jump over.
inspire.author: Michael H. Forde

inspire.quote: Your definition of success, your "why", is something that comes from deep within.
inspire.author: Michael H. Forde

inspire.quote: No wizard has ever made himself useful by magic, or, if they've tried, they've only made matters worse. No wizard ever stopped a war or mended a fence. It's better that they stay in their marshes, out of the way of worldly folk like farmers and soldiers and merchants and kings.
inspire.author: Kelly Link

inspire.quote: The Legend of the Firefish,first in the Trophy Chase Trilogy by George Bryan Polivka, is a winner....filled with action,adventure, danger, intrigue,surprise,suspense....The characters Polivka created are fresh and interesting....A must read for fantasy lovers, and a highly recommended drating for others who want a good story. Rebecca LuElla Miller A Christian Worldview of Fiction Website
inspire.author: George Bryan Polivka

inspire.quote: The Nobel Prize is the best thing that can happen to a writer in terms of how it affects your contracts, the publishers, and the seriousness with which your work is taken. On the other hand, it does interfere with your private life, or it can if you let it, and it has zero effect on the writing.It doesn't help you write better and if you let it, it will intimidate you about future projects.
inspire.author: Toni Morrison

inspire.quote: If people are troubled by their view, they ought to offer these New Orleanians, and black and poor people in the places like the Lower Ninth Ward around the country, a reason to believe otherwise.
inspire.author: Billy Sothern

inspire.quote: If you drink neem juice everyday, all the parasites in your muscle memory and bio memory will be cleansed. Even when the sex hormones are pumped into your body, it just manifests an intense devotion, sweetest secret sacred sentiment. It does not trigger violent, lusty, uncontrollable, agitating, life-negative, suicidal, wild, self-destructive visualization or patterns.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: As a river flowing beyond mountains,Far over the horizon it flows.No one knows where its water goes,what it touches or where it comes close.Encouragement can move mountains,Mountains of desperation and need.Who would know its effect or its deed?Who’d know the hungry it’ll feed?
inspire.author: Jozua Van Otterloo

inspire.quote: Podemos empezar partiendo de algo muy pequeño. Abre un documento nuevo o coge una hoja de papel en blanco. Será nuestro lienzo. Recuerda lo que Miguel Ángel dijo sobre que la escultura estaba en el interior de la piedra, que estaba allí desde un buen principio, y que su trabajo consistía en extraerla. Tus palabras también están ahí.
inspire.author: Jennifer Niven

inspire.quote: To be able to experience wealth, health and the many other things we humans want, we must mentally be in absolute harmony with them.
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: Those who can assume whatever state of mind they choose will soon find themselves well along the path to their freedom from financial concerns.
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: Believe in the reality of all you can imagine - because the end is where you begin.
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: Anyone sitting under the iluppai tree intensely smells or does pranayama of that iluppai tree’s breathing space, can live without the need of an external source of glucose, without taking white / brown sugar, any source for glucose. Your internal organs will be so active, they can directly take the glucose energy by the pranayama under the iluppai tree.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: This is what I mean when I say: without dumping the food, making your internal organs very active, alive!Yoga will make your physical body active. Reduce the quantity of the food; increase the quality ...Means, instead of solid food, move to more liquid and move from liquid to air, prana-based food.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: If you burn pure rice, pure cow ghee with the proper mantras and do the agnihotram with that pure organic desi cow dung cake, that smoke, air, can keep you hunger-free, fully charged. All your internal organs active, at least for 8 hours.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: The intense activity for body is yoga. Intense activity for internal organs is fasting.Intense, life-infusing for your mind is sincerity.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: When you decide to become sanyasi, everyday drinking neem juice is compulsory because it removes all parasites from your bio memory and muscle memory which triggers lusty, fantasy visualization.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Encouragement: To place courage within them, by coming along side them and inspiring them to hold on, to work hard, to fight for the cause placed in their care.
inspire.author: Jozua Van Otterloo

inspire.quote: If you decide you should be working and alive whole day without tiredness or boredom, always take handful of yellu and vellam (sesame and jaggery balls) every morning.It will remove all the parasites / microbes that triggers tiredness / boredom / irritation in you. Your muscle memory and bio memory will be so pure / clean. You will not fall for your tiredness / boredom / irritating parasites that trigger you.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: The Universe is a huge wave of ‘Tathāstu!—so be it!’So everything is as you create, as you organize, as you arrange! Put a little intelligence, time and energy into creating the right space in you. If you carry the space of many births, you will have many births! If you carry the space of a soul, you will have a soul! If you carry the space of no-soul, you will NOT have a soul!
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Any powerful cognition / conclusion you experience, arrive at, you need to prepare your body also sincerely for that. You need to work for it. You need to have sincerity in your mind.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Love is an intense experience in one’s inner space. Many of us think love is a choice. We think experience and expression of love is a choice. We think that if we want to, we can handle love; otherwise we can let it go. No! It is not a choice as we think. It is a basic necessity of life.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Fear is a deeper dimension of worry. Worry can cause ulcers. Fear on the other hand can even destroy life.Fear is a form of energy inside us. That is why it cannot be destroyed. Energy can neither be created nor destroyed; it can only be changed from one form to another.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Just as darkness disappears automatically when light is brought into a room, pain dissolves automatically when the energy of your awareness is focused on it.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Humans are forever confused between love and lust. They think only animals are lustful. Actually only animals are capable of pure lust when they mate! Humans, with their rationalization, can neither be lustful nor loving. That is why they feel dissatisfied and unfulfilled.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Add friendliness to love. As of now, our lust is deep-rooted violence to possess the other person. Add friendliness to the relationship. Welcome the partner as he or she is; do not just accept him or her. Welcome and accept the mind, body and being as it is. Then you can see lust turns to love and your being is in eternal bliss
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Krishna says in the Bhagavad Gita, ‘Let you lift yourself by yourself. If you don’t, you will be your worst enemy.’ It is up to you to help yourself as your best friend or hurt yourself as your worst enemy. Be very clear: nobody can hurt you unless you allow. Nobody can help you unless you allow.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: We live by the images of those we decide are heroes and gods.
inspire.author: Kathy Acker

inspire.quote: Do not loose your battle before fighting it, make an introduction that finishes the story.
inspire.author: Nurudeen sanimoh

inspire.quote: Work, ideas, and art can be good before they've been validated.
inspire.author: Ashly Perez

inspire.quote: Your inner voice is subtle, positive, consistent, and peaceful; it springs to life when you pay attention to it, when you show gratitude and trust what's coming through.
inspire.author: Kris Franken

inspire.quote: Living with self-awareness means living in communion with yourself. Communion is a consistent state of kind and conscious connection with your body, emotions, energy and surroundings.
inspire.author: Kris Franken

inspire.quote: Take faith, for example. For many people in our world, the opposite of faith is doubt. The goal, then, within this understanding, is to eliminate doubt. But faith and doubt aren't opposites. Doubt is often a sign that your faith has a pulse, that it's alive and well and exploring and searching. Faith and doubt aren't opposites, they are, it turns out, excellent dance partners.
inspire.author: Rob Bell

inspire.quote: Stop worrying about someone taking your spot. God already have it reserved. Do the work to get there and fill it!
inspire.author: Yvonne Pierre

inspire.quote: The power of hope! Even a lack of ambition can, for a time, pay off as a necessary facet, as long as hope outweighs it.
inspire.author: Criss Jami

inspire.quote: The little boy nodded at the peony and the peony seemed to nod back. The little boy was neat, clean and pretty. The peony was unchaste, dishevelled as peonies must be, and at the height of its beauty.(...) Every hour is filled with such moments, big with significance for someone.
inspire.author: Robertson Davies

inspire.quote: The challenge is to resist circumstances. Any idiot can be happy in a happy place, but moral courage is required to be happy in a hellhole.
inspire.author: Joyce Carol Oates

inspire.quote: It doesn't matter where you've been, only where you are going.
inspire.author: L.M. Fields

inspire.quote: He who does not see the light in others does not see the light in himself.
inspire.author: Doreen DeVore

inspire.quote: Every negative...Has a positive side...
inspire.author: Nelson M. Lubao

inspire.quote: Whatever it is you are really desiring, give it away. If it's companionship, give it to someone else, and just listen to them and be there. If it's money, give it to someone who is less fortunate. If it's encouragement, give it to others. If it's friendship, become the best friend you can be to others. If it's time, serve others with your time. You will be amazed to see how much more of everything you have when you are willing to freely give.
inspire.author: Osayi Osar-Emokpae

inspire.quote: Don't ask for directions if you're not going to start the car.
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: The ultimate source of comfort and peace is within ourselves.
inspire.author: Dalai Lama XIV

inspire.quote: Who are you? No really. Way, way down deep. Who are you?
inspire.author: Doug Dillon

inspire.quote: If you are neutral in situations of injustice, you have chosen the side of the oppressor.
inspire.author: Bishop Desmond Tutu

inspire.quote: Trust your inner voice.
inspire.author: Lynn A. Robinson

inspire.quote: But while the urban tribe helps us survive, it does not help us thrive. The urban tribe may bring us soup when we are sick, but it is the people we hardly know - those who never make it into our tribe - who will swiftly and dramatically change our lives for the better.
inspire.author: Meg Jay

inspire.quote: We may be living past and future lives at the same time we are living this one.
inspire.author: Doug Dillon

inspire.quote: Take the breath of the new dawn and make it part of you. It will give you strength.
inspire.author: Hopi Nation

inspire.quote: But if as you read this book you're saying to yourself: "I'd rather be miserably married than be alone." Well young lady, take out your clown shoes and buckle your seat belt - it's going to be a very bumpy one-woman circus.
inspire.author: Osayi Osar-Emokpae

inspire.quote: To soar, we must leave anything that weighs us down...
inspire.author: Saru Singhal

inspire.quote: Believe that life is taking you down a wonderful path!
inspire.author: Lynn A. Robinson

inspire.quote: Other people are only aspects of our own greater being.
inspire.author: Doug Dillon

inspire.quote: Writers are creatures of habit, as are humans, but writers aren’t necessarily human, are they?
inspire.author: Alyssa Hubbard

inspire.quote: Some ghosts or felt presences may simply be the essence of another living person projected outward while sleeping.
inspire.author: Doug Dillon

inspire.quote: Hope gives us a reason to live and to make plans for our future. But common sense gives us knowledge that God has control over our life. Life is a journey. We hope and plan our future as we travel each day.
inspire.author: Ellen J. Barrier

inspire.quote: Every negative...Jas a positive side...
inspire.author: Nelson M. Lubao

inspire.quote: Još uvijek silno vjerujem u umjetnost kao medikament!
inspire.author: Jasna Horvat

inspire.quote: Heads will fly all over the place, others will explode by themselves, everyone will have their chance to betray, and those who don't betray will be betrayed.
inspire.author: Sandro Veronesi

inspire.quote: The higher knowledge, the higher responsibility
inspire.author: Muhammad Ahkam A

inspire.quote: With a lump forming in his throat, he thoughtabout all the hopes and dreams that he had for his son. More thananything, he prayed his boy would not grow up to be a screw uplike his dad when it came to love and marriage.
inspire.author: Michelle Sutton

inspire.quote: Un archeologo è il miglior marito che una donna possa avere: più lei diventa vecchia, più lui s'interessa a lei.
inspire.author: Agatha Christie

inspire.quote: Losing a belief in free will has not made me fatalistic—in fact, it has increased my feelings of freedom. My hopes, fears, and neuroses seem less personal and indelible. There is no telling how much I might change in the future. Just as one wouldn’t draw a lasting conclusion about oneself on the basis of a brief experience of indigestion, one needn’t do so on the basis of how one has thought or behaved for vast stretches of time in the past. A creative change of inputs to the system—learning new skills, forming new relationships, adopting new habits of attention—may radically transform one’s life.
inspire.author: Sam Harris

inspire.quote: It is better to have God over your shoulder, than carry the world alone on your back.
inspire.author: Anthony Liccione

inspire.quote: Individually, every grain of sand brushing against my hands represents a story, an experience, and a block for me to build upon for the next generation.
inspire.author: Raquel Cepeda

inspire.quote: She preferred the quiet solitary atmosphere, to create in her own world of paint and colour, the thrill of anticipating how her works would turn out as she eyed the blank sheets of paper or canvas before starting her next masterpiece. How satisfying it was to mess around in paint gear, without having to worry about spills, starch or frills, that was the life!
inspire.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

inspire.quote: War crimes, you say?No matter how many policies you put on paper, in reality, there are no rights and wrongs in war. War itself is a crime. War cannot be justified. I believe, the only people, in this world, whose opinions matter, are the ones who go the extra mile to help other people expecting nothing in return. Soldiers who fight fiercely for their country, the doctors in Sri Lanka's public hospitals attending to hundreds of patients at a time for no extra pay , the nuns who voluntarily teach English and math to children of refugee camps in the north, the monks who collect food to feed entire villages during crises, they are the people worth listening to, their opinion matters. So find me one of them who will say: they wish the war didn't end in 2009, that they wish Sri Lanka was divided into two parts. Find me one of them who agrees with the international war crime allegations against Sri Lanka, and I will listen. But I will not listen to the opinions of those who are paid to find faults in a war they were never a part of, a war they never experienced themselves. I will not listen to the opinions of those who watched the war on tv or read about it on the internet or were moved by a documentary on Al Jazeera. The war is over. The damage is done. Let Sri Lanka move on. So our children will never have to see what we've seen.
inspire.author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi

inspire.quote: It isn't the subjects we write about but the seriousness and subtlety of our expression that determines the worth of or effort.
inspire.author: Joyce Carol Oates

inspire.quote: Goal Of LIFE Is patience,Goal Of Patience Is LIFE!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Art builds upon art, builds upon art...nothing is purely original. We're all inspired by something...or someone. It's a never-ending chain of ideas...and it's magical.
inspire.author: Shannon Taylor Hodnett

inspire.quote: Patience Pays..Is true! But the greater truth is that it takes advance payment before it pays you in return!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: What would you say to yourself if you could actually meet a younger you?
inspire.author: Doug Dillon

inspire.quote: Every comforting word is a command from a man of action...While every word of command is commotion from a man of just words...
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: What You were Once, Was Also Because You Were Someone Else Before that
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: The harder you work, the luckier you are, and I worked like hell.
inspire.author: Gerald Ford

inspire.quote: Life Is ‘Simple’ By Nature...The deeper you try to study, the more you complicate it.Just believe in it’s simplicity & it shall show you it is far too Simple actually!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Follow Your Heart & The world Shall Follow YOU!Reject it and It stops beating!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Coincidences link us to the unknown and weave us into it.
inspire.author: Doug Dillon

inspire.quote: Without the desire to be patient patience doesn't happen, Just like without the desire to grow, LIFE doesn't happen!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: The Glory Is Always Hidden Between The Lines Of the Story
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Love begets glory,Work begets story.LOVED WORK Begets A Story of Glory!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Life is a chain of events executed in a way which is - most convenient to ‘you’, ‘your’ dreams & people ‘you’ desire to be with & people you have been put up to live with...
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Que les poètes morts laissent la place aux autres. Et nous pourrions tout de même voir que c'est notre vénération devant ce qui a été déjà fait, si beau et si valable que ce soit, qui nous pétrifie, qui nous stabilise et nous empêche de prendre contact avec la force qui est dessous, que l'on appelle l'énergie pensante, la force vitale, le déterminisme des échanges, les menstrues de la lune ou tout ce qu'on voudra.
inspire.author: Antonin Artaud

inspire.quote: When you are stressed on mind...to pour it out, is the behaviour, most kind!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: The 4 pillars Of the Greatest Religion ever Are Love Trust Character & Brotherhood...
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Never outgrow your imagination.
inspire.author: Teresa Mummert

inspire.quote: The physical world we live in is just the beginning.
inspire.author: Doug Dillon

inspire.quote: Grub Street turns out good things almost as often as Parnassus. For if a writer is hard up enough, if he’s far down enough (down where I have been and am rising from, I am really saying), he can’t afford self-doubt and he can’t let other people’s opinions, even a father’s, keep him from writing.
inspire.author: Wallace Stegner

inspire.quote: For though, I walk through the valley of shadows of Death, I will never fear. For You are in Me and I know You will never let me Go.
inspire.author: Jestoni Revealed

inspire.quote: If Aphrodite chills at home in Cyprus for most of the year, then Fez must be the goddess’s playground.
inspire.author: Raquel Cepeda

inspire.quote: Seize the day...by the throat!
inspire.author: Courage Wolf

inspire.quote: Till tomorrow good sir one must but gaze at stars
inspire.author: Andrew Fisher

inspire.quote: Glass half full, or glass half empty, what am I? The answer? I'm not the bloody glass, I'm the fucking tap! Meaning, whatever my glass decides to be on a certain day, empty or full, I control how I feel and the flow of the milkshake inside it
inspire.author: Jimmy Tudeski

inspire.quote: When a Wanderess has been caged, or perched with her wings clipped, She lives like a Stoic, She lives most heroic, smiling with ruby, moistened lips once her cup of Death is welcome sipped.
inspire.author: Roman Payne

inspire.quote: These people will try to manipulate you, try to bring you down but remember baby girl you are a queen, own your crown.
inspire.author: Nikki Rowe

inspire.quote: A writer reports on the universe. When he presents his credentials, the gates of heaven and hell are equally opened to him. He can hear the devil’s defense and god’s accusations. The guards at the king’s heart let him in. The writer can be anything and any one he wants. When he writes he is a god, he creates.
inspire.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

inspire.quote: In my experience, it is always worth it to find the love that lives inside you. No matter how deep you have to dig sometimes.
inspire.author: Scott Stabile

inspire.quote: Everyone has a plan until they get punched in the mouth.
inspire.author: Mike Tyson

inspire.quote: Don't believe in everything that is written. Not everything that is written is true
inspire.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

inspire.quote: Your time is the most precious thing in this world.
inspire.author: Cometan

inspire.quote: A revelation leaps over the borders of the everyday. A life without revelation is no life at all. What you need to do is move from reason that ‘observes’ to reason that ‘acts’. That’s what critical.
inspire.author: Haruki Murakami

inspire.quote: If I can write, who possibly can’t. Even drawing a line in the sand is writing
inspire.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

inspire.quote: I am listening to the wind, to the voice in the wind telling me to write it all down. So I do.
inspire.author: Kwame Dawes

inspire.quote: Not all things that fall down break. Some develop wings.
inspire.author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

inspire.quote: No crime is a means to an end. No crime can be rationalized.
inspire.author: Compton Gage

inspire.quote: Art creates the Eden where Adam and Eve eat the serpent.
inspire.author: Alexander Theroux

inspire.quote: If one thousand of you participate in the murder of one child, then one thousand of you are a thousand times guilty.
inspire.author: Compton Gage

inspire.quote: Opportunities to share love and compassion are all around us. Its going to take an army of compassionate people to heal our world. How will you show yours?
inspire.author: Renae A. Sauter

inspire.quote: If one million of you give assent to the one thousand who participate in the murder of a child, then one million of you are a million times guilty.
inspire.author: Compton Gage

inspire.quote: Do What You Want; these are the 4 most frightening words brought to us by the Connection Revolution. If you want to sing, sing. If you want to lead, lead. If you want touch, connect, describe, disrupt, give, support, build, question—Do It. You will not be picked. But, if you want to pick yourself—go for it. The cost is that you own the results.
inspire.author: Seth Godin

inspire.quote: You can’t inspire and lead people without earning their attention. You achieve that in a counter-intuitive way – by paying close attention to what interests them.
inspire.author: Phil Dourado

inspire.quote: I believe that this is the time to become warriors for peace and dialogue, not warmongers or mere worriers.
inspire.author: Lama Surya Das

inspire.quote: Having what you want may give you Achievement. But wanting what you have will give you Fulfillment.
inspire.author: RVM

inspire.quote: Popularity does not happen overnight with a blink of an eye. It takes time, effort and creative knowledge to reach that particular goal in life.
inspire.author: Saaif Alam

inspire.quote: I have been driven to desperation more times than I can count. But it is here that I have been driven to the greatest inspiration that I can contain.
inspire.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

inspire.quote: There is only one thing that is more natural than thinking: breathing.  And it is in breathing that we find the door to happiness.
inspire.author: Mario Maruffi

inspire.quote: Healing is comparable to a garden. It needs tended to on a consistent basis. For weeds to be pulled out. The garden needs water and sunshine in effort to grow. Like a lotus flower, you will sprout through the soil, reaching up through the dark water towards the sunlight, stretching to the surface where you will beautifully bloom.
inspire.author: Dana Arcuri

inspire.quote: Our objective as a realist is to maximize our worth, and our objective as a romanticist is to be foolishly youthful.
inspire.author: Bongha Lee

inspire.quote: If you read proverbs, you will find answers to every puzzle.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Do what you can while you can.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Every time we choose our past over our present we kill our future.
inspire.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

inspire.quote: Your greatness is measured by your horizons.
inspire.author: Michelangelo

inspire.quote: Cease trying to work everything out with your mind. It will get you nowhere. Live by intuition and inspiration and let your whole life be a Revelation.
inspire.author: Eileen Cady

inspire.quote: When we are connected to the source, we will not be afraid of any task set before us.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: وَالدّهْر يَوْم لَك وَيوْم عَليك فإذا كان لَك فَلا تَبطر وَإذا كان عَليك فاصْبر فَبِكليهما تمْتَحَن.
inspire.author: Ali ibn abi talib

inspire.quote: You may not attain the highest height with one leap but my dear; you will reach your destination.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: You are to make your own way prosperous...Even God cannot do it for you; you will have to do it yourself by doing the right things; taking right decisions, talking right, thinking right, being at the right place with the right-kind of people and by reading the right materials.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: It makes no sense to compare yourself with others because there will always be better & worse people than you out there. Each person has his own path to make. You are where you are now. Could you reach for the stars & have everything you want? realistically no. You may not win Olympic Gold in London 2012 , or be the CEO of a Fortune 500 company etc but you most definitely have the capacity to make YOUR life as the Masterpiece it could really be. The choice is yours...
inspire.author: Pablo

inspire.quote: Your decision not to join the crowd may be what God is waiting for to grant you revelation on how to deliver your family, your country, business, profession or even your church!
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: So cheer up Beloved; for your God is able, He is the maker of all things.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: If a man tells you that he is fond of the Imitation, view him with sudden suspicion; he is either a dabbler or a Saint.
inspire.author: Ronald A. Knox

inspire.quote: Man is like a bride unto God. God is jealous when man veers away from Him.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: He is the only option for better living.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: It is never late, you can start the movement now, the provisions have been made, the price has been paid and the gifts have been packaged. Are you willing to change?
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Your behavior is the sum total of your action and reaction to issues and people around you.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: When you begin to reason with the Lord, your attitude to the issues of life will change.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: You are addressed by the way you dress. Your attire reflects your sense of value or taste and of course, your speech either makes or mars you.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: God wants all man's attention, thoughts and focus to be on Him.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: We cannot prevail by our own might or strength, we need to plug on to the source of our strength so that we will remain resourceful always.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: I am unique...I play by a different set of rules; I am not intimidated by anything.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: and what happens around us ,simply happens because we haven't learned to love .Till this moment ,people would have to go through the same paths ,experience similar events ,blinded ,full of wrath,imprisoned and bounded by themselves.They will star at their fellows seeing what they are unable to see on themselves....Themselves!
inspire.author: Katerina Kostaki

inspire.quote: God comes down in the evenings to chat with man, enjoy man's company and find out how man faired in the course of the day.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Are you the fruit of redemption? If yes, then make a delightful noise unto Him.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Do you want to make a change?...Do you want this change? Then let's move at God`s pace.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: God is not a thief. That which steals, kills and destroys is the devil - not God!
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Our father came to sleep in our house that night. He carried a small suitcase with a black mourning suit and a pair of polished shoes. Corrigan stopped him as he made his way up the stairs. 'Where d'you think you're going?'Our father gripped the bannister. His hands were liverspotted and I could see him trembling in his pause. 'That's not your room,' sad Corrigan. Our father tottered on the stairs. He took another step up. 'Don't,' said my brother. His voice was clear, full, confidant. Our father stood stunned. He climbed one more step and then turned, descended, looked around, lost.'My own sons,' he said.We made a bed for him on a sofa in the living room, but even then Corrigan refused to stay under the same roof; he went walking in the direction of the city center and I wondered what alley he might be found in later that night, what fist he might walk into, whose bottle he might climb down inside.
inspire.author: Colum McCann

inspire.quote: Listen with your heart, listen to your inner voice of wisdom, listen to your dreams. You know what is right for you.
inspire.author: Cheryl Hamada

inspire.quote: You don't need to go running from pillar to post looking for what God looks like.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: The Prince came to give life unto those whose lives were almost being snuffed out by the devil via the cares of this world.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Creative thinking encompassed by the Word of God infuses into you the divine ability to turn the seemingly ugly situation around.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: The horizon was indistinguishable from the inky black, which fell upon the desert like a sorcerer’s mantle shot through with diamonds. The stars were so tiny, so far away, and yet, at the moment, with her fingers curled around his, he almost felt as though he could reach up and snag one by the tail.
inspire.author: V.S. Carnes

inspire.quote: In the human society, it is difficult to find all angels flapping there wings and all saints singing halleluya.
inspire.author: late chief gani fahewinmi

inspire.quote: As if you couldn't like one place and want to see another.
inspire.author: V.E. Schwab

inspire.quote: Sleep deprivation, it seems, can giveth as much as it taketh away!
inspire.author: A.D. Aliwat

inspire.quote: A woman of virtue is not a weakling. Yes, she knows her weaknesses, yet she won’t let them define her. She makes a difference in the world.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: That was the scary thing about love. It was unpredictable and unfathomable, and when you were walking a tightrope in its throes, the only thing that mattered was how much you trusted the person walking it with you.
inspire.author: Neve Wilder

inspire.quote: Coffee: just as good as religious fervor, the mild stimulant effects of watered-down wine, anything else used to bring pen to page.
inspire.author: A.D. Aliwat

inspire.quote: Coffee could just be a delivery system for the words from on high; coffee did come from the Middle East, originally, after all.
inspire.author: A.D. Aliwat

inspire.quote: There is nothing needful than to live thy neighbour as yourself.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Following the herd may have been the path of least resistance in the past - but you weren’t born to do that. When the herd isn’t heading in the direction of the world you want to see, you mustn’t be afraid to go against it, because future generations will rely on your courage and vision.
inspire.author: Simona Ondrejkova

inspire.quote: No-one wins by looking back at the hills they've already climbed.
inspire.author: Elliot Connor

inspire.quote: Powerlessness is simply a lack of meaningful choice.
inspire.author: Elliot Connor

inspire.quote: The journey through the preschool years helps children to move from dependence to interdependence to independence.
inspire.author: Deepa Bhushan

inspire.quote: A woman of peace will always endorse peace wherever she goes because she understands the true value of peace.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A woman of vision comprehends that current circumstances do not reflect what her future holds. In her eyes, she sees continuance. In her mind, she thinks influence, and in her heart, she longs for affluence.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A woman of vision enables great things to happen by pursuing the right things.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A woman of vision looks at things from a different viewpoint because she does not rely on her eyesight to visualize great things.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: No one is real. Everyone on Earth is pretending. Even we are not true to ourselves, when no one is around. We all are wearing mask so that we can hide our face...
inspire.author: Anshu David Kiro

inspire.quote: She does not have an issue about a non-issue, because she is a woman of virtue.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A woman of value does not rely on others to recognize her value. She knows her own value, and she always adds value.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A woman of substance can never undervalue her existence.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A woman of a substance tells the blunt truth because she knows she must shine bright. Hence, she does not thrive on lies.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A wise woman knows her place and uses her faith to go places.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A wise woman knows that she does not have to fight every battle. For other battles, she just watches until she overcomes.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: More can be achieved in this world if good women are empowered to do what they are good at.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: This world can be a better place if good women are given the space to do good.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A woman who knows where she stands will remain standing; even when everything around her is crumbling.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: Nothing can bring down a woman comfortable in her skin. She is genuine and never pretends to be who she is not. She knows her worth and what she wants.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: She takes advantage of opportunities to help others. Yet, she takes advantage of no one because she is a selfless woman.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: Womanhood should be celebrated. Being a woman must not be seen as a weakness.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A powerful woman does not merely rely on the power of a man but the powerful hand of God.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A powerful woman is a heat resistant and storm bracing calibre. There is nothing she cannot handle.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: I have to find that silver lining around the dark cloud looming over all of us.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: When things don’t go as planned in the journey to your destination, don’t give up. Defy defeat. Resist submission. Hold onto hope.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Life is unmanageable when you are stateless.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Principles, morals, religion and values, are all worth nothing when considering whether or not we are directly adding value to the spaces we are in and that surround us. Are we a valuable experience in the lives of other people? Be the valuable experience of life. Don't just talk about the castles of your mind.
