inspire.quote: My grandfather was the first to teach me not to be loyal to a political figure. "To agree is fine. To disagree is fine. To blindly follow, you will become like a sheep destined for the slaughterhouse," he would tell me.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Humanity wasn’t all about conflict, or about who stole land from whom, or who hate whom. It was about who helps you when you need it the most.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: When I think of establishing a network, it’s like I’m looking down at a map of a nation- a nation that I’ve created.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: How can someone look back at a prison and call it home?
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Memories are powerful- whether filled with peace or turbulence.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Writing became my escape, the corner where I could take refuge in and be at peace.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: This is what conflict does. It spreads fear on all sides.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Writing was my escape from the overwhelming storm of emotions.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Having someone who believes in you makes a lot of difference. They don't have to make speeches. Just believing is usually enough.
inspire.author: Stephen King

inspire.quote: So hard to describe how I know that it's true, I don't quite know where to begin. Like conveying the sight of a sunrise to someone who's always slept in.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: Well, didn't you look sharp with your boots when you met me on the path?From two-tone to downtown Beirut but only halfway backStealing bits of wisdom from the shelfTurned prisons into prisms of the selfAnd what do they know about the springtime or me and you?Born in the midst of the long hot summer we lived throughDid they see you run for every rhyme?Did we run for running out of time?When even heroes have to dieNo one lives forever, love, no one's wise to tryWe're adding our own wisdom to the shelfStealing bits of paper, we had helpBut working away, did we miss the passing of the time?In your own flame you can wither though your passions still outshineDid you read the writing on the wall?Prophesying doom upon us allBut even heroes have to dieNo one lives forever, love, no one's wise to tryBut hidden in the writing on the wallMany are the beauties of the fall
inspire.author: Ted Leo

inspire.quote: An unspoken word is like the thorn of a rose: it hurts; only with its removal can the flower be held without pain
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Aside from FAMILY, there is nothing more important in this world than Self-Education. You too can unmasks the #1 truth about Personal Development; ANYONE can Develop a Genius Mindset and Unleash Their Full Potential and Achieve Unimaginable Success. -J.R. Fitzgerald
inspire.author: J.R. Fitzgerald

inspire.quote: Aside from FAMILY, there is nothing more important in this world than Self-Education. You too can unmasks the #1 truth about Personal Development; ANYONE can Develop a Genius Mindset and Unleash Their Full Potential and Achieve Unimaginable Success. -J.R. Fitzgerald
inspire.author: Me

inspire.quote: I have always loved seeing people realize their dreams, small or big, a dream is a dream. It is where reality meets imagination.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Much of the time my smile is due to my happiness; I’ve been fortunate to have experienced the joy that I have. There is another smile though. It masks my deepest pains
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: There is no shame in asking for help when people are happy to offer it, and give it out of love. My network is based on that fundamental.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: From my youth, I was trained to endure rejections and change them into opportunities.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Few things faze me. My reflex is to plot the next move, take calculated risks, set a target, and reach it- even if it means exercising tremendous patience and attempting countless alternative routes to my goal.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Survival is something that comes naturally to a refugee.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Refugees face appalling living conditions that are unsafe and unsanitary. But a refugee can endure all of this with inborn talents and learned skills.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Perfect the day.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: When things don’t go as planned in the journey to your destination, don’t give up. Defy defeat. Resist submission. Hold into hope.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: I love people’s imagination, especially when it involves conspiracy theories. Ouch!
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Even at time of fear and uncertainty, I never went to the darkness. Light was always my destination- the light at the end of the tunnel.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: learning more about your strengths is a good motivation to do even more
inspire.author: Anath Lee Wales

inspire.quote: Light is always welcome in the dark.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: I have to fight to exist and resist, especially with a virus that is keeping us imprisoned.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: I love life, how could despair win me over in those times? It happens, and I learned that when it does, it is people who are there for us. It is the support we need, and we will always get once we ask for it.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: I’m always vocal about what I need. My instinctive impulses are difficult to resist.
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: He realized he couldn't be a believer in Jesus and remain angry with his family's killers. He realized it was simply incompatible.
inspire.author: Brant Hansen

inspire.quote: My poems are my breath in words.
inspire.author: Gregory Joseph Firlotte

inspire.quote: What is poetry? It is one heart speaking to another.
inspire.author: Gregory Joseph Firlotte

inspire.quote: Who can I inspire but myself?
inspire.author: Marty Rubin

inspire.quote: You were born to believe.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: At the time your book was written, the full story of the monarch migration was unknown to humanity."When did they find it out?" Preston asked.The answer, to Dellarobia's astonishment, was within Ovid's lifetime. He had been just a bit older than Preston when the discovery was announced in the National Geographic, in 1976. A Canadian scientist chased the mystery his whole life, devising a tag that would stick to butterfly wings, recruiting volunteers to help track them, losing the trail many times. And then one winter's day, as an old man on shaky legs, he climbed a mountain in Michoacan to see what must have looked like his dream of heaven... Ovid could still quote passages of the article from memory: They carpeted the ground in their tremulous legions. He said he remembered exactly where he was when he read that article, and how he felt."Where were you?"Outside the post office, sitting on a lobster crate. I spent a lot of Saturdays there. My mother let me read the magazines before they went to their subscribers. I was so excited by the photos in that article, I ran all the way down Crown Street, all the way to West End and out a sandy road called Fortuna to the sea. I must have picked up a stick somewhere, because I remember jumping up and whacking every branch I passed, leaving a trail of flying leaves. When I got to the sea I didn't know what to do, so I threw the stick in Perseverance Bay and ran back. It was the happiest day of my life."Dellarobia wanted, of course, to know why."Why," he repeated, thinking about it. "It was just like any schoolboy. I thought everything in the world was already discovered. Already in my books. A lot of dead stuff that put me to sleep. That was the day I understood the world is still living.
inspire.author: Barbara Kingsolver

inspire.quote: Life isn't really about us, it's about those around us.
inspire.author: Frank Kayihura

inspire.quote: Asking people for advice and getting mad when it's not what you wanna hear is like eating food you know you are allergic to.
inspire.author: Liz Faublas

inspire.quote: Very few of us are Tolstoys or Gandhis, let alone bodhisattvas. We are just ordinary human beings caught in the groove of working or bringing up families, or for too many, merely surviving. Our lives offer only limited choices. However, peace does start with the individual, and even in the most mundane of lives it can be expressed in vivid and compelling ways.
inspire.author: Steve Killelea

inspire.quote: . I believe peace, when properly defined, is the first fundamental human right that makes all other rights possible. The right to life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness, to use the examples enshrined as ‘unalienable rights’ in the US Constitution, will remain forever out of reach in the absence of peace.
inspire.author: Steve Killelea

inspire.quote: I believe peace, when properly defined, is the first fundamental human right that makes all other rights possible. The right to life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness, to use the examples enshrined as ‘unalienable rights’ in the US Constitution, will remain forever out of reach in the absence of peace.

inspire.quote: Indeed, the key to making the best of your life, the key to discovering your calling, is to be with Jesus.

inspire.quote: This morningI heard the sun begging,And the birds sadly calling my name,This morning I felt a breeze of love knocking On the other side of a dusty window That I barely remember the last time I left open,This morning I let love and peace find their way back home againThis morning I kissed my Nights goodbye and welcome each loss as a leap of hopeAnd a lesson I’ve gratefully learned …

inspire.quote: Life is like a big cave with numerous doors. Only there's mist around our eyes, and we can't see them. When one door closes, the other opens, and when the second one closes, third opens and so on and so forth. So never give up....

inspire.quote: Are you a revolutionary? Don’t sit on the fence. Be a man of action, someone who makes a difference.

inspire.quote: Never give up on Hope' ~ RC

inspire.quote: It did not really matter what we expected from life but rather what life expected from us.

inspire.quote: I am the master of my fate, / I am the captain of my soul.

inspire.quote: Believe that your day is going to be good and leave it up to the day to prove you wrong.

inspire.quote: Life's rainy days... They bring out the rainbows, but they also bring out the worms. Pay attention to who's who and what's what.

inspire.quote: Be your light self.

inspire.quote: At the core of each of us is an identity secure in Christ, which leads to an ongoing, unbroken relationship with him.

inspire.quote: It’s more important to simply be present than to be brilliant.

inspire.quote: The price of doing whats right is not always based on results. If you dont get the result you want. Its not because you made a bad decision, its just the cost of doing whats right

inspire.quote: The final frontier is the inner frontier.

inspire.quote: You are the teacher you have always been looking for.

inspire.quote: Authenticity is the measure of our intuitive awakening.

inspire.quote: Poetry is pure like prophesy

inspire.quote: You are being prepared for a success you can't yet see.

inspire.quote: When the world is loud, create your own peace.

inspire.quote: Connect with those who see your light and celebrate your flame.

inspire.quote: Try, fail, try,Until You die!

inspire.quote: John by Maisie Aletha SmikleJohn the baptizerSon of LizaAte no appetizerAnd had nothing with fertilizerChosen to leadHe took heedFilled with gloryHe told the storyTo get a flannelThey disrobe a camelJohn wore it's skinTo keep warm withinWhile they lavish in castlesAnd ate lambs laced with honeyJohn lived among bristlesEating locusts glazed with honeyJohn had no landNor a bandHe kept no herdNor flocks of birdCalled he was indeedNone could do his deedAnd keep up to speedPaving the way to leadJohn had no moneyBut he had honeyJohn used a staffAnd kept no armsGod's enemies hated JohnHe threatened their insidious wrongJohn called out the wretchedFor light to expose their throngIndeed none could do the deed of JohnWho took martyrdom For the KingdomThen ascended for his mission on earth was done

inspire.quote: Happiness is a side effect of living intuitively.

inspire.quote: Ladies, just accept it. Men & women are wired differently. They don't think like us or understand why we feel the way we do and are perplexed by a lot of what we say, and baffled by our actions. But they don't have to always "get you" to love you. What's important is that he's a good boyfriend, husband, father. If *that's* missing, the fact he won't watch "Real Housewives of ATL" with you is the least of your worries.

inspire.quote: Never deprive your God-given philosophy that could metamorphose your Emotional pressure for competence in saintlike-Glory. There's greatness in all of us that breaths innovatory fire.

inspire.quote: Enlightenment is not a goal to be attained; it is a state of being to be regained.

inspire.quote: Despite everythingI still thank the universe For blessing me with you As my firstIf I could love you this much For this long— And on my first try — Then surely,I could love someone else more Far better,Far longer.

inspire.quote: How do you ignite your passion? It takes only a spark. A forward step, an inspired word, a bold attempt, a look, a nudge—anything that sets off a flicker of excitement. When it is your passion, the smallest thing can ignite it.

inspire.quote: I sit quietly with a cup of coffee, and enjoy the silence. I go for a morning run, which relieves stress and is perfect for contemplation. I use the quiet time before my family awakes to write something each morning. And I read, because a good novel is one of my favorite companions.

inspire.quote: On the road to successwhile you trybe wary of eyes that pryand fears that fly.

inspire.quote: Protect your time - it's your most valuable commodity. Guard it with your life.

inspire.quote: Any life career that you choose in following your bliss should be chosen with that sense - that nobody can frighten me off from this thing. And no matter what happens, this is the validation of my life and action.

inspire.quote: Go where your energy is reciprocated, appreciated, & celebrated. Audit your engagements; compartmentalize & adjust accordingly.Analyze & reflect on how each person affects you - energies you're inviting into your space/environment. Do they motivate you or keep you stagnant?

inspire.quote: Kindness is the key to success

inspire.quote: You'd be surprised at how far you can get in life, just by being kind.

inspire.quote: Trying to pump up your motivation to stick with a hard habit is like trying to force water through a bent hose. You can do it, but it requires a lot of effort and increases the tension in your life. Meanwhile, making your habits simple and easy is like removing the bend in the hose. Rather than trying to overcome the friction in your life, you reduce it.

inspire.quote: Don't fool yourself and don't let no one fool you!

inspire.quote: We need to teach people not about human beings but about being human.

inspire.quote: Zul je goed zorgen voor de broertjes die we waren, dan zorg ik voor de broertjes die we zijn

inspire.quote: External voices can damage or make you.Don't let those voices control the wheel of your life.Listen to your own inner voice and let it be the compass that direct your life towards greatness.

inspire.quote: this book is not a map, but an existential guide to a vagabondish lifestyle and perspective. If you want to hold this feeling in your hands, you will have to dig for it yourself. There is no other way, no shortcut, no online course, no magic recipe.

inspire.quote: I learnt lessons at every step of life, COVID-19 pandemic was the examination & Innovation will be the new normal.

inspire.quote: There were times I thought the best of my life had passed me by. I thought I was too old and too damaged to have anything good happen. Well, the BEST parts of my life happened after that. I'm so glad I was wrong! Turns out, it's never too late to meet the people you never knew you could love so much.

inspire.quote: If we work together they are no match for us.
inspire.author: Harmony Wagner

inspire.quote: It’s not your fault for what I thought. Last night, it was almost like I was scaling a wall and then looked down. I could fall, I could freeze against the rock wall, or I could keep on moving up. I've dug myself out of that hole already and said 'Never Again!
inspire.author: Skyler Grimi

inspire.quote: All of us have to learn how to invent our lives, make them up, imagine them. We need to be taught these skills; we need guides to show us how. Without them, our lives get made up for us by other people.Human beings have always joined in groups to imagine how best to live and help one another carry out the plan. The essential function of human community is to arrive at some agreement on what we need, what life ought to be, what we want our children to learn, and then to collaborate in learning and teaching so that we and they can go on the way we think is the right way.Small communities with strong traditions are often clear about the way they want to go, and good at teaching it. But tradition may crystallize imagination to the point of fossilizing it as dogma and forbidding new ideas. Larger communities, such as cities, open up room for people to imagine alternatives, learn from people of different traditions, and invent their own ways to live.As alternatives proliferate, however, those who take the responsibility of teaching find little social and moral consensus on what they should be teaching -- what we need, what life ought to be. In our time of huge populations exposed continuously to reproduced voices, images, and words used for commercial and political profit, there are too many people who want to and can invent us, own us, shape and control us through seductive and powerful media. It's a lot to ask of a child to find a way through all that alone.Nobody can do anything very much, really, alone.What a child needs, what we all need, is to find some other people who have imagined life along lines that make sense to us and allow some freedom, and listen to them. Not hear passively, but listen.
inspire.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

inspire.quote: It may feel like it now, my boy, but soon, you will see - you will see that everything you are afraid you are not.
inspire.author: Kristen Keenon Fisher

inspire.quote: We're All In This Thing Called Life, TOGETHER...Remember? Namastè & One Love.

inspire.quote: Let each day of your life be an inspiration to the world and tomorrow people
inspire.author: Jordan Hoechlin

inspire.quote: People come, students and everyone else, to be inspired by the biennale. They expect to see architecture as a kind of seismograph of where we are.
inspire.author: Aaron Levy

inspire.quote: I want to be my children’s hero.
inspire.author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

inspire.quote: During the play-act of life, errors can clash with our conventional truth and compel us to prepare new ground for another truth concept that will replace the old truth model. Be that as it may, let us fly on the wings of our inspiration, value the day, enjoy the now, and be ready because the new blueprint may only remain valid until it dies by natural death on its turn. ("Measuring space")
inspire.author: Erik Pevernagie

inspire.quote: ...in witnessing someone's being touched, we are also witnessing someone's being moved, the absence of which in ourselves is a sorrow, and a sacrifice. And witnessing the absence of movement in ourselves by witnessing its abundance in another...can hurt. Until it becomes, if we are lucky, an opening.

inspire.quote: Life is wonderful- if only, you would dare to be yourself.
inspire.author: Hrishikesh Agnihotri

inspire.quote: A purpose-driven woman does not stand on the way of others because she is always on the move.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: A dynamic woman gets a lot done, with a little less time.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: Even after a disappointment, a dynamic woman does not give up on doing what is right.

inspire.quote: Find something to aim for in life. Do not live an empty life.

inspire.quote: She is someone you can ask for help. She does not only care about herself. She cares about others as well. She is a caring woman.

inspire.quote: A loving woman needs love more than she loves.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: Dear Superwoman, When life is not treating you well, do not despair. It shall be well.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: Dear Superwoman, Seasons are there for a reason. You may not flourish now,but when it is your season,your cup will overflow.

inspire.quote: Dear Superwoman, Do not let anyone mess with your mind.You are not bitter.You are not bad.You are sweet, and you are smart. You just need to be around people who can help you grow.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: Dear Superwoman,Do not be afraid to start all over again.It is better to start from scratch, than stay where you are constantly hurt.

inspire.quote: Dear Superwoman,You can achieve great things in life, as long as you let no one or nothing stop you from walking in the right path.

inspire.quote: We may be different regards to our race, class, gender, religion , ability, citizenship status, personality and intelligence but we are the same creature as human beings. This gives us the oppurtunity to learn from each others' differences by treating each other with equal dignity and respect so we can maintain a civil society.

inspire.quote: A purpose-driven woman always does her best to ensure that purpose prevails.

inspire.quote: If you are going to live in the real world, the world of anger, violence, love and passion, responsibility, and continuity, then silence is not the path I recommend. You need to put yourself in the world, and in the way of the world.

inspire.quote: Elizabeth walked slowly down the aisle with her head held high. If anyone in the room thought the young woman before them would mince her words, they quickly realized their mistake.
inspire.author: Annie Boochever

inspire.quote: Crisis is the portal to new opportunity

inspire.quote: Lantern in hand;seeking humansin bright darkness...
inspire.author: Irene Doura-Kavadia

inspire.quote: Whenever a temptation arises in your mind, resistance to it also arises. If you accept both temptation and resistance, you will become free from both. If you go with resistance alone, temptation will become stronger.
inspire.author: Shunya

inspire.quote: A powerful woman knows how to dust herself off and shine just like a diamond, even after the worst has happened to her.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: And even feigned, courage is a lifeline.
inspire.author: Ivy G. Shadrick

inspire.quote: A powerful woman knows how to hold others by the hand and help them stand.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: Não gostava de pessoas, preferia os gatos. Digeria os humanos em pequenas doses, mais de três provocavam-lhe indigestão. - Alma Belasco
inspire.author: Isabel Allende

inspire.quote: If u want to be different follow the footsteps of your own shadow!!rather than be an image of an living embodiment!
inspire.author: DiptanshuG

inspire.quote: The CurveThere is a curve somewhere,I am in search of,Like the glimpse of a scythe in a mundane field,Or the drooping fairy in form of Chinese lantern, Sometimes it peeps through a broken doorOf some dilapidated mansion,The reign of which now belongs to void,And pride went past heritage.Why on earth moses symbolizes melancholy?I can't take my eyes off from their rebellious green,As if it merges with my previous birthstones,Where I was in waiting,For the same curve,The lost one.
inspire.author: সোনালী চক্রবর্তী

inspire.quote: Everybody is Somebody!
inspire.author: Somya Kedia

inspire.quote: Yo era alguien simple que trataba de hacer algo, que para mi, no era para nada simple
inspire.author: Estrella Viajera

inspire.quote: A positive man makes an airplane, while a negative man makes a parachute.
inspire.author: Kim Jong Min

inspire.quote: We are all stitches in a fabric too vast to comprehend. But perhaps that is a good thing, for it means we are always exactly where we need to be.
inspire.author: Roshani Chokshi

inspire.quote: The thing about poetsis we need heartacheand madness and losslike the air we breathe - for without the chaos,words are just tinyletters without a soul.
inspire.author: grace gegenheimer

inspire.quote: Whatever we focus our attention on grows. When we attend to what energizes or inspires us, we flourish.
inspire.author: David Taylor-Klaus

inspire.quote: We create our future self by default or design.
inspire.author: Nicole Cody

inspire.quote: Accepting your truth is a gateway to walk in your light.
inspire.author: Angel Moreira

inspire.quote: ONE OF THE BEST GIFT THAT WE CAN GIVE TO OUR SELF IS OUR HIGHEST INFLUENCE AND COURAGE.
inspire.author: Dax Bamania

inspire.quote: What is the job of a parent, but to teach a child she has worth so that one day she can transform herself into whatever she wants.
inspire.author: Stacey  Lee

inspire.quote: It takes so much courage just to start
inspire.author: Michael Roach

inspire.quote: ...But sometimes the best things to happen to us are the ones we didn't know we needed
inspire.author: Sheridan Anne

inspire.quote: If we do something just to help ourselves, it will never work. You can never really put effort into a thing if it's only for yourself. It has to be for something bigger.
inspire.author: Michael Roach

inspire.quote: A blessing loves a good surprise.
inspire.author: Stacey  Lee

inspire.quote: Seek the hidden treasure in every trouble.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Yes good one- hold on tight- to ideas. At times, since we are talking so much about birds and all things avian, these flighty things do have a tendency to spread their gossamer wings and take flight. So you haven’t even begun to see it and it disappears from your view. At times you don’t even know how many of these frisky things you thought of and they instantly frolicked their way into some wonderland. There they remain latent. Sometimes for mere moments, sometimes days, sometimes months and years. And then in a flash. They come back without warning, at times stealthily, in our most unguarded moments- in bed, polishing shoes, rolling out a roti, driving or pooping and you are not prepared. They settle tentatively on your sleepy eyes for a second and before you know it, fly past you in a flash again, good for you if you hold them then and there, for if you think you will sit yourself down one day with the wrong end of the pen in your mouth, or the laptop loaded with the works, or the dream paints on the palette, to capture what you saw in your mind’s stratosphere- you just blink and find it’s just a blankness you see, no matter how hard you try, a blankness that stares with a baffling obduracy. At times you even forget that you forgot. The thought had yet not entered your conscious mind- it was just hovering between the sleeping world and the awake, and just falls off the edge. Never makes it. Yes they are flighty things." She rounded it with a peal of laughter, amused with the little story she had concocted.
inspire.author: Sakoon Singh

inspire.quote: My passion in life is to teach and educate. If I make money along the way, then that is a wonderful thing too. The important thing is that you are given more opportunities by me sharing my knowledge and experience.
inspire.author: Linda Rawson

inspire.quote: My eyes opened... I had been blessed with a new day; another chance to get it right. I could take a small step in a healthier direction. I could allow the grace I have been shown to fuel my courage to let go of the past. I could be grateful to see that God thinks I deserve another day... And I will make this day count!
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: If the girl you're interested in doesn't inspire you to greater effort than you would undertake without knowing her, then you'd better look around and get another.
inspire.author: George Romney

inspire.quote: Jesus Christ is our righteousness. Jesus Christ is our holiness. Jesus Christ is our redemption.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: My father often said, when people called you monkey, make sure you stick your tail out, and make it long enough.
inspire.author: Nurudeen Ushawu

inspire.quote: In the end, maybe what you really seek is not so much balance but a calming of the storm in your soul.
inspire.author: Gail Armatys

inspire.quote: I believe in a better world.
inspire.author: Adrienne Posey

inspire.quote: Think of how many chances and fresh starts you have given others... Let today be the day you grant that to yourself. A new day. A fresh start. Renewed energy. Endless opportunities and blessings. Let's make today worth remembering!
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: Trust me, once your heart learns something, it will work and everything will be better for your own goods.
inspire.author: Shaa Zainol

inspire.quote: I had no control over what the Iraq War would ask of me; the only thing I could decide was how I would show up in it. What I would do. What I wouldn't do. In that decision I found what was worth dying for and what was worth living for- love.
inspire.author: Diana Oestreich

inspire.quote: Violence isn't only bombs and bullets, it can be speaking words that dehumanize and looking away when someone needs you to lean in and stand up alongside them to confront the racism, the intimidation, or the belittling.
inspire.author: Diana Oestreich

inspire.quote: Today is a great day to reconnect with who you are. Not the You that everyone else convinced you to be... but the real YOU. Stop playing small for other people's comfort. Reconnect with the power you have to overcome adversity and to shape your life. It's a new day... and ti's time for your BADDASSS self to rise and shine!
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: My perspective is different now. I'm stronger than ever. I may have let you control my story for awhile, but those days are over. NEVER AGAIN! My history will not interfere with my destiny. I'm in control of this journey now... Buckle up!
inspire.author: Steve Maraboli

inspire.quote: You are a collection of your own thoughts. What thoughts you generate these are accumulated and formed your own destiny.If you richly think, you become rich, if you poorly think, you become poor. Therefore, your thought is the master of your own life.
inspire.author: Lord Robin

inspire.quote: You are enough
inspire.author: Bobby Temps

inspire.quote: What is the world for if not to evoke and reflect back to us, as mirror, the obfuscated aspects of ourselves?
inspire.author: Bernardo Kastrup

inspire.quote: Fill your soul with beauty...artcontemplation of your Creationthe power of LOVEfriendsfamilypeople you don't knowGod
inspire.author: Sean Coons

inspire.quote: One might almost say that an apparition is human vision corrected by divine love. I do not see you as you really are, Joseph; I see you through my affection for you. The Miracles of the Church seem to me not to rest so much upon faces or voices or healing power coming suddenly near to us from afar off, but upon our perceptions being made finer, so that for a moment our eyes can see and our ears can hear what is there about us always.
inspire.author: Willa Cather

inspire.quote: What is it you do, then? I'll tell you: You leave out whatever doesn't suit you. As the author himself has done before you. Just as you leave things out of your dreams and fantasies. By leaving things out, we bring beauty and excitement into the world. We evidently handle our reality by effecting some sort of compromise with it, an in-between state where the emotions prevent each other from reaching their fullest intensity, graying the colors somewhat. Children who haven't yet reached that point of control are both happier and unhappier than adults who have. And yes, stupid people also leave things out, which is why ignorance is bliss. So I propose, to begin with, that we try to love each other as if we were characters in a novel who have met in the pages of a book. Let's in any case leave off all the fatty tissue that plumps up reality.
inspire.author: Robert Musil

inspire.quote: If we can write or sing or create in some way, even when we are dealing with difficulties or pain, then it becomes something bigger than ourselves — and often beautiful.
inspire.author: Brenda Peterson

inspire.quote: The movie Koyaanisqatsi shows non-commented time-lapse footage and focuses our attention on the very rhythm of our civilized modern life and nature. A marijuana high can do something for a user similar to what this time-lapse footage does. The enhancement of episodic memory and the acceleration of associative streams of memories can alter and enhance our recognition of patterns in our lives in various ways. If we are presented with quick associative chains of past experiences, we can see a pattern in a body of information that is usually not at once presented to our "inner eye" as such.
inspire.author: Sebastian Marincolo

inspire.quote: We are not strangers in this journey of life…We are connected to each other through this mysterious field of love.
inspire.author: Banani Ray

inspire.quote: You honor yourself by acting with dignity and composure.
inspire.author: Allan Lokos

inspire.quote: It has been my personal experience that as I allow the painting to speak I become lost, it is delicious and at the same time frightening. The best ones, to me, have a life of their own.
inspire.author: Luther E. Vann

inspire.quote: We dropped our troubles into the lap of the storyteller, and they turned into someone else's.
inspire.author: Naomi Shihab Nye

inspire.quote: Real love is a humble receptivity of a silent heart that is prepared to melt and merge…
inspire.author: Banani Ray

inspire.quote: He had been dazzled. Because of the dazzling brightness, he had had to kill [Seigen]. All who had encountered Seigen had had their hearts stolen by that brightness. That envy had turned to malice.
inspire.author: Takayuki Yamaguchi

inspire.quote: Please don't entertain for a moment the utterly mistaken idea that there is no drudgery in writing. There is a great deal of drudgery in even the most inspired, the most noble, the most distinguished writing. Read what the great ones have said about their jobs; how they never sit down to their work without a sigh of distress and never get up from it witout a sigh of relief. Do you imagine that your Muse is forever flamelike -- breathing the inspired word, the wonderful situation, the superb solution into your attentive ear? ... Believe me, my poor boy, if you wait for inspiration in our set-up, you'll wait for ever.
inspire.author: Ngaio Marsh

inspire.quote: I think about the Old Ones, that they have a past but no history. I think about the inevitability of death, and whether it’s not that very inevitability that inspires us to take photographs and make scrapbooks and tell stories. That that’s how we humans find our way to immortality. This is not a new thought; I’ve had such thoughts before. But I have a new thought now. That that’s how we find our way toward meaning. Meaning. If you’re going to die, you want to find meaning in life. You want to connect the dots.
inspire.author: Franny Billingsley

inspire.quote: He who perseveres like an infant that falls down and keeps getting up, shall eventually find the way."~ Amunhotep El Bey
inspire.author: Amunhotep El Bey

inspire.quote: Take your time.Stay away from the easy going.Never take the same way twice.Gunny Arndt's rules for successful reconnaissance; Guadalcanal 1942
inspire.author: GYSGT Charles C. Arndt

inspire.quote: Intuition represents a concept which is made up from lots of ideas and assumptions, not all of which will be common to everyone.
inspire.author: Sylvia Clare

inspire.quote: اسكبيني قطرة عطر في رسغك وتنشقيني..أسافر فيك وأحتل كل الشرايين
inspire.author: منجية إبراهيم

inspire.quote: Creation is bringing potential into being, bringing inspiration into action. Inspiration and action are nothing when they are apart. Inspiration feels like a great a wondrous thing, but if it is not manifested, it is as if it never existed. Likewise, action without inspiration has no purpose. It is only when they are together as one that they are truly something.
inspire.author: Kristi Bowman

inspire.quote: Don't worry much about the after-life, Just like you don't worry about your before-Life. Worry (and be grateful) about THIS life. This one DOES count
inspire.author: Pablo

inspire.quote: Everyone who dies out there dies of confusion.
inspire.author: Laurence Gonzales

inspire.quote: Ish #177 "You never know what you don't know, until you finally know it.
inspire.author: Regina Griffin

inspire.quote: Ish #28 "Give you child a name with meaning.
inspire.author: Regina Griffin

inspire.quote: God is not ecstatic about the lack you are experiencing; He is not delightful over your failures, He is not happy about your stagnancy.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: Toutes les erreurs de la critique commises à mon égard, à mes débuts, furent qu'elle ne vit pas qu'il ne fallait rien définir, rien comprendre, rien limiter, rien préciser, parce que tout ce qui est sincèrement et docilement nouveau - comme le beau d'ailleurs, porte sa signification en soi-même. La désignation par un titre mis à mes dessins est quelquefois de trop, pour ainsi dire. Le titre n'y est justifié que lorsqu'il est vague, indéterminé, et visant même confusément à l'équivoque. Mes dessins inspirent et ne se définissent pas. Ils ne déterminent rien. Ils nous placent, ainsi que la musique, dans le monde ambigu de l'indéterminé. Ils sont une sorte de métaphore.
inspire.author: Odilon Redon

inspire.quote: Our tragedy is their beauty. Our pain is their art. The beatific bereavement that is our life captured on a canvas for all the world to see.
inspire.author: Solange nicole

inspire.quote: Being poor in the Spirit means you are humble, gentle, meek, God-fearing,kind and exhibit the fruits of the Spirit but being Spiritually poor is lacking in every thing that pertains to life and godliness.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: When the Prince comes into your life, you will stop thinking and start reasoning.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: I see no priestly garments on you. There is no ephod on your belt. You presume to speak for Yahweh? You speak his name aloud so lightly?
inspire.author: Cliff Graham

inspire.quote: The sky is blue everywhere.
inspire.author: Kaleb Lampkin

inspire.quote: Options abound in our world. You can choose where to stay and how to stay there. Where you are Today is as a result of the option you took yesterday and no doubt where you will be Tomorrow is embedded in your option Today. Choose right; choose wisely, Take THE BEST OPTION. The Best Option will deliver your inheritance to you. It will change your state and deliver to you, your brand new estate. You do not blame anyone for failing to do it right the first time. You accept the blame. The Best Option will cause you to get it right the first time and always.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: Berikan kepadaku mereka yang lelah dan papaYang terbelenggu dan mendambakan kebebasanYang terbanting ke pantaimu, berimpitan lemasBeri aku para gelandangan, dan yang terhempasAkan kunyalakan pelitaku di sisi gerbang emas
inspire.author: Emma Lazarus

inspire.quote: Just about a month from now I'm set adrift, with a diploma for a sail and lots of nerve for oars.
inspire.author: Richard Halliburton

inspire.quote: There is no such thing as a perfect person in this world. We all must become the main characters or the stars of our lives. We are all different and start differently. But from whatever is our circumstances, it is very important that we find the opportunities to try out what we want to do.
inspire.author: Koo HyeSun

inspire.quote: Don't call yourself discouraged anymore;it's no longer your name.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Don't let any situation intimidate you anymore, don't accept defeat anymore.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Weigh whatever you are about to say; what will it do to your hearer - encouragement, edification, disappointment or fear? What will it do to your life - glorify, edify, beautify or weigh you down? Speak well and things will go well.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Dominate in your domain; You can do it.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: In the past, I used to think that it is fundamental and natural to have everything. But I realized that is not true. Instead I realized that those are things to be grateful for. After that realization, I became comfortable. Even if I don’t have it I am grateful. Such a realization also made me understand that is a way to love myself.
inspire.author: Goo Hye Sun

inspire.quote: Don't say negative things about your spouse and children.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: You recreate your world to your taste with God's Word in your mouth.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: You are not permitted to suffer what others suffer, you are not permitted to fail or die young.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Learn to trust yourself and you will create a meaningful life.
inspire.author: Lynn A. Robinson

inspire.quote: Each life experience poses this question: how do you want to be changed because of me?
inspire.author: Mollie Marti

inspire.quote: The more you become aware of and respond to the needs of others, the richer your own life becomes.
inspire.author: Mollie Marti

inspire.quote: God rewards every act of obedience to His Will.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Sometimes everything breaks up so something new can break through.
inspire.author: Lynn A. Robinson

inspire.quote: Your mouth is not given to you for feeding alone; it is given to you to programme events and circumstance around you.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Worship is the marriage of two Spirits - the Spirit of God and the Spirit of man.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: The presence of God is so important in the life of believers. There is abundance of all you need to make your life comfortable in His presence.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Create your world with God's Word in your mouth just say it and it will be accomplished!
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Your status has changed. Your Name is changed! You are a new creation.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Another way of remaining in intimacy with God is by remaining in His presence.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: You are not permitted to live and die as a non-entity because you have encountered the greatness that is associated with Christ.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: The presence of the Lord destroys a life of struggle. You will struggle until you encounter His presence.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: You deserve to have a prosperous and abundant life!
inspire.author: Lynn A. Robinson

inspire.quote: The choice is yours. Don't let your pronouncements destroy your destiny rather let them build your future up!
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Metaforen är ett av tankens väsentligaste verktyg. Den belyser vad som annars skulle ligga helt i mörker. Men denna belysning blir ibland så klar att den bländar istället för avslöjar.
inspire.author: Alasdair Gray

inspire.quote: I rather now strive to reach rather than wait to receive!
inspire.author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

inspire.quote: Let your words glorify God and edify your hearers and then beautify your life.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: You have abundance all around you.
inspire.author: Lynn A. Robinson

inspire.quote: Words are directed to your personalities namely; - God, your hearers, devil and yourself.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: If something's not giving you value, consider eliminating it from your life.
inspire.author: Leo Babauta

inspire.quote: Behind all these manifestations is the one radiance, which shines through all things. The function of art is to reveal this radiance through the created object.
inspire.author: Joseph Campbell

inspire.quote: Your whole life has been a long road leading directly to this moment
inspire.author: James Redfield

inspire.quote: When I look back on my life I realize I was very sick for a long time. Sitting here in good health, I find myself crying. I do that sometimes. I am very sensitive. My dear son Jayden, who many know as Fox0r Jr., inherited that trait from me. I see it in him already. Jaxson is confident. Owen is sweet and loving. He is also spry and cunning. Finley is bold. Finley is also a stirring and adventurous child. We have laughed together. We have cried together. We have smiled together. My sons, next to Jesus, are my greatest inspiration.
inspire.author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

inspire.quote: Yin and yang, fundamentally different yet symbiotic. I will never see one but for the other, as day has no meaning absent the dark, nor night without light, good without bad, right without wrong.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: I close my eyes and inhale gently. Entranced, yet acutely aware of my role here, an indelible, wonderful part of something inestimably greater than myself.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: Your approach could be day by day and you may concede that you will decide to ignore your own plan at times. Because you are admittedly flawed. Human after all.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: What is the meaning of life? To live.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: The present is all we have for action, for living. Everything else is either historical or hypothetical. Immutable data and uncertain potentialities that can be learned from and planned for, but only in the present.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: There’s only so many times a heart can break.One day, it will be okay, but it'll heal all wrong.It’ll heal with you outside of it.
inspire.author: Beena Khan

inspire.quote: Evil is innate, I have found. Ignored or misunderstood, it develops insidiously, on its own.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: I'm not going to get mad. I have control over my emotions. Little babies complain about video games. Men get back up and do it again and just fucking win, so that's what I'm going to do.
inspire.author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

inspire.quote: I hope to find lasting happiness and empower and inspire my fellow beings to also acquire and project their own happiness throughout the multiverse, enabling those ignorant, darkened souls to bloom and experience the blessings of true freedom.
inspire.author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

inspire.quote: Over the course of my life, many people have claimed that I am a good man. I don’t deny that claim. I am an equal helping of light and dark. Inherently, I know I am good. I also know that darkness resides inside of my heart. Thankfully, God sees through my walls and knows what resides inside. He has always protected me and others from that darkness, even when I was at my lowest.
inspire.author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

inspire.quote: It is not delusional to think we can change a world that is shrouded in darkness. A light, in and of itself, changes darkness by its very nature. If I choose to shine as a light in the darkness, I will illuminate the world around me. If I choose love over hate, I will make a difference – no matter how small that difference may be. You will, too.
inspire.author: Aaron Kyle Andresen

inspire.quote: Sun is rising, here comes the day. Mind is clear, thanks to you. All is good in every way, one more time—I want to.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: Without enduring faith, how can we endure life?
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Young people must respect the elderly.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: If you will hear me through a very little more, all you can ever do for me is done. I wish you to know that you have been the last dream of my soul...A dream, all a dream, that ends in nothing, and leaves the sleeper where he lay down, but I wish you to know that you inspired it.
inspire.author: Charles Dickens

inspire.quote: Pursue in lieu of a full mind, mindfulness. Absent this, the value of all, of everything, or nearly so is nearly nothing.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: I count until it counts.
inspire.author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

inspire.quote: Evil is innate, I have found. Ignored or misunderstood,it develops insidiously, on its own.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: What if you helped your people believe things they have no business believing?
inspire.author: Tim Burningham

inspire.quote: The only myth that is going to be worth thinking about in the immediate future is one that is talking about the planet, not the city, not these people, but the planet, and everybody on it.
inspire.author: Joseph Campbell

inspire.quote: One thing that comes out in myths, for example, is at the bottom of the abyss comes the voice of salvation. The black moment is the moment when the real message of transformation is going to come. At the darkest moment comes the light.
inspire.author: Joseph Campbell

inspire.quote: The line between need and want, whether fine or wide, can be poorly interpreted depending on the circumstances.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: I even have a superstition that has grown on me as the result of invisible hands coming all the time - namely, that if you do follow your bliss you put yourself on a kind of track that has been there all the while, waiting for you, and the life that you ought to be living is the one you are living. When you can see that, you begin to meet people who are in the field of your bliss, and they open the doors to you.
inspire.author: joseph campbell

inspire.quote: Change can be difficult,Don't compromise your values,Stay true.
inspire.author: Lochan Kalicharan

inspire.quote: When one tunes in into nature's frequency, life becomes change, change becomes hope!
inspire.author: Aniekee Tochukwu Ezekiel

inspire.quote: I don't worry about how other people perceive me. I figure out what I want, and I work very hard to make it happen. Simple recipe. I didn't achieve any goals by having it given to me on a silver platter, through fibbing or exaggeration, nor through favours. When you work hard, the universe almost always brings people to you - synergy. The universe will reflect the energy you give it. Stop worrying about what other people think of you, or worrying about the limit(s) they have, in their heads, about your potential. The universe will bring you into your purpose organically. Nothing out of force tastes as good as what you have worked your ass off to achieve, and for which the universe synergistically opens up for you, and brings into your world. As well it is not about proving other people wrong; first and foremost prove your own negative inner voice wrong. The inner voice that internalized the negative energies of others. Sometimes we are our own biggest hurdle. And as a subsequent outcome of rewiring your inner voice, you'll leave others speechless at contesting their limitations of you...seeing the supernova you are.
inspire.author: Cheyanne Ratnam

inspire.quote: Let the dark horses of passion emerge from the night of our secret dreams, and give voice to the appeals of our authentic being, and fly on the wings of our inspiration. ( "Just for a moment" )
inspire.author: Erik Pevernagie

inspire.quote: Words have the power to destroy and construct a better life
inspire.author: Ashmita Mishra

inspire.quote: The best way to deal with any kind of change is to embrace it.
inspire.author: Pooja Agnihotri

inspire.quote: Whenever feeling overwhelmed by many things you have to do just take the very first step. Small daily improvements and innovations can lead to astounding achievements over time.
inspire.author: Omar Cherif

inspire.quote: People can never get enough of something new and different.
inspire.author: Pooja Agnihotri

inspire.quote: Every dream begins with a dreamer.
inspire.author: Pooja Agnihotri

inspire.quote: You won’t develop a successful product if you don’t start with a clear vision.
inspire.author: Pooja Agnihotri

inspire.quote: The moment you define yourself, you limit yourself to every other possibility.
inspire.author: Hrishikesh Agnihotri

inspire.quote: I had created a vision for this team as a wide-eyed teenage girl when I had signed a commitment to wait for my future husband.
inspire.author: Kristine Akana

inspire.quote: While murder causes the physical death of one's body, sexual immorality brings other kinds of death- the death of innocence, health, stability, fidelity, faithfulness, trust, joy, peace, and security.
inspire.author: Kristine Akana

inspire.quote: The light has gone out, I said, and yet I was wrong. For the light that shone in this country was no ordinary light. The light that has illumined this country for these many years will illumine this country for many more years, and a thousand years later, that light will be seen in this country and the world will see it and it will give solace to innumerable hearts. For that light represented something more than the immediate past, it represented the living, the eternal truths, reminding us of the right path, drawing us from error, taking this ancient country to freedom.
inspire.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

inspire.quote: We work and work to rise from the deep, congregate and take flight.
inspire.author: C.M. Rivers

inspire.quote: Hard work will never betray the results !
inspire.author: Jennie Mollie

inspire.quote: … lebo nie ten, kto v rozkoši planúc žil, ale ten, kto tvoril a vytvoril, môže hovoriť, že žil!
inspire.author: Hviezdoslav

inspire.quote: —Get a goal, to achieve your life’s mission
inspire.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

inspire.quote: Through my studies, a picture was painted: God desires His people to be set apart as His pure bride, our purity is possible because of the grace we receive at the cross, and a lifestyle of purity is a direct result of God's enabling and empowerment.
inspire.author: Kristine Akana

inspire.quote: At the sight of the notebooks lined up in the window I feel the same flurry of anticipation for clean pages, fresh ink and new beginnings. If only I could crack myself open like a new book, and know that there were hundreds of blank pages waiting to be filled.
inspire.author: Maryam Diener

inspire.quote: It’s easy to believe that everything will be okay when everything is okay. It’s the moments where we feel like everything is crumbling before us and completely falling apart that faith proves just how powerful it is.
inspire.author: Jamie Grace

inspire.quote: By choosing to live in the boldness of who I am, I am embracing who God made me to be. My circumstance is a part of my everyday, and I make the choice to embrace that–even if it looks different from what everyone else would expect.
inspire.author: Jamie Grace

inspire.quote: When we allow our worth and our value to be defined by who we are and Whose we are instead of what other people think about us, we can begin to walk in freedom.
inspire.author: Jamie Grace

inspire.quote: There is a Creator available to all of us, who creates in a way much greater than we could ever could. And when He gives us the privilege to be a part of those designs, we know that we have found our purpose.
inspire.author: Jamie Grace

inspire.quote: Fine TuningMy fingers My hands My wrists hurt so badfrom working all these years- Working on being something, always feeling like nothing Some days, it hurtsto even turn the dial on the radioBut I don’t have to turn anymore causeyou’re the right frequency (self)And when you come to ground me,I know that’s where I’m meant to bestationed. Set the pre-set to Love.
inspire.author: Casey Renee Kiser

inspire.quote: Finally, I wanted to tell a more personal story that might inspire young people considering a life in public service; how my career in politics really started with a search for a place to fit in. A way to explain the different strands of my mixed up heritage and how it was only by hitching my wagon to something larger than myself that I was ultimately able to locate a community and purpose for my life.
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: Do not be afraid, my child," Sheba told her. "Fear is the prison of the mind.
inspire.author: Dana Gricken

inspire.quote: Even though change is an important part of growth, we still face a hard time liking it. We try to resist it for as long as we can before giving up. Not just in our personal lives, but even in our professional lives
inspire.author: Pooja Agnihotri

inspire.quote: Your limitations can become limitless if you use your mind and body to overcome a particular challenge.
inspire.author: Saaif Alam

inspire.quote: It wasn't that the ice-cream man came everyday; he came whenever the child heard his music.
inspire.author: Jenny Boully

inspire.quote: Never rush announcing your victory, people will push you to the darkness and will see you as a victim.
inspire.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

inspire.quote: Writing is easy. It’s actually saying something that’s hard.
inspire.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

inspire.quote: If I can inspire one being ;I am the whole being.
inspire.author: Madhushree Das

inspire.quote: Quitting is not giving up, it's choosing to focus your attention on something more important. Quitting is not losing confidence, it's realizing that there are more valuable ways you can spend your time. Quitting is not making excuses, it's learning to be more productive, efficient and effective instead. Quitting is letting go of things (or people) that are sucking the life out of you so you can do more things that will bring you strength.
inspire.author: Osayi Osar-Emokpae

inspire.quote: The poet dreams of the mountainSometimes I grow weary of the days, with all their fits and starts.I want to climb some old gray mountains, slowly, takingThe rest of my lifetime to do it, resting often, sleepingUnder the pines or, above them, on the unclothed rocks.I want to see how many stars are still in the skyThat we have smothered for years now, a century at least.I want to look back at everything, forgiving it all,And peaceful, knowing the last thing there is to know.All that urgency! Not what the earth is about!How silent the trees, their poetry being of themselves only.I want to take slow steps, and think appropriate thoughts.In ten thousand years, maybe, a piece of the mountain will fall.
inspire.author: Mary Oliver

inspire.quote: I am the happiest man alive. I have that in me that can convert poverty to riches, adversity to prosperity, and I am more invulnerable than Archilles; Fortune hath not one place to hit me.
inspire.author: Thomas Browne

inspire.quote: How will you go about finding that thing the nature of which is totally unknown to you?" (Plato) The things we want are transformative, and we don’t know or only think we know what is on the other side of that transformation. Love, wisdom, grace, inspiration- how do you go about finding these things that are in some ways about extending the boundaries of the self into unknown territory, about becoming someone else?
inspire.author: Rebecca Solnit

inspire.quote: Be a King. Dare to be Different, dare to manifest your greatness.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Don't die without fulfilling your purpose.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: It's amazing how close I have been, all this time, to my old life. And yet the distance that divides me from it is vast.
inspire.author: Lauren Oliver

inspire.quote: I take thee at thy word:Call me but love, and I'll be new baptized;Henceforth I never will be Romeo.
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: There is a power that can be created out of pent-up indignation, courage, and the inspiration of a common cause, and that if enough people put their minds and bodies into that cause, they can win. It is a phenomenon recorded again and against in the history of popular movements against injustice all over the world.
inspire.author: Howard Zinn

inspire.quote: God is never tired of bringing the sun out every morning, taking it in the evenings and bringing out the moon.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Dare to be different. Represent your maker well and you will forever abide in the beautiful embrace of his loving arms.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Your words are powerful so what you say goes a long way to either establish or destroy you; this is why you should say things that God has said concerning you, not things that situations or circumstances say.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Someone is always going to try to knock you down and take your place. It is up to you to fight for what you want.
inspire.author: Teresa Mummert

inspire.quote: Time was a film run backward. Suns fled and ten million moons fled after them.
inspire.author: Ray Bradbury

inspire.quote: Imagination is the true magic carpet.
inspire.author: Norman Vincent Peale

inspire.quote: Don’t hide what you have just because people tell you it’s not normal. I have known normal people…and guess what? They are as boring as hell...
inspire.author: Sidney Knight

inspire.quote: Fear is the Fatal killer of Desire.
inspire.author: zig ziggler

inspire.quote: Emotions are like muscles. Most of them go highly unattended, it's usually the weaker, undefined ones that cause injury to the rest, and there is most certainly memory response in play.
inspire.author: Erica Goros

inspire.quote: Life is a constellation, the individual moments in our lives seem so pointless sometimes; but when you look at the whole picture, you can see that those little moments formed memories.
inspire.author: Alex Rogers

inspire.quote: The difference between vampires and angels? Angels are real.
inspire.author: Lisa Grace

inspire.quote: Phantasie ist wichtiger als Wissen, denn Wissen ist begrenzt.
inspire.author: Albert Einstein

inspire.quote: The philosophies of men surround us. The face of sin today often wears the mask of tolerance. Do not be deceived; behind that facade is heartache, unhappiness, and pain. You know what is right and what is wrong, and no disguise, however appealing, can change that. Be the one to make a stand for right, even if you stand alone. Have the moral courage to be a light for others to follow.
inspire.author: Thomas S. Monson

inspire.quote: Each day begins a new journey of life, for if we awake, there is a reason.
inspire.author: Bethanie Armstrong

inspire.quote: No one should ever despair because the entrance to his or her chosen career path is clogged. There is an ancient saying: "The persistent drip wears through stone.
inspire.author: Kentetsu Takamori

inspire.quote: Never let negativity derail your journey as a writer. Use the energy for your own betterment.
inspire.author: Guadalupe Neri

inspire.quote: Every human being has divinity encased within its spirit and it is the task of its creator as well as itself to set it free. No human being is an end product, every being still breathing is a creation still under creation.
inspire.author: Toni Sorenson

inspire.quote: Do not look down with disdain on what Christ spent so much to achieve for you.
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Kekaguman lebih baik hanya tetap sebagai kekaguman. Kalau terlalu dekat.. Bisa seperti ikarus yang jatuh ke bumi karena sayapnya terbakar matahari..
inspire.author: Yuko Arisawa ( Detective Conan )

inspire.quote: People say, 'It's hard to forgive...et al'. I think it's much harder to live peacefully. So, forgive and focus on living peacefully.
inspire.author: m.ralte

inspire.quote: I let all that anger and worry go because they don't belong to me any more than the future does. And I don't wanna feel them anyhow, because the truth is, whatever happens when this war ends, here and now, far from Richmond County, I'm freer than I've ever been.
inspire.author: Teresa R. Funke

inspire.quote: But once we know that behind most fear lurks a lie, then we can ignore it by remembering God's truths in our lives.
inspire.author: Ken Costa

inspire.quote: Anyone can nurture a myth about their life if they have enough manure, so if the grass looks greener on the other side of the fence, that's probably because it's full of shit.
inspire.author: Fredrik Backman

inspire.quote: If with the same 26 alphabet letters we form a constructive world, then there will be no place for destruction in all its forms.
inspire.author: Mireille Saba Redford

inspire.quote: Shallow waters don't lead to new continents.
inspire.author: Constance Friday

inspire.quote: May we all grow up to be strong like her
inspire.author: Kelli Estes

inspire.quote: Some days it's hard to believe that we're all one. But I believe if we keep radiating good energy in the world it will come back to us a hundredfold.
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: The only danger of the moment was that Jo - and Gabe - might let those seconds pass away without seeing them as Ursa did, as her own teeny tweak of fate in a vast and miraculous universe, as a wondrous gift she was offering to them.
inspire.author: Glendy Vanderah

inspire.quote: In a sense she [Sylvia Plath] was the victim of an obsessive talent that sent her out into the world to gather sensations and seek wounds that could provide creative inspiration. Having acquired the wounds she stuck her fingers into them, turning the pain and blood into lines of highly subjective poetry that both repel and fascinate the reader.
inspire.author: Nancy Hunter Steiner

inspire.quote: There's nothing you want that you cannot have.
inspire.author: Constance Friday

inspire.quote: It's more risky to take no risks at all.
inspire.author: Constance Friday

inspire.quote: The bravest star is not the one that shines among the rest, it is the one that shines alone in a darkened sky.
inspire.author: Luis E. Cavazos Emotional Beauty

inspire.quote: Addressing the problem, and then taking this second step to fix the cause of the problem, distinguishes the people who are in control from the people who are not in control - the successful from the unsuccessful.
inspire.author: Sam Carpenter

inspire.quote: All that matters is what you do next.
inspire.author: Hrishikesh Agnihotri

inspire.quote: ...cultivation of the right mindset and the use of the right mental attitude are the ultimate goals that will deliver to us the life we have only dreamed of thus far...
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: Getting up each morning choosing to be happy is to shape circumstances instead of being shaped by them.
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: If you stay strong and humble by serving others, worshipping God, and being strong in the Word and watchful of your character, you will remain fully alive in your calling.
inspire.author: Ken Costa

inspire.quote: Is the movie of your LIFE how you intended it to be?Do you feel you’re the star of your own movie, or is someone else – a celebrity, royalty, a privileged toff, a super rich person – always in the main shot? Are you an out-of-focus blur in the background? How close does your movie stick to the original script you intended for your life? If it’s nowhere near, isn’t it time to change the script or change your life? Become the star of your own movie, transform it into colour rather than the dull black and white it is now. Ask yourself – if the movie of your life was in a cinema, would you watch it? Would you want other people to see it? Would they walk out because it’s so boring? Even worse, would you walk out too and demand a refund?
inspire.author: Adam Weishaupt

inspire.quote: A veiled irony, how true inspiration so rarely comes from within. Or if it does, it is so personal, it almost qualifies as selfishness.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: Happenchance sparks with no matter who, waiting for love to arrive. To anyone, here I am, longing, as long as I am alive.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: I will remember where the dark used to be. I remember what it looked like. What it felt like, what it did to me, what it did to others. And I will keep the light on.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: It is the present now and at noon yesterday, it was the present then. When noon tomorrow arrives, it will also be the present. The present is all there is.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: Silver starlight blankets the cool night. Our eyes reflecting something, suspecting, could it be this is love?
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: Weakness is to take a knee, fear I will not succeed. If I can choose destiny and move, then I am freed.
inspire.author: John Casey

inspire.quote: Destiny has called you to be a god. Are you hero enough for the task? Will you switch on your inner "hero program", or slink off to the shopping mall or the sports stadium and put it off for yet another day? Maybe you’ll take in a movie. So much easier to watch others doing the heavy lifting, and the actors are just faking it anyway. Where are the real heroes? Where are YOU?!
inspire.author: Michael Faust

inspire.quote: What you do is to teach a hundred what I taught you, and inspire each of them to teach a hundred. That's how it's always done.
inspire.author: Daniel Quinn

inspire.quote: We won't attain maturity unless we cultivate the wisdom to discriminate which deeds of our ancestors we need to reject and which achievements we need to take inspiration from.
inspire.author: S.L. Bhyrappa

inspire.quote: The role of a writer is to shed light on major issues, to speak the unspoken, and make others see the unseen, feel the unfelt, and hear the unheard.
inspire.author: Mireille Saba Redford

inspire.quote: A woman who is insecure *probably* does not feel right about herself. (Internal problem). A woman who is intuitive *definitely* feels something is not right. (External awareness). Note the difference.
inspire.author: Liz Faublas

inspire.quote: If cancer goes untreated, or is not surgically removed and rooted out, it will invade the body again and kill it.
inspire.author: Mireille Saba Redford

inspire.quote: We crawl by inches. What we find today we will wipe from the blackboard tomorrow and reject it—unless it shows up again the day after tomorrow. And if we find anything which would suit us, that thing we will eye with particular distrust.
inspire.author: Bertolt Brecht

inspire.quote: 2021: Happy New Year!Me: ...2021: What's wrong?Me: I'm not sure I'm going to be happy this year.2021: You will.Me:
inspire.author: Chinthia Indah

inspire.quote: I haven't figured out just yetif it's brave or stupidto live so boldlybut I'm going to keepdoing it anyway
inspire.author: McKayla Paige Arnold

inspire.quote: The magic is in the words, my dear girl. When you bend one's thoughts with words that touch the soul, they call it inspiration.
inspire.author: Amita Trasi

inspire.quote: My mom greatest worry and towardssame I am doing scurry. She wantsto hide me from everyone but i am nota piece of metal akin to gold or diamond.I am breathing and have my wings.I want to go out and play with my friends.Do I have any friends? I have no oneno one no one. My uncovered legs are a matter of fear, and now they are turned into smear. A teen life is more like an old granny life. No fun nothing left. Thats an irony
inspire.author: mehak vc

inspire.quote: Make love your compass. Always, in all ways!
inspire.author: Caterina Barregar

inspire.quote: A spectacle of light illuminates a room full of darkness.
inspire.author: Cyro Sanchez

inspire.quote: My brother says I don't talk enough so he hoped this notebook would give me a place to put my thoughts. Every now and then, I dress my thoughts in the clothing of a poem. Try to figure out if my world changes once I set down these words. This was the first time someone gave me a place to collect my thoughts. In some ways, it seemed like he was saying that my thoughts were important. From that day forward I've written every single day. Sometimes it seems like writing is the only way I keep from hurting.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Acevedo

inspire.quote: If you think I will be anything less,You must not know me, For I am me.
inspire.author: Tony Garcia

inspire.quote: If you are born to be different & have purpose. If you are born to do something really great then don’t let the dogma of world & people come in between. Don’t let the doubt overshadow the purpose.Be yourself, respect yourself, thank god for giving you that great purpose, believe that you have that power to make it happen & universe will going to help you to cultivate it. Work towards it every single day, nourish it! No matter how bad things go, make it work! Just make it work! Yes, you may feel that you are tiny little dot!But you need to realize that there is one more tiny little dot in the Universe & that tiny dot is nothing less than a planet which goes through several tough changes to give life to billions of species!Have a great grit!– NitikaS
inspire.author: Nitika Sharma

inspire.quote: Just having a place to sit and be thankful each day improves mental health.
inspire.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

inspire.quote: Limitations are not a dead end.
inspire.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

inspire.quote: Thoughts are not fluid. Sometimes they rush like a river then get plugged up out of nowhere.
inspire.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

inspire.quote: I found my voice within the Pagan community.
inspire.author: Jessica Marie Baumgartner

inspire.quote: The Whole world is small to hide until you find the world within.
inspire.author: Varun K. Singh

inspire.quote: The reader should be able to imagine himself inhabiting the house, walking the streets, sitting by the river. All the writer needs to achieve this isthe real expression of his tangible imaginations on a piece of paper.
inspire.author: Adewale Joel

inspire.quote: Fear can force employees to execute projects, but it cannot energize people. Fear is crippling and inhibiting, and it is one of the most dehumanizing forces in the workplace.
inspire.author: Ken Costa

inspire.quote: Happiness does not depend on what we have; it depends on how we feel about what we have.
inspire.author: — Robert Gill Jr. (Happiness Power: How to Unleash Your Power and Live a More Joyful Life)

inspire.quote: Chasing riches and wealth for their own sake is empty and void; but if one seeks and pursues unselfish purpose, the riches and wealth will automatically be attracted to accomplish the assignment; and that is very satisfying and fulfilling.
inspire.author: Dr. Lucas D. Shallua

inspire.quote: My past has no power over the fabulous future I will create today.
inspire.author: Lisa Messenger

inspire.quote: Yesterday is the reason you mustn't let your today be a lesson.
inspire.author: Timi Sultan Adeoye

inspire.quote: An honest and sincere hearted person always aims to inspire others.
inspire.author: Santosh Kumar (San)

inspire.quote: Strength is what is granted to me by God so that He might show through me what He wishes to do through others.
inspire.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

inspire.quote: This is a door. You can close it and stay here, outside, by yourself, or you can walk through it and join them
inspire.author: Jennifer Weiner

inspire.quote: And I could see her for what she was... Someone who wasn't invincible.. Someone who had flaws, and things she wanted.
inspire.author: Jennifer Weiner

inspire.quote: I looked at them all. 'You can't spend your life up here.'"The moment I said it I remembered Alan saying tat in a way he HAD spent his life up here, That his memories of the Moon were so bright and vivid that the things he did on Earth seemed grey by comparison. And I thought how completely cosmic it would be if I could fix that for them. If I could make it so that part of them was always up here. So that when they were back on Earth and their dads were yelling and pushing them on, they could just tune out and come back up here, where -- in their brightest memories -- they would always be kids.
inspire.author: Frank Cottrell Boyce

inspire.quote: Ich kenne Menschen, in denen steckt ein ganzes Universum, unermeßlich. Aber herauskriegen tut man es nicht. Ums Verrecken nicht. Das am Rande.
inspire.author: Patrick Süskind

inspire.quote: Seek wisdom from the sages, justice is waiting at the gate. Freedom is for all ages. Read the scriptures, to see the true picture.
inspire.author: Ora Bigio

inspire.quote: Look at how far you’ve come. Look at how much you’ve grown. If I don’t tell you enough that I am proud, I need you to know that I am. If I don’t tell you enough that I love you, I need you to know that I do.
inspire.author: Kirsten Robinson

inspire.quote: You have grown a backbone where your wishbone used to be. You have learned how to say no, you have learned how to walk away. Do you remember when they broke you? It felt like life as you knew it was over. It felt like your rib cage cracked apart. You have rebuilt yourself; you have stitched loss into gain, sadness into joy.
inspire.author: Kirsten Robinson

inspire.quote: We'll be fine’, Pierre-Auguste Renoir said assertively. ‘We are good artist; we know that. Remember what Baudelaire said before he died: "Nothing can be done except little by little." That is what we are doing, it is not big, but it is something!
inspire.author: Will Gompertz

inspire.quote: The effects you will have on your students are infinite and currently unknown; you will possibly shape the way they proceed in their careers, the way they will vote, the way they will behave as partners and spouses, the way they will raise their kids.
inspire.author: Donna Quesada

inspire.quote: Spiritual literature can be a great aid to an aspirant, or it can be a terrible hindrance. If it is used to inspire practice, motivate compassion, ad nourish devotion, it serves a very valuable purpose. If scriptural study is used for mere intellectual understanding, for pride of accomplishment, or as a substitute for actual practice, then one is taking in too much mental food, which is sure to result in intellectual indigestion. (152)
inspire.author: Prem Prakash

inspire.quote: Most ideas are born and lost in isolation.
inspire.author: Scott Belsky

inspire.quote: At last everything was satisfactorily arranged, and I could not help admiring the setting: these mingled touches betrayed on a small scale the inspiration of a poet, the research of a scientist, the good taste of an artist, the gourmet’s fondness for good food, and the love of flowers, which concealed in their delicate shadows a hint of the love of women
inspire.author: August Strindberg
