In the same breath, you cannot wait for everything around you to become peaceful in order for you to say "I am peaceful." In both happiness and peace, there is a heart of strength, determination and steadfastness; a heart that has the power to make things happen. You have to be at peace. You have to be happy. Now.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: So you never know who you touch. You never know how or when you'll have an impact, or how important your example can be to someone else" (20).
inspire.author: Denzel Washington

inspire.quote: As I look back on my own life, I recognize this simple truth: The greatest opportunities were the scariest lions. Part of me has wanted to play it safe, but I’ve learned that taking no risks is the greatest risk of all.
inspire.author: Mark Batterson

inspire.quote: Your environment will eat your goals and plans for breakfast.
inspire.author: Steve Pavlina

inspire.quote: Facts? What are facts? I only know imagination!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: It takes writing a billion bad words before you get to the good ones.
inspire.author: Ray Bradbury

inspire.quote: I hope I don't write TOO many books! When I look at authors who have written too many books, I wonder to myself "When did they live?" I certainly want to write BECAUSE I live! I know I don't want to write in order to live! My writing is an overflow of the wine glass of my life, not a basin in which I wash out my ideals and expectations.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: The conception of each star was at the point of no return; of a desperate soul struggling to master the winds!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: I believe in miracles.... I have to.
inspire.author: Terry Fox

inspire.quote: Opportunities? They are all around us ... There is power lying latent everywhere waiting for the observant eye to discover it.
inspire.author: Orison Swett Marden

inspire.quote: Earth's crammed with heaven, And every common bush afire with God.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Barret Browning

inspire.quote: Doa yang lemah,bisa diperbaiki dengan doa yang lebih kuat.Doa yang buruk,bisa diganti dengan doa yang baik.Lalu engkau bertanya,mengapakah doa-doa terbaik yang kau naikkanbelum juga terjawab?Pertama,ikhlaskanlah pengertianmu agar lebih mudahbagimu untuk bersyukur.Kedua,ketahuilah bahwa doa yang sudah sangat baik,hanya bisa diperbaiki dengan meningkatkan akhlaqdari pribadi yang berdoa.
inspire.author: Mario Teguh

inspire.quote: There are gigantic trees that have grown tall into the winds and the clouds over the thousands of years of their lives, their tops are rustled and tossed by the mists of the atmosphere! Then there are the short trees that don't live for long, they are young with no deep roots and only a few annual rings to tell their stories.The tall, ancient trees sway in the realm of freedom while the short young trees cannot even raise their branches into that direction of the sky! Now, you are the bird who needs a tree to live in; if you choose to live in the tree which thrives in the realm of freedom, that doesn't mean you are not committed to that tree. You are still committed to your tree, but together you and your tree live in freedom. Freedom is not the absence of commitment. If you are the bird who chooses to fly around amongst the short trees and live in them, that's because your wings are too short to make it any higher and your vision too near to see any further into the clouds. And if you move from one short tree to the next short tree, that doesn't mean you are free, you are still down there below, freedom is still nowhere near you.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Dicen que con llorar nada se arregla pero eso no es verdad. Llorar es hacer algo aunque ese algo no sirva más que para quitarnos la sensacion insoportable de no hacer nada.
inspire.author: Xavier Velasco

inspire.quote: Each day is a giftTo embrace and welcome
inspire.author: Karen Hackel

inspire.quote: Aku datang menghadap Mu, Tuhankutuk menyerah dan mohon penyelamatanAku mohon Kau maafkan salah dan dosa masa lalukuyang setia mengejar tuk menggigitku dari belakangPenyesalan ini membadai di hatikudan melemahkan niat hidupkuKini aku jiwa yang lebih baikyang lebih patuh kepada MuJangan Kau biarkan aku lama bersedihAku sangat menghamba kepada MuTuhan, sayangilah aku
inspire.author: Mario Teguh

inspire.quote: Always have something to look forward to
inspire.author: Vici Howard

inspire.quote: L'esercizio rende perfetti, ma nessuno è perfetto, quindi perché esercitarsi?
inspire.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

inspire.quote: Once you discover that you can, you must.
inspire.author: Al Jarreau

inspire.quote: No one of real intelligence will accept anything just because some authority declares it be so. Don't accept the truth of anything you have not confirmed for yourself.
inspire.author: Paul Hoffmann

inspire.quote: No se debe oponer resistencia a la corriente: hay que ir hacia arriba cuando hay que ir hacia arriba, y hacia abajo cuando hay que ir hacia abajo. Cuando debas ir hacia arriba, busca la torre más alta y sube hasta la cúspide. Cuando debas ir hacia abajo, busca el pozo más profundo y desciende hasta el fondo. Cuando no haya corriente, quédate inmóvil. Si te opones a la corriente todo se seca, el mundo se ve envuelto por las tinieblas. "Yo soy yo, él es yo, atardecer de otoño" Cuando renuncias a mi, yo existo.
inspire.author: Haruki Murakami

inspire.quote: لم اتصور انه عندما تفقد من تحب تصبح جسدا حي وروحا ميته ...الحب يحيي الروح كما يحي الغيث الارض
inspire.author: Shady Baraya

inspire.quote: Persistance is the quality of winners. Successful people never never give up
inspire.author: Lynda Field

inspire.quote: Judging is the cause that creates the effect of choosing.
inspire.author: Joey Lawsin

inspire.quote: Know what you want and reach out eagerly for it.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: When I stopped to take a breath, I noticed I had wings.
inspire.author: Jodi Livon

inspire.quote: Marriage is not kick-boxing, it's salsa dancing.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Treat yourself today! You are a unique, sparkling, spectacular soul. Celebrate you!
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Love is not a forest fire that burns intensely,hotly and out of control for a brief moment until,its expendable fuel spent,it sputters,seeking in vain for something else to consume,to sustain itself before, finally,it dies:cold, black ash the only evidence of its passing.Love is, instead, a campfire:it provides ample heat and comfortto the twosome who sit before it,and although its flames may at times wane,a well-tended campfire’s embers can be nurtured and fanneduntil the flames once again dance brightly and cheerfully,providing comfort to the couple who cherish the gentle warmth it ministers.
inspire.author: J. Conrad Guest

inspire.quote: Choose joyful abundance in your heart and be unbounded, free, and relaxed. Be relentless with your choice and you’ll make your mark.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Don't be in a hurry to achieve your dreams. Take a day to play with your kids and relax - your dreams will still be there tomorrow.
inspire.author: Lindsey Rietzsch

inspire.quote: Be brave and take risks… You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: When you have power and use it for destructive purpose: you don't deserve it.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: Enchantment lies in everyday moments if you are observant.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Stars do not pull each other down to be more visible; they shine brighter.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Tomorrow is promised to no one. Prioritize today accordingly.
inspire.author: Gina Greenlee

inspire.quote: Believe in your heart that you're meant to live a life full of passion, purpose, magic and miracles.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: When you walk in distinction, even the photocopying machine can’t replicate your unique quality.
inspire.author: Onyi Anyado

inspire.quote: When it's possible for you to dream, it's not impossible to achieve.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: Thank people who help you because they make you happy. Thank people who don't help you because they make you strong.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: When you stop complaining about others for not helping you and focus on your efforts; there’s no stopping you.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: When we aren't curious in conversations we judge, tell, blame and even shame, often without even knowing it, which leads to conflict." -The Power Of Curiosity: How To Have Real Conversations That Create Collaboration, Innovation and Understanding
inspire.author: Kirsten Siggins

inspire.quote: The power of love can spread magic to the world like nothing else.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Failure only happens when you lose your willpower to continue trying...If we let the obstacles get the best of us then it was our choice to fail, not fate.
inspire.author: Lindsey Rietzsch

inspire.quote: Be real, rare, refreshing you! Fan the flames of self love and ignite your light!
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Dance through life flinging kindness like shimmering rainbows. Find your bliss by sharing your heart.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Breathtaking, splendid, wondrous, sublime, all those words describe you, exactly as you are. You are a work of art! Enjoy your beauty!
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: When we embrace who we are the world embraces us right back.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Kindness and caring are ambrosia for the soul.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Women united can create movements. We can empower entire generations. We can build peace one action at a time. Together we rise. The time is now.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Being present to yourself in love and with kindness is the ultimate gift.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: I wanted to figure out why I was so busy, but I couldn't find the time to do it.
inspire.author: Todd Stocker

inspire.quote: Thoughts frame your portrait, action paints it.
inspire.author: Charles F. Glassman

inspire.quote: Your children are not your children.They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself.They come through you but not from you,And though they are with you, yet they belong not to you.You may give them your love but not your thoughts,For they have their own thoughts.You may house their bodies but not their souls,For their souls dwell in the house of tomorrow,Which you cannot visit, not even in your dreams.
inspire.author: Kahlil Gibran

inspire.quote: The most unlucky generation is the one which couldn't produce a hero to look upto.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, focus your energy on what you can create.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Entertainment is temporary happiness, but the real happiness is permanent entertainment.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: Don't let procrastination take over your life. Be brave and take risks. Your life is happening right now.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Fallon affected my body in weird ways. But only because she’s different, I told myself.
inspire.author: Penelope Douglas

inspire.quote: Life provides chances to open your heart all the time.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Forever friends are a treasure chest of understanding and compassion. Cherish them.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference… You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your concern, your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: A child has a deep longing to discover that the World is based on Truth. Respect that longing. In our attempt to help children grow into Inspired Adults, we wish them to carry the Youthfulness of their Souls, and the Wonders of Childhood into their old age.'Conscious Parenting by Natasa Pantovic Nuit Quotes about kids and world based on truth
inspire.author: Natasa Pantovic Nuit

inspire.quote: Go past the insecurity. Go past the little voice that says doing that thing will hurt you. Instead let the pain flow through you, and just hold on. At that very point, you will find yourself invincible.
inspire.author: Rishank Jhavar

inspire.quote: A child is a Soul, a Unit Consciousness materialized on Earth to learn, fulfill its purpose contributing within the Matrix of Gaia. Our parents fought for ‘Expression of Thoughts’, ‘Equality’, we now have a task to fight for the Supremacy of Love over Control within all Areas of Life.‘Conscious Parenting by Natasa Pantovic Nuit Quotes about kids development soul
inspire.author: Natasa Pantovic Nuit

inspire.quote: Killing a cruelty is not a cruelty.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: Sharing your kindness sparks understanding all around. Then like fireflies in the night, twinkling love surrounds you.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: No one makes it to the "top" by themselves. Each step you take is guided by at least one person's blood, sweat and tears. Appreciate those who stand behind you as you rise. They are the only ones who will catch you if you fall. The ladder of success is steadiest when someone's there to support it.
inspire.author: Carlos Wallace

inspire.quote: Your heart is a powerful force. Use it consciously.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Your healthy love for yourself is sexy!
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Set goals that make your heart sing. Then achieving them is an experience of uplifting joy.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Let people be the pursuits of happiness, you be the pursuit of perfection.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: Be positive. Be true. Be kind.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Inspiration is sometimes as simple as a shared smile.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue what you want.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Laughter is the divine effervescing.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, knowing something is more important than fear and taking action in the face of fear.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: The power of words is in the works of words. People are much more bonded by the works of words than words. The work of words is the trigger of words.
inspire.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

inspire.quote: Don't let your mind talk you out of your dreams, trick you into giving up; don't let your mind become the greatest obstacle to success. To get your mind on the right track, the rest will follow.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Everywhere we shine death and life burn into something new…
inspire.author: Aberjhani

inspire.quote: Appreciate every little beautiful moment in every day of your life. Give it a try and you'll see the world from another perspective.
inspire.author: Thea Kristine May

inspire.quote: We must not be defined by what we do, but we must be what and who we are, then only happen to do what we do!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: There will be haters, there will be doubters, there will be non-believers, and then there will be you proving them wrong.
inspire.author: Jennifer Van Allen

inspire.quote: Friendship is so important. The goal of a good friendship should be for life! To keep it for life! If you find a friendship, and it gives you a joy inside, a peace, and a freedom; keep that friendship for life. Through it all, you stay together. So many friendships are toxic, but the good ones are really good! I always tell my son this, I always say, a friend is for life!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Someone needs to fight, someone needs to sacrifice, someone needs to inspire, someone needs to be a hero.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: Freedom is an absolute state, there is no such thing as being half-free.
inspire.author: Daniel Delgado F

inspire.quote: There's a lot of talk these days about giving children self-esteem. It's not something you can give; it's something they have to build.
inspire.author: Randy Pausch

inspire.quote: We cannot face up to what lies ahead, without facing up to what lies within.
inspire.author: Eleesha

inspire.quote: Never allow others to create your world because if you do, they will always make it too small.
inspire.author: Christopher Robinson

inspire.quote: The truth is .. I'm okay with people not liking me. I'm not okay with them pretending that they do. Keep it real. Everybody ain't for everybody.
inspire.author: Nakia R. Laushaul

inspire.quote: Love' is the only weapon I have, I will defend with love, I will attack with love.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: When you trust your inner guidance and begin moving in the direction of your dreams (aligned with your individual gifts) you will be cloaked in an armor bestowed upon you by your guardian angel.
inspire.author: Charles F. Glassman

inspire.quote: You can't be sad when Daisy is around, she won't let you.
inspire.author: Maryam Faresh

inspire.quote: You can capture this body of mine, take away my freedom and enslave me. You may even have the power to capture my soul and sentence me to the realm of eternal darkness. But my dreams you cannot touch. They are my will
inspire.author: Richelle Goodrich

inspire.quote: I see myself as a Scottish sky: there are rain clouds, rainbows and sunrays that run and overtake one another, mingle together and dance with each other! You see all of this within seconds of looking up! It’s a living sky, it breathes and it’s real! And I think that when you look at me, you’ll see my rain clouds first, because only after rainclouds can there come the rainbows. You see, if the rainbows come first, then the rainbows aren’t even real, so I think that if people deserve to see my real rainbows, then they will just know that they need to stick around through the rain! Like a Scottish sky, I want to be real and breathing and running. I don’t want to be a clear blue all the time, or a dark grey all the time or have fake rainbows painted onto me; I want to be Scottish.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: They don't have to know the real you for you to keep being that amazing you! Don't let someone's negative spirit disrupt or corrupt yours. Be you for...you. God is the one that you want to see who you really are.
inspire.author: Marala Scott

inspire.quote: People do not meet by chance––they navigate their lives to certain people for certain reasons.
inspire.author: Ruti Yudovich

inspire.quote: The one ironclad rule is that I have to try. I have to walk into my writing room and pick up my pen every weekday morning.
inspire.author: Anne Tyler

inspire.quote: I don't so much mind looking back on having lost the election, or having been denied a role in the play, or having had my novel repeatedly rejected, or having been turned down for a date, or recalling laughter at my expense when I attempted some silly challenge.  Those things simply prove that I lived life.  What I do mind, however, is looking back on the lost opportunities where imagined concerns kept me from even trying—lose or win.  I've learned that there is no regret in a brave attempt, only in cowering to fear.
inspire.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

inspire.quote: Yes, content is king but excellence is his queen. ~ Onyi Anyado.
inspire.author: Onyi Anyado

inspire.quote: A poet is simply an artist whose medium is human emotions.  A poet chisels away at our own sensibilities, shaping our vision while molding our hearts.  A poet wraps words around our own feelings and presents them as fresh gifts to humanity.
inspire.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

inspire.quote: I would rather live in a world where people shout, "This is wrong." than live in a world with superheroes saving the day.
inspire.author: ♥EJ <---

inspire.quote: Be grateful for what you already have while you pursue your goals.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: You don't need to understand what the world is, just let your life flow with it and become something
inspire.author: Jayson Engay

inspire.quote: No difference, good or bad. Thoughts like birds in mind. Some fly in. Some fly out. Some stay at water hole to drink. Beware of birds that linger.
inspire.author: Natalie Wright

inspire.quote: Being angry, resentful, or saddened by rejection can suck the sweetness out of acceptance.
inspire.author: Charles F. Glassman

inspire.quote: Selama kita memiliki hari esok, teruslah berusaha untuk menjadi lebih baik. Percayalah bahwa dengan kita berbuat demikian akan ada hari yang lebih baik untuk dinikmati
inspire.author: Rizki De

inspire.quote: Live...More than your neighbors.Unleash yourself upon the world and go places.Go now.Giggle no,laugh.
inspire.author: Jon Blais

inspire.quote: Your heart is where your inner light resides. It is part of every sacred journey to reconnect with your inner light, step into your divinity, spread the light of love before you, return to the essence of love, and inspire others to do the same.
inspire.author: Molly Friedenfeld

inspire.quote: Caution not spirit, let it roam wild; for in that natural state dance embraces divine frequency.
inspire.author: Shah Asad Rizvi

inspire.quote: Do you know where your breakthrough begins? Your breakthrough begins where your excuses ends.
inspire.author: Patience Johnson

inspire.quote: YOU are your own guru. YOU are your own soul mate. YOU are powerful. Take the reigns and drive your carriage home to love.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: An acorn is an oak tree turned inside out.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: If you have kindness in your heart, you offer acts of kindness to touch the hearts of others wherever you go—whether they are random or planned. Kindness becomes a way of life.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Sometimes being happy takes effort. Invest time and energy in yourself and your happiness.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Choosing kindness is the ultimate expression of evolved consciousness. Grow by being kind.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: When life places stones in your path, be the water. A persistent drop of water will wear away even the hardest stone.
inspire.author: Autumn Morning Star

inspire.quote: When people try to bury you, remind yourself you are a seed.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: We have to be honest about what we want and take risks rather than lie to ourselves and make excuses to stay in our comfort zone.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: If you always do what is easy and choose the path of least resistance, you never step outside your comfort zone. Great things don’t come from comfort zones.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Our dream of happiness is waiting for another universe to collide with our own, and change what we ourselves cannot.
inspire.author: Louise Blackwick

inspire.quote: A kind thought, word, or action creates infinite ripples of caring, consideration, and peace.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: You are limitless! Accept this truth and soar to infinity.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Integrity is doing the right thing when nobody's watching, doing as you say you would do.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Respect, Love, and Value yourself. Always remember to be good to yourself by taking care of yourself. Make yourself a priority and know that it’s okay. Don’t feel guilty for loving yourself, first! You’re just as important as anybody else.
inspire.author: Stephanie Lahart

inspire.quote: A circle's unity and never ending smoothness is how we can aim to feel inside. Smooth, gentle, accepted, no rough edges, only love for all parts of our selves.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: It takes drive and focus to move from potential to reality.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Soul mate romance dissolves the superficial and touches your deepest heart with the delightful power of love.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Learn from stars; even in the dark they give off light, not despair.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: To have what you have never had, you have to do what you have never done.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: If you posses enough courage to speak out what you are, you will find that you are not alone.
inspire.author: Richard Wright

inspire.quote: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: Swirl into joy today by sharing your caring with the world. Be a pillar of positivity.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Choose love and joy as much as you can in each moment and watch your life transform.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: The secret ingredients to true happiness? Decisive optimism and personal responsibility.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: The most important person you meet in life is your higher self.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: YOU are the magic code that unlocks your happiness.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Focus your heart, mind, and soul on joy and you'll find ultimate success and fulfillment.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Caring is what matters, not stuff or status, just people sharing kindness & joy in a web of the heart that spans the globe.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Some people live in cages with bars built from their own fears and doubts. Some people live in cages with bars built from other people's fears and doubts; their parents, their friends, their brothers and sisters, their families. Some people live in cages with bars built from the choices others made for them, the circumstances other people imposed upon them. And some people break free.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: A genius is simply one who has taken full possession of his own mind and directed it toward objectives of his own choosing, without permitting outside influences to discourage or mislead him.
inspire.author: Napoleon Hill

inspire.quote: I never had any doubts about my abilities. I knew I could write. I just had to figure out how to eat while doing this.[Cormac McCarthy's Venomous Fiction, New York Times, April 19, 1992]
inspire.author: Cormac McCarthy

inspire.quote: I have found the paradox that if I love until it hurts, then there is no hurt, but only more love.
inspire.author: Mother Teresa

inspire.quote: Maybe we shouldn't begin to stop believing in God when He starts to let go of our hand; because at that moment He begins to let go of your hand, that's the moment He's begun to believe in YOU! He says, "I believe in you, I know you can." And that's not the time to stop believing in someone, when He is believing in you. A good father knows when to let go and start believing that you can. We may not understand it at first, but after we look at ourselves and say "Wow, I'm awesome, I did that all by myself." Then we say "Thanks, dad. If you never let go of me, I would have never learned how to fly.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Fairies with gossamer wings, Bring forth beauty, grace and joyful things. Fairies of the earth are caretakers of our soil, water and trees,They watch over beautiful creatures such as bears, bunnies and bees.Fairies ask that you breathe in and appreciate the vantage point from which you stand,Then trod carefully and respectfully with each intentional step you make across this beautiful land.
inspire.author: Molly Friedenfeld

inspire.quote: God would light the way. Faith would keep them on the right path.
inspire.author: Francine Rivers

inspire.quote: To say that a being who is sentient has no interest in continuing to live is like saying that a being with eyes has no interest in continuing to see. Death—however "humane"—is a harm for humans and nonhumans alike.
inspire.author: Gary L. Francione

inspire.quote: Nothing lasts forever. But the thing is, you can reuse some. Use your mind. - Leo's Mother, The Lost Hero
inspire.author: Rick Riordan

inspire.quote: When the flames of life are gnawing away at your butt, run faster, quicker, and harder than you've ever run before, because I guarantee it that life will condition you, harder than any trainer ever will.When you state to yourself with the utter most believe, "I will achieve this," than you are on the path, and this is when life throws obstacles left, right, straight on and which other way, but keep going. Because you will make it
inspire.author: Mark  O'Brien

inspire.quote: My story was not the story of a girl's broken dreams: it was the story of a girl who couldn't be broken.
inspire.author: Heather Schuck

inspire.quote: Never mourn the loss of innocence, because it always brings the much greater gain of wisdom.
inspire.author: Erica Goros

inspire.quote: So it is always preferable to discuss the matter of veganism in a non-judgemental way. Remember that to most people, eating flesh or dairy and using animal products such as leather, wool, and silk, is as normal as breathing air or drinking water. A person who consumes dairy or uses animal products is not necessarily or usually what a recent and unpopular American president labelled an "evil doer.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: I want to dream a dream so wonderful that I'll wake up sorry that it wasn't a memory.
inspire.author: Robin Helm

inspire.quote: Animals are property. There are laws that supposedly protect animal interestsin being treated "humanely," but that term is interpreted in large part to mean that we cannot impose "unnecessary" harm on animals, and that is measured by what treatment is considered as necessary within particular industries, and according to customs of use, to exploit animals. The bottom line is that animals do not have any respect-based rights in the way that humans have, because we do not regard animals as having any moral value. They have only economic value. We value their interests economically, and we ignore their interests when it is economically beneficial for us to do so.At this point in time, it makes no sense to focus on the law, because as long as we regard animals as things, as a moral matter, the laws will necessarily reflect that absence of moral value and continue to do nothing to protect animals. We need to change social and moral thinking about animals before the law is going to do anything more.
inspire.author: Gary L. Francione

inspire.quote: Realize this – your anger with God does not drive a wedge between you and Him. It is your silence that drives the wedge. - Prodigal Life
inspire.author: Pauline Creeden

inspire.quote: I reject animal welfare reform and single-issue campaigns because they are not only inconsistent with the claims of justice that we should be making if we really believe that animal exploitation is wrong, but because these approaches cannot work as a practical matter. Animals are property and it costs money to protect their interests; therefore, the level of protection accorded to animal interests will always be low and animals will, under the best of circumstances, still be treated in ways that would constitute torture if applied to humans.By endorsing welfare reforms that supposedly make exploitation more "compassionate" or single-issue campaigns that falsely suggest that there is a coherent moral distinction between meat and dairy or between fur and wool or between steak and foie gras, we betray the principle of justice that says that all sentient beings are equal for purposes of not being used exclusively as human resources. And, on a practical level, we do nothing more than make people feel better about animal exploitation.
inspire.author: Gary L. Francione

inspire.quote: Life is not about waiting for the storms to pass... It's about learning how to dance in the rain.- Vivian Greene
inspire.author: Vivian Greene

inspire.quote: Doing what is right to GOD gives you peace not regret
inspire.author: Rudzani Ralph

inspire.quote: The good is the Enemy of the best. Until you depart from the good, you cannot enter God's best for your life.
inspire.author: Pedro Okoro

inspire.quote: The first step to success it's to imagine it
inspire.author: Pete Hautman

inspire.quote: Thought I wanted overnight success, until I achieved it through hard work and the refusal to back down! What you earn, you keep.
inspire.author: A. M. Hudson

inspire.quote: Success always hugs you in private,but failure slaps you in the public...
inspire.author: sahil banga

inspire.quote: Even though your life is Rainy and muggy you can fight through it just Make sure you know what is happening And make sure you don't take to much pressure on it just shake it off!
inspire.author: Skye Daphne

inspire.quote: This is heaven my child.
inspire.author: Santosh Kalwar

inspire.quote: An item is only worth what someone is willing to pay for it
inspire.author: Bianca Baker

inspire.quote: Never put off for tomorrow what is meant for today...tomorrow may never come.
inspire.author: C.J. Candel

inspire.quote: Peace may be hard to achieve, but is possible with small yet essential steps that are guided by courage and sufficient commitment.
inspire.author: Widad Akrawi

inspire.quote: To achieve peace, it is crucial to eliminate unnecessary bureaucracy that prevents peace processes from advancing.
inspire.author: Widad Akrawi

inspire.quote: You always supposed to have that i'm number 1 mentality,don't let anyone make you feel like you is number 2 when they not even worth being number 1 !!!
inspire.author: jojo1980

inspire.quote: Dance with the waves,move with the sea.Let the rhythm of the waterset your soul free.
inspire.author: Christy Ann Martine

inspire.quote: There is no power like that of prevailing prayer - of Abraham pleading for Sodom, Jacob wrestling in the stillness of the night, Moses standing in the breach, Hannah intoxicated with sorrow, David heartbroken with remorse and grief, Jesus in sweat and blood. Add to this list from the records of the church your personal observation and experience, and always there is cost of passion unto blood. Such prayer prevails. It turns ordinary mortals into men of power. It brings power. It brings fire. It brings rain. It brings life. It brings God.
inspire.author: Samuel Chadwick

inspire.quote: Love is a longing for becoming one with another human being that nobody of us can avoid.
inspire.author: Tatjana Ostojic

inspire.quote: No one knows your truth but you. If you're secure in yourself, no one and no(thing) can touch you.
inspire.author: Brittany Burgunder

inspire.quote: The love we say we feel for another is, in most cases, just a selfish hunt for our own happiness.
inspire.author: Tatjana Ostojic

inspire.quote: The more you try to please people, the more they get control of you and you'll end up hurting yourself.
inspire.author: Chanda Kaushik

inspire.quote: I am to be loved, honored and respected solely because I exist. I am to be cherished, spoiled, celebrated because I Am! I was made to be admired. I am a beloved child of God after all.
inspire.author: Emmanuella Raphaelle

inspire.quote: When all seems to be against you, remember, a ship sometimes has to sail against the current, not with it.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: I like to set my dreams high. That way, even if I only make it half way there, it's still pretty darned good.
inspire.author: Elizabeth O. Dulemba

inspire.quote: If you believe ,you can."But work hard to believe".
inspire.author: Divyansh Mishra DM

inspire.quote: When seeds want to rise they drop everything that is weighing them down.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: If you want to know a person’s true character, observe how he treats those who don’t matter.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Commitment mixed with drive and sprinkled with imagination creates sustained results. Stay focused and you will make your mark!
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Spread kindness, caring, and compassion and create your own paradise. Infuse it with joy and you’ve created heaven on earth.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Critics are loud, but success is louder.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: It takes greater faith to dance in the dark than to rest in light.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: The sun is God's candle.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Speaking the truth is the main attribute of a pure hearted person.
inspire.author: Eraldo Banovac

inspire.quote: Be like the sun; never let the opinions of those who hate you dull your shine.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Be noble like the sun; let even those who resent you for shinning benefit from your warmth.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: When you’re faced with a choice, choose to inspire, choose to empower, choose to stand for those who have lost the will to stand for themselves.
inspire.author: Orly Wahba

inspire.quote: When the world throws rocks at you, turn them into diamonds.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: In the absence of a formally agreed, worldwide dictionary definition of 'Quotography' (in 2016), here are my two cents worth: 'Quotography is the art of pairing unique quotations with complementary images in order to express thought-provoking ideas, challenging concepts, profound sentiments'.
inspire.author: Alex Morritt

inspire.quote: Light in your mind is better than darkness in your soul.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Lovers never hate, haters never love.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: When the world told the caterpillar its life was over, the butterfly objected, "My life has just begun.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Don’t carry your mistakes around with you, place them on the floor and use them as stepping stones to where you want to go.
inspire.author: Karon Waddell

inspire.quote: The way to make your dreams come true is to start believing in them.
inspire.author: Helen Barry

inspire.quote: Jeder Tag bedeutet vierundzwanzig neue Stunden. Jeder Tag bedeutet, dass alles möglich ist. Man lebt den Moment oder man stirbt darin, aber man lebt sein Leben einen Tag nach dem anderen. [...] Und man versucht immer, auf die Sonnenseite zu gelangen. Ins Licht. (Day)
inspire.author: Marie Lu

inspire.quote: We are supposed to consume alcohol and enjoy it, but we're not supposed to become alcoholics. Imagine if this were the same with cocaine. Imagine we grew up watching our parents snort lines at dinner, celebrations, sporting events, brunches, and funerals. We'd sometimes (or often) see our parents coked out of our minds the way we sometimes (or often) see them drunk. We'd witness them coming down after a cocaine binge the way we see them recovering from a hangover. Kiosks at Disneyland would see it so our parents could make it through a day of fun, our mom's book club would be one big blow-fest and instead of "mommy juice" it would be called "mommy powder" There'd be coke-tasting parties in Napa and cocaine cellars in fancy people's homes, and everyone we know (including our pastors, nurses, teachers, coaches, bosses) would snort it. The message we'd pick up as kids could be Cocaine is great, and one day you'll get to try it, too! Just don't become addicted to it or take it too far. Try it; use it responsibly. Don't become a cocaine-oholic though. Now, I'm sure you're thinking. That's insane, everyone knows cocaine is far more addicting than alcohol and far more dangerous. Except, it's not...The point is not that alcohol is worse than cocaine. The point is that we have a really clear understanding that cocaine is toxic and addictive. We know there's no safe amount of it, no such thing as "moderate" cocaine use; we know it can hook us and rob us of everything we care about...We know we are better off not tangling with it at all.
inspire.author: Holly Whitaker

inspire.quote: I had always felt life first as a story: and if there is a story there is a story-teller
inspire.author: G.K. Chesterton

inspire.quote: Do not limit yourself to your own preconceptions of yourself, but throw yourself out onto a blank page that you haven't written on yet, and see what you find out about you, see what story unfolds, see what happens! I always do this, and sometimes it can be very frightening! To very often have a blank page with nothing written on it yet! I feel as though I am a soul with a single covering–my body of skin– and that's the only thing between me on the inside and the rest of the world! It's quite frightening to begin each day on a blank page, forgetting your own preconceptions of yourself and allowing your mind to embrace the new! It is like meeting yourself for the first time, over and over again!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Freedom is not the absence of commitment, and to be committed to something or to someone does not mean the loss of freedom. But freedom exists in the realm of the unbound and to be free is to be committed to that which is a part of the unbound realm. Whatever sets your soul to flight is freedom. If someone sets your soul to flight, to stay with that person is not to lose freedom but to stay with that person is to retain freedom. Together you have what is unbound. Whatever will swell your spirit and give you wings, is freedom, and it is a fault if you let go of that for the very reason that you are afraid of losing your freedom and in doing so you have in fact let go of what will keep you unbound.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: What we can change is our perceptions, which have the effect of changing everything.
inspire.author: Donna Quesada

inspire.quote: The problem with thinking that you are the absolute best, is that it leaves no room for you to become any better and while you live life thinking that you're the best, truth is a lot of people around you are already better and becoming even more better.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Just do it! First you make your habits, then your habits make you!
inspire.author: Lucas Remmerswaal

inspire.quote: I’m barely human. I’m more like a creature; to me, everything gives off a scent! Thoughts, moments, feelings, movements, words left unsaid, words barely spoken; they all have a distinct sense, distinct fragrances! Both a smell and a touch! To inhale is to capture, to experience! I can perceive and I can "touch" in so many odd ways! And so I am made up of all these scents, all these feelings! An illumination of nerve endings!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: It's time that I stop referring to myself, thinking about myself, planning for myself, according to the gridlines and the timelines and the guidelines of people. I will expand in this universe, I will not stay on the lines nor within the lines written by this world.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Freedom is a place, an area. It's a higher place. There are some other people that are here, and things that are here which are unseen. But you first have to set yourself free and believe in what you cannot see, believe that there is something more out there. In freedom can be found many devotions: a devotion to love, a desire to believe, a willingness to be happy, a perseverance to have peace. All these unseen things breathe and grow in the unseen soul. A free person is not an uncommitted person, but in a free person you will find a deep devotion, and a desire to be devoted to even more.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: ...No– but ours is a journey into ourselves, a walk with God every day! Ours is a book that we write, a smile, a love, a tear, a lust, an awakening, a learning, a joy, a laughter, a memory, a dream, a vision, a love, a love, a love and a love. Our life is now. And Heaven is always there, but this life isn't always there, but this life isn't always here. Heaven is always there for us but this life is a gift to us!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: You know, we can quote the written Word all day to our friends, but nothing will touch them like our own hunger and love for the Word himself. It is not dutiful love that attracts but love freely lavished from a heart familiar with the gardens of heaven.
inspire.author: Amy Layne Litzelman

inspire.quote: Anak muda adalah kegelisahan derap langkahnya adalah perubahan.
inspire.author: E.S. Ito

inspire.quote: It doesn't matter where your journey begins, so long as you begin it...
inspire.author: Solange nicole

inspire.quote: I think that there are those who write of life being a skip on the sidewalk, a chocolate bar, a bowl of cherries... the problem with that is it ends up disappointing people. Because life is more like being on the tube in London; you never really know what could happen! But then there are those people who bring a box of chocolates to eat on the tube...so life, it isn't a skip on the sidewalk, but it is a matter of strength: "Can I bring my bowl of cherries to feast on while I stand here in the gutter?" that's the essence of life. Can you still put on your rose-colored glasses while your eyes are filled with tears, and see everything in rosy colors? That's the strength that fuels a true life. Can you think to bring your little box of chocolates with you while you sit on the tube running under the streets of London? Because you should. Because even if you don't know anybody, and you don't know what's gonna happen next, you should have your box of chocolates with you. You should eat your bowl of cherries. And that is what life is.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Life is not about perfection. It's about persistence.
inspire.author: Natalie Wright

inspire.quote: I do not regret one moment of my life.
inspire.author: Lillie Langtry

inspire.quote: True friends are always together in spirit." Lucy Maud Montgomery
inspire.author: Dianna Bellerose

inspire.quote: When you let go of past pain, believe in yourself, and follow your dreams—you can find true happiness!
inspire.author: Casi McLean

inspire.quote: Emerge; don’t cower.Endure; don’t run.Nurture; don’t abandon
inspire.author: Raji Lukkoor

inspire.quote: إن طلب العدل مرض,و لكنه المرض الوحيد الذى لا يصيب الحيوانات,كل ما فى الأمر أننا انا و أنت شفينا من هذا المرض فأصبحنا نرى أعراضه على الاّخرين.
inspire.author: بهاء طاهر

inspire.quote: Be in the World, Not of the World—Kind of like Lucky Charms cereal: there are lots of pretty marshmallows in with the cereal, but they’re not the same. So live with the cereal, but remember: you’re a pretty marshmallow.
inspire.author: Laura Jensen Walker

inspire.quote: Do what you love or die a slow death doing what you hate
inspire.author: Sonya Watson

inspire.quote: Receiving is good but giving is much better. Nevertheless, sharing is the best.
inspire.author: Shahrizad Shafian

inspire.quote: Love is something you must accept in order to have, Naomi.
inspire.author: Nakia R. Laushaul

inspire.quote: The concept of 'home' is not just where one resides, but where the heart resides; in the purest depths of the soul.♥
inspire.author: Michelle D. Rosado

inspire.quote: Only something extremely dire and disabling will ever stop a real writer from writing. Retirement is never an option.
inspire.author: Warren Adler

inspire.quote: If everybody else your age is doing something very different than what you're doing, there's always going to be someone saying to you you might not succeed with it, you might not make any money with that... there's always going to be some type of obstacle in the way. All of those things will go away if you really focus on what makes you happy.
inspire.author: Kevin Clash

inspire.quote: I don’t want to freeze my eggs. I don’t want to visit a sperm bank. I don’t want to be a single parent, if I have any choice in the matter. I want a nuclear family. I want to put down roots, to let my seeds germinate, to watch them bloom and flourish. Not one day, if and when I ever fall in love again, but now. While I still have my youth, damn it.
inspire.author: Monica Pradhan

inspire.quote: Locating friendship at the heart of mission involves certain assumptions -- that reconciliation with God is something for which every human being is made and relationships are reciprocal.
inspire.author: Christopher Heuertz

inspire.quote: Success for you is a RECIPE that ONLY YOU KNOW the ingredients for.So to you I say ,COOK UP the success that ONLY YOU know how to make and allow the world to see YOUR CREATION!
inspire.author: Jon-Robert Holden

inspire.quote: I am convinced that one should tell one's spiritual director if one has a great desire for Communion, for Our Lord does not come from Heaven every day to stay in a golden ciborium; He comes to find another heaven, the heaven of our soul in which He loves to dwell.
inspire.author: St. Therese of Lisieux

inspire.quote: It's not whether your glass is empty or full, it's what you do with it that really matters.
inspire.author: Sue Nelson Buckley

inspire.quote: Somewhere, deep within me, beyond the passion, beyond the beauty of the night, that little spark of Daily magic ignited in me again, began burning in a place that had gone dark and untended, that had yearned to be bright and warm. I felt it now, something old, something new, something complete. Perhaps it had been in there in me all along, the belief that there is a plan and a purpose, that God whispers into every life, some things that are beyond the scope of the mind, and can only be felt with the heart and the spirit. Those dreams, the dreams that are dreamed *for* us, not by us, are the truest of all.
inspire.author: Lisa Wingate

inspire.quote: Write because you love to write.
inspire.author: Cindi Lee

inspire.quote: Tuhanku Yang Maha Lembut,...Maafkanlah aku yang sering kesaldan memarahi diriku sendiriyang tak kunjung selesaimembuat kesalahan.Aku tahu,sulit bagiku untuk berlakusepenuhnya damai,jika hatiku masih menyembunyikansedikit keburukan.Tuhan,tenagailah ketegasanku untuk kembalike kesucian jiwaku,agar aku mematang dengan anggun.Aamiin
inspire.author: Mario Teguh

inspire.quote: If a nation has not God that nation must fall, but if a nation has God then all the powers of evil, and all the armies, cannot shake its foundations; no, not even if the whole world is arrayed against it.
inspire.author: Taylor Caldwell

inspire.quote: Tongues in trees, books in running brooks, sermons in stones, and good in everything.
inspire.author: William Shakespeare

inspire.quote: A hero is not know by the number of battles he has won, but rather by the kind of battles he chooses to fight.
inspire.author: Tonny K. Brown

inspire.quote: We all have a voice. Some a whisper, some a roar. If you can roar, roar for others. If you can only whisper, keep trying. Every roar started small.
inspire.author: M.L. Shanahan

inspire.quote: I've never met a person, I don't care what his condition, in whom I could not see possibilities. I don't care how much a man may consider himself a failure. I believe in him, for he can change the thing that is wrong in his life any time he is ready and prepared to do it. Whenever he develops the desire he can take away from his life the thing that is defeating it. The capacity for reformation and change lies within.
inspire.author: Preston Bradley

inspire.quote: Love is spiritual oxygen; without it, the soul dies.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: The more time you spend thinking, the less time you spend doing. The less time you spend doing, the more you watch others do. This formula never equals success.
inspire.author: Beatrice McClearn

inspire.quote: The Lord must have created coffee to reward humans for those bad times they sometimes have on Earth. Having charged your heart and brain with a cup of coffee, you’re ready to face the challenges of life. A good cup of coffee makes life seem better.
inspire.author: Sahara Sanders

inspire.quote: When you don't get love, learn to love yourself more!
inspire.author: Avijeet Das

inspire.quote: Faith is not like a raincoat, only to be worn on drizzly days.
inspire.author: Kevin Ansbro

inspire.quote: waktu kita di bumi ini sakral adanya, dan kita seharusnya merayakan setiap detiknya
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: Being sensitive is a gift that fosters peace. Help create a kinder, gentler world by embracing it.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Simbol, huruf dan angka adalah alat, sedangkan gagasan adalah roh sebuah tulisan.
inspire.author: i made iwan darmawan

inspire.quote: The soul is the entryway to the heart,the heart is the doorway to the mind,the mind is the hallway to the world,and the world is the passageway to the universe.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Your actions will always speak volumes louder than your words ever will! - (G Swiss)
inspire.author: G Swiss

inspire.quote: Some choices are better than others and we, as mortal humans, cannot be expected to always choose the best ones. What we can control is how we evaluate past decisions. Our readiness to reflect and realize that we were wrong. Our ability to admit our wrongs and move forward. To say we are sorry or make amends for mistakes. To apply what we’ve learned from past follies and choose wiser in the present. I contend that in a random and often chaotic world of choices, that is what we can control.
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: It is great to celebrate birthday, but you know what is the greatest?, is to remember our mother who sacrified to gave us birth
inspire.author: Elmitch Alarcio

inspire.quote: It’s more than a bath; it’s a transformative experience. You’re searching for buoyancy in the soul, and spring in your step.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: [Truth] will keep your soul from withering and dying while you encounter the inevitable tragedy of life. It will help you avoid the terrible desire to seek vengeance for that tragedy-part of the terrible sin of Being, which everything must bear gracefully, just so it can exist.
inspire.author: Jordan B. Peterson

inspire.quote: No society can prosper if it aims at making things easier-instead it should aim at making people stronger!!
inspire.author: Ashoka Prasad

inspire.quote: My purpose is: What Lord? Where Lord? When Lord? Yes Lord!
inspire.author: Christine  Martin

inspire.quote: A fish that is afraid of drowning in a river is ignorant of its gifts.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Makeup can contribute to our success.
inspire.author: Sahara Sanders

inspire.quote: Great leaders don’t lead others with bitterness or resentfulness of past mistakes, they lead with hope and knowledge of the past to inform greater decision making in the future.
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: We live in an age where people pride themselves on individualism and the concept of living authentically. The human race strives towards self-help and desires nothing if not constant self-improvement both inward and outward. So, I ask you, what can be more authentic than learning the truth? How can one form their unique self without first knowing more possibilities? How can a person truly strive for such grandiose dreams of self-improvement without the ability to listen to the advice and knowledge of others?
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: As for methods of prayer, all are good, as long as they are sincere.
inspire.author: Victor Hugo

inspire.quote: If you're feeling helpless, help someone.
inspire.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

inspire.quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
inspire.author: Earl Nightingale

inspire.quote: Dreaming is the poetry of Life, and we must be forgiven if we indulge in it a little.
inspire.author: John Galsworthy

inspire.quote: The notion that we should promote "happy" or "humane" exploitation as "baby steps" ignores that welfare reforms do not result in providing significantly greater protection for animal interests; in fact, most of the time, animal welfare reforms do nothing more than make animal exploitation more economically productive by focusing on practices, such as gestation crates, the electrical stunning of chickens, or veal crates, that are economically inefficient in any event. Welfare reforms make animal exploitation more profitable by eliminating practices that are economically vulnerable. For the most part, those changes would happen anyway and in the absence of animal welfare campaigns precisely because they do rectify inefficiencies in the production process. And welfare reforms make the public more comfortable about animal exploitation. The "happy" meat/animal products movement is clear proof of that. We would never advocate for "humane" or "happy" human slavery, rape, genocide, etc. So, if we believe that animals matter morally and that they have an interest not only in not suffering but in continuing to exist, we should not be putting our time and energy into advocating for "humane" or "happy" animal exploitation.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: You must embrace change before change erases you.
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: If we take the position that an assessment that veganism is morally preferable to vegetarianism is not possible because we are all "on our own journey," then moral assessment becomes completely impossible or is speciesist. It is impossible because if we are all "on our own journey," then there is nothing to say to the racist, sexist, anti-semite, homophobe, etc. If we say that those forms of discrimination are morally bad, but, with respect to animals, we are all "on our own journey" and we cannot make moral assessments about, for instance, dairy consumption, then we are simply being speciesist and not applying the same moral analysis to nonhumans that we apply to the human context.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: Speciesism is morally objectionable because, like racism, sexism, and heterosexism, it links personhood with an irrelevant criterion. Those who reject speciesism are committed to rejecting racism, sexism, heterosexism, and other forms of discrimination as well.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: If we are ever going to see a paradigm shift, we have to be clear about how we want the present paradigm to shift.We must be clear that veganism is the unequivocal baseline of anything that deserves to be called an "animal rights" movement. If "animal rights" means anything, it means that we cannot morally justify any animal exploitation; we cannot justify creating animals as human resources, however "humane" that treatment may be.We must stop thinking that people will find veganism "daunting" and that we have to promote something less than veganism. If we explain the moral ideas and the arguments in favor of veganism clearly, people will understand. They may not all go vegan immediately; in fact, most won’t. But we should always be clear about the moral baseline. If someone wants to do less as an incremental matter, let that be her/his decision, and not something that we advise to do. The baseline should always be clear. We should never be promoting "happy" or "humane" exploitation as morally acceptable.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: Don't judge your success by what people think of you. You are your own success.Your determination and perserverence is what matters.
inspire.author: Abigal Muchecheti

inspire.quote: There are some animal advocates who say that to maintain that veganism is the moral baseline is objectionable because it is "judgmental," or constitutes a judgment that veganism is morally preferable to vegetarianism and a condemnation that vegetarians (or other consumers of animal products) are "bad" people. Yes to the first part; no to the second. There is no coherent distinction between flesh and other animal products. They are all the same and we cannot justify consuming any of them. To say that you do not eat flesh but that you eat dairy or eggs or whatever, or that you don’t wear fur but you wear leather or wool, is like saying that you eat the meat from spotted cows but not from brown cows; it makers no sense whatsoever. The supposed "line" between meat and everything else is just a fantasy–an arbitrary distinction that is made to enable some exploitation to be segmented off and regarded as "better" or as morally acceptable. This is not a condemnation of vegetarians who are not vegans; it is, however, a plea to those people to recognize their actions do not conform with a moral principle that they claim to accept and that all animal products are the result of imposing suffering and death on sentient beings. It is not a matter of judging individuals; it is, however, a matter of judging practices and institutions. And that is a necessary component of ethical living.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: We should never present flesh as somehow morally distinguishable from dairy. To the extent it is morally wrong to eat flesh, it is as morally wrong — and possibly more morally wrong — to consume dairy
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and let it come in.
inspire.author: Morrie Schwartz.

inspire.quote: Change is possible if you allow it to happen. Nothing in life is constant; it's always evolving and that's how life happens for me. Through my adversities I can reach new heights.
inspire.author: Chimnese Davids

inspire.quote: Take the first step. No more, no less, and the next will be revealed.
inspire.author: Clement Watt

inspire.quote: Gather the best you have to offer and create a heartfelt, prosperous life full of purpose.
inspire.author: Gail McMeekin

inspire.quote: The task of modern man is not to find his inner self, but to create himself.
inspire.author: Rod Judkins

inspire.quote: Whether you think you're right or you think you're wrong. You're right."If you think in pictures, write. If you think in words, paint.
inspire.author: Krista Kedrick

inspire.quote: I am the only force strong enough to stop me.
inspire.author: Naya S. Wood

inspire.quote: An abolitionist is, as I have developed that notion, one who (1) maintains that we cannot justify animal use, however "humane" it may be; (2) rejects welfare campaigns that seek more "humane" exploitation, or single-issue campaigns that seek to portray one form of animal exploitation as morally worse than other forms of animal exploitation (e.g., a campaign that seeks to distinguish fur from wool or leather); and (3) regards veganism, or the complete rejection of the consumption or use of any animal products, as a moral baseline. An abolitionist regards creative, nonviolent vegan education as the primary form of activism, because she understands that the paradigm will not shift until we address demand and educate people to stop thinking of animals as things we eat, wear, or use as our resources.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: Live your life as a curious student and you will discover how fascinating it is.
inspire.author: Elena Ornig

inspire.quote: Some instances in life call for humility. But, sometimes you need to be flat-out brazen when it comes to the desires of your heart.
inspire.author: Nakia R. Laushaul

inspire.quote: Try it before you doubt it, because it might just be for you
inspire.author: Rayvon L. Browne

inspire.quote: Living a Princely life requires that you learn to think and reason like the Prince, talk and behave like him, react like him as well.
inspire.author: Agu Jaachynma N.E.

inspire.quote: The rights paradigm, which, as I interpret it, morally requires the abolition of animal exploitation and requires veganism as a matter of fundamental justice, is radically different from the welfarist paradigm, which, in theory focuses on reducing suffering, and, in reality, focuses on tidying up animal exploitation at its economically inefficient edges. In science, those who subscribe to one paradigm are often unable to understand and engage those who subscribe to another paradigm precisely because the theoretical language that they use is not compatible.I think that the situation is similar in the context of the debate between animal rights and animal welfare. And that is why welfarists simply cannot understand or accept the slavery analogy.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: A persons limitations are only measured by their drive to succeed
inspire.author: Brian A Leslie

inspire.quote: The wide awake man seizes opportunities or makes them, and thus those who are widest awake usually come to the front.
inspire.author: Charles H Spurgeon

inspire.quote: Fear is a probability by its own cause of actions, if we live by it we lose all the possibilities of endurance
inspire.author: Saleem Durrani

inspire.quote: Length of a straight line is determined by the two tiny dots on both ends
inspire.author: mads

inspire.quote: Because I lay with him… I’ve caught a glimpse of heaven. Or I understand what I need. Or I have the courage to be myself.
inspire.author: K.Z. Snow

inspire.quote: Your comfort zone is a place where you keep yourself in a self-illusion and nothing can grow there but your potentiality can grow only when you can think and grow out of that zone.
inspire.author: Rashedur Ryan Rahman

inspire.quote: Turn obstacles into opportunities and problems into possibilities.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Above everything else, genuinely love yourself first. Self-love is powerful and it’s the best love that you will ever have. When you love who YOU are, your relationships will be healthier and your life will be happier. Self-love sets the standard in how we allow others to treat us and how we treat ourselves. Your happiness and well-being is important. Protect it by always valuing who you are!
inspire.author: Stephanie Lahart

inspire.quote: Every day send some blessings to the world. Let there be flow of love
inspire.author: Amit Ray

inspire.quote: Always be open to inspiration. You never know where it may come from. Begin with an open mind, end with an inspired heart.
inspire.author: Sheri   Fink

inspire.quote: The essence of life does not consist in the lushness of your possessions, but in the richness of your heart.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: علمتني تجربتي أنه لو اكتفينا بالقليل ، لن نحصل على الكثير. لا مصلحة لنا في الحد من طموحاتنا.
inspire.author: سيمون دي بوفوار

inspire.quote: Be thankful for the efforts of people who worked hard to get you where you are; you should not take it for granted and treat them with indifference.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Those who win never give up.Those who give up never win.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Comfort zone: simply means the routine of one’s daily life – it is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Be the positive impact on someone’s life.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Be the person that will take the first step towards personal success. You will be remembered for it.
inspire.author: Steven Cuoco

inspire.quote: Every act of goodness is born from our desire to be happy.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: Those who win never quit; those who quit never win.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Do not be complacent about your achievements and not to strive for continual improvement when you get to the top. As soon as you let success go to your head, you sink into following familiar patterns and play it safe. In other words, you risk losing your edge.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Grateful people are happy people. The more things you are grateful for, the happier you will be.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Patience, more than the ability to bear pains or endure waiting, is to be calm no matter what happens – constantly take action to turn it to positive growth opportunities – and have faith to believe that it will all work out in the end while you are waiting.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Making time to experience joy is the single most important thing you can do to heal your heart.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Learning to focus on the big picture will help you keep things in a proper perspective.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Not all things that fall down break. Some develop wings.
inspire.author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

inspire.quote: Start small and keep going.
inspire.author: Abhijit Naskar

inspire.quote: It is not what we have that matters; what matters is what we give away with love.
inspire.author: Debasish Mridha

inspire.quote: Be your own limited edition.
inspire.author: Steven Cuoco

inspire.quote: Success is the relentless pursuit of joy.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Interconnection permeates the entire universe. We are all one.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: What are five things you are grateful for? Right now? Open to gratitude and you will soften into joy.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Yes I have done it all. Tested the shallow waters, swam through the dangerous tides, met strangers, seen friends turn strangers, taken risks to achieve my goals, persevered to out do myself each time, rose high, fell hard, learned to climb, learned to dream and in dreaming learned to relate to reality. I have earned respect, achieved things very young, believed in my potential, questioned it too but through it all I have never stopped to aspire. I am a human and I must adapt to the changing seasons, learn new skills and master them all. Now as I stand and look up, I see a heap of laurels yet to achieve and chest of mysteries yet to resolve. I am not one in the crowd. I'll forever be the one whom they could never be
inspire.author: Adhish Mazumder

inspire.quote: We are entirely made up of dreams yearning to be lived. At every point in time, DO what you can, when you can and however you can to invest your time and efforts in your dreams; directly and without evasion.
inspire.author: Chinonye J. Chidolue

inspire.quote: There is nothing so convincing as a thing well done.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Creativity flows when the mind is light. Be light and ignite your imagination.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Until our world decides that every human matters, that everyone has a right to food and safety and freedom and healthcare and equality, it is the obligation of those privileged to have food and safety and freedom and healthcare and equality to fight tirelessly for those who do not.
inspire.author: L.R. Knost

inspire.quote: I want to show the world how darkness can sometimes be so beautiful.
inspire.author: Abdulhadi Al-Amshan

inspire.quote: The moon stared at me through sprinkled nighttime stardust and I alone smile.
inspire.author: Jay     Long

inspire.quote: If you're jealous of someone else it simply means you have not come to a true acceptance and appreciation of yourself.
inspire.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

inspire.quote: Languages connect us and break down barriers when we unite to nurture the best in us and help each other succeed. Happy International Mother Language Day!
inspire.author: Widad Akreyi

inspire.quote: Life is good! It is only our thoughts, choices and actions towards the situations we meet in life each moment of time that makes life look bad! The same bad situation in life that makes one person think badly inspires another to do a noble thing! The same good situation in life that makes one person feel so good to get into a bad situation inspires another person to create another good situation because of the good situation. It is all about thoughts, choices and actions! Life is good! Live it well!
inspire.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

inspire.quote: Hopes, wants and wishes, all cast across the night sky with my heart in tow.
inspire.author: Jay     Long

inspire.quote: Don’t be afraid of criticism; the tallest trees are always confronted by the strongest winds.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Your rebel soul shines like a diamond pulled from dust: bright, clear and flawless.
inspire.author: Jay     Long

inspire.quote: A star is not honored for its size, but for its light.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: A diamond earns its sparkle from the pressure it endures.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Learn as much as you can. Love as much as you should.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Moments caught in time. Simple memories spread out before me. Timeless reminders of how life goes on, even when it feels as if you cannot.
inspire.author: Jay     Long

inspire.quote: If one thousand of you participate in the murder of one child, then one thousand of you are a thousand times guilty.
inspire.author: Compton Gage

inspire.quote: When you are on your path, and it is truly your path, doors will open for you where there were no doors for someone else.
inspire.author: Joseph Campbell

inspire.quote: If one million of you give assent to the one thousand who participate in the murder of a child, then one million of you are a million times guilty.
inspire.author: Compton Gage

inspire.quote: You are the softness of the morning dew!
inspire.author: Avijeet Das

inspire.quote: No crime is a means to an end. No crime can be rationalized.
inspire.author: Compton Gage

inspire.quote: It is better to walk in light than to dance in darkness.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: The smallest light has greater power than the largest darkness.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Respect for the environment, and respect for what was naturally occurring in nature: that was the bedrock of all original peoples. Harmony, coexistence, not conquest and conquer.
inspire.author: L.A. Banks

inspire.quote: অতীত-বর্তমান হচ্ছে ক্যানভাস আর ব্যাকগ্রাউন্ড মাত্র, ছবিটা এখনও আঁকা বাকি।
inspire.author: নিমাই ভট্টাচার্য মেমসাহেব

inspire.quote: God created the soul pure, simple and clean of all stain of sin, with a certain beatific instinct towards Himself whence original sin, which the soul finds in itself, draws it away, and when actual is added to original sin the soul is drawn yet further away. The further it departs from its beatific instinct, the more malignant it becomes because it corresponds less to God.
inspire.author: St. Catherine of Genoa

inspire.quote: No Matter Your Age Or Date - Its Never Too Late! - (G Swiss)
inspire.author: G Swiss

inspire.quote: Choose to stay away from people who would not let you have your moment. They will talk about their moment in your moments. They will be like yeah you bought a car but my car. You have a house but my house. They don’t let you be and enjoy what you have without them comparing or mentioning what they have that is better than yours.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: Light cannot lose in a race against darkness, even if denied a head start.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: We put great expectations on our tomorrows when we truly need to rely on ourselves. Far too many overlook personal action, as a means to get things done. Blame is easily passed if one does not hold themselves accountable.
inspire.author: Jay     Long

inspire.quote: The greater the darkness the brighter your light.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Only what is below you tries to pull you down.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Your greatness is measured by your horizons.
inspire.author: Michelangelo

inspire.quote: Keberuntungan yang berlebihan selalu mengundang dengki.
inspire.author: Tere Liye

inspire.quote: Do not do what you cannot continue to deliver.For, remember, the world wants to see a continuity of delivery of set standards...!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: It Hurts...It Kills...It Teaches...It Thrills..."IT" Is LIFE...!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: When you want something, he entire universe conspires to help you achieve it.
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: The challenge of life is regretless decision making, relentless pursuit of vision with faith, forgiving others, enduring pain with a smile & achieving goals with an extra MILE
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: A sense of the divine presence and indwelling bears the soul towards heaven as upon the wings of eagles.
inspire.author: Charles Spurgeon

inspire.quote: Leadership is all about caring, daring and sharing!Caring for people, Daring to Act fearlessly,& Sharing the success with all!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: All have dreams, live for them, They add meaning to LIFE.The only thing that differentiates us from other beings is the fact that us can DREAM!!!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: A focused Mind is a result Of a little Effort To tell Your Distractions To sleep for A couple of hours While you are at WORK.
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Let All Your Life’s Experiences Lead To More Writing & Encourage More Reading..!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: The two toughest lessons to learn In life are "LET GO" & "LETs GO..!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Have a GOAL to keep the following 5-‘H’ OUT of your lifeH – HarassH – HamperH – HurtH – HarmH – HinderTo Ensure H=Happiness Prevails forever!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: IT’s All In The Game Of Mind.
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Travel Moulds A Man,People Mould His Wisdom And Experiences Mould His LIFE...!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: The wisdom of LIFE eludes even the best...For those who pass the test Life is a fest,While, its forever, A battle for the rest..

inspire.quote: By recalling God’s past provision, we can reassure ourselves that what He has done in the past, He will do again in the future.
