inspire.quote: The creative mind seeks chance and accident while everyone else seeks control and order. Rod Judkins ‘Change Your Mind
inspire.author: Rod Judkins

inspire.quote: A whetstone, though it cannot cut, may sharpen a knife that will.
inspire.author: Charles H Spurgeon

inspire.quote: Deal with your past so that it won't affect your future.
inspire.author: the prolific penman

inspire.quote: A Controlled Mind Can Create All That It Words...!

inspire.quote: life is worth living when you have someone to share it with ..

inspire.quote: If we will turn to God in prayer, and if we will seek His comfort through His Words in the Bible, we will find our hearts and minds healed.

inspire.quote: True success cannot be achieved until you have experienced failure

inspire.quote: Having the best doesn't make you the best but producing the best makes you the best

inspire.quote: Enjoy every day and make each day great

inspire.quote: A man is only as rich as the people around him

inspire.quote: Ninety percent of everything you believe you can achieve in life you will.

inspire.quote: Saya adalah produk gagal yang sedang dalam proses pendauran ulang. :)
inspire.author: Boneka Lilin

inspire.quote: Kenangi yang lalu, hadapi yang baru dengan penuh kesyukuran.

inspire.quote: Strive to make small changes and learn something new daily, because there is always these experiences you have had to tap into for the future.

inspire.quote: Hold yourself back, or heal yourself back together. You decide.

inspire.quote: Friendships - and indeed most relationships - are measured in the closeness of hearts, minds and soul ties... not in the distance of physical miles or even the passing of time.

inspire.quote: Love drips like honey from the hive, constant, sweet, precious, into your heart each and every moment if you let it.

inspire.quote: Each day brings new opportunities, allowing you to constantly live with love—be there for others—bring a little light into someone's day. Be grateful and live each day to the fullest.

inspire.quote: Do not let the roles you play in life make you forget that you are human.

inspire.quote: Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.

inspire.quote: The penalty for procrastination is the loss of hopes and dreams.

inspire.quote: Mere talents does not give glory to God but a humble heart.

inspire.quote: Despite the heart numbing frost, my soul is blooming like spring.

inspire.quote: How can you trust me, after what your own brother did to you?’‘Because he was false,’ said Damen, ‘and you are true. I have never known a truer man.

inspire.quote: Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart.
inspire.author: Roy T. Bennett

inspire.quote: Be like seeds; do not see dirt thrown at you as your enemy, but as ground to grow.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Visionary decision-making happens at the intersection of intuition and logic.
inspire.author: Paul O'Brien

inspire.quote: Connecting our hearts through love yields a nectar so sweet we are forever full.

inspire.quote: True love begins when you accept yourself in your totality. Then, and only then, can you completely love another.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Nurturing a feeling makes it proliferate. Choose wisely. Joy, kindness, love, & caring will illuminate your life.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Happiness is a collection of joyful experiences shared with soul friends. Get together and have some fun!

inspire.quote: If you listen to critics for too long, you will become deaf to success.

inspire.quote: If you tend to a flower, it will bloom, no matter how many weeds surround it.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Giving thanks fills you with light and joy so you can shine like the bright star you truly are.

inspire.quote: As architect of your reality, you are empowered to create it as you choose.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Embrace your diverse, prismatic colors! They make you uniquely you!

inspire.quote: The strong man is not one who is good at wrestling, but the strong man is one who controls himself in a fit of rage.

inspire.quote: Inspiration is like perspiration. It tends to strike at the most inopportune of times.

inspire.quote: An empowered sense of self-love means you truly love and accept yourself as you would a treasured lover or a sweet, wonderful child, and that you do this from a place of strength of character and belief in yourself.

inspire.quote: We can accept and embrace our pasts as part of the path that shaped who we are now.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Bringing joy to another lights a thousand suns within.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Transcendent, magical romance happens when you’re one hundred percent present for each other as #supersoul lovers.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Before this generation lose the wisdom, one advice - read books.

inspire.quote: Wishes are possibilities. Dare to make a wish.

inspire.quote: In meetings philosophy might work,on the field practicality works.

inspire.quote: I have always believed in the power of collaboration. Early on in my professional career, I realized that you can't develop all the competencies you need fast enough on your own. Furthermore, if you don't collaborate, your ideas will be limited to your own abilities. As a result, you will not be able to serve your clientele and thus can't achieve the anticipated impact.

inspire.quote: Why settle for a lesser vision? When you are destiny for greatness!
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Never stop dreaming, never stop believing, never give up, never stop trying, and never stop learning.
inspire.author: Roy   Bennett

inspire.quote: It is during our failures that we discover our true desire for success.
inspire.author: Kevin Ngo

inspire.quote: You know what's just as powerful as a good cup of coffee in the morning? Starting your day with some good, loving thoughts. It can change how your whole day unfolds.

inspire.quote: Follow your heart. Then root its longing with the facts.

inspire.quote: An ocean of shimmering love exists in your heart. Tap into it today and rest in the undulating currents of the great mystery.

inspire.quote: Loving yourself is required for authentic relationships.

inspire.quote: Earn Nicely, spend wisely and you will live happily.

inspire.quote: The results of knowledge without application results in nothing at all. Do what you know better to do.

inspire.quote: If you want to change the world,learn to change yourself first.
inspire.author: Hazrat Ali ibn Abu-Talib R.A

inspire.quote: Listen within to find shining poetry and hear extraordinary music. You are a work of art.

inspire.quote: Never fear Love's absence in your life, because it already exists within you, in great abundance.
inspire.author: Eleesha

inspire.quote: The Lord is God. God is Holy.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: We may regard certain days as free days. Free days are however fee days. We will pay later
inspire.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

inspire.quote: When you give your mind, body, and heart the message that you are worth the effort of being conscious, miraculous things start to happen.
inspire.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

inspire.quote: Don't worry about the negative people may say about you. Learn from it and move on.
inspire.author: Amanda Penland

inspire.quote: Never be afraid to travel on a new path.

inspire.quote: Policy-makers continue to discover that they cannot solve today’s problems with yesterday’s mindsets
inspire.author: Widad Akrawi

inspire.quote: Do not wait for life. Do not long for it. Be aware, always and at every moment, that the miracle is in the here and now.

inspire.quote: Life gave me lemons, then I met you and you had Vodka. Now my life is a party.

inspire.quote: Live for today, for there is only today

inspire.quote: Peace begins when expectations end.

inspire.quote: The Poetry of LoveWe see the world with the eyes of a small child.We visualize the beauty of the world with an unique magic sense,and unfold our deeper feelings and expectations diffusing the seizing negative forces that stretch out their threatening tentacles.We give blow and shape in our dreams.We seek for Love through unfamiliar new people and new experiences. Love is a vivid spirit, a big breath that touches upon each piece of our existence, our each cell…Love affiliates a lot of forms, exists and fits everywhere.Each flight of a small bird, the flutter of an incredible beauty butterfly, the stones wetted by waters of Aquamarine River, the branches of the trees that dally with the blow of wind, all these is the Spirit of Love.When you love in a genuine way, love everything.You are not bothered by the babble of Nature and the strange reactions of people.You hear the sounds of everyday routine with bigger consequence. Overtakes the meanness consequently and with courage.You seek truth in small things.You live the each moment as if it's unique.Love for nature.Love for life.Love for people.

inspire.quote: True enough. I say this all the time.Trez looked at his hands. "I didn’t ask for this."No one asks for life." The executioner hiked iAm’s body up higher. "And sometimes they do not ask for death...

inspire.quote: A mother gives you a life, a mother-in-law gives you her life.

inspire.quote: The circumstances surrounding your birth is not as important as the opportunity to live life.

inspire.quote: Ability, experience and books have solution for all the problems.

inspire.quote: Anyway, the trick is simply this: No matter what happens, keep your heart open. Wide open. The heart is made of love, and love is indestructible, and only the arrogance of ego would presume that it requires protection. To open your heart is to reduce your ego, and this is the only magic that is ever required to experience the naked truth.

inspire.quote: God’s joy can fill our days with gladness until we receive the answer we are waiting for.

inspire.quote: When you open your mind, you open new doors to new possibilities for yourself and new opportunities to help others.

inspire.quote: Your youth is certainly finished and old age has definitely arrived if you feel that you are losing enthusiasm, excitement and energy towards your dreams and goals.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: Dare to be a fool in the face of impossibilities.
inspire.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

inspire.quote: It is in the darkest hour, when we are faced with our deepest most wrenching fears, that we are given the greatest strength. The choice is whether we succumb to the fear or rise with courage to face our truth and shine our brilliance as our sword of valor.

inspire.quote: Stop thinking of yourself as a victim. You were a target that is now no longer being hit.

inspire.quote: Compromise brings harmony to both, happiness to none.
inspire.author: Amit Kalantri

inspire.quote: At times, it can feel like the loneliest place on Earth, because it’s just us. Alone with our unanswered prayers
inspire.author: Suzanne Elizabeth Anderson

inspire.quote: I think that a lot of the time, people are generous towards those whom they pity; but only find fault in those whom they see as better than themselves. There is a fake kind of goodness; and that is the goodness that is only good towards other people that make the givers feel better about themselves. Would you be good to someone you think is so much better than you are? Or who has so much more than you have? Or is your goodness only reserved for those who make you feel like a god because you give to them? Too often, there are shining, beautiful people, who suffer so much in this world, because there would be so many others willing to snuff out their flames! Goodness of a person is not measured by sympathy or compassion; rather, goodness is measured by empathy. Empathy goes beyond all the physical things you see with your two eyes. It’s easy to be good to those you pity; much harder to be good to those whom you envy!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: … e mult mai nobil sa ramai lucid oricat te-ar coplesi viata, esti totdeauna mai putin om cand te imbeti, indiferent cum, si daca fuga de realitate nu-i chiar o decadere, ramane totusi o infrangere.

inspire.quote: Never underestimate yourself when you do what is right. Never overestimate yourself when you do what is wrong.

inspire.quote: Smile more. Smiling can make you and others happy.

inspire.quote: Never let your past mistakes cause you to doubt your future

inspire.quote: life is not about how fast you start,but how the end is going to be ,so don't worry when others are ahead of you.just keep on doing what you have been doing.

inspire.quote: Live well, Laugh often, Love much.

inspire.quote: For every dilemma, find at least three or four possible solutions. The creative process leads to better results.

inspire.quote: Life is agid, life is fulgid. Life is what the least of us make most of us feel the least of us make the most of. Life is a burgeoning, a quickening of the dim primordial urge in the murky wastes of time.
inspire.author: Willard Van Orman Quine

inspire.quote: No hay caminos para la paz; la paz es el camino.

inspire.quote: When you make the dream of your heart a treasure of heaven, it holds an eternal value.
inspire.author: Deborah Brodie

inspire.quote: Dreams are what keep us growing. They are what keep us alive. To give up, is to let our dreams die.
