inspire.quote: SHINE JESUS - I have found, the more we point others to Jesus... the more His radiance shines through us. "Those who are wise will shine like the brightest of heavens, and those who turn many to righteousness will shine like stars forever and ever." Daniel 12:3
inspire.author: Paul Cobb

inspire.quote: Grace is the breath of God—an invisible essence beyond intellect that moves swiftly amongst us. It is not only possible to become a living conduit of this powerful force, grace is immediately accessible to us along with the courage to follow divine guidance.
inspire.author: Caroline Myss

inspire.quote: We often trick ourselves into thinking that we possess enough knowledge or control over any given situation to make correct choices. Maybe that is why we hold on to the decisions we make so dearly even when we know we are wrong.
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: Light is warmer than darkness.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Staying in the past won't help you move on to your future".
inspire.author: Princess Chezka B. Asaldo

inspire.quote: You dream of a new world to come, a new world to be birthed, a new dream to be dreamt. In the dream, a flower grows, a lotus from which the creator and the creation will unfold. From which light will begin to shine upon this vast dark sea, unveiling all the magic sleeping within. From this flower, infinite worlds and universes will be born. Each will contain a seed of light. And these seeds will light the heavens for all to guide their journeys by.
inspire.author: Thomas Lloyd Qualls

inspire.quote: Sometimes a journey is not about the traveler. It is not about a destination. It is about the bringing together of worlds. It is about lighting a path.
inspire.author: Thomas Lloyd Qualls

inspire.quote: His mission is not to wait until the world ends, but to find a way to the other side before it does. To prop open the door before it can be locked. To tie a suture before the fatal wound is made. To let in the moonlight before the sun is allowed to rise.
inspire.author: Thomas Lloyd Qualls

inspire.quote: But I don’t think fighting monsters is all that courageous. I think the ultimate act of courage is standing still in the face of a monster. Courage is looking closely enough into its jaws to see it for what it is: an illusion. The monster isn’t real. It’s your fear of the monster that is real. And just about anything in life can look like a monster if the light is just right.
inspire.author: Thomas Lloyd Qualls

inspire.quote: Prince Wen-hui’s cook, Ting, was cutting up an ox. Every touch of his hand, every ripple of his shoulders, every step of his feet, every thrust of his knees, every cut of his knife, was in perfect harmony, like the dance of the Mulberry Grove, like the chords of the Lynx Head music. Well done! said the prince. How did you gain such skill? Putting down his knife, Ting said, I follow the Tao, Your Highness, which goes beyond all skills. When I first began cutting up oxen, all I could see was the ox. After three years, I had learned to look beyond the ox. Nowadays I see with my whole being, not with my eyes. I sense the natural lines, and my knife slides through by itself, never touching a joint, much less a bone. A good cook changes knives once a year: he cuts. An ordinary cook changes knives once a month: he hacks. This knife of mine has lasted for nineteen years; it has cut up thousands of oxen, but its blade is as sharp as if it were new. Between the joints there are spaces, and the blade has no thickness. Having no thickness, it slips right through; there’s more than enough room for it. And when I come to a difficult part, I slow down, I focus my attention, I barely move, the knife finds its way, until suddenly the flesh falls apart on its own. I stand there and let the joy of the work fill me. Then I wipe the blade clean and put it away. Bravo! cried the prince. From the words of this cook, I have learned how to live my life.
inspire.author: Stephen Mitchell

inspire.quote: We live in a world where people believe they have full control oftheir choices and decisions, but rarely have the holistic knowledge to effectively wield such power.
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: Having an understanding of the human mind and how it functions is probably the single most important thing anyone who wants to be successful can do
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: We have two choices when it comes to creating impactful change inpeople’s decision-making process. We can create technology to prohibit or create rules to follow
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: The greatest leaders in the world fight cognitive bias by developing 'rules to live by' and carefully following predetermined routines to maximize efficiency and control of their environment
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: Imagine a world full of people who take their choices seriously, carefully weighing the options presented to them. I wonder where we would be if people put as much thought into their decision-making process as they do so many other things in their lives.
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: We are all skyscrapers, continually adding rooms and floors to who we are. Once one floor is done, the next begins and the result is a constant work in progress. The best business leaders treat their companies like projects never to be completed, only improved and refined, so why shouldn’t we also treat ourselves as such?
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: Love is the soul's treasure.
inspire.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

inspire.quote: Even in an age where the answer to almost all of life’s questions is a simple Google search away, we often don’t take the time to read the entire article for the answer. We don’t make time to actively seek out the truth, only the first or most relevant result.
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: The goal shouldn’t be to make the perfect decision every time but to make less bad decisions than everyone else.
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: when you face disappointments and trials in life, your response dictates the character that will be created in you as a result.
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: What we value and our priorities in life make us who we are. We are unique not only because of our outward differences, but arguably more importantly, our inward differences. Our values steer our personal and professional lives and have a distinct imprint on the decisions we make.
inspire.author: Spencer Fraseur

inspire.quote: The only difference between money and blank paper is that I can use blank paper for campfire" - Anuj Jasani
inspire.author: Anuj Jasani

inspire.quote: People just read about time management and think about time management but execution is a completely different experience that I can't describe in words
inspire.author: Anuj Jasani

inspire.quote: You don’t need to be a fortress to be strong. You don’t need to build walls to keep yourself safe. Open the windows and let the breeze breathe life into your bones. Go outside, touch the earth with your bare hands, and remind yourself how it feels to plant the seeds of love and watch them bloom intosomething beautiful. Water those flowers well; your garden will reawaken in the sun.
inspire.author: Kirsten Robinson

inspire.quote: Librarians are tour-guides for all of knowledge.
inspire.author: Patrick Ness

inspire.quote: Time changes all things; there is no reason why language should escape this universal law
inspire.author: Ferdinand de Saussure

inspire.quote: a hero is just somebody who does the right thing when it would be far, far easier to do nothing."-Cedric Diggory-
inspire.author: G. Norman Lippert

inspire.quote: Transient guests are we.
inspire.author: Hideyuki Kikuchi

inspire.quote: I is for Integrity, be honest with yourself and others.
inspire.author: Lucas Remmerswaal

inspire.quote: S is for SCARY! Fear is driven out by action! Bad habits are overcome by good habits.
inspire.author: Lucas Remmerswaal

inspire.quote: Think outside the square. Think for yourself don't just follow the herd. Think multidisciplinary! Problems by definition, cross many academic disciplines.
inspire.author: Lucas Remmerswaal

inspire.quote: love yourself,.,.,.,for the sake of  your better future
inspire.author: Jhon Grisham

inspire.quote: When we stop fighting against death, we are able to wake up to our lives.
inspire.author: Daniel Gottlieb

inspire.quote: It is the road you take that decides your destiny and not your destiny that decides the road you take.
inspire.author: Apoorve Dubey

inspire.quote: Warren Buffett chuckled and said to me "I hope it's not my bad habits" Good Habits once established are just as hard to break as bad habits and bad habits are easier to abandon today than tomorrow. So what are you going to do about it?
inspire.author: Lucas Remmerswaal

inspire.quote: In a few more days I'd anticipated telling Veronika that our injections had cured her heart condition. But in light of her unscheduled departure form Villette my telling that particular lie will not be required. The majority of people who attempt suicide repeat that attempt until they succeed. I took a risk in lying to her about her condition, i decided to test the only remedy i have come to have any faith in: awareness of life. Until she finds out from some other doctor that she is perfectly healthy. She'll consider each day a miracle. Which in my view it is.
inspire.author: Paulo Coelho

inspire.quote: More than once, the broken moon would cast through the window a silver light and remind me of independent events yielding to their own momentum and interacting under natural laws while my mind would impose happiness, grief, beauty, ruin, justice and chaos.
inspire.author: Leonard Seet

inspire.quote: I can manage," said Frodo. "I must.
inspire.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

inspire.quote: uhanku Yang Maha Penyayang,Engkau memerintahkanagar aku memuliakan orang tuadan keluargaku,...dan agar aku memungkinkanpencapaian impian hati mereka.Aku tahu bahwa aku tak mungkinmenyembunyikan dari pengetahuan Mu,tentang kerinduan hatikuuntuk mampu melakukanyang Kau perintahkan itu.Tuhan,aku mohon Engkau membuka tabiryang selama ini menutupi rezekiku.Mampukanlah aku membahagiakan keluargaku.Aamiin
inspire.author: Mario Teguh

inspire.quote: Cut not the wings of your dreams, for they are the heartbeat and the freedom of your soul.
inspire.author: Flavia

inspire.quote: Genius is the power of lighting one's own fire!
inspire.author: John Forster

inspire.quote: Feed your self-esteem; not your ego!
inspire.author: Deborah Brodie

inspire.quote: Z is for Zany! Master the Zany habit of thinking backwards. it will help you become a really great thinker!
inspire.author: Lucas Remmerswaal

inspire.quote: During the crash and burn, I began to burn from cranial crown to flat sole, for meaning and understanding. Every concept, psychological perceptions with hardened pathways, everything that registered as inherited from the communal was starting to dissolve into meaninglessness. The foundational tenets, the pre-established belief systems, instilled sustenance systems tended by both family and extended communal began to dissolve, first as trivial, and then as untenable to my being without validation from me. If my life was worth anything, I choose to live the best life for me. So I entered what I call The Blank State.
inspire.author: Dew Platt

inspire.quote: ...the best Evil Plan offers something much more for people--a chance to buy into an idea that matters, and share it with people who matter to them.
inspire.author: Hugh MacLeod

inspire.quote: There is no rest in the heart of God until He knows that you are at resh in His grace.
inspire.author: Lloyd J. Ogilvie

inspire.quote: I pray, before I die, that I receive the power to believe in fairytales again, Oh' how I would love to laugh and know that God laughed with me.
inspire.author: Tonny K. Brown

inspire.quote: Elles étaient en touffes avec des racines d'or, épanouies, enfoncées dans les ténèbres et qui soulevaient des mottes luisantes de nuit.(à propos des étoiles)
inspire.author: Jean Giono

inspire.quote: TanganNya tidak pernah terlalu pendek untuk menjangkau kita...kupingNya tidak pernah terlalu bising sehingga tidak bisa mendengar seruan kita...& mataNya tidak pernah berada terlalu jauh sehingga tidak bisa memperhatikan kita...Tapi,seringkali hati kita yg terlalu kecil untuk menyadari keberadaanNya...& pikiran kita yg terlalu sempit untuk mengakui kekuasaanNya atas semua masalah kita...*nite all..yesaya 55:8
inspire.author: Ferawati

inspire.quote: X is for X-mas Concentrate your energies, your thoughts and your capital. Put all your eggs in one basket and then watch that basket, then all your Christmases can come at once!
inspire.author: Lucas Remmerswaal

inspire.quote: It only takes one minute to find a really good book, but it can give you a lifetime of memories when you read a really good book that leaves you with lasting impression.
inspire.author: Nahisha McCoy

inspire.quote: Feeling guilty does not set us free. Being equipped sets us free.
inspire.author: Thom Hunter

inspire.quote: The importance of knowing for certain that you have been saved cannot be understated. We do not know how many days, hours, or minutes God has granted us here to have an opportunity to make a choice.
inspire.author: Kimberly McRae

inspire.quote: jika seluruh hidupmu kau lesakkan dalam satu benda, terpikir olehmu benda apakah itu?
inspire.author: Lisa Febriyanti

inspire.quote: fight for what you believe in,for if you don't you will be forever fighting against yourself.
inspire.author: Keisha Keenleyside

inspire.quote: I've learned that the universe doesn't care what our motives are, only our actions. So we should do things that will bring about good, even if there is an element of selfishness involved. Like the kids at my school might join the Key Club or Future Buisness Leaders of America, because it's a social thing and looks good on their record, not because they really want to volunteer at the nursing home. But the people at the nursing home still benefit from it, so it's better that the kids do it than not do it. And if they never did it, then they wouldn't find out that they actually liked it.
inspire.author: Wendy Mass

inspire.quote: Any serious social, political, and economic change must include veganism.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: Your life is a reflection of your thoughts. Think well.
inspire.author: Danielle Pierre

inspire.quote: Those that yield are not always weak
inspire.author: Jacqueline Carey

inspire.quote: But hell, you've gotta work with what you've got.
inspire.author: Haruki Murakami

inspire.quote: You cannot live a nonviolent life as long as you are consuming violence. Please consider going vegan.
inspire.author: GaryLFrancione

inspire.quote: There is a higher form of hierarchy and that is the hierarchy of the spirit. When I stand in front of a person, I stand in front of a soul and I have met magnificent souls in bodies possessing no money, as well as parched and shallow souls in bodies bathed in riches. In the same light, I have met magnificent souls in bodies bathed in wealth, as well as parched and shallow souls in bodies that are impoverished. I am tired of people busying their minds with hierarchy based upon money, because this form of hierarchy is primitive; meanwhile there is an altogether higher form of hierarchy that is of the soul. As you judge man and woman based upon their riches, I laugh at your primitive form of judgment! When I stand in front of a human, I stand in front of a soul.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Maybe God doesn't care if we get all dressed up and sit in the pew every Sunday, as Diana believes. Instead, maybe God comes to us through men like Sloth, watching over us as we make our own decisions. Maybe God has always been with me. Opening doors, leading me to opportunities, letting me choose my own path, and loving me even when I chose the wrong one. Never giving up on me. Knowing all along that I am on a journey. That I must find my own way to Him. Maybe River was rights. Maybe God does still believe in me.
inspire.author: Julie Cantrell

inspire.quote: My friends, don't idolize hardship. What you idolize is what your heart will look for and what your heart looks for is what you will have. And don't capitalize on misfortune, because you will always seek out to have capital! Throw away that pride! Don't put sorrow on a pedestal! If you ask me if I would rather have had my sorrows or not, I will tell you that no, I would rather have not had any of them! In the blink of an eye, I would rid myself of them! I have no pride. I don't rely on hardships and sorrows to mold me into someone. I don't allow myself to be dictated. When hardship and sorrow come knocking, saying "We are responsible for who you are today, let us in!" I'm going to say, in a split second, "No you're not! Go away, I don't owe you anything!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Le souvenir n'est qu'un regard posé de temps en temps sur des êtres devenus intérieurs,mais qui ne dépendent pas de la mémoire pour continuer d'exister.
inspire.author: Marguerite Yourcenar

inspire.quote: There are blue diamonds born to the world and given to those who only want glass crystals. There are blue roses born to the world yet given to those who only want daisies. Blue diamond, don't cry because they want glass crystals. Blue rose, don't bleed because they see only the daisies. You were formed in the bedroom of the gods, you were conceived in the garden of the eternal!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: We all have something redeemable in us, no matter how small." - Laura Armstrong, A Human Element
inspire.author: Donna Galanti

inspire.quote: If all the people who were called "crazy" started acting "normal", we'd probably still be living in caves.
inspire.author: Joana James

inspire.quote: Anybody can make the simple complecated. Creativity is making the complecated simple.
inspire.author: Charles Mingus

inspire.quote: For every woman, there is that one man who could get her to go anywhere he wanted her to go, do anything he wanted her to do—reach into her soul and turn her whole world on its ear—challenge everything she thought she believed. Highlighted by 24 Kindle users
inspire.author: Lenore Wolfe

inspire.quote: Don't tawch meh matherfawker!
inspire.author: Tommy Wiseau

inspire.quote: ...Make God's Word your Sourcebook...
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: You can't test courage cautiously." (Annie Dillard)
inspire.author: Marcia Quinn Noren

inspire.quote: ...You mistake other people’s success as your own failure...
inspire.author: Stephan Lawrence Theodore Clifford

inspire.quote: If you are willing to go out on a limb, the tree of life holds endless possibilities.
inspire.author: Angel Sharum

inspire.quote: I led the life of so many other so-called respectable people,—that is, in debauchery. And like the majority, while leading the life of a debauche, I was convinced that I was a man of irreproachable morality.
inspire.author: Leo Tolstoy

inspire.quote: make the most of the day, by determining to spend it on two sorts of acquaintances only - those by whom something may be got, and those from whom something may be learned. - Colton
inspire.author: Colton Robinsmith

inspire.quote: Friends who love us know that motherhood is about transitioning--and adjusting, constantly, to those changes. We must become masters of change because that is what life demands of us.
inspire.author: Meg Meeker

inspire.quote: The day of perfection is not scheduled on earth.
inspire.author: Naty Matos

inspire.quote: To prepare for the mountains develop mind, body, will and spirit as strong as a sword, soft as a pillow and fluid as water.
inspire.author: Jeff Rasley

inspire.quote: A drop of water shall be returned with a burst of spring.
inspire.author: Pat Cher

inspire.quote: word is like a sword; you should be wise when to use it or it'll kill and ruin everything you did in your past, you're doing at this time, and you're gonna do in the future
inspire.author: A Thaselia

inspire.quote: Pikiran mengendalikan hati manusia
inspire.author: Dian Dermawan

inspire.quote: Love and honor the world around you, and you experience life in its fullest. There is no "Other." There is simply us. The all of us, the whole of us. The mankind of us. Anything else is a lie.
inspire.author: Cassandra Blizzard

inspire.quote: To create a new business that makes money, and more significantly, employs others, and more significantly, gives a product to a customer that improves their life, is our greatest challenge, our greatest opportunity, and the greatest gift, far greater than any charity that we can give our fellow person.
inspire.author: Paul Zane Pilzer

inspire.quote: Tonight I saw Jesus with the eyes on my face. He looks half lion and half man. But not more like a lion and not more like a man, rather the same, I have never seen anything like the face of Jesus before, %100 one thing but %100 another thing: a lion man!" "Where did you see Him at?" "On the surface of my blanket as I lay in bed. He was suddenly drawn onto it, like a sketch, and that same moment I knew He was showing His face to me, finally." "Why do you think He did that?" "I think He thought it was about time.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Freedom is in the Now
inspire.author: Arnaud Saint-Paul

inspire.quote: Paths that lead to the crossroads of life; otherwise known as "transition."Transition is the tension present between struggle and grace.
inspire.author: Deborah Brodie

inspire.quote: 'Pity without rigor would be cowardly egotism, mere sentimentality.'
inspire.author: Matthew Pearl

inspire.quote: Doing what I like to do, the way I like to do it ... makes me happy.
inspire.author: Nakia R. Laushaul

inspire.quote: There's a very positive relationship between people's ability to accomplish any task and the time they're willing to spend on it.
inspire.author: Joyce Brothers

inspire.quote: The truth came to me-a great revelation, showing me that I have a child to the Jones whole and perfect mind, created to express the health that God with.
inspire.author: Myrtle Filmore

inspire.quote: A matter, as the famous book intoned, of finding the shade of the parachute that best complemented you. But really: With no parachute at all you'd hit the pavement so hard it probably wouldn't even hurt, and you'd unleash a whole new color palate-bone, blood, muscle-in the process.
inspire.author: Elisa Albert

inspire.quote: When wealth flees, untrue friends follow.
inspire.author: Thomas F. Shubnell

inspire.quote: The rainbow is the pot of gold to those who observe.
inspire.author: Thomas F. Shubnell

inspire.quote: I have a picture of the Pont Neuf on a wall in my apartment, but i know that Paris is really on the closet shelf, in the box next to the sleeping bag, with the rest of my diaries.
inspire.author: Thomas Mallon

inspire.quote: Don't worry about what others think. They don't know what sets your soul on fire.
inspire.author: Hiral Nagda

inspire.quote: Encouragement: To place courage within them, by coming along side them and inspiring them to hold on, to work hard, to fight for the cause placed in their care.
inspire.author: Jozua Van Otterloo

inspire.quote: As a river flowing beyond mountains,Far over the horizon it flows.No one knows where its water goes,what it touches or where it comes close.Encouragement can move mountains,Mountains of desperation and need.Who would know its effect or its deed?Who’d know the hungry it’ll feed?
inspire.author: Jozua Van Otterloo

inspire.quote: Though the fox kills the chicken, and the bigger animals live on the little animals, what appears to be cruelty is a design of order in this universe, except for man. When man doesn't interfere, there is great beauty of balance and harmony.
inspire.author: J KRISHNAMURTI

inspire.quote: When you will become aware of who you really are, you will meet the biggest miracle of your life.
inspire.author: Hiral Nagda

inspire.quote: To be able to experience wealth, health and the many other things we humans want, we must mentally be in absolute harmony with them.
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: I can't say I have always loved myself. I can only admit that I have weaved in and out of love for myself. I have always seemed to love others sometimes more than myself, but have had a true desire to turn that love inwards.
inspire.author: Helen Edwards Nothing Sexier Than Freedom

inspire.quote: You are not alone. You are seen. I am with you. You are not alone.
inspire.author: Shonda Rhimes

inspire.quote: To see the sun shine, you have to wait out the rain
inspire.author: America Joseph

inspire.quote: The bigger the house, the more you feel like the house owns you instead of you owning it.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: If you want go somewhere, never forget go to beach with your love. Why? She lost her heart to see you in beach. Here is the collection quotes how to enjoy in beach with your love by Angel Cherry. Do you want to know?
inspire.author: Cherry Nguyen(Let us you rich.com)

inspire.quote: Today you must remind yourself that you don’t need to get discouraged by their inability to reciprocate your kind of love, warmth, concern, care & respect. Not too many has the ability to understand the person you are.For God sake, please remain in your own lane, no matter what is going around, I mean remain calm & unfazed inspite of excessive noise & disturbance. Keep your focus on self awakening, self development, Self building & self Improvement. Continue protecting & preserving your energy.I want you to remember that you are not what they think you are or the wars you carry within – you are the warmth, tenderness, ethos, hopefulness, encouragement & inspiration you share with others.Let you remain proud of who you are & keep on learning, evolving, transforming, growing & becoming your Higher Self everyday.I want you to keep attracting happiness, ease, health & success through your good deeds, warmth, positive thinking & alignment with the Universe.Continue to be blessed!
inspire.author: Rajesh Goyal

inspire.quote: To get up, just the body is not enough.
inspire.author: 4ever1friend

inspire.quote: There are millions of writers in the world. Not all get to be mentioned by other writers or magazines. Or even be quoted by the public. So, I recognise my blessings. And I realise that I get to be one of those whose work is publicly acknowledged. I thank you, all.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: How to use the law of attraction for successful life of Jack CanfieldThe Law of Attraction says that you will attract into your life whatever you focus on. Whatever you give your energy and attention to will come back to you. So, if you stay focused on the good and positive things in your life, you will automatically attract more good and positive things into your life.Let Jack Canfield guide usIf you are going to be successful in creating the life of your dreams, you have first have to believe what you want is possible and you are capable of making it happen. —  Jack Canfield(Law of Attraction statements)How to do your dreams?1. Whatever you focus on, think about, read about, and talk about intensely, you’re going to attract more of into your life. —  Jack Canfield(Law of Attraction statements)2. If you are clear about your goals and take several steps in the right direction everyday, eventually you will succeed. So decide what it is you want, write it down, review it constantly, and each day do something that moves you toward those goals. —  Jack CanfieldRead more on my site3. Write your goals down in detail and read your list of goals every day. Some goals may entail a list of shorter goals. Losing a lot of weight, for example, should include mini-goals, such as 10-pound milestones. This will keep your subconscious mind focused on what you want step by step. —  Jack Canfield(Law of Attraction statements)4. If we are not a little bit uncomfortable every day, we’re not growing. All the good stuff is outside our comfort zone. —  Jack Canfield(Law of Attraction statements)How to believe?2. Whatever your dream is, look yourself in the mirror and declare that you are indeed going to achieve it – no matter what the price. —  Jack Canfield(Law of Attraction statements)How to think?Psychologists tell us we think 50,000 thoughts a day…between 1,000 and 5,000 thoughts in a single hour. Many of those thoughts are about ourselves and about our performance, about our lovability, our capability and our significance. So the key is to control those thoughts, making certain they’re always positive. —  Jack Canfield(Law of Attraction statements)How to choose?1. I choose to believe things are possible, even when I don't know how they will happen. —  Jack Canfield(Law of Attraction statements)1. All your dreams await just on the other side of your fears. —  Jack Canfield(Law of Attraction statements)
inspire.author: Letusmakeyourich

inspire.quote: Chase your dreams! Never doubt your capabilities to come out a winner. Struggle hard but never give up the chase to achieve your dreams!
inspire.author: Avijeet Das

inspire.quote: When you display an unstoppable vigor, circumstances bow down to you.
inspire.author: Hiral Nagda

inspire.quote: Surrender to your passions, not to your circumstances.
inspire.author: Hiral Nagda

inspire.quote: Make your lives a masterpiece, you only get one canvas.
inspire.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

inspire.quote: Above all, never think you're not good enough. Never think that. In life people will take you at your own reckoning.
inspire.author: Isaac Asimov

inspire.quote: Apabila dalam diri seseorang masih ada rasa malu dan takut untuk berbuat suatu kebaikan, maka jaminan bagi orang tersebut adalah tidak akan bertemunya ia dengan kemajuan selangkah pun
inspire.author: Sukarno

inspire.quote: I love words.  I crave descriptions that overwhelm my imagination with vivid detail.  I dwell on phrases that make my heart thrum.  I cherish expressions that pierce my emotions and force the tears to spill over.   In essence, I long for a writer's soul sealed in ink on the page.
inspire.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

inspire.quote: Time is too short in this one life, to be able to do everything, but it definitely is long enough at least to be able to develop the will to do anything & everything...
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: But just remember: a woman's like a rose; if you treat her right, she'll bloom, if you don't, she'll wilt.
inspire.author: Eric Wilson

inspire.quote: Nothing Comes Home...You Have To Get OUT & Get IT~!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Patience Pays..Is true! But the greater truth is that it takes advance payment before it pays you in return!
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Once You keep Aside the Emotional side Of yours,Is when You stop using the phrase "This was a BAD PHASE" of life..
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: Every comforting word is a command from a man of action...While every word of command is commotion from a man of just words...
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: When dreams become words to share with others - amazing things can happen.
inspire.author: Richard Hackett Jr

inspire.quote: The Glory Is Always Hidden Between The Lines Of the Story
inspire.author: Sujit Lalwani

inspire.quote: The best way to solve a problem is to prevent it.
inspire.author: chibisa charles

inspire.quote: You never leave your partner! Especially in a fire!
inspire.author: Jennifer Dion

inspire.quote: But men and women are different in the way that they feel loved. Men like to be admired for what they do, for their integrity and their accomplishments, whether it’s at work or at the gym or mowing the lawn, because it makes them feel manly. When a woman tells a man that she is proud of him, or she tells him that he did a good job, he’ll about bend over backwards to take care of her and love her."  "But women like attention from men, because it makes them feel feminine and adored. That’s why they’re always fixin’ themselves up, doing their hair, wearing pretty clothes and makeup and jewelry and perfume. It’s all to attract your attention, you know." (Thelma Jenkins)
inspire.author: Carol  McCormick

inspire.quote: Too many people are missing their destiny a year at a time because they're too scared to think in decades!" (p. 127)
inspire.author: Pete Greig

inspire.quote: Always set small, realistic goals that you know you can achieve first. But don't give up on the bigger ones that may seem too far from your reach.
inspire.author: W.D. Lady

inspire.quote: Love cannot be hidden. It even shines in the darkest places." ~ Carla Olson Gade, The Shadow Catcher's Daughter
inspire.author: Carla Olson Gade

inspire.quote: Los pensamientos que acuden a mi mente cuando corro se parecen a las nubes del cielo. Nubes de diversas formas y tamaños. Nubes que vienen y se van. Pero el cielo siempre es el cielo. Las nubes son sólo meras invitadas. Algo que pasa de largo y se dispersa. Y sólo queda el cielo. El cielo es algo que, al tiempo que existe, no existe. Algo material y a la vez, inmaterial. Y a nosotros no nos queda sino aceptar ka existencia de ese inmenso recipiente tal cual es e intentar ir asimilándolo.
inspire.author: Haruki Murakami

inspire.quote: Here, in this quiet place we own, worlds are born.~Run the Voodoo Down~
inspire.author: Cassandra  Wilson

inspire.quote: If you're lost and aloneOr you're sinking like a stoneCarry on...May your past be the soundOf your feet upon the groundCarry on
inspire.author: FUN

inspire.quote: Life is short,Live it long
inspire.author: Zaveric

inspire.quote: You're never losing when you're learning !
inspire.author: Knowledge Notes

inspire.quote: I can do nothing without His help. Oh, Lord, what ignorance thinking everything was wealth.
inspire.author: Venus Angelica Perez

inspire.quote: I promise.For the other side of the card, I put the giraffe and penguin on it and wrote:To think and try not to over think.To breathe, but not hyperventilate.To try to envision the best, and not dwell on the worst.To call you when I'm in trouble.To not do anything permanent on a situation that might be temporary.
inspire.author: Shirley Miranda

inspire.quote: Ma már nem gondolom, hogy út, szenvedés, fáradtság nélkül célba lehet jutni.
inspire.author: Tolvaly Ferenc

inspire.quote: Nervousness kill us... because we think we have only one opportunity that is in the Present and we don't think about the future! We loose our balance.
inspire.author: Vikram Roy

inspire.quote: The Prince is the only option to a better living. His arm is reliable and dependable. Get to Him, stay glued and remain on Top!
inspire.author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu

inspire.quote: Il culmine del piacere è la pura e semplice distruzione del dolore.
inspire.author: Epicuro

inspire.quote: One who has reached a goal no longer travels the road"(Pauline Christianity, p. 111)
inspire.author: John Ziesler

inspire.quote: We're never called on to do what hurts. We just do what hurts out of ignorance and habit. Once we see what we're doing, we can stop.
inspire.author: Steve Hagen

inspire.quote: When all is said and done all anyone has left is their integrity at their core... Don't give that away too.
inspire.author: Solange nicole

inspire.quote: All one can really leave one's children is what's inside their heads. Education, in other words, and not earthly possessions, is the ultimate legacy, the only thing that cannot be taken away.
inspire.author: Dr. Wernher von Braun

inspire.quote: The Buddha encouraged people to "know for yourselves that certain things are unwholesome and wrong. And when you do, then give them up. And when you know for yourselves that certain things are wholesome and good, then accept them and follow them."The message is always to examine and see for yourself. When you see for yourself what is true-and that's really the only way that you can genuinely know anything-then embrace it. Until then, just suspend judgment and criticism.
inspire.author: Steve Hagen

inspire.quote: He won't listen to the music, and I can't turn it off.
inspire.author: V.C. Andrews

inspire.quote: We've all received our share of good fortune, so that's my definition of much. A single blessing is all the bounty in the world, and if you've been blessed at all you're meant to pass some of that on. You're meant to set a positive example. That's our responsibility" (20) - Denzel Washington, "So that We Might Follow
inspire.author: Denzel Washington

inspire.quote: In-existence, the soul’s greatest imposition is its perfection. It is projected as a perfected form of the physical embodiment, an emblem of things, perhaps hyperreal and untouchably perfect as existence. It can not be! The soul in-existence is nothing of perfection. It is raw potential. The soul is nothing but potential. To be specific, the soul is unordered potential!
inspire.author: dew platt

inspire.quote: Remember that a wish held fervently turns into belief, and a belief held diligently becomes reality.
inspire.author: Jim Stovall

inspire.quote: Worth as I use it here is immeasurable, not as in mathematics towards infinity. But that it can not be measured. There are no measurable parameters for it! Certainly not a material-communal measurable parameter for it! Such, it is what the being holds that cannot and should never be traded. When it is there, every essence of your being knows it, and takes commands from it that will be able to override any personal or imposed sense of value.
inspire.author: Dew Platt

inspire.quote: A dream is an idea involving a sense of possibilities rather than probabilities, of potential rather than limits. A dream is the wellspring of passion, giving us direction and pointing us to lofty heights. It is an expression of optimism, hope and values lofty enough to capture the imagination and engage the spirit. Dreams grab us and move us. They are capable of lifting us to new heights and overcoming self-imposed limitations.
inspire.author: Robert Kriegel

inspire.quote: God can turn the impossibile into possibilities. Possibilities become opportunities. Opportunities leads us one step closer to our dreams!
inspire.author: Anasia Nicole Hixon

inspire.quote: Go where your nose leads you
inspire.author: Patricia Griecci

inspire.quote: Jesus knew that many of his listeners believed the old wineskin (or way of doing things) was good enough. They were comfortable with their beliefs and practices, but Jesus hadn't come to patch up old religious traditions. He was offering a new garment, a new wineskin, a way of life that didn't abolish the old ways, but fulfilled them.The teaching illuminated my own need to remain pliable before God. I realize that I must have a softer housing for my growing faith, one that can flex and change as God is at work inside of me. All too often I find myself clinging to that which is comfortable and familiar, rather than embracing the challenges that emerge with change and growth. Sometimes I shy away from people who have strong views that differ from mine, even though sharing a great conversation... could temper both our viewpoints and deepen our relationship. Why do I run away from strong opinions and potential conflict? Am I too comfortable and unwilling to change? Such a realization highlights the need for the Spirit in my life not just to discern and distinguish, but also to illuminate and invite me to move forward into the fullness of life with him." -Scouting the Divine
inspire.author: Margaret Feinberg

inspire.quote: The Yorubas have a saying, here, my translation in English--a poor fool is a bigger fool rich. In other words, money only allows and enables you to be more of who you are. My bigger translation? You don't jump essence, you jump environs!
inspire.author: Dew Platt

inspire.quote: Be the Light you seek so desperately in your life and chase away that darkness.
inspire.author: Solange nicole

inspire.quote: Don’t let anyone set restrictions on your life...You chart the course of your own future, not anyone else. Don’t let people have such a power over you. Because if you’re always racing against their standards, then what’s the point of reaching a useless finish line?
inspire.author: K.M. Parr

inspire.quote: لا ينبغى أن نخجل من أمر فُرض علينا , مهما كان , ما دمنا لم نقترفه
inspire.author: يوسف زيدان

inspire.quote: The day we put an end to believing in hope will be the day we stop existing, for without hope, we are nothing.
inspire.author: K.M. Parr

inspire.quote: I used to fear things like not having enough alcohol and drugs, or the money to get them. Now I fear someone holding me down and physically forcing me to take drugs and drink alcohol. I fear that for some reason I wouldn't be allowed or wouldn't be able to read anymore.
inspire.author: Volatalistic Phil

inspire.quote: The mandarins of culture—what do they do to teach the common folk to read? It's no good writing down lists of books for farmers and compiling five-foot shelves; you've got to go out and visit the people yourself—take the books to them, talk to the teachers and bully the editors of country newspapers and farm magazines and tell the children stories—and then little by little you begin to get good books circulating in the veins of the nation. It's a great work, mind you!
inspire.author: Moley Christopher

inspire.quote: أيهما أفضل ...أن تكون رجلاً فى زمن الرجال ،أم أن تكون رجلاً فى زمان عز فيه الرجال صدقنى ....القضية من الأساس أن تكون رجلاً
inspire.author: د/أحمد بيومى

inspire.quote: Say you are at the brink of killing yourself and someone tries to talk you out of it. You’ve already thought about it and your life is not worth living. Someone else comes along and tries to convince you not to kill yourself. Is there someone out there that can convince you not to kill yourself? What can they possibly say to convince you that your life, the one you have firsthand knowledge of, is worth living? There is that one answer. No one! There is that other answer. Nothing!
inspire.author: Dew Platt

inspire.quote: Kebathilan selama bila pun (abadan abada) tidak boleh dianggap benar kerana ukuran ramainya yang menyokong - atau sudah diarus perdanakan. Dan kebenaran pula - dalam apa jua zaman dan ruang masa pun - tidak boleh diinjak mati dan dilenyap punah hanya semata dititipkan rohnya oleh sebatang pena dan selembar kertas.
inspire.author: Hafiz Fandani

inspire.quote: Awak HEBAT! Buktikan & tonjolkan KEHEBATAN Awak .. =)
inspire.author: Cikgu Syadida Zakaria (UPSI)

inspire.quote: Chakravyuh mein ghusne se pehle,Before entering the circle of deceit,kaun tha mein aur kaisa tha,who I was, and what I was,yeh mujhe yaad hi na rahega.I would not remember.Chakravyuh mein ghusne ke baad,After entering the circle of deceit,mere aur chakravyuh ke beech,(there was) between me and the circle,sirf ek jaanleva nikat’ta thi,only a deathly intimacyiska mujhe pata hi na chalega.that I never realised.
inspire.author: Dilip Chitre

inspire.quote: dont aom for success if u want it just do what u love n believe in and it wil come naturaly.
inspire.author: David Frost

inspire.quote: Que as nossas palavras ressoem para sempre pela eternidade e que nunca sejam esquecidas. Se por ventura se perderem perdidos estaremos.
inspire.author: Rute Canhoto

inspire.quote: It is through imagination that we transcend understanding and travel into the world of possibilities.
inspire.author: Danielle Pierre

inspire.quote: Know that true change is demonstrated only by your actions around everyone, not just certain people.
inspire.author: Tanya Liverman

inspire.quote: Why can you see the stars at night, but not the light...
inspire.author: A. Witness

inspire.quote: Beauty gets attention, personality gets a heart
inspire.author: Skylar Blue

inspire.quote: Spirituality does not encourage idleness, but you must be more practical than those who are not spiritual.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.
inspire.author: Antoine De Saint Exupéry

inspire.quote: Don't underestimate dreams, because they are guides to adrift lives. We achieve, not by recognizing others, but by self-realization.
inspire.author: Leonardo H. Bandeira

inspire.quote: There are some things in our nature that never change and, even if forgotten, are still there. Sleeping. Just remove the dust that hides them a little, so that they emerge from the shining shadows again.
inspire.author: Leonardo H. Bandeira

inspire.quote: Magic is far beyond what our eyes can see.
inspire.author: Leonardo H. Bandeira

inspire.quote: Humans have an excellent ability to see everything they look at but feel very little of what they see.
inspire.author: Leonardo H. Bandeira

inspire.quote: Prophets are geniuses. Not of teaching some useless superstitions, but of conquering the hearts and bending the minds.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: There will come a time when we would all be gone and so will the memories of us ever existing but the only thing that will still stay behind is the energy that we created while being on earth.
inspire.author: Nidhi Manikoth

inspire.quote: I used to worry about tomorrow.....Until I realized how much it was screwing up today
inspire.author: Wendy  Rae

inspire.quote: Be like fire; burn the non-essential.
inspire.author: Pranay

inspire.quote: Vivekananda used to say that it's the subtle which influences everything in our life.
inspire.author: Pranay

inspire.quote: Those who stand in the way of justice are not the best company to keep.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Leading a life of contribution. If you look within yourself, you will and discover you have great Potentials the World is waiting for.
inspire.author: Josephine Horladapo

inspire.quote: We are becoming more spiritual, in our minds, but in reality, it is the opposite of spiritually that is practised by the mystics.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: In reality, all religions only pray in the Name of God. Because no one truly knows His Name.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You are required to pray, meditate and practice whatever you have been teaching to others.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Every prayer must be accompanied with action, otherwise, you will be basing your whole life upon expectations.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: My paper is a bed for wounded souls. My pen is a needle for fixing the wounds. And my words are the healing medicine.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Once you know yourself, then you do not need a mediator between you and God.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Since the prophets have full confidence in the divine One, you must put full energy on the improvement of your soul.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Boldness is something that you cannot take away from the prophets and geniuses.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The main job of the prophets is to guide and re-kindle the lost souls from going astray.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You should meditate and dedicate your entire life to the Creator.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The task of the teacher has come to an end and it is the right time for the student to outshine the master.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The final call was that man is the creator of his miseries and those calamities can be turned into benefits by simply, knowing your worth in life.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: By putting your mind into action, you can simply achieve anything that you keep craving for.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You are not a god, but part of the Most High.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You are complete as a man or as a woman. In other words, you have been given everything that is required of you to live in this world.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: It is only the vulgar people who will imagine religion to be the main enemy of science.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Being in a relationship, isn't just about getting kisses and hugs, it's about having Someone to care for; Someone to be there for you in hard times; Someone to laugh with; Someone to trust and believe in.
inspire.author: SKYLAR BLUE

inspire.quote: Our words have tremendous power to speak life or death to others, however, we are accountable to God for the words we choose to speak.
inspire.author: Julie Thomas

inspire.quote: Since the tree is useless on its own without the support of the roots, you must help out your fellow friend to keep humanity alive throughout every generation.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Love is not an evil nor good thing, it is neutral.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: From birth to death, love is the motto of every living being.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Even the devils love their own kind and, they cannot be evil to themselves.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: For love is beautiful only when you have mastered your emotions and mind.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You are living for the sake of love and your life is not free from wanting more love or pleasure to yourself.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: We all need someone or a helping hand in times of need.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: We are one with the angels, even though you claim that you are just a mere mortal.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You can still reach the level of the angels by doing great deeds in your daily life.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Let no mortal man tells you that your dreams are not feasible and sometimes not even nature because nature own laws have been defied on various occasions to achieve what seemed impossible.
inspire.author: ERIC BOAHEN

inspire.quote: Indeed, if you reach out to others, that is the main definition of humanity in a nutshell.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: For abundant freedom will be achieved only when the body is destroyed, and the soul is placed first before everything else.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Instead of focusing on all the negative and the things that you cannot do. Start focusing on the positive and all the things you can do.
inspire.author: Julie Thomas

inspire.quote: You cannot define anything that is beyond your sight and imagination.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Some people are like moths. They come to be around you when your life is bright and nice. They come to amuse themselves through your light. But, they also flee as soon as the lights go off.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: However hard is the soil of the sand, the flower which is supposed to sprout will sprout.
inspire.author: Aiyaz Uddin

inspire.quote: Tôi là ai, là do tôi định nghĩa, bằng tư duy, suy nghĩ, và hành động mang niềm vui, hạnh phúc cho đời. Khi thoát ra khỏi những thị phi, so đo, mong cầu vốn rất hẹp hòi, tôi tìm thấy hành trình đầy sắc màu và bao la nắng gió. Vũ trụ vẫn ở đây cùng vô số những món quà diệu kỳ nho nhỏ. Ai đó sẽ vấp vào khi tâm đã nở hoa.
inspire.author: Nguyễn Phi Vân

inspire.quote: The mind might become forgetful of great deeds, but the soul does not forget anything that it considers to be beautiful and good.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Remember, we are all blind when it comes to love, or at the time of choosing our life partners.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The only disadvantage of life is to come in contact with someone who does not know when and how to put their self-interest behind the closed doors.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You are offered a chance to live and enjoy yourself in this world, but sooner or later, death will come knocking on your door.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: I SHALL JOIN YOUR PURPOSE, NOT YOU. IT WOULD BE DIFFICULT TO HATE ME.मैं आपसे नहीं आपके मक़सद से जुडूंगा। मुझसे नफ़रत करना नामुमकिन होगा
inspire.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

inspire.quote: Either fill pitchers or live by the river
inspire.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

inspire.quote: The Future we dream The future we envisionThe future we anticipateWon’t happen magically But will requires every bit and byte of our works.Always, let’s remember to acknowledge and trust God at all material times of the whole process.
inspire.author: ERIC BOAHEN

inspire.quote: For years, measuring herself against others less tolerant, she’d thought of herself as a kind and good person, even generous. It occurred to her that she’d been using an imperfect measuring stick.⁣
inspire.author: Samantha St. Claire

inspire.quote: Never remain silent for the comfort of others.
inspire.author: Unknown

inspire.quote: Give without expecting any worldly reward here on Earth.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: World-peaceCan be achievedWhen the power of loveReplacesThe love of power.
inspire.author: Sri Chimnoy

inspire.quote: You were camouflaged snakes-in-the-grass.
inspire.author: Charlena E.  Jackson

inspire.quote: If your today is not better than yesterday, your best is yet to come.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: Emotions, or rather feelings, cannot be felt by an individual without the presence of the mind.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Only a few speak out against injustices. And, it's okay. History shows that it only takes a few to change the world.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Limitations answer only to imaginations. What is yields only to what is imagined.
inspire.author: Abiodun Fijabi

inspire.quote: If I can inspire one being ;I am the whole being.
inspire.author: Madhushree Das

inspire.quote: The world is not a wish granting factory.
inspire.author: John Green

inspire.quote: Dig more and construct what will remain hidden, Hide less and Exhibit what remains to be shown!!
inspire.author: s.g.writes

inspire.quote: The God of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob is a God of the living, who mingles with our acquaintances and colleagues. If we open ourselves to life as the arena of divine self-disclosure, we may find the Lord who undergirds our lives with the certainty of dignity and value at any point in our experience.
inspire.author: Wilkie Au

inspire.quote: Every strong household requires strong foundations to function well.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You must allow your spirit to explore the elements beyond the senses and be prepared for any outcome.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: A believer is similar to a restless soldier in an endless battle.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: In religion, you are fighting with an invisible enemy or perhaps, your mindset and the power of your imagination.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Religion is not a form of destruction in itself, but a blessing to those who have faith within them.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The sun is standing all alone and it is dependent upon itself in almost the same manners as we claim that the Creator is self-dependent.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Never engage in arguments to prove yourself—let your work and success speak for themselves!
inspire.author: Samuel Asumadu-Sarkodie

inspire.quote: Sleeping is like hitting a reset button of thoughts, thus, generating fresh ideas and getting a sense of relaxation at the end.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You are responsible for your actions and sins, in the same manner as you believe that you are responsible for your own life.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: When you express your thoughts be it through talking or through writing, your mind becomes clear & cool!
inspire.author: Akhilesh Bhagwat

inspire.quote: You want to be this you want to be that, when are you going to accept yourself as who you are!
inspire.author: Akhilesh Bhagwat

inspire.quote: When someone forgives you, you have to also forgive yourself.
inspire.author: Coleen Innis

inspire.quote: Get into the habit of asking yourself, "Does this support the life I'm trying to create?
inspire.author: Kristi Ling Spencer

inspire.quote: He who finds a way finds his purpose.
inspire.author: Marcia M Edwards

inspire.quote: Positivity is negativity repellent.
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: Tomorrow's dreams are a result of today's actions.
inspire.author: Raymond C Nolan

inspire.quote: Being Human is not easy for all Humans.
inspire.author: C V Singh

inspire.quote: Saying the time hasn’t arrived doesn’t always work. Everything depends on your determination. If it’s good for you, do it right away. Keep in mind that, time won’t determine success, but your efforts, does.
inspire.author: SoulWanderer_

inspire.quote: You said: "I’ll go to another country, go to another shore,find another city better than this one.Whatever I try to do is fated to turn out wrongand my heart lies buried like something dead.How long can I let my mind moulder in this place?Wherever I turn, wherever I look,I see the black ruins of my life, here,where I’ve spent so many years, wasted them, destroyed them totally."You won’t find a new country, won’t find another shore.This city will always pursue you.You’ll walk the same streets, grow oldin the same neighborhoods, turn gray in these same houses.You’ll always end up in this city. Don’t hope for things elsewhere:there’s no ship for you, there’s no road.Now that you’ve wasted your life here, in this small corner,you’ve destroyed it everywhere in the world.
inspire.author: C. P. CAVAFY

inspire.quote: You have got nothing to fear except the ignorance of your intelligence or lack of knowledge.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The proper way of giving charity is to give only to those who are truly in need.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: This is a time when all of God's people need to keep their eyes and their Bibles wide open. We must ask God for discernment as never before.
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: على الرغم من اننى مازلت اتذكر التعصب فى حادثة جامعة برنستون, فغايتى ان استمر فى عملى بجد و عزيمة و اخلاص لأحقق هدفى فى نهاية الأمر.. و ربما استطيع بذلك تغيير رأى هؤلاء الناس بمرور الزمن, و أما اذا وقفت مكتوف الايدى متذمرا, او اندب حظى و أرثى لحالى فعندئذ لن احقق شيئا و لن اتقدم خطوة الى الأمام.
inspire.author: أحمد زويل

inspire.quote: What if man is not really a scoundrel, man in general, I mean, the whole race of mankind-then all the rest is prejudice, simply artificial terrors and there are no barriers and it's all as it should be.
inspire.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

inspire.quote: Because..." he used to cradle his daughter in his arms every morning and often they would exchange soft nuances "...if you can dream it, if you can see it in your visions at night, if you can feel it in your soul, it’s yours! And it never really belonged to anyone else, in the first place! It was always yours!" Viera returned her scroll to the drawer and closed it, she kissed the compass around her neck and climbed into her bed under the warm quilts, the candle flame crackled and the memories of her father’s arms around her embraced her there in bed and his deep, hoarse voice resounded in her ears; "... and if you chance upon a treasure that is yours and it happens to be in the possession of someone else, it’s not very wrong to take what is yours, to take what you dreamed, what you saw in your visions at night, what you felt visit you in your spirit! Sure, it’s not lawful, but aye aye my little one, listen to me when I tell you that the best things in life are not under the laws of any sort! For which law created love? Which law created courage? The best things, the real things, are the things that are not measured by any man’s laws! Fear is the only thing that any law has ever created! And what kind of pirates would we all be if we were afraid of any of our fears, even a little!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Denying yourself a life of personal freedom is denying yourself of a life worth living.
inspire.author: Michelle D. Rosado

inspire.quote: I am going to open myself up to all that is superior in the world and beyond and I am going to spend time trying to take delight in things! Not finding ruin in them! If the ruin of you is what you look for, the ruin of you is what you are going to find!
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Courage is living by the free will that one creates for themselves, not the life of monotony determined by another.
inspire.author: Michelle D. Rosado

inspire.quote: Edine meje v tvojem življenju so tiste, ki si jih postaviš sam.
inspire.author: Robin S. Sharma

inspire.quote: The tide was a poem that only time could create, and I watched it stream and brim and makes its steady dash homeward, to the ocean.
inspire.author: Pat Conroy

inspire.quote: If you have put your faith in Christ and have spent significant time in the Word of God, the tough times can be like a magnet that draws you to the Lord Jesus. Nothing is going to happen - ever - that will catch Jesus Christ by surprise. He is able to help His children work through anything, and not a single thing is going to happen in the future that can change that fact.
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: When you don't know what the answer is, you know *Who* the answer is.
inspire.author: Larry Burkett

inspire.quote: Let yourself be enchanted in small ways.
inspire.author: Guy Kawasaki

inspire.quote: Just remember, the difference between being good versus being great is just a few points, inches, or seconds.
inspire.author: Bruce H. Jackson

inspire.quote: My study of prophecy convinces me that God intends knowledge of future events to help us "occupy" with a sense of urgency until the Lord returns.
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: the holiest place on earth is where an ancient hatred has become apresent love.
inspire.author: A Course in Miracles

inspire.quote: Sreča pride z dobro presojo, dobra presoja pride z izkušnjami in izkušnje pridejo s slabo presojo.
inspire.author: Robin S. Sharma

inspire.quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You have to set yourself on fire.
inspire.author: Arnold H. Glasnow

inspire.quote: If you buy an egg thinking it's a goose's egg, and when it hatches it is actually a bird of paradise; no manner of convincing and reproach will turn the bird of paradise into a goose. Even if you make it go to goose church and goose school and eat goose feeds and only hang out with geese! In the end, it will still belong to paradise.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: When you are like the tree, there is oneness with the Earth, Sun and Moon, but still steadfast in your purpose.
inspire.author: Michelle D. Rosado

inspire.quote: What He said He would do He always did, and the things we already see fulfilled in His Word simply remind us that what He said about the future will take place just as surely.
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: Do you know why I believe in the Lord Jesus and what He says? Because He has proved to me that He has my best interests at heart. What could He do that He did not do? He already gave His life for us (Romans 5:8-10; 8:32)
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: God is as real as a station wagon.
inspire.author: Peggy Payne

inspire.quote: We can remove the veil that shrouds our understanding and made us forget who we truly are. When we understand the core self and live from the core self, the myth of separation, concepts of separation, color, religion, class, intelligence…all these fade away. We are not our color. We are not our religion. We are not our sexual preference. We are human beings. We are spiritual beings.
inspire.author: Cassandra Blizzard

inspire.quote: If you have put your faith in Christ and have spent significant time in the Word of God, the tough times can be like a magnet that draws you to the Lord Jesus.
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: Each of us has a vulnerability like Edmund's that Satan is eager to exploit. It may be something addictive like drugs or alcohol, or it may be something seemingly harmless and perhaps even good like food, friendship, or work.
inspire.author: Discovery House Publishers

inspire.quote: [Jesus] not only kept Himself from engaging in evil, He also continually acted in ways that honored and glorified god. He not only continually avoided the negative, He always pursued the positive.
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: Amid the thousands of shrill voices screaming for our attention, there is but on Voice we need to hear. The voice of the Lord Jesus Christ.
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: [Christ] will come again. But we must look to Scripture, not human thought, for our guide to preparing.
inspire.author: David Jeremiah

inspire.quote: decision is of the mind not of the mouth also determination is of the heart not of the head- Golden Life Foundation
inspire.author: Chris C Nwakanma

inspire.quote: ISE LO GUN ISE.
inspire.author: RIDWAN AKOTUN

inspire.quote: You just need to be inside your own bubble far from reality & just believe in your dreams!
inspire.author: Akhilesh Bhagwat

inspire.quote: Remember don't just agree with what's written thinker from your perspective as well, at the end it's what works for you !
inspire.author: Akhilesh Bhagwat

inspire.quote: Above every cloud is the brightest sunshine
inspire.author: Joy Madden

inspire.quote: What’s there to think about? I say we make a choice here and now on this crusty shell-patterned couch. Will we live the lives they want us to live? Or will we blaze our own trails and set sail? Let’s at least give it a shot before we can only wish we had. We can always come back and get a real job and start again.
inspire.author: Joey Gnarly

inspire.quote: The possibility of anything happening amplified the feeling of freedom, not knowing what might happen next.
inspire.author: Joey Gnarly

inspire.quote: I have zero dollars,’ I said confidently.
inspire.author: Joey Gnarly

inspire.quote: I have zero dollars, I said confidently.
inspire.author: Joey Gnarly

inspire.quote: Check your attitude. Raise the bar. Beat your best efforts. You have much more in you than you are willing to admit.
inspire.author: Abiodun Fijabi

inspire.quote: Whenever I’m about to do something, I think, "Would an idiot do that?" And if they would, I do not do that thing.
inspire.author: Dwight Schrute

inspire.quote: You make your decisions. Your decisions make you.
inspire.author: Abiodun Fijabi

inspire.quote: Artists usually do well without classroom education. Because we follow what our hearts tell us, and rarely what the textbook says.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Victim-shaming is not okay. Maybe people should shame those who remain silent when witnessing abuse against others.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: The most rewarding journey you can ever embark on is the journey yo your Self
inspire.author: Sandra Cooze

inspire.quote: we all have holes in our live and we all have holes in our hearts, maybe maybe not one day we will all find what we are looking for.
inspire.author: Philip Yaro Laari

inspire.quote: we all have holes in our lives and we all have holes in our hearts, maybe maybe not one day we will all find what we are looking for
inspire.author: Philip Yaro Laari

inspire.quote: Collide into challenges. It's a place to rise up from.
inspire.author: Hiral Nagda

inspire.quote: It was only through enduring winter that I finally learned: no matter what cold comes my way, no matter how long and dark the days may grow—there is hope waiting for me around the corner. There is sunlight waiting for me to set it free from within. There is beauty in breakage, and there is love after loss.
inspire.author: Kirsten Robinson

inspire.quote: I hope you choose love. Even when it would be easier to hate. When someone stirs white-hot rage within you, when they insult you, when they question your worth: be loving. Some people need your love more than you do.
inspire.author: Kirsten Robinson

inspire.quote: There is no greater burden than to be cursed with knowledge.
inspire.author: Robert Kerr

inspire.quote: There is no greater burden than to be cursed with knowledge.
inspire.author: Robert Anthony Kerr

inspire.quote: Leave yesterday’s emotional baggage behind and live your best life today. Tomorrow is never ours!
inspire.author: George Pornaris

inspire.quote: Do not doubt in darkness what you believed in times of light.
inspire.author: Lynette Noni

inspire.quote: The search for truth is the light that guides me.
inspire.author: Wendy  Rae

inspire.quote: Life is a dance. All you need to do is find your rhythm.
inspire.author: Sandra Cooze

inspire.quote: You can’t set sail without hoisting your anchor first
inspire.author: Sandra Cooze

inspire.quote: The most rewarding journey you can ever embark on is the journey to your Self
inspire.author: Sandra Cooze

inspire.quote: The crisis is there. The crisis is not in the world, it is not the nuclear war, it is not the terrible divisions and the brutality that isgoing on. The crisis is in our consciousness, the crisis is what we are, what we have become.
inspire.author: J KRISHNAMURTI

inspire.quote: There is the sorrow of disease, there is the sorrow that man feels in complete isolation. There is the sorrow of poverty when you see all these poor, ignorant, dirty, hopeless people. There is sorrow when you see all the animals of the world being killed, destroyed, butchered in laboratories.

"Little" responses like that add up in the movie of our life. We don’t really get to play the martyr anymore, but that’s a great role to give up. Better to play the happy star of our own show.

inspire.quote: My desire for a better world, which treats women and children in a good manner, will not change. So, you may remain in the misjudgemnt of me, it adds nothing to my cause.

inspire.quote: Success is the purposeful progress of a meaningful idea.

inspire.quote: To be fearful about tomorrow is to lose your peace and joy.

inspire.quote: Our purpose will surface when passion meets service.

inspire.quote: You have grown a backbone where your wishbone used to be. You have learned how to say no, you have learned how to walk away. Do you remember when they broke you? inspire.quote: In order to understand the concept of success, first understand the value of time.

inspire.quote: Death is our best motivator in life. The idea of dying or not seeing the sun tomorrow will keep you up on your toes.

inspire.quote: I really am sorry," Tad explains. "I just want to belong. A frog who can’t eat flies—it just feels so wrong."Being different can be hard, but, you’ll figure it out somehow. Someday, you may find it’s a gift,even if you don’t think so right now."How would you know?" Tad’s eyes fill with tears."Because, I’m allergic to honey—have been for years! Since I couldn’t make honey like other bees do, I trained as a Medic, and now I get to help you!

inspire.quote: A woman of understanding does not allow people to push her around because she understands what she wants.
