inspire.quote: I'm a project. I manage myself. I'm a project manager.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: A caring woman can easily take care of herself and those around her.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: Prayer is helpful. It will help you feel peaceful.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: The man, tall with dignity and pride, looks toward his wife. She reaches across the table with her gnarled, old, hand longing for the touch of his hand. Their hands contain memories of being lovers and helpers over a lifetime. Their eyes have seen plenty; the children growing and the world changing around them, so many memories.
inspire.author: Lisa C.  Miller

inspire.quote: Make Your Living Rich,Not Bank Accounts.
inspire.author: Ravevx

inspire.quote: I am a writer. I am in the business of healing people through my writing. I want to heal people with my words. My slogan is: writing to heal millions of people.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Keep your focus on what you are becoming, not your current circumstances.
inspire.author: Bohdi Sanders

inspire.quote: Toughest of competition brings the best in you.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: Stop dwelling in the past and worrying about what can go wrong in your life, and get excited about the future and what can go right in your life.
inspire.author: Cliff Hannold

inspire.quote: Crisis is the portal to new opportunity
inspire.author: Samarpan

inspire.quote: Calmness comes when a person is face to face with oneself. Tenderness and whispers are signs of nearness while shouting and screaming signals distance
inspire.author: Samarpan

inspire.quote: The ability to read, write, and analyze; the confidence to stand up and demand justice and equality; the qualifications and connections to get your foot in that door and take your seat at that table – all of that starts with education. And trust me, girls around the world, they understand this. They feel it in their bones, and they will do whatever it takes to get that education.
inspire.author: Michelle Obama

inspire.quote: Every day is a new life to a wise man.
inspire.author: Anonymous                     .

inspire.quote: We need to diversify our world to get the maximum of what it has to offer.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Life is like a vapor. It is like a puff of smoke. It is here for a little while, then it is gone. If you were called into eternity today, would you be ready?
inspire.author: James       Collins

inspire.quote: You see most people don’t believe that miracles still exist. They believe those things ended with the disciples. I will gladly tell them our story and let them see that God is still working. Through all of my struggle and pain I want people to know that when we look at the storm of life and become afraid, God is there protecting us from the winds and lighting.
inspire.author: Andrew Golden

inspire.quote: To live in the moment... is the onlyfootprint one must follow..
inspire.author: Oglala Lakota- Hinhan Wakangli

inspire.quote: If you want to get rid of all your problems and pain, then simply kill all your desire.
inspire.author: Param Agarwal

inspire.quote: A Magical vision, uplifting mind's perennial quest,while numberless shadows obscured the words flow.why must a Writer stop the play,for he has a cascade of stories and reasons to throw.
inspire.author: Nithin Purple

inspire.quote: If you can accomplish it in your power, it isn’t big enough. Dig deeper.
inspire.author: Taneka Rubin

inspire.quote: Fear has a way of disguising itself as protection.
inspire.author: Taneka Rubin

inspire.quote: Life is an unfinished task.
inspire.author: Martin Stepek

inspire.quote: Trust the currents of your life, listen to the sound of the wind, let go and surrender to the flow.
inspire.author: Carole D. Fontaine

inspire.quote: Some people are lucky. Their mistakes and failures remain in private mode. Some of us don't have that privilege.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Being strong means crying or breaking down when it hurts. But also remaining with the hope that tomorrow can bring a positive outcome.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: The united strength of a society is mirrored through the vulnerable community it feeds.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Celebrate the life you have and never give up on the living...
inspire.author: @AnonymousXgHOST

inspire.quote: When I was six, God gave my mother cancer. I begged him not to take her from me. He did not, he gave me 51 years to get to know the most amazing person I've ever met.It's a double-edged sword.It's not always Fair. But that's not what's important. The only thing that is important is that 51 years.My mother used to say every morning. "Any day your breathing it's a good day to be alive."So, Celebrate the life you have and never give up on the living...
inspire.author: @AnonymousXgHOST

inspire.quote: Gloomy, the small bird you were, slow and low,before just flying to the crown of Hill,with mended Errors and your accomplished songs.
inspire.author: Nithin Purple

inspire.quote: Everyone is good at something. The problem is that most follow others on their path and they don't walk in their own path to find what they are good at.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: Train Your Brain To Reflect ConsciousnessLet anybody teach any religion, you can practice all that in the daytime, but if you want to fall asleep the only religion you have to follow is Hinduism, nothing else will teach you to fall asleep! Any amount of any sized bed you can buy, pills you can swallow, only Vedic tradition can give you rest; because falling asleep is an action, it is not collapsing on the bed as you have been taught from the beginning. Your buddhi (intellect) needs to be powerful. Your buddhi will be powerful whole day if you keep your body and intellect powerful. Whole day if you are acting, alive, not entertaining the boredom and tiredness, then just you can stretch your body, it will fall into Samadhi, it will fall into the state of Yoga Nidra.
inspire.author: -KAILASA's SPH JGM Nithyananda Paramashivam

inspire.quote: For most of my life, I’ve felt homeless, left out in the cold, to starve and die. But I found something without even searching for it. A life-line threw out to me in the depths of my drowning. ‘Words’ I swallowed them and they restored my body. If you look closely I am no one fragments of a soul, a person, broken.They built me up, there is no me without them, every thought, every cell are words a mix. They take root in me, warm my soul, and gave me a home.
inspire.author: awakeningthewriter

inspire.quote: Pebbles don't get waterlogged even after drowning in a waterfall for thousands of years.–Kazi Nazrul Islam
inspire.author: Kazi Nazrul Islam

inspire.quote: Want to transform your Life? Just shift focus from lack to gratitude!
inspire.author: Kanika Saxena

inspire.quote: You know, Ahmed, I'm not looking for a job. I'm looking for fulfillment. And for me, there are only two ingredients: knowing that my work means something for others, and the company's culture.
inspire.author: Hamza Zaouali

inspire.quote: C. Y. Croc knows that like art, stories can be subjective. What can be appealing for one person can be unappealing to another.She hopes you have a happy few hours getting lost in her art! ; )
inspire.author: C.Y. Croc

inspire.quote: The Beauty of Inspiration's kiss someway forbidden to reach the thoughtful Dreamer, for unbelieving the Lying lips of a cold- hearted World, hiding from behind to Dispirit his Orgasmic Imagination.
inspire.author: Nithin Purple

inspire.quote: There is coming a time when many disasters will come, saith the Lord! In my vision, the Lord said, 'Surely, they will look to Me to change things around. But I am looking for them to change their minds to come to Me and be saved, so I can be their God and Savior.
inspire.author: Don Bourdeaux

inspire.quote: Please remember, these homeless or long-term unemployed people were not born this way, they had an accident that brought them to where they are today. Allow them to one day tell the story of this perfect stranger who changed their life without asking for anything in return.
inspire.author: Hamza Zaouali

inspire.quote: Enlightened beings, they become one with the Cosmos, that is the ultimate experience, but not final, because Ultimate itself is constantly alive, not carved in stone! Ultimate is not carved in stone, it is a powerful happening. It is a constant happening! Every time I fall into Samadhi, I just know I am pregnant with billions of planets. I am just pregnant with billions of planets. Understand, when I say I am pregnant with billions of planets, means, I am constantly delivering, delivering, delivering. Swallowing billions and delivering billions. Infinity! Cosmos, is a happening. It is not a dead state. It is a alive, living, happening!~Ishavasya Upanishad
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Any stagnation is disease. Body, if you are able to bend 40 degree, make it at least 41 next day, don’t stagnate. Mind, if you are able to understand some concepts for five minutes, make it at least into 6 minutes next day. Killing all parts of stagnation in you by the constant inspiration and excitement is seeking.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Seek about everything, you have a right! You have a right to question the whole Cosmos! I am giving you a simple secret, simple secret, listen: if you have a stomach pain, don’t try to think "why there is stomach pain, what did I eat, is it indigestion, gastric, what is the reason, why am I having?" Don’t think that way. Try to ask, "why, first of all, this very habit of eating and digesting?" Start questioning the roots, you will be declared as rebellion by Cosmos, all your needs will be met. It is a child cries loud gets attention first!
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: Jesus came into the world and through giving himself up in death, broke the curse of death and opened the door to eternal life.
inspire.author: Thurman L. Faison

inspire.quote: Forgiveness is the greatest gift of God to us.
inspire.author: Thurman L. Faison

inspire.quote: Go to God and put your trust in HimAsk for guidance and listen; let Him show you the way
inspire.author: Louise Bélanger

inspire.quote: Your consistency must outlast the world's ignorance of who you truly are.
inspire.author: Dr. Billy Alsbrooks

inspire.quote: That's where you're wrong, Avery." Carlo's kindness danced in those hazel eyes. "You always have a choice.
inspire.author: A.J.  Rosen

inspire.quote: Sometimes it takes a broken frame to see the bigger picture.
inspire.author: Dean Cocozza

inspire.quote: You are an asshole.
inspire.author: Bill Gates

inspire.quote: The stumbling block of man is his ignorance as to where God’s power truly resides. He looks externally for the keys to his freedom, not knowing that the means to his liberation are already within him.
inspire.author: Dr. Billy Alsbrooks

inspire.quote: Unity is not a myth. It's a progressive action.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Black people, you must remember that you're not alone in the pursuit of equality.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Don't look for someone to make you happy. Look for someone to be happy with you.
inspire.author: David Solomon Hooker

inspire.quote: A STRONG MIND AND A STRONG HEARTWILL TAKE YOU A LONG WAY.
inspire.author: David Solomon Hooker

inspire.quote: True love is hard to find because your looking for it.Real love finds you.
inspire.author: David Solomon Hooker

inspire.quote: I know of a doorway to another world. It waits beneath your skull, behind your eyes. The key must be forged from scratch, smelted in passion and hardened by knowledge.
inspire.author: A.L. Exley

inspire.quote: UBUNTU - I am because we are, and because we are, you are.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Nyamayaro

inspire.quote: Whenever a temptation arises in your mind, resistance to it also arises. If you accept both temptation and resistance, you will become free from both. If you go with resistance alone, temptation will become stronger.
inspire.author: Shunya

inspire.quote: I'm fascinated by the idea of walking past a piece of art because you can't see it with the naked eye. Imagine all the times you've told yourself, Oh, it's nothing.Well, nothing can be pretty goddamned big.
inspire.author: Jodi Picoult

inspire.quote: The first step towards success is to Detox Emotionally. A person full of bitterness has no room for prosperity.
inspire.author: Dr. Billy Alsbrooks

inspire.quote: We're promoting progressive thinking. New ways of doing things. A new world. In fact, we're breaking down the walls and barriers that we find between humans.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: As Africans we must uplift each other.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Nyamayaro

inspire.quote: When we uplift others, we in turn uplift ourselves.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Nyamayaro

inspire.quote: It wasn’t until my feet were where they needed to be that I could do what I was called to do.
inspire.author: Michael Jr.

inspire.quote: Many of us make progress because of criticism. While some get paralysed by it.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: A healthy state of mind of a society, is strengthened through the inhancement of positive and effective social support systems.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: What we share is more powerful than what divides us.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Nyamayaro

inspire.quote: If one of us is unwell, then none of us is well.
inspire.author: Elizabeth Nyamayaro

inspire.quote: My children will know that I stood for something positive. They will know that I used my writing to heal broken hearts. And that I did it because I wanted to make this world a better place. That's the legacy I give to humanity.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: I don’t just speak diversity, I actually live it.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: being imperfect is the perfect thing to be.
inspire.author: anonymous

inspire.quote: We are agents of love. We heal through positive words. We are friends of the truth. We love justice. We strive for fairness and equality. And we know that with these tools, we will heal millions of people.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: True love exists. The people who disagree are the ones who have not experienced it. We wish them healing.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: You are denying the existence of true love. Because you've never experienced it. It is easy to not believe in a topic when you lack knowledge in it.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: We are always in the middle of change, and our dailychoices, work, relationships, and other aspects of our lives affect our collective future.
inspire.author: Dele Ola

inspire.quote: Life is sweeter with a little romance.
inspire.author: Bridgette Tell

inspire.quote: The present is the key that we have to the future. Today is the future that we changed yesterday.
inspire.author: Dele Ola

inspire.quote: READ and WRITE are the best GIFTS of HUMAN MIND
inspire.author: Rudraksh Agarwal

inspire.quote: Stunning beauty can be captured in a glimpse, but captivating enough to influence a lasting appreciation.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Sharing a meal can bond two people, and so does sharing a good laughter.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: You have strength in your black skin. The soulful dust in it makes you the heir of the soil.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: The absence of capital in a business will weaken its ability survive and to effectively contribute towards economic growth.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: As long you make excuses and not efforts. You won’t make money and you won’t be where you want to be in life. Make moves, not excuses or make up stories.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: Emotion Implosion By Maisie Aletha SmikleShow your emotionShow your motionShow your devotionShow your elation and frustrationNot with commotionNot with destructionBut with common senseThat makes senseAnd keep your centsWhere they belongIn your pocketsNot funding racketsMulti tax is the normEarning is taxedSpending is taxedEach time you buyYou pay tax from earnings already taxedPeople's tax foot the cost for prisonsIts occupants shelter and foodLobbyists gifts and donationsThat should be used for poverty eradication health and educationAre used for commotion extravaganza and splurgingCommotion costsWho pays? Not themOr else there would be noneShow your emotionNot an emotion implosionThat stirs up commotionAnd leads to increase taxationThey want to be richThey want people to be poorSo they levy taxes In order to get moreLand is over valued so it appears that you have moreBut that is only doneSo they can scoop up more doughAnd leave you po
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: I realised the power of the human aura through my dealings with other people. Some would measure me up, and want to compete with or against me. Whereas, some would see a leader in me. A leader whom they could trust. There were no words or actions involved. It's always the aura that shifted the atmosphere in the room.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Choose to appreciate. Appreciate what you have, life , everything and everyone around you, because in these pandemic days we are losing everything. We are losing our companies, jobs, education, money, houses, cars , family, partners, friends , freedom, social life and our lives.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: If ever there was a time that Life needed you to move through each moment as the colorful radiant Creative Intelligence that you are, it is now!
inspire.author: Corry MacDonald

inspire.quote: Let these interviews serve as a confirmation of an interest in pursuing a career in or around the European institutions, or passing the inspiration to other young professionals who stand for creating change at the EU level.
inspire.author: Lucia Kleštincová

inspire.quote: There are limits to what we can do as human beings. Especially in the field of policy-making where we face huge crises all the time, we need to accept that one individual cannot fix it all… It takes a magical combination of playfulness and mindfulness to discover not only one’s own recipe for getting out of a burnout but also to discover one’s own reasons for getting into one in the first place.
inspire.author: Lucia Kleštincová

inspire.quote: Love lives not in the shadow of doubt, like a seed it will sprout and flourish where its natured.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Unemployement not only diminishes the socioeconomic status of the affected society, but also broadens the platform for poverty.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: This river, like all rivers, remember its course
inspire.author: Brit Bennett

inspire.quote: Karanasan ang magsilbing aral sa tinatahak mong buhay.
inspire.author: Napz Cherub Pellazo

inspire.quote: We are all Warriors fighting our battles in Life!
inspire.author: Avijeet Das

inspire.quote: There's something magical and beautiful in letting go of toxic people and situations.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Don't compete with others. Get inspired by their success and efforts.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Be black. Your blackness is your strength. Above all else, remain empowered in it.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: In search of foreveryou will lose your today.
inspire.author: Parul Nigam

inspire.quote: In the name of the best within you, do not sacrifice this world to those who are its worst. In the name of the values that keep you alive, do not let your vision of man be distorted by the ugly, the cowardly, the mindless in those who have never achieved his title. Do not lose your knowledge that man’s proper estate is an upright posture, an intransigent mind and a step that travels unlimited roads. Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark, in the hopeless swamps of the approximate, the not-quite, the not-yet, the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish, in lonely frustration for the life you deserved, but have never been able to reach. Check your road and the nature of your battle. The world you desired can be won, it exists, it is real, it is possible, it’s yours.
inspire.author: Ayn Rand

inspire.quote: Friendship" does not spell "Friend cheap
inspire.author: Wisdom  Ogbe

inspire.quote: Don't Think YouCan't Do It OrHave No Time,JUST START!
inspire.author: Ravevx

inspire.quote: The first step to success is: eliminate the fear of failure.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Don't make someone else's life your benchmark.
inspire.author: Todd Stocker

inspire.quote: Don't ever doubt yourself, Power up and exceed your expectations.
inspire.author: Brajesh Kumar Singh

inspire.quote: We are living in a fear epidemic, stoked in part by a 24/7 media that makes tragedies from around the world seem part of our everyday experience, or makes a global pandemic appear to be crouching at our door. We live in a time of great uncertainty, when important things that we once thought we could rely upon, like a job for life, have been taken from us. Perhaps not since World War II has a generation been exposed to such uncertainty and fear. The causes may be different, but the effects can be the same. In such a time as this, if you want to live your life free from fear then remind yourself, every day, that your shepherd is with you, every step of the way. Trust in him, your shepherd is with you always, and he is mighty to save.
inspire.author: David  Knott

inspire.quote: Learn to differentiate between appreciating what you have and settling for less than you deserve
inspire.author: Musawenkosi Nyathi

inspire.quote: Everyone has a dream.The ambitious make that dream a goal.The motivated build a plan.The successful execute.
inspire.author: Mark Harari

inspire.quote: I have a sticky note on my desk with a quote written on it that I read somewhere. I don’t remember where I read it or who said it. I catch myself reading it sometimes. "Comfort my lonely soul and still my trembling heart." For someone to say that means I’m not the only one who feels lonely.
inspire.author: Sabrina Cammack

inspire.quote: Pieces of life are like a jigsaw puzzle. The job you got laid off from—that piece didn’t fit. When you move from your home you thought was a forever home—that piece didn’t fit. The time I bought a fern for the second time and it still died in a new place in my yard—that piece didn’t fit. From big pieces to little pieces, what doesn’t fit God’s plan won’t fit your plans.
inspire.author: Sabrina Cammack

inspire.quote: Plans are only as good as the actions behind them.
inspire.author: Todd Stocker

inspire.quote: I chose to be a scribe of our day, of hope or pain, of faith or a lack of faith, of sharp true words or of immeasurable falsehood.
inspire.author: Jean Mello

inspire.quote: How many different schools and educational resources are there to continue educating the elite, while other children live with sale of drugs and violence in the classroom? How can we talk about civilization?
inspire.author: Jean Mello

inspire.quote: I am sorry to know that rarity, the shortage of people who still give wings to their dreams is more and more common in our days. Even with all this counter current, I never let the impossible die within me. I hope and wish you do the same.
inspire.author: Jean Mello

inspire.quote: With full awareness that food is still lacking for many families, knowing also there is no shortage of solidarity in families on the outskirts, I see a large number of people taking non-perishable foods to churches to be donated to required people. Gradually, with very little, in the middle of ocean of difficulties a droplet sprouts in each heart. I can see an inexhaustible source of kindness and love in helping others.
inspire.author: Jean Mello

inspire.quote: The words around you just want to fool you. Listen, first of all, to strength of what your conscience says. Do not want to cross the desert more than once for lack of discernment.
inspire.author: Jean Mello

inspire.quote: The only time you lose...is when you give up . So don't give up because it's the American way!
inspire.author: Timothy Pina

inspire.quote: A Great teacher is that who can pass a paragraph in such a way that surroundings are awaken! where as a good teacher might possess knowledge but struggle to deliver!
inspire.author: DiptanshuG

inspire.quote: It is not enough to fail; others must succeed.
inspire.author: Liam Bright

inspire.quote: Dear future wife, I am not looking for a domestic worker, i am looking for a vision partner to fulfill my purpose on earth.
inspire.author: Khuliso Mamathoni

inspire.quote: You are on this planet because God called you to be here. Follow your call and live the life you were created to live.
inspire.author: Dianne Sealy-Skerritt

inspire.quote: It takes only one event in life , then your whole life changes completely. That even it doesn’t find you . You find it by going out there and doing something, not by just sitting and doing nothing.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: It takes only one event in life , then your whole life changes completely. That event, it doesn’t find you . You find it by going out there and doing something, not by just sitting and doing nothing.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: THE CONSCIOUS CONCLUSIONS YOU ARRIVE FORMS THE BASIS OF YOUR LIFE. THE CONSCIOUS CONCLUSIONS YOU ARRIVE IS THE SOURCE OF YOUR FUTURE.
inspire.author: Paramahamsa Nithyananda

inspire.quote: The story goes from a man to a woman, From strong love to weak compassion,From strong arms to feeble almsFrom smouldering eyes to a forest fire calm
inspire.author: Snehashree Mandal

inspire.quote: Don't judge a book by it's cover.
inspire.author: Unknown Author

inspire.quote: Betrayal is very sour. Moreso when the one you've been trusting turns out to be the one you should be fearing.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: I believe I can withstand all that I ask for,Unearth the life I desire.Pleasant things are happening,I can accomplish what I plan now.
inspire.author: Angeleen Mitchell

inspire.quote: Noi toți, într-o oarecare măsură, împrumutăm de la alții, de la cultura din jurul nostru. Ideile sunt în aer și ne însușim, uneori fără să ne dăm seama, expresiile și limbajul timpului. Limba în sine e împrumutată, nu inventată. Am găsit-o, am crescut cu ea, deși o folosim și o interpretăm în moduri foarte individuale. Problema însă nu este că "împrumutăm" sau "imităm" sau suntem "influențați" sau "lipsiți de originalitate", ci ce facem cu aceste împrumuturi sau imitații; cât de profund le asimilăm, ni le însușim, cum le combinăm cu propriile noastre experiențe, gânduri și sentimente, cum le punem în relație cu noi înșine și le exprimăm într-un fel nou, personal.
inspire.author: Oliver Sacks

inspire.quote: Pure Consciousness is all-pervasive. Even the moment you meditate, you just know. You are something more than the body, because all pervasiveness, the amount you can experience, only that much you can visualize. Please understand, physical things, for example this seat, this āsana, even if you don’t experience what it is made of and how it feels, you can see it, grasp it, but the more and more things become subtle, it’s the depth of your experience, how much you feel one with it, that much only you will know it.
inspire.author: -KAILASA's SPH JGM Nithyananda Paramashivam

inspire.quote: Let Consciousness Be Your Driving ForceWhen you feel you are Consciousness, whatever you do to you is tapas, even if you apply sandal paste on your body and take bath in the bādām milk (almond milk) and drink somarasa (heavenly nectarine drink) and lie down on the best available comforts and luxuries of the heaven, you are doing tapas. The moment you know –You Are Consciousness –whatever you do to your body is tapas, whatever you do to others is service;
inspire.author: Sri Nithyananda Paramashivam

inspire.quote: LIVE BY FAITH NOT BY FATE. KNOWING THAT ANYTHING CAN TURN AROUND IN YOUR FAVOR; IS LIVING BY FAITH NOT BY FATE!
inspire.author: Shareeda Banks

inspire.quote: It is easy to not believe in a topic when you lack knowledge in it.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Everything is, in reality, good, or in itself good, or good in respect of its results. And this goodness looks to general dominicality, all-embracing mercy, and universal manifestation.
inspire.author: Master Nursi

inspire.quote: On a delightful day, I planted a Vision, and it branched, like a Holy Basil-spread wide in the swaying mind, basking the innocent rain,and it grows unruffled and fertile in me.
inspire.author: Nithin Purple

inspire.quote: People can be strong if they know their weaknesses, people are weak if they don't know them.
inspire.author: Skylar Blue

inspire.quote: These motivators are no better or worse than pastors, or any religious leaders out there.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Has anyone ever said to you, "God never gives you more than you can bear?" Don’t you hate that? That’s because it’s not true. Sometimes, God gives us far more than we can bear so that, by our prayer and the prayer of others, we will rely on Him only, so that when God delivers us, we will be comforted. With stronger faith, we can comfort others when they are going through their own trials.
inspire.author: Bob Jennerich

inspire.quote: One never knows the time or the place when the dreams of your future will become your present and then life become so joyously blessed.
inspire.author: Ruth H. Miller

inspire.quote: It’s easy to believe that everything will be okay when everything is okay. It’s the moments where we feel like everything is crumbling before us and completely falling apart that faith proves just how powerful it is.

Voglio non vedere più queste facce, queste abitudini e questi giorni. Voglio riposare da estraneo dalla mia finzione organica. Voglio sentire arrivare il sonno come vita, non come riposo. inspire.quote: eCommerce is making tons of people millionaire, are you riding the wave?
