inspire.quote: A mirror is not a reflection of who you are. It is the reflection of how you see yourself.
inspire.author: Rhouveyzz

inspire.quote: Your preparation and excessive spending on things made today "New Year". It is all inside your mind.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: First impression only opens the door, but does not lock it.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Your definition of heaven lies wherever your self-interest and happiness dwells.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Never let the perfection of timing, stop you from speaking your desires and dreams into reality.There is no time like the present to begin the journey that will take you to your heart's desire.
inspire.author: Caterina Barregar

inspire.quote: Life is easy but life is not easy. Which message is for the mind and which one for the heart. That is the ultimate question
inspire.author: The Suited Monk

inspire.quote: Isn’t it queer how we go through life, always thinking that the things we want to do are the things that can’t be done?
inspire.author: George Orwell

inspire.quote: Right now is always the right time.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: A person who discards friends and lovers for new ones was never true to begin with.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: thou hast no more brain than I have in mine elbows; an assinego 45 may tutor thee: thou scurvy-valiant ass!
inspire.author: willy shakey

inspire.quote: Blame equals pain. Lies equal pain. Secrets equal pain. It’s as simple as that.
inspire.author: Brianne Davis

inspire.quote: We hear with our earsBut listen with our souls.
inspire.author: Laure Lacornette

inspire.quote: Sometimes your yearning for another's SUCCESS is so strong that it becomes your FAILURE.
inspire.author: SHUBHRA MOHANTY

inspire.quote: Quitting has never been an option for me... I have goals and I will never settle for a "classic" ordinary existence. I will live each day with purpose, focused upon my destination and regardless of the obstacles in my path; I will find a way to overcome them. My attitude makes the difference. When no one else believes in me, I will always choose to believe in myself.- Carla De Oliveira Agrosì & Kianu Starr
inspire.author: Carla De Oliveira Agrosì & Kianu Starr

inspire.quote: Attention is the money of the universe. What you pay attention to you buy.
inspire.author: PonyBoy Middler

inspire.quote: I am building a wall of memories.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Had supposed India was essentially unfathomable: it was too fast, too swiftly changing to yield to any categorisation. In Varanasi, however, I found a city whose spirit seemed to denote the whole.
inspire.author: Piers Moore Ede

inspire.quote: The parachute opens when you take the leap of faith.
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: We can't do everything but surely we can do something. Be a part of something that matters. Let's change the world and make it a better place.
inspire.author: Mlungisi Simelane

inspire.quote: We're always one choice, one day away from a completely different life.
inspire.author: Emily A. Myers

inspire.quote: Life is a full cycle. Most times, those who heal others have suffered before. Those who stand for justice have been ill-treated before. Those give to others have had nothing before. Struggles have a way of revealing the best people in this world.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: A negative pregnancy test still means a positive performance appraisal. It hasn't changed much.
inspire.author: SHUBHRA MOHANTY

inspire.quote: When you don't get support from others, know that you're rising above them.
inspire.author: Anita  Mishra

inspire.quote: It's better to seek contentment than excitement. The excitement is fleeting while the contentment is lasting. Introduce a bit of boredom to both scenarios to prove it.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Stop being a good girl/boy. The definition of good has changed and the world has moved ahead.
inspire.author: SHUBHRA MOHANTY

inspire.quote: Never compromise the happiness of your child to appease the egos of adults.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Death on the cross raised many doubts in the people. Having some bruises on the hands and feet. But it would've been a different story if the methods of hanging was involved. Simply, because it is the most peaceful death that doesn't involve the shedding of the blood.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Remember this: Justice and charity come before everything. In any case, what happens to us here on earth is not very important, since our true life is waiting for us above.
inspire.author: Christine Arnothy

inspire.quote: This is a door. You can close it and stay here, outside, by yourself, or you can walk through it and join them
inspire.author: Jennifer Weiner

inspire.quote: Commitment is a fundamental representation of integrity through the ability to fulfill an obligation.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: The goal is not to be better than the other man , but your previous self.
inspire.author: Dalai Lama XIV

inspire.quote: Io ho una morale molto semplice: non fare a nessuno del male o del bene. Non fare del male a nessuno, perché non solo riconosco agli altri lo stesso diritto, che penso mi spetti, di non essere disturbato, ma anche perché credo che, in materia di male nel mondo, sia sufficiente il male naturale....Non fare del bene perché non so cosa sia il bene, né so se lo faccio quando credo di farlo. Che ne so quanti danni provoco quando faccio l'elemosina? Che ne so quanti danni provoco quando educo o istruisco? Nel dubbio mi astengo. E penso inoltre che aiutare o dare spiegazioni a qualcuno sia, in un certo modo, commettere il male di intromettersi nella vita degli altri. La bontà è un capriccio del temperamento: non abbiamo il diritto di rendere gli altri vittime dei nostri capricci, anche se sono mossi da umanità o tenerezza....Ogni volta che mentre ero malato, mi sono venuti a far visita, ho patito ogni visita come un fastidio, un insulto, un'ingiustificabile violazione della mia inoppugnabile intimità....[335. 1931]
inspire.author: Fernando Pessoa

inspire.quote: I don’t want to be busy always, but I want to be productive, because being always busy doesn’t mean you are productive.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: Procrastination is the root cause of all failures.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: Перестаньте винить судьбу. Перестаньтеобвинять других. Перестаньте сваливать все на внешние обстоятельстваВы получаете ту жизнь, с которой готовы мириться.
inspire.author: Гэри Джон Бишоп

inspire.quote: I write this with confidence in that we will heal millions of people. We will do so through our writing.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: I don't talk about my vision. I show it
inspire.author: Marion Bekoe

inspire.quote: Be yourself and embrace the moment, even if others rejected you." - Avocado the Turtle
inspire.author: Kiara Shankar

inspire.quote: Asking for advice on important matter, simply means that you don't want to do it in the first place.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Leadership is a false crown when it is worn for admiration. Taken from Emotional Beauty
inspire.author: Luis E. Cavazos

inspire.quote: Failure is good only when you have time to spare, but useless if you want to get everything done on time. In reality, no one has that time to spare!
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Imperfection is the best gift we got as a human, this is how you evolve, some fails and some succeeds, but we do evolve
inspire.author: Kumar Pranay

inspire.quote: The happiest the soul gets, the easier it thrives
inspire.author: Kumar Pranay

inspire.quote: Both money and time have equal traits, the more you preserve, the less you live
inspire.author: Kumar Pranay

inspire.quote: The act of sinning is to allow your will to become rebellious, or do the things wrong that are under your own control.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: I also began to appreciate how you learn far more from defeat or during difficult times than you do from winning. I also understood that it was actually OK to make mistakes, provided you really learn from them and always try to avoid them in the future - Frank Arnesen
inspire.author: Peter Mukherjee A Few Wise Words

inspire.quote: Let go of who you think you should be and you will be free.
inspire.author: SAY Yang

inspire.quote: I google myself. Because I truly mind my own business.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: • ɪ ɴᴇᴠᴇʀ ʟᴏѕᴇ ɪ ᴇɪᴛʜᴇʀ ᴡɪɴ ᴏʀ ʟᴇᴀʀɴ "❤️
inspire.author: Neama Emad

inspire.quote: What does it take to love? I pondered.It didn't require money and it didn't require name or fame. It required just a thought.
inspire.author: Aarti Raheja

inspire.quote: Everything still exists, but it's not ours, it just is.
inspire.author: Aarti Raheja

inspire.quote: One of the main reasons why you must find something that you love doing is because it’s impossible to find success in life at anything unless you really work hard at it. And, when you’re working hard at something you really love doing, it doesn’t feel like hard work! - Frank Arnesen
inspire.author: Peter Mukherjee A Few Wise Words

inspire.quote: The world is becoming more feminine as each day pass by. We can barely see men with beard in the working places. Simply, because they wish to become more beautiful just as their wives.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Those you fear are mere mortals, deep inside they tremble as you do and would ask for your assistance if it were not for their pride
inspire.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

inspire.quote: Yang tak pernah putus adalah doa.
inspire.author: Indah Esjepe

inspire.quote: There's is no shame in being vulnerable when the world tosses you boatload of bullshit and tells you to deal with it.
inspire.author: stayonbrand

inspire.quote: You don't have to change yourself to be in a group, or for it to accept you. If you have to change yourself for its acceptance, then it's not worth your efforts.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: In your uniqueness, still learn from others. See what works for you. Learn it and use it to your advantage. Learning from others strengthens your uniqueness. It does not debilitate it.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: In the spiritual world, it's only the self-conscious individual that is considered the greatest and not the conqueror of the world. In reality, conquering temptation is the toughest task among them all.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You must create your own path if you wish to become successful in life. Meaning, you must seek for success where you believe it can't be found and not where many individuals claim it's found.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: We are only carried away by the skills of public speaking, but none of us cares about the skill of listening. Thus, learning has become a burden to many of us.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: It's not about having the time, it's about managing the time you already have.
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: I rule this land, not some wannabe trollop seeking her fortune at the expense of others. The Lion is ferocious." ~ Leonie Beaulieu
inspire.author: Charmaine Louise Shelton

inspire.quote: I have learned my lessons. I have realized that the world is real and our existence a necessity. Life and death are certainties and so are all the gamut of emotions that we experience on our journey. The earlier we accept this, the easier would it be to live. One does not learn by moving away. One learns by sticking it out and facing the truth of our fallibilities and that alone is the only way to overcome them - GS.Subbu The Diary of Mrityunjay
inspire.author: GS.Subbu

inspire.quote: I have learnt my lessons. I have realized that the world is real and our existence a necessity. Life and death are certainties and so are all the gamut of emotions that we experience on our journey. The earlier we accept this, the easier would it be to live. One does not learn by moving away. One learns by sticking it out and facing the truth of our fallibilities and that alone is the only way to overcome them
inspire.author: Gs. Subbu

inspire.quote: Stick with the wrong person long enough and they'll convince you that your flowers are weeds.
inspire.author: Kierra C.T. Banks

inspire.quote: Big elephants get stuck in small pits. Don’t lose your self-confidence when petty problems of life overwhelm you. You’re the big elephant.
inspire.author: Shunya

inspire.quote: Good people are always suspected as bad. They accept. Bad people fight silently under cover of a "good" person.
inspire.author: Nikola Mamlić

inspire.quote: Do all the good you can, by all the means you can, in all the ways you can, in all the places you can, at all the times you can, to all the people you can, as long as ever you can. That recipe will insure you of the thing that matters most at the end of the day and that is that it is more blessed to give than receive but receiving after you have given is the most rewarding feeling of all.
inspire.author: Chris J. Gregas

inspire.quote: Destiny is smiling at the people who are going to become successful, but are still struggling in the present moment.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: I get turned on when I'm challenged Excited when I'm doubted Driven when I'm underestimated I'll Succeed in everything God got me like that You'll only make me better when you do any of the above I Thank You
inspire.author: Marion Bekoe

inspire.quote: Humanity's greatest strength is it's ability to foster group compassion.
inspire.author: Jeremy Aldana

inspire.quote: Humanity's greatest strength is its ability to foster group compassion.
inspire.author: Jeremy Aldana

inspire.quote: If you look at anything in this world with an impossible eye, nothing shall be possible for you.
inspire.author: Samuel Clément

inspire.quote: living life... one brush-stroke at a time.
inspire.author: Jessica J Wohlgemuth

inspire.quote: Και αν το τέλος ξεκινά, εσύ Αουρέλια μη σιωπάς το κακό να κυνηγάς, ότι αντάλλαγμα και να ζητάς,διότι η αρχή είναι αυτή που θα δώσει το κλειδί,του πως του που και του γιατί!
inspire.author: Rafaella Anna Mpouhla

inspire.quote: When I look into the mirror, I don't see my own reflection. It is someone else. How come I changed so instantly!
inspire.author: Naser Banaqeeb

inspire.quote: Dreams are conceived yet require hard work.Hard work implies labor from conception—but Success is birthed from labor!
inspire.author: Samuel Asumadu-Sarkodie

inspire.quote: You have to become the person who deserves what you desire.
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: It is the brain that gets drunk and not the body itself.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Wine will make you whine all the day long.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You can't create stories in a vacuum.
inspire.author: Thomas C. Foster

inspire.quote: Never rush into announcing your victory when time is not set—it leads to a victim!
inspire.author: Samuel Asumadu-Sarkodie

inspire.quote: Never feel bad for being yourself.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: Opportunities are always present. You just have to go out and get it. Stop complaining and start doing.
inspire.author: Lo-Ammi Richardson

inspire.quote: Tough situations can either stunt or encourage growth.
inspire.author: Lo-Ammi Richardson

inspire.quote: Sage Yajanvalkya's advice to King Janaka: "When everything in the world fails to support you, and when nobody is around to speak to you, you must depend on the illumination that comes from within. Only then will you realize that your Self is your light and your Self your strength, and that there is nothing except your Self when everything else in the world fails.
inspire.author: Ashraf Karayath

inspire.quote: What roles do we human beings play when it comes to controlling our fates?
inspire.author: Ashraf Karayath

inspire.quote: En route to success—switching is permissible—quitting is forbidden!
inspire.author: Samuel Asumadu-Sarkodie

inspire.quote: There is no end to the learning journey. The deep-sea of ​​knowledge is before you, dive into it, and uncover the secret of success.
inspire.author: Muzamil Hussain

inspire.quote: Understanding the rules of engagement separate winners from losers!
inspire.author: Samuel Asumadu-Sarkodie

inspire.quote: This is the message that I tell myself when my back is against the wall, 'this is not my place. I'm not meant to last in this position. I'm meant to keep on moving. And there's a better place than being stuck against this wall.' Then, I twist, turn, and do everything I can to release myself from that position.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Sometimes I think that my enemies are challenging me just to help me be a great person. Because, regardless of their attempts to overthrow me, I still rise above it all. I become more resilient with each of their attempts. Obviously, they're on my team, they're just unaware of it.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: The truth is that, we are born only once; but we must live daily.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: We don't have to experience everything at first hand. Our friends' experiences are meant for us to learn from them too. Let's be wise.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: কিভাবে হবেন আল্লাহর বন্ধু?স্টেপ 1️⃣ : জানুন আল্লাহর ক্ষমতা।وَمَا تَكُونُ فِى شَأْنٍ وَمَا تَتْلُوا۟ مِنْهُ مِن قُرْءَانٍ وَلَا تَعْمَلُونَ مِنْ عَمَلٍ إِلَّا كُنَّا عَلَيْكُمْ شُهُودًا إِذْ تُفِيضُونَ فِيهِۚ وَمَا يَعْزُبُ عَن رَّبِّكَ مِن مِّثْقَالِ ذَرَّةٍ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَلَآ أَصْغَرَ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكْبَرَ إِلَّا فِى كِتَٰبٍ مُّبِينٍআর তুমি যে অবস্থাতেই থাক না কেন আর যা কিছু তিলাওয়াত কর না কেন আল্লাহর পক্ষ হতে কুরআন থেকে এবং তোমরা যে আমলই কর না কেন, আমি তোমাদের উপর সাক্ষী থাকি, যখন তোমরা তাতে নিমগ্ন হও। তোমার রব থেকে গোপন থাকে না যমীনের বা আসমানের অণু পরিমাণ কিছুই এবং তা থেকে ছোট বা বড়, তবে (এর সব কিছুই) রয়েছে সুস্পষ্ট কিতাবে। [ইউনুস ১০:৬১]স্টেপ 2️⃣: শনুন আল্লাহর ওয়াদাأَلَآ إِنَّ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهِ لَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَশুনে রাখ, নিশ্চয় আল্লাহর বন্ধুদের কোন ভয় নেই, আর তারা পেরেশানও হবে না। [ইউনুস ১০:৬২]স্টেপ 3️⃣: জেনে নিন পদ্ধতিٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَكَانُوا۟ يَتَّقُونَযারা ঈমান এনেছে এবং তাকওয়া অবলম্বন করত। [ইউনুস ১০:৬৩]
inspire.author: শাইখ খালিদ আল-হুসাইনান রহ.

inspire.quote: Jangan malu dan jangan takut bertanya
inspire.author: Sukowisesa Pratyeka

inspire.quote: Anyone can nurture a myth about their life if they have enough manure, so if the grass looks greener on the other side of the fence, that's probably because it's full of shit.
inspire.author: Fredrik Backman

inspire.quote: Her soul felt alive more than ever before. Sarai almost forget that she wasn't.
inspire.author: Laini Taylor

inspire.quote: Don't be shy and don't be afraid to ask
inspire.author: Sukowisesa Pratyeka

inspire.quote: Sacrifice yourself for the sake of your strong passion, like an incense stick burning itself to bring out the best in it.   -Reshma Cheknath Umesh-
inspire.author: RESHMA CHEKNATH UMESH

inspire.quote: What will make you successful is within you, but some people go out there to study and to get experiences, in order to find what is within themselves and to know how to use the gift that is bestowed upon them. Know yourself ,know what you can do and find what you good at, that will make you successful.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: A heart once filled with love will never be perfectly replaced. And new partners will not replace those who have left.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Some managers ignore the long-lasting nature of skills acquired through training. They give employees no alternative skills which can be used beyond their current jobs. Unless, if those employees get selected for new positions.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Memory is an act. As a matter of fact, it's the only thing that's real.
inspire.author: LZ

inspire.quote: Courage is essential in a management context and, above all, in leadership.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Knowing how to manage requires one to know how to start a movement rather than just to follow it. And one must take a firm position when necessary.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: A leader should not try to avoid tension, crisis, or confrontation.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: The new commandment is that, it's a sin to disbelieve in yourself.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: If God is all loving, then we must treat the heart as the throne of God.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The sacred responsibility is to repent.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: The Universe knows everything about you, and will bring to you, either what matches you, or even better than what you may expect. You cannot just dream yourself to what you want; you have to work on it, for the Universe puts the possibilities in front of you, while it is your job to notice it and do something about it.
inspire.author: Gino DiCaprio

inspire.quote: Going to school and earning a degree, Marie, is like picking on a glacier. Everyday, you get up, grab your pick and hack at the ice, and one day you know you’ll look down, and there won’t be any picking left, and the glacier will be gone. -Lynette from OF SCHOOL AND WOMEN
inspire.author: D.S. Marquis

inspire.quote: The goal of Meditations on Christ is to deepen our relationship with the Spirit of Jesus Christ and to greater embody His likeness.
inspire.author: Benjamin W. Decker

inspire.quote: Prayer is the method by which we set the intention in Christian meditation. We give the meditation to the Holy Spirit and welcome the Spirit's presence and guidance.
inspire.author: Benjamin W. Decker

inspire.quote: No matter how good or bad your life is, it is all up to you.How you look at life can be seen differently by each person.It is up to each of you, to understand and comprehend how powerful your thoughts are.You have the power to choose how to think, this is the ‘Law of Love’".
inspire.author: Gino DiCaprio

inspire.quote: Whenever the heart is in love, the mind become confused about what to do. Even concentration become a heavy burden.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Art is too important not to share
inspire.author: Romero Britto

inspire.quote: Meditation is a sacred, ancient practice that people of all world traditions practice in some form or another.
inspire.author: Benjamin W. Decker

inspire.quote: Taking just five minutes to calm the mind, relax the body, observe our thoughts, and listen to the Holy Spirit pierces the veil between the spiritual and physical worlds.
inspire.author: Benjamin W. Decker

inspire.quote: DONT FORGET THAT EVERYONE HAVE THE FREEDOM TO FAIL
inspire.author: PAPERBOAT QUOTES

inspire.quote: My Own Choice – Free WillYou are my father and I, your son.If you send me somewhere, I will go without a second thought nor doubt your judgment.If you demand, or ask something from me, then I shall give it to you. Considering that the thing in question is under my possession at the required time.However, choosing and making final decisions for me means that I have become a slave and not a son. Thus, you have taken away that free-will which belongs to every individual. Or, that blessing which the Creator blessed me with; from the very beginning of the creation.I can give up all the worldly possessions that are under my control, but never when it comes to taking away my free-will. Therefore, I wish to remain as a son to you and not a slave.I will not trust nor allow my soul to be taken for granted, and humiliated to such a level of not making up my own choice. No man should become a masterover another. Simply, because every slave must have a master, but a son needs only a father in life. Nothing more and nothing less!
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Love heals the wounds left in hatred!
inspire.author: Riya Joseph Kaithavanathara

inspire.quote: One who lives in the past never creates his own future and ruins his present too...
inspire.author: Ahemad R Kazi

inspire.quote: The troubles are there in the path to make you better, but if they make you bitter, you are becoming troublesome..!
inspire.author: Mahendar Singh Jakhar

inspire.quote: Tukikufa kifo itanipeleka place better ama place worse kushinda penye tuko?"Hizi characters ziko painted black na sketchy individualNakila time na lose my faith,nafind heaven ndani ya hizi abstract -na- hidden beautyQuestion niBefore uuze your conscience to the highest bidder jiulize; "after kumada your own son(sun) kama Ken Saro is it worth kukuwa caught kwa hizi challenges za a half a day?
inspire.author: Omondi Orony

inspire.quote: Hang on, it's the final hour of your tribulations. Soon the sun will rise. And your enemies will watch you bask in your success.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: You've come this far with a heavy burden. A broken heart. A bruised body. You've been entrusted with pain and suffering for a very long time. Please don't die without sharing the lessons you've learnt. Let your suffering be worth something.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Let your suffering be worth something.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: You were accused, tried, and tested. You were innocent all along. You knew it, and they knew it. The only thing that you had was the truth. And the truth sided with itself, as it always does.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: If you have to choose anything in this life, choose the truth. Because, the truth will always side with itself.
inspire.author: Mitta xinindlu

inspire.quote: We talk about pain because it's what we know. If we had riches, we'd talk about that too.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: I had to surrender all that I was and knew. It was a necessary process to discover my real purpose in this life. No regrets.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: ...sometimes it's the most difficult paths that are the right ones to take!
inspire.author: Zuzanne Belec

inspire.quote: Good deeds of yours will somehow reward you in the future. Spread kindness as much as you can".
inspire.author: I'm salmiah

inspire.quote: Don't depend on others to make a decision for your life".
inspire.author: I'm salmiah

inspire.quote: Utilize the time given by the Almighty to fight for your dreams and goals".
inspire.author: I'm salmiah

inspire.quote: Don’t just focus on beauty of your face. Start to purify your heart and good things will happen".
inspire.author: I'm salmiah

inspire.quote: When teachers doubt your potential, show them how wrong they truly are. Don’t just practice until you get it right, PRACTICE UNTIL YOU CAN’T GET IT WRONG.
inspire.author: Nzondi

inspire.quote: I empathize with those of you who have struggled long and hard with few rainbows and even less sunny days. Life for you as been an uphill battle. I implore-I beg you to continue to push, continue to believe in the power of the human spirit when there is nothing left but shame behind you, faith inside you and uncertainty ahead of you.
inspire.author: Nzondi

inspire.quote: All I know is that you can survive. You have to! You can climb higher. You want to! Don't give up. No matter what ... Don't give up on your children ... on your mate ... on your sanity ... on your faith. As far as I know ... we only have one life ... take your sour lemons and make lemonade ... look at whatever positives you can ... but believe ... if you keep on ... step-by-step ... you will not only survive, you will rise.
inspire.author: Nzondi

inspire.quote: Choosing is confusing. In some ways, we have a tendency to choose the wrong person or the wrong decisions in our life. It could lead us to a dead end, left in darkness. Alone and clueless, just because it wasn't a right option from the very first place.
inspire.author: Shaa Zainol

inspire.quote: ɪ ᴅᴏɴ'ᴛ ʜᴀᴠᴇ ᴅᴇꜱɪʀᴇꜱ ᴛᴏ ʟɪᴠᴇ ᴀ ʟᴜxᴜʀʏ ʟɪꜰᴇ ᴡʜᴇɴ ᴅᴇᴀᴛʜ ʜᴀꜱ ʀᴇꜱᴇʀᴠᴇᴅ ꜰᴏʀ ᴍᴇ ᴀ ʜᴏᴜꜱᴇ ᴡʜɪᴄʜ ɪꜱ ꜰᴜʟʟ ᴏꜰ ᴅᴜꜱᴛ ᴀɴᴅ ᴅᴀʀᴋɴᴇꜱꜱ.
inspire.author: Mohamed Nasrullah Osmani

inspire.quote: ᴅᴏɴ'ᴛ ɪɴꜱᴜʟᴛ ᴘᴇᴏᴘʟᴇ ɪɴ ᴛʜᴇɪʀ ᴅᴏᴡɴꜰᴀʟʟ, ʏᴏᴜ ʜᴀᴠᴇ ɴᴏ ɪᴅᴇᴀ ᴡʜᴀᴛ ʟɪꜰᴇ ʜᴀꜱ ʀᴇꜱᴇʀᴠᴇᴅ ꜰᴏʀ ʏᴏᴜ ɪɴ ꜰᴜᴛᴜʀᴇ.
inspire.author: Mohamed Nasrullah Osmani

inspire.quote: I don't have desires to live a luxury life, when death has reserved for me a house which is full of dust and darkness.
inspire.author: Mohamed Nasrullah Osmani

inspire.quote: Visoka moda je iskustvo kupovine.
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Investirajte u odjevne predmete koji nikada ne izlaze iz mode, koji su uvijek dio kruga u svakom novom trendu. Sacuvajte novac za popuste u prestiznim radnjama. Dobar je osjecaj kad kvalitet platite upola cijene.
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Elegancija ne znaci biti zapazen vec biti zapamcen.
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Da li ste se ikada zapitali koji odjevni predmet ima najvecu moc? Ima crvena pelerina
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Da bi svakog zadivile u bikiniju i lijepo se osjecale u najsmjelijoj odjeci tokom citave godine, redovno vjezbajte i pravilno se hranite
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Ljubav je kad sve o meni znas i sve sto znas mi oprastas, da me volis nastavljas
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Vjeruj u sebe i u svoju beskrajnu mogucnost
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Niko nije dobar u svemu, ali je svako dobar u necemu.
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Umjesto za kritiku, trazi razlog za pohvalu
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Niko nije savrsen. Svi smo culi za tu istinu
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Ne budite ravnodusni na tudjoj patnji
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Each day is a celebration. Each person is a blessing. Everything is a work of art.
inspire.author: Tara Bianca

inspire.quote: Life is a collection of short stories strung together for a mega novel. What is your favorite short story in your novel? Write it.
inspire.author: Naseha Sameen

inspire.quote: You are responsible for your actions, not their responses.
inspire.author: Todd Stocker

inspire.quote: Ne krivite druge za svoj neuspjeh. Onaj ko nije uspio, iskljucivo je sam kriv za to
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Obecajte samo ono sto mozete da ispunite. Nemojte vrijedjati i fizicki se obracunavati
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Najbolji stil komuniciranja je ja dobijam/ti dobijas
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Nikada ne odustajte od svojih planova, ma koliko vam trebalo da ih ostvarite
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Obrazovanje je najvrijednije oruzje kojim se moze mijenjati svijet
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: Da li ste danas nesto uradili u pravcu svog cilja?
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: My life. My lane. My pace. My rules.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Money doesn't bring happiness to the people who already have plenty of it. The value of money is subjective to the amount that you you have. If you have $10, then a $9 bill is expensive. Yet, if you have $100, the same $9 bill is cheap.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: We need to unpack the tragedy of abuse in relationships. The first step towards it is usually abandonment. Emotional, financial, mental, or physical abandonment.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: My goal, as a writer, is clear. My aim is to heal millions of people through writing. I am a healing writer.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: An interview is either a lesson or a blessing. You either use it as practice or you get a great job.
inspire.author: Hamza Zaouali

inspire.quote: If you just focus on being liked by them, how can you truly join a company that deserves you? You've got to have some standards. You must be assessing them, too. And if things don't work out because they're not up to your standards, then you've probably done yourself a huge favor.
inspire.author: Hamza Zaouali

inspire.quote: Izdrzi dok drugi odustaju. Neuspjeh ne moze da se nosi sa istrajnoscu
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: You can take it. We all can. It sucks and it hurts, but we get through it day by day, minute by minute until we're out the other side.
inspire.author: Kaisa Winter

inspire.quote: Mime artists are what happens to men when they’ve been single for too long
inspire.author: Daily Florence

inspire.quote: Africans, you have the permission to celebrate your roots and your heritage again. Go on and heal your bodies with your traditional herbs. And teach your children the secrets of your ancestors. Your ancestors lived well — with little to nothing. They were self-sufficient. Yet, they were the happiest. Embrace the secrets of your traditions again. You're safe and free.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Beloved Africans, you were once the victims of the past. But no longer. Today you're free and enriched with resources to maintain yourselves. Let the victim mentality go. And embrace your survivor status. Be wise and be resourceful.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Kritikuju se postupci, a ne licnost
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: The moment you stop praying, you will start dying spirituallyYour sins will be comfortableYour problems will be escalatedYou will be depressed and you will have a less desire for God.Your close relationship with God is ceased.Your family relationships are affected.Eventually you will lose focus and purpose in life.
inspire.author: Shaila Touchton

inspire.quote: When a goal is not archieved, the issue is not with the vision being unattainable; refine the strategy.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: berusaha semampunyaberhenti secukupnyaberdoa sebanyak-banyaknyaberfikir bahwa semua akan baik-baik saja
inspire.author: Habilah Mashabi

inspire.quote: Soar to the height of your heart, soar above the illusion of fear, and soar above the uncertainty of doubt.
inspire.author: Rodney McNeil

inspire.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
inspire.author: Abraham Lincoln

inspire.quote: سلّم لحكم الله، فما بك ابتدأ، ولا عليك اعتدى، فإن ثبرت فحبذا، ألا "فانطح ذا وزد ذا" وأشار إلى الحائط شيخ الشيوخ أبي فلاح صالح الكواش
inspire.author: رشاد الإمام

inspire.quote: Budite finansijski pismeni. Odgovorno upravljajte svojim novcem
inspire.author: Rada Krivokapic Radonjic

inspire.quote: 31st December is a reminder of Evanescence and Mortality. The Indomitable and Invincible Time tastes Death.
inspire.author: Naseha Sameen

inspire.quote: You don’t need to be a fortress to be strong. You don’t need to build walls to keep yourself safe. Open the windows and let the breeze breathe life into your bones. Go outside, touch the earth with your bare hands, and remind yourself how it feels to plant the seeds of love and watch them bloom into something beautiful. Water those flowers well; your garden will reawaken in the sun.
inspire.author: Kirsten Robinson

inspire.quote: You can control what you want, only if you could control the way you think.
inspire.author: Shivi Goyal

inspire.quote: To dream is good and living our dreams should be the ultimate goal".
inspire.author: Lucia Matuonto

inspire.quote: Excellence is the gateway to an infinite world of possibilities
inspire.author: Iain Cameron Williams

inspire.quote: Cuanto más sabes, mejor decides.
inspire.author: Greta Vega

inspire.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us
inspire.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

inspire.quote: Perubahan Tidak akan Menunggu Kesiapan Anda, Oleh Karena itu, Mulailah Sebelum Anda Siap
inspire.author: Suwandi Chow

inspire.quote: A success life is the one that fits you.
inspire.author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

inspire.quote: Simplicity protects people from Carnal Slavery!
inspire.author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

inspire.quote: Come to think of it, most of Lebanon’s politicians would be up for an Oscar. I would feel safer with them in movies rather than in power. Ouch!
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: All anyone needs to do is close their eyes and try, and then they'll see how unique and beautiful we all truly are.
inspire.author: T. E. Antonino

inspire.quote: We grow to become what we live within.
inspire.author: Dr. Anshul Mishra

inspire.quote: The continuation of success depends on greediness, patience, and dissatisfaction.
inspire.author: Dhirendra Pandey

inspire.quote: I strongly believe that the main destination of education is not to get rich only, but to be capable to identify corruptions around you.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Do not play with sin, because sin will no longer play with you. On the contrary, it will take you captive and you will be it slave.
inspire.author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

inspire.quote: Be someone’s light beneath the clouds.
inspire.author: Dianne Marie Andre

inspire.quote: The truth is we all achieve greatness. The only difference is the size of our audiences.
inspire.author: Jomny Sun

inspire.quote: If you've done leadership right, people will hug you on their way out the door.
inspire.author: Frank Kayihura

inspire.quote: My poems are my breath in words.
inspire.author: Gregory Joseph Firlotte

inspire.quote: What is poetry? It is one heart speaking to another.
inspire.author: Gregory Joseph Firlotte

inspire.quote: You'll encounter many obstacles on the road to success, don't allow yourself to be one of them.
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: Do not consider the one who gives you a daily support as a life giver, he or she is just a supporter. It is God only who is the Life Giver. If He decides that you live, you live. And if He decides the end of your life, nobody can add anything.
inspire.author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

inspire.quote: I believe inspiration surrounds us everywhere all the time, the key is to keep your eyes and mind open. It's important to create a space mentally and emotionally, so inspiration can find a way to drop in. When it does there’s this brief moment of magic and then... the hard work begins! - Salariya Publishing Interview
inspire.author: Dorien Brouwers

inspire.quote: Humanitarian aid missions are symbolic to the ethical beliefs and practices that influence social reform.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Don't worry about the jealous ones, take them as your opponent's coaches. Because a boxer in a ring fights only with his opponent not with his opponent's coach.
inspire.author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

inspire.quote: Hold your arrow and be focused to your game; the dart board is always in front of you not in back.
inspire.author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

inspire.quote: As an author, my goal is to spread and make sure that the message gets to you. Just like the person who invented the calendar, could not predict what will happen tomorrow.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: I've been wondering why the lonely ones make the most beautiful music and I think it's because they're the ones most invested in filling the silence.
inspire.author: Jomny Sun

inspire.quote: You are not alone, until you think about it!
inspire.author: Riya Joseph Kaithavanathara

inspire.quote: We realise it when others try to destroy us. But we choose to let karma deal with them to the greatest effect. In any case, we're also too occupied with stocktaking; counting our blessings one by one.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Sometimes the ones who discourage you are very important in your life. They help you to discover what is hidden within you.
inspire.author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

inspire.quote: Be the person people remember because you made them feel good about themselves.
inspire.author: RJ Intindola – (Gandolfo) – 2008

inspire.quote: Though she might pretend to be in the middle of the pack, there was no reason to train like it.
inspire.author: Sarah J. Maas

inspire.quote: To Heal A Wound You Need To Stop Touching It.
inspire.author: https://quotesonlife2020.blogspot.com/

inspire.quote: Just because they don't hear the song (of the world) doesn't mean it's silent.
inspire.author: Kevin J. Anderson

inspire.quote: A woman of peace may feel the need to react when provoked, but she always weighs her options. For her, inner peace is a priority.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: The ones who persistently pursue their passion always experiences the zeal of life.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: Find yourself. Inspiring others.
inspire.author: D. M. Stephenson

inspire.quote: Cleanse your mind. Feed your soul.
inspire.author: D. M. Stephenson

inspire.quote: There are hints of him in everything she writes. It's how she keeps him close, and it's why he'll never die. When people ask her why she loves to write, she tells them: It's truly a matter of life and death.
inspire.author: D. M. Stephenson

inspire.quote: Unmanaged spending hinders financial growth through irrelevant bad investment choices.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Pray for those who mistreat you, free your spirit and fly ,you will find abounded of happiness within, enlighten and blessed you will become !
inspire.author: Ofer Cohen

inspire.quote: In my imagination i see them all as flowers ,many colors ,open or close ,each one of them have a different personality .
inspire.author: Ofer Cohen

inspire.quote: We are all unique, each has his own uniqueness, me I rebel, an outsider, love to watch flowers, people birth charts and shuffle my old deck of cards..
inspire.author: Ofer cohen

inspire.quote: Hardness is what we see...Success is what they see...
inspire.author: Ashik Venkat

inspire.quote: At the end of the game, what's valuable and remains is what we did and how we did it.
inspire.author: Luigino Bottega

inspire.quote: A woman of peace does not go around tearing other women into pieces. She holds her peace because she knows that her inner peace is pivotal.
inspire.author: Gift Gugu Mona

inspire.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and reality.
inspire.author: Rodman Lu

inspire.quote: Learning to appreciate everything in life becomes a grand blessing. Problems cannot bother you anymore.
inspire.author: Premlatha Rajkumar

inspire.quote: Never settle for something your heart, mind and soul aren't in sync with. Life is too short and the cost for it isn't cheap enough to live in a mediocre fashion.
inspire.author: Bushra Zainab

inspire.quote: We are all trying in this world. Trying to stay alive, to do good, to be better, to achieve goals. Everybody is struggling, it is not only you. Give them your chance means you give it to yourself too.
inspire.author: Shaa Zainol

inspire.quote: There are different things which we can't see, feel and hear but they exist in reality
inspire.author: Niloy Rashid Jaki

inspire.quote: No one is born special, situations makes them special
inspire.author: Niloy Rashid Jaki

inspire.quote: Our mind controls our thoughts,our thoughts control our emotionsand our emotions controls our life.Control your thoughts to control your life.
inspire.author: Niloy Rashid Jaki

inspire.quote: Talk about your Work not your Goals
inspire.author: Niloy Rashid Jaki

inspire.quote: If love was made compulsory just as praying, we would be forced to love each other five times a day. At the end of the day, all the hearts will be melting with the love of our Creator.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Don't play with your heart! It is easy to see it flying but very difficult to get it back!
inspire.author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

inspire.quote: Turn your "Why" into "Why not?
inspire.author: Rob Liano

inspire.quote: A River Cuts Through A Rock Not Because Of It's Power, But It's Persistence.
inspire.author: https://quotesonlife2020.blogspot.com/

inspire.quote: Greathearted leaders are procreated to provide others with generosity, hospitality, and friendliness. I truthfully believe we need more integrity and responsibility like that in this troublesome World.
inspire.author: Daniel Linn Lewis

inspire.quote: Each of us is called to create harmony and a better life for ourselves, others and the cosmos, expressing love.
inspire.author: Luigino Bottega

inspire.quote: Don't write to be loved, just write what you love!
inspire.author: Riya Joseph Kaithavanathara

inspire.quote: The road to perfection winds through a land called imperfection
inspire.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

inspire.quote: Skipping the basic methods will cost you more at the top than following the full process of doing things while you are still at the bottom of the ladder.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: I seek no perfection in writing. I seek justice. Because as much as a pen can heal, it can also kill.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Oversleeping will only save you from having wild imaginations during the day. But those same imaginations are necessary in every genius. You need them while you are awake and not asleep!
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The proof of your progress is the strength of your standards!
inspire.author: Vamsee Puligadda

inspire.quote: Some names have meaning, some don't. It's not a big deal. What matters is the meaning of your life.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: How can you find peace or label yourself as being "free" while you are still terrified of Mondays?!
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The repetition of the days have taught me to fear nothing in life except the fear of my own ignorance.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The future that we will never experience is constantly haunting us in the present moment. Thus, taking away our true happiness.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Just as every tree starts as a seed and the baby an embryo. Your plans must follow the same steps if you truly wish to see them successful at the end.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: You must avoid looking for shortcuts in life, if you truly wish to know the full procedure of doing things.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Do your work as best as you can without worrying about the results. If you love what you do then that is reward in itself, the rest will follow when it is meant to be.
inspire.author: Vidisha Chandna

inspire.quote: We admire and love those people who constantly tease us, but we are doubtful of those who show us too much love.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Shortcuts will only satisfy and give you success in the present moment. But the future is preserved for those who are fully prepared for it. The people who didn't skip the basics.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Happy memories are like lifesavers, keeping us buoyant amid stormy seas and changing times.
inspire.author: Rich DiSilvio

inspire.quote: How can you be qualified as a genius without knowing the primary factors that made you to be so in the first place? Without knowing the cause, shows that you are still ignorant of your own existence.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Some people get everything in legacy, while some work hard to build the legacy
inspire.author: Kuldeep Sharma

inspire.quote: Focus on what makes you feel good rather than what you are good at.
inspire.author: Udai Yadla

inspire.quote: Some of us never had good schools, teachers, education, parents, childhood, background and a good wealthy family. Even the place we come from is not on google map, but that should not stop you from being the great person you were destined to be . In life Its either you spend your days feeling sorry for yourself for the rest of your life or you spend days fighting for better life for the rest of your life.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: You are your own brand
inspire.author: Avijeet Das

inspire.quote: Dari segala hal yang ada, apa yang paling kamu takutkan?"Sesaat setelah saya tiada, orang-orang tidak menangis dengan tulus, atau bahkan tidak ada yang menangis sama sekali."Apa maksudmu?"Saya sangat takut apabila dikenang sebagai ingatan yang buruk.
inspire.author: Syahrul Chelsky

inspire.quote: People going to Chandni Chowk to get designer copies of lehengas inspired by actresses are now shaming Neha Kakkar on the wedding dress similarity and entirely spoiling her wedding day for her while they stand against Internet bullying. Next time do not go to new market or Chandni Chowk with a picture of a celebrity bride. Design your own lehenga please. We need people to inspire us for originality please.❤️
inspire.author: Bakkaprabhu Uppar

inspire.quote: L'esperienza estremamente gratificante di poter usare le mie competenze a vantaggio di altri.
inspire.author: Lars Kepler

inspire.quote: You can't correct a mistake by repeating it over again.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: All you are or ever shall become is the result of the use to which you put your mind.
inspire.author: Napoleon Hill

inspire.quote: Fighting demons isn’t for the faint of heart, but neither is surviving the ones that got us here in the first place; it is how we became warriors, you and I.
inspire.author: Amie Gabriel

inspire.quote: Virtue is similar to silence. Simply, because we know what it is, but we can't fully explain it by using words.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Semminek sincs értelme. Ezt régóta tudom.Ezért semmi sem érdemes csinálni.Erre most jöttem rá.
inspire.author: Janne Teller

inspire.quote: You're the best thing that's ever happened to you.
inspire.author: Jennifer Ho

inspire.quote: Разумът, изкуството и поезията не помагат да се разгадае мястото, от което са прокудени.
inspire.author: Primo Levi

inspire.quote: Be addicted to being amazing.
inspire.author: Angel Moreira

inspire.quote: Целите в живота са най-добрата защита срещу смъртта - и не само в концлагера.
inspire.author: Primo Levi

inspire.quote: In our generation, we have moved away only one step from slavery. The difference is that, every work deserves a payment nowadays. But the employees are still under the mercy of the employer.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: you have known her for so longyou think you know herbut she hides herselfbehind her smilethe right one can hear thepain in the sound of herlaughterthe real one can feel thecrave for someone to touchher soul without touching herif she hasn't cried her heart outbefore you don't say you know her
inspire.author: Aman Raghav

inspire.quote: There are stars in the sky that are hundreds of times larger than our Sun. And we can fit 1,300,000 Earths inside of our Sun. There are multiple-star systems, which are systems of planets orbiting two, three, six, or seven...stars. If we were in one of those then when we look up, we'd have multiple "Suns" in our sky! This is our reality. But then we still find reasons to care about who marries who, or who beds who, or what church someone goes to. Our reality is awesome, but then we make up trivialities in our heads and call them "higher values" or "ways of being". I wonder, if everyone were to realise the vastness of our universe, would we finally trample the homemade trivialities to find our own true purposes?
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Never underestimate the power of a little light ...
inspire.author: Jeff Rees Jones

inspire.quote: We have no control over what God has given us. But, after that, we have opportunities to write our destiny.
inspire.author: Manya Nigam

inspire.quote: Kindness is not an option, it’s an obligation.
inspire.author: Mac Alvi A. R

inspire.quote: And I’m going to waddle my ass to that courthouse and strike a fierce pose for that b*tch.Maman Lionne is ready for you!" ~ Leonie Beaulieu
inspire.author: Charmaine Louise Shelton

inspire.quote: Fall comes with different colors to challenge a green Summer
inspire.author: Neamat Alishiryan

inspire.quote: Do the best you can until you know better. Then when you know better, do better. Maya Angelou
inspire.author: Charlie Baxter

inspire.quote: Never wait for someone else to believe in your greatness.
inspire.author: Angela Clay Raggs

inspire.quote: The first key point of persuasion is instantly catching attention. Why unorthodox methods frequently work? Because the doer exactly doesn’t know what and when is enough. So, the conscious efforts to improvise and attract the subject’s attention continues and the subject keeps getting hooked to something which is unexpected but unique at the same time. When the established routine doesn’t work, try unorthodox.
inspire.author: Shahenshah Hafeez Khan

inspire.quote: We are always free to change our current circumstances with our decisions at times.
inspire.author: Manya Nigam

inspire.quote: Make your life count -go that extra mile for a friend in need of your time," ~ Joan Aubele
inspire.author: Joan Aubele

inspire.quote: Believe in your success. The power for success lives within you - in your beliefs and assumptions. You have that power, no one else holds it for you.
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: The body is the container of the soul. Therefore, it's vital to keep it in optimal conditions, exercising daily and eating healthy. Because food is energy, with it you rebuild your body day by day.
inspire.author: Caro Briones

inspire.quote: When the clouds shifted, His light shined through, then came a calm after the storm. It was then, I could see hope for a better tomorrow.
inspire.author: Candina Ann

inspire.quote: Red tapes sometimes are put to save you from harm or danger, but sometimes are put to stop you from being powerful and successful. Most red tapes are put on information and knowledge ,because they know if you know what they know. They wont be able to stop you or to control you. Learn to distinguish these red tapes, because your success depends on it.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: There is so much in the world for us all if we only have the eyes to see it, and the heart to love it, and the hand to gather it to ourselves- so much in men and women, so much in art and literature, so much everywhere in which to delight, and for which to be thankful
inspire.author: Montgomery L.M.

inspire.quote: You are the hero of your own life story; and Heroes never give up.
inspire.author: Muniba Mazari

inspire.quote: Love is like a chilly wind. You are unlikely to tell when it started and when it's going to end.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Redefining the paradigm of business benchmarking in a dynamic technological world, fosters new strategic concepts that will define how businesses will evolve to gain traction.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: To be great you must divorce yourself from your society and culture.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The first step of knowing yourself is being fearless to make mistakes.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: When love is your motto. Even heaven will not deny you success in your life.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: There is so much goodness in this world than evil. Even the devil himself experience some worse days (nightmares).
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Don't be so poor to the point that you can't afford to pay attention.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: It's only God who can promise you unconditional love. And God's love, is the kind of love which doesn't expect to be loved.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The world dont make your choices, you make the choices so don't blame the world on your choice
inspire.author: Yandell Rogel-Siler

inspire.quote: Yes, We Can
inspire.author: Barack Obama

inspire.quote: Ki yi a hankali - Be careful.
inspire.author: F.S. Bala

inspire.quote: In the event of life and death situations, the pretence of false egos fall and the decisive misunderstandings between the loved ones turn out to be trivialities and the strong opinions turn out to be masquerades which do not long last in the moment of truth." Quote from-I Know You Now
inspire.author: Sushant Changotra

inspire.quote: Passion is the source of our finest moments… If we could live without passion, maybe we’d know some kind of peace… but we would be hollow… Empty rooms shuttered and dank. Without passion we’d be truly dead.
inspire.author: Joss Whedon

inspire.quote: Sometimes we fail to understand that those who don't protest are usually in the dark. For example, people who have issues with animal brutality are misjudged by those who don't. Those who protest against pollution are ridiculled by the manufacturing business. Those who lack parking spaces are ignored by those who live in big yards. Same thing with racism. Those who do not understand the outcry against it have never experienced its cruelty. So, the lesson here is that we need to educate those who oppose our cries. Maybe, they are clueless about the depth of our frustrations.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Your dreams (no matter how big) will forever be dreams if you don’t find the courage and persistence in bringing them to life.
inspire.author: Isha Panesar

inspire.quote: To err is human—to forgive divine.
inspire.author: Alexander Pope

inspire.quote: To know someone else you first have to know yourselfRjS
inspire.author: rassool jibraeel snyman

inspire.quote: Prejudice is committed easiest when it is by you against others but not the converseRjS
inspire.author: rassool jibraeel snyman

inspire.quote: To walk in someone else's shoes means that you have to leave your prejudiced shoes behindRjS
inspire.author: rassool jibraeel snyman

inspire.quote: Judging someone without walking in their shoes is the grossest misjudgment that one can makeRjS
inspire.author: rassool jibraeel snyman

inspire.quote: Those who cannot see life through the eyes of others have no empathy just pityRjS
inspire.author: rassool jibraeel snyman

inspire.quote: I'm educated. I have solid experience in commerce. I have talents. But one thing I've always been confident in bragging about is my gift to write. And I want to use it as a therapy for many people. I hope millions of people find my words to be soothing, cheering, motivating, and healing.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Don’t be ashamed of failing and start all over again with the lesson learnt
inspire.author: Enamul Haque

inspire.quote: How affirming it is when you can be a full person—shadows and all—and still be loved!
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: The only religion that can be true: is the one that is free of unforgiving comments. The one that promotes unity, forgiveness, love, and peace. A religion that respects people's free will to worship.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Dance to the beat. Be the symphony is you must. Just don't stop beating.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: Illusions build broken homes because they lack solid blueprints.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: When you start driving your emotions consciously, you become invincible
inspire.author: Sudhir K.V

inspire.quote: When you need someone, don't pretend you don't need them, thinking that they will need you with time. Cos those you think may need you, might not.
inspire.author: Ojingiri Hannah

inspire.quote: Hold your breath,Dive & let other's look after you ( Don't watch your back )...
inspire.author: Aleem Nasir

inspire.quote: In isolation, we assume we are in it alone. In connection, we find support, commonality, and companionship.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: Blame is subjective for everyone, stay positive and focus on listening and learning things will not get worse!
inspire.author: Enamul Haque

inspire.quote: Don't measure people before you give, you never know what a man is worth.
inspire.author: Ojingiri Hannah

inspire.quote: Strength is relative. A buffalo is much bigger than a fly, but can do nothing to the fly swirling around his head and shitting over it. A wolf can kill sheep, but can’t digest grass. Sometimes, strength is luck to have what the circumstances request.
inspire.author: Nikola Misovic

inspire.quote: We live in a world where we have to sacrifice our comfort for the sake of others. Where we have to go an extra mile to meet others' needs. Where we have to dig deep in our resources to please others. I have gone out of my comfort zone for some people. Some people have gone out of their comfort zone for me. And I'm grateful.It's life. It's a common thing. There is no right or wrong to this behaviour. We do it because either we want to or that we must.By the way, our self-sacrificing service can be unhealthy to us. Some people burn themselves down trying to keep others warm. Some break their backs trying to carry the whole world. Some break their bones trying to bend backwards for their loved ones. All these sacrifices are, sometimes, not appreciated. Usually we don't thank the people who go out of their comfort zone to make us feel comfortable. Again, although it's not okay, it's a common thing. It's another side of life.To be fair, we must get in touch with our humanity and show gratitude for these sacrifices.We owe it to so many people. And sometimes we don't even realise it.Thanks be to God for forgiving our sins — which we repeat. Thanks to our world leaders and the activists for the work that they do to make our economic life better. Thanks to our teachers, lecturers, mentors, and role models for shaping our lives. Thanks to our parents for their continual sacrifices. Thanks to our friends for their solid support. Thanks to our children, nephews, and nieces. They allow us to practise discipline and leadership on them. Thanks to the doctors and nurses who save our lives daily. Thanks to safety professionals and legal representatives. They protect us and our possessions. Thanks to our church leaders, spiritual gurus and guides, and meditation partners. They shape our spiritual lives. Thanks to musicians, actors, writers, poets, and sportspeople for their entertainment. Thanks to everyone who contributes in a positive way to our society. Whether recognised or not. Thank you. Thank you. Thank you!
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: I have gone out of my comfort zone for some people. Some people have gone out of their comfort zone for me. And I'm grateful.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: The TRUTH that sets FREE, the One that Jesus Christ was talking about is not the same as the human truth. This is why Pilate asked Jesus Christ: "What is the Truth?"So people will never be free unless they get the answer of Pilate's question!And if you want the answer of Pilate's question, consult Jesus Christ Himself.
inspire.author: Bruce Mbanzabugabo

inspire.quote: Entrancing beauty falls nothing short of absolute magnificent creation.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Always Respect Your Own Choices!
inspire.author: Granthana Sinha

inspire.quote: Standing atop the mountain...Happiness is all that surrounds.
inspire.author: Granthana Sinha

inspire.quote: It's not that we are awesome or good people that nice things happen in our lives. It's because God is good and awesome.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Stuff your eyes with wonder, live as if you'd drop dead in ten seconds. See the world. It's morefantastic than any dream made or paid for in factories. Ask no guarantees, ask for no security, there never was such an animal. And if there were, it would be related to the great sloth which hangs upside down in a tree all day every day sleeping its life away. To hell with that, shake the tree andknock the great sloth down on his butt.
inspire.author: Ray Bradbury

inspire.quote: Who's that? Even though the coast is nowhere to be seen, is still swimming in the midst of the ocean waves? What mighty use do you see in striving to swim in this manner?
inspire.author: His Majesty King Bhumibol Adulyadej

inspire.quote: Any individual who practices perseverance, even in the face of death, will not be in any debt to relatives or gods or father or mother. Furthermore, any individual who does his duty like a man, will enjoy Ultimate Peace in the future.
inspire.author: His Majesty King Bhumibol Adulyadej

inspire.quote: Control what you can, cope with what you can't, and concentrate on what counts
inspire.author: Sean Barker CPT PN2

inspire.quote: Life taught me to be thankful for my trials;to be grateful for my pain;to embrace my tears;and to laugh at my sorrow.Life taught methat trials bring victory;that pain adds strength;that tears produce healing;and that sorrow promotes wisdom.Life taught meto walk miles in my own shoes;to enjoy what I have;to be satisfied with what I've been given;and to take care of the present moment.Life taught methat other people's shoes will never fit;that I might lose what I have, in a moment;that wanting more is greed;and that moments die so abruptly.Life taught me to appreciate nature;to pray more often;to show love to my family;and to treasure my own life.Life taught methat nature is pregnant with metaphors;that praying is a path to the Living;that family was birthed to suit my needs;and that my life is existing for only a short breath.Life taught meto appreciate endings;to embrace goodbyes;to accept death;and to await the foretold judgement day.Life taught methat endings lead to new beginnings;that goodbyes lead to new hellos;that in death, there is life;and that the judgement day is the perfect ending.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: I waited for winter missed my summer on to spring but ended in autumn " (grab what's next)
inspire.author: Aleem Nasir

inspire.quote: You do not not need permission to change.
inspire.author: Marquita Burke De Jesus

inspire.quote: Adapting to a unique market requires innovation, surviving the market pressures requires good business acumen.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Your achievements are like piano. What you get out of it, depends on how you play it.
inspire.author: Coco Nicole Estef

inspire.quote: Your achievements are like a piano. What you get out of it, depends on how you play it.
inspire.author: Coco Nicole Estef

inspire.quote: जब पैरों के नीचे सेज़मीन खिसक जाएतो उड़ने का सोचिएJAB PAIRON KE NEECHE SEZAMEEN KHISAK JAYETOH UDNE KA SOCHIYEif your feetlost controlstart flyingあなたの足ならコントロールを失った飛行を開始しますbeneath your feetwhen earth shattersyou must flyあなたの足の下地球が粉々になったとき飛行を開始します
