inspire.quote: But you can't make people listen. They have to come round in their owntime,
inspire.author: Ray Bradbury

inspire.quote: I believe in love. Matter of fact, that's what I know best. I've been loved and I've loved.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: The whole secret of existence is to have no fear. Never fear what will become of you, depend on no one. Only the moment you reject all help are you freed.
inspire.author: Swami Vivekananda

inspire.quote: I believe in love, even if I'm single.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: God wants us to bring out the talents we didn't even know we had.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Thanksgiving season, embrace it with divine love and celebrate it with genuine gratitude.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: There are peaceful days,Created precisely for you.Sometimes you stay alone with yourself,Feeling the quietness returning to you.Through his divine waves, calm seems to be,A pure state of euphoria...
inspire.author: Diana D. Wild

inspire.quote: A charitable donation resembles shared strength and brings renewed hope to a vulnerable community.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: The application of academic knowledge to the socioeconomic development of an industry, is empowered by the acquired intellectual capacity to understand the principles that define the functionality of a given concept at hand.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: My dream shifted to my calling, and it was no longer optional.
inspire.author: Callie Daruk

inspire.quote: As if in response, beyond the window, stars shimmered and pointed the way to their creator - the God I always believed existed and held answers to questions I didn't quite know how to ask.
inspire.author: Callie Daruk

inspire.quote: May the beauty of your tapestry be as rich as the colors that define it and as deep and strong as the threads that bind it.
inspire.author: Judith Cosby

inspire.quote: When meeting people in life, evaluate them based on what they pay attention to ...Small minded people only focus on what you have or how you look. Intelligent & positive people focus on who you are and your value as a person ...
inspire.author: Nacer CB

inspire.quote: It's okay to say "No", set boundaries and practice balance, the long to-do list isn't so scary anymore.
inspire.author: FAITH FOO

inspire.quote: The transition back to a state of focusing on presence and conscious living first seems long, even unreachable. However, it is not difficult. On the contrary, it is quite simple. Just be. No attachment nor thought.
inspire.author: Steve Leasock

inspire.quote: Togetherness as one is real. It is perhaps the only thing that is real. I am referring to oneness. This is our essential state of being. Not only humans but all animals, plants, and things at the conscious level of being.
inspire.author: Steve Leasock

inspire.quote: I'm not impressed by your jargon. I'm not interested in your material value. I'm curious to know: at the end of the day, what do you stand for in life?
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Don't blame—seek to understand.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: It is difficult for one to see the roof of a house when one is on the inside of that same house. The same is true when seeing something from a great distance, where vision is distorted.
inspire.author: Gillian Duce

inspire.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear. It is the decision to move forward in spite of that fear.
inspire.author: K.R. Fraser

inspire.quote: The fabrication of the story is where divergent truths emerge.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: Litter by Maisie Aletha SmikleYou want me notAm inedible left to rotAm unusable to youAnd treasure to someone newAm litterDon't use me for batterOr to make fried fritterAm just matter that doesn’t matterRejected unwanted misplacedI have a placeIt's no disgraceHowever where am placed is a disgraceOn the beach in the market or on the streetWhere you meet to play shop and eatI should be out of sightIn a bin anchored tightOr some where Where I can rest in pieceAnd not be tossed about from place to placeLittering everywhere like heaps of fallen snowI can be recycled tooAnd use to make things brand newBury burn or reuse just chooseDon't misuse or abuseAnd dump me where I don't belongLeft for the winds and rain to take me alongWherever it goesLike am your foeTreat Earth kindlyPlace me in a bin where I belongEven litter has a placeIt's no disgrace
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Life isn't a play script where every character plays the way you wanted to because the characters you had in your play have their own play scripts. In the end life is all about screenplay of emotions you've experienced with those characters.
inspire.author: Kamal Voddepalli

inspire.quote: We cannot experience greater financial prosperity while telling ourselves how hard it is to pay the bills or to make ends meet. This situation may be the current state of your reality but if you want it to be different you have to be different and that all starts with your inner conversations.
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: Life is an endless dance of things happening - embrace it, cultivate a great expectation that change is always working to your advantage and it won’t seem so fearsome.
inspire.author: Elle Sommer

inspire.quote: I am educated, yes. Even so, my education is for me. I've had people classify my intelligence based on my certificates. I've had people assume my success based on my education. But in the end, neither success or intelligence can be truly measured by certificates.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: But what I hope is this: that you find a few [recipes] that will add to the wonder, love, and sacredness of your life. Those are the ones to follow. Those are the ones to keep.
inspire.author: Rivvy Neshama

inspire.quote: Loving and Living can be indescribably wonderful experiences without human based demands and expectancy.
inspire.author: Steve Leasock

inspire.quote: Instead of judging one's character, consider their circumstances.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: When we blame the circumstance, we continue to have respect for the person. When we judge their character, we lose respect for that person.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: Just because truths seem to change, it does not mean they are lies.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: It's time to learn to say "No". It is part of setting healthy boundaries. It's okay to say No, to the things that can wait.
inspire.author: FAITH FOO

inspire.quote: Judgment breeds disconnection and contempt; curiosity breeds connection and understanding.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: You are sharing the seeds of life with the universe. Please plant these seeds consciously, wisely, and with love. Everything reflects back to you and the seeds that have been planted.
inspire.author: Steve Leasock

inspire.quote: How you feel and how you respond is your responsibility.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: The choice is yours in how tightly you choose to cling to your story and which thoughts you choose to have about the event.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: You can be hurt and angry AND have a peaceful heart.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: These experiences are transitory. It will not be like this forever.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: Just as you give yourself grace, give your partner grace.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: Awareness is the first step in empowering change.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: Choosing compassion will foster open-heartedness for your soul, whereas judgment will foster close-heartedness.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: Honoring your truth creates the space in which a peaceful heart can emerge.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: You have control over how you experience your past.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: You are in charge of how you recall your memories.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: Despite your best efforts and intentions, you cannot control how others think of you or respond to you.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: What they say you are is not necessarily the truth of who you are.
inspire.author: Stephanie Meriaux

inspire.quote: There is no need to regret when you learn to live alone.
inspire.author: Vikrant Bhingardive

inspire.quote: Remembering everything is not the only solution. Perhaps, forgetfulness can make us live in peace too.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: Wait for it Son, to be a good writer you must learn to be patient with your listening and as for the story, it is far from over; there is much more to come~Vitthal
inspire.author: Kanika Sharma

inspire.quote: You see, the problem with dark arts is that it will give you what you want but it will not remain under your control for long~Sister Ava Thomas
inspire.author: Kanika Sharma

inspire.quote: In school, they taught us a "hero" never follows the "herd". Twenty years of being a misfit and I finally realised that maybe, the hero never had a choice. Maybe, a hero was just a reject from the herd.
inspire.author: Ayushee Ghoshal

inspire.quote: When the mind is busy, the stomach cannot complain of hunger too.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: The sun will rise again!
inspire.author: Felicia  Sanders

inspire.quote: Rationalization is the robber of dreams.
inspire.author: Raymond C Nolan

inspire.quote: don't be afraid of struggles, because as you go on, it enhances your confidence
inspire.author: Anath Lee Wales

inspire.quote: don't be affected by the ideologies of others because no one can be someone else, be yourself, the real you is a winner
inspire.author: Anath Lee Wales

inspire.quote: I Just wanna a cup of strong coffee under the deep sea!! And there I want all moments to remember while drinking it
inspire.author: Bakkaprabhu Uppar

inspire.quote: yet some way, you’ve turned catastrophe into a bouquet,proving you are meant to survivefor those who long to be alive within greenhouses you’ve contrived,and these flowers will thrive on your earth.scents of sage engage the sanctity of your rebirth.now do you see all you are worth?
inspire.author: Christine Weimer

inspire.quote: Kamala Harris is the female representation that we've all been waiting for. She is a good example in showing that women, black women, can lead key countries too.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: What matters is 'progressive thinking', regardless of its source.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: The world is moving so fast, progressing towards new ways of thinking and doing things. You'll be left behind if you don't adjust.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Dreams are not impossible. I'm possible.
inspire.author: Felicia  Sanders

inspire.quote: Politicians are friends behind closed doors. They do some of the social activities together. So, to be at peace with yourself, redirect your energy into making a positive change in the world. Start a society or charity. Write or speak positive messages to others. Do something else if your vote didn't win.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Every blow against me only strengthens me.
inspire.author: K.S. Villoso

inspire.quote: People who are being abused, who accept the abuse and see nothing wrong about it. End up abusing others.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: I also learned that God wants us to question things. How wouldn’t He allow His children to learn through curiosity?
inspire.author: Chaker Khazaal

inspire.quote: Think you're too busy for another project? Whether busy or not, ask yourself, "Do I have the right balance of joy, money, and flow in my life?" If you want an outcome different from the one your current path is leading to, somehow you'll have to find the time. Being too busy may be the new social currency, but the real winners find time to do what matters to them.
inspire.author: Chris Guillebeau

inspire.quote: When you dwell on the past, you are wasting the limited time you have on this earth. You are missing the beauty of the present moment. Place your attention and energy on the people and activities you love and how you can be of service, here and now. You are human, imperfect, and whole, just as you are.
inspire.author: Jessica Speer

inspire.quote: Great people have great values and great ethics.
inspire.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

inspire.quote: You will know the meaning of life when you find the difference between breathing and just breathing.
inspire.author: Srikanth Mahankali

inspire.quote: The story of Cinderella is a metaphor for our life experience. Just like Cinderella, some of us will often find ourselves as the only value-giver, surrounded by value-takers. Our goal is to create value, to become sculptors of value; while their goal is to focus on their own value and try to take by all means, to add more to it. When you take value, that's because you're not creating it in the spaces you are in and that surround you. You're not a valuable experience in other people's lives. You're the ugly stepsisters. But unlike Cinderella, we need to be more like Belle. We need to know our own worth while our own worth is happening.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: So hard to describe how I know that it's true, I don't quite know where to begin. Like conveying the sight of a sunrise to someone who's always slept in.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: Sometimes, we find peace by becoming forgetful of the past events. That is truly the bright-side of forgetting negative things in our lives.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: There is no peace without forgetting past events.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: If the ideas of reincarnation were true, I would love to see the slave incarnated as the king.
inspire.author: Mwanandeke Kindembo

inspire.quote: See how everything is vibrating around, the wind, the sun, a bird song , I close my eyes just before my morning readings , I leave the third one open, wide open.
inspire.author: ofer cohen

inspire.quote: Self care, in a sense, is the act of giving yourself that love you so desperately seek from someone else. Self care is taking initiative to love yourself, and then going one step further and putting that love in action. Self care is treating yourself the way you would treat anyone that you deeply love. It's accepting both your strengths and your flaws and caressing your imperfections until you realize that your imperfections might just be the most perfect thing about you. It's the first step to living a fulfilling life. Self care is self love in action.
inspire.author: LeeNor Dikel

inspire.quote: You will never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.

inspire.quote: Repentance is the first step towards redemption.

inspire.quote: Here's what he said: People adapt to you. Don't worry, you can't be what they think of ou to any degree, and by the same token what they think of you can't alter you.

inspire.quote: Many of us can't heal or help ourselves. But we have certain resources that can heal or help others. It's amazing how life forms a full cycle.

inspire.quote: It's quite easy to assume that a multilingual person is stupid. When you know only one language, you become a specialist in that language. You make no mistakes. People listen to you with seriousness, and life is good. But you become a specialist because you are limited in your vocabulary. For example, English speakers use the word 'can' without making any mistakes. They are always confident that the right word is 'can'. As a result, they may be perceived as intelligent people. Because confidence can easily sway the masses. But in the case of a multilingual person, the vocabulary is expanded. When they speak, their brain has to consider the word 'can' in English, 'pouvez' in French, 'kan" in Afrikaans or Dutch, 'puede' in Spanish, and so on.So, while the brain is trying to go through each language memory box, taking into consideration its rules, the speaker could appear blank in their face, slow in the mind, or stuttering when they speak. Then, the society may start to reject them, or to label them as 'stupid.'Unfortunately, many people, especially foreigners, suffer because of this mistaken perception. The message here is that we need to broaden our views about other people. We need to consider them as equally intelligent as we often see ourselves.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Our only limits are those we set for ourselves. To break down and break free from those illusory limits, we must push ourselves. When we challenge the boundaries of our comfort zone, we expand it. What once seemed extraordinary becomes our new ordinary. When we push ourselves, we explore our human potential. When we push ourselves, we grow. Our breaking point is our making point.

inspire.quote: Sometimes in life, people will try to define you. And if they fail, they would do everything to paint you into the image they want.Allowing that to happen won't diminish your true value.Those with valuable eyes will recognize valuable things.So, don't fight back.

inspire.quote: Never laugh at someone who has a plan , because you see they have nothing on them, when you look at them. You will be the joke when their plan succeed.

inspire.quote: You pounce on everything you said with a pair of tweezers and pluck it about until you can't remember exactly what it is you said, what context it was in, if you even said it, and if anyone heard you at all.

inspire.quote: To remind myself to never go back to being careful, I made a list of new freedoms. It looked like this: I am willing to sound dumbI am willing to be wrongI am willing to be passionate about something that isn't perceived as coolI am willing to express a theoryI am willing to admit I'm afraidI am willing to contradict something I've said beforeI'm willing to have a knee-jerk reaction, even a wrong oneI am willing to apologizeI'm perfectly willing to be perfectly human. The whole experience makes me wonder if the time we spend trying to become somebody people will love isn't wasted because the most powerful, most attractive person we can be, is who we already are; an ever-changing being that is becoming, and will never arrive, but has opinions about what is seen along the journey.

That’s why when youremember the painful event that happened ten years ago, your heart startsbeating fast or you become angry again. The body can’t differentiatewhat’s happening right now and what happened ten years ago, it just re-acts to your thoughts.

inspire.quote: A kind of light spread out from her.And everything changed color.And the world opened out. And a day was good to awaken to.And there was no limits to anything. And the people of the world were good and handsome. And I was not afraid anymore.

inspire.quote: There is an old Georgian tale about the old king who was dying. He had twelve sons, and he called them all to his death bed. He gave them a bundle of twelve arrows to break them together. None of them could break the bundle. Then the king separated the bundle and gave each one an arrow, and as was expected, everyone was able to break it. The old king told them that if they would stay together, the enemy could never defeat them as they couldn’t break the bundle. But if they would separate, the enemy could conquer them easily.In a relationship, the enemy is any problem the couple has. Unfortunately, what often happens is that when the couple has arguments, they see each other as enemies, instead of seeing the problem itself as an enemy. It’s not "Me versus you," it’s "Us versus the problem." We don’t have to be separated when we have issues, we have to unite in order to resolve the issue.
inspire.author: Ani Kapanadze

inspire.quote: Opportunity strikes those who strive for it.

inspire.quote: Leave the past, from which you always ran; and live today because you can.

inspire.quote: But now i know. Now i know i deserve to be the happiest, most fulfilled version of myself that I can possibly be. And i promise to use my experiences to continue to grow, heal and expand my life. It starts with me.

inspire.quote: A refugee is someone who was forcefully taken out of their time and place. They were then placed in another time and another place that insist on dehumanizing them. It is a tragedy. In this way, they leave no place for a refugee to feel at home or even alive.

inspire.quote: Throughout my life, I have been a seeker of wisdom and truth, always intrigued by the great mysteries of life. I have also grown a great deal through pain and suffering. In the words of Maya Angelou: "Those who learn, teach." And so, my mission in life is to share the wisdom of my soul with the world. I believe that the soul is the place where the God within us resides. It’s where love lives.

inspire.quote: You may look at my life and find it boring. That's alright. You are in a good position; a position of living your life the way you envision mine. I'm living my life in an authentic way. And, with all due respect, it is not aimed at pleasing you.

inspire.quote: Go backwards? No good at all. Go sideways? Impossible! Go forwards? Only thing to do, on we go!
inspire.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

inspire.quote: They own the window, You own the view

inspire.quote: You can't outwork a dream deferred.
inspire.author: Kierra C.T. Banks

inspire.quote: The vastness and splendor of a created worldlies beyond our mind, mired as it is in our senseless stupidity and destruction. Blind we remain to the persistent hope—the gratitude of life lived out instinctively, beautifully, in grace perfected— of the pandaof the polar bearof the emperor penguin.Creatures each given to a hardship of existence for which we, in our malnourished philosophic quest, would render not worth the effort. Pass then, creatures of the ice and snow into the annals of extinction, where later regret can bring no resurrection. If what we do brings you to this fateful end, so be it. We’ve saved you the trouble of struggling on. Besides beauty, what do you have to offer us? Where is your value-proposition that we can exploit for our profit, anyway?
inspire.author: T.P. Graf

inspire.quote: You'd think that the forest is at the mercy of the flame, but that's not it. The flame's greatest fear is the forest: being out of control, consumed from the inside out, burning with no end in sight. It is the flame which is at the mercy of the forest; but the forest doesn't care, she promises no end, she never says it stops or that it gets better! Flames never asked to be born as flames: so volatile, so vital, so uncontained. You are a flame, this world is a forest. Do you see it now? It was never the other way around.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: MAN HATES BEING TAUGHT.STILL MAN LOVES TO LEARN.(Hence SXILL was born.Hence pedagogy exists.To take teach out of learn)

inspire.quote: Far from being a passive endurance of life's tribulations, resilience is an active process you can choose to engage it. As we explore the key factors that cultivate resilience—connection, flexibility, perseverance, self-regulation, positivity, and self-care—you’ll gain clarity on the many choice points you have.
inspire.author: Gail  Gazelle

inspire.quote: It turns out that you already have resilience deep within you. While we often consider resilience to be an exceptional quality, in fact it resides within everyone. Most of us don’t know how to access our resilience, however, as we never learned that we each have an unshakeable, deep inner core of strength and capability. For many of us, rediscovering that buried core of resilience takes some thoughtful and determined excavation.
inspire.author: Gail  Gazelle

inspire.quote: Resilience is a renewable strength that lies within us, which we can draw upon to provide what we need to meet the challenges we face.
inspire.author: Gail  Gazelle

inspire.quote: The beauty of children is in their adaptation, we must nurture their spirit and never put limits on their potential; the plan we have for them may be the very thing that limits them. Never forget they are whole as they are, we are the ones that have to learn to listen differently.
inspire.author: Dana Hall LCPC MA TF-CBT

inspire.quote: When we live our lives with meaning, our struggles are much easier to overcome.

inspire.quote: THEY OWN THE STAIRSYOU OWN THE CLIMBसीढ़ी उनकी हैचढ़ाई तुम्हारी हैSEERDHI UNKI HAICHADHAI MERI HAI
inspire.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

inspire.quote: Lions never think about hunting,

inspire.quote: Resilience is a well of inner resources that allows you to weather the difficulties and challenges you encounter without unnecessary mental, emotional, physical, and spiritual distress.

inspire.quote: He asked if I loved him and I asked him if the sun ever needed the permission of the day to shine.

inspire.quote: To achieve resilience, we have to change our inner critic to an inner ally, and move from self-harshness to self-kindness.

inspire.quote: For resilience to deepen, we have to diminish the inner critic, lessening the amount of airtime the voice typically garners. We have to see the critic for what it is: misguided. Once we do, we free ourselves from its reign. When we bring our attention to the current moment, and pay greater attention to what's truly happening in our inner world, we see that the inner critic is just a voice, typically one that does not speak the truth. We can see more and more clearly that while we're not perfect—nobody is—we’re much less imperfect than our inner critic proclaims.
inspire.author: Gail  Gazelle

inspire.quote: There is always a way to move toward the things that matter in your life and feed your well-being. There’s always sustenance available from the well of resilience inside you, even when it feels most depleted. No matter how dark the time in your life, that well is never as empty as it seems, and you always have the ability to replenish it.
inspire.author: Gail  Gazelle

inspire.quote: Far from being a passive endurance of life's tribulations, resilience is an active process you can choose to engage it.
inspire.author: Gail  Gazelle

inspire.quote: Queening is the courage to define and see yourself as the highest form that you can be
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Success can be discovered on the other side of our fears, doubts and insecurities.
inspire.author: Angel Moreira

inspire.quote: Sometimes there are things that are too precious to let go
inspire.author: Emi Zako

inspire.quote: We are great within our own capacity, our greatness is immeasurable within God's capacity.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: No existence is a waste, no matter how little you think your part is in life.That part is what makes up a greater whole.Quit seeing yourself as an insignificant being.
inspire.author: Ojingiri Hannah

inspire.quote: Be my date, not because you are the best option but because my love for you is the only world I live in.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: God gives life for living.Life cannot be lived without a home with food and warmth. Without a home with food and warmth you are sentenced to death.God reads accurately all spaces between every line.
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Your life is yours. Do shine brightly and design the whole new things, something that can bring you pleasure and merriness.
inspire.author: Shaa Zainol

inspire.quote: Identify the worthiness within you,Of achieving the destination,before claiming it as yours.
inspire.author: Musafir Asmani

inspire.quote: Life is too short and delicate to live in shame.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Dear Liar, I've collected evidence from my family, friends, and even online. It proves that I'm not what you told others I was. I'm not crazy. I'm not alone. I'm not unloved. I'm not useless. I'm not stupid. In fact, I'm intelligent. I'm beautiful. I'm useful. I'm loved. I am not alone.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: I read recently that Americans are buying used cars for an average of $12,000, and I thought, Why don't they take the bus to work and make a feature film instead?
inspire.author: Rick Schmidt

inspire.quote: Every Backward Step Is For Me To Go Further Like A Slingshot
inspire.author: Marion Bekoe

inspire.quote: Elevate your self worth first, before you reach out to the world is search for promotions, transformation starts within.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Dream comes on itself but it is us who keeps it going.
inspire.author: MD. Muhtashimur Rahman

inspire.quote: Do you always wonder why a lot of products are cheap? Well, it's because they are produced and released in bulk. My point is: Just embrace your state of being different if you feel like you don't 'fit in'. Being unique is very valuable.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Stop blaming everyone when you have made wrong choices. You will ever learn. You will never grow, and you will keep on repeating same mistakes over and over again .
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: Let it all out; the characters dancing through the folds of your mind, the voices echoing within your soul, and the tales which course through your veins.
inspire.author: dumdum007

inspire.quote: Until you work as hard as those you admire, don't explain away their success as luck
inspire.author: James Clear

inspire.quote: A life without dreams would be far too sad.Dreams are made to become butterflies.A world without dreams is like a land without color,And it would be just a shadow that appears and disappears.
inspire.author: Diana D. Wild

inspire.quote: Love by Maisie Aletha SmikleLove is like a doveDescending from abovePure generous and genuineKind gentle patient and divineLove knows no boundsAs it aboundsLove must be coupled with self controlLess it rolls out of controlLove is good and can never be badUnless you love what isn't goodLovers of the goodHave withstoodTrials and testsFor love must persistTo conquer hateAnd not abate or dissipateLove is kindAnd not unkindLove is not blindLove looks intuitively deep to find its kindLove sees beyond the exterior Love examines the interiorLove sees beyond pimples Blemishes faults and wrinklesLove is goodLove is not badLove hates evilEvil hates loveLove and evil do not go hand in handLove good abstain from evil and do no wrongOnly love will stand the test of timePatiently persevere kind and always on time
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: At 54 I'm still in progress. And I hope that I always will be. For me becoming isn't arriving somewhere or achieving a certain aim. I see it instead as forward motion.
inspire.author: Michelle Obama

inspire.quote: Ona diyorum ki," Derdini sev, kaderini sev, sana kuyuların karanlığından sonra aydınlığı göstereni sev.
inspire.author: Kemal Sayar

inspire.quote: If some hunted as hard for information as they do for inspiration, they might find themselves in a better situation.
inspire.author: Loren Weisman

inspire.quote: Life is a Gift by Maisie Aletha SmikleLife is not strifePut away the knifeLife is a giftFor both the fit and unfitDon't dis itAnd miss itDon't step asideTo commit suicideThat is murderCan't you tellIf you live you'll be put in a cellIf you die you'll go to hellYou want to be in heavenBut instead you're in hellHell on earthThe place of birthLife is a gift don't dis itPut away the gunThat's no funGo for a run or watch the sunSo you want to rush to heavenLife on earth is hellBut instead you'll land in hellFor killing yourself wellThey are badThey make you sadYou are good and they are badDon't get it twisted and feel badLife is a giftDon't dis itAnd miss itLive it…
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Setbacks are opportunities only known to those with the right mindset and perception.
inspire.author: Marion Bekoe

inspire.quote: Hoje sei que é o equilíbrio entre todas as partes envolvidas em um sistema que o torna harmônico. Valorizo a minha própria companhia mais do que a de qualquer outra pessoa. E, ah! O silêncio! Aquele que só é interrompido pelo respirar, pelos pássaros, pelo acontecer orgânico de um ambiente em um movimento natural. Posso sentar ali, sozinha, por horas, e apenas observar e sentir. A paz de estar comigo mesma! E hoje, acho que por isso a minha cor favorita é o branco. Uma única verdadeira inspiração que posso compartilhar com certeza. O respiro. O silêncio. Esses elementos que para mim geram o equilíbrio. O vazio, às vezes, carrega mais informações do que um espaço preenchido. E um salto neste vazio é o que me alimenta!
inspire.author: Kalina Juzwiak

inspire.quote: Splashing Fireworks by Maisie Aletha SmikleLike earthly starsFireworks lit the skiesFlashing in magnificent grandeurShowing off Its beauty and its splendorLike the colors of the rainbowSparks flew some violet blueSwimming floating glidingLike starry streams collidingJoining in an ocean of airThen spectacularly disappearSprinkling glows and glitters Of shining starry littersGlowing and hovering gracefully in the airWe sat on a chairAnd watched and cheerTo behold fireworks so dearMystical magical ellipticalBurst of lights so hypnotical Splendidly arrayed beamsAppear in glowing streamsShowers of light with its mistMystically disperse without a twistAs sporadic lights focus in a parabolic embraceTo disseminate in spaceA precious sight and delightIt is to behold fireworks dark at nightAnd to glimpse the bright And beautiful lightOh such graceful outlayOf lights in an arrayIts beauty to portrayThe fireworks on display
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: The point is always to heal and encourage as many people as we can.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Elk ding is een woord
inspire.author: Clarice Lispector

inspire.quote: Mastering Letters and Numbersby Maisie Aletha SmikleGet readyYou are readyI am readyWe are readyWe must earnSo let's learnTo count to tenAnd use a pen1, 2 oh no you got boo boo3, 4 we can do more5, 6 it's half past six7, 8 we shan’t be late9, 10 let's count againTo write a noteOr give a quoteYou’ll need your numbersAnd letters tooTo succeedBooks we’ll readDo good deedAnd never speedABCDEFG... O my g...HIJKLMNOP... I ran to peeQRSTUV... We sip some tea WXY and Z ...Let’s go and zzzzI’ll come calling in the morning And we'll practice till in the eveningFor we shan’t give up on learning or achievingNor our goal to succeed inCounting from one to tenAnd writing letters with a penTo learn we must from dawn to duskFor education is a must
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Changing the world starts with you
inspire.author: Camille Burnett

inspire.quote: I know the devastation and desperation a human soul can feel when every earthly option fails. But I also know the freedom that can only come through Jesus, and how miraculously God can intervene when we cry out in brokenness for His mercy.
inspire.author: Patty Mason

inspire.quote: From broken crowns to muddy footstepsI've wandered this messed up worldGrowing from a child who easily misstepsTo a rising queen who believes in more
inspire.author: Jessica DCamp

inspire.quote: I think it’s brave that you get up in the morning even if your soul is weary and your bones ache for a rest.I think it’s brave that you keep on livingeven if you don’t know how to anymore.I think it’s brave that you push away the waves rolling in every day,and you decide to fight.I know there are days when you feel like giving up butI think it’s bravethat you never do.
inspire.author: Lana Rafaela Cindric

inspire.quote: Spotby Maisie Aletha SmikleSpot looks DalmatianAnd might even be a MartianHe likes to cuddleAnd play in a puddleSpot is polka dotCotton white and velvet blackAstute smooth and immaculateBetter than a box of chocolateHe cushions allBefore a fallAnd stands tallTo catch a ballAt the cat Spot barksWhen he goes for walksSniff sniff he detects a ratHe must get thatHis nose to the groundTail wagging like a houndHis ears proppedAnd huge eyes poppedFrom the leash Spot dashedIn a twinkling flashLike Tom and JerrySpot leapt in a hurryHe dug deep in the sandTill he could standSniff sniff the rat is goneAnd Spot is worn and all forlornSpot needs a boneAnd not sand stoneSo back Spot went away from the pebblesTo catch some floating bubblesSpot ate his boneAnd sat on a stoneGazing at the distant sun in the horizonHe mused for treats he could have a dozen
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Never Settle for less than you want/deserve and Never Overlook what you already have
inspire.author: Author Unknown

inspire.quote: Butterfliesby Maisie Aletha SmikleColorfully colored butterfliesBlack yellow orange and green With their beautiful specksAlign the garden decksButterfly butterfly…Lovely flies that ain't got butterTheir beauty makes one stutter And their heart go pitter patterAnd will soon melt like butterThey won’t eat from a platterAnd one can only mutter Butterfly butterfly ....Radiant as the sunshineBeautiful as the colors of the rainbowHarmless as a deerAdorn for all to seeFirst it was a caterpillar Crawling on its tiny legsIt's entire body stretches out on a leafIn the twinkling of an eyeThe caterpillar transformsAnd are given wings to flyAnd fly it must….It was not created to crawlMiraculous indeedIs the life of a butterflyDisplayed for all to seeHope in the life of a radiant butterfly
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: You may not be able to reach what's in front of you, until you let go of what's behind you.
inspire.author: Golden Flower

inspire.quote: We live in a world where people take trust and loyalty for granted.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Our lives are intricately intertwined. The cord that binds us is much stronger than I imagined. It’s now obvious to me that my success is tied to yours. Your light lightens my path. Your darkness obscures my sunshine. I can’t seem to rise faster or higher than your help. I can’t stand comfortably while you languish on the ground. My celebration is incomplete without yours. It’s sweeter when we share the podium than when I stand there alone. Knowing how crucial you are to my life and purpose, I am here sending you a notice - I am in your corner. Here is hoping you will be gracious enough to be in mine.
inspire.author: Abiodun Fijabi

inspire.quote: Grief and loss have a special way of revealing your true support system. Take note.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: A Leader is a Reader .
inspire.author: Mizo Amin

inspire.quote: Joan of Arc’s feminine magnetism had an overwhelming motivating power over the demoralized men – and nation – of her day. It is unlikely that even a handsome young man in the vigor of his youth could have had the same effect. Joan’s feminine beauty and virtue simply won over the hearts of her countrymen.
inspire.author: Peter Darcy

inspire.quote: It is hard to overestimate the fervor with which the men of her day greeted the Maid and embraced her mission. When Joan set out to lift the siege of Orléans, the dauphin could barely muster 2,000 straggling recruits to accompany her. When she rode into the city of Reims for the king’s coronation less than three months later, more than 11,000 soldiers rode with her.
inspire.author: Peter Darcy

inspire.quote: I hope that I never become so set in my ways that I meet someone different from me and think of them wrong and I right. I hope that I never become so set in my ways that I meet someone different from me and refuse to sit with them because I think them sinners. I hope I never become so set in my ways that I cannot change my opinions and beliefs when I roam and meet others unlike me. I hope that when I am 85, I will still be able to change my mind and learn from all of our many differences; sins and praises both.
inspire.author: C. JoyBell C.

inspire.quote: Allow your thoughts / mind / God to shape your Destiny.September 2020.
inspire.author: Dr. Anthony Onyachonam Chukuma aimls mbbs CPA USA hhi Harvard USA.

inspire.quote: Your Mindset Will Determine Your Future
inspire.author: Marion Bekoe

inspire.quote: We need to teach people not about human beings but about being human.
inspire.author: Camille Burnett

inspire.quote: We are inspired by the knowledge of possibility, our actions inspire the fruition of what was once an idea.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Family will not agree on everything, nor will a family unit conform to one standard, but love is the common denominator that will bond a family.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: A true family's love nourishes, it's the rock that is meant to support and strengthen you after being weakend by adversities of life.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Appreciate the gifts of the world, but never lose value for your family.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Our senior citizens paved many great paths for the future that have deep sentimental values, and are deserving of the greatest care and love.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Sometimes you need to experience harsh losses before you find healing.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: If your lover is second to none, that's true love served on a golden platter.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Looking for solace from the wrong people can cause you more damage.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Please give me a hand, less I lose my balance. I never thought I needed you this much.
inspire.author: Abiodun Fijabi

inspire.quote: Live in regrets? I 'll take a pass. Why dwell on the past that I cannot change? Thankfully, I have today to deal with and tomorrow to hope for.
inspire.author: Abiodun Fijabi

inspire.quote: In God We TrustFor Heaven is a Must
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: In God We Trust. For Heaven is a Must.
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: The methodical process of analytical thinking brings clarity to effectively define a clear strategy.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Greatness is supreme, it takes the spirit of a true champion to pursue it.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Extending help and receiving help is not a sign of weakness, but rather a representation of united strength.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Celebrate your birthday with the greatest joy for the priceless gift of life, be filled with joy that brings renewed strength.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Fallen heroes remain iconic figures through their devout patriotism and loyalty, the nations progress of today and the nations future growth is made possible by the foundation they build with great sacrifice.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Invest with an end vision in mind in order to scale your investment growth, misguided investments yeild losses.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Trust the timing of your life. DON'T GIVE UP NOW!
inspire.author: Adanne Chukwudi Udejiofor

inspire.quote: You will live by what you encourage, or you will die by what you encourage. Some of the things happening to us is not bad luck, being witched, cursed or misfortune, but It is the consequences of our actions. Go and do well or right, for your life and success depends on it.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: Every change begins with a single step in the right direction.
inspire.author: Laura Hervey

inspire.quote: A harmless lie is better than a harmful truth. Better to wield strength in an imperfect land than to be powerless in a perfect one.
inspire.author: Rin Chupeco

inspire.quote: Each man's life touches so many other lives. When he isn't around he leaves an awful hole, doesn't he?
inspire.author: It's a Wonderful Life

inspire.quote: To be perfect without suffering means no change. If you know neither hurt nor hardship, then you will not know the strength they can summon within the person. What is life's meaning if you cannot distinguish between happiness and sorrow?
inspire.author: Rin Chupeco

inspire.quote: You make me feel Monday is Saturday.
inspire.author: Avijeet Das

inspire.quote: The challenges that we experience are a call to reassess our purpose.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: No tienes un futuro negro, Ginger. Tienes un futuro inmenso. Una página en blanco delante de ti. Y puedes escribir lo que tú quieras".
inspire.author: Alice Kellen

inspire.quote: Rose Gardenby Maisie Aletha SmikleIn the garden roses bloomBlossom sprout and loomWith prickly stalks they budRed white and pink rosebudsPetals open petals fallTo grace the garden floorTake a midnight walkAnd inhale petals on the stalkAs dawn draws nearDewdrops form round and clearTrickling down the petals like a tear Cascading down the rosebud stalksLanding at it's rootWatering little sproutsSo tiny buds may riseFrom the garden floorSpringing up to bloomPetals of pink white and redTo cover the garden bedAnd their sweet aroma spreadRoses of good cheerRoses for posesRoses I bringTo make you singTo bring you happiness To bring you love To bring you joyAnd to bring you peace
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: You thought I'd change into a bad person after you lied about me. Instead, you exposed the bad intentions in you.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Before you weigh your neighbor's hogs, fix your own broken pens.
inspire.author: Rin Chupeco

inspire.quote: There's a fine line between laughter and pain. And I think, sometimes, it's the only thing you can do with your pain. Sometimes things suck so bad that you have to laugh at it.
inspire.author: Jared Reck

inspire.quote: Decisions congregate with emotion; one moment you are certain of yourself, the next you are standing where you once swore you never would. And then you must pick up your life where it fell, dust it off, and pretend that you knew what you were doing. Pretend that profound wisdom can be somehow gleaned from pride.
inspire.author: K.S. Villoso

inspire.quote: Perhaps, when you love less, it is easier not to let the emptiness become a cavern from which you could no longer see the sun.
inspire.author: K.S. Villoso

inspire.quote: In the end, you will heal. Your wounds will fade into beautiful scars. Your heart will remember your pain as only a symbol of your strength. The thoughts of your struggles will turn into giggles. Because you are not meant to suffer forever. You will not die in sorrow. You will heal. You will heal.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: You were someone special before you met them. And you will continue being one even after they've left you.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Men only see the truth in their very greedA transparent hollow with a misguided grinSo wide-apart that it cannot be filled. A fair one cry or a cry of the thousandsThe wave of justice seems far-awayFor it deserts Men in their most needIts not always sudden and swiftBut it’s sure to come at the ugliest hourThis is the hateful truth even Eris herself concedes
inspire.author: Abdulkadir Abdullahi

inspire.quote: Your strength is not measured by the pain you’ve endured. But by the lessons you’ve gained from that pain.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: I have stopped asking about the wounds in my life. The truth is that everyone has wounds. For some, they're even scarier, deeper, and bigger. For what it's worth, I have learnt that my wounds, regardless of their size, are there for my lessons and growth.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Our lives are cycles. We only break the cycle through changing our perspectives, or by meeting with death.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: The real within us, is found in nature,Our soul created a painting for us.We have colors and animals...From wilderness, we grew dandelions.
inspire.author: Diana D. Wild

inspire.quote: Forestby Maisie Aletha SmikleIn the forest there lived a manWho was chased from his landThey took his toilAs their spoilThey wine and dineAnd drank his fine wineThey took his precious coinAnd bank it like a mineLike pirates they hoard and stashHeaping loot on top of lootNo one dare to askFrom whence such treasure cameBut took taxes, bribes and giftsLike Christmas comes on shiftsThe looters chimed and saidWe are not Robin WoodWho took from the richAnd gave to the poorSo the poor could have moreInstead we are wood robinsThat take from the poorAnd give to the richSo the rich can have moreO what a stitchWhile the wealthy is richerAnother is that much poorerRobin Wood is outlawedAnd wood robin is in the lawIndeed it is flawedRobin Wood is wood robinThe spoils only shiftFrom the poor to the rich
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Both the ones who celebrate us and those who humiliate us are vessels of change. Our power is in that we own the scale of how much their words impact our lives.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: I was hurting so much inside. Yet, I wanted my words to reach and heal as many people as possible.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: A religious society, empowers and restores hope and faith in those that seek to fellowship with them; alienating those seeking to strengthen their faith changes the narrative of what a faith based society stands for.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: Vote for a transformative leader that empowers the growth of a nation, not a figurehead that thrives on socio-economic instabilities.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: The past cannot be re-shaped, but the desires of what the past could have been, can help shape the future by progressively building the desired path each day.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: The loss of a loved one causes pain, but the treasured experiences shared will bring joy to a saddened heart, the support given will help bring renewed strength.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: You cannot expirience a peaceful world if you inspire war, you cannot expirience a world of love if you inspire hate and you cannot expirience a rational world if you inspire ignorance.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: You cannot experience a peaceful world if you inspire war, you cannot experience a world of love if you inspire hate, you cannot experience a rational world if you inspire ignorance, you cannot experience a merciful world if you inspire unforgiveness and you cannot experience a world of unity if you inspire divisiveness.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: When we're in an emotional pain, or any physical strain, we must consider ourselves as a tainted cabbage.Our aim should be to remove our felt baggage. Usually, when a cabbage is tainted,only a small section is affected. But we often err,and throw the whole cabbage in the air.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: When feeling low, just remember...The moon too looks broken at times.
inspire.author: Granthana Sinha

inspire.quote: Modesty is well and good, but acknowledging improvements to one's skill is as necessary as acknowledging improvements to one's character.
inspire.author: Rin Chupeco

inspire.quote: Success is not measured by what you have. It's measured by what you give.
inspire.author: Crystal Alexis Ingram

inspire.quote: Beauty is timeless, every gorgeous smile never fades into the shadows of time.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: The TideGushing to the shoreI must have moreI aim to reach a beachThat's beyond my reachBe still whispers the waveYou may just land in a caveI can't be still my name is TideI shall not hideI'll take your foamYou need not groanI'll take to shore what weighs you downAnd fossils that you refuse to ownSoon I will landOn the soft sandThen turn around for a trip againDoing my part to keep the ocean cleanI go up and I go downI rise and I fallI ebb and I flowJust to make the ocean glowI bring you measuresOf timeless treasuresI bring you archaeological fossilsI shall n’t be stillFor soon I will turn aroundTo return againWith gifts from the oceanAnd endless fun beneath the sun
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Becoming an Author requires discipline. Touching others with your pen requires creativity. And building a name requires devotion.
inspire.author: Lola O.

inspire.quote: When there is peace, there is growth.
inspire.author: Ojingiri Hannah

inspire.quote: Once Upon a Starless Night by Maisie Aletha SmikleOne starless nightThe dish flew awayAnd left the spoonThe spoon looked for the moonBut the moon was not in tuneIt decided to come at noonThe midnight sky wondered whyThe moon and the stars were not in the skyO what a moonless starless nightNothing was in sightExcept the night owls and alley catsTheir eyes casting shadows on the meadowsWhy O why moans the midnight skyAre the moon and stars gone from the skyWhy O why cries the spoonIs the dish gone when there is no moonShadows driftAnd the spoon makes a wishO starless night I wishFor a flying dishTo rest my spoonAnd find the moonThat's out of tuneAnd wants to come at noonAn angel heard the wishAnd brought the dishThe stars and the moonBack to the spoon
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: I am sorry. Genuinely uttered, that three-word statement, has saved many relationships that were on the the brink of collapse and has strengthened many more.
inspire.author: Abiodun Fijabi

inspire.quote: True happiness is not as a result of the amount of riches you have acquired.True happiness is the content you feel even when you haven't gotten everything you aspired.
inspire.author: Ojingiri Hannah

inspire.quote: External voices can damage or make you.Don't let those voices control the wheel of your life.Listen to your own inner voice and let it be the compass that direct your life towards greatness.
inspire.author: Ojingiri Hannah

inspire.quote: Embrace the suck
inspire.author: James D. Wilson

inspire.quote: This is what places and the people we meet in those places are meant to do. Even the most transitory. They are meant to descend on us and shape us and help us evolve. To leave indelible marks of color and insight and newly discovered loves and passions all over our souls.
inspire.author: Hallie Lord

inspire.quote: At first learn the things in proper way and then teach the same to others in another way.
inspire.author: Nitish Kumar Bharadwaj

inspire.quote: Don't be so focused on the problem that you neglect to see the progress.
inspire.author: Crystal Alexis Ingram

inspire.quote: Fitness training not only strengthens you, but also promotes a wholesome quality of life.
inspire.author: Wayne Chirisa

inspire.quote: The sky is not a limit. It is a limitation.
inspire.author: Crystal Alexis Ingram

inspire.quote: The Hungry Lion by Maisie Aletha SmikleI pray for my preyHay is not my forteMy meal comes walkingHopping jogging or runningHiding I layAwaiting my preyI pray for a mealTo come my wayBut not todayI will go awayAnd wait another dayI must live or I might dieWhile I lieIn wait for my preyA hippo comes strollingAnd I start droolingBut not too soonA cobra comes crawlingHe hissed and missedI sprang and the hippo sangIt's not its day to be in my fangO that cobraMade me lost a hippoAnd an enormous supperWhat a dayI was almost a cobra's preyTomorrow is another day I must wait and catch my prey
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Snuffy by Maisie Aletha SmikleMy name is SnuffyThey call me FluffyI have no handsI have no feetFor a rideI have no slideI cannot glideNor strut my strideSwimming seems grimI must not grin ahaBut laugh I mustTill my ductless tears gustI travel farI travel wideWithout a sailWings or wheelMobility is my gameMy antennas are wirelessMobile is my homeI carry it all aroundAm booked alwaysA motel or hotel or innCannot keep me inFor my home am always inI incubate day or nightOr in a frightMy home is my shellIt serves me wellYes. I am a snailAnd not a whaleI do not sail Nor have a tail
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Don't be ashamed of your roots for history doesn't define your future or who you are today
inspire.author: Godknows Jencarlos

inspire.quote: Write until somebody responds.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: My definition of living is the possibility that we live in a realm of fantasy, an adventure that can only be transpired through the lens of a writer.
inspire.author: Eli Liszt

inspire.quote: Value is seen through deeds.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Lovely melodies with the peaceful sound of falling rain is such a perfect rhythm combination.
inspire.author: Shaa Zainol

inspire.quote: O My O MyI dreamt of friesThey filled the skiesAnd rained from the cloudPounding rooftops rather loudI ranPeople ranWe all ranTo fill our canO my o myFries are fallingThe farmer comes callingWondering why buyers are stallingThis can't be the farmer saysIt’s pouring heavenly spudsHe grabbed a chairTo reach for his shareThere will be another yearWhen potatoes will bearAnd buyers will want his spudsBecause there will be no heavenly budsThere will be tater totsFor the potsAnd cooked potatoes to mashSo there’ll be some cashThere’ll be potatoes to bakeTo have with steakTop that off with a cakeNot all is at stakeAdd potato rollsFor a long strollMy O my fries arriveWithout a tollMake wedgesFor some edgesTie a spud with a bandanaPotatoes have gone bananas
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Gratitude is the grammar of success.
inspire.author: Jacques De Villiers

inspire.quote: The Tide by Maisie Aletha SmikleGushing to shoreI must have moreI aim to reach a beachThat's beyond my reachBe still whispers the waveYou may just land in a caveI can't be still my name is TideI shall not hideI'll take your foamYou need not groanI'll take to shore what weighs you downAnd fossils that you refuse to ownSoon I will landOn the soft sandThen turn around for a trip againDoing my part to keep the ocean cleanI go up and I go downI rise and I fallI ebb and I flowJust to make the ocean glowI bring you measuresOf timeless treasuresI bring you archaeological fossilsI shall n’t be stillFor soon I will turn aroundTo return againWith gifts from the oceanAnd endless fun
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: Turning your life into a masterpiece is your payment for getting to play here.
inspire.author: Jacques De Villiers

inspire.quote: To grieve means you have loved. To love opens up the possibility for grief. There cannot be one without the other.
inspire.author: Rin Chupeco

inspire.quote: The infinite, it's so sweet...Through him, everything goes beyond.We are born from Infinite,And that doesn't make us heroes.
inspire.author: Diana D. Wild

inspire.quote: The past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it or learn from it
inspire.author: Rafiki (The Lion King)

inspire.quote: I'm not matching anyone's energy, but I'm also not chasing.
inspire.author: Kierra C.T. Banks

inspire.quote: To create is to participate in the life we were given.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: If I could share something with the world, it would be happiness.Cos there are wounded hearts that needs the touch of laughter.
inspire.author: Ojingiri Hannah

inspire.quote: Sometimes it's really hard to go on in life, not knowing what fate tomorrow holds.But you should keep going, trusting God that everything will eventually be alright.
inspire.author: Ojingiri Hannah

inspire.quote: When life throws uncertain flints of doubt and disharmony, and the roads seem to be lonely. The wanton gust pulls your zest apart and you are left with your shattered heart. You may never know someone's full story so never be quick to judge someone's life because the universe itself keeps the untold mysteries in its murkiest heart.
inspire.author: Arindol Dey

inspire.quote: Life is like a game of chess. You move your pieces to achieve an end goal...you can't lose sight of that goal.
inspire.author: Ardnas Marie

inspire.quote: Everything starts when your thinking turns into action and actions into genuine efforts and efforts to produce results and results which bring success.
inspire.author: Syed Aiyaz Uddin

inspire.quote: The only path to walk is your OWN.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: The goal is to believe in them. Yet, if they fail to believe in themselves, it's a DEAD end.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: In life, we're minutes and moments destined to be extraordinary.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: How can you be valued if you are not valuable
inspire.author: Anande Semwenda

inspire.quote: Mindfulness isn't mindfulness if you can't handle the fullness of your mind.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: Mañana Starts Today!
inspire.author: Sandra Elaine Scott

inspire.quote: The world has everything to offer only to those who have a dream, will, and action.
inspire.author: Syed Aiyaz Uddin

inspire.quote: If you want to succeed then you must first fail because failure will teach you what inherited success or opportunity success cant teach you.
inspire.author: Syed Aiyaz Uddin

inspire.quote: If they can't see your value, they don't deserve your gold.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: I discovered writing a great story is the same high as reading one! I have been hooked ever since!
inspire.author: Karen Keith

inspire.quote: If you’ve lost everything, find yourself. If you haven’t, find yourself anyway.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: We cannot know someone from his or her actions and words alone; we need to understand their thinking.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: Leave others more qualified to worry for the stars.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: The need to breathe, air, so intrinsic to life. So is love the sole averment of ever having been truly alive.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: To have known love and lost leaves one disconsolate and voided, forever seeking some course of revival. A way to bring it back, to breathe again.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: The bad ones, the deep, dark secrets, stay hidden the longest. Festering, roiling, gnawing.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: A door appears as I tremble cold, receding portal of fading light. Frantically clawing to find a hold, but there's nothing left, and nothing right.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: Could treats so good be bad at all? A hunger oh so strong... 'La Dolce Vita' is my call, delicious can't be wrong.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: Spin this that way, that to this, it's quite easy to do. Discretion is unneeded where the roadblocks are few.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: I just don't have time for all this worthless chatter. I'm apathetic, because it doesn't matter.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: Perception is an excuse not to see that everything's just as it seems, to me.
inspire.author: John     Casey

inspire.quote: ألا تشعرين أنه لا يمكنك إلا أن تعشقي هذا العالم عندما ترين صباحاً مثل هذا الصباح؟
inspire.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

inspire.quote: Time is the only treasure I have on earth.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Be on the side of the angels. Be a prism. You have that something within, the higher self.
inspire.author: James Joyce

inspire.quote: The moment you start to stand for yourself is the moment the world will stand against you.
inspire.author: Aiyaz Uddin

inspire.quote: You must learn to stand still with a soul full of motions.
inspire.author: Ree Villaruel

inspire.quote: A loser is someone who still has something to lose.
inspire.author: Péter Zilahy

inspire.quote: Repentance is necessary for regeneration.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Repentance is one step towards reformation.
inspire.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

inspire.quote: Today you can choose to enjoy and celebrating the remain days of the year or you can choose to complain and cry about the past days of the year.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: My heart is not necessarily a measure of my love for the other but a measure of my humanity.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: If there is one thing people desire more than a good story, it is when they speak their own.
inspire.author: Rin Chupeco

inspire.quote: Breeding isn't what you were born as; breeding is what you grow to be.
inspire.author: Rin Chupeco

inspire.quote: life is too short for living,and bulky to renounce.
inspire.author: Musafir Asmani

inspire.quote: Every business today was once a thought in the mind of a person who was inspired by an idea. What makes a thought perfect is "perfect thought".
inspire.author: Aiyaz Uddin

inspire.quote: The only things downplayed in a friendship should be fine lines and wrinkles.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: What Resonates, Make It Write! Because When It's from You, It will be for All
inspire.author: Bhavya Jain

inspire.quote: haters gonna hate, players gonna play. live your life man.
inspire.author: Rap Monster

inspire.quote: You are all of your needed directions put together: where east, south, north and west find a happy crossing, where left meets right, where backwards makes an extraordinary forward.
inspire.author: Ree Villaruel

inspire.quote: Young children can worry excessively about a variety of things like grades, family issues, friendships, and how they fit into this world. It is important now, more than ever, that we equip them with the tools to create a positive life.
inspire.author: Niki Spears

inspire.quote: Worrisome thoughts can be like a thunderstorm blocking the sunshine from your day.
inspire.author: Niki Spears

inspire.quote: Today, pause and appreciate the good things happening around you.
inspire.author: Niki Spears

inspire.quote: A heartful of gratitude creates a life filled with joy.
inspire.author: Niki Spears

inspire.quote: Today, have the courage to BE Happy!
inspire.author: Niki Spears

inspire.quote: The more you find the good in every situation, the more every situation becomes good.
inspire.author: Ari Gunzburg

inspire.quote: Negativity literally shuts us down. It closes us off, it limits our possibilities, it increases the darkness in our lives...[while] positivity is expansive. Positivity opens us up, broadens possibilities, and increases the light we experience in the world.
inspire.author: Ari Gunzburg

inspire.quote: Feel the world around you–both good and bad–so you can truly feel the good.
inspire.author: Ari Gunzburg

inspire.quote: Create your OWN dreams.
inspire.author: K.D. Gates

inspire.quote: You can also fall and win at the same time, By falling high in things you love!
inspire.author: paul sachudhanandam

inspire.quote: all we need to decide is what to do with the time given us...
inspire.author: Jrr Tolkien

inspire.quote: In order for you to master your true self, you need to first expose and explore yourself. When you do you will see yourself through your own mirror and that's where you start to see your true self. But how many do? Or have the courage to face themselves?
inspire.author: Aiyaz Uddin

inspire.quote: Shake off the Spear by Maisie Aletha SmikleIt's bitterIt's badYou are wounded and sadThe wrenching agony of deceitHas left you raging madRobbed of joyYour treasured toyYour peaceful mindNow unwindAmidst your pain of utter grief and disbeliefYou were stabbed. But You bled not.You were kicked. But You Flinch not.You were shoved. But like a Boulder you stand.You were shunned. But like a distant star in the galaxy you shone.You died a thousand deaths. But You rose from the grave with unparalleled dignity.Oh yes. It's bitterIt's badYou are wounded and sadThe wrenching agony of deceitHas left you raging madShake off your SpearDry your bitter tearThe dagger is wornTattered and tornCovered in shameThe adversary relinquished it's claimReclaim your joyYour treasured toyYour peaceful mindNow unwindAmidst your gain and utter relief
inspire.author: Maisie Aletha Smikle

inspire.quote: We don't need to save the world; we need to love people. We can't fix anything for anyone, but we can listen. We can love. We can empathize. And as long as we can, we should.
inspire.author: MARY SWAN-BELL

inspire.quote: Exercise your heart by lifting other people up!" ~Michelle Cole
inspire.author: Michelle Cole

inspire.quote: The problem is you want what other people have. You don’t want your own things. Success is different in each and every person. Don’t let your success be define by others. Success it is tailormade.
inspire.author: De philosopher DJ Kyos

inspire.quote: You are always of value and you can only succeed if you value you.
inspire.author: Muhammad Saad Uddin

inspire.quote: You were not born to please, you are here to disrupt, awaken, speak truth, to ease the pain scattered around so when you are told to quiet down, I hope you grow louder.
inspire.author: Muhammad Saad Uddin

inspire.quote: Every relationship will be complicated until you'll give value to each relationship accordingly.Every relationship has its respect, value, and self-worth. A relationship demands honesty. Whether in family or friendship or marriage, we have to show our true hearts to have a real connection to every relationship.
inspire.author: Muhammad Saad Uddin

inspire.quote: Maybe someday you get exhausted and broke as hell but remember, everyone's time comes. Keep chasing your goals and wait. You'll see, one day you won't be broken.
inspire.author: Muhammad Saad Uddin

inspire.quote: A defective noise will perform a function of breathing better than a good ear.
inspire.author: Khuliso Mamathoni

inspire.quote: There are always ups and downs in life. If today's a bad time, then remember one day will be a good time. Times passes. Be like time, like time never gives up, so should you.
inspire.author: Muhammad Saad Uddin

inspire.quote: Hearing the word ‘no’ is of no consequence—when all you really need is one ‘yes,’ keep on going!
inspire.author: D. Linn Whorley

inspire.quote: A Healthy, Happy, Abundant Life begins in your MIND, which translates into your THOUGHTS which trigger your ACTIONS and ULTIMATELY shapes your FUTURE…which remains unwritten~your Life is What YOU make it!
inspire.author: D. Linn Whorley

inspire.quote: Anything worth having is worth working for: Set high expectations for yourself, when you reach those, set higher ones!
inspire.author: D. Linn Whorley

inspire.quote: Expression and inspiration give wings to our creativity. Whenever we are inspired, we instantly become motivated to make things happen!
inspire.author: D. Linn Whorley

inspire.quote: Operate in your gift and you will arrive at your destiny.
inspire.author: D. Linn Whorley

inspire.quote: You think you're stopping me, but you're helping me.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: If you want to achieve anything in life, nothing will happen just by sitting and watching. You have to fight to achieve it.
inspire.author: Muhammad Saad Uddin

inspire.quote: May you truly know that You Are Enough. That is a given. From there, find something you really love to do, get behind that, and push with all you've got. Channel any negative energy inside you into something positive that you can share and contribute to the world.
inspire.author: Lauren Tom

inspire.quote: To know the universe itself as a road, as many roads, as roads for traveling souls. The soul travels, the body does not travel as much as the soul. The body has just a great of work as the soul and parts away at last for the journeys of the soul." If it’s happiness we are after it is the pursuit of happiness that matters.
inspire.author: Walt Whitman

inspire.quote: You can't grow your brain but you can grow your mind.
inspire.author: Dr. Divya Mishra

inspire.quote: To know the universe itself as a road, as many roads, as roads for traveling souls. The soul travels, the body does not travel as much as the soul. The body has just a great of work as the soul and parts away at last for the journeys of the soul." "It’s not the getting there that matters so much as the going." "If it’s happiness we think we are after it’s the pursuit that actually makes us happy." -various versions of The Song Of The Open Road over the centuries.
inspire.author: Walt Whitmantman

inspire.quote: Čoveku je sudbina ono u šta veruje.
inspire.author: Isidora Bjelica

inspire.quote: Musicians collaborate with each other all the time. Why don't we do the same as writers?
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: As the sun rises anew each day, so we too have the opportunity to awaken each moment of every day.
inspire.author: Michael Brant DeMaria

inspire.quote: In every pain and joy lies the makings of our next awakening.
inspire.author: Michael Brant DeMaria

inspire.quote: The deepest mystery is that there is something eternal about who we are.
inspire.author: Michael Brant DeMaria

inspire.quote: Change occurs when the pain of where we are overcomes the fear of where we are going.
inspire.author: Michael Brant DeMaria

inspire.quote: Never think yourself perfect otherwise you won't able to learn new every moment of life. However, life is shorter but has a lot to learn.
inspire.author: Muhammad Saad Uddin

inspire.quote: We don't have to experience everything at first hand. We can learn from our friends' experiences too. Let's be wise.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Tell me the role I play in your life while I'm still alive. Instead of doing it through social media or memorial gatherings when I'm dead. That is all.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: If it's good advice, it doesn't matter who offers it. I'll take it.
inspire.author: Mitta Xinindlu

inspire.quote: Like a weary bird flying out over the most desolate sea, I finally had a place to land.
inspire.author: Adrienne Young

inspire.quote: Sometimes you’ve got to walk away from something’s to walk into better things.
inspire.author: Temi O'Sola

inspire.quote: The mightiest of things have the humblest beginnings
inspire.author: S.A Chakraborty

inspire.quote: Share your mistakes with the world because you once wished that someone would have done the same.
inspire.author: Amara Leggett

inspire.quote: I am no longer falling for hearts,For I have sinned with words.
inspire.author: Madhushree Das

inspire.quote: There must be some place along the route, a halfway house in time, where the runners may pause and ask themselves why they run, what is the prize and is it the prize they really want?
inspire.author: Whitney Otto

inspire.quote: Tell the story that's been growing in your heart, the characters you can't keep out of your head, the tale that speaks to you, that pops into your head during your daily commute, that wakes you up in the morning.
inspire.author: Jennifer Weiner

inspire.quote: I disapprove of what you say but i will defend to the death your right to say it.
inspire.author: Voltaire

inspire.quote: Some dream dreams others live them. What shall it be for you?
inspire.author: Melonie B. Garrett

inspire.quote: [...]Enquanto houver lugares onde seja possível a asfixia social; em outras palavras, e de um ponto de vista mais amplo ainda, enquanto sobre a terra houver ignorância e miséria, livros como este não serão inúteis.
inspire.author: Victor Hugo

inspire.quote: A time we crossed when the world turned their heads of denial and scorn was a paramount importance. But the moment transition invaded at the threshold, the left old faces began to exchange the words of amity.
inspire.author: Arindol Dey

inspire.quote: A brand or business that skips the creative process has not been founded and is just a failed dream with a worthless title of being founded
inspire.author: James D. Wilson

inspire.quote: A hundred-dollars goes a long way when you’re following your dreams," Sofia said kindly.
inspire.author: NA Leigh

inspire.quote: It’s okay. It’s a shopping bag," she said, looking up into his eyes. "It’s what’s on the inside that counts.
inspire.author: NA Leigh

inspire.quote: If we all are judged on the basis of our worst day, nobody will make it to heaven.
inspire.author: D.B. Stageman

inspire.quote: More is accomplished in life by a person who is guided by principles than by one who relies on their will. When your will fails let your principles prevail because you stand a better chance of making success of your dream.
inspire.author: Victor Kwegyir

inspire.quote: Obstacles are what you see when you take your eye off the goal
inspire.author: Anonymous

inspire.quote: Forgivivng without receiving apology is not a way to show off about feeling less pain or no pain at all.But there are angels on earth who believe that humans will always be human, thus forgive.
inspire.author: Ojingiri Hannah

inspire.quote: Many ladies deceived by the number of likes, comments under their post and love massages in their inbox and become too much though of themselves, yet they can't produce husbands in many years.
inspire.author: IG_Garbati

inspire.quote: For beginners- Write wrong or right, write happy or sad, write good or bad, write left or right, Just write
inspire.author: Neel Rana

inspire.quote: It's not about what you think it's about how you feel.
inspire.author: Tanishka singh

inspire.quote: You are priceless to me, Sebastian. Nothing in this world or beyond compares to you. Think of my love whenever you glance at the time." ~ Lola Lewis
inspire.author: Charmaine Louise Shelton

inspire.quote: I may not have the key to success but I know how to pick the lock.
inspire.author: Drew Hastings

inspire.quote: I do want a life insurance, but what I need is a heart insurance. Sometimes the heart can break so bad, that all the body breaks too, irreparably.
inspire.author: Temi O'Sola

inspire.quote: Success breeds success while broke breeds broke
inspire.author: James D. Wilson

inspire.quote: If you do not have a great support system, be your own mentor.
inspire.author: Amara Leggett

inspire.quote: When you build consistency in your business, you can easily find the strengths and weaknesses of your strategy.
inspire.author: Amara Leggett

inspire.quote: I know the world is not interested in my stories, still i will write and rewrite it, just to remind myself who i was, who i am, and who i could be.
inspire.author: Priyanka Pandey

inspire.quote: Who says there is no second chance in life, there are infinite chances in life to make it happen when u stop waiting for chances and start creating chances for yourself.
inspire.author: Priyanka Pandey

inspire.quote: Your network often reflects your net worth.
inspire.author: Amara Leggett
